[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'dul ba nga bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgyad bcu gsum pa/_gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_kha lo sgyur ba mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa nyam chung ba dbang po 
[\[1b.2\]]nyams pa/_skye bo mang po'i mig gis kyang lta mi phod pa 'di ci yin/_lha 'di ni bro 'tshal ba zhes bgyi'o/_/kha lo sgyur ba nad kyis thebs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_lha mi 'di gang 
[\[1b.3\]]'dis 'gum par 'gyur ba'i gnas de mchis te/_lha 'di ni bros thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/kha lo sgyur ba nga yang nad kyi chos dang nad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/_lha yang snyun gyi chos 
[\[1b.4\]]dang snyun gyi chos nyid las ma 'das so/_/kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas nga nad las ma 'das zhes grags pa'i don de nyid 
[\[1b.5\]]bsam par bya'o/_/kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/_der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas bdag kyang nad las ma 'das pa 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/_/'dir smras pa/_mi ni lus rid skya bo rbab rbab po/_/rang dbang med pa'i nad thebs 'dir gzigs nas/_nad las bdag ma 'das pa lta zhig ces/_/de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan 
[\[2a.2\]]dgongs par mdzad/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/_kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/_skyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' bar gyur tam/_lha ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe 
[\[2a.3\]]na/_lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba na mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa/_nyam chung ba/_dbang po nyams pa/_skye bo mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang bdag la bka' stsal pa/_kha lo sgyur ba mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa/_
[\[2a.4\]]nyam chung ba/_dbang po nyams pa/_skye bo mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa 'di ci yin/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha 'di ni bros thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/de 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba nad kyis thebs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_de 
[\[2a.5\]]la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/mi 'di gang gnod pa 'dis 'gum par 'gyur ba'i gnas de mchis te/_lha de ni bros thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/de 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba nga yang nad kyi chos dang nad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/_de 
[\[2a.6\]]la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha yang snyun gyi chos dang snyun gyi chos nyid las ma 'das so/_/de 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas nga nad las ma 'das 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/_/lha gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas nga yang nad las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi 
[\[2b.2\]]tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang /_gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/_ma la bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin la 
[\[2b.3\]]ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin te ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so/_/'dir smras 
[\[2b.4\]]pa/_de tshe dga' nas bdag 'dor mi gzhug phyir/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang /_/reg bya yid du 'ong ba gtso rnams kyi/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po yang byin no/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i 
[\[2b.5\]]tshe kha lo sgyur ba la/_kye kha lo sgyur ba re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang /_der bzhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_kye kha lo sgyur ba re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms 
[\[2b.6\]]shig_/der nga zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po bshams te byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[2b.7\]]shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyis/_lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs te skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]pas ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla re bres pa dang /_khyogs khyer ba dang /_mdun na me sgron thogs pa dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang /_bud med skra bshig pa rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhin 'brang ba zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas 
[\[3a.2\]]kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_kha lo sgyur ba ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla re bres pa dang /_khyogs khyer ba dang /_mdun na me sgron thogs pa dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang /_bud med skra bshig pa rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhin du 'brang ba 'di ci yin/_
[\[3a.3\]]lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o/_/kha lo sgyur ba shi ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_lha mi 'dis slan chad sdug pa'i pha ma mi mthong zhing bu pho dang /_bu mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las bgyid pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyang ma lags la/_de dag gis kyang slan chad 
[\[3a.4\]]'di mi mthong bas lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o/_/kha lo sgyur ba nga yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/_lha yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/_/kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'di ltar nga pho 
[\[3a.5\]]brang nyid du phyin nas nga 'chi ba las ma 'das zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/_/kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/_/der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas bdag kyang 'chi ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes 
[\[3a.6\]]shing thugs ngan dgongs so/_/'dir smras pa/_tshe zad pa yis 'du shes bral gyur cing /_/sems med mi yi ro zhig gzigs nas ni/_/'chi las bdag ma 'das pa lta zhig ces/_/de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba 
[\[3a.7\]]la smras pa/_kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/_skyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' bar gyur tam/_lha ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba na ras kha dog sna tshogs las bgyis 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]pa'i bla re bres pa dang /_khyogs khyer ba dang /_mdun na me sgron thogs pa dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas mchi ba dang /_bud med skra bshig pa rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang bdag la gsungs pa/_kha lo sgyur ba 
[\[3b.2\]]ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla re bres pa dang /_khyogs khyer ba dang /_mdun na me sgron thogs pa dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang /_bud med skra bshig pa rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba 'di ci yin/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[3b.3\]]to/_/lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o/_/des 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba shi ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha mi 'dis slan chad sdug pa'i pha ma mi mthong zhing /_bu pho dang /_bu mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las bgyid 
[\[3b.4\]]pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyang ma lags la/_de rnams kyis kyang slan chad 'di mi mthong bas lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o/_/de 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba nga yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[3b.5\]]lha yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/_/des 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas 'chi ba las ma 'das zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/_/lha gzhon nu de pho brang 
[\[3b.6\]]gi nang du gshegs te bdag kyang 'chi ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang /_gzhon nu skra dang kha 
[\[3b.7\]]spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/_ma la bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin la ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin nas ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so/_/'dir smras pa/_grong khyer dam pa dpal ldan yid 'ong der/_/lha yi 
[\[4a.2\]]lhar gyur sgron ma dang mtshungs pa/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga pos kun dgyes pa/_/mig stong dga' ba'i tshal na gnas pa bzhin/_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par bya 
[\[4a.3\]]dgos te/_'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos so snyam nas de rnams kyis mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa lag pa na lhung bzed thogs pa zhig khyim nas khyim dang khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba zhig sprul to/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed 
[\[4a.4\]]mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la kha lo sgyur ba re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang der bzhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/_de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs 
[\[4a.5\]]pa/_kha lo sgyur ba re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig_/der bzhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po bshams nas byang chub sems 
[\[4a.6\]]dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyis/_lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang 
[\[4a.7\]]por zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa lag pa na lhung bzed thogs pa zhig khyim nas khyim dang /_khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang kha lo 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_kha lo sgyur ba mi skra bregs shing lag na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang /_khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la 'di'i gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/_ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/_lha de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/_/
[\[4b.2\]]kha lo sgyur ba rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_lha rab tu byung ba de ni dul ba legs pa dang /_yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /_don spyod pa legs pa dang /_chos spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas 
[\[4b.3\]]skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba ste/_lha 'di ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/_/kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta 'di rab tu byung ba gang na ba de logs su sgyur cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas 
[\[4b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas shing rta de rab tu byung ba gang na ba der bsgyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas rab tu byung ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye mi khyod ci'i phyir skra bregs shing lag pa na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim 
[\[4b.5\]]dang /_khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la khyod kyi gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/_ci ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba yin/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu bdag ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/_/kye mi khyod ji ltar na rab tu byung ba zhes bya/_gzhon nu bdag 
[\[4b.6\]]gis dul ba legs pa dang /_yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /_don spyod pa legs pa dang /_chos spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho 
[\[4b.7\]]nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de ltar na bdag rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o/_/kye mi khyod kyis dul ba legs pa dang /_yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /_don spyod pa legs pa dang /_chos spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge legs 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/_dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba legs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/_kha lo sgyur ba de'i 
[\[5a.2\]]phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas don 'di kho na bsam par bya'o/_/kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/_der pho brang du gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa kye ma'o bdag ni skra dang kha 
[\[5a.3\]]spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa'i don de nyid dgongs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/_kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas skyed mos 
[\[5a.4\]]tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/_skyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' bar gyur tam/_lha ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba na mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig 'tshal ba sug pa na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang /_khang 
[\[5a.5\]]pa nas khang par rgyu zhing mchi ba zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba mi skra bregs pa lag pa na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang /_khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la 'di'i gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/_ji 
[\[5a.6\]]ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/_/de 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/_de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha rab 
[\[5a.7\]]tu byung ba de ni dul ba legs pa dang /_yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /_don spyod pa legs pa dang /_chos spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]pa kho nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba ste/_lha 'di ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/_/de 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta 'di rab tu byung ba gang na ba de logs su sgyur cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas 
[\[5b.2\]]shing rta de rab tu byung ba gang na ba de logs su bsgyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas rab tu byung ba de la 'di skad ces gsungs te/_kye mi khyod ci'i phyir skra bregs la lag pa na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang /_khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la khyod kyi 
[\[5b.3\]]gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/_ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba yin/_des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gzhon nu bdag ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_kye mi khyod ji ltar rab tu byung ba zhes bya/_des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[5b.4\]]gzhon nu bdag gis dul ba legs pa dang /_yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /_don spyod pa legs pa dang /_chos spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas 
[\[5b.5\]]dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de ltar na bdag rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa kye mi khyod kyis dul ba legs pa dang /_yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /_don spyod pa legs pa dang /_chos spyod pa 
[\[5b.6\]]legs pa dang /_dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang /_dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba legs so/_/lha de nas gzhon nus gsungs pa/_kha lo sgyur ba de'i 
[\[5b.7\]]phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas don 'di bsam par bya'o/_/bdag gis de nas shing rta bsgyur nas gzhon nu pho brang du zhugs so/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang /_gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/_ma la bdag gis gzhon nu zhing pa'i grong du btang la ci nas kyang de la 
[\[6a.2\]]sems g.yengs par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/_gzhon nu shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu tshur shog_/khyod zhing pa'i grong du song la las kyi mtha' la ltos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgas pa dang /_nad pa dang /_shi ba mthong nas ni yid byung ngo /_/
[\[6a.3\]]rab tu byung ba la ni mngon par zhen pa'i blos yab shAkya zas gtsang gi tshig gsan nas shing rtar zhugs te zhing pa'i grong du skus gshegs kyi thugs kyis ni ma yin no/_/de la lam kar gter lnga brgyas kha nye bar bstan te sgra phyung ba/_gzhon nu bdag cag ni khyod kyi nye du'i gter lags 
[\[6a.4\]]kyis bdag cag bzhes shig_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_re zhig de rnams kyis blun po'i yongs su gzung ba byas nas ci zhig byas/_khyed nga la dgos pa med kyis song shig_/tshigs su bcad pas kyang gsungs pa/_gang gis nga la 'chi ba'i gtam smras pa/_/de 
[\[6a.5\]]dag kyang shi gtam du gyur pa yin/_/bdag kyang shi nas ring po mi thogs par/_/gzhan dag gi yang gtam du 'gyur bar 'ong /_/de rnams kyis yang sgra phyung ba/_/gzhon nus gal te mi bzhes na/_/bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpas ci bde bar 
[\[6a.6\]]zhugs shig ces gsungs pa dang /_de rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa dang /_ji tsam na zhing pa skra gyen du 'greng ba/_lag pa dang rkang pa ser ga byung ba/_lus rdul gyis yog pa dag cig dang /_rmon pa lcag gzer bu rnon po 
[\[6a.7\]]can gyis lus dral bas rgyab dang mjug do'i phyogs khrag gis yog pa/_ltogs pa dang skom pas dbugs brdzags shing snying ga'i phyogs nas dbugs brdzags pa ring du 'dren la gnya' shing gis mnan pa'i rma las rnag khrag 'dzag pa la sbrang bu dang 'bu'i tshogs za ba/_thong 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]lcags kyis rkang pa rma byung zhing /_kha dang sna nas kha chu sna chu 'dzag la sbal pa dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings kyis [,]ring gis [}]yog pa rnams gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsod nams bskyed cing bsags pa'i thugs rjes kun nas bskyod pa'i 
[\[6b.2\]]thugs kyis zhing pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/shes ldan dag khyod su'i yin/_de rnams kyis gsol pa/_lha'i lags so/_/des gsungs pa/_shes ldan dag deng phan chad bran du mi bya/_mngag gzhug par mi bya/_rang dbang can gang dga' bar 'gro bar byas/_
[\[6b.3\]]bde ba la reg par gnos shig_/rmon pa rnams kyang bkrol nas gsungs pa/_khyed cag kyang deng phyin chad rtswa mchog ma nyams pa la za zhing chu ma rdul ma bsnyogs shing dang bdag la 'thungs shig_/khyod la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung bsil ba ldang bar gyur cig_/de nas byang 
[\[6b.4\]]chub sems dpa' yid byung ba de nyid kyis yab shAkya zas gtsang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' la gzigs nas shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/_shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs te/_'dod pa las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben 
[\[6b.5\]]pa/_rtog pa dang bcas/_dpyod pa dang bcas shing dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can zag pa med pa dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang byang chub sems dpa' spangs te mi 'gro bar shing gzhan rnams 
[\[6b.6\]]kyi drung na sdod do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa byang chub sems dpa' ring zhig thogs te 'di ltar dro'i dus las yol gyis ltar 'gro'o zhes de shing rtar zhugs nas zhing pa'i grong du song ste phan tshun du byang chub sems dpa' tshol zhing shing 'dzam bu'i drung du phyin to/_/
[\[6b.7\]]de'i tshe nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol/_shar phyogs su 'bab/_shar phyogs su bab par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mthus shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ngo /_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol/_shar phyogs su 'bab/_shar phyogs su bab par gyur na shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhon 
[\[7a.2\]]nu ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_'di ltar da lta nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol/_shar phyogs su 'bab/_shar phyogs su bab par gyur na shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba ngo mtshar che'o snyam mo/_/
[\[7a.3\]]de nas dga' ba'i bsti stang byas te byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_ji ltar bltams tshe sa ni g.yos pa ltar/_/'dzam bu'i grib mas khyod sku mi gtong ba/_/blo chen khyod kyi ya mtshan gnyis 'di ste/_/kun gzigs khyod 
[\[7a.4\]]kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' skyil mo krung bcas pa las bslang nas shing rtar zhugs te/_dur khrod kyi nang nas ser skya'i gzhir gshegs pa na byang chub sems dpas dur khrod kyi nang na mi ro rnam par sdos pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[7a.5\]]'bus gzhigs pa dang /_rnam par bam pa dag gzigs nas de shin tu skyo ba skyes te/_shing rtar zhugs bzhin du skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so/_/de nas yang rgyal po zas gtsang gis skyil mo krung bcas pa las bslang nas/_ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/_grong khyer 
[\[7a.6\]]gyi nang du 'jug pa na mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te gzhon nu zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar lung bstan par rig nas de rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te de yi bzang po gzigs bzhed na/_/de'i 
[\[7a.7\]]slad dgung bdun bar du srungs shig dang /_/mi dbang gdugs ni bdal bar gyur pa na/_/rin chen sna bdun 'byung bar the tshom med/_/khyod sras rin chen bdun po yi/_/dbang phyug gi ni rgyal por 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho la ni thug pa'i sa/_/chad pa med pas skyong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]'on te sa ni spangs nas su/_/bsnyengs med nags su bzhud na ni/_/thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur nas/_/'gro ba sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur/_/shAkya dus legs kyi bu mo [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes zhes bya ba de skar khung na 'dug pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad 
[\[7b.2\]]de smras pa/_kye ma 'di yi yum bde zhing /_/yab de yang ni bde ba yin/_/kye ma gang gi khyim thab 'gyur/_/bud med de yang mya ngan 'das/_/skyes mchog bsam gtan pa de yis/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra thos nas/_/mya ngan 'das pa zhi nyid du/_/mkhyen nas de la 
[\[7b.3\]]thugs dgyes gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas legs par smras pa'i phyir mu tig gi phreng ba 'phangs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthus skar khung nas song ste de'i mgul du 'khris par gyur to/_/skye bo'i tshogs kyis nang du song ba de mthong nas/_de rnams kyis rgyal 
[\[7b.4\]]po zas gtsang la rgyas par smras nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mos 'tsho ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes la sogs pa'i 'khor bud med drug khri yod do/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[7b.5\]]po zas gtsang gcung bre bo zas dang /_zas dkar dang /_tshad med zas gsum dang lhan cig gcig tu tshogs nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la gal te zhag bdun gyi bar 
[\[7b.6\]]du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis/_de lta bas na bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' zhag bdun gyi bar du bsgrims te bsrung bar bya zhing grong khyer yang legs par bsrung bar bya'o/_/de nas de rnams kyis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer rab 
[\[7b.7\]]rim pa bdun dang 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo 'phar lcags las byas shing /_sgo 'phar rnams la dril bu shin tu sgra gsal ba btags te sgo phye na de'i sgras dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu grag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]kyi gzhi na bud med yid 'phrog pa gzugs bzang ba rnams dang /_gar dang glu dang /_rol mo rnams kyi spyod pas bsnyen bkur byed du bcug go/_/blon po rnams ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig ra ba'i phyi rol kho ra khor yug tu gcan pa byed du 
[\[8a.2\]]bcug go/_/skas spor rung ba mi lnga brgyas tshugs pa yang byas so/_/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgor yang sgo phye na de'i sgras rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho brang du grag cing de thos nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mi dang /_grong khyer gyi sgo srung rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi grong khyer gyi phyi rol 
[\[8a.3\]]nas srung du bcug pa rnams bag dang chas te 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta bu btags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi skyes pa med par zhugs nas pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_'khar rnga dang /_sgra snyan la sogs pa rol mo'i cha spyad dag nye bar len cing 'byor 
[\[8a.4\]]pa chen pos bzhugs so/_/mtshan mo ni rgyal po zas gtsang yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang shar sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go/_/lho phyogs na ni bre bo zas so/_/nub phyogs na ni zas dkar ro/_/byang phyogs na ni tshad med zas so/_/grong khyer gyi dbus kyi 'gram po byed pa ni 
[\[8a.5\]]shAkya ming chen no/_/de shar sgor song nas smras pa/_su zhig mel tshe byed/_su zhig mel tshe byed rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_kho bo mel tshe byed do/_/lha mel tshe mdzod cig_/mel tshe mdzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras te/_tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'jig 
[\[8a.6\]]rten gnyid log ro dang mtshungs/_/gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song /_/'di na mi nyal rtag tu mkhas/_/de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/_/lho sgor song nas smras pa/_su zhig mel tshe byed/_su zhig mel tshe byed/_bre bo zas kyis smras pa/_kho bo mel tshe byed do/_/lha mel tshe 
[\[8a.7\]]mdzod cig_/mel tshe mdzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'jig rten gnyid log ro dang mtshungs/_/gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song /_/gnyid log 'chi bdag dbang du song /_/de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/_/nub sgor song nas 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]smras pa/_su zhig mel tshe byed/_su zhig mel tshe byed/_zas dkar gyis smras pa/_kho bo mel tshe byed do/_/lha mel tshe mdzod cig_/mel tshe mdzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gnyid log pa ni rtag tu myos/_/myos 
[\[8b.2\]]'gyur bre bos 'thungs pa nyal/_/dgon pa'i nags su nyal ba 'dra/_/de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/_/byang sgor song nas smras pa/_su zhig mel tshe byed/_su zhig mel tshe byed/_tshad med zas kyis smras pa/_kho bo mel tshe byed do/_/lha mel tshe mdzod cig_/mel tshe 
[\[8b.3\]]mdzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ri nyal ri sul nyal ba bzhin/_/rgya mtsho'i chur ni nyal ba dang /_/ljon shing rtse la nyal ba bzhin/_/de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/_/dbus kyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag tu song nas smras pa/_
[\[8b.4\]]su zhig mel tshe byed/_su zhig mel tshe byed/_srung ma rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag mel tshe bgyid do/_/mel tshe byos shig_/mel tshe byas dang legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_chos spyod chos ma yin ma spyod/_/bden pa smros shig [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ma 
[\[8b.5\]]smra/_/mun pa chen por 'jug par 'gyur/_/de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/_/de nas nam nangs nas shAkya ming chen gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa/_lha dgung sangs lags te dgung bdun la dgung gcig ni thal/_dgung drug ni lus so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang 
[\[8b.6\]]gis smras pa/_legs kyis zhag drug 'das na gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur bar gyur na bdag cag nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir phyi bzhin dong ngo /_/de bzhin du dgung gcig lus so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 
[\[8b.7\]]'og tu 'jug pa yin pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mi dbang shAkya'i sras po thub pa 'di/_/bdag nyid chen po pha rol phyin drug rdzogs/_/thub rnams dgyes par mdzad pa dka' thub tshal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su gshegs par bzhed/_/de nas 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo dang lhan cig skyes pa med pa na rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag la gzhan dag gzhon nu shAkya thub pa ni skyes pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir grags 
[\[9a.2\]]'dzin ma dang /_sa 'tsho ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes dang /_bud med drug khri spangs nas rab tu byung ngo zhes gzhi des kha zer bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/_ma la bdag gis grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o snyam nas des grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig dga' 
[\[9a.3\]]mgur spyod pa dang grags 'dzin ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_nam nangs nas byang chub sems dpa'i snyan du gsol lo snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_bud 
[\[9a.4\]]med dang bdag khyim nyal ba'i/_/tha ma deng gi 'di yin te/_/phyin cad khyim du bud med dang /_/nga ni lhan cig mi gnas so/_/de nas bud med de rnams gar dang glu dang rol mos dub nas kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la gos dang lag pa dag lhug par btang nas bsla ba'i tshig 
[\[9a.5\]]byung rgyal du brdol zhing gnyid log go/_/byang chub sems dpas bud med de dag thams cad kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la gos dang lag pa dag lhug par btang nas bsla ba'i tshig byung rgyal du brdol zhing gnyid log pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang btsun mo'i 'khor la 
[\[9a.6\]]dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes nas des tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_rlung gi shugs kyis pad ma'i tshal ltar sa gzhi 'dir/_/lag pa dag dang rkang pa brkyang nas 'gyel gyur te/_/skra rnams zhig cing mdoms dang rkub kyi phyogs snang ba/_/shAkya'i sras kyis gzigs nas rang 
[\[9a.7\]]bzhin skyo bar gyur/_/tshul dang bral ba'i bud med na chung tshogs 'di dag_/dur khrod 'jigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin 'drar mthong nas/_/sems can byis pa'i spyod pa'i yul la deng dga' na/_/sems dang blo gros dran dang bral ba yin nam ci/_/'dod pa tha chad 'dam dang 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]mda' mdung dug me 'dra/_/rmi lam lta bu yin te tshwa chu'i ro dang mtshungs/_/'dod pa phung byed rtsod dang sdig pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/mtha' ngan sbrul gyi dbang po lta bu bdag gis spang /_/bar skabs der skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i rmi lam du bzhi rmis pa/_zla ba sgra can gyis zin pa 
[\[9b.2\]]dang /_nyi ma shar phyogs nas shar nas de nyid du nub pa dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bdag la phyag byas pa dang /_bdag nyid dgod cing ngu ba'o/_/grags 'dzin ma'i rmi lam du brgyad rmis pa/_bdag nyid kyi khyim gyi gdung chag pa dang /_bkra shis kyi mal khri chag pa dang /_lag 
[\[9b.3\]]pa'i gdu bu chag pa dang /_so'i phreng ba lhags pa dang /_skra'i lan bu zhig pa dang /_dpal khyim nas byung ba dang /_zla ba sgra can gyis zin pa dang /_nyi ma shar phyogs nas shar nas de nyid du nub pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang rmi lam lnga rmis pa/_sa chen po nyid kyi 
[\[9b.4\]]gzims mal du byas shing /_ri rab ri'i rgyal po dbu rten du bcug_/phyag g.yon pa shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug_/phyag g.yas pa nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug_/zhabs gnyis rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa dang /_'greng ba zhes bya ba'i rtsa'i rigs lte ba nas 
[\[9b.5\]]byung nas nam mkha'i bar du 'phags te 'dug pa dang /_bya kun nas dkar la mgo gnag pa rnams kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas pus mo'i lha nga la thug gi bar du ldag pa dang bya sna tshogs phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs nas mdun du kha dog gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_mi gtsang 
[\[9b.6\]]pa'i ri'i steng nas bdag nyid mi gtsang bas ma gos par 'chag pa'o/_/rmis nas kyang thugs dgyes te dgongs pa/_nga'i rmi lam 'di 'dra ba rmis pas ring po mi thogs pa kho nar bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas grags 'dzin mas byang chub sems 
[\[9b.7\]]dpa' la rmi lam gsol pa/_lha da gzod bdag gis g.yar lam du brgyad rmis pa/_bdag gi sdum pa'i gdung chag pa dang /_bkra shis kyi mal khri chag pa dang /_sug pa'i gdu bu chag pa dang /_so'i phreng ba lhags pa dang /_skra'i lan bu zhig pa dang /_dpal sdum 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]ba nas byung ba dang /_zla ba sgra can gyis zin pa dang /_gdugs shar phyogs nas bdal nas de nyid du nub pa rmis lags so/_/byang chub sems dpas grags 'dzin ma'i yid mi bde ba bsal ba'i phyir rmi lam rnams bshad pa/_bdag gi khyim gyi 
[\[10a.2\]]gdung chag go zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi 'dug gam/_bdag gi bkra shis kyi mal khri chag go zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang ma chag ste 'dug pa'o ni yin mod/_lag pa'i gdu bu chag go zhes smras pa gang yin pa ci chag gam ma chag rang nyid rtogs shig_/so'i phreng 
[\[10a.3\]]ba lhags so zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pas ci lhags sam ma lhags rtogs shig_/bdag gi lan bu zhig go zhes gang smras pa de yang khyod kyis so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pas ci zhig gam ma zhig rtogs shig_/khyim nas 
[\[10a.4\]]dpal byung ngo zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni bud med rnams kyi dpal ni khyo yin la nga ni 'dug pa nyid do/_/zla ba sgra can gyis zin ces smras pa gang yin pa de ni zla ba 'di mngon sum du 'dug pa ma yin nam/_nyi ma shar phyogs nas shar nas de nyid du nub bo zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[10a.5\]]da dung yang nam phyed yod de/_re zhig shar kyang ma shar na nub par lta ga la gyur ces de ltar brda sprad nas btsun mo grags 'dzin cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa grags 'dzin ma'i rmi lam de 'dra ba rmis pas gdon mi za bar nga kho na bdag 'gro bar 
[\[10a.6\]]byas 'di la tshig zur gyis bstan no snyam nas des de la tshig zur gyis bstan pa dang /_grags 'dzin mas gsol pa/_lha khyod gang du bzhud pa der bdag khrid cig_/byang chub sems dpas mya ngan las 'das pa las dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du bya ste/_gang 
[\[10a.7\]]du 'gro ba de dang der khyod bkri'o/_/de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nags kyi spre'u ni spyod 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]yul rgyu 'dra zhing /_/yan par 'dug pa'i rte'u dang 'dra ba'i thugs/_/gal te 'dod pa'i yon tan las bzlog na/_/de nas shin tu gsal ba'i snang ba gzigs/_/blo gros bzang po bzhengs shig bzhengs/_/sa ni spangs te bzhud mdzod la/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid 
[\[10b.2\]]brnyes nas ni/_/'gro ba dag ni bsgral bar mdzod/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_kau shi ka ma mthong ngam/_nga ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bdag po rgyas bskor ltar/_/mi ni mthu ldan gzhu mtshon ral gri thogs/_/rta glang shing rta dpung tshogs mang po yis/_/grong khyer ser skya kun 
[\[10b.3\]]nas yongs su bskor/_/zas gtsang la sogs shAkya'i tshogs 'di dag_/glang chen rta zhon legs par go bgos lus/_/mi sdug sna tshogs lag na mtshon thogs te/_/khyams dang rta babs khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhi nang gnas/_/pho brang dang ni khyim sgo dang /_/de bzhin grong khyer sgo 
[\[10b.4\]]dag kyang /_/bcad nas gtan pa dam bcug ste/_/de bzhin kun nas bsrungs par gyur/_/rwa dung pa Ta ha sgra rnga sgra yis/_/khyams dang rta babs khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nang gnas shing /_/glang chen rta dmag 'bad pa'i skye bo'i tshogs/_/rgyun du nga mi btang phyir srung bar byed/_/brgya byin 
[\[10b.5\]]gyis gsol pa/_des pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dang /_/sdug bsngal gyis gdungs 'jig rten 'di dang yang /_/khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas dgongs mdzod la/_/khab dag spongs te nges par 'byung bar mdzod/_/ji ltar khyod ni bgegs med par/_/deng nyid nags su gshegs 
[\[10b.6\]]'gyur ba/_/bdag cag tshangs sogs bcas pa yi/_/lha rnams kyis ni de bzhin bgyi/_/byang chub sems dpas legs so zhes gsungs nas thugs dgyes par gyur to/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gnyid kyis myos par byas nas/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen 
[\[10b.7\]]po lngas rtsen la bsgo ba/_grogs po byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nas 'babs kyis skas long shig_/des skas blangs pa la byang chub sems dpa' 'babs pa dang /_de nas brgya byin gyis brda byas ma thag tu zhabs 'bring ba 'dun pa gang na ba der gshegs nas/_ji 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]tsam na 'dun pa gnyid stug pos non par gzigs nas byang chub sems dpas bsgrims te bslang nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gsungs pa/_'dun pa longs kye khyim nas myur du ni/_/nga yi rta pho rin chen bsngags ldan long /_/sngon gyi rgyal bas 
[\[11a.2\]]longs spyod dka' thub tshal/_/thub rnams dgyes par mdzad par ngag gshegs so/_/'dun pa gnyid log pa'i mig phye nas smras pa/_lha khyod skyed mos tshal gyi dus ma bab/_/des pa khyod dang 'ga' yang kho na ma mchis/_/khyod la dgra bo su yang ma mchis na/_/dgung phyed khyod la 
[\[11a.3\]]bcibs pas ci zhig bgyid/_/byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_'dun pa khyod kyis lan 'ga' yang /_/nga yi tshig ni ma bcag na/_/nga yi deng dus tha ma la/_/nga yi tshig 'di ma gcag cig_/'dun pas gsol pa/_gzhon nu mtshan mo 'di ni 'jigs pa dang 
[\[11a.4\]]'jigs su rung ba mchis pas bdag bcibs pa mi len no/_/byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/_lan dang yang lan gyis gdon mi za bar skye bo sad par 'gyur gyis bdag nyid song la rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan sta gon bya'o snyam na/_de nas nyid kyis pho brang gi sgo phye nas rta'i rgyal po 
[\[11a.5\]]bsngags ldan bzung bar brtsams pa na de khros pa'i me rab tu 'bar bas rkang pa 'phra/_'jing kyog byed la phar bros tshur bros shing 'dug tu mi btub bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/_'khor lo dang bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil 
[\[11a.6\]]pa mnga' ba/_skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas mgo la byugs nas gsungs pa/_bsngags ldan tha ma yi ni khur long ste/_/dka' thub nags su ma thogs nga skyol cig_/byang chub thob nas myur du 'gro ba kun/_/bsam gtan rnam thar char gyis tshim par bya/_/
[\[11a.7\]]chos nyid kyis dud 'gro yang gdams na phyi lang mi byed pas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan mi g.yo bar 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thugs dgyes pa skyes te rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan bstad nas bzhes so/_/brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis byang chub 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]sems dpa' phyir gshegs pa'i phyir lha'i bu bzhi po bsgo ste bzhag pa/_'gram dang /_nye 'gram dang /_lo ma dang /_lo ma gyon pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpas de rnams la gsungs pa/_shes ldan dag nga sus bkur/_de rnams kyis gsol pa/_bdag cag gis bkur 
[\[11b.2\]]lags so/_/khyed cag la stobs ji tsam yod/_gcig gis gsol pa/_gzhon nu bdag gis ni sa'i rdul ji snyed mchis pa khur du thogs te mchi'o/_/gnyis pas gsol pa/_bdag gis ni rgya mtsho chen po bzhi dang /_mtsho dang mtshe'u dang lteng ka dang /_chu mig rnams 
[\[11b.3\]]kyi chab ji snyed mchis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi'o/_/gsum pas gsol pa/_bdag gis ni sa la ri ji snyed mchis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi'o/_/bzhi pas gsol pa/_bdag gis ni sa la rtswa dang shing dang yal ga dang lo ma ji snyed mchis pa de thams 
[\[11b.4\]]cad khur du thogs te mchi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas zhabs sa la bzhag pa na de rnams kyis bsgul bar yang ma nus nas ngo mtshar skyes te gsol pa/_gzhon nu bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la stobs 'di 'dra ba mnga' bar ma 'tshal to/_/gal te 'tshal 
[\[11b.5\]]na bdag cag mi mchis pa lags pa zhig_/gtam de 'dun pa sngar sad pas thos nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar song ba dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan la bcibs/_'dun pa yang 'phongs la zhon nas 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang 
[\[11b.6\]]chub sems dpa'i mthu dang /_lha rnams kyis lha'i mthus rta rin po che bsngags ldan steng gi nam mkha' las mngon par 'phags pa dang pho brang na gnas pa'i lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' dang bral bas ngu bar brtsams so/_/de rnams ngu ba'i mchi ma'i thigs pa rnams lus dang sa 
[\[11b.7\]]la bab bo/_/'dun pas gsol pa/_gzhon nu char gyi thigs pa dag 'bab na ci lhas dgung char phab bam/_byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_lhas char phab pa ma yin te/_'on kyang pho brang na gnas pa'i lha rnams nga dang bral bas ngu bar brtsams te/_de rnams kyi 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]mchi ma'i thigs pa rnams lus la bab pa yin no/_/de nas 'dun pa mig mchi mas gang zhing dbugs ring po'i shugs nar gyis phyung nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' sku thams cad kyis glang po che'i gzigs stangs kyis g.yas phyogs 
[\[12a.2\]]su gzigs te dgongs pa/_nga bud med dang lhan cig khyim na nyal ba'i tha ma ni 'di yin no snyam mo/_/yang dgongs pa gal te nga shar sgo spangs te sgo gzhan nas byung na gzhon nus ni bdag la tha ma'i dus na yang ma bltas so snyam du rgyal po mi dga' bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/ji tsam 
[\[12a.3\]]na rgyal po zas gtsang gnyid stug pos non pa gzigs nas des de la bskor ba mdzad de gsungs pa/_yab gus pa ma mchis pa dang /_zhes ma mchis pas skrag nas mchi ba ni ma lags te/_gzhan du na 'jig rten rga ba dang 'chi bas bcom pa rga ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug 
[\[12a.4\]]bsngal gyis 'jigs pa las yongs su dgrol ba'i slad du lags so/_/ji tsam na shAkya ming chen 'gram po byed pa skye bo nyul zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gshegs par chas pa mthong ngo /_/de nas skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas smras pa/_
[\[12a.5\]]gzhon nu 'di ci mdzad/_ming chen 'gro'o/_/gzhon nu 'di ni rigs pa ma lags so/_/ming chen gang gi phyir ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa des na dang ci khyim na 'dug phod dam/_
[\[12a.6\]]'di ni nges te dka' thub kyi tshal du 'gro'o/_/de nas gsung tshig drag pos shAkya ming chen spyos pa dang /_cho nges btab ste kyi hud/_deng du rgyal po zas gtsang dang /_/shAkya dag ni thams cad kyis/_/yang dang yang du bsams pa yi/_/re ba 'bras bu med par gyur/_/deng 
[\[12a.7\]]du rgyal po zas gtsang ni/_/sras kyi mya ngan gyis gdungs pas/_/lag bsgreng shin tu sdug bsngal zhing /_/mi bzad sgra ni 'byin par gyur/_/sa 'tsho grags 'dzin [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes/_/de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rgyas pa'ang /_/don grub dang ni bral ba yis/_/shin tu sdug 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]bsngal myong bar gyur/_/zhes smras nas/_de sngangs pas grags 'dzin ma bslang ste smras pa/_don grub 'di ni gshegs gyur gyis/_/khyim thab sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas/_/sdug bsngal nyam thag dur 'ong gis/_/khyim thab sdug pa de zlog shig_/khyod kyis khyim 
[\[12b.2\]]thab gshegs 'gyur 'di ni mthong dka' ste/_/khyod kyis 'di ltos khyim thab mthong ba'i tha ma yin/_/kyi hud phongs pas bdag gis mtshan mo kus btab kyang /_/sus kyang lan ma ster bas bdag gis mnyes so/_/des ni de ltar khus btab kyang /_/'di ltar lha rnams byin 
[\[12b.3\]]rlabs kyis/_/dgon par 'o dod bos pa bzhin/_/'ga' yang sad par ma gyur to/_/de nas shAkya ming chen sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas gdungs nas de rings par rgyal po zas gtsang gi drung du song nas rgyal po zas gtsang bslang ste smras pa/_don grub 'di ni bzhud lags 
[\[12b.4\]]kyis/_/sa bdag de ni bzlog par mdzod/_/sras kyi mya ngan gyis thebs nas/_/sdug bsngal gyis gdungs bshums 'gyur mchis/_/ma stes te de yang gnyid ma sad do/_/de nas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor 
[\[12b.5\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bskor cing dong ste g.yas phyogs nas gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams spyod lam zhi ba dang /_g.yon phyogs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas lha'i rol mo'i khyad 
[\[12b.6\]]par sna tshogs dang /_mdun nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa rang rang gi spyod lam gyis dong ngo /_/nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i lha brgya stong phrag du mas ni byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po 
[\[12b.7\]]rnams kyis gtor ro/_/a ga ru'i phye ma dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i phye ma dang /_lha'i me tog man dA ra bas kyang gtor to/_/lha'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs kyang brdungs so/_/gos rnams kyang gtor ro/_/'dir smras pa/_mkha' la lha rnams gzha'i 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]sgra chen 'byin byed la/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis gos kyi g.yab mos 'debs byed cing /_/kha cig byang chub sems dpa' la ni stod byed de/_/nam mkha' la ni sor mo brgya phrag sgyur bar byed/_/kha cig dag ni sgo rnams 'byed byed cing /_/me tog man dA ra 
[\[13a.2\]]bas 'thor bar byed/_/kha cig dag ni bcibs pa'i rkang 'dzin cing /_/bde bar gshegs pa rtog cing rjes bzhin 'brang /_/kha cig dag kyang g.yas nas rjes bzhin 'brang /_/g.yon nas 'gro ba dag kyang rjes bzhin 'brang /_/brgya byin de bzhin tshangs par bcas pa dang /_/
[\[13a.3\]]lus ngan bdag nyid shul ni mtshon par byed/_/zla ba nya ba rgyu skar tshogs kyis ltar/_/bdag nyid chen po lha tshogs mdun bdar nas/_/dka' thub nags ni thub rnams dgyes byed pa/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su thugs dgyes gshegs/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[13a.4\]]dpa' grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir byung ba dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams yid dga' bas spro ba bskyed pa/_grogs po khyod yun ring po nas nam zhig nang bgegs las thar te dka' thub kyi nags su 'gro bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs pa skyed pa gang lags pa de deng 
[\[13a.5\]]du yongs su rdzogs pa lags kyis/_nam khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag cag la yang dgongs shig_/byang chub sems dpas de bzhin du bya'o zhes dam bcas nas sku thams cad kyis g.yas 
[\[13a.6\]]phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa yi/_/lam gyi mchog ni ma thob par/_/grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir ni slar/_/nga ni 'jug par mi bya'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thun gnyis kyi dpag tshad bcu 
[\[13a.7\]]gnyis su byon nas bcibs pa las babs te rgyan bkrol nas 'dun pa la bka' stsal pa/_'dun pa rgyan dang rta khyer la slar song shig_/'dir smras pa/_kha lo sgyur khyod nga yi rta 'di dang /_/rgyan 'di rnams kyang gnyen pa dag la byin/_/nga ni 'dod pa rgya chen spangs nas su/_/da ltar 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]'di nyid du ni rab byung bya/_/de nas 'dun pa gdong la mchi ma char bzhin 'bab pas byang chub sems dpa' la gsol pa/_seng ge stag gis bltam pa dang /_/phyugs rjes bltam pa'i nags tshal du/_/'ba' zhig sku gnyen dang bral nas/_/'phags pa ji ltar spyod par 'gyur/_/
[\[13b.2\]]byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_skye dgu 'di ni skye na'ang gcig pu ste/_/de bzhin 'chi na'ang gcig pu 'chi bar 'gyur/_/'di ni gcig pus sdug bsngal myong 'gyur gyi/_/'khor ba la ni grogs yod ma yin no/_/'dun pas gsol pa/_kye hud gzhon nus sdug bsngal 
[\[13b.3\]]ma gzigs te/_/zhabs 'jam glang chen rta la bcibs goms pa/_/sa gzhi rtswa dang rdo bas bltam rtsub par/_/ji ltar zhabs kyis gshegs shing nags su rgyu/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_'chi bdag 'jigs pa de ni lan 'ga' yang /_/skyid la brtsams med 
[\[13b.4\]]bde bar goms la min/_/mgon bcas la min rigs btsun la ma yin/_/dpa' dang brtson min skye bo dga' la min/_/dga' bas 'chi bdag 'jigs pa dag_/bskyed nas 'ongs par 'gyur zhes grags/_/don ma byas shing ma brtsams par/_/'chi bar yang ni 'gro bar 
[\[13b.5\]]'gyur/_/'dun pas gsol pa/_lha rgyal po bgres po ni sras kyi mya ngan gyis 'grongs par 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir 'dun pa'i tshig thugs la ma bab bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas ut+pal sngon po 'dra ba'i ral 
[\[13b.6\]]gri shubs nas phyung nas gtsug phud bregs te steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis blangs nas bkur sti chen po byas te sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du khyer nas gtsug phud kyi mchod pa chen po btsugs so/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can 
[\[13b.7\]]rnams kyis phyogs der dbu skra blangs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te da dung yang mchod rten la phyag byed pa'i dge slong dag phyag byed do//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgyad bcu bzhi pa/_byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_'dun pa ji snyam du sems/_gang la 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]'di lta bu'i brtul ba yod pa de cig yang khyim na gnas par 'gyur ram/_lha ma lags so/_/'dun pas bsams pa/_gzhon nu ni rgyal rigs kyi nga rgyal can yin pas 'di phyir bzlog par mi nus so snyam mo/_/de nas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan gyis byang 
[\[14a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la lces bldags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i phyag 'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil ba mnga' bas byugs nas gsungs pa/_bsngags ldan song shig dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas khyod kyi byas pa 
[\[14a.3\]]gzo bar 'gyur ro/_/'dun pa la yang gsungs pa/_khyod kyis bsngags ldan pho brang du ma bkri shig_/de skad ces gsungs pa dang /_'dun pa skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang nas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan khrid de yang dang yang du byang chub sems dpa' la blta zhing song ngo /_/
[\[14a.4\]]de gnyis kyis thun gnyis kyis son pa'i sa gang yin pa de nas zhag bdun gyis phyir 'khor to/_/'dun pas bsams pa/_gal te lhan cig tu dong na smre sngags chen pos bdag shi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des skyed mos tshal du 'dug nas bsngags ldan btang ngo /_/des 
[\[14a.5\]]skad phyung ba dang pho brang gi skye bo dang skye bo'i tshogs gzhan gyis kyang skad de shes nas re ste phyir byung ba las byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong nas bsngags ldan de'i mgul du 'jus te ngu bar brtsams so/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags 
[\[14a.6\]]phal pa gzhan la yang kun rdzob kyi shes pa yod na rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan la lta smos kyang ci dgos pas des skye bo'i tshogs chen po smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra thos te dbugs khong du song ba nyid kyis brnangs te shi nas de sgra can gyi bram ze las drug la brtson pa zhig gi rigs su 
[\[14a.7\]]nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub pa de'i tshe de la dmu rgod kyi gdams pas gtams nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]'das pa la 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' la ngur smrig gis dgos pa byung nas grong khyer dpe med du khyim bdag phyug po nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor 
[\[14b.2\]]gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na khye'u zhig btsas so zhes bya ba nas de 
[\[14b.3\]]bzhin du khye'u bcu btsas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de dag thams cad rab tu byung nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/_/de dag gi ma rgan mo des de dag la sha na'i gos dag cig byin pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_yum bdag cag yongs su mya ngan 
[\[14b.4\]]las 'da' bas 'di dag bdag cag la mi dgos te 'on kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras gzhon nu shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba zhig yod kyis 'di dag de la phul cig_/des na khyod kyis 'bras bu chen po 
[\[14b.5\]]thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/rgan mo des kyang 'chi khar gos de dag 
[\[14b.6\]]bu mo la gtad nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras so/_/de'i bu mo de yang nad kyis thebs te 'chi bar shes nas des kyang shing drung zhig tu bzhag nas shing de la gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de la khyod kyis 'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras la phul cig ces gsol ba btab bo/_/lha 
[\[14b.7\]]rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des de dag shes nas blangs te/_de nas rngon pa rgas 'khogs pa lta bu zhig tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas de dag bgos te lag na mda' gzhu thogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa'i 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]lam kar bsdad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yang rim gyis lam der byon nas rngon pa lag na mda' gzhu thogs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang mi de la gsungs pa/_kwa'i nang rje sha na'i gos 'o ni dag ni 
[\[15a.2\]]rab tu byung ba la 'tsham pa yin gyis/_ka shi ka'i ras phran 'di dag khyer la 'o ni dag nga la byin cig des gsol pa/_gzhon nu bdag la gzhan dag khyod kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bkrongs nas ka shi ka'i ras phran gyi gos 'di dag blangs so zhes gzhi des g.yar mchi bar 
[\[15a.3\]]'gyur lags pas bdag 'di dag mi 'bul lo/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_kye nang rje nga ni mthu ji lta bu dang ldan pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis shes te su zhig gis nga dgrongs par nus/_khyod kyis nga dgrongs par su zhig yid ches kyis bag tsha ba med par 
[\[15a.4\]]byin cig_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas sha na'i gos dag phul te ka shi ka'i ras phran rnams blangs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang sha na'i gos de dag 'tsham par ma gyur pa dang de 'di snyam du dgongs 
[\[15a.5\]]te/_kye ma'o sha na'i gos rnams bdag gi sku dang 'tsham par gyur cig snyam nas tshig tu smras ma thag tu sha na'i gos de dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang 'tsham par gyur 
[\[15a.6\]]to/_/byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/_da ni bdag rab tu byung zin gyis/_'gro ba rnams rjes su gzung bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i ka shi ka'i ras phran gyi gos de dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis blangs nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 
[\[15a.7\]]kyi nang du ka shi ka'i mchod pa chen po btsugs so/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis kyang phyogs der ngur smrig blangs pa zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te da dung du yang mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge slong dag phyag byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]dbu skra bregs shing na bza' ngur smrig mnabs te dka' thub kyi nags su phan tshun rgyu zhing drang srong ngan spong gi bu'i bsti gnas su gshegs pa dang /_de'i tshe drang srong ngan spong gi bu lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de lta bu de byang chub sems dpas gzigs 
[\[15b.2\]]nas gsungs pa drang srong chen po ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des gsol pa/_bdag gi bsti gnas 'di na shing ta la rnams gser gyi lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu chags pa las de rnams snga mkho bzhin du ma gyur to/_/byang chub 
[\[15b.3\]]sems dpas gsungs pa/_drang srong chen po gang gi mthus bsti gnas 'di ni shing ta la rnams gser gyi lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bur ldan pa de rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste dka' thub kyi nags su gnas pas so/_/gal 
[\[15b.4\]]te des rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par ma gyur na/_skyed mos tshal 'di de'i yin par 'gyur ba zhig_/de skad ces gsungs pa dang /_drang srong chen po ngan spong gi bus byang chub sems dpa' la brtag 
[\[15b.5\]]par brtsams so/_/de nas gzugs bzang zhing zhi ba'i cha byad du mthong nas yun ring du brtags te ngo mtshar skyes nas gsol pa/_kye rab tu byung ba de khyod kho na ma lags grang /_byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_drang srong chen po de ltar nges so/_/da nas ngan spong gi bu 
[\[15b.6\]]ya mtshan skyes pa'i mig bgrad de bltas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' thog mar gdan la spyan drangs te me tog dang /_'bras bu bstabs so/_/de ltar kun du dgyes par byas pa dang byang chub sems dpas skad cig gcig bzhes nas gsungs pa/_drang srong chen po 'di 
[\[15b.7\]]nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir ji srid yod/_des gsol pa/_dpag tshad bcu gnyis mchis so/_/byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/_grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nye'o/_/'dir gnas pa ni rung ba ma yin te/_shAkya rnams kyis grong gi 'khrug pa byed par 'gyur gyis/_
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ma la bdag gang gA rgal lo snyam nas de gang gA rgal nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon to/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas de dang /_de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas des shing ka ra bI ra'i lo ma 
[\[16a.2\]]las lhung bzed byas nas spyod lam zhi bas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi na 'dug pa des de 'gro ba dang /_ldog pa dang /_lta ba dang /_rnam par lta ba dang /_bskum pa 
[\[16a.3\]]dang /_brkyang ba dang /_chos gos snam sbyar dang /_lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas bsod snyoms spyod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal po'i khab na rab tu byung ba ji snyed cig gnas pa la ji ltar rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam de 
[\[16a.4\]]lta bu ni 'ga' yang med do snyam nas 'dir smras pa/_ji ltar mig can 'gro ba ltar/_/rab tu byung ba bsgrags par bya/_/'di ni brtags par mdzad nas su/_/rab tu byung ba yang dag bzhed/_/khyim gnas 'di ni sdug bsngal te/_'di ni rdul gyi gnas yin 
[\[16a.5\]]zhing /_/rab tu byung ba bar snang ltar/_/mkhyen nas de tshe rab tu byung /_/rab tu byung nas sku yi ni/_/sdig pa'i las ni spangs pa dang /_/gsung gi sdig pa spangs nas ni/_/'tsho ba kun nas dag par mdzad/_/de nas ma ga d+hA yi ni/_/grong mchog rgyal po'i 
[\[16a.6\]]khab gshegs nas/_/mgon po shes bzhin dran ldan pas/_/bsod snyoms phyir ni gshegs pa de/_/bzo sbyangs ma ga d+hA yi bdag_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na ni 'dug pas mthong /_/mthong nas sems dad de nas ni/_/blon po rnams la 'di skad smras/_/mtshan 
[\[16a.7\]]mchog gi ni rgyas gyur cing /_/kho lag phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/gnya' shing gang du lta ba yi/_/'di la shes ldan dag ltos shig_/spyan mi 'deg la yid gzhungs shing /_/dman pa'i rigs las ma 'khrungs 'di/_/gang du gnas par gshegs gyur 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]pa/_/rgyal pos pho nya rjes bzhin btang /_/de nas pho nya la bsgo ba/_/dge slong de ni gar 'gro zhing /_/gang du gnas ni btab pa yi/_/rjes bzhin du ni 'brang bar gyis/_/de ni bsod snyoms gshegs pa na/_/sgo drug legs par bsdams nas ni/_/shes 
[\[16b.2\]]bzhin dran dang ldan pa yis/_/lhung bzed myur du gang bar mdzad/_/bsod snyoms spyad pa byas nas kyang /_/thub pa grong khyer phyir byung nas/_/skya bseng las ni mngon gshegs te/_/de la gnas ni btab par gyur/_/gnas btab pa ni shes nas kyang /_/pho nya 
[\[16b.3\]]gcig gis bsdad byas nas/_/gzhan ni myur du slar log ste/_/rgyal po la ni tshig smras pa/_/rgyal po chen po dge slong de/_/seng ge'am stag gi phru gu dang /_/ri sul dag na gnas pa ltar/_/skya bseng gi ni steng na gnas/_/pho nya rnams kyi tshig thos nas/_/
[\[16b.4\]]sa bdag shing drung zhugs nas ni/_/de ni blon pos yongs bskor nas/_/myur du kho nar dong bar gyur/_/bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sar zhon te/_/de ni bzhon pa las bab nas/_/rkang gis nye bar song nas ni/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong /_/rgyal pos 
[\[16b.5\]]'dug nas dgyes pa dang /_/mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gsol nas/_de ni ma khengs mi brlang bar/_/don 'di dag ni rab smras so/_/dge slong lang tsho dang po la/_/bang bar yang dag gnas gyur cing /_/'di 'dra gzi brjid ldan pa la/_/bsod snyoms spyod pa 
[\[16b.6\]]mdzes ma lags/_/khang pa nyams dga' dag dang ni/_/bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_/longs spyod mchog ni khyod gsol na/_/nyid kyi gdung ni zhu yis gsungs/_/rgyal po gangs ri nye ba na/_/yul gyi ljongs ni nor dag dang /_/'bru dag gis ni gang gyur 
[\[16b.7\]]pa/_/ko sa la zhes grags pa yod/_/bu ram shing pa nyi ma'i rus/_/shAkya dag ni de na gnas/_/rgyal po nga'i rigs rgyal rigs te/_/nga ni 'dod pa don mi gnyer/_/sa 'di ri dang bcas shing rgya mtshor bcas/_/rin chen kun dang ldan pa bskyangs gyur kyang /_/
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]mi ni nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur te/_/so ga tsha dus shing gis me bzhin no/_/'dod pa rnams ni sha kho na 'brel ces gsungs/_/mi dbang rgal bar dka' zhing 'dam rdzab 'dra/_/sdug bsngal dang ni mya ngan 'jigs pa yi/_/rtsa ba'i gtso ste blo ngan 
[\[17a.2\]]rnams kyis bstan/_/rgyal po ngas ni byung ma thag tu yang /_/'dod pa rnams la mi dga'i blo bskyed na/_/'jigs byed chos kyi dgra bor gyur pa dag_/bor ba de kho slar yang ji ltar blang /_/rtse mo sna tshogs yangs par gyur pa yi/_/lhun po gangs can rlung gis bskyod 
[\[17a.3\]]srid kyi/_/nga yi blo ni thar pa la brten pa/_/'dod pa'i shugs kyis bskyod par mi nus so/_/'jig rten 'di ni 'dod par bying gyur nas/_/'khor ba'i 'khor los yongs su 'khyam pa la/_/mi dbang nga skyabs yin te gzhan med pas/_/'jigs pa che las de ni 
[\[17a.4\]]thar bar bya/_/'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mkhyen/_/mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba gzigs/_/spang phyir gang du nga yi yid/_/dga' ba dag tu 'gro bar bya/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gsol pa/_kye rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs 'dis/_ci zhig don 
[\[17a.5\]]du gnyer/_des gsungs pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_kye rab tu byung ba gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la yang dgongs shig_/byang 
[\[17a.6\]]chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_de bzhin du bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs nas/_rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang ha cang yang mi ring bar drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas der gshegs so/_/de rnams spyod pa dang gnas pas bsam gtan la brtson 
[\[17a.7\]]par gnas te/_de rnams gang gi tshe rkang pa gcig gis nyin thun gcig 'greng ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' thun gnyis su bzhengs so/_/gal te de rnams gdung ba lnga'i sbyor bas nyin thun gcig 'dug pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas kyang sbyor ba des thun gnyis su 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas de rnams ya mtshan skyes nas dge sbyong 'di ni chen po zhig go zhes smras pas dge sbyong chen po dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas de rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed brtul zhugs 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/_/de 
[\[17b.2\]]na kha cig gis gsol pa/_brgya byin nyid do/_/kha cig gis gsol pa/_bdag cag ni tshangs pa nyid do/_/kha cig gis gsol pa/_bdud nyid do/_/byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/_drang srong 'di dag ni slar ltung ba lam log par zhugs pa ste/_lam de ni nus pa ma 
[\[17b.3\]]yin no snyam nas de sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /_sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/ring du 'phur gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du kho bo tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[17b.4\]]pa gau ta ma bdag la mi bde ba med kyis/_khyod ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_ring du 'phur khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig rtogs par gyur/_des gsol pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du'o/_/de nas 
[\[17b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur dad pa de la ni nga yang dad la/_sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur la brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab yod pa ltar bdag la yang brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_
[\[17b.6\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab yod pas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur gyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du chos de snyed mngon sum du byas na/_ci'i phyir bdag gis kyang chos 'di dag mngon sum du mi bya snyam nas/_de nas byang chub sems dpas chos de rnams kho na ma thob pa 
[\[17b.7\]]thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/_rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid gtod par gnas te gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]gtod par gnas pa na ring po ma thogs pa kho nar chos de dag mngon sum du mdzad par gyur to/_/chos de dag mngon sum du mdzad nas yang sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/
[\[18a.2\]]ring du 'phur khyod kyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas sam/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma mad de/_bdag gis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de dag mngon sum du byas so/_/
[\[18a.3\]]byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_tshe dang ldan pa ring du 'phur bdag gis kyang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de dag rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma de lta na khyod kyi ji tsam pa bdag gi yang de tsam la/_bdag gi ji tsam 
[\[18a.4\]]pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di la'o skol mtshungs shing mnyam ste 'dra bar thob kyis tshur spyon 'o skol gnyi gas 'khor 'di yongs su drang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[18a.5\]]la rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod do/_/de'i rtogs pa dag la yang dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[18a.6\]]dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas lam de nus pa med par rig nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/lhag spyod gal te khyod la mi 
[\[18a.7\]]bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du nga tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/des gsol pa tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma bdag la mi bde ba med kyis khyod ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig_/khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig mngon sum du byas tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]kyi bar du'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dad pa la ni bdag kyang dad la rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab yod pa lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_
[\[18b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab ni bdag la yod na rangs khyed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di snyed cig mngon sum du byas na bdag gis kyang ci'i phyir chos 'di dag mngon sum du mi bya snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas chos 
[\[18b.3\]]de rnams kho na ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid gtod par gnas te/_gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan 
[\[18b.4\]]pa/_bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na ring po ma thogs pa kho nar chos de mngon sum du mdzad par gyur to/_/chos de mngon sum du mdzad nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/lhag spyod khyod 
[\[18b.5\]]kyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar du chos 'di dag rang gis mngon sum du byas sam/_tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma mad lags te bdag gis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag mngon sum du bgyis so/_/byang chub sems dpas 
[\[18b.6\]]gsungs pa/_tshe dang ldan pa lhag spyod bdag gis kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gis mngon sum du byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma de lta na khyod kyi ji tsam pa bdag gi yang de tsam la/_bdag gi ji tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas 
[\[18b.7\]]don 'di la 'o skol mtshungs shing mnyam ste 'dra ba thob kyis tshur spyon 'o skol gnyi gas tshogs 'di yongs su drang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rjed pa dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]pas mchod do/_/de'i shes pa rnams la yang dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub 
[\[19a.2\]]par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lam de yang nus pa med par rig nas gshegs so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang bu'i mya ngan gyis rtag tu gdungs nas byang chub sems dpa' btsal ba'i phyir pho nya btang ba las/_des ji ltar gzhon nu don thams 
[\[19a.3\]]cad grub pa rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang lhan cig bzhugs pa las rgyal po'i khab nas phyir byung ste rim gro pa med par 'khyam mo zhes thos so/_/thos nas rim gro byed pa sum brgya btang ngo /_/grong khyer lhas bstan du shAkya legs par rab sad kyis kyang de bzhin du thos 
[\[19a.4\]]nas des kyang rim gro byed pa nyis brgya btang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim gro pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas dka' thub kyi nags su rgyu ba na des dgongs pa/_dka' thub kyi nags gang bar spyod cing gnas pas na bdud rtsi thob par mi nus kyis/_ma la bdag 
[\[19a.5\]]gis rim gro byed pa lnga zhig blangs la lhag ma ni dgye'o snyam nas des yum gyi phyogs las gnyis/_yab kyi phyogs nas gsum khrid de/_de rnams kyis de'i rim gro byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim gro pa lngas yongs su bskor te ga yA'i lho phyogs na lteng 
[\[19a.6\]]rgyas 'od srung gi sde'i grong rdal gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te byon nas de phan tshun du 'chag pa na sa phyogs dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa/_nags tshang tshing mdzes pa/_chu klung nai rany+dza na bsil bar 'bab pa/_gse gu can 'jug ngogs bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing ma 
[\[19a.7\]]sngon po dang shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/_kye ma'o sa phyogs 'di ni dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa/_nags tshang tshing mdzes pa/_chu klung nai rany+dza na bsil bar 'bab pa/_
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]gse gu can 'jug ngogs bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing ma sngon po dang /_shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig ste/_kye ma spong ba don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bus nags khrod 'dir brten na spong ba bya bar nus so/_/bdag spong ba don du gnyer ba 
[\[19b.2\]]yin pas ma la bdag gis kyang nags khrod 'dir brten la spong ba bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nags khrod du zhugs te shing zhig gi drung du bzhugs nas tshems la tshems gtad/_ljags rkan la bcar nas thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung /_mngon du 
[\[19b.3\]]bsdams/_shin tu mngon du bsdams so/_/de thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung /_mngon du bsdams/_shin tu mngon du bsdams pas ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul byung bar gyur te/_dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba zhig phying ka log tu bzung /_
[\[19b.4\]]mngon du bsdams/_shin tu mngon du bsdams na de'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul 'byung ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshems la tshems gtad/_ljags rkan la bcar te thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung /_mngon du bsdams/_shin tu mngon du bsdams pa 
[\[19b.5\]]na ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul byung bar gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_sku ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/_rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/_/byang chub 
[\[19b.6\]]sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i 
[\[19b.7\]]bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/_de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/_/
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa dang rlung thams cad spyi bo'i nang du song nas/_de de'i dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes so/_/dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba'i spyi bor lcags kyi phur pa 
[\[20a.2\]]rnon pos btab na de'i mgo la mgo'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_
[\[20a.3\]]sku ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/_rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa che ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar 
[\[20a.4\]]sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la 
[\[20a.5\]]snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/_de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/_/de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pas rlung thams cad snyan gnyis kyi bu 
[\[20a.6\]]gnas rgyus par gyur to/_/dper na mgar bas sbud pa bus na rlung thams cad kyi rgyun grwa gnyis kyi bu gnas rgyu ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na rlung thams cad kyi rgyun snyan gnyis kyi bu gnas rgyus par gyur 
[\[20a.7\]]kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_sku ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/_rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa che ba 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis lhag par yang rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam 
[\[20b.2\]]mo/_/des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/_de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/_/de'i zhal dang shangs nas 
[\[20b.3\]]dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pas phyal gyi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/_shin tu rgyas par gyur to/_/dper na mgar ba'i sbud pa bus na gang bar gyur/_shin tu gang bar gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan 
[\[20b.4\]]dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na phyal gyi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/_shin tu rgyas par gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/_rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_sems rtse 
[\[20b.5\]]gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma 
[\[20b.6\]]la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/_de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs 
[\[20b.7\]]nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/_/de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa dang de'i tshe dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes so/_/dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba'i mgo 'breng bas yang nas yang du dam 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]du bcings na de'i mgo la mgo'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa 
[\[21a.2\]]yin/_lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/_rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 
[\[21a.3\]]sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/der lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 
[\[21a.4\]]'jug par brtsams te/_des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/_/de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa dang de'i tshe khong du khong gi tshor ba mi bzad pa 
[\[21a.5\]]skyes so/_/dper na ba lang gi shen pa mkhas pa'am/_ba lang gi shen pa'i slob ma mkhas pas ba lang gsod pa'i gri rnon pos ba lang gi lto dral na de'i khong du khong gi tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan 
[\[21a.6\]]dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na khong du khong gi tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/_rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par 
[\[21a.7\]]bzhag pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa che ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis lhag 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/_des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_zhal dang shangs 
[\[21b.2\]]nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags so/_/de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pa dang /_de'i tshe sku la sku'i gdung ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes so/_/dper na mi shin tu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis mi stobs shin tu chung ba zhig phying 
[\[21b.3\]]ka log tu bzung ste me dong gi nang du sbyangs na de'i lus la lus kyi gdung ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/_sku la sku'i gdung ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang /_de zhum pa 
[\[21b.4\]]ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/_rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid 
[\[21b.5\]]du mi 'ong ba de lta bu'i tshor ba nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad du zas mi za ba bsgrub par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha rab tu mang 
[\[21b.6\]]po'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po gal te khyod mi'i kha zas kyis 'dzem par mdzad/_/ngo tsha bar mdzad/_smod par mdzad/_
[\[21b.7\]]rnam par smod par mdzad na/_bdag cag gis khyod kyi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas lha'i mdangs bsgrub par bgyis te/_khyod kyis gtor cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te bdag gis mi'i zas mi bza' bar dam bcas la 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]bdag gi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du lha rnams kyis lha'i mdangs bsgrubs nas de bdag gir byed pa ni bdag gi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]yin la/_bdag gi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gang yin pa de ni bdag gi log pa yin no/_/bdag gi log pa gang yin pa de'i rkyen gyis ni 'di na sems 
[\[22a.2\]]can kha cig lus zhig ste shi nas ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis lha rnams kyi tshig ni thams cad kyi thams cad du spangs la kha zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]dang /_chang chung bza' 
[\[22a.3\]]ba'am/_yang na mon sran sde'u'i khu ba'am/_'on te rgya sran gyi khu ba'am/_yang na ha re nu ka'i 'bras bu'i khu ba btung ngo snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe lha rnams kyi tshig thams cad kyi thams cad du spangs nas zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /_chung
