[\[22a.4\]]zad dang /_chang chung gsol ba'am/_yang na mon sran sde'u'i khu ba'am/_'on te rgya sran gyi khu ba'am/_yang na ha re nu ka'i 'bras bu'i khu ba gsol lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]dang /_chang chung gsol ba na 
[\[22a.5\]]yan lag dang nying lag thams cad zhum kun du zhum ste/_skem zhing dpal chung bar gyur to/_/dper na ldum bu a si ta'i sdong bu dang /_ka li ka'i sdong bu 'jum kun du 'jum pas sha chung zhing skams par gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung 
[\[22a.6\]]ba dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]dang /_chang chung gsol ba na yan lag dang nying lag thams cad zhum kun du zhum ste skem zhing dpal chung bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]dang /_chang chung gsol ba na dbu la dbu'i 
[\[22a.7\]]pags pa rnyis kun du rnyis te 'khums shing 'bar 'bur du gyur to/_/dper na ku ba rtsa ba nas bcad na rnyis kun du rnyis pas 'khums la 'bar 'bur du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]dang /_chang chung gsol 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]ba na dbu la dbu'i pags pa rnyis kun tu rnyis te 'khums shing 'bar 'bur du gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/_rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par 
[\[22b.2\]]bzhag pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/_/de zhal zas nyung ba 
[\[22b.3\]]dang /_chung ba dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]dang /_chang chung gsol ba na spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyi 'bras bu phug tu song shin tu phug tu song ste/_zab pa shin tu zab par ring du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang ngo /_/dper na khron pa zab mo'i chur skar ma'i gzugs brnyan phug tu song shin 
[\[22b.4\]]tu phug tu song ste/_zab pa shin tu zab par ring du song bar gtam du bya ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]dang /_chang chung gsol ba na spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyi 'bras bu phug tu song shin tu phug tu song ste/_zab pa 
[\[22b.5\]]shin tu zab par ring du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang yang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/_rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/_/de'i tshe byang 
[\[22b.6\]]chub sems dpa' bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba 
[\[22b.7\]]dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]dang /_chang chung gsol ba na de'i tshe rtsib ma'i bar mthon dman can du gyur te/_dper na rtswa khang lo gnyis sam gsum lon pa'i phyam dgu po mthon dman du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]dang /_
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]chang chung gsol ba na rtsib ma'i bar mthon dman du gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/_rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag 
[\[23a.2\]]pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhal 
[\[23a.3\]]zas nyung ba dang /_chung ba dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]dang /_chang chung gsol ba na sgal pa'i tshigs 'di lta ste/_skra'i lan bu lta bur gyur to/_/mjug do ni 'di lta ste rnga mo'i rkang pa lta bur gyur to/_/de lan 'ga' ldang bar 'dod na kha sbub tu 'gyel la/_lan 'ga' 'dug par 
[\[23a.4\]]'dod na gan rkyal du 'gyel lo/_/de ro stong la brten nas ro smad 'jog par byed/_ro smad la brten nas ro stod 'jog par byed do/_/de phyag gnyis kyis sku la byugs yongs su byugs te/_de'i phyag gnyis kyis sku la byugs yongs su byugs pa de'i tshe ba spu rnams drung rul 
[\[23a.5\]]bas sa la lhags par gyur to/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_lam 'di yang shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas lha gsum zhig byang chub sems dpa' gang 
[\[23a.6\]]na ba der lhags te/_de nas gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nag po zhig go/_/gnyis pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di nag po ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang sngo bsangs zhig go/_/gsum pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di nag po yang ma yin/_
[\[23a.7\]]sngo bsangs kyang ma yin gyi mdog dmar smug cig go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sku mdog bzang por snang ba ni thams cad kyi thams cad du nub par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe gsum zhig snang ba 'di lta ste/_shing rlon pa chu 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]can zhig chu nas phyung ste nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang /_de nas mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig der 'ongs nas des de la gtsub stan byas te gtsub shing bzhag nas gtsubs na 'di ltar shing de rlon pa chu can yin pa'i phyir me 'byung ba dang /_'bar du mi btub pa de bzhin du dge 
[\[23b.2\]]sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus dang sems kyis thag sring bar mi gnas kyi/_de rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa dang /_'dod pa la chags pa dang /_'dod pa la dga' ba dang /_'dod pa la zhen pa dang /_'dod pa la 'chums pa dang /_'dod pa la lhag 
[\[23b.3\]]par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te/_gnas pa yin pas lus dang sems kyis thag sring bar mi gnas pa rnams kyi ni de dang 'dra'o/_/de rnams bdag nyid gnon pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu 
[\[23b.4\]]nyams su myong mod kyi/_'on kyang de rnams kyis shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin te/_de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba dang po yin no/_/
[\[23b.5\]]dper na shing rlon pa chu can zhig chu nas phyung ste/_nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang /_de nas mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas des de la gtsub stan byas te/_gtsub shing bzhag nas gtsubs na 'di ltar shing de rlon pa chu can yin pa'i phyir me 'byung ba dang 
[\[23b.6\]]'bar du mi btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus kyis spong bar gnas kyi sems kyis ma yin pa de rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /_'dod pa la chags pa dang /_'dod pa la dga' ba dang /_'dod pa la zhen pa 
[\[23b.7\]]dang /_'dod pa la 'chums pa dang /_'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te gnas pa yin no/_/de rnams bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong mod 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]kyi/_'on kyang de rnams kyis shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin te/_de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba gnyis pa yin no/_/
[\[24a.2\]]'di lta ste shing skam khong stong chu med pa zhig chu dang thag ring por skam la bzhag pa dang /_de nas mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas des de la gtsub stan byas te/_gtsub shing bzhag nas gtsubs na 'di ltar shing de skam zhing khong stong yin pa'i phyir me 'byung ba 
[\[24a.3\]]dang 'bar du btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus dang sems kyis thag sring bar gnas pa de rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /_'dod pa la chags pa dang /_'dod pa la dga' ba dang /_'dod pa la zhen pa dang /_'dod 
[\[24a.4\]]pa la 'chums pa dang /_'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te mi gnas pa yin no/_/de rnams bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong mod kyi/_'on kyang de rnams 
[\[24a.5\]]kyis shes par nus/_mthong bar nus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus te/_de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba gsum pa yin no/_/'di ltar de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la dpe gsum pa snang nas ma la bdag gis 
[\[24a.6\]]til 'bru gcig gi zas bza' bar bya'o zhes de til 'bru gcig gi zas gsol te/_ji srid de'i mdangs de sku las yal bar ma gyur gyi bar du til 'bru gnyis pa'i zas mi gsol te/_yal nas til 'bru gnyis pa'i zas de gsol bar mdzad do/_/de til 'bru gcig gi zas 
[\[24a.7\]]gsol bas yan lag dang nying lag rnams shin tu skams par gyur to/_/til 'bru gcig ji lta bar 'bras 'bru gcig dang /_sran kol 'bru gcig dang /_rgya sran 'bru gcig dang /_mon sran gre'u 'bru gcig dang /_mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig dang /_rtswa'i gding ba la 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]mnal bar mdzad do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis dka' ba spyod pa'i gnas skabs de thos nas nyi ma re re zhing rtog pa nyis brgya lnga bcu gtong bar byed do/_/rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis kyang nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/_/de dag nyi ma re re zhing de gnyis la myur ba myur bar gtam 
[\[24b.2\]]skyel bar byed de/_byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di 'dra ba'i dka' ba spyod de/_til 'bru gcig dang /_'bras 'bru gcig dang /_sran ko la 'bru gcig dang /_rgya sran 'bru gcig dang /_mon sran gre'u 'bru gcig dang /_mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig gi zas gsol zhing rtswa'i 
[\[24b.3\]]gding ba la mnal to zhes smra'o/_/de rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bu'i mya ngan gyis non pas lhag par dang khar na zhing mig mchi mas brnangs te gdungs nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas par rtswa'i gding ba la nyal bar byed do/_/btsun mo grags 'dzin yang khyim thab kyi 
[\[24b.4\]]gnas skabs de thos nas khyim thab kyi mya ngan gyis non te gdong mchi mas rlan cing me tog phreng dang /_rgyan dang spud pa rnams bor nas dka' ba spyod par byed de/_til 'bru gcig dang /_'bras 'bru gcig dang /_sran ko la 'bru gcig dang /_rgya sran 'bru gcig dang /_
[\[24b.5\]]mon sran gre'u 'bru gcig dang /_mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig gi zas za zhing rtswa'i gding ba la nyal bar byed do/_/de'i rum mi bde'o zhes rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas des bsams pa/_gal te grags 'dzin mas byang chub sems dpa'i gtam nyi ma re re zhing thos na khyim thab kyi 
[\[24b.6\]]mya ngan gyis non te dka' ba spyad pa 'dis mngal mi 'chags pa'am/_srog 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod pas des na grags 'dzin ma la byang chub sems dpa'i gtam su yang gleng bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/_rgyal po zas gtsang gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye bo 
[\[24b.7\]]thams cad la khrims su bcas pa/_sus kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gtam grags 'dzin ma la brjod par mi bya'o/_/gtam skyel ba la yang bsgo ba/_nga ma gtogs par su la yang byang chub sems dpa'i gtam brjod par mi bya'o/_/rang gis thos na yang grags 'dzin 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]ma la bsams nas mya ngan mnags te gang thos na btsun mo grags 'dzin ma mi 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gzhan gyis btsun mo'i 'khor la 'drid par byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_lam 'di yang shes par nus pa ma yin/_
[\[25a.2\]]mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis kha zas shin tu ngan pa bza' bar bya'o snyam ste/_des kha zas shin tu ngan pa gsol bar mdzad do/_/de la zas phal pa ni 
[\[25a.3\]]'di yin te/_be'u byung nas ring po ma lon par ma'i 'o ma 'thung ba gang yin pa de rnams kyi gcin dang lci ba yin no/_/ji ltar de'i sku las mdangs de yal bar ma gyur pa de srid du zas gnyis pa mi gsol te/_yal nas kha zas phyi ma gsol bar mdzad do/_/dur khrod chen 
[\[25a.4\]]por gshegs nas kyang mi ro dbu rten du bcug_/zhabs la zhabs bzhag ste snang ba'i 'du shes dang /_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang /_ldang ba'i 'du shes yid la mdzad pas glo g.yas pas mnal bar mdzad do/_/de'i tshe grong khyer gyi gzhon nu rnams dang /_grong khyer gyi gzhon 
[\[25a.5\]]nu ma rnams lhags nas shing bus de'i snyan gnyis kyi bu gar 'dzugs par byed/_rna ba gnyis nas 'dren par byed cing 'di skad ces kye phyag dar khrod kyi sha za la ltos/_kye phyag dar khrod kyi sha za la ltos zhes smra bar yang byed do/_/de'i tshe phyag dar dang bong rdog dang /_gseg 
[\[25a.6\]]mas kyang 'thor bar byed do/_/'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni grong khyer gyi gzhon nu rnams sam/_grong khyer gyi gzhon nu ma de rnams la ngan sems skyed pa'am/_sdig pa'i tshig dbyung bar mi dgongs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i dka' ba spyod pa na 'di snyam 
[\[25a.7\]]du dgongs te/_gang su dag sdug bsngal spang bar brtson par gnas pa de thams cad ni 'di tsam du zad de/_de las lhag pa yang med de'i gong na yang med na/_lam 'di yang shes par nus pa ma yin/_mthong bar nus pa ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam nas/_de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/_rmongs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/_sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_shes par 
[\[25b.2\]]nus pa dang /_mthong bar nus pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa'i lam de gang yin snyam na/_de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag yab shAkya zas gtsang gi khyim na gnas pa'i tshe zhing las kyi mtha'i drung du song nas shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la 'dug 
[\[25b.3\]]ste/_'dod pa las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa de mngon par dran te/_de ni lam yin/_de ni sgrub pa yin/_
[\[25b.4\]]shes par nus pa yin/_mthong bar nus pa yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa yin na/_de bdag gis bskyed du yang 'di ltar rid cing nyam chung la zhan pas sla ba ma yin te/_ma la bdag gis ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /_ci bder dbugs 
[\[25b.5\]]'byung ba dang /_ci bder 'bras chan dang zan dron gyi kha zas rags pa bza' zhing lus mar sar dang til mar gyis byugs la chu 'jam pos lus bkru bar bya'o snyam ste/_de ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /_ci bder dbugs 'byung ba dang /_ci bder 'bras chan dang zan dron gyi zhal 
[\[25b.6\]]zas rags pa gsol zhing sku til mar dang mar sar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos sku 'khru bar mdzad do//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgyad bcu lnga pa/_de nas rim gro pa lnga po de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni sdom pa 
[\[25b.7\]]lhod pa/_bya ba mang ba/_mang pos 'tsho ba/_spong ba nyams par gyur pa yin te/_'di da lta 'bras chan dang zan dron gyi kha zas mang du za la lus zhun mar dang til mar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed de/_'dis da ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang thob par mi nus so snyam du bsams nas 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' bor te dong ba las/_rim gyis bA rA Na sIr phyin nas 'jig rten pa'i dgra bcom pa gang yin pa de la brten nas rab tu byung ste/_lnga po de rnams blo mthun zhing lhan cig 'grogs la kun du dga' bas rtsod pa med par drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags 
[\[26a.2\]]na gnas pas lnga sde lnga sde zhes bya bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas rim gyis lus kyi stobs dang /_mthu dang brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed nas rim gyis sde can gyi grong khyer du gshegs so/_/de na grong khyer gyi dpon po sde can zhes bya ba de la bu mo gnyis yod de/_dga' 
[\[26a.3\]]mo dang /_dga' stobs ma'o/_/de gnyis kyis shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/_drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring bar byung ba de mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur 
[\[26a.4\]]ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa/_skye bo thams cad kyi yid 'phrog pa yin pas bud med gang gis lo bcu gnyis su 'di lta bu'i brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs te spyod pa de'i khyim thab tu 'gyur 
[\[26a.5\]]ro zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bud med ni skyes pa la mngon par dga' ba yin pas de gnyis kyis lo bcu gnyis su dka' thub blangs te de rdzogs par byas nas de rdzogs pa dang /_lan bcu drug tu snying khur byas pa'i 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bas drang srong dka' thub kyis yongs 
[\[26a.6\]]su dub pa glo bur du 'ongs pa la 'bul bar byed do/_/de gnyis kyis ba stong bzhos nas ba stong po de nyid la blud do/_/de nas ba stong po de dag nyid bzhos nas lnga brgya la blud do/_/de nas lnga brgya po de dag bzhos nas lnga brgya po de dag nyid la blud do/_/de nas lnga brgya po de dag bzhos 
[\[26a.7\]]nas nyis brgya lnga bcu la blud do/_/de nas nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag nyid bzhos nas nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag la blud do/_/de nas nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag nyid bzhos nas brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga la blud do/_/de nas brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga po de dag bzhos nas brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga po de dag nyid la blud 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]do/_/de nas brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga po de dag bzhos nas drug bcu rtsa gsum la blud do/_/de nas drug bcu rtsa gsum po de dag bzhos nas drug bcu rtsa gsum po de dag nyid la blud do/_/de nas drug bcu rtsa gsum po de dag bzhos nas sum bcu rtsa gnyis la blud do/_/de nas sum bcu rtsa 
[\[26b.2\]]gnyis po de dag bzhos te/_sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag nyid la blud do/_/de nas sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag bzhos nas bcu drug la blud do/_/de nas bcu drug po de dag bzhos nas bcu drug po de dag nyid la blud do/_/de nas bcu drug po de dag nyid bzhos nas brgyad la blud do/_/
[\[26b.3\]]de nas brgyad po de dag nyid bzhos nas brgyad po de dag nyid la blud do/_/de nas brgyad po de dag nyid lan bcu drug tu snying khur byas pa bzhos te/_shel las byas pa'i snod kyi nang du blugs nas bskol te 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bar byed pa na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 
[\[26b.4\]]kyis bsams pa/_'o ma'i thug pa 'di byang chub sems dpas gsol na deng nyid du bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur gyis de lta bas na 'di la mthu zhig bstabs par bya'o snyam nas/_de rnams kyis mod la mthu skyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman blugs so/_/'o ma khol ba de la 'khor 
[\[26b.5\]]lo dang bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil ba'i mtshan ma dag snang ngo /_/der yang kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro zhes bya ba 'khyam zhing phyogs der phyin na des 'o ma'i thug pa de mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_'o ma'i thug pa 'di sus 'thungs pa des deng nyid du bla na med pa'i ye shes thob 
[\[26b.6\]]par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis 'di bslang ngo snyam nas re zhig ma phyung gi bar du de yud tsam zhig mtha' gcig tu song ste bsdad nas des song ste/_smras pa/_kho bo bkres pa dang skom pas dub cing nyen gyis 'di kho bo la lud cig_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_mi sbyin no/_/
[\[26b.7\]]de cang mi smra bar song ngo /_/de nas de gnyis kyis shel las byas pa'i snod kyi nang nas rin po che'i yol go'i nang du blugs so/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des de'i bram ze'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas de gnyis kyi mdun 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]du 'dug go/_/tshangs pa yang 'ongs nas de dang nye ba zhig tu 'dug go/_/de gnyis kyis brgya byin la sbyin pa sbyin par brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_ci bdag la sbyin nam/_'on te bdag pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la sbyin de gnyis kyis smras pa/_
[\[27a.2\]]khyod pas ches khyad par 'phags pa gang yin pa de la phul lo/_/des smras pa/_tshangs pa 'di ni bdag bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin gyis de la phul cig_/de gnyis kyis de la sbyin par brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_ci bdag la sbyin nam/_'on te bdag bas 
[\[27a.3\]]ches khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyod pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la dbul lo/_/des smras pa/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha 'di dag ni bdag bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin gyis de dag la phul cig_/
[\[27a.4\]]de gnyis kyis de dag la sbyin par brtsams pa dang /_de dag gis kyang smras pa/_ci bdag cag la sbyin nam/_'on te bdag cag bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyed bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la'o/_/de 
[\[27a.5\]]dag gis smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das 'di chu klung nai rany+dza nar zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad de nyam chung ba nyid kyis bzhengs mi spyod pa zhig yod de/_de bdag cag pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin gyis de la phul cig_/de gnyis de'i drung du chas pa dang /_de'i 
[\[27a.6\]]tshe lha rnams kyis shing ardzu na'i yal ga btud nas btud pa la byang chub sems dpa' 'jus te chu klung nai rany+dza na nas byung nas chos gos bgos te chu klung nai rany+dza na'i 'gram na bzhugs so/_/de nas de gnyis kyis gus pa dang bsam pa drag pos de la'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba de 
[\[27a.7\]]phul lo/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang de gnyis rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bzhes so/_/bzhes nas gsungs pa/_ci yol go 'di yang yongs su btang ngam/_de gnyis kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di yang yongs su btang lags so/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]dpas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba gsol nas yol go de bkrus te chu klung nai rany+dza nar bor ba klu rnams kyis blangs so/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis nam mkha' lding gi cha byad du sprul te/_chu 
[\[27b.2\]]klung nai rany+dza na dkrugs nas klu skrag par byas te yol go de phrogs nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du khyer te yol go'i mchod pa chen po btsugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs la gsungs pa/_sbyin pa 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/_
[\[27b.3\]]de gnyis kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos/_chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/_drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring bar byung ba de mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 
[\[27b.4\]]lung bstan pa zhig mchis pa de sems bskyed pa dang zhal zas phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bdag cag gi khyim thab tu gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_de 'dod pa rnams la don du mi gnyer bas rab tu byung zin no/_/de gnyis kyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[27b.5\]]ldan 'das gal te 'dod pa rnams don du mi gnyer na/_bsod pa phul ba'i bsod nams ci mchis pas/_/grags dang ldan pa don rnams kun grub pa/_/mi yi mchog gyur blo mchog ldan pa de'i/_/don kun myur du shin tu grub gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpas de bzhin 
[\[27b.6\]]du gyur cig ces gsungs nas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba gsol te/_dbang po drug tshim zhing stobs dang mthu thob nas chu klung nai rany+dza na'i 'gram na phan tshun du bzhugs pa'i sa btsal ba dang /_ji tsam na ri brags chen po me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig gzigs nas/_
[\[27b.7\]]de de la 'dzegs te phyogs dben zhing gsal ba'i sa phyogs su skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/bzhugs ma thag tu ri de nyid nyil to/_/byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/_nges par bdag gis las skyon can zhig byas te des na ri 'di nyil to snyam mo/_/lha rnams kyi sems 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis skyon can gyi phrin las ma mdzad do/_/'on kyang 'di ni chos nyid lags te/_sa thams cad kyis gzung bar rngo mi thog pa ni gnyis te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa gang lags pa dang /_
[\[28a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa gang lags pa'o/_/khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas ma lags te/_'on kyang chu klung nai rany+dza na rgol la phyogs che ge mo zhig na rdo rje'i gdan mchis kyis bzhud cig_/der ni 'das 
[\[28a.3\]]pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cing thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lhas lam bstan pa bzhin gshegs pa na de'i zhabs bzhag par pad ma dag byung bar gyur to/_/
[\[28a.4\]]rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las kyang chu bab nas pad ma'i rdzing dag byung bar gyur to/_/gom pa bor nas mnan pa na sa chen po 'di khar ba'i snod bzhin du sgra 'byin par brtsams so/_/bya tsa sha dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la skor ba byed do/_/rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu 
[\[28a.5\]]rnams kyis kyang dal bu dal bus rlung gtong bar byed do/_/char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang char pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]'bebs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/_nga la 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan ma byung bar gyur pas deng nyid bdag gis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 
[\[28a.6\]]'gyur ro snyam mo/_/chu klung nai rany+dza nar klu'i rgyal po dus can sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i gnas shig byung bar gyur te/_de sangs rgyas byung zhing sangs rgyas 'byung ba na mig thob par 'gyur ba yin pas de sa'i sgra grags pas gnas nas byung ba na rgyang ring po kho na 
[\[28a.7\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus spras pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer dang /_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]mthong ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod par brtsams pa/_dga' ba'i dbyangs kyis kun gang ba'i/_/sa yi sgra ni thos nas kyang /_/klu ni gnas nas byung nas su/_/phyogs kun du yang lta bar byed/_/brang gis 'gro ba'i gtso bo ste/_/klu yi 
[\[28b.2\]]rgyal po mthu chen gyis/_/nai rany+dza na'i ngos su ni/_/'jig rten 'dren pa gshegs pa mthong /_/sangs rgyas byung ba'i mthu yis ni/_/klu yis mig ni thob gyur te/_/sems dga' zhing ni yid mgu nas/_/des ni 'di skad tshig gsol to/_/bdag gis sngon ni mthong ba yi/_/sangs 
[\[28b.3\]]rgyas mthu chen de rnams dang /_/thub pa khyod ni mthong gyur na/_/de dang tha dad dbyer ma mchis/_/thub pa ji ltar thog mar ni/_/g.yas pa'i zhabs ni bteg pa las/_/khyod ni sangs rgyas deng gyur nas/_/'jig rten gyi ni yon gnas 'gyur/_/ji ltar chos gos mnabs pa dang /_/
[\[28b.4\]]nai rany+dza na'i chu bsil la/_/ji lta bur ni 'jug pa las/_/de ring khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/ji ltar rab brten 'gros su gshegs pa dang /_/ba lang khyu mchog 'gying ba ltar gshegs pas/_/skyes bu khyu mchog chos 'dzin rnams kyi mchog_/deng 'dir khyod ni sangs rgyas 
[\[28b.5\]]mchog 'gyur ro/_/da ltar mkha' la tsa sha brgya phrag gis/_/khyod sku rgya chen rgya chen mdzad de la/_/lding zhing bskor ba bgyid par gyur pa las/_/mi mchog deng ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar dri zhim rlung ni ldang ba dang /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bya yi tshogs kyang mi skrag la/_/
[\[28b.6\]]ljon shing rlung gis g.yos par ma gyur pas/_/mi mchog deng ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar btsun pa khyod kyi zhal gyi 'od/_/dri med gser 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba de/_/rnam par mdzes shing kha dog ldan pas na/_/mi mchog deng ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro//_//_
[\[28b.7\]]bar sdom la/_sgra dang mthong dang sangs rgyas dang /_/rdzogs dang zhabs dang chos gos dang /_/brten dang rtswa sha de bzhin rlung /_/khyod gtogs pa dang de bcu'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po dus can gyis yang dag par bstod nas rdo rje'i gdan logs su gshegs te 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]des dgongs pa/_rtswa'i gding ba la 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang /_de la rtswa'i dgos pa byung bar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa shes nas/_ri spos kyi ngad ldang las shing bal gyi 'dab ma ltar reg na bde ba'i rtswa khur gcig 
[\[29a.2\]]blangs nas rtswa 'tshong bkra shis kyi kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul te byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar bsdad do/_/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rtswa'o ni dag nga la phul cig_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis 
[\[29a.3\]]la gtugs nas gus pa dang bcas pas phul lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas bkra shis kyi rtswa 'tshong las rtswa bzhes te lha rnams kyis bstan pa'i lam nas byang chub kyi snying po gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rtswa rnams ma 'khrugs pa dang /_stug srab med pa dgram par 
[\[29a.4\]]brtsams so/_/de nas rtswa de rnams bskor thabs su lhung nas byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/_ji ltar rtswa 'di rnams bskor thabs su lhung ba las bdag gis gdon mi za bar deng bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas rdo rje'i gdan la 'dzegs te brang 
[\[29a.5\]]gis 'gro ba'i rgyal po gnyid log pa'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil mo krung bcas sku drang por bsrang dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs nas sems bskyed cing tshig tu yang gsungs pa/_ji srid zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du skyil mo krung gzhig par mi bya'o zhes des re 
[\[29a.6\]]zhig zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du skyil mo krung ma bshig go/_/bdud sdig can gyi rgyal mtshan gnyis po dga' ba'i gnas dang /_dogs pa'i gnas gnyis yod pa las/_dogs pa'i gnas kyi rgyal mtshan g.yo bar brtsams so/_/sdig can gyis bsams pa/_ji ltar 
[\[29a.7\]]rgyal mtshan 'di g.yo ba las gdon mi za bar gnod pa byed pa zhig byung ngo snyam ste/_de bsam pa la zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_shAkya zas gtsang gi bu 'di rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug gis/_ci tsam 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]bdag gi yul las ma 'das kyi bar du de la bgegs bya'o snyam du bsams nas phrin yig skyel ba skra gyen du 'greng ba/_sha na'i smad g.yogs bgos pa zhig gi kha dog tu mngon par sprul nas/_byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rtabs par smras pa/_grong khyer ser skya'i 
[\[29b.2\]]gzhi ni lhas byin gyis mnan pho brang ni bcom/_shAkya rnams ni kha btag na khyod ci'i phyir gnas btab ste 'dug_/de na byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes pa 'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_
[\[29b.3\]]rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o/_/de la 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni grags 'dzin ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes dang /_sa 'tshom la'o/_/gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ni lhas byin la'o/_/rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni de'i rjes su 'tsho ba'i shAkya rnams la'o/_/
[\[29b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ci'i phyir bdag la sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes snyam na/_ji tsam na bdud sdig can 'di lta ste/_dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs pa gzigs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' la dge ba'i rnam par rtog 
[\[29b.5\]]pa gsum skyes te/_'di lta ste/_nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnod sems med pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o/_/yang bdud kyis smras pa/_khyod ci'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug_/byang chub sems dpas bka' 
[\[29b.6\]]stsal pa/_bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_khyod kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes ga la thob/_byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_sdig can khyod kyis re zhig mchod sbyin gcig byas pas kyang 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par 
[\[29b.7\]]gyur na/_ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_dbyig dang /_gser la sogs pa yongs su btang 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]bas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_ngas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur ba de srid re skan/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bdud kyis smras pa/_re zhig ji ltar bdag gi mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang 
[\[30a.2\]]phyug thob par gyur pa'i bdag gi dpang ni khyod nyid yin na/_ji ltar khyod kyi bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_
[\[30a.3\]]mig dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_dbyig dang /_gser la sogs pa yongs su btang bar khyod la dpang du su yod/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang /_dra bas 
[\[30a.4\]]'brel ba bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas sa la reg par mdzad nas ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa 
[\[30a.5\]]dang /_mig dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_dbyig dang /_gser la sogs pa yongs su btang ba'i nga'i dpang ni sa 'di yin no/_/de nas sa'i lhas sa brtol nas thal mo sbyar te skad phyung ba/_sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa 
[\[30a.6\]]de bzhin yin no zhes de skad smras pa dang /_bdud sdig can cang mi smra bar gyur te/_zhum zhum por gyur/_bag 'khums par gyur/_spyi bo smad nas spobs pa med la sems khong du chud cing 'dug par gyur te/_de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas bsams pa/_bdag gis 
[\[30a.7\]]shAkya zas gtsang gi bu la de ltar byas kyang glags ma rnyed kyis/_ma la 'di la bdag gis yang bgegs shig bya'o zhes smras nas song ngo /_/de nas des bu mo gsum po sred ma dang /_dga' byed ma dang /_dga' spyod ma mngags te de rnams gzugs dang /_lang tsho'i rgyags 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]pas dregs shing lha'i gos dang rgyan gyis bklubs nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du bud med kyi g.yo rnams bstan par brtsams so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas ji ltar rgan mor gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas bdud gang na ba der dong ba dang /_
[\[30b.2\]]bdud kyis de rnams de lta bu'i rnam par mthong nas yi chad nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de gang gis na shAkya zas gtsang gi bu'i dka' thub la bgegs byed par 'gyur ba'i thabs legs pa ci yod snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/des 'byung po'i dpung tshogs dang ldan pa glang 
[\[30b.3\]]po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_ra dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_ma he dang /_phag dang /_khyi dang /_'ug pa dang /_ne'u le dang /_spre'u dang /_wa la sogs pa 'dra ba ral gri dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /_'khor lo dang /_mdung thung dang /_gzhu dang /_zhags 
[\[30b.4\]]pa dang /_dgra sta dang /_lcags kyi ber ka la sogs te mtshon cha can bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug ded nas rang nyid gzhu rna drung du bkang ste byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskor nas 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas gzugs rnam pa du ma can mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dang 
[\[30b.5\]]bcas pa de rnams gzigs nas dgongs pa/_re zhig pho phal pa zhig dang lhan cig 'thab par rtsom na yang de'i gnyen po'i phyogs la sbyor ba byed na 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug 'di la lta smos kyang ci dgos kyis/_ma la bdag gis gnyen po'i phyogs la sbyar bar bya'o snyam du 
[\[30b.6\]]dgongs nas de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i thabs la dgongs par brtsams so/_/bdud kyis 'byung po bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas 'khor lo dang /_mdung dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /_mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha 
[\[30b.7\]]rnams dbab par brtsams so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la snyoms par zhugs pa na de'i mtshon cha de rnams lha'i me tog ut+pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar por gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i nye 'khor du 'bab par brtsams so/_/de nas bdud steng 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te phyag dar gyi char dbab par brtsams na/_de yang lha'i me tog man dA ra ba rnams su gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas 'bab par brtsams so/_/de nas bdud kyis gdug pa'i rlung dang /_rdo'i char phab pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris 
[\[31a.2\]]kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i steng du lo ma las ma yin pa'i spyil po mngon par sprul pas rdo'i char dang gdug pa'i rlung du bcas pa des byang chub sems dpa' la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang gnod par ma gyur to/_/bdud kyis bsams pa/_bdag gis nam du yongs su bskor te 'dug_/bsam 
[\[31a.3\]]gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin gyi/_byang chub kyi shing shel las byas par mngon par sprul la song ba dang /_de'i lo ma rnams rtag par sgra 'byin pas de'i sems rtse gcig par mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas byang chub kyi shing shel las byas par mngon par sprul te/_rna ba gtad nas bsgrims 
[\[31a.4\]]te bsdad pa na byang chub kyi shing gi lo ma shel las byas pa rnams myur ba myur bar sgra 'byin par brtsams pas bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas/_byang chub sems dpas sems rtse gcig pa ma thob bo/_/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bsams pa/_shel las byas 
[\[31a.5\]]pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi lo ma shel las byas pa rnams kyi sgras byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig pa ma thob kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam ste/_de nas de rnams kyis lo ma re re bzung na/_'on kyang bdud kyi dpung de bzhin du gnas nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha 
[\[31a.6\]]rnams kyis bsams pa/_bdud sdig can 'di ni ring mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas bdud kyi dpung de khor yug gi pha rol du 'phangs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas nas 'bab chu nai rany+dza na'i 'gram 
[\[31a.7\]]byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs te rtag tu bya ba dang /_'grus skyong dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson pas bzhugs so/_/de nam gyi thun dang po la rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na/_de rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar mdzad de/_'di lta ste gcig tu gyur cing mang por gyur pa dang /_mang por gyur cing gcig tu gyur pa dang /_snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar gyur pa ye shes gzigs pas nyams su myong bar mdzad do/_/
[\[31b.2\]]skus rtsig pa dang /_ri dang /_ra ba la yang thad kar gshegs par mdzad de/_dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang /_byi'u zul mdzad de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu'i rgyun la yang mi nyams par gshegs te/_dper na sa la bya ba 
[\[31b.3\]]bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis gshegs par mdzad de/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la phyag gis nom zhing nyug par mdzad cing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du skus dbang sgyur 
[\[31b.4\]]bar mdzad do/_/yang bdud kyis bsams pa/_bsam gtan gyi tsher ma sgra yin pas ma la bdag gis rgyang ring po kho nar 'dug la sgra dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas des 'byung po bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug dang /_'jigs pa chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/byang chub sems 
[\[31b.5\]]dpas kyang de bsgrib pa'i phyir dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi bar du shing ka dam pa'i tshal sprul pas des na sgra de rdugs pas mi grag go/_/byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/_ma la bdag gis lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du bzhag 
[\[31b.6\]]nas/_des na lha dang mi rnams kyi sgra gang dang gang dag thos par 'dod pa de dag mnyan par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa bzhag pa na/_de lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyi las 'das pas sgra gnyis po mi 
[\[31b.7\]]rnams dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyi dang /_gang dag ring ba dang /_gang dag nye ba yang gsan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/_bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug las bdag la su dag ni gnod par sems/_su dag ni ma yin zhes de dag ji 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]ltar shes par bya snyam pa dang de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam nas/_de nam gyi gung thun la sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag 
[\[32a.2\]]pa na/_de'i thugs kyis sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa'i yid ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'dod 
[\[32a.3\]]chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa dang /_gti mug dang bral ba dang /_bsdus pa dang /_rnam par g.yengs pa dang /_zhum 
[\[32a.4\]]pa dang /_rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_rgod pa dang /_mi rgod pa dang /_nye bar ma zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_ma bsgoms pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang /_sems rnam par ma grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba zhes ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[32a.5\]]du rab tu mkhyen to/_/shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems la shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdud kyi mngag gzhug pa 'di rnams las su dag bdag dang tshe rabs gzhan na mar 'brel ba'am/_phar 'brel 
[\[32a.6\]]ba'am/_su dag gshed ma'am/_phyir rgol ba'am/_dgrar gyur pa de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam nas/_de nam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas 
[\[32a.7\]]rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na/_des sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dgongs te/_'di lta ste/_des skye ba gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_drug dang /_bdun dang /_brgyad dang /_
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]dgu dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum bcu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu dang /_skye ba brgya dang /_skye ba stong dang /_skye ba brgya stong dang /_skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang /_skye ba stong phrag du ma dang /_skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa dang /_'chags pa'i 
[\[32b.2\]]bskal pa dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma rjes su dgongs te/_bdag sngon sems can 'di dag gi nang na gnas pa na ming ni 'di zhes bya/_
[\[32b.3\]]rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/_zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig nyams su myong /_tshe ni 'di srid cig lon/_yun ni 'di srid cig 'dug 'dug_/tshe ni 'di srid cig lon te gnas de nas bdag shi 'phos te che ge mo zhig tu skyes 
[\[32b.4\]]so/_/de nas kyang shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/_/de nas kyang shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba rnam pa dang bcas te yul phyogs dang bcas par sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dgongs so/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdud kyi mngag gzhug 'di rnams las 
[\[32b.5\]]su dag ni ngan song du 'gro/_su dag ni mi 'gro ba de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam ste/_de nam gyi thun tha ma la 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon 
[\[32b.6\]]par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na/_de'i lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyi las 'das pas gzigs na sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa dang /_dman pa dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gro 
[\[32b.7\]]dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can rnams las ji lta ba bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/_shes ldan sems can 'di zhes bya ba 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan te/_'phags pa rnams la skur ba 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]'debs pa log par lta ba ste/_log par lta ba'i chos dang las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/shes ldan sems can 'di dag ni lus 
[\[33a.2\]]kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan te/_'phags pa rnams la skur ba mi 'debs shing yang dag par lta ba ste/_yang dag par lta ba'i chos dang las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho 
[\[33a.3\]]ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang mi rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_shes ldan sems can 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i zag pa dang /_srid pa'i zag pa dang /_ma rig pa'i zag pas 'khor ba na 'khor ro/_/'di rnams kyi 'dod pa'i zag pa dang /_srid pa'i zag pa dang /_
[\[33a.4\]]ma rig pa'i zag pa de ji ltar spang ba de ji ltar shes par bya snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam ste/_de rtag tu byed pa dang /_'grus skyong dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la bsgom 
[\[33a.5\]]pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson pas gnas nas zag pa med pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na/_des 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung 
[\[33a.6\]]ba'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong na 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhing srid pa'i zag 
[\[33a.7\]]pa dang /_ma rig pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes nyid mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]de ltar de na bcom ldan 'das byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_bya ba byas/_byed pa byas nas me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug byams pa'i mtshon gyis mngon du bcom 
[\[33b.2\]]nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis gnas gzhu lhung /_rgyal mtshan 'gyel/_gnas kyang g.yos so/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'byung po'i 'khor bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba yid la bcags te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/
[\[33b.3\]]bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni dka' ba lo drug spyad nas rdo rje'i gdan la 'dzegs te rtswa'i gding ba la grongs so zhes bsgrags pa gang yin pa de rgyal po zas gtsang btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po'i tshogs dang /_grong 
[\[33b.4\]]khyer ser skya na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pas thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang yid mi bde bas gdungs par gyur to/_/sa 'tsho ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes dang /_grags 'dzin ma yang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rjes su dran nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel nas chus 
[\[33b.5\]]gtor ba las slar dbugs byung ngo /_/btsun mo'i spro bsring ba'i skye bo dag ni mig mchi mas gang la myur ba myur bar dbugs brdzags shing dal bus dal bus smre sngags 'don cing 'dug go/_/de dag sdug bsngal ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha dga' ba skyes pa 
[\[33b.6\]]rnams kyis mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ma nongs te/_'di ltar des bla na med pa'i ye shes bsnyes so zhes smras pa gang yin pa rgyal po zas gtsang 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_ser skya'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/_/bcom 
[\[33b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na grags 'dzin ma la yang khye'u zhig btsas so/_/bdud rtsi zas kyi yang khye'u zhig btsas so/_/zla ba yang sgra can gyis zin to/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis phun sum tshogs pa de mthong nas/_dga' ba dang /_mgu 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_rangs pa rgya chen po dang /_yid bde ba skyes par gyur to/_/des grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bshams/_
[\[34a.2\]]dar gyi chun phyang mang po dbyangs/_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng /_me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar bkram nas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi dang sum mdo rnams su sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs so/_/de nas grong khyer gyi shar sgor dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa 
[\[34a.3\]]pa dang /_kun du rgyu dang /_ngan pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_slong mo ba rnams la sbyin pa dag gtong ngo /_/lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_dbus kyi sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin pa dag gtong /_bsod nams dag byed do/_/
[\[34a.4\]]grags 'dzin ma'i bu'i ming 'dogs par byed de/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye bos smras pa/_'di btsas pa na zla ba sgra can gyis zin pa de bas na khye'u'i ming sgra can zan zhes gdags so zhes btags so/_/bdud rtsi zas kyi yang de bzhin du sbyin pa dag btang /_bsod nams 
[\[34a.5\]]dag byas nas khye'u'i ming cir btags zhes bu'i ming 'dogs par byed do/_/nye du dag gis smras pa/_gang gi tshe 'di btsas pa na grong khyer thams cad dga' bar gyur pas de'i phyir khye'u'i ming kun dga' bor gdags so zhes btags so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang 
[\[34a.6\]]gis smras pa/_grags 'dzin ma'i bu gang yin pa 'di ni shAkya thub pa'i bu ma yin no zhes smras pa/_grags 'dzin mas thos nas yi chad par gyur to/_/de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i bang tshad kyi pha bong la zhon nas rol pa'i rdzing 'gram du 'dug ste bden pa gsol 
[\[34a.7\]]ba btab pa/_gal te 'di byang chub sems dpa' las skyes pa yin na de bzhin du rdzing 'dir pha bong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar gyur cig_/ci ste ma yin na bying bar gyur cig ces smras nas chur bor ba dang de shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du pha bong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar brtsams 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis ya mtshan du gyur pa de thos nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te byang chub sems dpa' rol pa'i rdzing 'gram du song na/_ji tsam na sgra can zin bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i bang tshad kyi pha bong la zhon nas shing bal gyi 'dab ma 
[\[34b.2\]]bzhin du chu na 'phyo ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_rangs pa rgya chen po dang /_yid bde ba skyes te de ma thag tu rdzing der zhugs nas gzhon nu sgra can zin bzang po pang du blangs nas langs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 
[\[34b.3\]]'das kyis bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug byams pa'i mtshon gyis mngon du btul nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur to/_/'jig rten 'di thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/_'di 
[\[34b.4\]]ltar 'jig rten dang 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba'i snang bas snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas der sems can gang dag 
[\[34b.5\]]skyes pa de rnams kyis snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas/_shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhig shes ldan dag sems can gzhan zhig kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhig ces ngo shes par gyur to//_//sdom la/_'khor 
[\[34b.6\]]bzhi dang ni lang tsho dang /_/yab dang sras ni mjal ba dang /_/shAkya de bzhin rang byung dang /_/dung skyong khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/de nas tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis shig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lteng 
[\[34b.7\]]rgyas na chu klung nai rany+dza na'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad nas/_de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis/_ma 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]la bdag cag der song la tshigs su bcad pa re res mngon par bstod do snyam mo/_/de nas tshangs ris kyi lha de gnyis kyis 'di lta ste/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskums te brkyang pa'am brkyang ste bskums pa tsam gyis tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis tshangs 
[\[35a.2\]]ris kyi 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis las gcig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_ded dpon g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba po/_/sdig pa mi mnga' bzhengs shig 'jig 
[\[35a.3\]]rten gzigs/_/rin chen chos ni 'tshal bar 'gyur mchis kyis/_/bde gshegs chos kyi mchog ni bshad du gsol/_/cig shos kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_nga rgyal bcom zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba/_/sdig pa mi mnga' bzhengs shig 'jig rten 
[\[35a.4\]]gzigs/_/bco lnga lon pa'i dgung zla nya ba ltar/_/khyod kyi thugs ni shin tu rnam dag lags/_/zhes gsol nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_'jig rten 'dod pa'i 
[\[35a.5\]]bde gang dang /_/lha yul byung bde gang yin pa/_/srid pa zad pa'i bde de la/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/khur khyer ba ni sdug bsngal te/_/khur bor ba ni bde ba yin/_/khur ni lci ba rnams bor nas/_/gzhan dag blang bar mi bya'o/_/sred pa thams cad rnam 
[\[35a.6\]]spangs shing /_/'dus byas thams cad zad nas ni/_/dngos po thams cad yongs shes nas/_/slar yang srid par mi 'ong ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba sku nyams su btar nas/_skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par 
[\[35a.7\]]mdzad pa na/_/de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul lo/_/de'i tshe tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po gnyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig dong ba na lam de nyid du zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po'i sngon gyi grogs po dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_mdza' 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]bshes su gyur pa'i lha zhig yod pa 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lteng rgyas na chu klung nai rany+dza na'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba sku nyams su 
[\[35b.2\]]btar nas/_skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad pa na/_de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis/_de la tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po gnyis kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug na/_de ni tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po de gnyis kyi yun 
[\[35b.3\]]ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag rang gis 'di gnyis 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms 'bul du gzhug pa'i phyir brtson par bya'o snyam nas/_de nas lha des shing rta dang tshong pa thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas tshong pa 
[\[35b.4\]]ga gon dang /_bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshong pa tshong pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lteng rgyas na chu klung nai rany+dza na'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba sku 
[\[35b.5\]]nyams su btar ba na skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad de/_de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis/_de la khyed kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms phul na de ni khyed kyi yun ring mo'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas lha de de nyid du mi snang bar 
[\[35b.6\]]gyur to/_/de nas tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin la/_chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir 'di ltar lhas kyang 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir brtson 
[\[35b.7\]]par byed do snyam du bsams nas sbrang rtsi dang lde gu mang du khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang pos 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du 'dir bdag cag gis sbrang rtsi dang lde gu mang du 'tshal te mchis kyis/_bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 'di bzhes su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[36a.2\]]'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te bdag gi phyag gis bsod snyoms bzhes na dper na mu stegs can bzhin du 'gyur bas de ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod 
[\[36a.3\]]snyoms gang du bzhes pa bsam par bya'o snyam pa na bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du lhung bzed du bsod snyoms bzhes lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[36a.4\]]kyis kyang dgongs shing ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms lhung bzed du bzhes par gyur nas de nas bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyis lhung bzed kyi dgos pa byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[36a.5\]]chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyis lhung bzed kyi dgos pa byung bar rig nas ri brags can zhig la rdo las byas pa'i lhung bzed mi ma yin pas byas shing mi ma yin pas zin par byas la gsal ba/_gtsang ma/_dri mi zhim pa med pa bzhi khyer te bcom ldan 'das 
[\[36a.6\]]gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed 
[\[36a.7\]]kyis lhung bzed kyi mkho ba byung bar bdag cag gis 'tshal nas ri brags can zhig las rdo'i lhung bzed mi ma lags pas bgyis shing mi ma lags pas legs par bgyis pa gsal ba/_gtsang ma dri nga ba ma mchis pa bzhi 'dir 'tshal te mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das thugs 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 'di bzhes su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te bdag gis rgyal po chen po gcig las lhung bzed gcig bzhes na gsum gyi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te gnyis las na ni gnyis kyi sems mi dga' bar 
[\[36b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/gal te gsum las na ni gcig gi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi las lhung bzed bzhi bzhes la lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlab par bya'o snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi las lhung 
[\[36b.3\]]bzed bzhi bzhes te lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgyad bcu drug pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po las srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms bzhes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[36b.4\]]'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshong pa dag khyed tshur sangs rgyas la skyabs su deng shig_/chos la skyabs su deng shig_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la yang skyabs su deng shig_/
[\[36b.5\]]btsun pa bdag cag sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun gang lags pa de la yang skyabs su mchi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po'i sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang bas 
[\[36b.6\]]rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/_gang gi don du sbyin pa btang /_/de yi don du 'gyur ba ste/_/bde ba'i don du sbyin btang na/_/de ni bde bar 'gyur ba yin/_/bsod nams rnam smin bde ba dang /_/bsams pa yang ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/myur du zhi ba dam pa yi/_/mya ngan 
[\[36b.7\]]'das pa rtogs par 'gyur/_/pha rol las byung gnod pa ni/_/lha dang bdud kyi rigs dag gis/_/bsod nams kho na byed pa na/_/bar chad bya bar mi nus so/_/gal te 'phags pa'i shes rab phyir/_/gtong ldan de ni 'bad byed na/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed pa dag_/
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]rnam par mthong zhing reg par 'gyur/_/de nas tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/
[\[37a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang /_bzang po la bsod snyoms bzhes nas chu klung nai rany+dza na gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas chu klung nai rany+dza na'i 'gram du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad do/_/de nas sbrang rtsi yang rlung slong la lde gu yang rlung slong bas des bcom ldan 
[\[37a.3\]]'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs so/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 
[\[37a.4\]]dus la bab lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_'di lta ste dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir bdud sdig can 'di nye bar 'ongs so snyam du dgongs nas/_bdud sdig can la 'di skad 
[\[37a.5\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/sdig can ji srid nga'i nyan thos mkhas pa/_gsal ba/_yid gzhungs pa/_pha rol gyi rgol ba byung zhing byung ba rnams chos bzhin gyis tshar gcod nus pa/_rang gi smra ba gsal bar byed nus pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge 
[\[37a.6\]]bsnyen ma rnams byung bar ma gyur pa dang /_nga'i tshangs par spyod pa rgya chen po skye bo mang po dang lha dang mi'i bar la rgya cher yang dag par legs par rab tu ma bstan gyi bar du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni yongs 
[\[37a.7\]]su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/snyam du bsams nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la 'gyod pas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas shing 'dzam bu zhes bya bas 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]gang yin pa de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na a ru ra chen po'i tshal yod de/_de nas kha dog dang /_dri dang /_ro dang ldan pa'i a ru ra blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig 
[\[37b.2\]]tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bser ma'i snyun nad kyis thebs par bdag gis 'tshal nas shing 'dzam bu zhes bgyi bas 'dzam bu'i gling du btags pa gang 
[\[37b.3\]]lags pa de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na a ru ra chen po'i tshal mchis te/_de nas bdag gis kha dog dang /_dri dang /_ror ldan pa'i a ru ra 'dir 'tshal te mchis kyis de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol dang /_bser ma dang mthun par 'gyur 
[\[37b.4\]]zhing bser ma'i snyun nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol ba dang rlung dang mthun par gyur nas rlung nad kyi snyun nye bar zhi bar gyur to/_/des na bcom ldan 'das shin tu bzod cing lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ji tsam dgyes kyi bar 
[\[37b.5\]]du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing zhig gi drung du brten te skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drang por bsrang ste dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi 
[\[37b.6\]]gnas su zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par gyur to/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gis zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par rig nas gnas nas mngon par 'phags te/_bcom ldan 'das zhag bdun po 'di la bser bar 'gyur du 'ong /_tsha ba dang /_sbrang 
[\[37b.7\]]ma dang /_sha sbrang dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi reg pas sku la gnod par 'gyur du 'ong zhes lus kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun du dkris te steng du mgo'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gis zhag bdun gyi dus ma yin 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]pa'i sprin chags pa med par rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku lus las lus bkrol te dpung rgyan dang /_rna rgyan dang /_phreng ba dang /_rgyan sna tshogs dang /_byug pas byugs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[38a.2\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dgung bdun po 'di la bser bar ma gyur tam/_tsha ba dang /_sbrang ma dang /_sha sbrang dang /_bser ma dang /_gdugs dang /_sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas sku la reg par ma gyur tam/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 
[\[38a.3\]]tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_dben pa'i dga' ba bde ba yin/_/chos thos pa la lta ba dang /_/srog chags rnams la sdom pa yis/_/'jig rten 'tshe ba med pa bde/_/'jig rten 'dod chags bral ba dang /_/'dod chags rnams las rgal ba bde/_/nga'o 
[\[38a.4\]]nga rgyal thul ba gang /_/de nyid bde ba'i dam pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas na bzhugs nas byang chub kyi snying po gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang rtswa'i gding ba bshams pa nyid la skyil mo krung bcas/_sku drang 
[\[38a.5\]]por bsrang nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugs te/_skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad cing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po lugs dang mthun pa dang /_lugs dang mi mthun pa 'di nyid la gzigs par mdzad 
[\[38a.6\]]de/_'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di yod/_'di skyes pas 'di skye ba 'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched 
[\[38a.7\]]drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste 'di med na 'di med la/_'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 
[\[38b.2\]]'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/
[\[38b.3\]]tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde 
[\[38b.4\]]ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun po de nyid 'das par mdzad nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_
[\[38b.5\]]gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/_/gang tshe chos rnams rgyu dang bcas shes pa/_/de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral/_/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs 
[\[38b.6\]]pa yin/_/gang tshe sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas shes pa/_/de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral/_/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/_/gang tshe tshor ba zad pa thob 'gyur ba/_/de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 
[\[38b.7\]]'bral/_/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/_/gang tshe rkyen rnams zad pa thob nas ni/_/de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral/_/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]tshangs pa yin/_/gang tshe zag pa zad pa thob gyur nas/_/de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral/_/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/_/'jig rten kun du snang bar 'dug pa ni/_/ji ltar nyi ma bar 
[\[39a.2\]]snang shar ba bzhin/_/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/_/bdud kyi sde rnams rnam par bcom gnas te/_/sangs rgyas kun du sbyor las rnam par grol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_
[\[39a.3\]]bdag gis chos zab mo zab par snang ba mthong bar dka' zhing khong du chud par dka' ba rtog ge pa rnams kyi rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa zhib mo mdzangs pa'i mkhas pa dang /_rig pas rnam par shes par bya ba rtogs te/_de bdag gis gzhan la smras kyang gzhan gyis de 
[\[39a.4\]]mi shes pas des bdag dub par 'gyur/_ngal bar 'gyur/_sems la spro ba med pa kho nar 'gyur bar zad pas ma la bdag gcig pu dgon pa'i nags stug por mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas par bya'o snyam ste/_de nas bcom 
[\[39a.5\]]ldan 'das thugs las chung ngus bzhugs pa la thugs gzhol bar mdzad cing chos 'chad pa la ma yin no/_/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ma rung ba'o kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ma rung ba ste/_gang gi phyir da ltar brgya lam na lan 
[\[39a.6\]]'ga' de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba ni dper na u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin na/_bcom ldan 'das de da ltar thugs las chung ngus bzhugs pa la thugs gzhol bar mdzad cing chos 'chad pa la ni ma yin pas ma la 
[\[39a.7\]]bdag der song la gsol ba gdab bo snyam mo/_/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskums nas brkyang ba'am/_brkyang nas bskums pa tsam gyis tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar byas te/_
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_ma ga d+hAr ni sngon chad chos byung ba/_/dag pa ma lags dri mar bcas pas rtogs/_/bdud rtsi chos kyi sgo ni phye mdzod la/_/dri ma med pas rtogs pa bshad 
[\[39b.2\]]par mdzod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/tshangs pa ngas ni tshegs chen gyis/_/skyon rnams bcom nas rtogs gyur pa/_/srid dang chags pas dkris rnams kyis/_/chos ni legs par rtogs mi 'gyur/_/rgyun las bzlog phyogs 'gro ba'i lam/_/
[\[39b.3\]]zab cing shin tu mthong dka' ba/_/mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa yi/_/'dod chags zhen pas mthong mi 'gyur/_/btsun pa 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la dbang po rnon po dang /_dbang po 'bring po dang /_dbang po rtul po dang /_drang 
[\[39b.4\]]sla ba dang /_gdul sla ba dang /_nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /_rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te/_de dag gis dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa dper na ut+pa la'am/_pad ma'am/_ku mu da'am/_pad ma dkar po dag chab nas 
[\[39b.5\]]skyes shing chab nas chen por gyur te chab nas 'phags te mchis pa las kha cig ni chab dang mnyam/_kha cig ni chab kyi nang du nub cing mchis pa de bzhin du btsun pa 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la yang dbang po rnon po dang /_dbang po 'bring 
[\[39b.6\]]po dang /_dbang po rtul po dang /_drang sla ba dang /_gdul sla ba dang /_nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /_rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te de dag gis dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur bas chos rin po che 'tshal bar 'gyur ba mchis kyis/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[39b.7\]]chos bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la nga nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la blta bar bya'o snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]gzigs te/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa dang /_'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la dbang po rnon po dang /_dbang po 'bring po dang /_dbang po rtul po dang /_drang sla ba dang /_
[\[40a.2\]]gdul sla ba dang /_nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /_rdul chung ba'i rang bzhin yod de/_de dag dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po gzhol bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[40a.3\]]de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_bdud rtsi'i sgo mo dag ni dbye bar byas/_/nyan par su 'dod som nyi sol cig dang /_/tshangs pa mi rnams la ni gya nom chos/_/klan ka mi btsal mdo tsam bshad par bya/_/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'di snyam du sems 
[\[40a.4\]]te/_kye bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad par 'gyur ro/_/kye bde bar gshegs pas chos bshad par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_dga' ba rgya chen po dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 
[\[40a.5\]]la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ngas su la thog mar chos bshad snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas sgyu 
[\[40a.6\]]rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur de la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/_de ni nga'i thog ma'i slob dpon kho na yin bzhin du rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod la rtogs pa dam pa dag la yang yid rangs shing dad par gyur pa yin no snyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams 
[\[40a.7\]]kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa sgyu rtsal shes kyi ba ring du 'phur gum nas dgung bdun lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs pa la zhugs te/_ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur shi nas zhag bdun lon no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]snyam du dgongs te/_e ma'o sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur shi ba de ni te por ma stes so/_/e ma'o sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur shi ba de ni shin tu te por ma stes te chos 'dul ba 'di ma thos so/_/gal te des chos 'dul ba 'di thos na shes par 'gyur ba zhig snyam mo/_/de nas 
[\[40b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod de la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/_de ni nga'i thog ma'i slob dpon kho na yin bzhin du rjed 
[\[40b.3\]]pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod la rtogs pa dam pa dag la yang yid rangs shing dad par gyur to snyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod mdang sum srod la gum lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 
[\[40b.4\]]dgongs pa la zhugs te ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod srod la shi bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_e ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod shi ba de ni te por ma stes so/_/e ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod shi ba de ni shin tu te por ma 
[\[40b.5\]]stes te chos 'dul ba 'di ma thos so/_/gal te des chos 'dul ba 'di thos na shes par 'gyur ba zhig snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam mo/_/de nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas lnga sde'i dge slong 
[\[40b.6\]]de rnams la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/_de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor gyis rjes su brtson par gnas pa na bla ma dang /_gus pa dang /_sdug pa dang bcas pas gnas pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_lnga 
[\[40b.7\]]sde'i dge slong rnams da ltar gang na 'dug snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyi las 'das pas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na 'khod pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du byang chub 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]kyi shing drung du bzhugs na bA rA Na sI'i ka shi'i grong khyer gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/_/de'i tshe kun tu rgyu nyer 'gro lam de nyid du zhugs par gyur te/_kun tu rgyu nyer 'gros bcom ldan 'das lam nas gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces 
[\[41a.2\]]gsol to/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni dngas/_bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag_/pags pa'i mdog ni gsal na/_tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma khyod kyi ston pa ni gang /_khyod su las brten te rab tu byung /_khyod su'i chos la dga'/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 
[\[41a.3\]]tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_nga dang 'dra ba yod min pas/_/nga la slob dpon 'ga' med do/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas nga gcig pu/_/yang dag byang chub dam pa thob/_/thams cad zil mnan 'jig rten kun mkhyen la/_/'di na chos kun gyis ni nga ma gos/_/
[\[41a.4\]]thams cad spangs shing sred bral rnam grol te/_/rang gis mngon par shes na su la brten/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha mi'i ston pa po/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs ni kun ldan pas/_/nyid kyis byang chub rtogs nas rab gsung ba/_/mi mnyam mtshungs pa med na su la 
[\[41a.5\]]brten/_/nga ni 'jig rten dgra bcom ste/_/'jig rten bla med nga yin pas/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/nga ni rgyal ba bdud zil gnon/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma rgyal ba zhes gsung ngam/_/gang gis zag pa zad thob pa/_/rgyal ba nga 'dra shes par bya/_/sdig 
[\[41a.6\]]pa'i chos ni ngas bcom pas/_/de bas nyer 'gro nga rgyal ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma gang du bzhud/_/bA rA Na sIr gshegs nas ni/_/ngas ni chos kyi rnga brdung zhing /_/'jig rten ma bskor gang yin pa'i/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/'jig rten chags las rgal 
[\[41a.7\]]ba yi/_/kun mkhyen sangs rgyas zhi gyur pa/_/'jig rten bsgral ba ma byas par/_/skyes bu dam pa grags mi srid/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma rgyal ba legs so/_/zhes gsol nas kun du rgyu nyer 'gro lam nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]gshegs pa na bA rA Na sIr byon to/_/de'i tshe lnga sde'i dge sbyong rnams bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na 'khod do/_/lnga sde'i dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang phan tshun nas ched du bsams te legs par 'dug nas 
[\[41b.2\]]khrims su bcas pa/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma mi brtan pa/_bya ba mang ba/_mang pos 'tsho zhing /_spong ba nyams pa de da 'bras chan dang /_zan dron gyi kha zas mang du za zhing lus mar sar dang til mar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed cing 'ong gis de bdag cag 
[\[41b.3\]]gi drung du 'ongs pa dang de la smra bar mi bya/_phyag mi bya/_ldang ba mi bya/_langs te stan bstab par mi bya'o/_/gzhan du na stan nar ma kho na bting la tshig 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma stan yod kyis ji ste 'dod na 'dug shig ces brjod par bya'o zhes khrims bcas so/_/bcom 
[\[41b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis ji lta ji ltar lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la gzigs pa'i phyir nye bar gshegs pa de lta de ltar lnga sde'i dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid dang /_dpal dang /_bkur sti ma bzod nas stan las langs te kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan shom mo/_/kha 
[\[41b.5\]]cig ni zhabs bkru ba'i chu dang zhabs kyi rten dag mtha' gcig tu 'jog par byed do/_/kha cig ni bsu ste na bza' chos gos dag blangs nas 'di skad ces shes ldan gau ta ma tshur spyon/_shes ldan gau ta ma byon pa legs so/_/shes ldan gau ta ma gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs 
[\[41b.6\]]shig zhes zer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_kye ma skyes bu blun po 'di rnams kyis khrims bcas nas rang gis bshig go snyam du mkhyen nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[41b.7\]]mtshan nas brjod/_gdung nas brjod/_tshe dang ldan pas brjod pa kun du rjod par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa dang /_gdung nas brjod pa 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]dang /_tshe dang ldan pas rjod pa'i kun du ma brjod cig_/khyed la yun ring por gnod pa dang phan pa ma yin pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag gang la la lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa dang /_
[\[42a.2\]]gdung nas brjod pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pas rjod pa'i kun du brjod pa de ni skyes bu blun po de la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa ma yin pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma khyod kyis re zhig sngon gyi tshul dang /_spyod 
[\[42a.3\]]pa dang dka' ba spyad pa des mi'i chos bla ma 'phags pa'i khyad par thob par nus pa'am/_shes pa'am/_mthong ba'am/_reg par gnas pa cung zad kyang ma thob na/_da lta khyod mi brtan zhing bya ba mang la mang pos 'tsho zhing spong ba nyams pas da khyod 'bras chan dang /_zan dron dang /_kha 
[\[42a.4\]]zas la mang du za zhing lus mar sar dang til mar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dge slong dag khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mdog dang dbang po rnams gsal ba sngon las tha dad du bya ba gzhan lta mthong ngam/_de rnams kyis 'di skad 
[\[42a.5\]]ces gsol to/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma de de bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rab tu byung bas ni mtha' 'di gnyis la brten par mi bya/_bsnyen par mi bya/_bsnyen bkur mi bya ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_
