[\[42a.6\]]'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa'i bsod snyoms kyi rjes su brtson pa/_dman pa/_ngan pa/_tha chad ma rabs gang yin pa dang /_bdag nyid dub pa la rjes su brtson pa/_sdug bsngal ba/_'phags pa ma yin pa/_gnod pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o/_/khyed kyis mtha' 'di gnyis 
[\[42a.7\]]la mi brten par dbu ma'i lam mig byed pa/_ye shes byed pa/_nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba/_mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba yod de/_dbu ma'i lam gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di lta ste/_yang 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong 
[\[42b.2\]]rnams la shes par bya ba 'dis shes par mdzad spyod pas bcom ldan 'das lnga sde'i dge slong rnams las gnyis la snga dro gdams ngag 'bogs pa na gsum grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug ste/_gsum gyis bsgrub pa gang yin pa des drug char 'tsho bar byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das lnga sde 
[\[42b.3\]]rnams kyi dge slong gsum la phyi dro gdams ngag 'bogs pa na gnyis grong du bsod snyoms 'jug ste/_gnyis kyis bsgrub pa gang yin pa des lnga sde 'tsho bar byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni snga dro'i dus kho nar gsol ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la 
[\[42b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni sdug 
[\[42b.5\]]bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug 
[\[42b.6\]]bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas yongs su shes par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i 
[\[42b.7\]]bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas spang bar bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]par shes pas mngon sum du bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon 
[\[43a.2\]]par shes pas bsgom par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas yongs su shes so zhes 
[\[43a.3\]]tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas spangs so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes 
[\[43a.4\]]so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_
[\[43a.5\]]rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas bsgoms so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_
[\[43a.6\]]blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag nga ji srid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams la de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i mig ma skyes/_shes pa ma yin/_rig pa ma yin/_blo ma yin/_rtogs pa ma skyes pa de srid du nga lha dang bcas 
[\[43a.7\]]pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang mir bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_mi ldan pa dang /_rab tu grol ba dang /_phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par ma gyur 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]cing dge slong dag ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar ma shes so/_/dge slong dag ngas gang nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams la de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i mig skyes shing 
[\[43b.2\]]shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes pa de nas nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten/_bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang lha dang mir bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_mi ldan pa dang /_rab 
[\[43b.3\]]tu grol ba dang /_phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par gyur cing /_dge slong dag ngas de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar shes so chos kyi rnam grangs de bka' stsal pa na tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya dang /_
[\[43b.4\]]lha brgyad khri la chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/_kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyi chos kun shes sam/_bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal lags so/_/kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/_kun 
[\[43b.5\]]shes sam/_bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lags so/_/kun 'tshal lags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+yas chos kun shes pas de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya kun shes kauN+Di n+ya zhes tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su btags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+yas chos kun shes so/_/zhes sa bla'i gnod sbyin 
[\[43b.6\]]rnams sgra sgrogs par byed do/_/grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bA rA Na sIr drang srong smra ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang 
[\[43b.7\]]'jig rten du chos dang ldan par ma bskor ba skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir bskor bas lha'i ris mngon par 'phel zhing lha ma yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so zhes 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]dbyangs bsgrags so/_/sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams kyi sgra thos nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas 
[\[44a.2\]]skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de dang /_skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra bsgrags so/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang sgra sgrogs par byed do/_/grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bA rA Na sIr drang srong smra ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[44a.3\]]kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par 'ga' yang ma bskor ba skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_
[\[44a.4\]]'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir bskor bas lha'i ris mngon par 'phel zhing lha ma yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so zhes dbyangs bsgrags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bA rA Na sIr drang srong smra ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su lan 
[\[44a.5\]]gsum bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa bskor bas de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su btags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[44a.6\]]dge slong dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni 'di dag yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/_/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i 
[\[44a.7\]]bden pa gang zhe na/_skye ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_rga ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_na ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_'chi ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_mi sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug bsngal ba dang /_gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa de yang sdug bsngal ba dang /_mdor 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal ba ste/_de yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_yang srid pa'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang de la mngon par 
[\[44b.2\]]'dod pa ste/_de spang ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_yang srid pa'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang de la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de nyid ma lus par spangs pa dang /_bor 
[\[44b.3\]]ba dang /_bsal ba dang /_zad pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gags pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_nub pa ste/_de mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[44b.4\]]gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_
[\[44b.5\]]yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_de yang bsgom par bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/lnga sde'i dge slong lhag ma rnams la ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/
[\[44b.6\]]de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa gcig dang /_gnyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong lnga sde lhag ma rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gzugs ni bdag ma yin no/_/dge slong dag gal te gzugs bdag yin na gzugs la gnod pa 
[\[44b.7\]]dang /_sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhing gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig_/'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gang gi phyir gzugs bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir gzugs la gnod pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing gzugs 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig_/'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa ni bdag ma yin no/_/dge slong dag gal te rnam par shes 
[\[45a.2\]]pa bdag yin na rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig_/'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir rnam 
[\[45a.3\]]par shes pa la gnod pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig_/'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_gzugs rtag gam mi rtag btsun pa mi rtag lags so/_/mi 
[\[45a.4\]]rtag pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/_sdug bsngal ma yin/_btsun pa sdug bsngal lags so/_/mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag go/_/bdag ni 'di yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag go 
[\[45a.5\]]zhes bdag tu khas len tam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag gam mi rtag_/btsun pa mi rtag lags so/_/mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam sdug bsngal ma yin/_
[\[45a.6\]]btsun pa sdug bsngal lags so/_/mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag go/_/bdag ni 'di yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len tam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/
[\[45a.7\]]dge slong dag de lta bas na gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung 'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang gi'am/_phyi'i'am/_rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_gya nom pa'am/_gang dag thag ring ba'am/_gang dag thag nye ba de dag thams cad ni 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]bdag ma yin/_bdag ni de ma yin/_de ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ji snyed pa gang ci yang rung 'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs 
[\[45b.2\]]pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang gi'am/_phyi'i'am/_rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_gya nom pa'am/_gang dag thag ring ba'am/_gang dag thag nye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yin/_bdag ni de ma yin/_de ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes ji lta ba de 
[\[45b.3\]]bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'di ltar 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di bdag ma yin/_bdag gi ma yin par lta ba ste/_de de ltar blta ba na 'jig rten ci yang len pa med do/_/len pa med na yongs 
[\[45b.4\]]su gdung ba med do/_/yongs su gdung ba med na bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das te bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di dag las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_lnga sde'i dge 
[\[45b.5\]]slong lhag ma rnams kyis len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de'i tshe dgra bcom pa lnga dang drug pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI'i 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na rigs kyi gtso bo zhes bya 
[\[45b.6\]]ba'i bu grags pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_de nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pas lus snyom/_lus dub/_lus rgud pas myur du gnyid kyis log par gyur to/_/bud med de rnams kyang lus snyom/_
[\[45b.7\]]lus dub/_lus rgud pas myur du gnyid kyis log par gyur to/_/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa mtshan mo gnyid sad pa na bud med de dag thams cad rdol zhing sgren mor byung la skra zhig lag pa brkyang ste byung rgyal du bla ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de rang gi chung ma la dur khrod kyi 'du 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]shes skyes par gyur to/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa mal chen po las babs te/_rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung gcig gon nas nyal khang gi sgo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas grogs po bdag ni gtses so/_/grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes skad 
[\[46a.2\]]ngan phyung ba dang /_de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khyim gyi sgo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas grogs po bdag ni gtses so/_/grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang /_de'i sgo mi ma yin 
[\[46a.3\]]pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa grong khyer gyi sgo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas grogs po bdag ni gtses so/_/grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang /_de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag 
[\[46a.4\]]par byas so/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'bab chu gnod pa can gang na ba der song ba dang /_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'ong ba la yang dang yang du gzhes shing 'chag pas 
[\[46a.5\]]'chag go/_/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pas bcom ldan 'das 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na 'chag pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dge sbyong bdag ni gtses so/_/dge sbyong bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs 
[\[46a.6\]]kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu tshur shog gnas 'di ni khyod la 'tshe ba med pa yin/_'di ni nyams pa med pa yin no/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung gcig po 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram du phud nas 
[\[46a.7\]]'bab chu gnod pa can rgal te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khrid de nyid kyi gtsug lag khang gang na ba der 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]gshegs nas byon pa dang gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab 
[\[46b.2\]]tu dga' bar mdzad de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /_
[\[46b.3\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu dben pa rjes su bsngags pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do/_/gang gi tshe de bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang /_dge ba'i sems dang /_mgu 
[\[46b.4\]]ba'i sems dang /_sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /_skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[46b.5\]]bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam de rgya cher bshad do/_/dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags 
[\[46b.6\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam rtogs so/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_
[\[46b.7\]]the tshom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan 
[\[47a.2\]]chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgyad bcu bdun pa/_bran mo zhig de nyid kyi mtshan mo gnyid log pa las sad na gzhon nu grags pa mal chen po na mi snang bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 
[\[47a.3\]]khyim bdag gi gtso bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig_/gzhon nu grags pa ni rang gi mal chen po na mi gda' lags so/_/de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhon nu nor gyi phyir 
[\[47a.4\]]chom rkun nam g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol du khrid par ma gyur grang snyam du sems shing phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa dag bkye nas rang nyid mi lag na sgron ma thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'bab chu gnod pa can gang na ba de logs su song ba dang /_khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos 'bab chu 
[\[47a.5\]]gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung gcig phud pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhon nu ni nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol du ma khrid kyi/_'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung 
[\[47a.6\]]gcig phud pa las na gzhon nu 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs 'di nyid nas rgal bar ma gyur grang /_'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung gcig bor ro snyam du bsams nas/_'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs de nyid nas rgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba 
[\[47a.7\]]der song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo rgyang ring po nas gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ci nas kyang ngas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bus mngon par 'du bya bas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan 'di 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu mdzad do/_/de nas 
[\[47b.2\]]khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das cig gzhon nu grags pa gzigs sam khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang /_stan 'di kho na la gzhon nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong 
[\[47b.3\]]bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/_/de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/_gdon mi za bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu grags pa gzigs par gyur to/_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang /_
[\[47b.4\]]stan 'di kho na la gzhon nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do zhes bka' stsal to snyam du rig nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_dga' ba rgya chen po dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo 
[\[47b.5\]]bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad 
[\[47b.6\]]de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_
[\[47b.7\]]rnam par byang ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rgya cher bshad do/_/gang gi tshe de bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang /_dge ba'i sems dang /_mgu ba'i sems dang /_sgrib pa dang bral ba'i 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]sems dang /_skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /_kun 
[\[48a.2\]]'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam rgya cher bshad do/_/dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug 
[\[48a.3\]]bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam rtogs te/_chos kyi rnam grangs de bshad pa na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa grags pa yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du len pa 
[\[48a.4\]]med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de slar bsdus nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du ni chos spyad de/_/dul zhing yang dag sdom pa tshangs 
[\[48a.5\]]spyod la/_/'byung po kun la chad pa spangs pa ni/_/de ni bram ze dge sbyong dge slong yin/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug dang bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/_/khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 
[\[48a.6\]]gzhon nu grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu tshur shog_/khyod kyi ma lus ngal zhing lus dub pas smre sngags 'don gyis khyim du 'dong /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag ji snyam du sems/_
[\[48a.7\]]gang gis mi slob pa'i shes pa dang /_mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs pa de cig khyim pa khyim na gnas pa'am/_sogs 'jog gi longs spyod kyis 'dod pa la 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]spyod par 'gyur ram/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/khyim bdag ji ltar khyod kyis slob pa'i shes pa dang /_slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs pa de bzhin du gzhon nu 
[\[48b.2\]]grags pas mi slob pa'i shes pa dang /_mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs so/_/btsun pa gzhon nu grags pas gang gis na mi slob pa'i shes pa dang /_mi slob pa'i 
[\[48b.3\]]lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das slad bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong grags pa dang thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste rigs kyi 
[\[48b.4\]]gtso bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs na legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[48b.5\]]byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/_lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa grags pa dang khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i khyim 
[\[48b.6\]]gang na ba der gshegs so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du bsu ba'i phyir bar sgo na sdod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom 
[\[48b.7\]]ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan 
[\[49a.2\]]pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i gtam dang 
[\[49a.3\]]tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos 
[\[49a.4\]]rnams rgya cher bshad do/_/gang gi tshe de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang /_dge ba'i sems dang /_mgu ba'i sems dang /_sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /_skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus pa gzigs pa de'i 
[\[49a.5\]]tshe/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam de rgya cher bshad do/_/dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os 
[\[49a.6\]]pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs 
[\[49a.7\]]so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis kyis chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so/_/bdag cag ni mngon par 
[\[49b.2\]]'phags lags te/_bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/btsun 
[\[49b.3\]]pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas 
[\[49b.4\]]gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das gdan la bde bar bzhugs pa dang /_gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par 
[\[49b.5\]]byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin cing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /_chung ma gnyis la 
[\[49b.6\]]chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang 
[\[49b.7\]]dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]pa grags pas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas mchis 'brang gi 'khor na mchis na rang gi mchis 'brang la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/_
[\[50a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag grags pa 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags te/_'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag 
[\[50a.3\]]gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing 
[\[50a.4\]]bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na 
[\[50a.5\]]sI'i grong khyer dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can sems can thams cad la phan par sems pa zhig gnas pa de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na mi ro zhig mthong nas/_de de la zhen pa'i sems kyis bsod snyoms la zhugs te/_bsod snyoms spyad nas 
[\[50a.6\]]slar log pa dang /_ji tsam na mi ro de rnam par sdos shing rnam par bam par 'gyur ba bltas pa dang /_de nyid kyi mdun du zhigs nas des de nyid du 'dod chags dang bral ba bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni gzhon nu grags pa 'di nyid 
[\[50a.7\]]yin te/_'dis de na 'dod chags dang bral ba bskyed de/_des na da ltar chung ma'i nang na 'dug pa na rkyen rnyed pa yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba dang 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[50b.2\]]dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos bu gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs te[,]bzang ste[}]/_rigs kyi 
[\[50b.3\]]gtso bo'i bu dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing /_
[\[50b.4\]]chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa re zhig shin tu gzhon pa shin tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gis/_ma la bdag cag 
[\[50b.5\]]gis kyang skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag 
[\[50b.6\]{]bzangs te[,]bzang ste[}]/_rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams bA rA Na sI nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang /_
[\[50b.7\]]gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs te[,]bzang ste[}]/_rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/_bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 
[\[51a.2\]]thob ste/_de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid gtong bar gnas so/_/gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid gtong bar gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs te 
[\[51a.3\]]gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te/_bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya 
[\[51a.4\]]ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa bcu dang bcu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/_/bA rA Na sI'i grong mi gtso 
[\[51a.5\]]bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcus rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa ste/_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs te[,]bzang ste[}]/_rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur 
[\[51a.6\]]smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang /_
[\[51a.7\]]gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa ste/_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs te[,]bzang ste[}]/_rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams ni re zhig shin tu gzhon pa shin tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gis/_ma la bdag cag kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas grong gi mi gtso bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag bA rA Na 
[\[51b.2\]]sI nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas grong mi gtso bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[51b.3\]]btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/_bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab 
[\[51b.4\]]tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/_de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid gtong bar gnas so/_/gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid gtong bar gnas pa na 
[\[51b.5\]]gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye ba zad do/_/
[\[51b.6\]]tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug bcu dang drug bcu rtsa gcig pa ni 
[\[51b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI'i drang srong smra ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/_/dge slong dag 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/_dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la yang bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i ched du rgyu zhing deng la khyed gnyis 
[\[52a.2\]]shing ni gcig tu ma 'gro shig_/nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di bA rA Na sI'i drang srong smra ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na 'dug nas de nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du chos ston to/_/dge 
[\[52a.3\]]slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/_/dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/_dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar du ste/_nga yang lteng 
[\[52a.4\]]rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na bar rgyu zhing 'gro'o zhes zer gyis/_ma la bdag gis de la 'di lta ste/_dkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u'i kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin 
[\[52a.5\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/_ma grol grol bar 'du shes na/_/ji ltar bdag nyid grol bar sems/_/bdag gis dge sbyong ma bkrol bas/_/'ching ba chen pos bcings pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam 
[\[52a.6\]]du dgongs te/_e ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te/_'di lta ste/_dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi/_/'ching ba gang yin kun las grol/_/bar chad byed pa khyod bcom par/_/
[\[52a.7\]]sdig can de ltar shes par gyis/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sems kyis bdag gi sems shes so snyam du rig nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba yid la gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]gnyis su yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/_/dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/_dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa 
[\[52b.2\]]dang zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der gshegs so/_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[52b.3\]]bA rA Na sIr ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /_grong khyer sde can du byon to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ras bal can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing zhig gi drung 
[\[52b.4\]]du brten te nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi phyi rol du nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na/_de rnams las bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te 
[\[52b.5\]]bros so/_/de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs bud med de tshol zhing ras bal can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der dong ba dang /_drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/_dad par 'os pa/_bzang po zhi ba/_thugs zhi ba/_thugs mchog tu dul ba/_zhi ba dang 
[\[52b.6\]]dul ba dang ldan pa/_gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur gyur pa/_dpal gyis 'bar zhing shing gi drung na brten te bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das cig bud med cig 
[\[52b.7\]]gzigs sam/_gzhon nu dag bud med de khyed cag gi cir 'ong /_btsun pa 'di ni bdag cag gi drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi slad rol du bud med kyis bgyis pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid/_dga' mgur spyod par bgyid de/_de rnams dang bdag 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]cag rtse bar bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid/_dga' mgur spyod par bgyid pa na bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros nas bdag cag tshol lags so/_/gzhon nu dag ji snyam du sems/_bud med tshol ba gang yin pa dang /_bdag nyid tshol ba gang yin pa gang bdam/_
[\[53a.2\]]btsun pa bdag cag la bud med kyis ci bgyi/_bdag cag ni bdag nyid tshol ba gang lags pa de 'dam lags so/_/gzhon nu dag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang khyed la chos bshad do/_/de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos 
[\[53a.3\]]phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs la chos dang ldan 'das pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' 
[\[53a.4\]]bar mdzad de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /_kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[53a.5\]]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do/_/gang gi tshe de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang /_dge ba'i sems dang /_mgu ba'i sems 
[\[53a.6\]]dang /_sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /_skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal 
[\[53a.7\]]dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam de rgya cher bshad do/_/dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs so/_/de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las 
[\[53b.2\]]rgal ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar 
[\[53b.3\]]ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng 
[\[53b.4\]]slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[53b.5\]]byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhi na bram ze lha zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi thugs rag por gyur pa zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig na gnyen zad/_nor zad/_'byor pa zad par gyur to/_/
[\[53b.6\]]gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum bcu drug bcom nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa de'i tshe bram ze lha chung ma dang lhan cig grong khyer sde can du 'ongs so/_/bram ze lhas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so zhes thos nas/_
[\[53b.7\]]des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su 'khrungs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de ni grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la gshegs na bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de la bsod snyoms dbul du gang gi phyir bdag 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]gi khyim na nyi ma gcig gi kha zas kyang med kyis/_ngas khyod gtar bcug ste kAr ShA pa Na lnga zhig skyin por blang ngo /_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig_/bram ze lhas chung ma bram ze zhig la gtar bcug nas kAr ShA pa Na lnga bcom ldan 'das bshos 
[\[54a.2\]]gsol ba'i phyir skyin po'i tshul du blangs so/_/de'i chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag ni byang chub sems dpas lan 'ga' yang dri ma can dang gos ngan pa gyon pa ma gzigs so/_/bram ze lhas khyim bdag cig las rgyan rnams brnyas nas chung ma la bskon no/_/de nas bram ze 
[\[54a.3\]]lha chung ma dang lhan cig gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_
[\[54a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze lha la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bram ze lha'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas bram ze lhas bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas chung ma dang lhan cig 
[\[54a.5\]]tu gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/_rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te 
[\[54a.6\]]lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze lha la yon bsngo ba mdzad nas gshegs so/_/de'i chung mas rgyan rnams bkrol te bzhag pa de ma byin par 
[\[54a.7\]]len pas brkus so zhes bram ze lhas thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te/_'brog dgon pa zhig tu song nas nga la rgyan sbyin du ga la yod gzhan byar med kyis bdag 'chi'o snyam pa dang /_ji tsam na mi zhig gis dong brkos nas song ngo /_/bram ze lha ngo mtshar skyes nas 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]de na ci yod re zhig blta'o snyam pa las/_ji tsam na rgyan de mthong nas des rgyan blangs te khyim du 'ongs so/_/lha'i chung ma yang sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas gdungs nas khyim phyag dar byed pa na 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus ji tsam na 
[\[54b.2\]]gser gyi bum pa 'tsher bag can zhig mthong ngo /_/lhas de la dris pa/_bzang mo 'o ni ci yin/_des smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag gis gser gyi bum pa zhig mthong ngo /_/des kyang smras pa/_bzang mo kho bos kyang rgyan de mthong ngo /_/de gnyis kyis lhag par yang bcom ldan 
[\[54b.3\]]'das la dad pa bskyed do/_/de ltar mngon par dad pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas bram ze lha chung ma dang bcas te 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom 
[\[54b.4\]]nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/_lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can du bsod 
[\[54b.5\]]snyoms la zhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas grong khyer sde can der thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam pa las/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ngas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/_de dag 
[\[54b.6\]]gis nga sngon gyi sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na 'dis mar gsar dang 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bas bsnyen bkur byas so snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so/_/
[\[54b.7\]]grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon/_bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]gdan bshams pa 'di nyid la bzhugs zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 
[\[55a.2\]]'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar 
[\[55a.3\]]mdzad de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[55a.4\]]dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rgya cher bshad do/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag dga' ba'i sems dang /_dge ba'i sems dang /_mgu ba'i sems dang /_
[\[55a.5\]]sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /_skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 
[\[55a.6\]]'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam de rgya cher bshad do/_/dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i 
[\[55a.7\]]bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs so/_/de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_the tshom 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]las rgal ba dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[55b.2\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang 
[\[55b.3\]]bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_
[\[55b.4\]]dga' stobs ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang par rig cing /_bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi 
[\[55b.5\]]lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/_rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin te phyag bcabs shing lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs 
[\[55b.6\]]te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag 
[\[55b.7\]]par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can nas gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ngas yul ma ga d+hA 'dir ngang tshul bzang por bkur ba'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang zhig dbang du byas na de dbang du gyur pas 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod snyam mo/_/de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa zhig yod pa de ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis bkur sti bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_rjed par 
[\[56a.2\]]bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bas dgra bcom par bkur cing 'khor lnga brgya dang nai rany+dza na'i klung gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa 'di 
[\[56a.3\]]ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_ma la ngas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dbang du byas te/_'di dbang du gyur na tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 
[\[56a.4\]]'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs so/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po tshur spyon/_
[\[56a.5\]]dge sbyong chen po byon pa legs so/_/dge sbyong chen po yun ring po zhig lags na gang nas 'khor te 'dir byon/_dge sbyong chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 
[\[56a.6\]]'od srung ral pa can dang /_bcom ldan 'das lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 
[\[56a.7\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na/_khyod kyi me khang du bdag zhag gcig 'dug go/_/dge sbyong chen po bdag la ni mi bde ba ma mchis na/_'on kyang de na klu gdug pa zhig gnas te/_des khyod tho btsams par 'gyur du mchi'o/_/'od srung 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]khyod kyis re zhig gnang bar gyis shig dang tho btsams par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge sbyong chen po gal te khyod la tho mi btsam na dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas me khang gi 
[\[56b.2\]]phyi rol du zhabs bsil nas me khang gi nang du zhugs te/_nyid kyis rtswa gding ba bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste/_skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs so/_/klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khros 
[\[56b.3\]]pa'i mthus dud pa phyung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dud pa phyung ngo /_/klu gdug pas khros pa'i mthus 'bar bar byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de na klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthu dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[56b.4\]]'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus me khang thams cad 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pas sreg par byed do/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ba na me khang thams cad 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce 
[\[56b.5\]]gcig tu gyur nas sreg pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma chen po 'di ltar mdzes pa/_klu gdug pas thal bar byas par ma gyur grang /_kyi hud nyon mongs pa dag gi tshig ma nyan to snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs 
[\[56b.6\]]te/_nga lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa chas bcad kyis/_ma langs rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba la sems mnyam par bzhag na/_mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la des kyang de'i lus la gnod par mi byed cing de dul bar mkhyen nas lhung 
[\[56b.7\]]bzed du bcug ste lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed pa 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]de lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad de/_de dul bar mkhyen nas lhung bzed du bcug ste lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der bsnams nas gshegs so/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom 
[\[57a.2\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po gson pa lta zhig_/'od srung gson no/_/dge sbyong chen po khyod kyis lhung bzed na bsnams te byon pa ci/_'od srung klu gdug pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mir gyur pa rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnas su mi ster 
[\[57a.3\]]ba de ngas btul nas lhung bzed du bcug nas khyer te 'ongs so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[57a.4\]]lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod pa re re'i me thab gsum gsum ste me thab stong lnga brgya yod do/_/de nas bram 
[\[57a.5\]]ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na me de spar bar ma nus so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'dir 
[\[57a.6\]]bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na zhugs de spar bar rngo ma thog lags so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas pa de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom 
[\[57a.7\]]ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na me de spar bar rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do/_/'od srung me de sbar bar 'dod dam/_dge sbyong chen po sbar du gsol/_de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur 
[\[57b.2\]]to/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas 
[\[57b.3\]]kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyad nas me bsad par 'dod na me bsad par ma nus so/_/bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste lhags nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces 
[\[57b.4\]]smras so/_/mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i rngo ma thog lags so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na 
[\[57b.5\]]gnas pa de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[57b.6\]]rnams zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum par rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do/_/'od srung me de bsad dam/_dge sbyong chen po dgum 
[\[57b.7\]]du gsol/_de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid shi'o/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang nyid me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na spar 
[\[58a.2\]]bar ma nus so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[58a.3\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_'dir bdag nyid zhugs la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na spar bar rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur 
[\[58a.4\]]grang snyam bgyid do/_/'od srung me de spar bar 'dod dam/_dge sbyong chen po spar du gsol/_de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du 
[\[58a.5\]]sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de nas dus 
[\[58a.6\]]gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang nyid me la yongs su spyad nas me bsad par 'dod na bsad par ma nus so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo/_/de 
[\[58a.7\]]nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_'dir bdag nyid zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i rngo ma 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do/_/drang srong me de bsad dam/_dge sbyong chen po dgum du gsol/_de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha 
[\[58b.2\]]rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid shi'o/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 
[\[58b.3\]]'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa de la lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor 
[\[58b.4\]]dang bcas pa dang /_gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis bsgrims kyang bsad ma nus so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od 
[\[58b.5\]]srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_dge sbyong chen po 'dir bdag gi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas 
[\[58b.6\]]sreg par bgyid pa de la bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bsgrims na zhugs dgum pa'i rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do/_/'od 
[\[58b.7\]]srung me khang de zhi bar bya 'am dge sbyong chen po zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgyad bcu brgyad pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas 
[\[59a.2\]]nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/_de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_
[\[59a.3\]]kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la blta ba na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 
[\[59a.4\]]'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/_'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa 
[\[59a.5\]]bzhi yod do snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_'dir mdang sum bdag rgyu skar rnams 
[\[59a.6\]]la blta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur te sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bdag nyid 'di snyam du sems te/_/dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/_'di ltar de'i spyan 
[\[59a.7\]]snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa bzhi mchis so snyam mo/_/'od srung cing me la yongs su spyod dam/_nga me la yongs su mi spyod de/_de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]pas mtshan mo la bab pa nang gang na ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/_nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin 
[\[59b.2\]]no/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas 
[\[59b.3\]]kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du 
[\[59b.4\]]rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi po de dag bas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la blta ba na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar me'i phung po chen 
[\[59b.5\]]po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/_'di ltar de'i mdun na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 
[\[59b.6\]]'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhig yod do snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du 
[\[59b.7\]]gsol/_'dir bdag mdang sum rgyu skar rnams la blta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/_'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa zhig mchis so snyam mo/_/'od srung cing me la yongs su spyod dam/_nga me la yongs 
[\[60a.2\]]su mi spyod de/_de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa nang gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/_de dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur 
[\[60a.3\]]nas sreg pa bzhi po de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che 
[\[60a.4\]]mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba 
[\[60a.5\]]der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/_dper na me'i phung po bzhi po de dag nyid snga ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas me'i phung po lnga pa de me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags 
[\[60a.6\]]la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la blta ba na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar zhig mthong ngo /_/
[\[60a.7\]]mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_/dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/_'di ltar de'i mdun du me'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa'i bar zhig yod do snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_'dir bdag mdang sum rgyu skar rnams la blta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi phung po chen po 'bar ba zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar zhig 
[\[60b.2\]]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/_'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa zhig mchis so snyam mo/_/'od 
[\[60b.3\]]srung cing me la yongs su spyod dam/_nga me la yongs su mi spyod de/_de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/_nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/_de dper na me'i phung po 
[\[60b.4\]]'bar rab tu 'bar ba bzhi po de dag nas snga ma bzhin du me'i phung po chen po lnga pa de 'bar ba nas me lce gcig tu gyur pa nas sreg par byed pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no/_/
[\[60b.5\]]de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas 
[\[60b.6\]]kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab bo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 
[\[60b.7\]]'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi/_bdag la ni de ltar ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod kyis/_kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]can gyi sems mkhyen nas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung nas/_bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung 
[\[61a.2\]]ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin de zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du sems te/_'dir bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/_kye ma da ni dge sbyong chen 
[\[61a.3\]]po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung /_bdag gis de yang de la longs spyod du gzhug go snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs so/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis 
[\[61a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po byon tam/_'od srung 'ongs so/_/dge sbyong chen po khyod ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du bzhud lags/_'od srung khyod kyi 'dug gnas na mchod 
[\[61a.5\]]sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab nas 'di snyam du/_gal te ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi/_bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis/_kye ma dge sbyong 
[\[61a.6\]]chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/_nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo /_/'o na ci'i slad du 'dir byon lags/_'od srung khyod kyis mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam 
[\[61a.7\]]du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/_kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung /_bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go snyam du 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]sems pa ma yin nam/_dge sbyong chen po de lta lags so/_/nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas nga 'ongs pa yin no/_/dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar longs spyad du gsol/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 
[\[61b.2\]]'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[61b.3\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po de'i slad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs shig dang bdag gis khyod la chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 
[\[61b.4\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas g.yos byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/_dge sbyong chen po da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_
[\[61b.5\]]'od srung de'i phyir song shig nga yang 'ong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan 
[\[61b.6\]]pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te/_lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung 
[\[61b.7\]]ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po byon tam/_'od srung 'ongs so/_/dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]na ci mchis/_'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang /_dri dang /_ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis 
[\[62a.2\]]lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis/_gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig_/dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar 'tshal lags so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul 
[\[62a.3\]]che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/'dzam bu'i snye ma ji lta bar skyu ru ra'i snye ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'brus lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams 
[\[62a.4\]]nas/_lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams
