[\[62a.5\]]pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po byon tam/_'od srung 'ongs so/_/dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/_'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag 
[\[62a.6\]]na byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'brus lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis/_gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig_/dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar 'tshal lags so/_/de nas lteng 
[\[62a.7\]]rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su gshegs nas lha'i bdud 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]rtsis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang nyid kyis g.yos byas nas 
[\[62b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/_dge sbyong chen po da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs 
[\[62b.3\]]lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i 
[\[62b.4\]]bza' ba dang bca' bas lhung bzed bkang nas phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung 
[\[62b.5\]]ngo /_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang /_de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste/_chu bab 
[\[62b.6\]]pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po byung ste chu bab pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_chu 'di sngon ni med na 'di da ltar gang nas bab snyam mo/_/de nas lteng 
[\[62b.7\]]rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po'i chab cig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]snyam du sems te/_chu 'di sngon ni ma mchis na da ltar chu 'di gang nas bab snyam bgyid do/_/'od srung ral pa can 'dir khyod las ngas bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs 'dir zhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa na nga la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo /_/de nas lha rnams 
[\[63a.2\]]kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis nga la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas phyogs 'dir lag pa sa la bsnun pa las/_de nas bkod ma chen po byung ba de la ngas chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do/_/'od srung rdzing 'di ni lag pas brkos pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam 
[\[63a.3\]]du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[63a.4\]]'das phyi 'bred nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/_rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/_rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas rdzing lag 
[\[63a.5\]]pas brkos pa nas 'byung bar bzhed pa na shing ardzu na gang na ba de logs su phyag brkyang ngo /_/de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dud par gyur te/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bzung nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo /_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa 
[\[63a.6\]]na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dud pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_ardzu na'i yal ga 'di sngon ni 'dud par ma gyur na/_ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di da su zhig gis btud snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral 
[\[63a.7\]]pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dud pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni 'dud par ma gyur na/_da 'di su zhig gis btud snyam bgyid do/_/'od srung nga 'dir phyi 'bred nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/_
[\[63b.2\]]rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig na na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te/_lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas 'byung bar 'dod nas shing ardzu na 'di gang na ba de logs su lag pa brkyang ba dang /_de nas 
[\[63b.3\]]ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di 'dud par gyur te/_de la nga 'jus nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo /_/'od srung shing 'di ni ardzu na lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che 
[\[63b.4\]]zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 
[\[63b.5\]]brnyes nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag gang du bkru snyam mo/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs 
[\[63b.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 'di la bkru bar gsol/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/_/
[\[63b.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang /_de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas/_brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig khyer nas 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 
[\[64a.2\]]bkram mo/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni med na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis khyer te 'ongs snyam mo/_/de nas lteng rgyas 
[\[64a.3\]]'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_'dir bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag cig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bdag 
[\[64a.4\]]'di snyam du sems te/_rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni ma mchis na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis 'tshal te mchis snyam bgyid do/_/'od srung 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag cig brnyes so/_/de nas nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/_phyag dar khrod pa'i sha 
[\[64a.5\]]na'i ras gang du bkru snyam pa dang /_de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te/_nga gang na ba der 'ongs te/_phyin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i 
[\[64a.6\]]sha na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/_ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/_/nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang /_de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas 
[\[64a.7\]]brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba gzhan zhig blangs te/_nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/_ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkram mo/_/'od 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]srung rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[64b.2\]]lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe nai rany+dza na'i chu cher brug nas bab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i steng nas sa rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag pas 'chag par mdzad 
[\[64b.3\]]do/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po brug pas khyer bar ma gyur grang /_ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal lo snyam du bsams nas shing gcig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te bcom ldan 'das btsal 
[\[64b.4\]]ba na/_lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa na 'chag pas 'chag pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po gson 
[\[64b.5\]]nam/_'od srung gson no/_/dge sbyong chen po zhugs shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam/_'od srung 'jug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la ngas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i gru ji lta bar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul 
[\[64b.6\]]mngon par 'du bya ba 'du bya'o snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i gru ji lta bar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar dge 
[\[64b.7\]]sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/_ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]srung khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma yin/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/_dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de yang mi shes so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma'i 
[\[65a.2\]]thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/_dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar 
[\[65a.3\]]bdag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/'od srung khyod kyis 'khor la bltas sam/_dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so/_/'od srung de'i phyir re zhig 'khor la ltos shig_/'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa shes nyen can rnams kyis ni 'khor la blta 
[\[65a.4\]]ba legs pa yin no/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang yin pa der song ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig_/bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad 
[\[65a.5\]]na shes ldan dag ci byed/_mkhan po bdag cag gis [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po la brten nas lags pas gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/_bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo /_/bram 
[\[65a.6\]]ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis de'i phyir g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_khar ba dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_blugs gzar 'di dag chu klung nai rany+dza na'i nang du 'or cig_/mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_
[\[65a.7\]]khar ba dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_blugs gzar rnams chu klung nai rany+dza na'i nang du bor nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan po 'di ltar bdag cag gis bgyi ba gang lags 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]pa de bgyis lags so/_/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po bdag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/_bdag legs par gsungs pa'i 
[\[65b.2\]]chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/'od srung tshur shog_/tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig_/de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung ba 
[\[65b.3\]]dang /_des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/_/de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi spun chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu dang chu klung nai rany+dza na'i 'jug ngogs kyi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod 
[\[65b.4\]]do/_/chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung spun gyis g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun dang /_khar ba dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_blugs gzar de dag chu klung nai rany+dza nas khyer ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gi tshangs pa 
[\[65b.5\]]mtshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po'am/_chom rkun nam/_me'am/_chus nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang /_ma la bdag cag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams btsal lo snyam mo/_/de nas chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung spun dag lteng 
[\[65b.6\]]rgyas 'od srung ral pa can tshol zhing lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der dong ba dang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos nyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/_/chu klung 'od srung 
[\[65b.7\]]dang /_ga yA 'od srung spun gyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'od srung 'di ni mchog yin 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]la/_de mchog ma yin nam/_'od srung dag 'di ni mchog yin te/_de ni ma yin no/_/de nas chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung spun dag 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog 
[\[66a.2\]]ma yin pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/_ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_rjed par byas/_mchod par byas shing dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang 
[\[66a.3\]]lan gnyis kyi bar du dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar khas blangs kyis/_ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs 
[\[66a.4\]]par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/_bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/khyed kyis 'khor la bltas sam/_dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so/_/'od srung 
[\[66a.5\]]dag de'i phyir re zhig 'khor la ltos shig_/'di lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa shes nyen can dag gis ni 'khor la blta ba legs pa yin no/_/de nas chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung spun rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di 
[\[66a.6\]]skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig_/kho bo cag ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na shes ldan dag ci byed/_mkhan po dag bdag cag [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags kyis/_gal te mkhan 
[\[66a.7\]]po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na bdag cag kyang mkhan po dag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo /_/bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus da yin par shes par gyis shig_/de nas chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung spun 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu dang 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong chen po bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/_dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge 
[\[66b.2\]]slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/_bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/'od srung dag tshur sheg tshangs par spyod pa spyod cig_/de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang /_des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_des dge slong gi dngos 
[\[66b.3\]]por gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can stong pa de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas lteng rgyas su ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas ga yA gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ga yAr byon nas ga yA na ga yA mgo'i mchod 
[\[66b.4\]]rten la sngon gyi ral pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de la cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms par mdzad de/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su 
[\[66b.5\]]bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na/_nyid kyi gdan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur cing shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa 
[\[66b.6\]]bzhi mdzad de/_'di lta ste 'chag pa dang /_bzhengs pa dang /_bzhugs pa dang /_mnal ba mdzad do/_/me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par mdzad de/_me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[66b.7\]]dag 'byin par mdzad de/_'di lta ste sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel gyi kha dog go/_/cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad de/_sku'i smad nas 'bar bar mdzad la/_sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do/_/
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]sku'i stod nas 'bar bar mdzad la sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/_/phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 
[\[67a.2\]]rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/_de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/_
[\[67a.3\]]dge slong dag khyed kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o/_/khyed kyi yid ni 'di lta bu'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o/_/'di ni rtogs shig_/'di ni ma rtogs shig_/'di ni yid la byos shig_/'di ni yid la ma byed cig_/'di ni spongs shig_/'di ni ma spongs shig_/'di ni 
[\[67a.4\]]lus kyis mngon sum du byas la rdzogs par byas te gnos shig_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/_dge slong dag 'di thams cad ni kun du 'bar ba yin no/_/dge slong dag thams cad 
[\[67a.5\]]kun du 'bar ba de ci yin zhe na/_dge slong dag mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun du 'bar ba yin zhing mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug 
[\[67a.6\]]bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun du 'bar ba yin no/_/dge slong dag rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni kun du 'bar ba yin zhing yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[67a.7\]]gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun du 'bar ba yin no/_/gang gis kun du 'bar zhe na/_'dod chags kyi me dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi mes kun du 'bar/_skye ba 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa ste/_sdug bsngal gyis kun du 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o/_/de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/_/chos 
[\[67b.2\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ga yA na ga yA mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge sbyong thams cad kyang 
[\[67b.3\]]dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/rgyal po 
[\[67b.4\]]gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos/_chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/_drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis/_gal te 
[\[67b.5\]]khyim par gyur te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang 
[\[67b.6\]]po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa blon po rin po che yin no/_/de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dpa' brtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_
[\[67b.7\]]pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/_de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/_chos dang mthun zhing snyoms par legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes thos 
[\[68a.2\]]so/_/thos nas kyang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag cag 'dir lha'i yul na rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon 
[\[68a.3\]]nu gangs ri'i ngos/_chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/_drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis/_gal te khyim par gyur te khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba 
[\[68a.4\]]zhes bya ba nas/_bdun pa blon po rin po cher 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthun zhing snyoms par legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs 
[\[68a.5\]]te gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas/_'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan pa zhig thos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/lha de khum shig_/lha bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o/_/grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon 
[\[68a.6\]]nu gangs ri'i ngos/_chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/_drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_gal te khyim par gyur te khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthun zhing snyoms 
[\[68a.7\]]par legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba de lha khum shig_/lha bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o zhes khyed cag de skad ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma 
[\[68b.2\]]bzhin du ste/_gal te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i 
[\[68b.3\]]sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par gyur na de'i nyan thos su khas blang bar bya'o/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug nas smon pa'i gzhi lnga smon par byed de/_kye ma bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa 
[\[68b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba 
[\[68b.5\]]dang /_de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang /_nye bar song ba na des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang /_bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang /_bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/_/
[\[68b.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po de steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug nas smon pa'i gzhi lnga smon par byed de/_kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[68b.7\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang /_de la yang blta ba'i 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang /_nye bar song ba na des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang /_bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang /_bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/_/ma ga 
[\[69a.2\]]d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag cig ljongs rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos/_chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/_drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin pa de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan 
[\[69a.3\]]zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[69a.4\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_de ga yA na ga yA mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun 
[\[69a.5\]]du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/_ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs 
[\[69a.6\]]can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag cag 'di na lha'i yul na rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa de zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur 
[\[69a.7\]]smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_de ga yA na ga yA mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_lha de la bkur sti mdzod cig dang /_de lta na lha gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur ro/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po 
[\[69b.2\]]bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos mi zhig la bsgo ba/_kwa'e nang rje tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas kho bo'i tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/_gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_'tsho 'am/_bskyod pa yang 
[\[69b.3\]]ngam/_stobs dang /_bde ba dang /_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_reg par spyod dam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig_/bdag bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims 
[\[69b.4\]]cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes gsol cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[69b.5\]]'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das la mi des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs 
[\[69b.6\]]can snying po mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_snyun gsol lags so/_/kye mi khyod dang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bde bar gyur cig_/btsun pa ma 
[\[69b.7\]]ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchid nas 'di skad ces/_bdag bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes mchi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_
[\[70a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag 
[\[70a.3\]]pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang thabs cig tu ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yul ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal na yod pa gang na ba der gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par 
[\[70a.4\]]rab gnas su byon nas ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal na yod pa na bzhugs so/_/ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya 
[\[70a.5\]]ba nas/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu shing gshegs pa na/_ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal na yod pa gang na ba der gshegs te/_ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang 
[\[70a.6\]]brang gi tshal na yod pa na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang shing rta bzang po'i nang du zhugs te 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na/_de'i shing rta'i 'khor 
[\[70a.7\]]lo sa'i nang du bying bar gyur to/_/des bsams pa bdag gis las skyon can [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]byas par ma gyur grang snyam mo/_/lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi/_khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyod pa gang yin pa de dag 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]btson ra na 'dug gis de dag thon cig_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na gdon no zhes rgyal pos btson rnams 'don du bcug go/_/yang rgyal po phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na de'i dbu rgyan sgo la thug go/_/des yang bsams pa/_bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar las skyon 
[\[70b.2\]]can zhig byas te/_des na bdag la ltas ngan pa gzhan sgo la dbu rgyan thug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo/_/lha de rnams kyis yang smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi/_khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyod pa gang yin pa de dag kha cig ni 'dus/_
[\[70b.3\]]kha cig ni yul phyogs gzhan ga ge mo zhes bya ba dag na las kyi mtha' byed cing 'dug pa de dag sbron cig_/rgyal pos yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bkug go/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shing rta khri nyis stong dang /_zhabs 'bring ba rta pa'i tshogs khri 
[\[70b.4\]]brgya stong dang /_ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo /_/de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste/_
[\[70b.5\]]bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/_/ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos thag ci tsam nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i bar de nas rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po ze'u kha dang /_gdugs dang /_ral gri dang nor bu'i rnga yab dang /_lham 
[\[70b.6\]]khra bo rnams phud do//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgyad bcu dgu pa/_de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 
[\[70b.7\]]'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de rang gi ming nas phyung ste/_lan gsum du gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so/_/rgyal po 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]lags so/_/rgyal po chen po de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no/_/rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no/_/rgyal po yin no/_/rgyal 
[\[71a.2\]]po chen po khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug shig_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag kha cig gis ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[71a.3\]]zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[71a.4\]]gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te 'khod do/_/kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong nas cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 
[\[71a.5\]]'di snyam du sems te/_ci dge sbyong chen po lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la spyod dam/_'on te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa la spyod snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[71a.6\]]rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dri ba rmas pa/_lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'dir ci mthong na/_/me spangs nas ni brtul zhugs 'di dag spyod/_/khyod kyis ci ltar me yi mchod spangs pa/_/don de 'od srung nga la smra 
[\[71a.7\]]bar gyis/_/lteng rgyas 'od srung gis gsol pa/_'di ni kha cig zas skom de bzhin ro/_/'dod pa dag dang bud med kho na smra/_/de dag thabs kyi dri ma rab mthong ste/_/des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' sreg blugs ma ni/_/khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang /_
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]de bzhin ro la yid ni mi dga' na/_/lha mi 'jig rten la ci khyod kyi yid/_/dga' ba yin nam 'od srung dri yis smros/_/phung po ma mchis zhi ba ci ma mchis/_/'dod sred ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis/_/gzhan gyis mi bkri'i go 'phang mchog mthong ste/_/des 
[\[71b.2\]]bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' sreg blugs min/_/go 'phang mi nyams mchog ni ma mthong bas/_/mchod sbyin brtul zhugs dang ni zhugs dag gis/_/grol snyam bdag gi yid ni rmongs gyur te/_/dmus long gyur nas skye shi rjes bzhin 'thom/_/skyob pa gtso bo mchog gis legs 
[\[71b.3\]]bshad pa/_/go 'phang 'dus ma byas te gzod mthong na/_/thub pa gau tam rnam par 'dren khyod ni/_/skye bo phal chen don brtson bden la zhugs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyi rtogs pa legs rtogs te/_/khyod kyis nyes par bsams ma yin/_/rab 
[\[71b.4\]]tu phye ba'i chos rnams la/_/gtso bo gang yin de blangs so/_/'od srung 'khor skyo ba skyed cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur cing /_shar phyogs 
[\[71b.5\]]kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/_'di lta ste/_'chag pa dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba byed do/_/me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed de/_me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na tshe 
[\[71b.6\]]dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gi lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin par byed de/_'di lta ste sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel gyi kha dog dag go/_/cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed de/_lus kyi smad nas 'bar 
[\[71b.7\]]bar byed la lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do/_/lus kyi stod nas 'bar bar byed la lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]phyogs su yang de bzhin no/_/phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba dag bsdus te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas ba'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de 
[\[72a.2\]]logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so/_/bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so/_/ston pa lags so/_/
[\[72a.3\]]bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/_/nyan thos lags so/_/'od srung de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no/_/khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no/_/'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no/_/khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no/_/'od srung khyod 
[\[72a.4\]]rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas ma ga ng+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong chen po ni lteng rgyas 'od srung 
[\[72a.5\]]ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la mi spyod kyi/_lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nyid dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa la spyod do snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gzugs la skye ba yang 
[\[72a.6\]]yod/_'jig pa yang yod de/_de'i skye ba dang 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la skye ba yang yod/_'jig pa yang yod de/_de'i skye ba dang 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[72a.7\]]rigs kyi bus gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas gzugs de yongs su shes so/_/rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas rnam par shes pa de yongs su shes so/_/rgyal 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs yongs su shes na gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len/_mi 'dzin lhag par mi gnas/_mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su 
[\[72b.2\]]shes na bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len/_mi 'dzin/_lhag par mi gnas/_mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs la bdag gam/_bdag gir khas mi len/_mi 'dzin/_lhag par mi gnas/_mngon par zhen par mi byed na tshad med cing 
[\[72b.3\]]grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o/_/rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la bdag gam/_bdag gir khas mi len/_mi 'dzin/_lhag par mi gnas/_mngon par zhen par mi byed na tshad 
[\[72b.4\]]med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te gzugs bdag ma yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin na/_'o na bdag gam/_
[\[72b.5\]]sems can nam/_srog gam/_skye ba po'am/_gso ba po'am/_gang zag gam/_shed las skyes sam/_shed bu'am/_byed pa po'am/_byed du 'jug pa po'am/_shes pa po'am/_kun nas shes pa po'am/_slong ba po'am/_kun nas slong ba po'am/_smra ba po'am/_
[\[72b.6\]]tshor ba po'am/_kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa nam yang ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing da lta yang yod pa ma yin na/_gang gis de dang der dge ba dang sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po 'di bor te phung po gzhan dang nying 
[\[72b.7\]]mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yin par 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bdag bdag ces bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]btags pa'i rjes su lhung ba yin te/_'di la bdag ce'am bdag gi med kyi/_dge slong dag skye ba na sdug bsngal 'di skye zhing 'gag pa na yang sdug bsngal 'gag go/_/skye ba na 'du byed rnams skye zhing 'gag pa na 'du byed rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_rgyu dang rkyen de 
[\[73a.2\]]la brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud 'jug go/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas 'du byed kyi rgyud nying mtshams sbyor ba thugs su chud nas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba 'dogs par mdzad de/_dge slong dag ngas lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 
[\[73a.3\]]'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba dang kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa dang /_dman pa dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang gzigs so/_/las ji lta ba bzhin nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[73a.4\]]du rab tu mkhyen te/_sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_log par lta ba yin te/_log par lta ba'i las dang chos blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas 
[\[73a.5\]]shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan/_'phags pa rnams la skur ba mi 'debs pa dang /_yang dag par lta 
[\[73a.6\]]ba yin te/_yang dag par lta ba'i las dang chos blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mkhyen to/_/dge slong dag ngas de ltar mkhyen cing de ltar gzigs pas nga 'di skad ces bdag gam/_sems 
[\[73a.7\]]can nam/_srog gam/_skye ba po'am/_gso ba po'am/_gang zag gam/_shed las skyes sam/_shed bu 'am/_byed pa po 'am/_byed du 'jug pa po'am/_shes pa po 'am/_kun nas shes pa po'am/_slong ba po'am/_kun nas slong ba po'am/_smra ba po'am/_
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]tshor ba po'am/_kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa ni nam yang ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing da ltar yang yod pa ma yin pas gang gis de dang der dge ba dang /_sdig pa'i las byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po 'di bor te phung po gzhan dang nying 
[\[73b.2\]]mtshams sbyor ba de chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa 'di yin no zhes mi gsung ngo /_/de la chos kyi brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di yod/_'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/_'di lta ste ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam 
[\[73b.3\]]par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid 
[\[73b.4\]]pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste 'di med pas 'di med 
[\[73b.5\]]la/_'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/
[\[73b.6\]]skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga 
[\[73b.7\]]shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal lo/_/mya ngan las 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]'das pa ni zhi ba'o/_/rgyu kun 'byung bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing rgyu 'gags pas sdug bsngal 'gag ste/_rgyun bcad pas mi 'byung zhing nying mtshams sbyor ba med par 'gags pa 'di nyid ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/_/dge slong dag de la yongs su 
[\[74a.2\]]mya ngan las 'das pa gang zhe na/_gzhan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gags pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba/_de ni bsil bar gyur pa de ni nub pa ste/_dge slong dag zhi ba'i gnas 'di yin te/_'di lta ste phung po thams cad spangs pa/_sred pa zad pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba/_
[\[74a.3\]]'gags pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_gzugs rtag gam mi rtag_/btsun pa 'di mi rtag lags so/_/
[\[74a.4\]]mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/_sdug bsngal ma yin/_btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so/_/mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la ci ga 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no/_/bdag ni 'di yin no/_
[\[74a.5\]]'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag gam mi rtag_/btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag lags so/_/mi rtag pa gang 
[\[74a.6\]]yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/_sdug bsngal ma yin/_btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so/_/mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la ci ga 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no/_/bdag ni 'di yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi 
[\[74a.7\]]bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung /_'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang gi'am/_phyi'i 'am/_rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]gya nom pa'am/_gang dag thag ring ba'am/_gang dag thag nye ba yang rung ste/_de thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no/_/bdag ni 'di ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[74b.2\]]po de lta bas na khyod kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung /_'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang gi 'am/_phyi'i 'am/_rags pa 'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_gya nom pa'am/_gang dag thag ring 
[\[74b.3\]]ba'am/_gang dag thag nye ba yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no/_/bdag ni 'di ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang 
[\[74b.4\]]ldan pa de ltar mthong ba ni gzugs la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yid byung na 'dod chags dang 'bral lo/_/'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[74b.5\]]rnam par grol na bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 
[\[74b.6\]]dang /_lha brgyad khri dang /_ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma la chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_
[\[74b.7\]]chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 
[\[75a.2\]]'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas 
[\[75a.3\]]pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid lags na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal 
[\[75a.4\]]po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[75a.5\]]snga nas song ngo /_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom 
[\[75a.6\]]ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung 
[\[75a.7\]]bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pa ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa 
[\[75b.2\]]brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa na 'jig rten du ston pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha 
[\[75b.3\]]lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtsibs kyi lte ba zhes bya ba byung nas des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad de/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/skye bo'i tshogs 
[\[75b.4\]]chen pos de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas sa phyogs dben zhing yangs pa zhig tu mchod rten chen po brtsigs so/_/de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po kr-i kI zhes bya ba khrom gyi ru ba bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang steng gi nam mkha' las yul rgyu ba na mchod rten de dang nye ba zhig tu phyin 
[\[75b.5\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i 'khor lo rin po che thogs par byas so/_/rgyal po kr-i kIs bsams pa/_'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che 'di thogs pa las na bdag gi bsod nams zad par ma gyur grang snyam mo/_/de la lha rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[75b.6\]]rgyal po khyod kyi bsod nams ma zad mod kyi phyogs 'di na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte ba'i mchod rten bzhugs pas/_des na 'khor lo rin po che 'di de'i steng du mi 'gro zhing thogs par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kI khrom gyi ru pa bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang lhan 
[\[75b.7\]]cig babs na ji tsam na mchod rten byi dor ma byas pa de mthong nas 'khor dang bcas pa des byi dor byas te dri dang /_byug pa dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas 'khor dang bcas pas drung du btud de smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yon gnas dam 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gis yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par 'gyur ba dang /_ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed cing mi mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 
[\[76a.2\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po kr-i kI zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di nyid yin te/_'khor dang bcas pa des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte ba'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa de'i 
[\[76a.3\]]las kyi rnam par smin pas 'dis bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag mang por lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba khyad par du 'phags pa nyams su myong bar gyur to/_/'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni nga'i spyan sngar 'khor dang bcas pa bden pa 
[\[76a.4\]]mthong bar byas so/_/ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed cing mi mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pas ni nga nyid dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte bar lhan cig mnyam par mnyam ste/_stobs mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang 
[\[76a.5\]]brtson 'grus mnyam pa dang /_thob pa mnyam pa yin te/_'dis ston pa nga mnyes par byas kyi/_mi mnyes par ma byas pa yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi ni rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni 
[\[76a.6\]]dkar ba yin/_'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /_'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/_las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom 
[\[76a.7\]]skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gis las ci zhig bgyis na/_des na cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul bar gyur lags/_chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung dag ni tshegs chung dus btul 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang 
[\[76b.2\]]po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na 'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[76b.3\]]kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba byung nas/_de bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu brten te drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i 
[\[76b.4\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de'i sku gdung rgyal po kr-i kIs spos kyi shing thams cad spungs te spungs pas bsregs nas me 'o mas bsad de/_sku gdung de dag ni rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du blugs nas sa phyogs dben 
[\[76b.5\]]zhing yangs par sku gdung gi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad gcig la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa zhig rtsig tu bcug go/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos 
[\[76b.6\]]kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na rim gyis khye'u gsum btsas 
[\[76b.7\]]so/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag de nad kyis thebs nas de rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma dang /_'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur nas de 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas de'i bu rnams kyis ras sngon po dang /_ser 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar pos khyogs brgyan nas dur khrod du khyer te bsregs so/_/de nas pha la pha'i bya ba byas nas mya ngan sangs te/_nor so sor bgo bar gros bya bar brtsams nas phu bo shos kyis smras pa/_nor bgo'o/_/nu bo spun gnyis ma dad do/_/
[\[77a.2\]]des gal gyis gcus pa dang de gnyis kyis smras pa/_gal te de lta na re zhig 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags blangs la phyis bgo bar bya'o/_/des smras pa/_ci dag bya/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'di la mchod do/_/de dad pa chung ba 
[\[77a.3\]]zhig pas des bka' 'khor du khas blangs so/_/de nas de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la mchod nas smon lam gdab par brtsams te/_gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[77a.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i bstan pa la 
[\[77a.5\]]bdag cag rab tu byung nas khyad par thob par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de gnyis kyis smon lam btab pa phu bo des thos nas drung du btud de/_smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_bdag ni dad pa chung la dmu rgod yin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub 
[\[77a.6\]]pa des cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul nas rab tu phyung ste/_rab tu byung nas kyang khyad par rtogs par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_phu bo shos dmu rgod dad pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni lteng rgyas 'od srung 'di nyid yin no/_/nu bo gnyis po gang dag yin 
[\[77a.7\]]pa de dag ni chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung 'di dag nyid yin no/_/smon lam gyi dbang des na lteng rgyas 'od srung cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul ba yin no/_/chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung ni tshegs chung dus btul ba yin no/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]po gzhon nur gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa de la kun dga' ra ba me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod de/_de de la lhag par chags par gyur to/_/ji tsam na gzugs can snying po phyi rol du byung bas skyed mos tshal de mthong ba 
[\[77b.2\]]dang /_de yang lhag par chags par gyur nas smras pa/_khyim bdag skyed mos tshal 'di nga la byin cig_/des ma byin no/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang smras na yang ma byin nas/_yang smras pa/_rin sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_gzhon nu nyis na kho bo yul nas [(]sbyugs [,]spyugs [)]
[\[77b.3\]]kyang bla'i skyed mos tshal ni mi 'bul lo/_/gzhon nu gzugs can snying pos smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis smras pa dran par byos shig_/nga nam rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe nga nyid kyis bkur ro/_/des smras pa/_nam khyod rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo yang rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o/_/
[\[77b.4\]]gzhon nu gzugs can snying pos mjal to zhes byas nas song ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po pad ma chen po shi nas/_gzhon nu gzugs can snying po rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang /_des skyed mos tshal de mthus phrogs so/_/khyim bdag de snying na zhing skyed mos tshal de la 
[\[77b.5\]]lhag par chags pas shi nas de nyid sbrul gdug pa zhig tu skyes te/_de rgyal po la rgyun du glags tshol ba lhur len cing gnas so/_/ji tsam na rgyal po gzugs can snying po so ga'i dus la bab ste/_me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus pa na btsun mo dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal der zhugs 
[\[77b.6\]]nas de de na skyes pa med par rol mos btsun mo'i bud med dang lhan cig dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byas nas gnyid log go/_/bud med ni me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas kun du 'khyam du dong ngo /_/bud med gcig gis ral gri bskur te rgyal po srung du bcug go/_/
[\[77b.7\]]de nas sbrul gdug pa des rgyal po'i drung na sgra mi grag par rig nas rgyal po la gzung ba'i phyir tshang nas byung ste chas so/_/rgyal po'i bsod nams kyi mthus bya ka lan da ka zhes bya ba de rnams kyis sbrul gdug pa de kun nas bskor nas tsi tsi'i sgra phyung ngo /_/bud med ral gri thogs pas 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]thos nas dngangs te sgra chen po byung nas ral gris bsad do/_/de nas rgyal po yang dngangs te sad nas smras pa/_'di ci byung /_bud med des smras pa/_lha sbrul gdug pa 'di lha la gzung ba'i phyir chas pa na bya ka lan da ka rnams kyis tsi tsi'i sgra phyung nas bdag 
[\[78a.2\]]gis bkum lags so/_/rgyal po'i gnas skabs de gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_khrom gyi ru pa dang /_rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis thos nas skyed mos tshal de'i phyi nang du ku co'i sgra chen pos gang bar gyur te/_rgyal po de skye dgu la byams pa 
[\[78a.3\]]zhig pas phyir zhing btsun mo skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas te mig mchi mas gang zhing 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la srog skyob pa de la mchog ci zhig sbyin/_skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal srid 
[\[78a.4\]]kyi phyed do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag bya ka lan da ka rnams kyis nga'i srog byin pas rgyal srid phyed 'di dag la sbyin no/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bya 'di dag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba lags pas rgyal srid phyed kyis 'di dag la ci bgyi/_'di dag 
[\[78a.5\]]'od ma'i tshal gang du gnas pa der 'di dag gi gnas bca'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de bzhin du gyis shig_/skyed mos tshal de 'od ma'i tshal gyis yongs su bskor te/_blon po rnams kyis de rnams kyi gnas 'od ma'i tshal gyi nye 'khor du bcas pas/_de 'od ma'i tshal bya ka 
[\[78a.6\]]lan da ka gnas pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zhang po kun du 'tsho rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung nas des skyed mos tshal de de'i gnas kyi phyir byin no/_/ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas shing 
[\[78a.7\]]zhig gi drung na bzhugs so/_/ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas shing zhig gi drung du bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor ba chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]chen pos rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can 
[\[78b.2\]]snying po la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 
[\[78b.3\]]'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud 
[\[78b.4\]]de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/_gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang 
[\[78b.5\]]mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs 
[\[78b.6\]]gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te/_gdan bshams nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyi dus tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod lags na da de'i dus la 
[\[78b.7\]]bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/_lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te/_ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang 
[\[79a.2\]]zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig 
[\[79a.3\]]nas/_gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te btsun pa 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'dir bcom ldan 'das ci bder bzhugs shig ces bcom ldan 'das la skyed mos tshal de phul lo/_/de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde rnams kyi nang du bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 
[\[79a.4\]]'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so zhes gdags par byas so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu 
[\[79a.5\]]rang gi khyim du spyan drangs so/_/yang de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas de khyim bdag de'i khyim du nub mo 'brang btab bo/_/de nas khyim bdag de de nyid kyi mtshan mo langs te nang mi rnams la bsgo ba/_nang rje dag longs 
[\[79a.6\]]shig_/bzhin bzang dag longs shig_/shing rnams gshegs shig_/me dag bus shig_/'bras chan tshos shig_/sran tshod tshos shig_/bca' ba dag bzang du gyis shig_/bkad sa'i zhal ta dag gyis shig_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems 
[\[79a.7\]]te/_ci khyim bdag 'di bag ma len tam/_bag ma gtong ngam/_yul mi'am/_tshong pa'am/_tshogs sam/_'khor tam/_'dis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs sam snyam du bsams nas khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]smras so/_/khyim bdag khyod ci bag ma len tam/_bag ma gtong ngam/_yul mi'am/_tshong pa'am/_tshogs sam/_'khor tam/_khyod kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs sam/_khyim bdag kho bo bag ma len 
[\[79b.2\]]pa'am/_bag ma gtong ba yang med yul mi ma yin/_tshong pa ma yin/_tshogs ma yin/_'khor ma yin/_ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa ma yin te/_'on kyang kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs 
[\[79b.3\]]tshod la spyan drangs so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos pa dang ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas de spu zing zhes byed pas khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di su yin/_
[\[79b.4\]]khyim bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/_khyim bdag 
[\[79b.5\]]de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/khyim bdag dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'di su yin/_khyim bdag rgyal rigs las kyang rigs kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung 
[\[79b.6\]]ba dag yod/_bram ze'i rigs dang rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs las kyang rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ba dag yod de/_khyim 
[\[79b.7\]]bdag de ni dge 'dun zhes bya ba yin te sang kho bo'i khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de rnams gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/_/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang na bzhugs/_rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid kyi dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis bltar rung ngam/_khyim bdag de'i phyir re zhig sdod cig dang /_gal te bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid du gshegs pa dang sang khyod kyi mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon 
[\[80a.2\]]med zas sbyin sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas nyal lo/_/de nam ma nangs par nam nangs pa'i 'du shes kyis lho sgo gang na ba der song ba dang /_de'i tshe lho sgo thun gnyis la sgo phye nas 'jog ste/_thun dang po la ni pho nya glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams mi thogs par bya ba'i phyir phye ste 
[\[80a.3\]]'jog go/_/thun tha ma la ni pho nya 'gro bar chas pa rnams mi thogs par bya ba'i phyir phye ste 'jog go/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar lho sgo phye ste 'dug pas gdon mi za bar nam nangs so snyam du rig nas snang ba de nyid du grong khyer nas byung 
[\[80a.4\]]ba dang /_de byung ma thag tu snang ba gang yin pa med nas slar mun nag por gyur to/_/de 'jigs par gyur/_bag tsha bar gyur cing /_spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas bdag mi'am/_mi ma yin pa'am/_g.yon can 'ga' zhig gis gtses par mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsams 
[\[80a.5\]]nas slar ldog par 'dod pa dang /_de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des ci tsam lho phyogs kyi sgo nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod kyi bar thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim 
[\[80a.6\]]bdag spyan sngar song shig_/slar ma ldog shig_/khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rta brgya dang ni gser rgyan brgya/_/dre'u'i shing rta brgya dang ni/_/sna tshogs nor kyis spud pa ni/_/rta rgod ma yi shing rta brgya/_/gom 
[\[80a.7\]]pa gcig cig bor ba yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig_/slar ma ldog shig_/khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gangs can ri yi glang chen brgya/_/gser dang nor bus brgyan 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]byas la/_/lus che gshol mda'i mche bar ldan/_/ma tang gar skyes stod po che/_/gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig_/slar ma ldog shig_/khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi/_slar log 
[\[80b.2\]]na ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tho gar yul gyi bu mo brgya/_/rna cha dang ni gdub kor thogs/_/gser gyi dpung rgyan thogs pa yi/_/mgrin pa rgyan gyis legs brgyan pa/_/gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/khyim bdag spyan 
[\[80b.3\]]sngar song shig_/slar ma ldog shig_/khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su zhig_/khyim bdag kho bo ni khyod nyid kyi grogs po rnying 
[\[80b.4\]]pa bram ze'i khye'u sbrang rtsi'i phung po yin te/_kho bos dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis la sems dad pa bskyed nas shi ba dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes te lho sgo 'di nyid la gnyug mar gnas so/_/de'i phyir khyod la kho bos 'di skad ces 
[\[80b.5\]]khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig_/slar ma ldog shig_/khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi/_slar log na ni ma yin no zhes smra'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma 
[\[80b.6\]]yin zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das de la blta bar lha yang brtson par byed do snyam du bsams nas/_bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba dang /_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na 'chag cing 
[\[80b.7\]]lhag par yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'ong ba la gzhes so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag gis yang dag par dgyes par 'gyur bas yang dag par dgyes par byed do/_/bcom 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]ldan 'das cig bde bar mnal tam/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos la/_/zag med rab tu rnam grol ba/_/mya ngan yongs 'das bram ze ni/_/thams cad du ni bde bar mnal/_/'dir 
[\[81a.2\]]ni re ba kun bcad nas/_/thugs kyi rims nad rnams bsal cing /_/zhi ba thob pa'i thugs kyis na/_/nye bar zhi ba bde bar mnal/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin khrid nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa 
[\[81a.3\]]dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par 
[\[81a.4\]]bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam 
[\[81a.5\]]dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod pa rnams mnog chung ba dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu dben pa'i phan yon gyi rjes su bsngags pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs dang mthun 
[\[81a.6\]]pa'i chos kyi gtam rgyas par yang dag par bstan to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de dga' ba'i sems dang /_dge ba'i sems dang /_mgu ba'i sems dang /_sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /_skal ba dang ldan zhing yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa kun shes 
[\[81a.7\]]par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam rgyas par rab tu bstan to/_/dper 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa 
[\[81b.2\]]dang /_lam mngon par rtogs so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_
[\[81b.3\]]gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[81b.4\]]btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsdos te skyabs su 
[\[81b.5\]]mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag khyod kyi ming ci/_btsun pa bdag gi ming bzang sbyin lags mod kyi bdag gis mgon ma mchis pa rnams la 'tshal ma 
[\[81b.6\]]stsol bas des na bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bgyi bar skye bos 'tshal to/_/khyim bdag khyod kyi gnas gang yin/_btsun pa yul pra tsin zhes bgyi ba na ko sa la pa rnams kyi grong rdal mnyan yod ces bgyi ba mchis te/_de na bdag mchis lags so/_/bcom 
[\[81b.7\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs shig dang /_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]bkur bgyi lags so/_/khyim bdag mnyan yod na gtsug lag khang yod dam/_btsun pa ma mchis lags so/_/khyim bdag gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der dge slong rnams 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang gnas par sems so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[82a.2\]]'das gshegs shig dang /_bdag gis ci nas kyang mnyan yod du dge slong rnams mchis pa dang /_gzhan du mchi ba dang /_mchi bar sems par 'gyur ba de ltar gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang 
[\[82a.3\]]mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/des rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba 
[\[82a.4\]]dang bsgrub pa gang yin pa de thams cad byas shing bsgrubs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom 
[\[82a.5\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi grogs dge slong gcig stsal du gsol/_de dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong su zhig gis khyim bdag 
[\[82a.6\]]mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur snyam na dge slong shA ri'i bus 'dul bar gzigs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med 
[\[82a.7\]]zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_
[\[82b\]]
