[\[82b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad de zas kyi bya ba byas nas 
[\[82b.2\]]zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs te/_gnas mal ji ltar spyad pa mkhos su phab nas de lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin lam rgyags mang po khyer nas nub mo nub mo zhing mnyan yod du song 
[\[82b.3\]]ste phyin nas da mnyan yod du ma zhugs pa nyid du kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang /_skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang /_nags tshal nas nags tshal du 'chags nas 'chag sar dpyod cing 'di skad ces smras so/_/mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring la ha cang 
[\[82b.4\]]yang mi nye ba dang nyin par lang long nyung zhing ku co nyung ba dang /_mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang /_sgra chung ba dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dang /_rlung dang nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi reg pa chung ba'i sa phyogs gang na yod pa der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug 
[\[82b.5\]]lag khang brtsig na phyogs de gang na yod snyam pa las/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi kun dga' ra ba ni mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring la ha cang yang mi nye ba dang /_nyin par lang long nyung zhing ku co nyung ba dang /_mtshan mo gcom chung 
[\[82b.6\]]ba dang /_sgra chung ba dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_'dir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/_de rang gi 
[\[82b.7\]]khyim du ma song ba nyid du gzhon nu rgyal byed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu kun dga' ra ba bdag la stsol cig der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/_/des smras pa/_
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]khyim bdag de ni nga'i kun dga' ra ba ni ma yin te/_skyed mos tshal yin mod kyi de nga'i yin no/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu bdag la kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[83a.2\]]stsol cig_/bdag gis der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so/_/khyim bdag kun dga' ra ba de gser bye ba gshibs kyang nga mi gtod do//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po dgu bcu pa/_yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 
[\[83a.3\]]gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba'i rin thang bkum lags kyis dbyig dang /_gser bzhes shig_/kun dga' ra ba ni bdag gi lags so/_/rin thang sus bcad/_khyod kyis rin thang bkum mod/_de gnyis rin thang bcad do/_/rin 
[\[83a.4\]]thang ma bcad do zhes rtsod par gyur nas zhal che gcod pa'i mi gang na ba der dong ba dang /_bar skabs der 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig par brtson gyis de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas de 
[\[83a.5\]]nas zhal che gcod pa'i mir bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas dgos pa'i phyir 'dus so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang gzhon nu rgyal byed gnyis zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i drung du song nas/_de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal che gcod 
[\[83a.6\]]pa sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams la don de rgyas par smras pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu kun dga' ra ba'i rin thang bcad zin gyis gser long shig_/kun dga' ra ba ni khyim bdag gi yin no/_/de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon 
[\[83a.7\]]med zas sbyin gyis shing rta dang /_rgya dang /_gzeb dang /_rnga mo dang /_glang dang /_bong bu rnams la gser mang po bkal te 'ongs nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad gshib par brtsams pa dang /_sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma yog pas ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug go/_/
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin don de sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/_gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas slar yang spa bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ngu yang ma yin ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam pa dang /_
[\[83b.2\]]gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni gdon mi za bar ci'i phyir kun dga' ra ba'i ched du nor gyi phung po chen po 'di snyed yongs su btang zhes 'gyod pa skyes so snyam du bsams nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[83b.3\]]so/_/khyim bdag gal te khyod 'gyod pa skyes na gser slar long shig_/kun dga' ra ba ni nga nyid kyi yin no/_/gzhon nu bdag ni 'gyod pa ma skyes te 'on kyang don 'di sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug pa ni bdag gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas 
[\[83b.4\]]slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin/_ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam mo/_/de nas gzhon nu rgyal byed 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa 
[\[83b.5\]]ma yin te/_de la da ltar khyim bdag 'di kun dga' ra ba'i ched du nor gyi phung po 'di snyed yongs su gtong ngo snyam du bsams nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs kho bo la byin cig_/der kho bos bcom ldan 
[\[83b.6\]]'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig par bya'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed la ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs byin nas der gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang rtsig tu bcug go/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[83b.7\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtsams pa dang /_mu stegs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas slong ba'i yid can rnams 'dus nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang /_smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]phyir gtsug lag khang ma rtsig shig_/ci'i phyir kho bo cag gis grong khyer bgos te dge sbyong gau ta ma'i rgyal po'i khab yin no/_/kho bo cag gi ni mnyan yod yin no/_/des smras pa/_khyed cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos kyi/_bdag gi nor ma bgos pas gang 
[\[84a.2\]]la mngon par dga' ba de'i chos kyi phung po brtsig go/_/de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong ba dang /_der yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par byas pa dang /_mu stegs spyi brtol can mu cor smra ba rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod dga' mgur byed du mi 
[\[84a.3\]]gzhug ste/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog cig 'ongs nas/_gal te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig_/des smras pa/_rung gis re zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag go/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin tshe 
[\[84a.4\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun 
[\[84a.5\]]pa shA ri'i bu mu stegs can rnams 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod dga' mgur byed du mi gzhug ste/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas/_gal te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig ces mchi na/_de la ji ltar bsgrub 
[\[84a.6\]]par bgyi/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_ji 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]yod dam 'on te med ces bsams pa las yod par mthong ngo /_/su zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam na bdag kho na la'o/_/yang bsams pa ji 'di snyed cig kho na bdag la rag 
[\[84a.7\]]las pa'i tshig gis 'dul bar 'gyur ram/_'on te gzhan yang tshig gis 'dul ba yod snyam pa las yod par mthong ngo /_/dus ji srid kyis tshogs par 'gyur snyam na zhag bdun lon nas so/_/bsams nas smras pa/_khyim bdag de bzhin du bya ste/_'on kyang zhag 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas mu stegs can rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin nas mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu na re de bzhin du bya ste/_'on kyang zhag bdun 
[\[84b.2\]]pa'i nyin par bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de rnams kyis bsams pa 'di la rgyu gnyis yod par 'gyur te/_yang na ni de 'bros 'dod do/_/yang na ni de phyogs tshol lo/_/de ma yin na dus der gdab ci dgos/_bdag cag kyang phyogs btsal lo zhes de rnams phyogs btsal bar 
[\[84b.3\]]brtsams te de rnams kyis phyogs btsal ba dang /_kun du rgyu mig dmar mthong nas de la de rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod dang bdag cag ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog bdag cag gis brtsad pa'i phyir bkug na de phyogs tshol 
[\[84b.4\]]gyis/_khyod kyang bdag cag gi grogs gyis shig_/dus ji tsam zhig na/_'di nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par ro/_/rung gis de bzhin du bya ste/_gang gi tshe khyed cag 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig_/mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang sems khral skyes nas 
[\[84b.5\]]nyin re zhing phyogs tshol ba dang /_nyi ma bgrang bar byed do/_/ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs yangs par stan shom du bcug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ched du yang seng ge'i khri bshams so/_/
[\[84b.6\]]yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mu stegs can rnams dang /_mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /_de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni ngo mtshar skyes/_kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas 'dus so/_/de nas tshe 
[\[84b.7\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pas mdun du bdar te rtsod pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas gdul ba'i skye bo rnams la bltas te 'dzum pa sngon du btang nas spyod lam zhi bas seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug go/_/'khor thams cad sems 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]mi g.yeng par tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la rtog cing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mu stegs can rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci re zhig byed dam/_'on te 'jig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_kho bo cag gis byas/_khyod kyis shig cig tshe dang 
[\[85a.2\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis byas na 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas kyang 'jig par mi nus na kun du rgyu mig dmar gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du rig nas kun du rgyu mig dmar la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis byos shig ngas gzhig go/_/
[\[85a.3\]]de mig 'phrul byed pa yin pas des shing sa ha kar shin tu me tog gis rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rlung dang char drag po phab ste/_des de rtsa ba nas phyung nas phan tshun du rnam par gtor te rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yul du yang ma gyur to/_/de nas des 
[\[85a.4\]]pad ma'i rdzing zhig sprul pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus glang po che bzang po zhig sprul nas des kun du brnal nas ming gi lhag ma tsam zhig bzhag go/_/des sbrul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus nam mkha' lding zhig sprul te des de blangs so/_/
[\[85a.5\]]des ro langs shig sprul pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur bas btab pa las nyes par spyod pa'i ro langs ni bdag nyid la gsod par byed pas des de nyid la bsnyags pa dang /_de nas de 'jigs skrag phongs shing ba spu zing zhes byed nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i 
[\[85a.6\]]rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu skyabs su mchi lags kyis yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa phyung ba dang ro langs de zhi bar gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de la chos bshad de/_de dad pa skyes nas smras 
[\[85a.7\]]pa/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rab tu phyung bsnyen par 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag byin te/_des brtson pa dang 'bad pa dang /_brtsal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te dgra bcom par gyur nas/_khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam 
[\[85b.2\]]pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/_rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa la chags pa 
[\[85b.3\]]dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrad nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad 
[\[85b.4\]]par gyur te/_smras pa/_'phags pa shA ri'i bus ni smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po tshar bcad do snyam du rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin 
[\[85b.5\]]shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas so/_/de thos pas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/_kha cig gis ni rang 
[\[85b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/_kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs/_kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 
[\[85b.7\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/_/'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/_chos la 'bab/_dge 'dun la bab 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]pa la bkod do/_/mu stegs can rnams kyis bsams pa/_bdag cag gis 'di shags kyis tshar bcad mi nus kyis thabs shig bsham par byas la/_de nas glags rnyed nas 'di bgags te gsad par bya'o snyam nas thams cad 'dus te khyim 
[\[86a.2\]]bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du dong ste smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad ni bcad pas de bas snying brtse bar gyis shig dang /_khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o/_/kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas 
[\[86a.3\]]yul bor na mi rung ngo /_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/_re zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag go zhes de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa mu stegs can rnams kyi mchid 
[\[86a.4\]]nas khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad pas de bas na snying brtse bar gyis shig_/khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o/_/kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo zhes mchi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bsam pa la 
[\[86a.5\]]zhugs te/_ci 'di dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam 'on te med snyam na des yod par mthong ngo /_/su zhig la rag lus snyam na/_bdag kho na la'o snyam nas des bsams te smras pa/_khyim bdag de la 'gal ba ci yod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/de rnams gtsug lag 
[\[86a.6\]]khang der gla mi'i las byed par brtsams pa na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lcag thogs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas des de rnams las byed du gzhug par brtsams so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas/_de dang nye ba'i shing drung zhig na 'chag cing 'dug 
[\[86a.7\]]pa dang /_de rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/_dben pa na 'dug pas 'di bsad pa'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas/_de rnams kyis de'i drung du dong ste bskor nas 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_'di rnams bsam pa ci 'dra bas bdag gi 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]drung du 'ongs snyam na/_ci tsam na bsad pa'i sems kyis yin par shes nas des lcag thogs sprul pa de sbad nas/_des de rnams las byos de bzhes thag bcug pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa re 
[\[86b.2\]]zhig song la ngal sor chug shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'di ni 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/_bdag cag gis ni gsad par bsams na 'di ni bdag cag la byams par sems so snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi bsam pa dang 
[\[86b.3\]]bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas te/_de thos nas de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[86b.4\]]bu mngon sum du byas te de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 
[\[86b.5\]]bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag byin te/_de rnams kyis brtson pa dang /_'bad pa dang brtsal bar byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/_'du byed kyi rnam pa 
[\[86b.6\]]thams cad nyams pa dang /_lhung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/_
[\[86b.7\]]bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan dang ste 'ur mnyam pa/_rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhing rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang 'dod pa'i 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]rnyed pa la chags pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gtsug lag khang gi 
[\[87a.2\]]thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung /_mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dzum dbyung bar brtsams so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[87a.3\]]sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/_khyim bdag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[87a.4\]]pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/_khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrad de smras pa/_'phags 
[\[87a.5\]]pa shA ri'i bu gal te de lta na de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang dang lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang thig skud de bzung ba dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lhag par dang ba drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par 
[\[87a.6\]]byas te/_dad pa de'i mjug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa rin po che sna bzhi las byas par gyur nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang chen 
[\[87a.7\]]po bcu drug dang /_khang phran drug bcu rtsig tu bcug ste/_des gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /_khang phran drug bcu brtsigs nas yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das gshegs na shul so ji tsam du byon par 'gyur/_khyim bdag dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i tsam mo/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/_khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni 
[\[87b.2\]]nyi ma gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i lam du 'gro'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshegs dgongs brtsis nas gzhes sa dag byed du bcug_/sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag byed du bcug_/dus tshod gsol 
[\[87b.3\]]ba'i mi dag bkod/_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyis brgyan/_tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag nye bar bkod/_rta babs dag byed du bcug_/dus kyi dang thun tshod kyi sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go/_/de ltar tshogs 
[\[87b.4\]]bsags nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/_kye nang rje tshur spyon/_khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la son pa dang /_kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshol la/_gnod pa nyung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_'tsho 'am bskyod pa yang 
[\[87b.5\]]ngam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_
[\[87b.6\]]gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid do zhes kyang gsol cig jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi ltar mnyan nas rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/_/
[\[87b.7\]]de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas/_reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/kye mi khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar 
[\[88a.2\]]gyur cig_/btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha 
[\[88a.3\]]dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid do/_/zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas mi de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 
[\[88a.4\]]la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/_zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/_grol ba 'khor grol ba/_dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/_rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/_dgra bcom pa 
[\[88a.5\]]'khor dgra bcom pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/_mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/_khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_glang po che'i mchog glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs 
[\[88a.6\]]kyis bskor ba lta bu/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/_zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba 
[\[88a.7\]]lta bu/_nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/_yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]lta bu/_thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/_sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/_glang 
[\[88b.2\]]po che dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/_sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom 
[\[88b.3\]]gang gis brgyan pa'i sku nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dge 
[\[88b.4\]]slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod 
[\[88b.5\]]kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas/_mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang bcas pas grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas mnan pa de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/_sa chen po 'di g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos/_ldeg_/rab tu ldeg_/
[\[88b.6\]]kun du rab tu ldeg ste/_shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/_lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/_byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/_mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/_dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar gyur cing /_'jig 
[\[88b.7\]]rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas te snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/bar snang la yang lha'i rnga brdung zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]a ga ru'i phye ma dang /_rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_gur gum gyi phye ma dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang /_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba rnams 'thor zhing lha'i gos rnams kyang 'thor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na 'di 
[\[89a.2\]]dag dang /_gzhan yang ngo mtshar de lta bu dag byung bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to/_/dma' ba rnams ni mthon por gyur to/_/mthon po rnams ni mnyam par gyur to/_/glang po che yang skad 'byin to/_/rta yang skad 'byin/_khyu mchog 
[\[89a.3\]]rnams kyang skad 'byin to/_/khyim na yod pa'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin to/_/long ba rnams kyis ni mig thob bo/_/'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas thos so/_/lkugs pa rnams kyis ni smra nus par gyur to/_/dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyis ni dbang 
[\[89a.4\]]po rnams yongs su tshang ba thob bo/_/chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to/_/dug 'thungs pa rnams ni dug zhi bar gyur to/_/phan tshun kho na byung ba rnams ni byang bar gyur to/_/sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to/_/btson du bcings pa rnams ni 
[\[89a.5\]]bcings pa las thar to/_/nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed par gyur to/_/de dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na ngo mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegs so/_/gshegs 
[\[89a.6\]]nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang nye du dang gnyen gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun sbreng bar brtsams pa las/_de 'dzag tu ma btub 
[\[89a.7\]]pas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsams pa/_bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang byas pa med do/_/'on 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di nyid phul ba yin gyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbrengs shig_/des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas sbrengs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang 
[\[89b.2\]]ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad de/_rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad pa na/_gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis 
[\[89b.3\]]gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi sems mkhyen nas dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no zhes der ming thog mar smos par mdzad do/_/gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis deng bdag gi ming thog mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas 
[\[89b.4\]]shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs las bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go/_/de bzhin du gnas brtan sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med 
[\[89b.5\]]zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge sbyong gau ta ma ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas/_mnyan yod du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[89b.6\]]bzhugs te/_shes ldan gau ta ma de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che'o zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang 
[\[89b.7\]]dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma bdag gis 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]shes ldan gau ta ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che'o zhes thos lags na/_gau ta ma gang dag de skad ces lung ston pa de dag ci ga dge sbyong gau ta ma la skur ba 'debs pa ma lags 
[\[90a.2\]]sam/_thal bar smra ba ma lags sam/_shes ldan gau ta mas gsungs pa bzhin smra ba lags sam/_chos smra ba lags sam/_chos dang mthun pa'i chos lung ston pa lags sam/_cig de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang mthun pa'i rtsod pa'i rjes su 
[\[90a.3\]]rtsod pa mchis na smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur lags sam/_rgyal po chen po gang dag de skad du smra ba de dag ni de skad du lung ston pa bden pa de nga la skur ba 'debs pa ma yin/_thal bar smra ba ma yin/_de ni gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin/_chos smra 
[\[90a.4\]]ba yin/_chos dang mthun pa'i chos lung ston pa yin te/_de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang mthun pa'i rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa 'ongs na smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[90a.5\]]mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/shes ldan gau ta ma de skad gsungs mod kyi/_shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag yid mi ches lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_kye gau ta ma re zhig rgan zhing rgan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze ni 'di dag lags te/_'di lta ste 'od srung rdzogs byed dang /_kun 
[\[90a.6\]]du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /_smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /_mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /_ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang /_gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu gang lags pa de dag kyang da dung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[90a.7\]]par bdag nyid g.yar gyis mi 'che ba lags na/_shes ldan gau ta ma 'khrungs nas ring po ma lags pa gsar du rab tu byung bas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_rgyal po chen po gzhon nu bzhi po 'di dag la khyad du gsad par mi bya gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po sbrul gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/_gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po me chung ngu khyad du gsad par mi bya/_chung ngu 
[\[90b.2\]]la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po dge slong gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong gzhon nur gyur kyang de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i dgra bcom par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[90b.3\]]kyis de skad ces/_/bka' stsal nas ni bde gshegs kyis/_/de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas/_/ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs/_/rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang /_/rigs btsun grags par ldan pa la/_/blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes/_/khyad 
[\[90b.4\]]du mi gsad zil mi mnan/_/rgyal po rgyal rigs mkhas pa yis/_/rgyal srid dag ni thob gyur nas/_/chad pas gcod pa'i gnas de yod/_/de bas de la shin tu gdung /_/de ltas rang gi srog bsrung zhing /_/rang gi don la lta bas ni/_/de ni khyad du mi gsad cing /_/
[\[90b.5\]]de la legs par bag kyang bya/_/gal te grong ngam dgon pa'ang rung /_/gang du sbrul ni mthong gyur na/_/blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes/_/khyad du mi gsad zil mi mnan/_/'di ltar sbrul ni rgyu ba na/_/rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs la/_/glags rnyed nas ni 
[\[90b.6\]]gzhon nus kyang /_/skyes pa bud med du ma zin/_/de ltas rang gi srog bsrung zhing /_/rang gi don la lta bas ni/_/de ni khyad du mi gsad cing /_/de la legs par bag kyang bya/_/mang po sreg cing 'bar byed pa/_/lam gnag bsreg bya za ba'i me/_/blo dang 
[\[90b.7\]]ldan pas de chung zhes/_/khyad du mi gsad zil mi mnan/_/me ni chung ngur gyur pa yang /_/rkyen las chen por 'gyur ba yin/_/mes ni ring por mi thogs par/_/grong rdal dang ni grong khyer sreg_/de ltas rang gi srog bsrung zhing /_/rang gi don la lta 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]bas ni/_/de ni khyad du mi gsad cing /_/de la legs par bag kyang bya/_/lam gnag bsreg bya za ba'i me/_/nags tshal sreg pa gang yin te/_/zhag 'das nas ni 'ga' zhig tu/_/'dab ma rnams ni skye 'gyur gyi/_/dge slong tshul 
[\[91a.2\]]khrims ldan pa la/_/brten nas gang zhig tshig gyur pa/_/de la bu tsha yod min pas/_/bgo skal spyod pa 'thob mi 'gyur/_/ta la'i mgo ni bcad pa bzhin/_/ring por mi thogs rabs kyang 'chad/_/de bas rang gi srog bsrung zhing /_/rang gi don la lta bas ni/_/
[\[91a.3\]]de ni khyad du mi gsad cing /_/de la legs par bag kyang bya/_/rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang /_/de bzhin brang 'gro me dang ni/_/dge slong tshul khrims ldan de la/_/blo dang ldan pas brnyas mi bya/_/de bas rang gi srog bsrung zhing /_/rang gi don la lta bas ni/_/de la khyad du 
[\[91a.4\]]mi gsad cing /_/de la legs par bag kyang bya/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas 
[\[91a.5\]]song ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba/_lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_khyod kyi sras kyis 
[\[91a.6\]]bdud rtsi thob nas bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do zhes spring ba rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo /_/gnyis pa btang ba dang /_de yang de nyid du rab tu phyung ste/_pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs 
[\[91a.7\]]pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo snyam mo/_/sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa 'char kas 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]mthong nas smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du khyod phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe kho bos phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las de dag kho bo'i gan du 'ongs nas 
[\[91b.2\]]gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dir bzhugs so zhes smra'o/_/da ni kho bos phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang na 'ga' yang phrin yig khyer te mi 'ong na ji ltar sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/_'char kas smras pa/_lha bdag mchi ste bka' mchid 
[\[91b.3\]]'tshal la slar mchi'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_'char ka gang dang gang song ba de dang de de'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/_/'char kas smras 
[\[91b.4\]]pa/_lha slar mchi lags so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis spring yig bris pa/_lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su/_/khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te/_/nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du/_/rgyal ba ljon shing la bsdad na/_/da ni khyod 
[\[91b.5\]]kyi slob ma yi/_/yal ga lcug ma 'phel 'gyur bas/_/gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar gyur/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal skal bar ldan/_/gzhan yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na/_/bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun 
[\[91b.6\]]bskrun te/_/bu gcig yul mis 'bras bus yongs su spyad thob na/_/de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la snying rje med/_/gang tshe thog ma bltams pa na/_/nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams ni/_/shin tu che dang phan gdags zhes/_/khyod kyis dam bcas 
[\[91b.7\]]mdzad nas ni/_/khyod kyis zhi gnas de brnyes na/_/bdag dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la/_/thugs brtses rjes su zung mdzod de/_/gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol/_/zhes spring ba'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /_lam 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba'i yi ge lags so zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas bklags so/_/bklags 
[\[92a.2\]]nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang 'char kas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhud dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'char ka 'dong ngo /_/'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas de sngon gyi 'dris pa 
[\[92a.3\]]kho nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud dang /_bdag gis mthus bkri bar bgyi lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig yul gyi rgya mor ma chags shing /_/sred 'gags bkri ba yod pa ma yin 
[\[92a.4\]]pa'i/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/_/gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/_/gang zhig yul gyi rgya mor ma chags shing /_/sred 'gags bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de/_/gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi 
[\[92a.5\]]yis bkri/_/gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing /_/'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/_/gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/_/gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing /_/'jig rten ma 
[\[92a.6\]]bcom cung zad yod min pa/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de/_/gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/_/lan la spobs pa med nas gsol pa/_/bcom ldan 'das mchi ste/_rgyal po zas gtsang la rig par bgyi'o/_/'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di 
[\[92a.7\]]lta bu ma yin no/_/'char kas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags/_rab tu byung ba yin gyis khyod kyang rab tu byung shig_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchi bar dam bcas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]stsal pa/_'char ka rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/_yab dang /_yum dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyi chos dang 
[\[92b.2\]]mthun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog go/_/'char kas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu 'byung lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'char ka 'di ni yun ring po'i don dang phan 
[\[92b.3\]]pa dang bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te kun du spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas/_'char ka 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te/_
[\[92b.4\]]deng phan chad bud med dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag go/_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_
[\[92b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'char ka song la khyod mod kho nas rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sgo 
[\[92b.6\]]na sdod la shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te nang du spyon cig ces gleng na 'jug par bya'o/_/zhugs nas gal te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan yang yod dam zhes zer na yod do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing 
[\[92b.7\]]cha byad 'di 'dra'am zhes 'dri na/_'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas par mi bya'o/_/gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes gleng na/_mi bzhugs so zhes brjod 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]par bya'o/_/gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'dri na dgon pa'am gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'dri na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o/_/gal te gzhon nu don thams 
[\[93a.2\]]cad grub ba byon nam zhes 'dri na/_byon no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/ji srid cig na byon zhes 'dri na zhag bdun lon na'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mchi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_song shig_/sa bdag 
[\[93a.3\]]rnams ni tshig gis te/_/lha rnams bsams pas 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyis/_/sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir son 
[\[93a.4\]]pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa mi bzod pa skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_ci 
[\[93a.5\]]shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam/_shes ldan dag yod do/_/de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_shAkya'i dge slong mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_nang du thong shig_/de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/_'char ka rab 
[\[93a.6\]]tu byung ngam/_des smras pa/_lha rab tu byung ngo /_/khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smras pa ma yin nam/_'di ci yin/_'char kas smras pa/_lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bka' stsal nas chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs 
[\[93a.7\]]pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung mod kyi bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo /_/rgyal pos yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug ste/_de'i don du chu btsags rtsa ba dang 'bras bu brtags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug go/_/tshe dang 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang /_dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin yongs su longs spyad do/_/rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/_'char ka ci gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra ba nye bar zhi ba yin 
[\[93b.2\]]nam/_'char kas smras pa/_lha bdag gi dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags so/_/dper ji lta bu ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no/_/rgya mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no/_/nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no/_/nam mkha' dang pad ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no/_/rgyal 
[\[93b.3\]]po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am/_lha 'di 'dra zhing cha zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /_chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar byung ste smras pa/_'char ka 
[\[93b.4\]]gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam/_'char kas smras pa byon no/_/dus ji srid na dgung bdun lon na'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis rgyal po'i khab dang pho brang byi dor byos shig_/
[\[93b.5\]]'char kas smras pa/_lha bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do/_/rgyal pos smras pa gang du bzhugs/_'char kas smras pa/_dgon pa'am gtsug lag khang du'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/_
[\[93b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to/_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /_khang phran drug bcu rtsig 
[\[93b.7\]]tu chug shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /_khang phran drug bcu rtsig tu bcug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu song la dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'dzom na khyed cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig 
[\[94a.2\]]ces sgo shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'dzom na khyed cag las su lta bar 
[\[94a.3\]]spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/_zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/_grol ba 'khor grol ba/_dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/_rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/_dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/_
[\[94a.4\]]'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/_mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/_khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_glang po che glang po'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i 
[\[94a.5\]]tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_dpa' bo ru ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_lam mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis 
[\[94a.6\]]bskor ba lta bu/_ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_khams kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/_zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/_yul 
[\[94a.7\]]'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]ba lta bu/_brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/_sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/_glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam 
[\[94b.2\]]gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/_sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas 
[\[94b.3\]]mdzes pa/_stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu 'bab chu ro hi kar byon to/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu 
[\[94b.4\]]ro hi kar byon to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang /_gyo mo dang /_gseg ma rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_dri shin tu zhim po'i pog por nye bar bshams/_dar gyi chun phyang mang po dpyangs te/_gang 
[\[94b.5\]]yang 'bab chu ro hi ka nas gang yang n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba de'i bar gyi lam shin tu mdzes par byas te/_sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkra ba dag shom du bcug go/_/de na 'bab chu ro hi ka la dge slong kha cig ni lag pa 'khru bar byed do/_/kha cig ni so shing 'dor 
[\[94b.6\]]bar byed do/_/kha cig ni khrus byed do/_/ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul/_kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas thams cad n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba 
[\[94b.7\]]nas byung ste ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/_'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa blta'o snyam mo//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te nga zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir gshegs 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]na/_shAkya nga rgyal can rnams kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi nags su gshegs nas ltogs po zhig grub pa lta zhig ste/_de lha brgya stong phrag du mas zham 'bring byas nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te dus de srid du dka' ba brgya stong 
[\[95a.2\]]spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas nga zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta zhes ma dad pa skyed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/_'di lta ste 'chag 
[\[95a.3\]]pa dang /_bzhengs pa dang /_bzhugs pa dang mnal ba mdzad do/_/me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad do/_/me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad 
[\[95a.4\]]de/_'di lta ste sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel gyi kha dog go/_/cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad de/_sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad de/_sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do/_/sku'i 
[\[95a.5\]]stod nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/_sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/shar phyogs la ji lta bar lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/_/phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 
[\[95a.6\]]'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa bsdus te ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so/_/dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid 
[\[95a.7\]]tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams ta la gcig gi srid tsam na'o/_/
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs na ni dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[95b.2\]]bzhi'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams mi gang lhag tsam na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag 
[\[95b.3\]]tsam na ni dge slong rnams sa la'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang /_dge slong mang po mthong nas de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/_'char ka 'di na ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung 
[\[95b.4\]]ba mang po zhig yod na de la gzhon nu gang yin/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags/_/'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyin byed de nyid don ni kun du ston 
[\[95b.5\]]mdzad lags/_/'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags/_/dri med gsal ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang da gzigs shig_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la phyag byas te 
[\[95b.6\]]tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/_blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/_/kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/_/bltam pa'i tshe nas ni g.yos pa dang /_/'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o/_/de nas shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyis rgyal po zas 
[\[95b.7\]]gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa mthong nas da ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci tha tshig ces ma dad pa bskyed do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag da gdod kho bos gzhon nu don 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/_gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltam pa na sa chen po g.yos par gyur cing 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/_'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun 
[\[96a.2\]]gnag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/_der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag gcig gis gcig 
[\[96a.3\]]mthong ba dang /_shes ldan dag 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta/_shes ldan dag 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta zhes ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so/_/gang gi tshe gzhon nu don 
[\[96a.4\]]thams cad grub pa/_zhing blas kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_
[\[96a.5\]]bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/_shar phyogs su 'bab/_shar phyogs su bab kyang shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par 
[\[96a.6\]]gyur pa de'i tshe yang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bo'i yid bsdus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/_'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so/_/de bas na 'di skad ces/_blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/_/kun 
[\[96a.7\]]spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/_/bltam pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang /_/'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o zhes smra'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas dge slong 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing snying dang mig mchi mas gang bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_gzhal med khang gi gnas rnams las/_/yab kyi khab na 
[\[96b.2\]]bzhugs pa las/_/dgon pa'i 'jigs dang bcas rnams su/_/ji lta bur ni 'ba' zhig bzhugs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/mi yi bdag po gang du ni/_/khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba/_/'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcus/_/thub pa rnams 
[\[96b.3\]]ni gnas par mdzad/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_ba so gser gyi rtsa ba can/_/shin tu bde ba bting ba yi/_/khri la mnal bar mdzad pa las/_/gding ba la ni ji ltar mnal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rgyal po rnam grol gnas mal ni/_/dga' ba 
[\[96b.4\]]byang chub yan lag gi/_/me tog bkram par chags med cing /_/yongs su gdung ba rnam spangs mnal/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_/dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni/_/gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na/_/rnyog pa can la dro ba yi/_/chab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad 
[\[96b.5\]]lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gau tam dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med/_/bsod nams 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/_/de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus nas/_/lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol 
[\[96b.6\]]pa/_/dpa' bo khyod sngon ser skya yi/_/tsan dan gyis ni sku bkrus shing /_/ka shi'i mchog gnas mdzes pa las/_/de dang bral na mdzes ma lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/tshul khrims nga yi rgyan yin te/_/tshul khrims nyid ni phyug pa yin/_/
[\[96b.7\]]gser dang nor bu rna cha dag_/rmongs skyed nga la ci zhig bya/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na/_/glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa/_/tsher mar bcas pa'i sa gzhi la/_/zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang /_/yang dag rtsol ba'i bzhon pa yis/_/sa kun rnam par rgyu na yang /_/nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba/_/dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'i/_/na bza' mnabs na mdzes pa las/_/ngur 
[\[97a.2\]]smrig rtsub po'i gos mnabs pa/_/ji ltar khyod kyi sku yis bzod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rgyal po nga yi gos ni ngo tsha shes/_/nga yi bgo bsnam sbyar te/_/de bgos thub pa zhi ba rnams/_/nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur/_/rgyal po zas gtsang 
[\[97a.3\]]gis gsol pa/_/'di ltar khyod sngon gser gyi gzhong pa las/_/du ma'i ro ldan 'bras chan gsol ba las/_/'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod snyoms ni/_/phal pa gsol ba ji ltar mgur du mchi/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/zas kyi sred pa thams 
[\[97a.4\]]cad spangs nas ni/_/nges par byung dang mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'i/_/nga ni chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi/_/'jig rten kun la brtse phyir nga spyod do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_/mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i/_/dgun skyems kha ra'i chab gsol 
[\[97a.5\]]na/_/rnyog pa can la dro ba yi/_/chab ni ji lta zhig tu gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/mi yi bdag po gang 'thungs na/_/bdag la btung ba thams cad ni/_/dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa/_/chos kyi ro mchog nga btung ngo /_/rgyal po zas 
[\[97a.6\]]gtsang gis gsol pa/_/'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang /_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs/_/da lta gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa/_/blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ji ltar bsnyengs pa med par bzhugs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[97a.7\]]stsal pa/_/gau tam 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin de/_/dri ma bag chags bcas par ngas spangs pas/_/nga ni mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te/_/nga la 'di na 'jigs pa cung zad med/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_/khyod sngon khrus khang shin tu yid 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]'ong bar/_/khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na/_/gcig po khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par/_/thub dbang da ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gau ta ma chos kyi mtsho bran dri med pa/_/tshul 
[\[97b.2\]]khrims 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/_/de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus nas/_/lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_/gang gis khyod ni khyad du gsod/_/gang las 'jigs su rung ba skye/_/yid 
[\[97b.3\]]'byung ba yang gang las skye/_/zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gang gis nga yi khyad gsod dang /_/gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang /_/gang las yid 'byung skyes pa dag_/nyon cig khyod la bshad par bya/_/rga 
[\[97b.4\]]dang na dang 'chi ba ste/_/gal te 'di gsum yod min na/_/nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i/_/yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/_/shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba/_/legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo legs/_/khyod ni 'jig 
[\[97b.5\]]rten chos brgyad kyis/_/ji lta bur yang ma gos so/_/de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas byas nas/_/drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ni/_/thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/_/bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du 
[\[97b.6\]]sems te/_gang bdag gi bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa ni bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun 
[\[97b.7\]]pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/_/de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so/_/lha sbyin nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can/_sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]byas pas khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang bcas pas smras pa/_gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i sgyu mas dbang du byed pa shes na bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig_/de la shAkya rnams kyis bshes pa'i tshig gis smras pa/_lha sbyin bcom 
[\[98a.2\]]ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra shig ces bzlog nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun 
[\[98a.3\]]khri drug stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro/_/ro hi ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga 
[\[98a.4\]]stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro/_/'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni 
[\[98a.5\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs 
[\[98a.6\]]pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur/_kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /_kha cig gis ni chos la/_kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste/_'khor de dag kyang phal cher kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol/_chos la 'bab/_dge 'dun la bab par bkod 
[\[98a.7\]]do/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar bcas pas mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur na/_da lta ni mis mchod kyi lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]su bcad de gsol pa/_drang srong chen po smra mchog dam chos kyi/_/char pas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad do/_/mi bzad lam du lhung ba'i 'jig rten 'di/_/drongs te thar ba'i lam la sbyar bar mdzod/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul 
[\[98b.2\]]che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/_lhag par dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_rgyal po zas gtsang gis ci'i phyir bden pa ma mthong snyam pa las de 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/_
[\[98b.3\]]lhag par dga' bar gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug go/_/rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur te/_ha cang zhum pa dang /_shin tu dga' ba'o/_/de la zhum pa'i sems dang shin tu dga' ba yod kyis/_ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang /_shin 
[\[98b.4\]]tu dga' ba gnyis spong du gzhug go snyam nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang la soms shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom 
[\[98b.5\]]ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ba dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi 
[\[98b.6\]]bu chen po tshur spyon/_maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos sems 
[\[98b.7\]]ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur te/_shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/_'di lta ste 'chag pa dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal bar byed do/_/me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]par 'jug par byed do/_/me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed do/_'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_
[\[99a.2\]]le brgan dang /_shel gyi kha dog dag go/_/cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed de/_lus kyi stod nas 'bar bar byed la/_lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do/_/lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed la lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs 
[\[99a.3\]]par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/_/phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba bsdus te stan bshams pa 
[\[99a.4\]]nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/_rgyal po chen po mchis 
[\[99a.5\]]so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mthu che ba dang gsum rig dang /_/sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang /_/zag zad dgra bcom gang yin pa/_/thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 
[\[99a.6\]]'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas de shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/_/skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/_kye ma brgya byin dang 
[\[99a.7\]]tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos bshad do snyam pa dang /_chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]'das kyis dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na/_brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/_nyan thos chen po rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa mi shes na/_brgya 
[\[99b.2\]]byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta ci smos/_srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis lta ga la shes/_de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[99b.3\]]lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas/_des lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa la bsgo ba/_bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa rtseg ma gdan sna tshogs bshams 
[\[99b.4\]]pa zhig sprul cig_/kau shi ka khyod kyi mchog tu bzang ngo zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa rtseg ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul to/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhin 'khod pa'i yul 
[\[99b.5\]]'khor skyong dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_lus ngan po ste/_shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor skyong dpung rgyan dang /_rna cha gdub kor dang /_phreng ba dang /_rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis 
[\[99b.6\]]brgyan pa'o/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba 
[\[99b.7\]]der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/_lha'i 'khor phal po che'i gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang nang du zhugs pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 
[\[100a.2\]]'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go/_/ci'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/_der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo /_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su zhig_/yul 'khor skyong 
[\[100a.3\]]gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni yul 'khor skyong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang /_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su 
[\[100a.4\]]zhig_/'phags skyes pos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags skyes po'o/_/ci'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/_der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nub sgor song ba dang /_rgyal po chen po mig mi 
[\[100a.5\]]bzang gis mthong nas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su zhig_/mig mi bzang gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni mig mi bzang ngo /_/ci'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor 
[\[100a.6\]]dag pa la chos 'chad de/_der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang /_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus mthong nas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[100a.7\]]khyod su zhig_/rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyi bu'o/_/ci'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/_der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]pa la chos 'chad pa de bdag gis blta'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang zhum pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te nga ma mthong na khrag dron mo skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur 
[\[100b.2\]]ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod pas de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de shel las byas par sprul pa dang /_des na rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong ngo /_/
[\[100b.3\]]mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags 
[\[100b.4\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de bden pa mthong 
[\[100b.5\]]nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la phas ma bgyis/_mas ma lags/_rgyal pos ma lags/_lha rnams kyis ma lags/_sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/_
[\[100b.6\]]sdug pa dang /_rang gi skye bo dang /_gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams 
[\[100b.7\]]ni phye/_bdag lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag go/_/yang gsol pa/_pha la lan du phan gdags pa/_/dam pa'i bus ni bgyi ba gang /_/khyod kyis bdag la mdzad lags te/_/sems ni grol bar gzhol bar bgyis/_/khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las/_/drangs te 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]mtho ris thar pa la/_/bsgrim mi 'tshal bar bzhag lags te/_/khyod kyis dka' ba mdzad pa legs/_/mgon po byams pa khyod kyis ni/_/bdag ni tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar/_/mtho ris rnyed pas srid pa yi/_/longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad/_/de nas 
[\[101a.2\]]rgyal po zas gtsang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par 
[\[101a.3\]]gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo 
[\[101a.4\]]bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te/_zas dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas zas dkar la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu khyod rgyal srid thob kyis rgyal srid khyer cig_/ci'i slad du ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bas so/_/
[\[101a.5\]]gang gi gdugs la lags/_de ring kho na'o/_/bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra bar chos bshad pa de'i nyi ma la shAkya bdun khri bdun stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/_/de bzhin du bre bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras 
[\[101a.6\]]pa dang /_des smras pa/_bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri drug stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/_/de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang /_des 
[\[101a.7\]]smras pa/_bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ro hi ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/_/gal te de ltar gyur na da su zhig rgyal srid la gzhag_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_shAkya'i rgyal po 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]bzang ldan gyis bgyi'o zhes de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur ro/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te/_gdan 
[\[101b.2\]]bshams shing nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis gdugs tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags na/_da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed 
[\[101b.3\]]dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[101b.4\]]zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/_rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rang gi lag nas 
[\[101b.5\]]bstabs shing tshim par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das la n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs 
[\[101b.6\]]kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad pa/_sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'dis/_/shAkya rnams kyis bsams pa yi/_/yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni/_/rtag pa'i gnas ni thob par shog_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[101b.7\]]de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs nas nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol/_
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol lo/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na dka' thub drag po'i brtul zhugs kyi khyad par dag gis lus gdungs pas lus mi mdzes par 
[\[102a.2\]]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin mod kyi/_lus mdzes pa ma yin na 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las/_des bsams pa/_shAkya'i 'khor 
[\[102a.3\]]gyis yin no snyam nas/_de nas shAkya thams cad bsogs te smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung bar gyur na cir 'gyur/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur/_g.yog bgyid par 'gyur 
[\[102a.4\]]ro/_/da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur na/_khyed cag ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/_lha ci rab tu 'byung ngam/_rab tu byung shig_/ci thams cad dam/_khyim re nas re re'o/_/bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong 
[\[102a.5\]]khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_rgyal po'i zhal nas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces de skad bka' stsal to/_/bre bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang /_ming chen no/_/ming chen ni zhing blas kyi mtha' 
[\[102a.6\]]la lhag par brtson no/_/ma 'gags pa ni steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/ming chen la mas smras pa/_bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_shAkya rnams las 
[\[102a.7\]]khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bsgos khyod rab tu byung shig_/des smras pa/_bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis khyod kyi bu sdug pa bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu phyung shig_/bu bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sems can de la khyod 'gran ma 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]tshol cig_/yum khyod gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags mod/_de ring de la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang ma bskur dang /_ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po legs sam ma legs mngon par 'gyur ro/_/bu de bzhin du byas te yid ches par bya'o/_/
[\[102b.2\]]des gzeb stong pa rdze'u yis bkang nas kha ras dkar pos dkris te rgya skyegs la rgyas btab nas bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba/_gal te de na ci yod ces 'dri dang ci yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig_/des de la khyer nas song ba dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang 
[\[102b.3\]]po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa/_rang sangs rgyas kun shes pa la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin pa de deng ci'i phyir zas kyis phongs par bya/_de'i zan sbyar bar bya'o zhes des rdze'u de rnams su sran tshod dang /_tshod ma sna 
[\[102b.4\]]tshogs ro dang ldan pa dang zas kyis bkang ngo /_/ji tsam na mngag gzhug ma des khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu mo 'o na ni ci yod/_des smras pa/_gzhon nu ci yang ma mchis so/_/ma 'gags pas bsams pa/_bdag la ma 
[\[102b.5\]]byams na 'di stong par ci ste bskur/_gdon mi za bar 'di ni ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis re zhig blta'o/_/zhes ci tsam na kha phye ba dang /_skyed mos tshal de thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur te/_de bsnams nas ma 'gags pa mchog tu 
[\[102b.6\]]ya mtshan skyes so/_/de ma la gus pa yin pas des ma la zas kyi phud bskur nas spring pa/_yum gdugs re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di lta bu sha stag bskur ba'i rigs so/_/des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/_des ming chen la bstan nas/_
[\[102b.7\]]bu mthong ngam/_yum mthong lags so/_/khyod la kho mos sngar bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po'i sems can mi skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig ces ma smras sam/_des smras pa/_yum bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung mi ldan yang rung bdag ni 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes ji ltar ming chen gnas skabs thams cad du rab tu byung bar khas len du ma btub bo/_/de nas des ma 'gags pa la smras pa/_bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bsgo na khyod ci rab 
[\[103a.2\]]tu 'byung ngam/_'on te khyim par 'dug_/des smras pa/_yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis/_nyes dmigs ci mchis/_khyim par mchis pa la phan yon ci mchis/_nyes dmigs ci mchis/_bu rab tu byung bas legs par bsgrubs na/_mya ngan las 'das
