[\[103a.3\]]pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/legs par ma bsgrubs na lha dang mi thob par 'gyur ro/_/khyim par 'dug ste legs par bskyangs na lha dang mi thob bo/_/ma bskyangs na sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'thob bo/_/yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs 
[\[103a.4\]]gang lags pa de ni khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon lags pas de bas na khyim na gnas pa mi 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu 'byung ngo /_/des smras pa/_bu legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/ma 'gags pa'i ne'u zla shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de de'i drung 
[\[103a.5\]]du song ngo /_/de'i tshe shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pi bang len te/_de pi bang len pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur to/_/ma 'gags pa pi bang len pa la byang ba yin pas des sgra ci 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas de sgor bsdad de sgo srung gi mi la smras pa/_kye nang rje song 
[\[103a.6\]]la rgyal po bzang ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig_/sgo srung song nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras pa/_lha ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chab sgo na sdod cing mchis so/_/des smras pa/_
[\[103a.7\]]shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog_/shes ldan ma 'gags pa nang du thong shig_/de nang du zhugs pa dang /_rgyal pos 'khyud nas 'dug tu bcug ste smras pa/_khyod 'ongs nas ji srid lon/_des smras pa/_gang gi tshe khyod pi bang len pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]na'o/_/de mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas des smras pa/_khyed pi bang len pa la byang ba yin no/_/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/_gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'ongs/_ma 'gags pas smras pa/_lha rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams 
[\[103b.2\]]la khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig par bsgo bas de khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig rab tu 'byung ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na kho bo yang rab tu 'byung ste/_gros bya ba yod kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid du gnas thob shig_/de de nyid du gnas btab bo/_/ma la 
[\[103b.3\]]'cha' bas rims bag gi dri can gyi gos kyis bting zhing me tog gi sil mas bkram pa'i mal du ma 'gags pa nyal ba dang /_de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i reg pa de'i nyams su tshor nas smras pa/_ci 'di'i 'og na rdo phre'u yod dam/_de rnams kyis brtag par 
[\[103b.4\]]brtsams pa na me tog gi rtsa ba zhig mthong nas de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/_/ma 'gags pa mtshan mo mi bde bzhin nyal nas nam nangs so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ma 'gags pa ci ga bde bar gnyid log gam/_des smras pa/_lha bde bar gnyid ma log go_/
[\[103b.5\]]rgyal pos smras pa/_ci'i phyir/_ma 'gags pas smras pa/_lha rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting bar me tog gi sil ma bkram pa'i me tog gi rtsa bas lus gnad lags so/_/rgyal pos mal 'cha' ba bkug nas khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting ste 
[\[103b.6\]]ci bya/_mal 'cha' bas smras pa/_lha bdag la dkor bas gtad pa lags so/_/rgyal pos dkor ba bkug nas smras pa/_khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos phog ste ci bya/_des smras pa/_lha bdag la thag pas gtad pa lags so/_/rgyal pos thag pa 
[\[103b.7\]]bkug nas smras pa/_khyod kyis ci'i phyir rims bag gi dri can gyi gos dbul/_tha ga pas smras pa/_lha snam bu 'thag pa'i 'phro cung zhig lus pa na bdag rims kyis thebs bzhin bgyis pa lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod kyis ji ltar 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]shes/_des smras pa/_tsha ba'i reg pa nyams su myong bas rims bag gi dri lags so/_/rgyal po mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te smras pa/_shes ldan ma 'gags pa ni shAkya skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa yin no/_/de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 
[\[104a.2\]]gyis smras pa/_gzhon nu gal te kho bo rab tu byung na lha sbyin shAkya rnams kyi rgyal por gyur te/_de shAkya rnams la gnod par byed par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag cag thams cad 'dus la lha sbyin spro ba bskyed par bya'o zhes shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de bkug ste/_de 
[\[104a.3\]]nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa/_lha sbyin kho bo cag thams cad rab tu 'byung na khyod ci byed/_lha sbyin gyis bsams pa gal te rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /_shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyis/_de la thabs cig bsham par bya ste 
[\[104a.4\]]bslu'o/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa/_ji ltar 'di'i sgyu mas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang bya'o zhes bsams so snyam nas 
[\[104a.5\]]smras pa/_khyed cag rab tu 'byung na bdag ci ste 'dug_/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bsams pa/_'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yin gyis dam 'char bcug la 'gro ba mang pos so sor rig par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal pos tshig de glegs bu la bris nas grong khyer ser 
[\[104a.6\]]skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig_/bzang ldan dang /_nam gru dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_lha sbyin la sogs te shAkya lnga brgya rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur gyis/_thos par gyis la rab tu dga' ba skyed cig 
[\[104a.7\]]ces bsgo'o/_/lha sbyin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang yid mi bde ba skyes nas/_gal te bdag gis shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan nges par rab tu 'byung ba shes par gyur dang bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_da ni gal te rab tu ma byung na [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yin no zhes rgyal srid 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zad dam cis rab tu byung la bdag rab tu byung bzhin du rgyal srid bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/_shAkya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la blta'o snyam nas des grong khyer gseg ma dang gyo mo 
[\[104b.2\]]bsal/_tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan bsgreng /_dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs/_shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag_/me tog sna tshogs kyi sil mas dga' dga' ltar byed du bcug go/_/de nas shAkya brgya stong phrag du mas 
[\[104b.3\]]yongs su bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo na seng ge'i khri la 'dug go/_/shAkya mo dang shAkya gzhon nu ma ngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang skar khung khol ma can dang /_skar khung dang /_stegs bu dag la 'dug go/_/shAkya rnams kyi 'byor pa la blta bar 'dod pa'i skye bo'i tshogs yul sna 
[\[104b.4\]]tshogs nas lhags pa dag kyang lam po che 'am/_tshong 'dus dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su 'dug go/_/shAkya las su dag gis ni mnyes par 'gyur/_su dag gis ni thugs byung bar 'gyur ba brtag pa'i phyir bram ze dang /_mtshan mkhan dang /_ltas mkhan 
[\[104b.5\]]dag bkug go/_/shAkya rnams do shal dang /_gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pha dang ma dag la bltas nas so so'i shing rtar zhugs te phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na/_shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan sna la byung ba mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong 
[\[104b.6\]]nas de dag gis smras pa/_re zhig 'dis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nam gru dang /_ma 'gags pa la sogs pa phyir byung ba na de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to/_/de nas lha sbyin phyir byung ste/_de phyir byung ba na bya khras gtsug gi nor bu 
[\[104b.7\]]phrogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_'di'i rtags dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar ston pa la 'khus nas dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams phyir byung ba dang 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]bong bu'i skad grag nas de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis bstan pa/_'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la tshig ngan pa smras nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/nye dga' glang po che la zhon nas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na mu tig gi do shal lhung 
[\[105a.2\]]ba dang /_de glang po che las babs te blangs so/_/de yang de rnams kyis lung bstan pa/_'di ha cang 'dod chen ches pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bzang ldan dang /_nam gru dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_lha sbyin la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya po 
[\[105a.3\]]de rnams skyed mos tshal du dus ston la 'gro ba bzhin du bzang pos 'gran cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gal te ngas shAkya rnams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung na kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur/_
[\[105a.4\]]kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur te/_mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag gzhan du sems la/_dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma yin pas ma la ngas thams cad dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu 
[\[105a.5\]]byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge 
[\[105a.6\]]slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams kyi 'breg mkhan nye ba 'khor zhes bya ba de rnams rab tu 'byin pa na skra 'breg par btang nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi skra 'breg pa na de ngom zung gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag la skad 
[\[105a.7\]]'dzer cing dbugs brdzags par skra 'breg par byed do/_/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/_nye ba 'khor ci'i phyir du/_de snying rje rje skad du gcom chung ngu dal bus tshig re nas smras pa/_lha bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]mi phal pa rnams la yang bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba lta zhig_/khyed kyis spangs te gson pa bas ni 'gum mi bsdo'o/_/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/_nye ba 'khor khyod kyis jo bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te/_chog gis mya ngan ma 
[\[105b.2\]]byed cig_/ngas ji ltar mi phal pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas des phyogs gcig tu ras zhig bting nas shAkya gzhon nu rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan gzhon nu dag nyon cig_/'breg mkhan nye ba 'khor 'dis bdag cag la bkur 
[\[105b.3\]]sti byas la bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyis rgyan rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen du ras kyi steng du zhog shig_/de rnams kyis se mo do dang /_do shal dang /_mgul rgyan dang /_gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_rna rgyan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan 
[\[105b.4\]]khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por spungs so/_/nye ba 'khor gyis de rnams mthar gyis skra bregs te de rnams khrus la dong ba dang /_des bsams pa/_re zhig gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang /_'byor pa dang /_lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la/_mdzod 
[\[105b.5\]]dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/_bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba 
[\[105b.6\]]dang /_sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig snyam mo/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la 
[\[105b.7\]]gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byed pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'breg mkhan nye ba 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'breg mkhan nye ba 'khor gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'breg mkhan nye ba 'khor la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]so/_/nye ba 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug nye ba 'khor gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir da ltar gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang /_'byor pa dang /_lang tsho la bab cing chung ma 
[\[106a.2\]]dang ldan la/_mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/_bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing 
[\[106a.3\]]chu bo las rgal ba dang /_sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na/_bdag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni 
[\[106a.4\]]rigs snying por byed pa ma yin/_rus snying por byed pa ma yin/_rgyud snying por byed pa ma yin/_thos pa snying por byed pa ma yin te/_'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni/_/rgyud dang 
[\[106a.5\]]rus la rtog mi mdzad/_/'das nas yun ring lon pa yi/_/las rnams la ni rtog par mdzad/_/gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod na tshur bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dong dang /_khyod bcom 
[\[106a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa/_des khas blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'breg mkhan nye ba 'khor khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[106a.7\]]kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa nye ba 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lags na thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste/_
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nar skra byi ba dang /_snam sbyar gyon pa dang /_
[\[106b.2\]]lag par lhung bzed dang bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang /_skra dang kha spu skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang /_dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra byi 
[\[106b.3\]]snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/_/shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams ni rgan rabs ji lta bu bzhin du 'dud par byed pas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa na/_nye ba 
[\[106b.4\]]'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so/_/de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nye ba 'khor lags na/_ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang 'dud par bgyi 'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba 
[\[106b.5\]]yin te/_'di rgan gyis khyod kyis nga rgyal gyi dregs pa chog la thud cig_/des de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur te/_sa chen po 'di g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun du rab tu ldeg ste/_
[\[106b.6\]]shar phyogs mtho na ni nub phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs mtho na ni shar phyogs dma'/_lho phyogs mtho na ni byang phyogs dma'/_byang phyogs mtho na ni lho phyogs dma'/_dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/_mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur te/_de ltar thams cad kyis 
[\[106b.7\]]rim bzhin du gtugs so/_/lha sbyin gyis ma btud pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin gyis thud cig_/des gsol pa/_bdag gis de'i rkang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis zhes de 'dud du 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]ma btub ste/_der thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lha sbyin gyis bcag go/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis nye ba 'khor 
[\[107a.2\]]la phyag bgyis pa dang sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ni chos nyid yin te/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad/_'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa 
[\[107a.3\]]na sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du bcug go/_/de'i tshe 
[\[107a.4\]]bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i drung du bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' zhes bya ba song nas smras pa/_bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis tshur shog_/des smras pa/_khyod la kAr ShA pA Na lnga brgya yod dam/_des smras pa med do/_/song 
[\[107a.5\]]la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya khyer te shog shig_/de la 'byor pa med kyang de de la lhag par chags pas dus dus su me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs skyel bar byed pa dang /_de de la sdug pa skyes so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bA rA Na sIr dus ston byung nas bud med thams cad gos 
[\[107a.6\]]dang /_phreng ba dang /_rgyan rnams kyis bklubs nas rang gi khyim na rtse zhing dga' ba mang pos gnas pa de bram ze'i khye'u mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mthong nas yi chad par gyur te/_smad 'tshong ma bzang mos bsams pa/_de ring bA rA Na sI'i mi rnams gos dang /_phreng ba dang /_rgyan rnams 
[\[107a.7\]]kyis bklubs nas rang rang gi chung ma rnams dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur na/_bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' su zhig dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur zhes de de snyam du sems shing bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' gang na yod pa'i phyogs der 'ongs nas/_des de mthong ba dang /_
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]sngon gyi byas pa drin du gzo ba yid la bskyed nas smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u song la shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog dag khyer te shog shig_/bdag cag lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/_/de shi ba las sos pa bzhin du dga' bas sems kyi rgyud ngo mtshar gyis bsdus nas song ngo /_/
[\[107b.2\]]de'i gzugs dang /_lang tsho dang /_g.yer ba'i yon tan brtags nas mos shing zhen pas mtshan thog thag gnyid ma log pas nam nangs pa dang mtshan mo gnyid kyis shin tu lci bar gyur nas/_ji tsam nyi ma shar gyi bar du gnyid log nas gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi dus ston gyi ched 
[\[107b.3\]]du me tog thams cad btus zin pa de'i tshe sad nas me tog gi ched du phan tshun song ba na ma rnyed nas/_des shing shir+Sha zhes bya ba'i me tog cig khyer nas de'i drung du song ste tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_g.yang gzhi thogs pa bu pho mdzes dga' ni/_/ma sha phyed med rgyud 
[\[107b.4\]]gzhan snyom las kyis/_/de ring shing rnams me tog rgyas dus na/_/sbyin pa'i me tog shir+Sha da 'di yin no/_/des smras pa/_song la me tog gzhan dag khyer la shog shig_/'dod pa rnams la so sor rten par byed pa ni kun du sbyor ba la sogs te/_de'i 'dod chags 
[\[107b.5\]]rab tu 'phel bas so ka'i zla ba'i tha ma'i nyin par sprin med cing rlung mi ldang bar 'dug pa'i nyi ma phyed kyi dus na grong khyer nas shin tu thag ring ba'i yul dgon pa dag tu mgo 'dren pa dang dkyus ma ngag dbyangs su len cing me tog thu'o/_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du chas 
[\[107b.6\]]pa na de nyi ma'i gzer rnon pos gdungs nas grib ma'i ched du phyogs der son pa dang /_de'i glu'i sgra thos nas tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/_steng nas nyi mas gdung byed cing /_/'og nas bye mas gdungs pa la/_/glu len khyod kyi lus la ni/_/ci phyir nyi ma'i gdung ba med/_/
[\[107b.7\]]mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag ni nyi mas ma gdungs te/_/rtog pa yis ni bdag gdungs lags/_/bya ba bya ba ma yin pas/_/'jig rten 'di gdungs nyi ma min/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni gdon mi za bar bsil 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]bar byed pa'i gtam la mkhas pa zhig yin te/_des na nyi ma phyed kyi tshe 'dug nas me tog thu'o snyam nas/_des bkug ste smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u re zhig bsil bar byed pa'i gtam dag byos shig mnyan to/_/des bsams pa/_rgyal po de ni 
[\[108a.2\]]gdon mi za bar lus gdungs pa yin te/_des na 'di skad smra'o snyam nas/_des bsil bar byed pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs de la smras pa thos nas rgyal po lus gdung ba dang bral bar gyur to/_/rgyal po mngon par dga' bar gyur nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag 
[\[108a.3\]]rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i srog sbyin pa gang yin pa de la lan du phan ci gdags/_lha rgyal srid phyed kyis so/_/de nas rgyal po des smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u de ring rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas thob cig dang /_sang rgyal srid kyi phyed sbyin no/_/de rgyal po'i 
[\[108a.4\]]pho brang du ma la bzang po byin nas de de la nyal ba na bzang mo rjes su dran par sems shing rgyal srid phyed po de yang smad 'tshong bzang mo'i phyir blang ngo snyam mo/_/yang bsams pa/_rgyal srid phyed po de la longs spyod pa'i rgyal po de ci 'dra ba zhig_/ma la bdag gis de srog dang dbral 
[\[108a.5\]]bar bya'o snyam mo/_/yang bsams pa/_rgyal po bsad pa'i rgyal srid gang yin pa des ci zhig bya snyam nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_don ma grub na 'dod 'gyur la/_/don grub 'dod pa ldog mi 'gyur/_/ma grub na ni phongs gyur pas/_/de bas don ni don ma 
[\[108a.6\]]yin/_/ji tsam nam nangs su nye ba na de 'gyod pa skyes nas mal nas babs te g.yang gzhi sa la bting nas nyal lo/_/nam nangs pa na rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u de khug shig_/de la rgyal srid phyed sbyin no/_/rgyal po'i pho nya dag 'ongs pa nam la 
[\[108a.7\]]chen po nas babs te g.yang gzhi sa la bting nas nyal ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ma dad pa bskyed de rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/_lha 'di ni rgyal srid kyi 'os ma lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ci'i phyir/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha nyon mongs 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]mal chen po gya nom pa spangs te g.yang gzhi sa la bting nas mchis nyal ba'i dman pa la mos pa gang lags pa de rgyal srid stsal te ci rung /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag shes rab can de de la rgyu zhig yod par 'gyur gyis khug shig_/de rnams kyis de bkug pa dang 
[\[108b.2\]]rgyal pos smras pa/_kye bram ze'i khye'u khyod ci'i phyir mal chen po nas babs te g.yang gzhi sa la bting nas nyal/_des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal po la rig par byas nas de nas smras pa/_lha gnang bar mdzod cig rab tu 'byung ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_dam zhig bcas te 
[\[108b.3\]]gal te khyod rab tu byung na khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]rtogs pa nga la brjod pa lta na gnang ngo /_/des de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes khas blangs so/_/de nas des zhi ba'i phyogs su song nas mkhan po dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub rtogs par byas nas rang sangs rgyas des 
[\[108b.4\]]bsams pa/_bdag gis rgyal po de la sngon khas blangs pas song la/_khas blangs pa de rig par bya'o zhes de rgyal po'i drung du song nas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag 
[\[108b.5\]]bya bar brtsams so/_/rgyal pos de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_dge ba ci zhes btsal phyir rab byung ba'i/_/bram ze'i khye'us rnyed pa legs rnyed de/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]las kyi rnam smin bskyed pa yi/_/nyer 'gros khyad par chen po 'dir rtogs ltos/_/
[\[108b.6\]]rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi skra mkhan gang ga skyong zhes bya ba zhig yong ba de des mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]tshigs su bcad pas smras pa 'dzin du bcug nas smras pa/_gang ga skyong nga la tshigs su bcad pa de yang dang yang du dran par gyis shig_/skra mkhan gang ga skyong rang gi bzo la shin tu byang ba 
[\[108b.7\]]yin pas de gang gi tshe rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi kha spu 'chos pa de'i tshe de gnyid log par 'gyur zhing se gol gyis sad par byas te/_sad nas kyang gang ga skyong la mchog gang 'dod pa gsol cig ces mchog sbyin par byed pa na des smras pa/_lha gsol ba zhig mchis so/_/gang gi 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]tshe gang ga skyong gis rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa dran par byed pa de'i tshe rgyal po 'dod pa'i gtam la sems kyang mi 'gro na 'dod pa la zhen cing spyod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_btsun mo la blta bar yang mi byed do/_/btsun mo rnams nyon mongs pas myos shing zhen 
[\[109a.2\]]nas gang ga skyong la smras pa/_zhang po gang gi tshe rgyal po khyod la lhas mchog sbyin par mdzad pa de'i tshe lha gal te bdag la dgyes na tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don rgyas par bshad du gsol cig_/rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa de'i don rgyas par rnam par bkrol ba dang /_de skyo ba skyes nas rkang pa 
[\[109a.3\]]la gtugs te smras pa/_lha bdag gis bsnyen bkur bgyis lags kyis khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te rab tu byung nas yon tan gyi tshogs [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]rnyed na nga la rig par byos shig_/des smras pa/_lha bka' bzhin 'tshal snyan du gsol 
[\[109a.4\]]bar bgyi'o/_/de drang srong rnams kyi nang du song ste rab tu byung nas des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis rgyal po tshangs sbyin la sngon khas blangs kyis song la khas blangs pa de rig par bya'o snyam nas/_des rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na 
[\[109a.5\]]ba der song ste phyin nas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas des rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/_
[\[109a.6\]]'phags pa khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs sam/_rtogs so/_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis drang srong gang ga skyong gi rkang pa la gtugs pas sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/yang de'i mas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_tshangs sbyin blo dang ldan pa po/_/'di 
[\[109a.7\]]ru 'breg mkhan lag cha dag_/bzhag nas rab tu byung 'di la/_/lha khyod 'dud pa'i tshul ma yin/_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi mas khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_'di ltar thub pas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la/_/des ni dka' spyad 'di dag spyad 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]lags te/_/blo rgya chen por gyur pa gang lags pa/_/gang ga skyong la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ma gsung shig_/dka' thub zil gyis sdig pa thams cad mnan/_/dka' thub zil gyis 'jig rten thams cad mnan/_/dka' thub zil gyis 'breg mkhan snod bcom ste/_/dka' thub 
[\[109b.2\]]'bar la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ma gsung shig_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de bzang ldan 'di nyid yin no/_/drang srong gang ga skyong zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni nye ba 'khor 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang shAkya'i rgyal po 
[\[109b.3\]]bzang ldan tshangs sbyin du gyur pa na nye ba 'khor drang srong gang ga skyong zhes bya bar gyur pa la phyag byas pa nas rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/da ltar yang bzang ldan gyis nye ba 'khor rab tu byung ba la phyag byas pa nas rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to//_//sdom la/_kauN+Di 
[\[109b.4\]]n+ya dang ril ba'i dbyibs/_/thams cad skyob nor shing rta dang /_/gdugs dang srin bu ki ta ka/_/byams pa'i dril sgrogs bcug pa dang /_/dga' skyong la du btung ba dang /_/snum khur gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can/_/'dul ba 'dzin mchog bgrang ba'o/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan 
[\[109b.5\]]pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[109b.6\]]zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas las ci zhig bgyis na des na bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong kun shes kauN+Da n+yi 'di nyid kyis las 
[\[109b.7\]]tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas dge slong kauN+Di n+ya 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po 
[\[110a.2\]]dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu 
[\[110a.3\]]rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na 'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[110a.4\]]'od srung zhes bya ba byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sIr nye bar brten nas ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs zhes bya ba la bzhugs so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams te/_bA rA Na 
[\[110a.5\]]sIr bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_dge 'dun lnga brgya tsam dong ba'i dge 'dun de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/_sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang 
[\[110a.6\]]gis brgyan pa/_'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes par mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu dad pa bskyed nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di las rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis de 
[\[110a.7\]]ltar gros byas pa las kha cig ni rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/_/kha cig ni yul gyi mthar dong ngo /_/kha cig ni shi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur te/_skye bo bcu drug zhig lus pa de rnams ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs la dong nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las rab 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]tu byung ste/_de rnams de na bsam gtan dang /_klog pa dang /_rnal 'byor gyis gnas so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags 
[\[110b.2\]]su phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de rnams la lha rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de ring 
[\[110b.3\]]du zhag bdun lon te/_de'i bstan pa yang nub na khyed cag 'bras bu med pa'i sbun pa 'bru zhing 'dug ste/_ci rung zhes byas pa thos nas bya ba ma byas pa'i sdug bsngal chen pos gdungs so/_/de nas lnga ni thos ma thag tu ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs las babs nas bA rA Na sIr zhugs so/_/
[\[110b.4\]]drug gis ni de nyid du yid byung bas brtson 'grus brtsams nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/_/phyi nas lnga yang babs nas bA rA Na sI nyid du 'jug par brtsams pa na ji tsam na shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa dag 'gro ba na shing rtas 'tsho ba cig gi glang dag nyam chung bzhin du de dag la 
[\[110b.5\]]des lcag gzer bu can gyis yang nas yang du gzhus te/_de rnams nyam chung bas shi la thug cing 'gro mi nus bzhin du shing rtas 'tsho ba'i sna la 'gro ba dang /_de la dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa/_kye shing rtas 'tsho ba khyod kyi glang nyam chung ba 'di rnams la lcag gzer bu can gyis 
[\[110b.6\]]yang nas yang du gzhus te ci rung /_gal te 'gro mi nus na dal bus 'gror chug la phyi nas song ngo cog_/des smras pa/_bdag sna la shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa dang lhan cig mchi mi nus zhes gal te bdag phyi nas chas na gdon mi za bar shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa 'dis bdag 
[\[110b.7\]]bor nas dong bar 'gyur ro/_/de rnams kyis shing rtas 'tsho ba de las bzur bzur nas mi dga' ste/_gcig la gcig smras pa/_shes ldan dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das te bdag cag lus na 'dis kyang bdag cag la 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]skul ma btab kyis/_ma la bdag cag gis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_thub pa chen po 'od srung gi/_/gal te chos ni nub gyur kyang /_/yang dag sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'i/_/brtson 'grus 'dor 
[\[111a.2\]]bar mi bya'o/_/bdag cag gi ni zag pa yang /_/gal te zad par ma gyur na/_/shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi/_/nyan thos mchog tu 'gyur bar bya/_/de rnams bA rA Na sA ri zhugs nas bsod snyoms spyad de slar yang ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs la dong nas bsam gtan dang /_klog 
[\[111a.3\]]pa dang /_rnal 'byor gyis gnas pa na de rnams las bzhi shi'o/_/gcig cig lus pa de mi dga' ba skyes shing yid byung bas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/_ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs gang yin pa 'di nyid la bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen 
[\[111a.4\]]bkur byas la de'i dge slong nyi khri yang mthong na/_bdag 'ba' zhig 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag na snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa lta zhig snyam nas/_des smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las 'di 
[\[111a.5\]]srid du tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang ma rtogs kyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin 
[\[111a.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa las bdag rab tu byung nas/_der thog mar nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 
[\[111a.7\]]des bdag snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dge slong nyi khri 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]yod pa las dge slong gcig lus pas 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag na snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan bzung ste/_ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs gang na ba der song nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong kun shes kauN+Di n+ya 'di nyid yin te/_de'i smon lam gyi dbang gis da ltar 
[\[111b.2\]]yang bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dkar ba 
[\[111b.3\]]yin/_'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[111b.4\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya la chos bshad nas yang dang yang du rmed par mdzad de/_kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/_bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal lags so/_/kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/_bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lags so zhes gsol pa de'i 
[\[111b.5\]]tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas las ci zhig bgyis na/_des na bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad nas yang dang yang du rmed pa mdzad de/_kauN+Di n+ya 
[\[111b.6\]]khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/_bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal lags so/_/kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/_bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lags so zhes gsol lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong kauN+Di n+ya 'di nyid kyis 
[\[111b.7\]]las byas zhing bsags pa/_tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sIr rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]pa skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na btsun 
[\[112a.2\]]mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na khye'u gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_yan lag gi mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes 
[\[112a.3\]]ming 'dogs par byed do/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha yul dbus kyi yul chos kyis ni gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa lags na de mdzes dga' zhes 'dogs lags la/_khye'u 'di yang gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug cing yul ka shi'i rgyal po'i 
[\[112a.4\]]sras kyang lags pas khye'u'i ming ka shi mdzes dga' zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes de'i ming ka shi mdzes dga' zhes bya bar btags so/_/khye'u ka shi mdzes dga' ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma 
[\[112a.5\]]ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying po dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/_skyed par byed 
[\[112a.6\]]cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/yang rgyal po rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na khye'u zhig btsas te/_gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de 
[\[112a.7\]]nyid kyi nyi ma la bA rA Na sIr yul mi dang grong mi 'thab mo chen po byung ngo /_/de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/btsun mo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/_lha 'di btsas pa na bA rA Na sIr grong mi dang yul mi rnams 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]'thab mo chen po byung bas de'i slad du khye'u'i ming 'thab mo skyes su gdags so zhes btags so/_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin ni chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_gzhon nu ka shi mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]pha chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[112b.2\]]mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag kyang yab 'das na rgyal por 'gyur zhing bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas de pha'i drung du song 
[\[112b.3\]]ste rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/_yab gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bdag khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung lags so/_/des smras pa/_bu gang gi don du mchod sbyin mchod par byed/_sbyin sreg sreg par byed/_dka' thub kyis gdung bar byed pa'i rgyal srid 
[\[112b.4\]]khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs na ci'i phyir rgyal srid spangs te rab tu 'byung /_des tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_nags na shing shun rtswa gyon zhing /_/rtsa ba 'bras bu 'cha' ba dang /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdug pa rnams dang ni/_/lhan cig gnas pa mchog lags kyi/_/'jig rten pha 
[\[112b.5\]]rol 'jig byed pa'i/_/mkhas pas rgyal srid slad du ni/_/gsod dang bcing dang rdeg pa dag_/bgyid pa de lta ma lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu shes par gyis shig_/khyod ni nga'i bu gcig pa sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_bzod pa/_mi mthun 
[\[112b.6\]]pa med pa yin te/_nga shi bar gyur na mi 'dod bzhin du khyod dang 'bral grang /_gson bzhin du lta ga la btang /_gzhon nu ka shi mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_yab gal te gnang na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gnang na 'tshal ma yang mi 'tshal/_phyag yang mi 'tshal 
[\[112b.7\]]lo/_/de na gzhon nu ka shi mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]nyi ma gcig kyang zan gcad pa byas pa nas/_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_drug gi bar du zan gcad pa byas so/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu gzhon nu 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]shes par gyis shig_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/_/rab tu dben par bya dka'o/_/gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' bar bya dka'o/_/gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod ri drung dang bas mtha' dag tu gnas pas mnags dka'o/_/gcig pu 
[\[113a.2\]]dgon par gnas pa yang sdug bsngal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdug pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par bya dgos so/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bya dgos so/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i 'dod pa dag las 
[\[113a.3\]]dben par bya dgos so/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i dga' ba dang /_rtsed mo dag las dben par bya dgos so/_/bu gzhon nu khyod tshur shog_/'di nyid du 'dug la rgyal tshab byos te 'dod pa dag la yang spyod cig_/sbyin bdag kyang byin cig_/bsod nams dag 
[\[113a.4\]]kyang byos shig_/de skad ces smras kyang gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' cang mi smra'o/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis btsun mo dang /_blon po dang /_mdun na 'don la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag re zhig gzhon nu slong shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes btsun mo dang /_blon 
[\[113a.5\]]po dang /_mdun na 'don rnams gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sras gzhon nu mkhyen par mdzod cig_/khyod ni shin tu gzhon pa bde ba bzhed pas sdug bsngal mi mkhyen te/_tshangs 
[\[113a.6\]]par spyod pa spyad dka'o/_/rab tu dben par bgyi dka'o/_/gcig pu nyid la mngon pa dga' bar bgyi dka'o/_/gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod ri drung dang /_bas mtha' dag tu gnas pas mnags dka'o/_/gcig pu dgon par gnas pa yang sdug bsngal lo/_/
[\[113a.7\]]khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdug pa dag dang lhan cig gnas par bgyi 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bgyi 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bgyi 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]'tsho'i bar du mi'i dga' ba'i rtsed mo rnams las dben par bgyi 'tshal lo/_/sras gzhon nu khyod tshur spyon/_'di nyid du bzhugs la rgyal tshab mdzod de/_'dod pa rnams la yang yongs su spyod cig_/sbyin pa dag kyang stsol cig_/bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig ces 
[\[113b.2\]]de skad smras pa na/_gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' dang lhan cig rdul khrod na rtse rtse ba'i blon po'i bu rnams dang /_mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang /_gzhan yang gzhon nu rnams la bsgo ba gzhon 
[\[113b.3\]]nu dag tshur re zhig gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' slong shig_/de nas blon po'i bu rnams dang /_mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang /_gzhon nu rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs sbyin las mnyan nas/_gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' 
[\[113b.4\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu des pa mkhyen par mdzod cig_/khyod ni shin tu gzhon pa bde ba bzhed pas sdug bsngal mi mkhyen te/_tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/_/rab tu dben par bgyi dka'o/_/gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' bar dka'o/_/gnas 
[\[113b.5\]]mal dgon pa nags khrod ri drung dang /_bas mtha' dag tu gnas pas mnags dka'o/_/gcig pu dgon par gnas pa yang sdug bsngal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdug pa dag dang lhan cig gnas par bgyi 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 
[\[113b.6\]]gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bgyi 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bgyi 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i dga' ba'i rtsed mo dag las dben par bgyi 'tshal lo/_/sras gzhon nu khyod tshur spyon/_'di nyid du 
[\[113b.7\]]bzhugs la rgyal tshab mdzod de/_'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig_/sbyin pa dag kyang stsol cig_/bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig ces smras pa na/_gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas blon po'i bu rnams dang /_mdun na 'don gyi bu 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]rnams dang /_gzhon nu rnams rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzod cig_/gzhon nu des pa ka shi mdzes dga' gum na ci rung /_'di ltar rab tu byung ba ni mkhas pa rnams kyis 
[\[114a.2\]]bsngags pa lags te/_gal te de la mngon par dga' bar gyur na gson por de la gzigs par 'gyur ro/_/gal te mngon par dga' bar ma gyur te/_slar yang drang srong rnams las log par gyur na bu'i gnas ni pha dang ma ma lags pa gzhan gang du mchi bar 'gyur/_rgyal 
[\[114a.3\]]po tshangs sbyin gyis smras pa/_gzhon nu dag gal te de lta na gnang bar bya'o/_/de nas blon po'i bu rnams dang /_mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang /_gzhon nu rnams gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[114a.4\]]so/_/gzhon nu des pa mkhyen par mdzod cig_/rab tu 'byung bar gnang ste gzhon nu da ni de'i dus mkhyen par mdzod cig_/de nas gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' bcud kyi khu ba'i rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus bskyed de bA rA Na sI nas byung 
[\[114a.5\]]nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo /_/des brtson pa dang /_'bad pa dang /_brtsal ba byas pas 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byas nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/_de shin tu sems can rnams la brtse ba dang ldan par gyur nas/_de'i 
[\[114a.6\]]byams pa des ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdug pa rnams kyang bsti gnas su 'dris par gyur te/_gnod pa mi byed pas de'i ming bzod pa smra ba bzod pa smra ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin shi nas 'thab mo skyes rgyal srid la bzhag ste/_de chos dang chos 
[\[114a.7\]]ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/drang srong bzod pa smra bas smras pa/_mkhan po bdag gi lus ni kha zas dang btung bas bskyed pas dgon pa'i sman gyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thog gis grong mthar gnas su mchi lags so/_/des smras pa/_bu grong ngam dgon par gnas 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]kyang rung ste/_drang srong rnams ni dbang po rnams srung bar byed kyis/_song la bA rA Na sI'i nye 'khor du song nas lo ma dang 'dab ma'i spyil bu byos la gnas par gyis shig_/de mkhan po las lung thob nas bA rA Na sIr song ste/_zhi ba'i gnas btsal ba'i phyir phan tshun du rgyu zhing 
[\[114b.2\]]rim gyis pha'i skyed mos tshal du song ste/_des der gnas btsal ba las zhi ba'i phyogs shig mthong nas de de na gnas so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'thab mo skyes so ga'i dus la bab pa na nags tshang tshing me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung 
[\[114b.3\]]dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_shang shang te'u rnams kyang skad 'byin pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi sa gzhir btsun mo dang lhan cig dong nas des skyed mos tshal der bde ba nyams su myong bas dub par gyur te gnyid log pa dang /_bud med ni me tog dang 
[\[114b.4\]]'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas skyed mos tshal de nyid nas phan tshun du rgyu bar brtsams pa las/_ci tsam na drang srong bzod pa smra ba spyod lam zhi bas mtha' gcig na 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bla mar bya ba'i sems bskyed nas drang srong de la phyag byas te bskor nas 'khod 
[\[114b.5\]]do/_/drang srong bzod pa smra bas bud med rnams mthong nas lhag par spyod lam zhi bas chos bshad par brtsams so/_/ji tsam na rgyal po 'thab mo skyes gnyid kyi snyoms pas dub pa las sangs pa na/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med ma mthong nas/_des ral gri blangs te 
[\[114b.6\]]btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med btsal bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na drang srong bzod pa smra ba bskor nas 'khod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang phrag dog bskyed de/_bdag nyid khros pa'i kun nas dkris pa'i rang bzhin gyis drang srong de'i drung du song ba dang /_btsun 
[\[114b.7\]]mo'i tshogs kyis de khros pa'i gnas skabs mthong nas skrag ste byer ro/_/rgyal po snyems pa can gyis bzod pa smra ba la smras pa/_kye nang rje khyod su zhig des smras pa/_bzod pa smra ba'o/_/rgyal po 'thab mo skyes kyis smras pa/_kho bo 'khrugs pa la yang bzod pa 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]smra bar bdag nyid khas 'che ba yin nam/_da ni khyod bzod pa smra ba yin nam ma yin shes par bya'o zhes des de'i lag pa gnyis bcad nas yang dris pa/_khyod su yin/_des smras pa/_bzod pa smra ba'o/_/des de'i rkang pa bcad cing yan lag dang nying lag 
[\[115a.2\]]rnams kyang bcad pa dang /_des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_gal te bdag gi lus la ni/_/til 'bru tsam du gtub pa yi/_/lus ni phye ma brgyar gtubs nas/_/sa la gtor kyang bzod mi spong /_/gang phyir bdag gis byams dge ba'i/_/sems ni rtag tu goms 
[\[115a.3\]]byas pas/_/bu sdug lta bu'i skye bo la/_/bzod pa de gtong spro ba med/_/ces tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs de lta bus tshor ba bsal nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_ji ltar rgyal po 'di nyon mongs pa la zhen pa'i blos bdag la yang dang yang du rmas nas yan lag dang 
[\[115a.4\]]nying lag rnams gtubs pa de bzhin du bdag bzod pa dang des pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag nyid kyi nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams bcom nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/_de la shes rab kyi 
[\[115a.5\]]ral gris yang dang yang du rmed cing thog mar de'i nyon mongs pa gcod par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de nas bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yin pas bsams pa/_rgyal po sdig can 'dis drang srong 'di nyes pa med cing gnod pa ma byas par rkang pa dang lag pa dang phral te bor 
[\[115a.6\]]gyis/_ci nas kyang bdag gis 'di la gnod par bya'o snyam du rig nas khro ba drag po'i kun nas dkris pas bzod pa smra ba'i mdun du 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_'thab skyes bu dang bu mor bcas/_/gnyen gyi tshogs bcas grong khyer dang /_/ljongs bcas 'jig 
[\[115a.7\]]rten 'tsho ba kun/_/thal bar bgyi yis bka' stsol cig_/des slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang gis bdag lus lag pa rkang pa dang /_/sna dang phral nas ma rung byas gyur pa/_/de la'ang sdig pa cung zad mi 'dod na/_/nyes med 'gro ba rnams la smos ci dgos/_
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]de nas bA rA Na sI'i lha gang yin pa des yams kyi nad dang /_byi ba dang /_bye ba dang /_ne tso rnams btang zhing lhas char ma phab pas skye bo'i tshogs rnams shi bar gyur to/_/rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir lha char mi 'bebs shing 
[\[115b.2\]]byi ba dang /_bye ba dang /_ne tso rnams rab tu mang por gyur la skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyang shi bar gyur/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha dang drang srong bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang lags pa'i lha de rab tu 'khrugs te/_de 'khrugs pas des yams kyi nad 'di 
[\[115b.3\]]btang lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_ltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gtor ma dang /_me tog phreng dang /_yo byad rnams kyis lha rab tu 'khrugs pa mnyes par 'gyur bas gtor ma dang /_me tog phreng dang /_yo 
[\[115b.4\]]byad rnams sbyar la lha dang drang srong de la yang bzod pa gsol bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal pos bA rA Na sIr dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig_/skyed mos tshal na gnas pa'i lha drang srong bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad pa des 
[\[115b.5\]]yams kyi nad btang zhing des char mi 'bebs pa dang /_byi ba dang /_bye ba dang /_ne tso rnams rab tu mang por byas te skye bo'i tshogs kyang shi bar gyur gyis/_yams kyi nad de nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir khyed cag sang gtor ma dang /_me tog phreng dang /_yo byad rnams dang 
[\[115b.6\]]chas te skyed mos tshal der deng la mchod pa byos shig_/skye bo'i tshogs kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtor ma dang /_me tog phreng dang /_yo byad rnams sta gon byas te skyed mos tshal der rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang lhan cig tu dong ngo /_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos lha de 
[\[115b.7\]]la brten nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa dag byin nas lha'i gnas su mchod pa chen po byas te lha de la yang bzod par gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po drang srong bzod pa smra ba'i drung du song nas rkang pa la gtugs te bzod pa 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]gsol bar brtsams pa/_drang srong chen po bdag gis yul zhig la lhag par zhen pas khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa'i blo gros kyis khyod la gnod pa bgyis pa bzod par gsol lo/_/bzod pa smra bas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bzod do/_/sus 'tshal/_
[\[116a.2\]]des tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_lus la mtshon gyis 'debs pa na'ang /_/bdag ni sems can kun la byams/_/gal te khyod yid mi ches na/_/bdag gi khrag 'dzag pa la ltos/_/de'i khrag 'o ma'i thigs par 'dzag pa'i cho 'phrul rgyal po sdig pa'i las byed 
[\[116a.3\]]pa de la bstan na/_'on kyang yid ches par ma gyur nas des yang smras pa/_drang srong chen po bzod par gsol lo/_/rgyal po chen po bzod do/_/sus 'tshal/_de nas byang chub sems dpas yan lag dang nying lag gtubs pa'i gnas rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas 
[\[116a.4\]]bden pa gsol ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rgyal po khyod kyis bdag gi lus/_/gtubs kyang shin tu phra ba yi/_/zhe sdang 'di ltar yod min na/_/bdag lus ji ltar sngon bzhin shog_/des bden pa'i tshig gsol bas lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/_/
[\[116a.5\]]de nas rgyal po ya mtshan gyis mig phye nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_kye ma'o chos la legs gnas pas/_/kye ma brtul zhugs 'di grub ste/_/lus la gtub par byed pa na/_/khyod la mi dga' ci yang med/_/rgyal po 'thab mo skyes btsun mo dang /_blon po 
[\[116a.6\]]dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi dang bcas pas drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te dong ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong bzod pa smra ba gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/rgyal po 'thab mo skyes gang yin pa de ni dge slong kauN+Di n+ya 'di nyid 
[\[116a.7\]]yin te/_ngas de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing smon lam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gis de la yang nas yang du rmed cing nyon mongs pa gcod par gyur cig ces btab pa'i smon lam gang yin pa de'i dbang gis/_da ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos bshad nas yang 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]nas yang du smras so/_/dge slong dag da lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha brgyad khri chos kyi ros yang dag 
[\[116b.2\]]par bsdus bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lha brgyad khri chos kyi ros yang dag par bsdus te bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod 
[\[116b.3\]]pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di rnams tshong pa brgyad khrir gyur pa na zang zing gis yang dag par bsdus nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bkod pa 
[\[116b.4\]]de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ded dpon gnyis zhig byung ste/_thams cad skyob dang /_legs grub ces bya ste/_re re la yang tshong pa'i 'khor bzhi khri bzhi khri yod do/_/de la legs grub nges par 'byung ba la mngon par dga' nas de drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab 
[\[116b.5\]]tu byung ste/_des mtha' gcig tu brtson 'grus la gnas nas mkhan po dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/_/de'i tshong pa de rnams ded dpon ma mthong nas phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams pa na/_gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad du ma rnyed pa de'i tshe ded 
[\[116b.6\]]dpon thams cad skyob kyi drung du dong nas smras pa/_ded dpon ded dpon des ni bdag cag la ma bltas par mchis te/_bdag cag gis btsal na yang ma rnyed na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_des smras pa/_yi blong bar ma byed par 'khod cig ded dpon de btsal lo/_/
[\[116b.7\]]de nas ded dpon thams cad skyo ba tshong pa brgyad khris yongs su bskor nas/_ded dpon legs grub skyed mos tshal dang /_'dug gnas dang /_dka' thub kyi nags su btsal bar brtsams pa na des de mthong nas dris pa/_khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshong pa rnams spangs te rab 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]tu byung /_bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos 'chad kyis/_ngag gis ma yin pas ded dpon 'khor dang bcas pa de la 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul gyis dad par byas so/_/des tshong pa brgyad khri po de 
[\[117a.2\]]zang zing gis bsdu bas bsdus nas smras pa/_'di'i phyir bya ba byos shig_/'di la bya ba byas na gdon mi za bar 'bras bu smin par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams kyis de la bya ba rnam pa du ma byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon thams cad 
[\[117a.3\]]skyob gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/tshong pa brgyad khri po gang yin pa de dag ni lha brgyad khri po 'di dag nyid yin te/_de na yang ngas zang zing gis nye bar bsdus nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bkod do/_/'di dag da ltar yang ngas chos kyi ros yang dag 
[\[117a.4\]]par bsdus nas bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod do/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dkar ba yin la/_'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas 
[\[117a.5\]]zhes bya ba nas dge slong khyod kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnams bgo bsha' mdzad 
[\[117a.6\]]nas/_dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te dam pa'i chos kyi 
[\[117a.7\]]ros tshim par mdzad pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/_zhe sdang dang bral/_gti mug dang bral zhing /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te/_ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te dam pa'i chos 
[\[117b.2\]]kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/_'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/_zhe sdang dang bcas/_gti mug dang bcas shing /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba 
[\[117b.3\]]dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol te/_ded dpon du gyur pa na lnga po dag 'brog dgon pa'i lam du chu med pas srog dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dog pa nyam nga ba thob pa na lha rnams la bden pa gsol nas dbang phyug chen pos char phab pa'i 
[\[117b.4\]]chus tshim par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ded dpon thams cad skyob ces bya ba tshong pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu tshong byed cing 'brog dgon pa'i lam chu chung ba zhig tu zhugs nas rim gyis 'bigs byed ces bya ba'i dgon par phyin pa dang /_tshong 
[\[117b.5\]]pa de rnams der chu thams cad kyi thams cad du zad nas chu dang bral yang mnags te dong ba las/_tshong pa lnga tsam chu ma rnyed pas lhag par yi blong bar gyur pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de dag ded dpon thams cad skyob kyis mthong nas snying rjes sems bskyod pas kha gyen du bltas te lha rnams 
[\[117b.6\]]la gsol ba bya bar brtsams pa/_zhi ba dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_khyab 'jug la sogs pa lha shes ldan dag gson cig_/bdag sems can rnams la mnyam par sems pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 
[\[117b.7\]]'dis dbang phyug chen po'i lhas char 'bebs par gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa'i mthus dbang phyug chen po'i gnas g.yos pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa/_su zhig gis dbang phyug chen 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]po'i gnas g.yos par byas snyam na/_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin par mthong nas des dbang phyug chen po'i char gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag phab ste/_des tshong pa de rnams tshim par byas nas 'brog dgon pa'i lam nas bsgral to/_/dge slong de ci snyam du sems/_
[\[118a.2\]]de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon thams cad skyob gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/tshong pa lnga po chu dang bral bas lhag par yi blong par gyur pa de dag ni lnga sde'i dge slong 'di dag yin te/_de na yang ngas 'di dag chus tshim par byas nas 'brog dgon pa nas bsgral to/_/da ltar yang ngas 'di dag 
[\[118a.3\]]dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par byas nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bsgral to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton nas dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad 
[\[118a.4\]]pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton nas dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po 
[\[118a.5\]]che rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/_zhe sdang dang bral/_gti mug dang bral zhing /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 
[\[118a.6\]]'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te/_ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te/_
[\[118a.7\]]dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/_'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/_zhe sdang dang bcas/_gti mug dang bcas shing /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol te/_ded dpon du gyur pa na rang gi srog yongs su btang nas 'di dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bton te rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' byas pa gang yin pa 
[\[118b.2\]]de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba na ded dpon nor gyi shing rta zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_de tshong pa lnga zhig dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por dong ba na de rnams dang ded dpon des phan tshun bshes pa'i gtam smra bar byed pas mdza' bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na mthar gyis rgya mtsho'i 
[\[118b.3\]]'gram du phyin nas gru so so sta gon byas nas 'jug pa'i tshe de rnams kyis ded dpon nor gyi shing rta la smras pa/_ded dpon bdag cag ni khyod dang bral na dga' bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta na 'dir zhugs shig dang gru dor ro/_/de rnams der zhugs pa 
[\[118b.4\]]dang rlung langs nas skrag par gyur to/_/nor gyi shing rtas smras pa/_shes ldan dag ma 'jigs shig_/gang gi tshe gru zhig par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi mgul du 'jus shig dang /_bdag gis khyed cag gdon to/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi 
[\[118b.5\]]gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin pas des ni rin po che chen po la 'os pa dag mchan khung du btags nas gru zhig pa na de rnams ded dpon de'i mgul du 'jus nas/_des de rnams lus du bcing srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin par byas so/_/de rnams 
[\[118b.6\]]skam la phyin te de btang ba dang /_de dbugs gtan chad nas shi'o/_/de rnams kyis de chu nas skam la phyung ba dang /_ji tsam na mchan khung na rin po che chen po la 'os pa dag mthong nas de rnams kyis de khyer te dong ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon 
[\[118b.7\]]nor gyi shing rta gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/tshong pa de rnams ni dge slong lnga po 'di dag nyid yin te/_de na yang ngas 'di dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bton te rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' byas so/_/da ltar ngas 'di dag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton nas dbang po dang /_
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' byas so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa/_yang gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya rgan pa'i ngang la 'dug pa de'i tshe 'khor la gdugs lta bur 
[\[119a.2\]]byas te 'dug go/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor la gdugs lta bur bgyis te mchis lags/_
[\[119a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong kun shes kauN+Di n+ya 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag 
[\[119a.4\]]sdums byed ces bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_
[\[119a.5\]]rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa las ji tsam na ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab bo zhes bstan to/_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis rang gi yul du dril sgrogs su bcug 
[\[119a.6\]]pa/_nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong mi dag nyon cig_/ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab bo zhes bstan gyis/_de la khyed cag las lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang btung ba yod pa de dag ni nga'i yul na gnas par gyis shig_/gzhan ni phyogs 
[\[119a.7\]]sna tshogs su deng la lo bcu gnyis 'das nas slar shog shig_/de nas khyim bdag sdums byed kyis mngan la smras pa/_kye nang rje bang mdzod na bdag 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang btung ba dag yod dam/_des smras pa/_dpon po mchis so/_/de nas 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]khyim bdag sdums byed 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'dug go/_/skye bo'i tshogs ni kun du dong ngo /_/mu ge chen po nyam nga ba/_dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung ba la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba med pa na rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la 
[\[119b.2\]]snying brtse ba can/_bas mtha'i gnas mal brten pa/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas de'i tshe bA rA Na sI dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bsti gnas zhig tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas so/_/gang gi tshe mu ge'i dus kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs 
[\[119b.3\]]su rung bas skye bo'i tshogs skrag nas kun du dong ba de'i tshe de rnams kyi bsod snyoms chad nas de dag thams cad 'dus te khyim bdag sdums byed gang na ba der dong nas smras pa/_khyim bdag kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la bsod snyoms rgyun du sbyor ram/_des smras pa/_
[\[119b.4\]]mngan la rmas te bgyi'o zhes des mngan byed pa'i mi la smras pa/_kye nang rje bdag cag gi bang mdzod na bdag cag dang rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po gang yin pa 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang btung ba yod dam/_des smras pa/_dpon po mchis so/_/de nas rang 
[\[119b.5\]]sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la khas blangs so/_/khyim bdag sdums byed kyis rab tu byung ba lnga brgya'i bsod snyoms sbyar to zhes rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gzhan dag gis thos nas khyim bdag sdums byed kyi drung du dong ste phyin nas khyim bdag sdums byed la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[119b.6\]]so/_/khyim bdag kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la bsod snyoms kun du sbyor ram/_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag phul lags bzhin du yang bslang ci 'tshal/_khyim bdag de rnams kyang gzhan yin la bdag cag kyang gzhan yin no/_/des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[119b.7\]]pa gal te de lta na mngan la smras te bgyi'o zhes des mngan byed pa'i mi la smras pa/_kye nang rje bdag cag gi bang mdzod na bdag cag dang rab tu byung ba stong po gang yin pa 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang /_btung ba yod dam/_des smras pa/_dpon po 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]mchis so/_/der rang sangs rgyas de rnams la smras pa/_'phags pa rnams bzhugs shig khyed kyi gdugs tshod kyi dus gang lags/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag nyi ma phyed ma yol bar ro/_/de nas khyim bdag sdums byed kyis sbyin gtong 
[\[120a.2\]]gi khang pa rtsig tu bcug nas sbyin gtong gi zhal ta byed pa'i mi dang dus tshod sbron pa yang bzhag nas de rnams nyi ma re re zhing lhags nas zas kyi bya ba byed do/_/dgra bcom pa stong po de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa de lhag par mdzes pa mgo gdugs ltar 'dug 
[\[120a.3\]]pas 'khor de la gdugs ltar byas te gnas so/_/khyim bdag sdums byed kyi bu mos dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan de'i mgo gdugs ltar 'dug cing kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par mthong nas kyang lhag par dad pa skyes so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drol bab pa dang 
[\[120a.4\]]lhas char dbab par brtsams so/_/de nas bu mo des dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi spyi bor gdugs bzung nas zan zos zin pa dang /_rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar 'phags pa 'di yon tan gyi tshogs ci 'dra ba'i rnam pa 'di 
[\[120a.5\]]lta bu dag thob pas 'di 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas pa de bzhin du bdag kyang 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_khyim bdag sdums byed kyi bu mo gang yin pa de dge slong kun shes kauN+Di n+ya 'di nyid 
[\[120a.6\]]yin te/_de na 'di gzhon nu mar gyur pa na rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gdugs bzung nas smon lam du yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob nas 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/des na da ltar nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[120a.7\]]spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas kyang 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag de lta bu la khyed kyis bslab par bya'o zhes 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la brten nas lha brgyad khri dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus 
[\[120b.2\]]pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la brten nas lha brgyad khri dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang gi phyir da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/_zhe sdang dang bral/_
[\[120b.3\]]gti mug dang bral zhing /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te ye shes 
[\[120b.4\]]dang shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la brten te lha brgyad khri dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/_'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/_zhe sdang dang bcas/_gti mug dang bcas shing /_skye ba dang /_rga ba 
[\[120b.5\]]dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su ma grol te/_dud 'gro byol song gi lus su skyes pa na/_kauN+Di n+ya srin bu ki ta kar gyur pa la brten nas srin bu ki ta ka brgyad 
[\[120b.6\]]khri rang gi shas tshim par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas te rgya mtsho chen po'i rus sbal rnams kyi nang du skyes nas de rnams kyi gtso bor gyur to/_/ji tsam na tshong pa lnga brgya rgya mtsho chen po'i gru bo che 
[\[120b.7\]]bsgrubs nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te/_de nas rin po che sna tshogs blangs nas slar log pa las 'di ltar gru bo che chu srin nya'i rigs kyi tshan gyis phug ste/_de na ku co chen po byung ba'i sgra de rus sbal gyis thos nas rgya mtsho chen po nas langs te/_de de rnams kyi drung du song 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag bag tsha ba bor la kho bo'i rgyab tu zhon cig dang kho bos bsgral bar bya'o/_/de nas tshong pa de rnams shi ba las sos pa bzhin du thams cad rus sbal gyi rgyab tu zhon te/_des de rnams khyer nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyogs te chas pa 
[\[121a.2\]]na khur gyis shin tu btsir kyang brtson 'grus la gnas shing snyom pa ma bskyed de/_de lus dub pas de rnams legs par bsgral te mgrin pa brkyang nas gnyid log go/_/de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na srin bu ki ta ka rnams kyi tshang yod pas de nas ki ta ka gcig rgyu zhing song 
[\[121a.3\]]ba na dri tshor te de'i drung du song ba dang /_de nas lus chen po de gnyid log par mthong nas rings pa'i 'gros kyis srin bu ki ta ka'i tshang du son te/_rang rang gi brdas ki ta ka rnams la go bar byas nas srin bu ki ta ka brgyad khri ded de rus sbal gyi drung du dong ngo /_/de nas de gnyid 
[\[121a.4\]]log ste shi ba bzhin du sems med pa la bza' bar brtsams te/_gang gi tshe de'i sha chen po rnams las zos nas ngal bas dub ste gnyid stug pos non pas ma tshor ro/_/ji tsam gnad rnams kyi sha rnams za ba de'i tshe sad na srin bu ki ta ka thams cad kyis lus yog par mthong 
[\[121a.5\]]nas des bsams pa/_gal te lus bsgul lam bsgyur na gdon mi za bar 'di rnams 'chi bar 'gyur te/_srog chags gzhan la gnod par byed pa bas ni srog dang bral yang bla'o snyam du bsams nas/_gnad rnams su phug cing tshigs rnams phral ba na smon lam gdab 
[\[121a.6\]]par brtsams pa/_ji ltar srin bu ki ta ka brgyad khri po 'di rnams la sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas pa de bzhin du bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang de rnams chos kyi ros tshim par byed par 
[\[121a.7\]]gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rus sbal gyi gtso bo gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/srin bu ki ta ka de rnams la lam ston pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong kauN+Di n+ya 'di nyid yin no/_/de la brten nas sha dang khrag gis tshim 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]par byas pa'i srin bu ki ta ka brgyad khri po gang dag yin pa de dag ni lha brgyad khri po 'di dag nyid yin te/_de na yang ngas rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas so/_/da ltar yang ngas de rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad do/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams 
[\[121b.2\]]kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te shin tu mthar 
[\[121b.3\]]thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad 
[\[121b.4\]]nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/_zhe sdang dang bral/_gti mug dang 
[\[121b.5\]]bral zhing /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te ye shes dang shes 
[\[121b.6\]]bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te/_shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig tshe/_'das pa'i dus na nga 
[\[121b.7\]]'dod chags dang bcas/_zhe sdang dang bcas/_gti mug dang bcas shing /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su ma grol 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]ba na/_'di dag la rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la bkod pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po rdo rje'i dpung pa zhes bya ba 'byor ba dang zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang mi mang pos gang 
[\[122a.2\]]ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_rgyal po de yang dad pa bzang ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba can/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/_snying rje'i bdag nyid chen po/_chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa/_thams cad sbyin pa/_thams cad 
[\[122a.3\]]yongs su gtong ba/_chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba/_gtong ba chen po la gnas pa ste/_de lhag par byams pa la shin tu goms pas de nyin gcig la lan gsum byams pa la snyoms par 'jug par byed de/_de byams pa la snyoms par zhugs pa na/_
[\[122a.4\]]slong ba'i skye bos phongs par gyur nas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi rnams su sbyin gtong gi khang pa rtsig tu bcug la dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_lam du 'jug pa'i slong 
[\[122a.5\]]mo pa gang dag ci don du gnyer ba de dag byin cig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_gnas mal dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_
[\[122a.6\]]dngul dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_g.yas su 'khyil ba la sogs te nor mang pos slong mo pa'i skye bo tshim par bya ba'i phyir phung por spungs so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can nas 
[\[122a.7\]]mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin lnga spyugs te/_phan tshun 'phyan pa las bA rA Na sIr phyin nas de rnams kyis ba lang rdzi dang /_lug rdzi dang /_rtswa thun dang /_shing thun dang /_lam gyis 'tsho ba dang /_lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams mthong nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]khyed cag kho bo cag gis mi 'jigs sam/_shes ldan dag gang gi phyir kho bo cag gi rgyal po byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can sems can la phan pa'i bsam pas nyin gcig la lan gsum du byams pa la snyoms par zhugs pa yod na ci'i phyir 'jigs/_de nas de rnams 
[\[122b.2\]]bram ze'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i sgo bzhi rnams su sbyin gtong gi khang pa rnams la brtags te rgyal po rdo rje'i dpung pa byams pa las langs par shes nas dul ba'i cha byad kyis rgyal po'i drung du song ngo /_/song nas rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag rgyal po la 
[\[122b.3\]]byas nas smras pa/_lha bdag cag bkres lags na g.yar zas kyis rjes su gzung du gsol/_rgyal pos blon po rnams bkug ste smras pa/_shes ldan dag bram ze 'di rnams kha zas bsod pas tshim par byos shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag ni sha dang khrag 
[\[122b.4\]]'tshal lags so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te sha dang khrag gi 'byor pa med na tshong 'dus nas chos bzhin gyis rnyed pa'i khrag byin cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bdag cag ni mod la bkum pa'i sha dang khrag 'tshal na/_mod la 
[\[122b.5\]]bkum pa'i sha dang khrag gis rjes su gzung bar mdzod cig_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_gzhan la gnod pa ma byas par mod la bsad pa'i sha dang khrag ga la rnyed kyis ci nas kyang 'di rnams la bdag gis rang gi khrag sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/_de nas dpyad mkhan rnams bkug ste 
[\[122b.6\]]smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga'i yan lag gi rtsa thams cad chod cig dang /_slong mo pa'i skye bo tshim par bya'o/_/dpyad mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_lha mi phal pa rnams kyi phyir bdag cag lha'i sku la mtshon gyis mi 'debs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni bzo'i gnas 
[\[122b.7\]]dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin pas des rang nyid kyis lus kyi yan lag lnga mtshon gyis gtar te/_de nas rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas nas de rnams la de lta bu'i chos bshad de/_de thos pas gnod sbyin de rnams brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bkod do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po rdo rje'i dpung pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag ni lnga sde'i dge slong 'di dag nyid yin te/_de na yang ngas 'di rnams 
[\[123a.2\]]rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la bkod do/_/da ltar yang ngas 'di rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par byas nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te/_shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod 
[\[123a.3\]]do/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/_the tshom 
[\[123a.4\]]thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das 
[\[123a.5\]]pa la bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/_zhe sdang dang bral/_gti mug dang bral zhing zhes bya ba nas ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_lnga sde'i
