[\[123a.6\]]dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/_nga 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas zhes bya ba nas sdug 
[\[123a.7\]]bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_'di rnams rang gi shas tshim par byas nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la bkod pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po byams pa'i stobs zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang mi mang po yod pa rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can bdag nyid chen po sems can thams cad la byams pa dang ldan pa 
[\[123b.2\]]zhig yod de/_ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can nas mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin lnga nyes pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir spyugs nas/_de rnams ljongs de nas rgyu zhing bA rA Na sIr phyin nas de rnams la sus kyang gtor 
[\[123b.3\]]ma 'am/_me tog phreng dang /_yo byad dag ma byin nas/_de rnams khros pas yams kyi nad btang ste bA rA Na sI'i skye bo'i tshogs shi bar gyur to/_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po byams pa'i stobs la smras pa/_lha bA rA Na sI'i skye bo'i tshogs te por 'gum lags 
[\[123b.4\]]so/_/rgyal pos de rnams la bsgo ba/_deng la bA rA Na sI kho nar dril sgrogs su bcug la/_shes ldan dag rgyal po byams pa'i stobs kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa la lhag par rtsom pa'i yid kyis nyin mtshan 'da' bar 
[\[123b.5\]]byed kyis/_de la khyed cag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byams pa yid la byos shig dang /_de lta na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de rnams sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byams pa yid la byed pa la zhugs pa na mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod 
[\[123b.6\]]sbyin rnams kyis bA rA Na sI'i nye 'khor du rgyu bar brtsams na 'jug ma nus so/_/de rnams kyis 'jug ma nus pas glags ma rnyed do/_/glags ma rnyed pas ba lang rdzi dang /_lug rdzi dang /_rtswa thun dang /_shing thun dang /_lam gyis 'tsho ba dang /_lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams mthong 
[\[123b.7\]]nas dris pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag kho bo cag gis mi 'jigs sam/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_mi 'jigs so/_/ci'i phyir/_'di ltar bdag cag gi rgyal po byams pa'i stobs dgongs pa gang yin pa de sems pas so/_/rgyal po byams pa'i stobs ci 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]dgongs/_sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byams pa'o/_/de rnams kyis bsams pa/_'dir rgyu 'dis na da ltar bdag cag gis glags ma rnyed do snyam nas de rnams bA rA Na sI'i sgo nas sgor rgyu zhing rgyal po byams pa'i stobs nam zhig 
[\[124a.2\]]mthong snyam mo/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po byams pa'i stobs phyi rol du skyed mos tshal du chas pa dang /_de nas de rnams bram ze'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas spyod lam zhi bas rgyal po'i drung du nye bar dong ste rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas smras pa/_
[\[124a.3\]]lha bdag cag bkres lags na g.yar zas kyis rjes su gzung du gsol/_rgyal pos blon po rnams bkug ste bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag bram ze 'di rnams kha zas bsod pas tshim par byos shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bdag cag ni sha dang khrag 'tshal lags 
[\[124a.4\]]so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te sha dang khrag 'byor pa med na tshong 'dus nas chos bzhin gyis rnyed pa'i sha dang khrag byin cig_/lha bdag cag ni mod la bkum pa'i sha dang khrag 'tshal na mod la bkum pa'i sha dang khrag gis rjes 
[\[124a.5\]]su gzung du gsol/_rgyal pos bsams pa/_sems can gzhan la gnod pa ma byas par ni mod la bsad pa'i sha dang khrag ga la rnyed kyis/_ci nas kyang 'di rnams la bdag gis rang gi khrag sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/_de nas dpyad mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/_
[\[124a.6\]]shes ldan dag nga'i yan lag gi rtsa thams cad chod cig dang slong mo ba'i skye bo tshim par bya'o/_/dpyad mkhan gyis smras pa/_lha mi phal pa rnams kyi phyir bdag cag lha'i sku la mtshon gyis mi 'debs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de 
[\[124a.7\]]dang de dag la mkhas pa yin pas des rang nyid kyi lus kyi yan lag lnga mtshon gyis gtar te/_de nas rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas nas de rnams la de lta bu'i chos bshad de/_gang thos pas gnod sbyin de rnams brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la bkod do/_/dge 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po byams pa'i stobs gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag ni lnga sde'i dge slong 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang ngas 'di rnams rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas te 
[\[124b.2\]]brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la bkod do/_/da ltar kyang ngas 'di rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par byas nas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[124b.3\]]lo drug tu dka' ba spyad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs nas bA rA Na sIr gshegs te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lnga sde dang /_nye lnga'i sde dang /_drug bcu'i tshogs bzang po rnams btul bas dge slong mang du gyur pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes 
[\[124b.4\]]te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgung lo drug tu dka' ba spyad lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[124b.5\]]dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi sku tshe gzhan rnams su phrin las byas shing bsags pa dang /_tshogs rnyed pa ni zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bai b+hi Ting ga'i grong khyer 
[\[124b.6\]]gyi grong rdal 'byor ba dang zhes bya ba nas skya bo dang mi mang po yod pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_dge slong dag bai b+hi Ting ga'i grong khyer gyi grong rdal na bram ze'i shing sA la chen po lta bu n+ya gro ng+ha zhes bya ba phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba zhig byung ste/_bai b+hi Ting ga'i 'du tang dang 
[\[124b.7\]]bcas/_sa dang /_shing dang /_chur bcas par rgyal po kr-i kIs bram ze'i sbyin par byin nas 'byor pa na yongs su longs spyod do/_/dge slong dag bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu n+ya gro ng+ha'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba pha dang ma'i rigs dang ldan pa/_mo phyogs 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]nas dag pa/_mes po'i phyogs dang /_phyi mo'i phyogs zung bdun rgyud kyis bzung ste rigs la gtam gyis ma phog pa/_klog tu 'jug pa/_gsang tshig 'dzin pa/_rig byed gsum po sgra nges par sbyor ba dang /_shes gsal dang bcas pa dang /_yi ge 
[\[125a.2\]]rab tu 'byed pa dang bcas pa dang lnga po de lta bu byung ba can rnams kyi pha rol du phyin cing lung ston par byed pa/_gzugs bzang po blta na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig yod de/_bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu n+ya gro ng+ha'i bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug 
[\[125a.3\]]go/_/dge slong dag bai b+hi Ting ga'i grong khyer gyi grong rdal na rdza mkhan dga' skyong zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa/_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba/_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba/_sangs rgyas la gcig tu 
[\[125a.4\]]byed pa/_chos dang dge 'dun la gcig tu byed pa/_sangs rgyas la yid gnyis dang dang the tshom med pa/_chos dang dge 'dun dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam la yid gnyis dang the tshom med pa/_bden pa mthong ba/_
[\[125a.5\]]'bras bu thob cing rtogs pa/_lo ma dang gtun spangs pa zhig gnas te/_gzhan du na de gang na chus brkos pa'am/_byi brun ma gtogs pa rang gi lag gis sa mi rko zhing brkor mi 'jug go/_/de nas sa lus kyis blangs nas srog chags med pa'i chus sprus te/_snod 
[\[125a.6\]]rnams byas shing mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas 'di skad ces 'phags pa dag tshur/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag tshur/_til lam/_'bras sam/_mon sran sde'u la sogs pa'am/_mon sran gre'u la sogs pa mtha' gcig tu zhog la khyed cag las gang zhig snod gang don 
[\[125a.7\]]du gnyer ba de long la deng shig ces smras shing des de las pha ma long ba gnyis gso ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la dus dus su bsod snyoms 'bul lo/_/bram ze'i khye'u bla ma'i grogs po dang /_snying du sdug pa dang /_ne'u zla yang yin 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]no/_/de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der song ste phyin nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa 
[\[125b.2\]]dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rdza mkhan dga' skyong la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_
[\[125b.3\]]rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[125b.4\]]'od srung gis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo /_/de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u bla ma shing rta thams cad nas dkar ba rta rgod ma dang ldan pa'i nang du zhugs/_gser gyi khar ba dang ril ba 
[\[125b.5\]]thogs te/_bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te/_bai b+hi Ting ga'i phyi rol du bram ze'i khye'u rnams gsang tshig klog tu gzhug par 'dod nas bai b+hi Ting ga nas byung ba dang bram ze'i khye'u bla mas rdza mkhan dga' skyong 
[\[125b.6\]]rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa dga' skyong khyod gang nas 'dir 'ongs/_des pa bla ma bdag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byas nas da gzod 'dir 'ongs kyis/_des pa bla ma tshur/_bdag 
[\[125b.7\]]cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong ngo /_/des pa dga' skyong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la lta ba thong shig_/bsnyen bkur bya ba thong shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge sbyong mgo reg de la byang chub ga la yod/_
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]byang chub ni mchog tu dka' ba yin no/_/des pa bla ma khyod 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg de la byang chub ga la yod/_byang chub ni mchog tu dka' ba yin no zhes ma smra shig_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de nyid sangs rgyas yin te/_des chos thams 
[\[126a.2\]]cad sangs rgyas so/_/rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa bla ma tshur/_bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong ngo /_/bram ze'i khye'u bla mas 
[\[126a.3\]]lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa dga' skyong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la lta ba thong shig_/bsnyen bkur bya ba thong shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod/_
[\[126a.4\]]byang chub ni mchog tu dka' ba yin no/_/des pa bla ma khyod 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg de la byang chub ga la yod/_byang chub ni mchog tu dka' ba yin no zhes ma smra shig_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de nyid sangs rgyas yin te/_des chos thams cad sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[126a.5\]]de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma'i shing rta'i nang du 'dzegs nas bram ze'i khye'u bla ma'i skra las bzung ste/_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa bla mtshur/_bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur 
[\[126a.6\]]byed du 'dong ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u bla ma 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma sangs rgyas mchog ma yin pa yang ma yin zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/_des na da ltar rdza mkhan dga' skyong yun ring po nas khro ba ma yin/_gtum pa ma yin/_brlang 
[\[126a.7\]]ba ma yin/_gzu lums can ma yin pa des kyang skra las bzung ba yan chad byas so snyam du bsams nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa dga' skyong de tsam bya ba la thug gam/_des pa bla ma de tsam bya ba la thug ces so/_/des pa dga' skyong 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]ci de tsam bya ba la thug gam/_des pa bla ma de tsam bya ba la ha cang thug ces so/_/des pa dga' skyong de'i phyir thong shig dang /_bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u bla ma dang rdza mkhan dga' skyong 
[\[126b.2\]]shing rta gcig gi nang du zhugs nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der dong ste/_de gnyis kyis ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas yang 
[\[126b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bram ze'i khye'u bla 
[\[126b.4\]]ma 'di ni sangs rgyas la mngon par ma dad/_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par ma dad lags kyis/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bram ze'i khye'u bla ma 'di sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos legs par bshad 
[\[126b.5\]]du gsol/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rdza mkhan dga' skyong la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_
[\[126b.6\]]yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab 
[\[126b.7\]]tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u bla mas rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa dga' skyong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gya nom pa 'di lta bu thos na khyod dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par ci'i phyir rab tu ma byung /_
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]des pa bla ma ji ltar kho bo pha ma long ba gnyis gso ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la dus dus su bsod snyoms 'bul bar khyod mi shes sam/_des pa dga' skyong khyod rab tu byung yang rung ma byung yang rung /_re zhig kho bo ni rab 
[\[127a.2\]]tu 'byung ngo /_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bram ze'i khye'u bla ma 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 
[\[127a.3\]]'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_de rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rdza mkhan dga' skyong la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rdza mkhan dga' 
[\[127a.4\]]skyong gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song ngo /_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 
[\[127a.5\]]gis rdza mkhan dga' skyong song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas bram ze'i khye'u bla ma rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/_bai b+hi Ting gar ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas bA rA Na sI ka shi gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang bA rA Na 
[\[127a.6\]]sIr byon nas bA rA Na sI'i drang srong smra ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po kr-i kIs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /_bA rA Na sIr byon nas/_bA rA Na sI'i drang srong smra ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so 
[\[127a.7\]]zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bA rA Na sI nas byung ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kr-i kI la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu 
[\[127b.2\]]dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kI stan las 
[\[127b.3\]]langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi sdum par 
[\[127b.4\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis rgyal po kr-i kI la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kIs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[127b.5\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kIs de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta 
[\[127b.6\]]gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod lags te/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_
[\[127b.7\]]de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi tshogs kyis mdun du bdar nas/_rgyal po kr-i kI'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kIs sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing 
[\[128a.2\]]tshim par byed de/_rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis zhal zas gsol zin te/_phyag bcabs lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas gser gyi bya ma 
[\[128a.3\]]bum blangs te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar gsol ba btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du bdag gis na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi 
[\[128a.4\]]yo byad rnams dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya rtsig tu stsal cing khri dang /_khri'u dang /_la ba dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_dbu rten dang /_gor bu lnga brgya lnga brgya 'jog tu stsal cing /_'bras sog ma'i sbubs su smin pa de lta bus bcom 
[\[128a.5\]]ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid lags na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_rgyal po chen po sems mngon par dad pa de nyid kyis byas pa yin gyis chog go/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rgyal po kr-i kIs lan gnyis lan gsum 
[\[128a.6\]]du yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du bdag gis na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du 
[\[128a.7\]]gtsug lag khang lnga brgya rtsig tu stsal cing /_khri dang /_khri'u dang /_la ba dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_dbu rten dang /_gor bu lnga brgya lnga brgya 'jog tu stsal cing /_'bras sog ma'i sbubs su smin pa de lta bus bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]bgyid lags na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rgyal po kr-i kI la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po sems mngon par dad par byas pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis byas zin pas chog go/_/
[\[128b.2\]]de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rgyal po kr-i kIs 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bgyid pa dper na da ltar gyi bdag 'dra ba gzhan zhig mchis lags sam/_rgyal po chen po yod de/_khyod kyi yul bai b+hi Ting ga'i grong khyer gyi grong rdal 
[\[128b.3\]]de na rdza mkhan dga' skyong zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa/_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba/_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba/_sangs rgyas la gcig tu byed pa/_chos dang dge 'dun la gcig tu byed pa/_sangs 
[\[128b.4\]]rgyas la yid gnyis dang the tshom med pa/_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam la yid gnyis dang the tshom med pa/_bden pa mthong ba/_'bras bu thob cing rtogs pa/_lo ma dang gtun spangs pa zhig gnas te/_de gzhan du na 
[\[128b.5\]]chus brkos pa'am/_byi brun ma gtogs par rang gi lag gis sa mi rko zhing brkor mi 'jug go/_/de nas sa lus kyis blangs nas srog chags med pa'i chus sbrus te/_snod rnams byas shing mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas 'di skad ces/_'phags pa dag tshur/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[128b.6\]]dag tshur/_til lam/_'bras sam/_mon sran sde'u la sogs pa'am/_mon sran gre'u la sogs pa mtha' gcig tu zhog la/_khyed gang zhig snod gang don du gnyer ba de des long la deng shig ces smra zhing /_des de las pha ma long ba gnyis gso ba dang /_nga la yang dus dus su bsod 
[\[128b.7\]]snyoms 'bul bar byed do/_/rgyal po chen po nga dus gcig gcig na bai b+hi Ting ga'i grong khyer gyi grong rdal na nye bar rten cing bzhugs pa na snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te bai b+hi Ting ga'i grong khyer gyi grong rdal du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/_rim 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi khyim gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas sgo 'phar la mi drag par dal bu dal bus brdabs pa dang /_de'i tshe rdza mkhan dga' skyong ni dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir phyi rol du song bar gyur nas/_rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi pha 
[\[129a.2\]]mas sgo 'phar brdabs pa'i sgra thos so/_/thos nas kyang 'di skad ces sgo 'phar la mi drag pa dal bu dal bus rdebs pa'i 'phags pa de su zhig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de su zhig ces smras so/_/ngas de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[129a.3\]]rgyas 'od srung yin te bsod snyoms bzhed do/_/de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa nang du spyon cig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag nang du spyon cig_/phru ba 'di rnams na bshos dron po dang /_rdze'u na sran tshod mchis mod kyi khyod la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa ni slad rol du 
[\[129a.4\]]mchis lags kyis/_gal te bzhed na nyid kyis bzhes te yongs su longs spyad du gsol/_rgyal po chen po ngas byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi dus byin gyis brlabs nas nyid kho nas phru ba'i nang nas zan dron dang /_rdze'u na sran tshod yod pa blangs nas yongs su longs spyad do/_/de nas phyi zhig 
[\[129a.5\]]nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong 'ongs nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis phru ba'i nang na zan dron dang /_rdze'u na sran tshod yod pa zos par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang pha ma long ba gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum phru ba'i nang na zan dron dang /_rdze'u na sran tshod mchis pa 'di su zhig gis 
[\[129a.6\]]gsol/_de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa dga' skyong khyod song nas ring po ma lon par 'dir sgo 'phar la rdebs pa'i sgra zhig thos so/_/thos nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/sgo 'phar la mi drag par dal bu dal bus rdebs pa'i 'phags pa de su zhig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[129a.7\]]de su zhig_/des 'di skad ces/_nga ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yin te bsod snyoms bzhed do zhes gsungs nas de la 'di skad ces/_'phags pa nang du spyon cig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nang du spyon cig_/phru ba 'di'i nang na bshos dron po dang /_rdze'u na sran tshod mchis mod 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]kyi/_khyod la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa ni slad rol du mchis lags kyis gal te bzhed na nyid kyis bzhes te yongs su longs spyad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /_des phru ba'i nang na zan dron yod pa dang /_rdze'u na sran tshod yod pa de dag gsol ba lta zhig_/de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong 'di snyam du 
[\[129b.2\]]sems te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis legs par bag phab cing 'dris par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam du rig nas dga' ba dang bde ba de nyid kyis skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par byas so/_/zla ba phyed kyi bar du yang de'i lhan cig 
[\[129b.3\]]ldan pa'i dran pa lus mi 'dor zhing de rtag tu lus la bar chad med par gnas so/_/zhag bdun gyi bar du pha ma'i phru ba na zan dron po yod pa dang /_rdze'u na sran tshod yod pa ji lta ba de bzhin du phru ba na yang zan dron yod la/_rdze'u na yang sran tshod yod do/_/rgyal po chen po nga dus gcig 
[\[129b.4\]]cig na bai b+hi Ting ga'i grong khyer gyi grong rdal du nye bar brten te dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes pa las nga la der thog mar lhas char phab pas gtsug lag khang zags par gyur to/_/de'i tshe rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi las byed pa'i khang pa rtswa sar pas g.yogs so/_/ngas dge slong 
[\[129b.5\]]zhabs 'bring byed pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed cag deng la rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi las byed pa'i khang pa g.yogs pa'i rtswa sar pa shus la nga'i gtsug lag khang g.yogs shig_/de rnams kyis bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes nga las mnyan nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi 
[\[129b.6\]]las byed pa'i khang pa rtswa sar pas g.yogs pa 'chu bar byed do/_/de'i tshe rdza mkhan dga' skyong dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir phyi rol du song bar gyur to/_/rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi pha ma long bas las kyi khang pa thog 'chu ba'i sgra thos so/_/thos nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/rdza 
[\[129b.7\]]mkhan dga' skyong gi las kyi khang pa rtswa sar pas g.yogs pa 'chu ba'i 'phags pa de su zhig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de su zhig_/de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bo cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs 'bring ba dge slong rnams yin te/_yang dag par 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gtsug lag khang der thog mar lhas char phab pas zags par gyur nas/_kho bo cag rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi las byed pa'i khang pa g.yogs pa rtswa sar pa bshus nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gtsug lag khang 
[\[130a.2\]]g.yog go/_/de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa ni slad rol du mchis lags kyis/_'phags pa dag snoms shig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag snoms shig_/de rnams kyis de bshus te nga'i gtsug lag khang g.yogs so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_
[\[130a.3\]]bam po dgu bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_de nas phyi nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong 'ongs nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis las kyi khang pa g.yogs pa'i rtswa sar pa bshus par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang pha ma long ba gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum las kyi khang pa g.yogs pa'i rtswa sar 
[\[130a.4\]]pa de rnams su zhig gis bshus lags/_de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa dga' skyong khyod song nas ring po ma lon par 'dir las kyi khang pa g.yogs pa'i rtswa sar pa 'chu ba thos so/_/thos nas kyang 'di skad ces las kyi khang pa g.yogs pa'i rtswa sar pa 'chu ba'i 
[\[130a.5\]]'phags pa de su zhig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de su zhig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis 'di skad ces/_kho bo cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs 'bring ba dge slong rnams yin te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gtsug lag khang der thog 
[\[130a.6\]]mar lhas char phab pas zags par gyur nas kho bo cag rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi las kyi khang pa g.yogs pa'i rtswa sar pa bshus te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gtsug lag khang g.yog go zhes smras nas de dag la 'di skad ces/_khyed la bsnyen bkur bgyid ba 
[\[130a.7\]]ni slad rol du mchis lags kyi 'phags pa dag snoms shig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag snoms shig ces smras pas de rnams kyis las kyi khang pa'i rtswa de dag bshus par gyur grang /_de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong 'di snyam du sems te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]shin tu bag phab cing 'dris par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam du rig nas dga' ba dang bde ba de nyid kyis skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par byas so/_/zla ba phyed kyi bar du yang de'i lhan cig ldan pa'i dran pa rtag tu lus las mi 'dor zhing /_zhag bdun 
[\[130b.2\]]du pha dang ma'i lus la yang de bar chad med par 'dug go/_/dbyar gyi gnas der rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi las byed pa'i khang pa 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus char thigs pa gcig kyang ma bab bo/_/rgyal po chen po khyod ni yang dag 
[\[130b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis zla ba gsum du bdag gis na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul na ma gnang ngo zhes sems gzhan du 'gyur gyi/_rdza mkhan dga' skyong ni las byed pa'i khang pa g.yogs 
[\[130b.4\]]pa'i rtswa sar pa bshus kyang sems gzhan du ma gyur to/_/btsun pa rdza mkhan dga' skyong gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sdum par shin du bag phab cing 'dris par mdzad lags so/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kr-i kI'i 
[\[130b.5\]]sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/_sbyin sreg mchod sbyin rnams kyi mchog_/sdeb sbyor mchog ni nyi ma'i lha/_/mi yi mchog ni rgyal po ste/_/rgya mtsho chu bo rnams kyi mchog_/zla ba rgyu skar rnams kyi gtso/_/nyi ma snang byed rnams kyi gtso/_/steng dang 
[\[130b.6\]]'og dang thad kar yang /_/'gro ba'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/smra ba'i mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kr-i kI la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang 
[\[130b.7\]]dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kIs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gshegs nas ring po ma lon par shes nas mi zhig la smras pa/_kye nang rje tshur shog_/khyod kyis 'bras sog ma'i sbubs 
[\[131a.2\]]su smin pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam khong la rdza mkhan dga' skyong gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces/_des pa dga' skyong khyod la rgyal po kr-i kIs 'bras sog ma'i sbubs su smin pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam po bskur ba 'di dag yin gyis/_de las khyod bdag nyid dang khyod 
[\[131a.3\]]nyid kyi pha ma yang dag pa'i bde bas tshim par bya ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la yang dus dus su bsod snyoms phul cig ces gsung ngo zhes smros shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes mi des rgyal po kr-i kI las mnyan nas 'bras sog ma'i sbubs su 
[\[131a.4\]]smin pas shing rta lnga brgya tsam bkang ste/_rdza mkhan dga' skyong gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa dga' skyong khyod la rgyal po kr-i kIs 'bras sog ma'i sbubs su smin pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam po bskur ba 'di dag yin gyis/_
[\[131a.5\]]de las khyod bdag nyid dang khyod kyi pha ma yang dag pa'i bde bas tshim par bya ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la yang dus dus su bsod snyoms phul cig ces gsung ngo /_/kye nang rje rgyal po rnams ni bya ba sgrub pa mang ngo zhes smras nas len du ma btub bo/_/dge slong dag 
[\[131a.6\]]'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u bla ma gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_ngas dge sbyong mgo reg de la byang chub ga la yod/_byang chub ni mchog tu dka' ba yin no zhes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la ngag rtsub po phyung ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin 
[\[131a.7\]]pas da ltar ngas dka' ba lo drug spyad do/_/gal te ngas byang chub la skur ba btab par gyur na slar yang ngas byang chub kyi ched du bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du bdag nyid dub par byas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag khyed de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gang gi nyi ma la byang chub sems dpa' phyir byung ba de nyid kyi nyi ma la grags 'dzin ma sems can dang ldan 
[\[131b.2\]]par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa de'i tshe btsun mo yang dka' ba spyad pa la zhugs pas grags 'dzin ma mang la zhum par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' ba spyad pa don med par thugs su chud nas ci bder dbugs 'byin pa dang /_ci bder 
[\[131b.3\]]dbugs rngub pa dang /_'bras chan dang zan dron gyi zhal zas mang po gsol zhing /_mar dang til mar gyis sku byugs nas chu 'jam pos sku 'khru bar mdzad pa de'i tshe btsun mo yang ci bder dbugs 'byin pa dang /_ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /_'bras chan dang zan dron gyi kha zas mang po za zhing /_mar dang til 
[\[131b.4\]]mar gyis lus byugs nas chu 'jam pos lus 'khru bar byed pa de'i tshe mngal de yang slar rgyas par gyur to/_/de'i mngal gyi mtshan ma skyes par gyur pa dang /_shAkya rnams kyis co dri ba dang bcas par smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' dka' thub kyi nags su bzhud nas khyod kyis byi phyin 
[\[131b.5\]]to/_/des smras pa/_kho mo'i sdig pa zhi bas byi ma phyin to/_/ji mngon khyod yid ches par bya'o/_/ji tsam zhig na de khye'u zhig btsas te/_de nyi ma gang la btsas pa'i nyi ma de nyid la zla ba sgra can gyis zin to/_/de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 
[\[131b.6\]]'dogs par byed do/_/de'i nye du rnams kyis smras pa/_'di btsas pa na zla ba sgra can gyis zin pas de bas na khye'u'i ming ni sgra can zin du gdags so zhes btags so/_/gzhon nu btsas pa na shAkya rnams yang dang yang du gleng ba kho nar byed nas/_des bden pa gsol ba byas te/_
[\[131b.7\]]sgra can zin bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i bang tshad kyi rdo la zhon nas rol pa rdzing gi nang du bcug ste/_gal te 'di byang chub sems dpa' las skyes pa yin na 'phyo bar gyur cig ces de bcug pa dang /_de pha rol du byung ngo /_/des pha rol nas tshu rol du 'ong bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang /_
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]de pha rol nas tshu rol du 'ongs nas de rnams ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to/_/grags 'dzin mas smras pa/_shes ldan dag ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' las skyes pa yin zhing kho mos byi ma phyin par yang yid ches par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug gis 
[\[132a.2\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te lo bcu gnyis 'das pa na ser skya'i gzhir byon nas nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol/_nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol ba de'i tshe grags 'dzin ma 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gis na bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dbang du 
[\[132a.3\]]'gyur ba'i thabs legs pa ci zhig yod snyam mo/_/ser skya'i gzhi na kun du rgyu mo dbang du bya ba la sogs pa las rnams la shin tu mkhas pa zhig yod de/_grags 'dzin mas de la kA ra ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin nas che zhe kAr ShA pa Na 'di rnams las dbang du bya ba byos la skur cig_/des dbang du 
[\[132a.4\]]bya ba'i la du zhig grags 'dzin ma la bskur ba dang /_grags 'dzin mas sgra can zin gyi lag tu byin nas smras pa/_bu khyod kyi yab gang yin pa de la phul cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis de lta bu mi mkhyen pa dang /_mi gzigs pa dang /_thugs su mi chud 
[\[132a.5\]]pa dang /_rnam par mi rig pa ci yang mi mnga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_grags 'dzin ma la mi snyan pa grag gis de spang bar bya'o snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas lnga brgya sprul pa dang /_sgra can zin gyis sangs rgyas thams cad la brtags nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[132a.6\]]rgan pa'i ngang las bzhugs pa la phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes nas slar yang de la byin te sgra can zin gyis zos so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yon tan bsngo ba mdzad nas gshegs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin gzhon nu sgra can zin bzang po 'brang nas slar bzlog kyang 
[\[132a.7\]]dus te slar ldog tu ma btub bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_sems can 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa yin pas 'dis khyim gyi gnas pas gnas mi phod do snyam mo/_/sgra can zin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal 'tshos pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang btsun mo'i bud med dang shAkya 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]rnams dang bcas pa ngo mtshar skyes nas/_grags 'dzin ma la lhag par mngon par dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas grags 'dzin ma'i mi snyan pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu sgra can zin bzang po rab tu dbyung bar brtsams pa/_rgyal 
[\[132b.2\]]po zas gtsang gis thos nas de bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te gzhon nu sgra can zin bzang po rab tu 'byin par mdzad par nges par lta na/_deng gi gdugs gcig la mchis su gsol cig dang /_
[\[132b.3\]]'di la de'i bar du bdag gis mchod pa bgyi'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis sgra can zin gyi skye bo'i dus ston chen po byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gzhon nu sgra can zin rab tu phyung shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal 
[\[132b.4\]]zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas gzhon nu sgra can zin bzang po rab tu phyung ngo /_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus 
[\[132b.5\]]su bcom ldan 'das la dus zhal 'tshos par bgyis pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang me tog gi phreng bas ngo shes par byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 
[\[132b.6\]]'or na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na khye'u zhig btsas nas des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang 
[\[132b.7\]]mo bdag cag gis bu lon ded pa dang nor 'phrog pa skyes kyis zong thogs te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug tu 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig_/de zong thogs te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las de nyid du shi'o/_/de nas de'i chung mas mya ngan bsang ba byas nas lag 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]las kyi mthu dang gnyen gyi mthus bsnun bskyangs te bskyed do/_/de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na thag pa rang gi bzo la mkhas pa zhig gnas te/_de rang gi bzos thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i rang gi bzos 'byor pa 'grub pa mthong nas smras pa/_
[\[133a.2\]]tha ga'i las ni mchog yin gyi/_rgya mtshor 'jug pa ni de lta bu ma yin te/_der song na tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/des tha ga pa de la smras pa/_ming po dpon po 'di yang tha ga pa'i las slobs shig_/des smras pa/_rung gis de bzhin du bya'o zhes des de la 
[\[133a.3\]]bslab par brtsams pa na de sgrin po g.yer bag can zhig pas des dus thung ngu zhig gis tha ga pa'i las rnams lobs so/_/tha ga pa de ni bzang pos 'khru ba dang /_bzang po gyon pa dang /_kha zas bzang po za nas khye'u des smras pa/_zhang po khyod kyang las 'di kho na byed la bdag cag 
[\[133a.4\]]kyang 'di kho na byed pa las ci'i phyir khyod ni bzang pos 'khru/_bzang po gyon/_zas bzang po la yongs su longs spyod la/_bdag ni mi 'grub/_des smras pa/_tsha bo bdag ni las gnyis byed de/_nyin par ni tha ga pa'i las so/_/nub mo ni rkun po byed do/_/des smras pa/_zhang 
[\[133a.5\]]po gal te de lta na bdag kyang rkun po bgyi'o/_/tsha bo khyod kyis rkun po byed mi nus so/_/zhang po nus so/_/des bsams pa/_re zhig 'di bgam par bya'o snyam nas de khrid de tshong 'dus su song nas des der ri bong zhig nyos te de la gtad nas tsha bo re zhig sregs shig dang /_de'i bar du 
[\[133a.6\]]bdag khrus byas nas 'ong ngo zhes de khrus byed du song ba dang /_des de myur ba myur ba zhig tu bsregs nas gzugs gcig zos so/_/tha ga pa de khrus byas nas 'ongs te tsha bo ri bong bsregs sam/_zhang po bsregs so/_/'o na blta'o/_/des de byin pa dang rkang lag gsum mthong nas 
[\[133a.7\]]smras pa/_tsha bo ri bong 'di'i gzugs bzhi pa shos gar song /_des smras pa/_zhang po ri bong la gzugs bzhi pa yod yang med na gar 'gro/_des bsams pa/_re zhig bdag kyang rkun ma yin na/_'di ni rkun chen yin no snyam nas/_des de dang ri bong gzugs gsum po khyer te 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]chang 'tshong gi khyim zhig tu zhugs nas tsha bo chang btung ngam/_btung ngo /_/de gnyis kyis 'thungs nas tha ga pas smras pa/_tsha bo chang rin ni gya gyus dgang ngo /_/des smras pa/_zhang po sus 'thungs pa de gya gyu byed grang /_bdag gis ni ma 'thungs pas gya gyu byar ci yod/_tha ga pa 
[\[133b.2\]]des bsams pa/_'di ni rkun chen yin pas lhan cig rkun ma bya nus so snyam nas de de dang lhan cig khyim 'bigs pa'i rkun ma la zhugs te/_de gnyis kyis khyim phug nas tha ga pa des bu gar mgo bcug pa dang des smras pa/_zhang po khyod rkun ma byed kyang thabs mi shes te/_thog mar rkang 
[\[133b.3\]]pa gzhug par bya'i mgo ni ma yin no/_/gal te mgo bcad par gyur na ngo shes pas rigs thams cad brlag par 'gyur gyis rkang pa chug shig_/des rkang pa bcug pa dang /_tshor nas rkun po rkun po zhes ku co bton nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos rkang pa gnyis nas bzung nas 'then to/_/
[\[133b.4\]]de ni gcig pu yin pas slar 'dren ma nus nas mgo bcad de khyer te song ngo /_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha rkun po gcig pu gar zhugs pa las zin na/_de'i mgo gcig gis bkum nas 'tshal te mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag mgo 
[\[133b.5\]]bcad de khyer te song ba gang yin pa de ni rkun chen yin no/_/deng la ro mgo rdum de lam po che'i bzhi mdor zhog ste phyogs dben par 'khod dang /_de las bzung ste cho nges 'debs pa yod na de ni rkun po yin gyis de zung shig_/de nas rgyal po'i mi de rnams kyis ro mgo rdum de lam po che'i 
[\[133b.6\]]bzhi mdor bzhag nas phyogs dben par bsdad do/_/rkun po cig shos des bsams pa/_bdag gis zhang po'i mgul nas 'jus te dung mos mi gdab pa lta mi srid do snyam nas/_des bdag nyid smyon pa'i cha byad du zhugs nas bud med kyi mgul nas kyang 'jus/_skyes pa 
[\[133b.7\]]dang /_shing rta dang /_rta dang /_khyu mchog dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_khyi'i mgul nas kyang 'ju bar brtsams nas gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyis smyos par shes pa de'i tshe ro mgo rdum pang du blangs te ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du ngus nas song ngo /_/rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po la 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]smras pa/_smyon pa zhig gis ro mgo rdum de pang du blangs te ji tsam 'tshal gyi bar du ngus nas mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag de nyid rkun ma cig shos yin na/_de ma bzung ba ma legs pa zhig byas kyis de zung shig_/rkun po cig shos kyis 
[\[134a.2\]]bsams pa/_bdag gis zhang po la bskur sti mi bya ba lta mi srid do snyam nas des shing rta pa'i cha byad du byas nas shing rta shing skam gyis bkang ste/_phyogs der 'ongs nas de'i steng du shing rta shing skam gyis bkang ba bzhag ste glang bkrol nas shing rta mes btang ste song ba dang /_me des ro mgo 
[\[134a.3\]]rdum de yang tshig go/_/rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha rkun po gcig po de bsregs lags so/_/sus de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag shing rta pa gang yin pa de nyid rkun po cig shos yin te/_de ma bzung 
[\[134a.4\]]ba ma legs pa zhig byas kyis zung shig_/rkun po cig shos kyis bsams pa/_bdag gis zhang po la dur khrod du mtshun gyi bya ba ma byas pa ni mi srid do snyam nas/_des bram ze'i cha byad du byas nas khyim nas kha slong zhing brgyus te bslangs pa de las de'i phangs sha lnga byas nas 
[\[134a.5\]]dur khrod du bzhag ste song ngo /_/rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha bram ze zhig gis khyim nas slong zhing brgyus te phyogs gang du ro mgo rdum bsregs pa der des phangs sha lnga bgyis ste bzhag ste mchis lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag 
[\[134a.6\]]de nyid rkun po cig shos yin na/_de ma bzung ba ni ma legs pa zhig byas so/_/rkun po cig shos kyis bsams pa/_bdag gis zhang po'i rus pa rnams gang gAr mi 'dor ba lta mi srid do snyam nas/_des thod pa can gyi cha byad du byas te phyogs der song nas des der lus 
[\[134a.7\]]thal bas byugs shing rus pa dang thal bas thod pa bkang nas gang gAr pho ste song ngo /_/rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag de nyid rkun po cig shos yin na de ma bzung ba ni ma legs pa zhig byas so/_/mdor 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]na khyed 'dug shig dang /_ngas de gzung ngo zhes rgyal pos gang gA'i gru'i nang du skyed mos tshal byed du bcug ste/_'gram gnyis su srung ma'i mi dag bkod nas rgyal po'i bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa zhig chu'i skyed mos tshal der bzhag ste bsgo ba/_
[\[134b.2\]]gal te khyod la 'ga' zhig gis bzung dang skad phyung shig_/srung ma'i mi rnams la yang bsgo ba/_gang gi tshe skad 'byin pa de'i tshe khyed cag chu'i skyed mos tshal du deng shig_/de na gal te mi 'ga' zhig yod pa dang /_de bzung la nga la phul cig_/rkun po cig shos kyis bsams 
[\[134b.3\]]pa/_bdag gis rgyal po'i bu mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur ma spyad du mi gtong ngo snyam nas de gang gA'i 'bab phyogs zhig tu 'dug ste/_des der rdze'u stong pa zhig tu chu bskur bar brtsams so/_/gcig bskur ba dang srung ma'i mi rnams kyis rkun po'o snyam nas bsnyags te de dag gis de 
[\[134b.4\]]la thal mo gcig bsnun nas bcag go/_/gnyis pa shos bskur ba dang /_de yang bcag go/_/gsum pa shos bskur ba dang /_de yang bcag nas srung ma dag na re 'di dag ni rdze'u stong pa chus khyer ba yin no zhes bag bor te 'dug go/_/de nas rkun po cig shos po des rdze'u zhig gi 
[\[134b.5\]]nang du mgo bcug nas rgyun phyogs su brkyal te/_phyogs der phyin pa dang de nas gru la 'dzegs nas bu mo la smras pa/_khyod bsad da re sgra ma 'byin cig_/de skrag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_de de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas song ngo /_/des ngu bar 
[\[134b.6\]]brtsams te/_shes ldan dag rkun po cig shos kyis kho mo la dga' mgur spyad nas song ngo /_/srung ma rnams kyis smras pa/_gang gi tshe dga' mgur spyad pa de'i tshe cang mi smra bar 'dug la/_gang gi tshe dga' mgur spyad nas song ba de'i tshe dus na da gang du btsal bar bya/_
[\[134b.7\]]srung ma rnams kyis rgyal po la ji ltar gyur pa smras so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de ma bzung ba ni ma legs pa zhig byas so/_/bu mo de rkun po dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pas sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na khye'u zhig btsas so 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]zhes rkun po cig shos kyis thos nas des bsams pa/_bdag gi bu btsas pa'i dga' ston ma byas par mi btang ngo snyam nas/_des nang kor ma'i cha byad du byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ste zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag lha'i 
[\[135a.2\]]zhal nas tshong rdal du phrog rlom gyis shig ces bka' stsal to/_/de rnams kyis bsams pa/_rgyal po'i dpon po btsas pas des na bdag cag tshong rdal du phrog rlom byed du bcug go snyam nas/_de rnams phrog rlom bya bar brtsams pa na sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po byung nas rgyal 
[\[135a.3\]]pos smras pa de ci yin/_blon po rnams kyis rgyas par smras so/_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta na nga yang des bslus par gyur gyis/_rgyal srid dor ba'am de chad pas gcad pa zhig bya'o/_/snyam du bsams nas/_der 'khor gyi khyams rtsig tu bcug ste/_dus 
[\[135a.4\]]chung ngu zhig bsdad nas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag yul 'khor du dril 'di skad du sgrogs su chug shig_/yul 'khor na skyes pa ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad snyad ma 'dogs par 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus shig_/su ma 'dus pa de ni chad 
[\[135a.5\]]pas gcad do zhes sgrogs shig_/blon po rnams kyis dril sgrogs su bcug nas yul 'khor na gnas pa'i skyes pa thams cad 'dus pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos khye'u de la me tog gi phreng ba zhig byin nas bsgo ba/_khyod kyi pha gang yin pa de la byin cig_/srung ma'i skyes 
[\[135a.6\]]pa rnams la bsgo ba/_khye'u 'dis su la me tog phreng ba byin pa de khyed cag gis zung la nga la phul cig_/de nas khye'u de me tog gi phreng ba de khyer nas skye bo'i tshogs la rtog cing rgyu ba na des rkun po cig shos po de mthong ngo /_/sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni 
[\[135a.7\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas des de la me tog phreng ba byin pa dang /_rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rkun po cig shos po de bzung nas rgyal po la phul lo/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]lha dgum lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag skyes bu 'di lta bu'i dpa' bo ga la gsad/_'di la spyan ras kyis btsa' bar bya'o zhes des bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas de la chung mar byin te/_rgyal srid phyed kyang bgos so/_/dge slong dag ji 
[\[135b.2\]]snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rkun po cig shos gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi de'i bu gang yin pa de ni sgra can zin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang nga la 'dis me tog gi phreng bas ngo shes so/_/da ltar yang 'dis nga la dus ngo shes par byas so/_/
[\[135b.3\]]dge slong dag de lta bas na sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas las kyi gnas pa la goms par bya'o/_/grags 'dzin mas bsams pa/_gal te sgra can zin gyi yab pho brang du gshegs dang /_ji ltar yang slar gshegs par mi 
[\[135b.4\]]'gyur ba de lta bur spyad par bya'o snyam nas/_de nas bdag nyid dang /_sa 'tsho ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes la sogs pa bud med drug khri rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing shin du dri zhim po'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /_bdug pas bsgos pa'i gos rnams kyis bklubs so/_/de nas 
[\[135b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te 'dul ba'i skye bo la gzigs nas pho brang gi nang du zhugs so/_/de nas grags 
[\[135b.6\]]'dzin ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes dang /_sa 'tsho ma la sogs te bud med drug khri gzugs dang /_lang tsho dang /_dregs pa'i rgyags pas zin cing yid la gcags pas g.yen spyo zhing bskyod pa na gser gyi 'og bag lhod par bcings pa mang po 'khrol zhing sgra 'byin 
[\[135b.7\]]la/_'dzum pa'i glu dbyangs snyan pa dang /_mig dang smin ma skyod cing nu ma dang /_yan lag rnams gsal bar ston pa/_bud med kyi tshul gyi steg chos rnams bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gal te gdugs tshod gsol 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]na 'dul ba'i skye bo'i dus las kyang 'das par 'gyur la/_bud med 'di rnams kyang 'dod chags kyis gdungs pas bden pa'i snod du mi 'gyur gyis 'di ltar so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas ma la ngas pho brang du rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 
[\[136a.2\]]'phrul bstan pas dad par bya'o snyam du dgongs te/_shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/_'di lta ste 'chag pa dang /_bzhengs pa dang /_bzhugs pa dang /_mnal ba mdzad do/_/me'i khams la yang 
[\[136a.3\]]snyoms par 'jug par mdzad de/_me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_
[\[136a.4\]]shel gyi kha dog dag go/_/gzhan yang cho 'phrul zung du ston par byed de/_sku'i smad nas 'bar bar mdzad la sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad de/_sku'i stod nas 'bar bar mdzad la sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do/_/shar phyogs 
[\[136a.5\]]la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/_/phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa slar bsdus te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs 
[\[136a.6\]]so/_/de nas bud med de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dag mthong nas dad par gyur te/_shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan snga na 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[136a.7\]]de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas/_gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor yang dag par khong du chud par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_sa 'tsho ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes la sogs pa 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]bud med drug khris rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/grags 'dzin ma ni lhag par 'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pas bden pa mthong bar ma byas te/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ro'i sred pas dbang du bya'o snyam du bsams 
[\[136b.2\]]nas/_rang nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du bza' ba dang btung ba dag g.yos nas bdag rang gi lag nas bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o zhes pa dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la grags 'dzin ma ni rang gi lag 
[\[136b.3\]]nas bgyis pa'i ro'i sred pas dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga sngon 'dod chags dang bcas/_zhe sdang dang bcas/_gti mug dang bcas pas ro so sor nyams su myong zhing ro so so'i chags pa nyams su myong ba 
[\[136b.4\]]las da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/_zhe sdang dang bral/_gti mug dang bral te/_ro so sor nyams su myong yang ro la so sor chags par 'gyur ba'i nyams su myong ba med na/_da nga la grags 'dzin mas ro'i sred pas ji ltar dbang du bya/_dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom 
[\[136b.5\]]thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das grags 'dzin mas dbang du bgyi ba'i slad du la dus dbang du bgyi bar brtsams pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong da ltar gyi 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi ji ltar 
[\[136b.6\]]'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang dga' bar 'gyur bas dbang du byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong rdal med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu dang /_rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig na drang srong dka' thub drag pa rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu dang /_
[\[136b.7\]]chu la longs spyod pa/_pags pa dang lo ma gyon pa zhig gnas te/_des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pas de la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdug pa rnams kyang 'dris pa'i gnas pas bsti gnas na gnas so/_/de phyogs gzhan zhig tu gci ba'i phyir song ba na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo zhig rjes 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]bzhin rjes bzhin du 'breng ngo /_/des khu ba dang bcas par gcis pa de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo des 'thungs nas lces mo mtshan la bldags so/_/sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/de 'byung 
[\[137a.2\]]ba'i dus su phyogs der 'ongs nas khye'u zhig byung ba dang des dri bsnams na ris mi mthun pa'i sems can yin te/_skrag nas gcin rtug shor nas bor te song ngo /_/ji tsam zhig na drang srong de phyogs der phyin pa dang /_des khye'u de mthong nas 'di su'i bu yin snyam pa'i bsam pa la zhugs 
[\[137a.3\]]pa na/_bdag nyid kyi yin par mthong nas des de bsti gnas su khyer te bsnun bsnyod nas bskyed de/_de chen por gyur pa dang mgo la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rwa skyes par gyur te/_de la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rwa 'dra ba yod pas drang srong rwa can drang srong rwa can zhes bya bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na drang srong de nad kyis 
[\[137a.4\]]thebs par gyur nas/_drang srong de dang mthun pa'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur te/_gang gi tshe de 'chi ba la thug pa'i tshor ba skyes nas ring po mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe des bu de la smras pa/_bu bsti gnas 'dir phyogs sna tshogs na 
[\[137a.5\]]gnas pa'i drang srong rnams dus dus su 'ong gis khyod nga la dga' bas de rnams la kun du spyod pa'i chos kyis 'ongs pa legs so zhes brjod pas yang dag par dga' bar bya zhing /_stan la mgron du bos la rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu ci nus par stobs shig ces smras nas/_bsags pa 
[\[137a.6\]]kun gyi mtha' zad cing /_/mthon po kun gyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/_/phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/zhes bya ba yin pas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/_/des de drang srong gi chos bzhin du bsregs te/_de pha dang bral ba'i mya ngan 
[\[137a.7\]]gyis non pas skyo ba skyes nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/des dus gzhan zhig na chu'i don du bum pa khyer nas song ba na lhas char dbab par brtsams so/_/de chus bum pa bkang nas khyer te 'ong ba 'gred nas rdeg 'chos so/_/drang srong rnams ni myur 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]du khro ba yin pas des chu nyung zhig blangs te gtor nas dmod pa bor ba spyod pa ngan pa can khyod kyis bum pa chus bkang ba chag par byas kyis/_de lta bas na khyod nyi ma 'di nas bzung ste lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bebs par gyur cig ces byas pas lha char mi 'bebs par gyur to/_/
[\[137b.2\]]bA rA Na sIr mu ge chen po byung nas skye bo'i tshogs kun du dong ngo /_/rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste smras pa/_shes ldan dag su zhig gi mthus na lha char mi 'bebs/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_drang srong khros pas lags so/_/ji ste drang srong de dka' thub de la 
[\[137b.3\]]bskyod par nus na lha de bzhin du char 'bebs kyi gzhan du na ni ma lags so/_/rgyal po sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /_btsun mo dang /_blon po dang /_gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du thugs mi dgyes/_des smras pa/_drang srong khros pas lha 
[\[137b.4\]]char mi 'bebs la ltas mkhan rnams kyang 'di skad ces gal te drang srong de dka' thub de las bskyod na de bzhin du lha char 'bebs kyi/_gzhan du na ma yin no zhes zer te/_dka' thub de la su zhig gis bskyod par nus pa mi shes so/_/rgyal po de'i bu mo zhi ldan ma zhes bya ba des smras 
[\[137b.5\]]pa/_lha gal te de lta na thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig dang /_bdag gis drang srong de dka' thub de las ji nas kyang g.yos par gyur pa de ltar bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_thabs ci zhig gis bya/_des smras pa/_bdag dang bud med gzhan rnams bram ze rnams la gsang tshig 
[\[137b.6\]]'don du stsol cig_/gru zam gyi bsti gnas me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa bgyid du stsol cig_/des de dang bud med gzhan dag kyang bram ze la gsang tshig slob tu bcug go/_/gru zam gyi bsti gnas kyang byed du bcug go/_/de nas des dbang du 
[\[137b.7\]]bya ba'i rdzas dang chang gis bkang ba'i 'bras bu de dag dang /_gzhan yang 'bras bu rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs byed du bcug nas/_drang srong gi cha byad du byas te/_de rtswa dang shing shun gyon nas bud med rnams dang lhan cig bram ze rnams la gsang tshig 'don cing de'i bsti gnas 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]su lhags pa dang /_drang srong la slob ma rnams kyis smras pa/_mkhan po khyod kyi bsti gnas su drang srong mang du lhags so/_/drang srong rnams lhags pa legs kyis nang du shog shig_/de rnams nang du zhugs pa des mthong nas tshigs su bcad pas 
[\[138a.2\]]smras pa/_brtags pa med par 'gying zhing 'gro ba dang /_/bzhin yang kha spu rnams dang bral gyur cing /_/'di rnams brang ni mthon dman gyur pa ste/_/e ma drang srong cha byad sngon ma byung /_/de de rnams la the tshom gyi kun nas dkris pa'i blos rtsa ba dang 'bras bu bstabs 
[\[138a.3\]]so/_/de rnams kyis de dag zos nas drang srong de la smras pa/_khyod kyi 'bras bu 'di dag ni rtsub pa kha ba bska ba yin gyi/_bdag cag gi chu nang gi bsti gnas de na yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams ni bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba yod de/_'di ltar khyod bdag cag gi bsti gnas su spyan 'dren 
[\[138a.4\]]to/_/des khas blangs nas de de rnams dang gru zam gyi skyed mos tshal du zhugs nas des de la dbang du bya ba'i rdzas chang gis bkang ba dang ldan pa'i na li ke ra'i 'bras bu rnams dang /_gzhan dag kyang byin no/_/de chang gis myos pa dang dbang du bya ba'i rdzas kyi sbyor bas de de dang 
[\[138a.5\]]lhan cig mi tshangs par spyad pas rdzu 'phrul yongs su nyams so/_/char la mngon par dga' ba'i lhas sprin kun nas bsdus pa dang drang srong des bkag go/_/zhi ldan mas smras pa/_da dung khyod kyis bdag nyid su yin pa mi shes sam/_des de'i 'dod chags kyi 
[\[138a.6\]]zhags pas bcings nas rgyal po la phul nas lha drang srong de ni 'di lags so/_/de nas lhas char dbab par brtsams nas lo legs par gyur to/_/rgyal pos zhi ldan ma 'khor dang bcas te drang srong de la chung mar byin no/_/des zhi ldan ma spangs nas gzhan dag dang 
[\[138a.7\]]lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa la zhugs pa na/_de la zhi ldan ma phrag dog gi kun nas dkris pa'i snying gis de la bkur sti ma yin pa bya bar brtsams pa dang /_de nas phar cig tshur cig rtsod pas mchil lham dang bcas pa'i rdog pas mgor bsnun pa dang /_des 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]bsams pa/_sprin gyi 'brug sgra yang bdag gis mnags par mi bzod na da ni 'dod chags kyi zhags pas bcings na bud med tsam gyis kyang brnyas sam snyam nas des brtson 'grus la gnas pas slar yang mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong 
[\[138b.2\]]dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/zhi ldan ma gang yin pa de ni grags 'dzin ma 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'dis nga ro'i sred pas dbang du byas so/_/da ltar yang 'dis la dus dbang du bya ba la zhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom 
[\[138b.3\]]ldan 'das pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol nas phyi rol du byung ba de'i tshe grags 'dzin ma khyim thab kyi byams pa dang bral lo snyam ste re thag chad nas khang thog tu 'dzegs te bdag nyid mchongs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can 
[\[138b.4\]]yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis de blangs so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du grags 'dzin ma khang thog nas bdag nyid mchongs pa 
[\[138b.5\]]la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nga'i phyir bdag nyid bor ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes 
[\[138b.6\]]bya ba zhig byung ste/_de dus gzhan zhig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor zhing rim gyis song ste ri sul zhig tu phyin pa dang /_des de na mi 'am ci pho dang /_mi 'am ci mo gnyis las mi 'am ci pho ni nyal/_mi'am ci mo ni ma nyal ba zhig mthong nas rgyal pos gzhu rna drung du bkang ba'i mdas mi'am ci pho 
[\[138b.7\]]gnad du bsnun nas srog dang phral te/_rgyal pos mi 'am ci mo chung ma'i don du bzung nas khrid de song ba las des smras pa/_lha re zhig gzhes la de'i bar du bdag gis mi 'am ci'i ro la mchod pa bgyid na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_re zhig gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/_
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]de la mchod pa ji ltar byed pa blta'o snyam nas des de la gnang ngo /_/de nas des mi 'am ci'i ro de la shing gi phung po byas nas me sbar te bdag nyid mchongs so/_/lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_mi'am ci mo dga' spyad ces/_
[\[139a.2\]]don gzhan du ni bsams pa las/_/gzhan du yongs su bsgyur byas pas/_/srog chags gnyis ni bsad par gyur/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi mi 'am ci gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/mi'am ci mo gang yin pa de ni 
[\[139a.3\]]grags 'dzin ma 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid me phung du mchongs so/_/da ltar yang 'dis nga'i phyir khang thog nas bdag nyid mchongs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_da ni grags 'dzin ma gdul ba'i dus la bab kyis/_ma 
[\[139a.4\]]la 'di ngas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bsgral bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas de la gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par khong du chud par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/_grags 'dzin ma 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu 
[\[139a.5\]]mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas ji tsam na dgra bcom mar gyur pa dang /_de rang gi rigs rgyud dang mthun par bya ba dang /_'phags 
[\[139a.6\]]pa'i lam thob pas dge slong ma rnams kyi nang du dgos pa byung ba rnams la shin tu 'dzem pa dang ldan no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma rnams la 'dzem pa dang ldan pa'i mchog ni 'di lta 
[\[139a.7\]]ste sgra can zin gyi ma grags 'dzin ma 'di yin no/_/yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa grags 'dzin mas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas mngal du lo drug bzung lags/_
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag grags 'dzin ma 'di nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon 
[\[139b.2\]]byung ba gnag lhas zhig na phyugs rdzi ma dang /_bu mo ma smad gnyis zhig gnas te/_de gnyis dar ba'i bum pa thogs te/_rgyun du grong mthar 'gro ba na/_de gnyis las bu mo ni ngan g.yo'i rang bzhin can yin no/_/ma ni drang ba zhig yin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_
[\[139b.3\]]yum re zhig dar ba'i bum pa snoms shig bshang ba zhig bgyid do/_/des thogs te song ngo /_/de ni ngan g.yo'i rang bzhin can yin pas phyin sdod cing de'i rjes slebs par ma song ste/_de de ltar byed pa na ma des dar ba'i bum pa rgyang grags drug gi bar du khyer ro/_/
[\[139b.4\]]dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi phyugs rdzi bu mo gang yin pa de ni grags 'dzin ma 'di nyid yin te/_de na 'dis ma la ngan g.yo'i spyod pas rgyang grags drug tu dar ba'i bum pa bskur ro/_/las de'i rnam par smin pas 'dis sgra can zin lo drug tu 
[\[139b.5\]]mngal du bzung ngo /_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes 
[\[139b.6\]]nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas lo drug tu ma'i mngal na mchis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sgra can 
[\[139b.7\]]zin 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/_sgra can zin nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po 
[\[140a.2\]]dang khams dang skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed nas lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI dang ha cang mi ring ba na me tog dang 'bras bu 
[\[140a.3\]]phun sum tshogs pa'i bsti gnas bya sna tshogs skad 'byin cing bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dris par bsten pa zhig yod de/_de na drang srong 'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba dang chu la longs spyod pa/_pags pa dang lo ma gyon pa/_dung dang bris pa zhes bya ba spun gnyis zhig gnas te/_dung ni mkhan po byed 
[\[140a.4\]]do/_/bris pa ni slob ma byed de/_de gnyis bA rA Na sI'i 'jig rten thams cad la yang grags so/_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis kyang skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhes bya bar drang srong dung dang bris pa spun gnyis gnas te/_de la dung ni mkhan po byed do/_/bris pa ni slob ma byed do zhes thos so/_/ji 
[\[140a.5\]]tsam dus gzhan zhig na dung gis ril ba chus bkang nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i ched du nags khrod du song ngo /_/bris pa yang de nyid nas nang par sngar langs te song nas des me tog dang 'bras bu dag blangs te rings par 'ongs nas rang gi ril ba las brtags nas chu nyung nas de skom pas nyen 
[\[140a.6\]]pas bsams pa/_mkhan po'i chu btung ngo snyam nas des 'thungs so/_/ji tsam na drang srong dung rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag blangs nas skom pas nyen pa'i rang bzhin gyis bsti gnas su phyin nas ril ba la brtags na stong par mthong nas de mi bzod pa skyes te smras pa/_kho bo'i chu rkun ma su zhig gis brkus/_
[\[140a.7\]]bris pas smras pa/_mkhan po rkun ma ni bdag lags te/_bdag gis 'tshal gyis bdag la chad pas dgum du gsol/_des smras pa/_khyod ni kho bo dang spun yin la slob ma yang yin pas gal te 'thungs na 'thungs pas legs kyis ci bder spyod cig_/des smras pa/_mkhan po 'gyod pa 'di bdag 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]gis bsal bar rngo mi thog gis chom rkun pa la gcod pa'i chad pa lci ba gang lags pas bdag la dgum du gsol zhes de skad smras pa dang /_drang srong dung khros nas smras pa/_kho bo chad pa mi gcod kyis ci ste khyod chad pa don du gnyer na rgyal po'i drung du song shig_/yang de'i tshe rgyal po [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[140b.2\]]'chor ba'i phyir chas pa de la des rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag kyang byas nas tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab pa/_rgyal chen gang phyir ma stsal chab/_/'tshal bas bdag ni rkun ma lags/_/chom rkun gcad pa gang lags pa'i/_/chad pa'i lci bas bdag la khum/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[140b.3\]]chu la ni ma byin par len pa med na 'on kyang su dbang ba'i chu khyod kyis brkus/_des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod dang de spun yin zhing mkhan po yang yin pas chad pas gcad par mi 'os kyis song shig_/des smras pa/_lha bdag gis 'gyod pa bsal bar rngo mi thog gis 
[\[140b.4\]]chom rkun pa la 'gum pa'i chad pa lci ba gang lags pas bdag la dgum du gsol zhes de skad smras pa dang /_rgyal po khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa la gnas pa'i kun nas dkris pa drag pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na 'di nyid du 'dug la re zhig nga slar ma log gi bar du khyod ma 'gro shig_/rgyal po 
[\[140b.5\]]des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bshor nas ched du bsams te sgo gzhan nas nang du zhugs nas phyir yang ma byung ngo /_/blon po rnams kyis zhag drug gi nyin par rgyal po la smras pa/_lha drang srong de phyogs de kho na nyid na mchis nas deng du dgung drug lags kyis bka' stsal pa'i rigs so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_chad pa nas phyung 
[\[140b.6\]]la de'i chad pa ni de kho na yin gyis song shig_/blon po rnams kyis drang srong de la smras pa/_drang srong lha'i zhal nas chad pa nas phyung la de'i chad pa ni de kho na yin gyis song shig ces gsung ngo /_/de 'gyod pa dang bral te song ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 
[\[140b.7\]]rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang yin pa de ni sgra can zin 'di nyid yin te/_de na 'dis sems gdug pas drang srong la phyogs 'di nyid du 'dug la ma 'gro shig ces smras pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ma'i mngal du lo drug go/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po dgu bcu rtsa lnga pa/_dge slong rnams the tshom skyes 
[\[141a.2\]]nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas mi gtso bo rnams kyi rgyal por gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bzang ldan 'di 
[\[141a.3\]]nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas bzang ldan gyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas 
[\[141a.4\]]shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_
[\[141a.5\]]las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba mu lto ba zhig ljongs shig nas bA rA Na sIr 'ongs pa dang /_de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i mu lto ba phrag dog gi rang bzhin can rnams kyis de 
[\[141a.6\]]ltag dbyug dang thag lcag dang /_dbyug pa la sogs pas shin tu brdegs nas bskrad de de bA rA Na sI'i phyi rol na rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal zhig yod pa na gnas so/_/ji tsam na rgyal po tshangs sbyin so ga'i dus la bab ste/_me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang /_krung krung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_
[\[141a.7\]]ri skegs dang khu byug dang /_/shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags tshal stug po'i skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir btsun mo dang lhan cig song nas de skyed mos tshal de na btsun mo dang lhan cig bde ba nyams su myong bar byas nas gnyid log go/_/bud med ni me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]ba yin pas/_me tog dang 'bras bu tshol zhing phan tshun 'khyam pa la zhugs so/_/ji tsam na rgyal po tshangs sbyin gnyid kyis dub pa sangs nas rings pa rings par bA rA Na sIr zhugs so/_/btsun mo'i bud med rnams kyang rings pa rings par dong ngo /_/ji tsam na bud med gzhan zhig rtabs pas mu tig gi do shal 
[\[141b.2\]]bor te song ngo /_/ji tsam na mu lto ba de skyed mos tshal der rgyu bar brtsams pa na/_des mu tig gi do shal de mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_bdag la 'di ci dgos 'di'i phyir gnod par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod snyam nas des de su'i yin pa de len par 'gyur grang zhes/_
[\[141b.3\]]de skyed mos tshal nyid du shing gi yal ga zhig la btags te bzhag go/_/ji tsam na btsun mo rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol pa/_lha btsun mo che ge mo zhes bgyi ba'i mu tig gi do shal skyed mos tshal du lus lags so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag mu tig gi do 
[\[141b.4\]]shal skyed mos tshal du lus pa tshol cig_/de rnams skyed mos tshal du dong nas btsal bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na shing gi yal ga zhig la btags pa mthong nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/_re zhig 'di sus btags dpyad par bya'o snyam nas de rnams skyed mos tshal 
[\[141b.5\]]na rgyu bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na mu lto ba zhig mthong nas de rnams kyis de la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje mu tig gi do shal 'di su zhig gis yal ga la btags te bzhag_/des ji ltar gyur pa de rnams la smras pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la mu tig gi do shal phul 
[\[141b.6\]]nas ji ltar gyur pa smras so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag mu lto ba de bltas khug shig de rnams kyis bkug nas rgyal pos smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje khyod kyis ci'i phyir mu tig gi do shal shing gi yal ga la btags te bzhag nas rang gir ma byas/_des smras pa/_lha 'di'i skal 
[\[141b.7\]]ba bdag la ma mchis kyi lha kho na la 'os pa'i slad du'o/_/rgyal po dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje khyod ni dam pa 'os pa yin pas dam pa gang 'dod pa gsol cig sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_gal te lha bdag la dgyes par gyur na mu lto ba rnams 'tshal ma stsal cing de rnams re re la 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]ras zung re bskon nas bdag dpon por bsko bar gsol/_rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag khyed cag gis mu lto ba thams cad zan byin la re re la ras zung re bskon te 'di de rnams kyi dpon por chug shig_/de rnams kyis bA rA Na sIr dril sgrogs 
[\[142a.2\]]su bcug pa/_lhas bka' stsal gyis bA rA Na sI'i mu lto ba ji snyed pa thams cad skyed mos tshal che ge mo zhig tu 'dus shig_/ngas mu lto ba rnams la zas sbyin zhing re re la yang ras zung re bskon no zhes bsgrags pa dang /_de dag thams cad 'dus nas blon po rnams kyis kha zas 
[\[142a.3\]]bsod pas tshim par byas nas re re la yang ras zung re bskon te bsgo ba/_lhas bka' stsal pa/_deng phan chad khyed cag gi rgyal por mu lto ba 'di bskos kyis/_khyed cag gis 'di'i tshig bzhin du byos shig_/de rnams kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas pa dang /_ras zung re bskon pas yi 
[\[142a.4\]]rangs nas smras pa/_lhas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes mu lto ba de dpon por gyur to/_/mu lto ba rnams ni rang bzhin gyis bkres skom pas zil gyis non pa yin pas tshong 'dus nas bza' ba dang btung ba 'phrog par byed do/_/de rnams rgyal pos bkur nas ni lhag par yang 
[\[142a.5\]]dbrog par brtsams so/_/tshong rdal gyis 'tsho ba'i tshogs 'khrugs nas des rgyal po la gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_khyed cag srung ba la bag yod par byos la de rnams la ni ma rdeg shig_/ji tsam na mi zhig snum khur dag khyer nas tshong 'dus kyi dbus nas song ba las mu lto 
[\[142a.6\]]ba'i dpon po des de la phrogs nas de khyer te phyogs dben pa zhig tu song ba dang /_mu lto ba rnams kyis phyir 'brangs te de rnams kyis de la glags bltas pa na 'bab chu ba ri ka rgal nas shing zhig gi drung du 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /_
[\[142a.7\]]ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin pas/_ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas zhig stes te phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /_des de lus mdzes shing sems dang ba dang /_spyod lam zhi bar mthong nas des 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba ma byas pa des na bdag mi thob na yang mu lto bar skyes kyis/_gal te bdag nyid chen po 'di bdag las snum khur bzhes par gyur na bdag gis de dbul lo snyam mo/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas de'i sems kyis de'i 
[\[142b.2\]]bsam pa shes nas/_pha rol rjes su bzung ba'i ched du/_de la lhung bzed bzed do/_/des de la gus pas snum khur phul lo/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyi ngag gis ma yin pas de steng gi bar snang la 'phags te/_'bar ba dang /_gsal ba 
[\[142b.3\]]dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtong ba yin pas de shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi rkang pa la gtugs nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_bdag gis 
[\[142b.4\]]yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag mi gtso bo rnams kyi rgyal por gyur la/_'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed kyi mi mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de nas mu lto ba rnams lhags nas smras 
[\[142b.5\]]pa/_bdag cag la yang snum khur stsol cig_/des smras pa/_ngas de bdag nyid chen po'i drang srong de la phul lo/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_phul na khyod kyis smon lam ji skad btab/_des smras pa/_mi gtso bo rnams kyi rgyal por gyur cig ces byas so/_/de rnams kyis smras 
[\[142b.6\]]pa/_bdag cag kho na khyod kyi mi gtso bo rnams su gyur cing /_de rnams kyi rgyal por khyod gyur cig_/des smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig_/khyed cag gis ci drang srong gi zhabs la gtugs te smon lam mi gdab bam/_de rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa la gtugs 
[\[142b.7\]]te smon lam btab pa/_bdag cag khyod kyi mi gtso bo rnams su gyur cing de rnams kyi rgyal por khyod gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi mu lto ba'i dpon po gang yin pa de ni shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'di nyid yin no/_/mu lto ba de rnams 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]ni shAkya lnga brgya po 'di dag yin te/_'di dag dang bzang ldan mu lto bar gyur pa na rang sangs rgyas la smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas shAkya lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyi rgyal por gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin 
[\[143a.2\]]pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sgra can gyi drang srong kun rdzi ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe lhung bzed rab tu mang po dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[143a.3\]]kyis lhung bzed bla gab med par bzhag go/_/de nas spre'u shig shing sA la las babs nas lhung bzed rnams gang na yod pa der song ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed rnams bcag tu 'ong zhes de bzlog go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal 
[\[143a.4\]]pa/_dge slong dag spre'u 'dis lhung bzed rnams bcag par mi 'gyur gyis 'di la ma bzlog shig_/de nas spre'u de bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed khyer te shing sA la de la 'dzegs nas sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi'i dngas mas
