[\[143a.5\]]bkang ste rim gyis dal bu dal bus shing sA la las babs nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de srog chags dang bcas pa yin pas ma bzhes so/_/de nas spre'u des mtha' gcig tu song nas srog chags bsal te bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang /_bcom 
[\[143a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis de brtags pa ma yin no zhes ma bzhes so/_/de nas spre'u de mtha' gcig tu song ste chu grang mos btab nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de brtags pa byas so zhes bzhes so/_/de nas spre'u de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sbrang rtsi'i 
[\[143a.7\]]lhung bzed bzhes so snyam du rig nas/_dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_dga' ba rgya chen po dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba byas te phyi nur du gar byed cing phyag 'tshal ba las de bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing rgyab tu ma bltas 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]pas khron par lhung nas shi ste sgra can nyid kyi bram ze las drug la brtson pa zhig gi khyim du skyes so/_/gang gi nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa de kho na'i nyi ma la sbrang rtsi'i char bab bo/_/de'i phas ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_sems 
[\[143b.2\]]can 'di'i mthu yin no/_/ji tsam na bram ze mo de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig btsas so/_/gang gi nyi ma kho na la btsas pa de kho na'i nyi ma la sbrang rtsi'i char bab bo/_/de'i nye du rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas 
[\[143b.3\]]khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/nye du rnams kyis smras pa/_khye'u 'di gang gi nyi ma kho na la ma'i rum du zhugs pa de kho na'i nyi ma la sbrang rtsi'i char bab la/_gang gi nyi ma kho na la btsas pa de kho na'i nyi ma la yang sbrang rtsi'i char bab la/_gnas 'jog dang 
[\[143b.4\]]yang rus gcig pas de bas na khye'u'i ming gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can zhes bya bar gdags so zhes de'i ming gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can zhes bya bar btags so/_/de bsrings bskyed nas chen por gyur to/_/gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 
[\[143b.5\]]la rab tu byung ste/_de rab tu byung nas kyang nyi ma re re zhing sbrang rtsi lhung bzed gsum gsum grub par gyur te/_des de rnams las gcig ni bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo/_/gnyis pa ni dge 'dun la'o/_/gsum pa 'grogs bshes dang lhan cig longs spyod par byed do/_/
[\[143b.6\]]dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas gdugs re re zhing sbrang rtsi lhung bzed gsum gsum 
[\[143b.7\]]grub par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed 'bul ba'i spre'u gang yin pa de mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u gang yin pa de ni gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can 
[\[144a.2\]]'di nyid yin te/_des na 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed phul ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas bram ze las drug la brtson pa'i khyim du skyes shing nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa dang btsas pa na yang sbrang rtsi'i char bab bo/_/'di ltar da ltar yang nyi ma re re 
[\[144a.3\]]zhing sbrang rtsi lhung bzed gsum gsum 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa zhes bya ba nas las gcig tu dkar ba las brtsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[144a.4\]]zhe na/_gal te dge slong gnas 'jog gi bu sbrang rtsi can gyis shar gyi rgya mtsho chen po la sbrang rtsir mos shing /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang gi rgya mtsho chen po sbrang rtsir mos na de dag kyang sbrang rtsir 'gyur te/_dge slong dag de ltar na yon gnas de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu med pa yin 
[\[144a.5\]]no/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal po'i 'breg mkhan du gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[144a.6\]]pa/_dge slong dag nye ba 'khor 'di nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las byas shing bsags pa dang tshogs rnyed pa ni zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po'i 'breg mkhan zhig yod 
[\[144a.7\]]pa'i drung du rang sangs rgyas shig song nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pa'i skra bregs shig dang /_khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro/_/de yang rgyal po'i pho brang du chas pas des tsha bo la smras pa/_tsha bo rab tu byung ba 'di'i dbu regs shig_/kho bo rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro dgos kyis/_ji ltar rgyal 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]po la bya ba de bzhin du regs shig_/des bsams pa/_zhang pos ji skad smras pa las na gdon mi za bar 'di la bsod nams yod do snyam nas/_des gus par byas te de'i skra dang kha spu bregs so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis bsams pa/_sems can 'dis bsod nams mang du bskyed 
[\[144b.2\]]kyis 'di dge ba bskyed par bya'o snyam du bsams nas de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la 'phags te 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems 
[\[144b.3\]]gtod pa yin pas de shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar bdag gi zhang po rgyal po'i 'breg mkhan byed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang rgyal po'i 'breg mkhan du gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge 
[\[144b.4\]]slong dag ji snyam du sems/_rgyal po'i 'breg mkhan gyi tsha bo gang yin pa de ni dge slong nye ba 'khor 'di nyid yin te/_de na 'dis rang sangs rgyas kyi skra dang kha spu bregs nas smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas rgyal po'i 'breg mkhan du gyur to/_/gzhan yang 'dis 
[\[144b.5\]]smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas te/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_
[\[144b.6\]]dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas so/_/yang de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas so zhes bya ba nas/_rim gyis khye'u bdun btsas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de'i ne'u zla rgyal po'i 'breg mkhan zhig yod pa 
[\[144b.7\]]de bu med pas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de/_bdag la bu pho yang med/_bu mo yang med pas bdag shi na bdog ba thams cad bu med do zhes rgyal pos mnga' mdzad par 'gyur ro snyam du sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de khyim bdag des mthong nas smras pa/_ne'u zla ci'i phyir sems 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]khong du chud/_des smras pa/_ne'u zla kho bo la nor gyi rigs 'di snyed yod na bu pho yang med/_bu mo yang med pas kho bo shi nas 'di dag thams cad rgyal pos mnga' mdzad par 'gyur na ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/_des smras pa/_gal te de 
[\[145a.2\]]lta na kho bo'i bu 'di dag thams cad kyi nu bo shos de kho bos khyod la sbyin no/_/des de blangs so/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag de shi ba dang /_de'i bu de rnams gang gi tshe kha cig dang lhan cig 'thab mo 'gyed pa de'i tshe des gang dag gi spu 'breg mkhan yin pa khyed kyang 'thab mo rgol 
[\[145a.3\]]lam zhes kha zer bar byed do/_/de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas bsams pa/_bdag cag brnyas pa ci yang rung ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni nu bo 'di'i skyon las gyur gyis thams cad du dbrog go snyam nas de rnams kyis de phrogs pa dang /_'breg mkhan khros nas des 
[\[145a.4\]]'breg mkhan thams cad la khrims su bcas pa/_khyim bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba'i bu rnams kyi kha spu bcos pa'i las sus kyang mi bya'o zhes bcas so/_/de rnams skra dang /_kha spu dang /_sen mo ring por skyes pa de rnams rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed 
[\[145a.5\]]cag ci'i phyir skra dang /_kha spu dang /_sen mo ring por 'dug_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'breg mkhan 'dis 'breg mkhan thams cad la de rnams kyi kha spu bcos pa'i las su yang ma bgyid cig ces bkag lags so/_/ci'i phyir/_de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras pa 
[\[145a.6\]]dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_phas bu byin na khyed cag gis ci'i phyir dbrog_/de la slar byin cig_/de rnams kyis mi 'dod bzhin du slar btang ngo /_/de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes te 'jig rten gyis smad pas 'jigs nas de gsad par 'dod do/_/'jig rten la ni mdza' ba dang /_
[\[145a.7\]]mi mdza' ba dang /_bar ma yod pas de la gzhan dag gis sbran pa dang /_des 'breg mkhan de la smras pa/_de rnams bdag la gsad par 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu 'byung ngo /_/des bsams pa/_de rnams kyis srog dang bral ba bas ni rab tu byung ba 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]bla'o snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_bu gal te de lta na song la rab tu byung shig_/gang gi tshe yon tan kyi tshogs cung zad thob pa de'i tshe bdag la smros shig_/de gnang ba thob nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/_des mkhan po med pa dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub 
[\[145b.2\]]mngon sum du byas nas des bsams pa/_bdag gis pha de la sngon khas blangs pa'i dam bcas pa de ston du 'gro'o snyam nas de de'i drung du song ste 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo 
[\[145b.3\]]ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas de shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtswa ba 'dis bdag rgyal po'i 'breg 
[\[145b.4\]]mkhan du gyur cig_/gzhan yang 'dis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag rgyal po'i 'breg mkhan du gyur cig_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhi la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i 
[\[145b.5\]]rtsa ba 'dis bdag rgyal po'i 'breg mkhan du gyur cig ces btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lan mang du rgyal po'i 'breg mkhan du gyur to/_/yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang 
[\[145b.6\]]ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam btab pa nyid kyis so/_/gang du smon lam btab lags/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 
[\[145b.7\]]bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sIr nye bar brten te drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]bzhin du ste/_de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung bar gyur te/_rab tu 'byin pa'i dge slong gang yin pa de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/de la 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad 
[\[146a.2\]]na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas/_de na 'di 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob kyis/_dge 
[\[146a.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya 
[\[146a.4\]]thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par gyur pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum byas nas/_ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog 
[\[146a.5\]]tu bstan pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces btab pa de'i smon lam gyi dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las 
[\[146a.6\]]gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag de lta bu la khyed kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa 
[\[146a.7\]]drug bcom nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa de'i tshe bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir rgyal po btsun mo dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi dang bcas pa la dge sbyong gau ta ma ni de ring shi'o zhes bsgrags so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang btsun mo dang /_
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi dang bcas pas mya ngan bya bar brtsams pa dang /_lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma nongs te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na 
[\[146b.2\]]med pa'i ye shes brnyes so/_/da nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kun dga' ba byas te kun dga' bar gyur pa de'i tshe bdud rtsi zas kyi khye'u zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/nye du dag gis smras pa/_
[\[146b.3\]]khye'u 'di kun dga' bar gyur pa na btsas pas khye'u'i ming kun dga' bo zhes gdags so zhes de'i ming kun dga' bo zhes bya bar btags so/_/khye'u kun dga' bo ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen 
[\[146b.4\]]grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad de/_de ma ma'i pang na 'tsho ba na mtshan mkhan rnams kyis khye'u 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i rim gro byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/bdud rtsi zas kyis khye'u mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to zhes thos nas des bsams pa/_
[\[146b.5\]]gal te de lta na bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung du 'ong ngo zhes spyan sngar mi 'bab par bya'o snyam nas/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs pa de'i tshe de yangs pa can du skyel lo/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe slar yang ser skya'i gzhir 
[\[146b.6\]]khyer ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de lta bu mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_thugs su ma chud pa'am/_rnam par mi rig pa cung zad kyang mi mnga'o/_/chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan par zhugs 
[\[146b.7\]]pa/_srung ba gcig pu pa/_nyag gcig dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/_dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs legs par gnas pa/_bsdu ba'i 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms pa/_yan lag lnga spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/_
[\[147a.2\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa brgya phrag bcur dbang sgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la 
[\[147a.3\]]gzigs nas gang ni nyams par 'gyur/_gang ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_gang ni gnod par 'gyur/_gang ni nyam nga bar 'gyur/_gang ni mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni gnod pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni ngan song la gzhol/_gang ni ngan song la 'bab/_gang 
[\[147a.4\]]ni ngan song la bab/_ngas gang ni ngan song las bslang ste mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhag par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dag ni bskyed par bya/_gang gi bskyed pa dag ni yongs su smin par bya/_gang gi smin pa ni grol bar bya/_zhes mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa 'jug go/_
[\[147a.5\]]yang smras pa/_chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa/_/dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni/_/dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gzhon nu kun dga' bo ni srid pa tha ma pa yin pas de nga'i bstan pa la 
[\[147a.6\]]rab tu 'byung ste/_rab tu byung nas nga'i rim gro byed cing gsung rab 'dzin pa dang /_nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur gyis/_ma la ngas gzhon nu kun dga' bo bstan pa la gzhug par bya'o snyam nas ma tshor ba kho nar grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byon nas bdud 
[\[147a.7\]]rtsi zas kyi gnas khang du gshegs te gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bdud rtsi zas kyis gzhon nu kun dga' bo khang phran gzhan zhig gi nang du bcug ste bzhag go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe na sgo rang bye bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas thog ma kho nar 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bsil yab blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/_/de nas bdud rtsi zas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs 
[\[147b.2\]]gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi zas la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du 
[\[147b.3\]]mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te bzhud do/_/rgyu'i stobs che yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos dgos pas srid pa tha ma 
[\[147b.4\]]pa'i sems can kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brang ba na/_bdud rtsi zas chung ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas bzlog par ma nus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can yin pas khyed kyis bzlog par mi nus 
[\[147b.5\]]kyis ma zlog shig_/bdud rtsi zas kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar gyur na 'di la rim pa bzhin bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du byos shig_/de nas bdud rtsi zas kyis dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs 
[\[147b.6\]]pa dang /_'gro bar chas pa'i slong ba pa rnams kyi phyir sbyin pa dag gtong du bcug_/bsod nams dag byed du bcug_/rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la yang bzod pa gsol du bcug nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/_glang po che la zhon nas skye bo du mas yongs su 
[\[147b.7\]]bskor te/_n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra ba logs su phyogs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar btang ngo /_/de yang srang gi dbus nas 'gro ba na glang po ches ut+pa la'i chun po zhig zos so/_/mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu 'di ni thos pa 'dzin pa 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas n+ya gro ng+ha'i kun dga' ra bar zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos 
[\[148a.2\]]phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od srung gzhon nu rab tu phyung shig ces 'od srung stobs bcu ldan la gtad nas des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas 
[\[148a.3\]]rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i spyi bor phol mig byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed la 
[\[148a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong kun dga' bo la dpyad byos shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas chos 
[\[148a.5\]]'chad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir de nyid na 'dug go/_/'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis bsams pa/_'di chos la dad pa bdo bar gyur pas mi tshor gyis dpyad bya ba'i dus la bab bo snyam nas/_des de'i phol mig smin par 'gyur ba dag 
[\[148a.6\]]bskus nas de nyid du dral te de nyid du sos par byas so/_/de na chos bshad pa rdzogs nas 'tsho byed kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'di nyid na mchis bzhin du phol mig smin par bgyis te brtol nas sos par bgyis lags so/_/tshe 
[\[148a.7\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_gal te bdag gi lus til 'bru tsam du gtubs par gyur kyang bdag gis mi tshor lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi chos las byung ba'i dad pas bsam pa bsdus pa la 'tsho byed mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na/_des na spyi bor phol mig byung bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong 
[\[148b.2\]]kun dga' bo 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul mtha' 'khob cig na rgyal po ki ra ta zhes bya ba gnas so/_/sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[148b.3\]]'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas de nas rang sangs rgyas zhig de der rgyu ba na ki ra ta'i grong khyer du phyin nas de der 
[\[148b.4\]]bsod snyoms kyi phyir ki ra ta'i rgyal po'i khyim du zhugs pa dang /_de de la mi bzod pa skyes te sems gdug pas 'jim ril gyi ngan kong gis rgyab tu bsnun pa las bdag nyid chen po de dregs pa dang nga rgyal bcom pa yin pas de snod du ma gyur par shes nas song ngo /_/dge 
[\[148b.5\]]slong dag ji snyam du sems/_ki ra ta'i rgyal po gang yin pa de ni dge slong kun dga' bo de nyid yin te/_gang 'dis rang sangs rgyas la mi bzod pa skyes te sems gdug pas 'jim ril gyi ngan kong gis rgyab tu bsnun pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar gang dang 
[\[148b.6\]]gang du skyes pa de dang der spyi bor phol mig byung bar gyur to/_/'di ltar da ltar 'di'i srid pa tha ma la yang spyi bor phol mig byung ngo /_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la lhag par dad pa dang /_gus 
[\[148b.7\]]pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_'dzem pa nyid kyis nye bar gnas so/_/gang gi tshe sprul pa yin na ni dad pa dang /_gus pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang /_'dzem pa de 'dra ba dag gis mi gnas so/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag cig gis sangs 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun 
[\[149a.2\]]gyis bltas nas khyim bdag de'i khyim du gshegs te/_gdugs tshod gsol nas slar gshegs so/_/dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ci de ring khyod bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig song ngam/_'on te sprul pa 
[\[149a.3\]]dang /_des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig song gis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang ni ma yin no/_/ci mngon gang gi tshe kho bo bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig 'gro ba de'i tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das la lhag par dad pa dang /_gus pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_
[\[149a.4\]]khrel yod pa dang /_'dzem pas nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa yin pa de'i tshe de ltar mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag phan tshun smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni mtshan ma la mkhas so/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su dge 
[\[149a.5\]]slong kun dga' bo mtshan ma la mkhas so zhes bya ba'i sgra bsgrags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab tu ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas mnyen yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan 
[\[149a.6\]]yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro sham thabs bgos chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa bram ze zhig gis mthong nas bsams pa/_dge 
[\[149a.7\]]sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos dge slong kun dga' bo mtshan ma la mkhas so/_/zhes thos pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin gyis re zhig shing sha pa zhes bya ba 'di la 'dab ma du yod pa dri'o snyam nas des de la dris pa/_'phags pa shing sha pa 'di la 'dab ma ji snyed mchis/_des smras pa/_brgya 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]dang /_stong dang /_khri phrag 'di snyed yod do zhes smras nas song ngo /_/bram ze des de la lo ma dag cig btogs nas bgrangs te bor ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms spyad de slar log pa dang /_bram ze des yang smras pa/_'phags pa da ltar shing sha 
[\[149b.2\]]pa 'di la 'dab ma ji snyed mchis mkhyen tam/_des smras pa/_sngar ni brgya dang /_stong dang /_khri phrag 'di snyed yod pa las da las 'di snyed cig btogs so/_/bram ze de 'phags pa ni rtsis la yang de ltar mkhas pa lta zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/_/dge slong 
[\[149b.3\]]rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na des na mtshan ma la mkhas par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[149b.4\]]dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI na bram ze zhig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_
[\[149b.5\]]de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te rigs dang mthun pa'i ming 
[\[149b.6\]]btags nas gsos bskyed de chen por gyur to/_/de yul gzhan du song ste mtshan ma'i bstan chos drug khri bslabs so/_/de bzhin du tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe mtshan ma'i bstan chos drug khri bslabs shing gzhan la yang bstan pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen 
[\[149b.7\]]des gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der mtshan mkhan rnams kyi mchog tu byung ngo /_/'di ltar da ltar gyi srid pa tha ma la yang mtshan mkhan rnams kyi mchog tu byung ngo /_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la yang nyi ma re re zhing dro ka'i dus su gzhong par 'bras sA lu'i chan dang /_
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]bu ram shing gi sdong bu zhig dang /_sreg pa gnyis lhung la de gnyis las gcig ni gzhong pa'i steng du 'bab/_cig shos ni sa la'o/_/des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rig par byas te/_des kyang dge slong rnams la'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom 
[\[150a.2\]]skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/_des na 'tshal ma'i dus su gzhong bar 'bras sA lu'i chan dang /_bu ram shing gi sdong bu zhig dang /_sreg pa gnyis 
[\[150a.3\]]lhung la/_de gnyis las gcig ni gzhong pa'i steng du 'bab/_cig shos ni sa la lhung bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu las byas shing bsags te/_des 
[\[150a.4\]]na 'di'i zas kyi dus su gzhong par 'bras sA lu'i chan dang /_bu ram shing gi sdong bu dang /_sreg pa gnyis lhung la/_de gnyis las gcig ni gzhong pa'i steng du 'bab/_cig shos ni sa la lhung bar gyur pa ni dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag 
[\[150a.5\]]phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba zhig gnas te/_de'i mngag gzhug pa rnams kyis zhing pa'i grong nas 'bras sA lu sar pa zhig dang /_sreg pa gnyis dang /_bu ram shing gi sdong bu zhig khyer te 'ongs so/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du 
[\[150a.6\]]rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas de nas rang sangs rgyas zhig bA rA Na sIr 'ongs nas de snga dro na bza' sham thabs bgos chos gos dang 
[\[150a.7\]]lhung bzed thogs te bsod snyoms la khyim bdag de'i khyim du zhugs pa na des de lus de mdzes pa dang /_sems dad par mthong nas des der de la thog mar lo tog sar pa 'on cig ces byas nas 'bras sA lu'i chan dang /_bu ram shing gi sdong bu zhig dang /_sreg pa gnyis 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]phul ba las/_de las gcig ni lhung bzed du lhung ngo /_/cig shos ni sa la'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gang yin pa de ni rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin te/_'dis rang sangs rgyas 
[\[150b.2\]]la 'bras sA lu'i chan dang /_bu ram shing gi sdong bu dang /_sreg pa gnyis phul ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang po dang /_lo brgya stong phrag mang por mi'i bde ba nyams su myong ngo /_/da ltar yang 'di'i zas 
[\[150b.3\]]kyi dus su gzhong par 'bras sA lu'i chan dang /_bu ram shing gi sdong bu dang /_sreg pa gnyis lhung ste/_de las gcig ni gzhong pa'i steng du lhung la/_cig shos ni sa la'o/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi las kyi rgyu ba 
[\[150b.4\]]gcig lung bstan pas sngon gyi mtha'i ni las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni yod do snyam du rig nas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mngon par dad de de ltar las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa'i blo gros kyis gnas so/_/ltas mkhan rnams kyis 
[\[150b.5\]]'phags pa kun dga' bo ni cod pan gyis bcings par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas ci tsam nam nangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i 'phral bar phol mig byung ngo zhes ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_yon 
[\[150b.6\]]gnas rnams la bya ba byas na bsod nams kyi 'bras bu khyad par med par mi 'gyur bas ma la bdag gis 'di la rang nyid kyis bkur sti bya'o snyam nas/_des sman pa thams cad bkug ste/_'phags pa kun dga' bo'i dpyad gyis shig_/de'i dpyad gsal ba na bya bar 
[\[150b.7\]]brtsams pa dang /_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rang nyid kyis rtsibs brgya yod pa'i gdugs bzung zhing /_'phral ba'i rtsa 'debs pa na cod pan gyis bcings so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rang nyid kyis rtsibs brgya mchis pa'i gdugs bzung zhing rang nyid 
[\[151a.2\]]kyis cod pan dkar pos bcings te bsnyen bkur bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu las byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 
[\[151a.3\]]'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI na sman pa zhig gnas pa'i drung du rang sangs rgyas nad pa zhig song ba dang /_des de la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te rang nyid kyis sman dpyad dang bkur sti byas so/_/dge slong dag ji 
[\[151a.4\]]snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sman pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid yin te/_de na 'dis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lo brgya phrag du ma dang /_lo stong phrag du mar rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze 
[\[151a.5\]]dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di la bsnyen bkur byas so/_/ji ltar da ltar kyang 'di la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rtsibs brgya yod pa'i gdugs spyi bor bzung zhing rang nyid kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du 
[\[151a.6\]]bzhugs nas shing sA la can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang sA la can du byon nas sA la can gyi bram ze'i grong khyer na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i nyan thos chen po gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor na nye bar brten 
[\[151a.7\]]cing 'dug pa 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_bzang ldan dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_dga' yod dang /_kim pi la dang /_sa la na gnas pa'i gnas brtan grags ldan dang /_
[\[151b.2\]]yul chu mig can na gnas pa'i gnas brtan gang po dang /_de dag dang gzhan yang gnas brtan nyan thos chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor na nye bar brten te gnas so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po dgu bcu rtsa drug pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[151b.3\]]kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ni nga rgas 'khogs gtugs te 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la gdams ngag dbog tu dub kyis dge slong dag nga'i rim gro la thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi 
[\[151b.4\]]thugs la 'thad pas rim gro byed cing bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i dge slong zhig spro ba skyed cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de 
[\[151b.5\]]logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das la thugs la mi 'thad pa ma lags kyi/_thugs la 'thad pas rim gro bgyid cing bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba 
[\[151b.6\]]lags so/_/kauN+Di n+ya khyod re zhig rgas 'khogs gtugs pas khyod nyid la rim gro pa dgos kyis re zhig kauN+Di n+ya khyod nyid kyi stan ji lta ba bzhin la 'dug shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_bzang 
[\[151b.7\]]ldan dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_dga' yod dang /_kim pi la dang /_sa la na gnas pa'i gnas brtan grags pa dang /_yul chu mig can gyi gnas brtan gang po stan las 
[\[152a.2\]]langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la thugs la mi 'thad pa ma lags kyi thugs la 'thad pas rim gro bgyid 
[\[152a.3\]]cing /_bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba lags so/_/gang po khyod kyang rgas 'khogs gtugs te/_khyod nyid la rim gro pa dgos kyis re zhig gang po khyod nyid kyi stan ji lta ba bzhin la 'dug shig_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po rang gi 
[\[152a.4\]]stan ji lta ba la 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gang zhig rim gro par bzhed par 'gyur/_ma la bdag gis ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag na bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la lta bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 
[\[152a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la lta bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 
[\[152a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la bltas na nga'i rim gro dge slong kun dga' bos byas na thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi thugs la 'thad pa dang /_bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[152a.7\]]bo la gtad pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la bltas na dge slong kun dga' bos nga'i rim gro byas na thugs la mi 'thad pa ma 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]yin gyi thugs la 'thad pa dang /_bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba yin no zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la gtad do/_/dper na khang pa brtsegs pa'am/_khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyams byang phyogs su ring ba shar phyogs su skar khung 
[\[152b.2\]]btod pa/_shar phyogs su skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shar ba nub phyogs kyi rtsig pa'i ngos la 'bab pa de bzhin du nga'i rim gro dge slong kun dga' bos byas na thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi thugs la 'thad pa dang /_bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi don yang nyams 
[\[152b.3\]]par mi 'gyur ba yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la gtad kyis tshur bdag cag dong la spro bar bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang 
[\[152b.4\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_de nas tshe 
[\[152b.5\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro par spro'am/_bde bar gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni khyod la don chen por 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 
[\[152b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro par bdag mi spro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na me 'bar ba'i me phrag ni bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no/_/de 
[\[152b.7\]]bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro par bdag mi spro'o/_/'di lta ste dper na gcan gzan gyi rgyal po seng ge ri phug na gnas pa'i so phrag ni bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no/_/
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na ma tang ga'i glang po che'i rgyal po lo drug bcu lon pa dar la bab pa/_grags pa/_mche ba gshol mda' tsam yod pa/_brang gi 
[\[153a.2\]]phel ka che ba/_g.yul myong ba/_g.yul ngor son pa'i mche ba'i phrag ni bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba yin no/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bsnyen par dka' zhing bzod par dka' bas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[153a.3\]]rim gro par bdag mi spro'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das ni nga'i rim gro dge slong kun dga' bos byas na thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi 
[\[153a.4\]]thugs la 'thad pa dang /_bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur ro zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la thugs gtad de dper na khang pa brtsegs pa'am/_khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyams byang phyogs su ring ba shar phyogs su skar khung btod pa shar 
[\[153a.5\]]phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shar ba nub phyogs kyi rtsig pa'i ngos la 'bab pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ni nga'i rim gro dge slong kun dga' bos byas na thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi thugs la 'thad pa dang /_bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi don yang nyams 
[\[153a.6\]]par mi 'gyur ro zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la thugs gtad na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro par spro'am/_bde bar gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni khyod la don chen por 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu bdag gis de bzhin du bgyi 
[\[153a.7\]]ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro bgyi bar spro bar bgyid na/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mchog gsum po bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' smad g.yogs dang chos gos bdag gis mi bcang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gang zag pa'i mgron du 'bod na 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]bdag gis bdag gir mi bya ba dang /_bdag bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang /_bkur sti bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba la dus ma yin pa cung zad kyang med par gnang ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mchog gsum gnang ba 
[\[153b.2\]]lta na bdag de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro bgyid par spro'i gzhan du na ma lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro par spro ba bskyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na 
[\[153b.3\]]ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rim 
[\[153b.4\]]gro bgyid pa'i dge slong bdag cag gis spro ba bskyed pa ni 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo lags na/_de'i mchid nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bdag gis de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro bgyid par spro bar bgyi na/_gal te bcom ldan 'das 
[\[153b.5\]]kyis bdag la mchog gsum po bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' smad g.yogs dang chos gos bdag gis mi bcang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gang zag pa'i mgron du 'bod na bdag gis bdag gir mi bya ba dang /_bdag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir nye 
[\[153b.6\]]bar 'gro ba dus ma yin pa cung zad kyang med pa gnang ngam/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mchog gsum gnang ba lta na bdag de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro bgyid par spro'o zhes mchi lags so/_/maud gal gyi bu chen po legs so legs so/_/dge slong kun dga' bo 
[\[153b.7\]]ni mkhas pa yin te/_des ma 'ongs pa na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams las rtsod cing rjes su rtsod pa smad pa'i gnas kyi chos 'byung la/_gzhi 'dis bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dge slong kun dga' bo ni chos gos kyi rgyus ston pa la bkur sti byed do zhes kha zer 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_maud gal gyi bu 'di ni dge slong kun dga' bo'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no/_/maud gal gyi bu legs so/_/legs so/_/dge slong kun dga' bo ni mkhas pa yin te/_des ma 'ongs pa na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 
[\[154a.2\]]rnams las rtsod cing rjes su rtsod pa'i smad pa'i gnas kyi chos 'byung la/_gzhi 'dis bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dge slong kun dga' bo ni kha zas kyi rgyus ston pa la bkur sti byed do zhes kha zer bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/_maud gal gyi bu 'di ni dge slong kun dga' 
[\[154a.3\]]bo'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no/_/maud gal gyi bu legs so legs so/_/dge slong kun dga' bo ni mkhas pa yin te/_dus shes shing dus rig pas de 'di ni bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus yin/_'di ni dus ma yin/_'di ni dge 
[\[154a.4\]]slong gi dge 'dun dang /_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /_dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gyi dus yin/_'di ni gzhan mu stegs can dang /_kun tu rgyu dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus yin/_'di ni dus ma yin/_gzhan mu stegs can 
[\[154a.5\]]dang /_kun tu rgyu 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_'di dag ni bka' la spobs pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur/_bza' ba dang bca' ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la bde ba skyed par 'gyur/_'di ni bde ba skyed pa ma yin no zhes shes te/_maud 
[\[154a.6\]]gal gyi bu dge slong kun dga' bo ni mkhas pa yin te/_dus shes shing dus rig pas de 'di ni bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus yin no/_/'di ni dus ma yin no/_/'di ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang /_dge bsnyen 
[\[154a.7\]]gyi 'khor dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gyi dus yin no/_/'di ni gzhan mu stegs can dang /_kun tu rgyu dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus yin no/_/'di ni dus ma yin no/_/gzhan mu stegs can dang /_kun tu rgyu 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]kyi bka' la spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni bka' la spobs pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/_/bza' ba dang bca' ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la bde ba skyed par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni bde ba skyed pa ma yin no zhes shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni maud gal gyi bu dge 
[\[154b.2\]]slong kun dga' bo'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no/_/maud gal gyi bu legs so legs so/_/dge slong kun dga' bo ni mkhas pa yin no/_/de sems kyi rnam grangs la mkhas pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa phyi ma nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs pa 
[\[154b.3\]]mtshan ma 'am gsung bstan pas shes par 'gyur zhing bde ba'i gnas pa 'di dang 'dis bcom ldan 'das mang du bzhugs so/_/gnas pa 'di dang 'dis bde bar gshegs pa mang du bzhugs so zhes ston par 'dod na ji skad bstan pa de dag thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur te/_
[\[154b.4\]]gzhan du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni maud gal gyi bu dge slong kun dga' bo'i rmad du byung ba'i chos yin te/_des de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim gro byas na thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi thugs la 'thad pa dang /_bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi don yang nyams par mi 
[\[154b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim gro dge slong kun dga' bos byas na thugs la mi 'thad pa ma yin gyi thugs la 'thad pa dang /_bka' stsal pa 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi don yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni dge slong kun dga' bo'i rmad du 
[\[154b.6\]]byung ba'i chos yin no/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro bar spro ba bskyed pa na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bsngags pa mdzad pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas 
[\[154b.7\]]the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi mched du gyur cing thos pa mang ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa dang /_thos pa bsags pa'i 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]rim gro par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge 
[\[155a.2\]]slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po 'od zer zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_skye bo dang /_mi mang po yod pa na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/
[\[155a.3\]]de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_'di'i yab 'od zer lags pas de'i slad du khye'u'i 
[\[155a.4\]]ming 'od zer can du gdags so zhes de'i ming 'od zer can du btags nas/_bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur pa dang phas rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to/_/yang de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na khye'u zhig btsas nas de'i yang btsas ston rgya 
[\[155a.5\]]cher byas te 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar ming btags so/_/gzhon nu 'od zer can nges par 'byung ba la mngon par dga' zhing des pha chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag kyang yab 'das nas rgyal por 'gyur te bdag gis kyang 
[\[155a.6\]]chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de pha'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_rab tu 'byung lags so/_/des smras pa/_bu gang gi don du mchod sbyin mchod par 
[\[155a.7\]]byed/_sbyin sreg sreg par byed/_dka' thub kyis gdung bar byed pa'i rgyal srid de khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs na ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung zhes de bzlog kyang ma btub bo/_/rgyal pos gdon mi za bar gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ba dang /_de drang srong rnams kyi nang du song ste rab 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]tu byung ngo /_/rgyal pos gzhon nu 'od zer ldan rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to/_/'od zer can drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu phyung ste/_mtha' gcig tu song nas mkhan po med pa dang /_slob dpon med par rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na nad kyis thebs 
[\[155b.2\]]par gyur nas phan tshun 'khyam pa na bA rA Na sIr phyin to/_/rgyal po 'od zer gyis 'od zer can rang byang chub mngon sum du byas te de der 'ongs so zhes thos nas de de'i drung du 'ong ste rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa/_drang srong chen po khyod ni bsod snyoms don du gnyer ba lags la/_
[\[155b.3\]]bdag ni bsod nams 'tshal ba lags kyis bdag gi skyed mos tshal 'di nyid du bzhugs shig dang khyod la bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o/_/des khas blangs pa dang rgyal pos de'i rim gro bar gzhon nu 'od zer ldan byin te des de'i rim gro bya ba la zhugs 
[\[155b.4\]]pa na rang sangs rgyas kyis de zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan smin pa mthong nas des de la smras pa/_nu bo ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /_des smras pa/_drang srong chen po rab tu 'byung ngo /_/gal te de ltar gyur na song la yab la rtogs shig_/de rgyal po'i drung du song 
[\[155b.5\]]nas lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag rab tu 'byung lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod kyi phu bo rab tu byung bas nga 'das na khyod kho na rgyal po yin na ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung zhes des rab tu 'byung ba ma thob bo/_/rang sangs rgyas de nyid rgyal po'i drung du song ste song 
[\[155b.6\]]nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_'od zer 'od zer ldan thong dang /_/'od zer ldan pa rab tu 'byung /_/'od zer rab tu byung ba legs/_/'di ltar rgyal ba rnams kyis bsngags/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_drang srong chen po khyod rab tu byung bas de ni bdag 'das na rgyal 
[\[155b.7\]]por 'gyur te 'di nyid du sbyin pa dag stsol ba dang /_bsod nams dag bgyid par 'gyur na ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung /_rang sangs rgyas kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'od zer tshe ni cung zhig ste/_/re ltar thogs na zhag bdun nyid/_/don gzhan ched du bsams bsam 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]pa/_gzhan nyid du ni yongs su 'gyur/_/drang srong chen po 'di'i tshe zhag bdun lags sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa/_zhag bdun yin no/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_drang srong chen po gal te de lta na gnang bar bgyis rab tu phyung shig_/de bdag la tshe cung 
[\[156a.2\]]zhig yod par shes nas dad pa drag pos de la bkur sti bya bar brtsams so/_/rang sangs rgyas de rlung nad can zhig bas des lhung bzed lag tu blangs nas za ba na rlung gis lag pa 'dar bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gdu bu phyung nas lhung bzed kyi gzhir bzhag pa dang de la lhung 
[\[156a.3\]]bzed mi g.yo bar 'dug go/_/des de mthong nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_ji ltar 'di la lhung bzed mi g.yo ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi rgyud la chos ci yod pa de dag mi g.yo bar gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de de la sngon yi ge dang tshig ran pa ran par 
[\[156a.4\]]chos 'chad pa yin pas des smras pa/_khyod sngon khyim par gyur pa na yi ge dang tshig ran pa ran par chos 'chad pa lags na/_da rang byang chub mngon sum du bgyis na ci'i phyir chos mi bshad/_des smras pa/_kho bo chos mi 'chad do/_/'o na su 'chad lags/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[156a.5\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gang yin pa ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni tshig dang yi ge ran pa ran par chos 'chad do/_/des smon lam btab pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshig dang yi ge ran pa ran par chos 'chad pa gang yin pa 
[\[156a.6\]]de'i mched dang rim gro par bdag gyur cig ces btab bo/_/rang sangs rgyas des rab tu phyung nas smras pa/_khyod zhag bdun 'das nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de kho na khyod kyis yid la byos shig_/des zhag bdun lon na cung zad kyang ma rtogs nas de'i 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa/_
[\[156a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas thos pa mang ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa dang /_thos pa bsags par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]rgyal bu gzhon nu rang sangs rgyas kyi nu bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'dis rang sangs rgyas phu bo shos kyi rim gro byas nas smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi mched du gyur cing /_thos pa 
[\[156b.2\]]mang ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa thos pa bsags pa'i rim gro par gyur to/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas 
[\[156b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis thos pa mang ba/_thos pa 'dzin pa/_thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dang tshogs rnyed pa ni zhes 
[\[156b.4\]]bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/_sangs 
[\[156b.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sIr nye bar brten nas drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung na de na 'dis yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad kyang ma thob bo/_/
[\[156b.6\]]'di rab tu 'byin pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis thos pa mang ba/_thos pa 'dzin pa/_thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan pa yin pas de 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yang dag par 
[\[156b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad kyang ma thob kyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[157a.2\]]cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis thos pa mang ba/_thos pa 'dzin pa/_thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang shAkya'i 
[\[157a.3\]]rgyal po'i yang rgyal po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des thos pa mang ba/_thos pa 'dzin pa/_thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar ngas thos pa mang ba/_thos pa 'dzin pa/_thos pa bsags pa 
[\[157a.4\]]rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//_//sdom la/_rdzu 'phrul ston pa gsum smra dang /_/gtum byed rig pa ga yA 
[\[157a.5\]]dang /_gang gi phyir ni gnod pa dang /_/sems can rna ba khyi yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mu ge'i dgon pa nyam nga ba slong mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung ngo /_/de na dge slong rdzu 'phrul thob pa gang 
[\[157a.6\]]yin pa de rnams ni 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa de las shing 'dzam bu'i snye ma kha dog dang dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa 
[\[157a.7\]]rnams la 'god par byed do/_/gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na bil pa'i tshal lam/_ka pid tha'i tshal lam/_skyur rtsi'i tshal gang yin pa de las skyur rtsi'i 'bras bu kha dog dang dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du dong nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged 
[\[157b.2\]]par byed do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris sam/_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas lha'i bdud rtsi las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'god par byed do/_/yul ljongs 'byor pa dang 
[\[157b.3\]]zhes bya ba nas/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba'i bar gang yin pa de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed do/_/de nas lha sbyin 'di 
[\[157b.4\]]snyam du sems te/_da ltar mu ge'i dgon pa nyam nga ba slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung ba la/_dge slong rdzu 'phrul thob pa gang yin pa de rnams ni 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa de las shing 'dzam bu'i snye ma kha 
[\[157b.5\]]dog dang dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed do/_/gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na bil ba'i tshal lam/_ka pid tha'i tshal lam/_skyur rtsi'i tshal gang yin 
[\[157b.6\]]pa de las skyur rtsi'i 'bras bu kha dog dang dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du dong nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras 
[\[157b.7\]]sA lu'i 'bru las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris sam/_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas lha'i bdud rtsi las lhung bzed bkang ste 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed do zhes bya ba nas yul ljongs 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba'i bar gang yin pa de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas lhung 
[\[158a.2\]]bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed kyis/_gal te bdag gis kyang rdzu 'phrul zhig thob na bdag gis kyang 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa 
[\[158a.3\]]las shing 'dzam bu'i snye ma kha dog dang dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na bil ba'i tshal lam/_ka pid tha'i tshal lam/_skyur 
[\[158a.4\]]rtsi'i 'bras bu kha dog dang dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'o/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du song la ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru las lhung bzed bkang ste 
[\[158a.5\]]blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'o/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris sam/_sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song la lha'i bdud rtsi las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing /_lhag ma yang 
[\[158a.6\]]dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'o/_/yul ljongs 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba'i bar gang yin pa de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong rnams 
[\[158a.7\]]la bgo bar bya na/_su zhig gis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam lung dbog par nus snyam mo/_/de nas lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]ldan 'das la lha sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung dbog tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha sbyin sdig pa'i 'dod pa de lta bu skyes par gyur pa thugs su chud nas lha sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[158b.2\]]gau ta ma khyod lhag pa'i tshul khrims la tshul bzhin yid la byos shig dang /_khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gau ta ma khyod lhag pa'i sems la tshul bzhin yid la byos shig dang khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gau ta ma 
[\[158b.3\]]khyod lhag pa'i shes rab la tshul bzhin yid la byos shig dang /_khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung ma phog go snyam du bsams nas chas te tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[158b.4\]]kun shes kauN+Di n+ya gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung dbog tu gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dang lha sbyin gyi la bltas na sdig pa 'dod 
[\[158b.5\]]pa de lta bu skyes par shes nas lha sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha sbyin khyod gzugs la tshul bzhin yid la byos shig dang khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas brtan kun shes kauN+Di n+yas kyang bdag la rdzu 'phrul 
[\[158b.6\]]gyi lam gyi lung ma phog go snyam du bsams nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_bzang ldan dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_gnas brtan lnga brgya gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 
[\[158b.7\]]gnas brtan lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung dbog tu gsol/_/de nas gnas brtan lnga brgya pos bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams dang lha sbyin gyi la bltas na sdig pa'i 'dod pa de 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]lta bu skyes par shes nas lha sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha sbyin khyod gzugs la tshul bzhin yid la byos shig dang /_khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lha sbyin khyod tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam 
[\[159a.2\]]par shes pa la tshul bzhin yid la byos shig dang /_khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas brtan lnga brgyas kyang bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung ma phog na/_ci tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag dang bcom ldan 
[\[159a.3\]]'das dang lhan cig snga nyid nas bgros sam/_'di ltar bdag la sus kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung ma phog go snyam mo/_/de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_su zhig bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung dbog par nus snyam mo/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu 
[\[159a.4\]]ldan rgyal po'i khab kyi sde can gyi phug na 'dug go/_/de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas brtan 'od srung stobs bcu ldan 'di ni yun ring po nas g.yo med pa/_sgyu can ma yin pa/_drang por byed pa/_drang po'i rang bzhin can yin la/_bdag gi nye mtshams kyi phu bo kun 
[\[159a.5\]]dga' bo'i yang mkhan po yin pas gnas brtan 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung dbog par nus so snyam du bsams nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis 
[\[159a.6\]]la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung dbog tu gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs 
[\[159a.7\]]bcu ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams dang /_lha sbyin gyi la bltas na sdig pa'i 'dod pa de lta bu skyes par gyur par ma rig nas lha sbyin la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung phog go/_/de nas lha sbyin gyis nam gyi cha stod dang /_nam gyi cha 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]smad la mi nyal bar brtson pa dang ldan pa'i gnas pas bsam gtan dang po la brten te rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/_de gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ba dang /_mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ba dang /_snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba shes pa mthong bas 
[\[159b.2\]]nyams su myong bar byed do/_/rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro/_ri la yang thad kar 'gro/_rab la yang lus kyis mi thogs par thad kar 'gro'o/_/'di lta ste/_nam mkha' dang sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang byi'u zul byed de dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang mi 
[\[159b.3\]]nub par rgyun phyogs su 'gro ste/_dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/skyil mo krung gis nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed de/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/zla ba dang /_nyi ma 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba la yang lag pas nyug cing kun du nyug 
[\[159b.4\]]par byed do/_/de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_ci bdag gis 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa de las 'dzam bu'i snye ma kha dog dang dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs 
[\[159b.5\]]spyod cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'am/_gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na bil ba'i tshal lam/_ka pid tha'i tshal lam/_skyur rtsi'i tshal gang yin pa de las skyur rtsi'i 'bras bu kha dog dang dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang 
[\[159b.6\]]ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'am/_byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du song la ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/rgyal tshe na 
[\[159b.7\]]bzhi'i ris sam/_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song la/_lha'i bdud rtsi las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'am/_yul ljongs 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang /_
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]mi mang pos gang ba'i bar de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag gis longs spyod cing /_lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'am snyam mo/_/de nas yang lha sbyin 'di snyam du 
[\[160a.2\]]sems te/_bdag gis yul ma ga d+hA'i mi gtso bo gang zhig dbang du byas na de dbang du gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen po tshogs chung ngus bdag gi dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhon nu ma skyes dgra 'di pha shi nas pha'i rgyal srid kyi 
[\[160a.3\]]dbang phyug la bzhag par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis gzhon nu ma skyes dgra dbang du 'gyur bar bya ste/_de dbang du gyur na skye bo'i tshogs chen po tshegs chung ngus bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas lha sbyin gyis glang po cang shes bzang po dang /_rta cang 
[\[160a.4\]]shes bzang po dang /_dge slong skra bregs shing snam sbyar bgos pa dar la bab pa dag tu bsgyur nas gzhon nu ma skyes dgra'i sgo nas zhugs shing sge'u chung ngu 'byung ba dang /_sge'u chung nas zhugs shing sgor 'byung bar byed do/_/res 'ga' gzhon nu gser gyi 'og pag gis bcings 
[\[160a.5\]]par bsgyur nas gzhon nu ma skyes dgra'i pang na 'gre ldog par byed do/_/ma skyes dgra yang gzhon nu de la 'dzin cing kha sprad de 'khyud par byed do/_/res 'ga' ni khar mchil ma'i thal ba blugs na de yang lha sbyin med par byed do/_/'di lta ste rnyed pa dang bkur stis zil gyis non pas 
[\[160a.6\]]sems gtugs pa'i phyir ro/_/de na gzhon nu ma skyes dgra lhag par yang sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba thob ste/_kye ma ston pa bas ni 'phags pa lha sbyin ches mthu che'o zhes dad par gyur to/_/de la dad par gyur nas lhag par bya ba byed do/_/shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang lhan 
[\[160a.7\]]cig snga dro dang phyi dro rim gro byed du 'gro'o/_/de la g.yos kyi sna rdze'u lnga brgya tsam yang bkad sa dang bkad sa dag tu stobs par byed do/_/lha sbyin yang dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig bkad sa'i gung la 'dug par byed do/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs bgos 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/dge slong rab tu mang po rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyod pas lha sbyin la rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/_ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes dgras shing rta lnga brgya tsam 
[\[160b.2\]]dang lhan cig snga dro dang phyi dro rim gro byed du 'gro zhing /_de la g.yos kyi sna rdze'u lnga brgya tsam yang bkad sa dang bkad sa dag tu stobs par byed do/_/lha sbyin yang dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig bkad sa'i gung la 'dug par byed do zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po'i khab tu 
[\[160b.3\]]bsod snyoms spyad de/_zas kyi bya ba byas shing zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs nas chos gos dang lhung bzed mkhos su phab ste rkang pa bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig 
[\[160b.4\]]tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'dir bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs 'tshal lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs 
[\[160b.5\]]nas btsun pa bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad pa na/_lha sbyin la rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/_ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes dgras shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig snga dro dang phyi dro rim gro bgyid du mchi zhing /_de 
[\[160b.6\]]la g.yos kyi sna rdze'u lnga brgya tsam yang bkad sa dang bkad sa dag tu stobs par bgyid do/_/lha sbyin yang dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig bkad sa'i gung la mchis par bgyid do zhes thos lags so/_/dge slong dag khyed lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti la dga' bar ma byed 
[\[160b.7\]]cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni gsod pa yin no/_/lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni smad pa yin no/_/dge slong dag dper na chu shing gi 'bras bu phyung nas brnyis par 'gyur zhing /_chu shing ni 'bras bu phyung nas bskams par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lha 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni gsod pa yin no/_/lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni smad pa yin no/_/dper na sba dang smyug ma ni 'bras bu phyung nas bskams par 'gyur zhing /_sba dang smyug ma ni 'bras bu phyung nas dung yag tu 'gyur ba de bzhin du lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur 
[\[161a.2\]]sti ni gsod pa yin no/_/lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni smad pa yin no/_/dper na dre'u mo mngal du bzung nas 'chi bar 'gyur zhing /_dre'u mo ni mngal du bzung nas ma rung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni gsod pa yin no/_/lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni smad 
[\[161a.3\]]pa yin no/_/dge slong dag lha sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti de lta bu ji snyed byung ba de dag ni skyes bu gti mug can de la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa ma yin pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti gang yin pa 
[\[161a.4\]]zil gyis mnan par bya'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti byung ba la sems gtugs te gnas par mi bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab bar bya'o/_/chu shing 'bras bu smyug 'bras dang /_/sba ni 'bras bus skems pa dang /_/rang gi bu yis dre'u mo ltar/_/skyes bu tha shal bkur 
[\[161a.5\]]stis 'joms/_/ji srid byis pa mngon byed pa/_/de srid du ni phung bar 'gyur/_/byis pa'i dkar ba'i cha 'joms pa/_/rtse mo las kyang ltung bar 'gyur/_/de nas lha sbyin rnyed pa dang bkur stis zil gyis non pa sems yongs su gtugs pa la sdig pa'i 'dod pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/_
[\[161a.6\]]da ni bcom ldan 'das bgres 'khogs gtugs te 'khor bzhi la gdams ngag dbog tu mnyel bar gyur gyis/_e ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun bdag la spangs te bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su drang zhing /_bcom ldan 'das ni thugs las chung ngur 
[\[161a.7\]]mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson pas bzhugs kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems bskyed ma thag tu lha sbyin rdzu 'phrul de las yongs su nyams kyang bdag yongs su nyams so zhes mi shes so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos skrod nga'i bu dge slong nog can zhes 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgoms nas 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa'i 'dun pa spang ba'i phyir de la mang du gnas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ngan 
[\[161b.2\]]spong gi chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs byed kyi tshal gyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na 'dug go/_/de nas tshangs pa nog can gyis lha sbyin rdzu 'phrul de las yongs su nyams par shes nas/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am brkyang ba las bskum 
[\[161b.3\]]pa tsam gyis tshangs pa nog can tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar byas te ngan spong du 'ongs nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas tshangs pa nog can gyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud 
[\[161b.4\]]gal gyi bu chen po shes par gyis shig_/lha sbyin rnyed pa dang bkur stis zil gyis non pa sems gtugs pa la sdig pa'i 'dod pa 'di lta bu skyes te/_da ni bcom ldan 'das bgres 'khogs gtugs te 'khor bzhi la gdams ngag dbog tu mnyel bar gyur gyis/_e ma'o 
[\[161b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun bdag la spangs te/_bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su drang zhing /_bcom ldan 'das ni thugs las chung ngur gnas shing mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson pas bzhugs kyang 
[\[161b.6\]]ci ma rung snyam du sems bskyed ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul de las slar yongs su nyams te/_yongs su nyams kyang bdag ni slar yongs su nyams so zhes ma shes kyis/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu snying brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas don 'di 
[\[161b.7\]]rgyas par gsol na legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa nog can la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/_/de nas tshangs pa nog can gyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po cang mi smra bas khas blangs par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa tshangs pa nog can song nas ring po ma lon par shes nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na ngan spong nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rgyal 
[\[162a.2\]]po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas 
[\[162a.3\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa nog can dang lhan cig bar skabs kyi gtam ji snyed glengs pa de dag thams cad rgyas par gsol to/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan 
[\[162a.4\]]pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu snga mo zhig tu lha sbyin sems la bkram nas rig par ma byas sam ci na da gzod tshangs pa nog can gyis sbran/_btsun pa mad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu thabs cig tu 
[\[162a.5\]]bar skabs kyi gtam 'di gleng bar mdzad pa na/_de nas lha sbyin grogs dge slong bzhi po ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha sbyin rgyang ring po kho na 
[\[162a.6\]]nas gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu lha sbyin 'o ni da ltar 'ong gis tshig srungs shig dang /_de'u re skyes bu gti mug 'o ni bdag nyid kyis/_bdag nyid lung bstan to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud 
[\[162a.7\]]gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na 'od ma'i tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_ngan spong gi chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs byed kyi tshal gyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]zhugs so/_/de nas lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lha sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/da ni bcom 
[\[162b.2\]]ldan 'das bgres 'khogs gtugs te 'khor bzhi la gdams ngag dbog tu mnyel bar gyur gyis/_e ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun bdag la spongs shig dang /_bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su drang gis/_bcom ldan 'das ni thugs las chung 
[\[162b.3\]]ngur bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson pas bzhugs su gsol/_skyes bu gti mug re zhig shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag la yang ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun mi spongs na/_ro dang 'dra ba mchil ma 'thung ba khyod la ltag la spong /_
[\[162b.4\]]de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu la ni bsngags pa gsungs la bdag la ni ro dang 'dra ba mchil ma 'thung ba'o zhes smad pa gsungs so snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha sbyin 'khrugs pa dang /_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[162b.5\]]nga rgyal dang /_'chab pa dang /_bgrongs pa dang /_mi bzod pa dang /_ma dad pa bstan to/_/de nas lha sbyin gyis 'jal to zhes byas nas mgo lan gsum lcogs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po dgu bcu rtsa bdun 
[\[162b.6\]]pa/_de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas 
[\[162b.7\]]pa na dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten te gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su sdus shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten te gnas pa de dag thams 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]cad rim gro'i gnas su bsogs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di 
[\[163a.2\]]skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten te mchis pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su bsogs lags te/_bcom ldan 'das da ni de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das rim gro'i gnas 
[\[163a.3\]]gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ston pa lnga po 'di dag 'jig rten na yod cing mngon te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di na 
[\[163a.4\]]ston pa gcig ni tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag ste nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba ste/_de nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes nas ston pa shes ldan 'di ni tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa 
[\[163a.5\]]yin bzhin du bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag ste nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/_gal te bdag cag gis gzhan la de skad smras na/_des na 'di'i yid la mi 'bab par 'gyur bas ston pa de la yid du mi 'ong par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bdag cag gis
