[\[163a.6\]]glengs te ci rung /_ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par 'gyur grang /_'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_nad gsos kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis sems so snyam ste/_de nyan thos rnams kyis tshul khrims las rjes su 
[\[163a.7\]]srung bar sems so/_/ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams kyis tshul khrims kyi sgo nas rjes su srung bar re ba yin te/_'di ni 'jig rten na ston pa yod cing mngon pa dang po yin no/_/gzhan yang 'di na ston pa gcig ni 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag gi 'tsho ba 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]yongs su dag ste nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba ste/_de nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes te/_ston pa shes ldan 'di ni 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag gi 'tsho ba yongs su dag ste/_nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes 
[\[163b.2\]]khas 'che ba yin te/_gal te bdag cag gis gzhan la de skad smras na/_des na 'di'i yid la mi 'bab par 'gyur bas ston pa de la yid du mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bdag cag gis glengs te ci rung /_ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par 'gyur grang /_'di bdag cag 
[\[163b.3\]]la 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_nad gsos kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis sems so snyam ste/_de nyan thos rnams kyis 'tsho ba'i sgo nas rjes su srung bar sems so/_/ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams kyis 'tsho ba'i sgo nas 
[\[163b.4\]]rjes su srung bar re ba yin te/_'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing mngon pa'i ston pa gnyis pa yin no/_/gzhan yang 'di na ston pa gcig ni shes pa mthong ba yongs su ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag gi shes pa mthong ba yongs su dag ste/_nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba 
[\[163b.5\]]ste/_de nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes nas ston pa shes ldan 'di'i shes pa mthong ba yongs su ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag gi shes pa mthong ba yongs su dag ste/_nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/_gal te bdag cag gis gzhan 
[\[163b.6\]]la de skad smras na/_des na 'di'i yid la mi 'bab par 'gyur bas ston pa de la yid du mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bdag cag gis glengs te ci rung /_ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par 'gyur grang /_'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_
[\[163b.7\]]gnas mal dang /_nad gsos kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis sems so snyam ste/_de nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa mthong ba'i sgo nas rjes su srung bar sems so/_/ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa mthong ba'i sgo nas rjes su srung bar re ba yin te/_'di ni 'jig rten na 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]yod cing mngon pa'i ston pa gsum pa yin no/_/gzhan yang 'di na ston pa gcig ni lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin bzhin du bdag gis lung ston pa ni phun sum tshogs pa yin te nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba ste/_de nyan thos rnams dang 
[\[164a.2\]]lhan cig gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes nas ston pa shes ldan 'di ni lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin bzhin du bdag gi lung ston pa ni phun sum tshogs pa yin te/_nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/_gal te bdag cag gis gzhan la de skad ces smras na/_des 
[\[164a.3\]]na 'di'i yid la mi 'bab par 'gyur bas ston pa de la yid du mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba de bdag cag gis glengs te ci rung ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par 'gyur grang /_'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_nad gsos 
[\[164a.4\]]kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis sems so snyam ste/_de nyan thos rnams kyis lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas rjes su srung bar sems so/_/ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams kyis lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas rjes su srung bar re ba yin te/_'di ni 
[\[164a.5\]]'jig rten na yod cing mngon pa'i ston pa bzhi pa yin no/_/gzhan yang 'di na ston pa gcig ni chos 'dul ba nyes par 'chad bzhin du bdag gi chos 'dul ba ni legs par bshad pa yin te nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba ste/_de nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'i 
[\[164a.6\]]rgyus so sor shes nas ston pa shes ldan 'di ni chos 'dul ba nyes par 'chad bzhin du bdag gi chos 'dul ba ni legs par bshad pa ste/_nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/_gal te bdag cag gis gzhan la de skad smras na/_des na 'di'i yid la mi 'bab par 
[\[164a.7\]]'gyur bas ston pa de la yid du mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bdag cag gis glengs te ci rung /_ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par 'gyur grang 'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]kyis sems so snyam ste/_de nyan thos rnams kyis chos 'dul ba legs par bshad pa'i sgo nas rjes su srung bar sems so/_/ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams kyis chos 'dul ba legs par bshad pa'i sgo nas rjes su srung bar re ba yin te/_'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing mngon pa'i 
[\[164b.2\]]ston pa lnga pa yin no/_/dge slong dag nga ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa kho na yin pas nga tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ste nyon mongs can ma yin no zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/_nyan thos rnams kyis nga la tshul khrims kyi sgo nas rjes su srung bar bsam yang mi dgos la nga yang nyan thos 
[\[164b.3\]]rnams kyis tshul khrims kyi sgo nas rjes su srung bar 'dod pa mi mnga'o/_/dge slong dag nga ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa kho na yin pas nga'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag ste nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/_nyan thos rnams kyis nga la 'tsho ba'i sgo nas rjes su srung bar bsam 
[\[164b.4\]]yang mi dgos la/_nga la yang nyan thos rnams kyis 'tsho ba'i sgo nas rjes su srung bar 'dod pa mi mnga'o/_/dge slong dag nga ni ye shes gzigs pa yongs su dag pa kho na yin pas nga ye shes gzigs pa yongs su dag ste nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/_nyan 
[\[164b.5\]]thos rnams kyis nga la ye shes gzigs pa'i sgo nas rjes su srung bar bsam yang mi dgos la nga yang nyan thos rnams kyis ye shes gzigs pa'i sgo nas rjes su srung bar 'dod pa mi mnga'o/_/dge slong dag nga ni lung ston pa dang ldan pa kho na yin pas nga'i lung ston pa phun sum tshogs te nyon 
[\[164b.6\]]mongs pa can ma yin no zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/_nyan thos rnams kyis nga la lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas rjes su bsrung bar bsam yang mi dgos la/_nga yang nyan thos rnams kyis lung ston pa dang ldan par rjes su srung bar 'dod pa mi mnga'o/_/dge slong dag nga'i chos 'dul 
[\[164b.7\]]ba ni legs par gsungs pa kho na yin pas nga'i chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa ste/_nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/_nyan thos rnams kyis nga la chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa'i sgo nas rjes su bsrung bar bsam mi dgos la/_nga yang nyan thos 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]rnams kyis chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i sgo nas rjes su srung bar 'dod pa mi mnga'o/_/dge slong dag nga ni khyed la tshar bcad cing tshar bcad cing /_thag bcug cing thag bcug cing rab tu smra'i khyed la ngo ni mi byed de/_rdza mkhan gyis rdza ma tshos pa rnams 
[\[165a.2\]]la bya ba bzhin du gang rung ba de 'jog par zad pas nga'i tshig gi lam rnams bzod par yang gyis shig_/de nas lha sbyin gyis ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin la smras pa/_ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos 
[\[165a.3\]]byin dag tshur/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'dug bzhin du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba dang 'khor lo dbye bar bya'o/_/des na bdag cag shi ste 'das na yang /_dge sbyong gau ta ma de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_de ltar mthu che ba 'dug bzhin du lha sbyin dang /_ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya 
[\[165a.4\]]dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin gyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa phye ba dang /_'khor lo phye ba byas so zhes phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su grags pa dang /_sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa snyan pa rgya cher 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha sbyin bdag cag 
[\[165a.5\]]gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba dang /_'khor lo dbye bar bya mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba lha'i mig dang pha rol gyi sems rig pa dag yod la/_de dag ni rgyang ring po 
[\[165a.6\]]nas kyang mthong la/_drung na 'dug kyang mi snang ba dag yin te/_de rnams kyi sems kyis sems khyab par byas nas/_yid kyis yid rnam par shes kyi/_de rnams kyis bdag cag bskyod pa nyid kyis shes par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_ko ka li ka dag tshur thabs yod kyis 
[\[165a.7\]]bdag cag dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi drung du song la gnas brtan dag thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig dang /_bdag cag gis gnas brtan rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o zhes yo byad thams cad kyis bstab par bya zhing dge slong gsar bu rnams la yang 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_lhung bzed kyi snod dang /_chu tshags dang /_ska rags dang /_lung 'bogs pa dang /_klog tu gzhug pa dang /_'don du gzhug pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la byed pas nye bar bsdu zhing rim gro bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa lha sbyin thabs de ni 
[\[165b.2\]]bden pa zhig yod do/_/de na lha sbyin gyis dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar brtsams so/_/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis lha sbyin dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar bskyod pa nyid tshor nas skabs de dge slong rnams la smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams 
[\[165b.3\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa lha sbyin ni dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i slad du rtul ba bgyid lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis lha sbyin dang /_de lta bu dang mthun pa gzhan su yang rung ba la 
[\[165b.4\]]bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o/_/bsgo ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/_lha sbyin khyod dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar ma byed cig_/dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig_/lha sbyin khyod dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/
[\[165b.5\]]dge 'dun mthun mi phyed/_kun tu dga'/_mi rtsod/_mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing /_chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo shig_/dge slong de rnams kyis lha sbyin bzhams 
[\[165b.6\]]te bsgo ba dang /_de bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]no zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed nas/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag cag gis lha sbyin 
[\[165b.7\]]la bzhams te bsgo lags na/_de bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis lha sbyin dang /_
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/bsgo ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad 
[\[166a.2\]]'dug cing mthun par gyur pa dang /_dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_lha sbyin 'di dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i slad du rtul te dbyen bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste mchis 
[\[166a.3\]]na/_'di la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 
[\[166a.4\]]'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis lha sbyin la lha sbyin khyod dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul par ma byed cig_/dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig_/lha sbyin khyod dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis 
[\[166a.5\]]shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed/_kun du dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes lha sbyin la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba 
[\[166a.6\]]mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_lha sbyin 'di dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i slad du rtul te dbyen bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste mchis nas 'di la dge slong mang pos 
[\[166a.7\]]bzhams te bsgo ba na/_bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis lha sbyin la lha sbyin khyod dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]bar ma byed cig_/dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig_/lha sbyin khyod dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed/_kun du dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres 
[\[166b.2\]]pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_lha sbyin khyod dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar ma byed cig_/dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig_/lha sbyin 
[\[166b.3\]]khyod dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed/_kun du dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig_/'don pa gcig cing chu dang /_'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro 
[\[166b.4\]]zhes lha sbyin la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag lha sbyin la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de 
[\[166b.5\]]bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i bar du bya'o/_/dge 'dun de rnams kyis lha sbyin la gsol ba dang /_bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/_bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]no zhes rjes su tha snyad 
[\[166b.6\]]'dogs so/_/de'i grogs byed cing mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong bzhi po ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin te/_de rnams kyis kyang dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang 
[\[166b.7\]]rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba 'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag cag gis lha sbyin la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/_bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la 
[\[167a.2\]]nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid lags so/_/de'i grogs bgyid cing mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong bzhi po ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya 
[\[167a.3\]]dang /_rgya mtshos byin de rnams kyang dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par 
[\[167a.4\]]blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la bzod cing 'dod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes mchi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[167a.5\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin la bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o/_/bzhams te bsgo ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/_ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin 
[\[167a.6\]]dag khyed shes bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun par dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa'i grogs byed cing mi mthun par rjes su phyogs par ma byed cig_/dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe 
[\[167a.7\]]dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes ma zer cig_/tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag dge 'dun 'byed 'dod par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag dge 'dun mthun 
[\[167b.2\]]par smra ba nyid du 'dod par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed/_kun tu dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig_/'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na 
[\[167b.3\]]bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo shig_/dge slong de rnams kyis/_ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos 
[\[167b.4\]]byin rnams la bzhams te bsgo na/_bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan tan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed do/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_
[\[167b.5\]]btsun pa bdag cag gis ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la bzhams te bsgo lags na/_bsgo yang gzhi de nyid nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 
[\[167b.6\]]'dogs par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dang gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/
[\[167b.7\]]bsgo ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa dang /_dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]pa rnams gsan du gsol/_ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin 'di dag 'tshal bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i slad du rtul bar bgyid cing de mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs par gyur 
[\[168a.2\]]nas dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas 
[\[168a.3\]]rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la bzod cing 'dod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes mchis nas/_'di dag la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo na 
[\[168a.4\]]bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis ko ka 
[\[168a.5\]]li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin khyed cag shes bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par gyur pa'i rtsod 
[\[168a.6\]]pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa dang de mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs par ma byed cig_/dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang 
[\[168a.7\]]ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba ma yin/_'dul ba smra ba ma yin gyi tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba/_'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni 
[\[168b.2\]]chos ma yin pa dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod cing bzod par 
[\[168b.3\]]ma byed cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed dge 'dun 'byed 'dod par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun mthun pa nyid du 'dod par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 
[\[168b.4\]]'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed/_kun tu dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba mdzad na/_
[\[168b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_ko ka li ka dang /_
[\[168b.6\]]khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin 'di dag 'tshal bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i slad du rtul bar bgyid cing de mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs par gyur nas dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang 
[\[168b.7\]]rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra pa/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes mchis nas/_'di dag la dge slong mang pos bzhams te 
[\[169a.2\]]bsgo na/_bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos 
[\[169a.3\]]byin rnams la ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin khyed cag shes bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa dang de 
[\[169a.4\]]mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs par ma byed cig_/dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_
[\[169a.5\]]dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes ma zer cig_/
[\[169a.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba ma yin/_'dul ba smra ba ma yin gyi/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba/_'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par blangs 
[\[169a.7\]]nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes ma zer cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed 'dod par ma 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]byed par/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun mthun pa nyid du 'dod par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed/_kun tu dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_
[\[169b.2\]]ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ko ka li 
[\[169b.3\]]ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po'o/_/de bzhin du lan 
[\[169b.4\]]gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de 
[\[169b.5\]]bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/_ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang /_bzhi'i las kyis bsgo'o/_/dge slong de rnams 
[\[169b.6\]]kyis ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/_de rnams dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas/_
[\[169b.7\]]'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed do/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag cag gis ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin la gsol pa dang /_
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]bzhi'i las kyis bsgo lags na/_bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la 
[\[170a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lha sbyin gyis nga'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba dang 'khor lo dbye bar bya nus te/_'di ltar 'di'i grogs byed cing mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong bzhi po ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya 
[\[170a.3\]]dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams yin pas so/_/lha sbyin gyis bdag la dge sbyong gau ta mas lha sbyin gyis nga'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba dang 'khor lo dbye bar bya nus te/_'di ltar 'di'i grogs byed cing mi mthun par smra ba rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong bzhi 
[\[170a.4\]]po ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams yin pas so zhes lung bstan pa thos so/_/thos nas kyang ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la smras pa/_ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da 
[\[170a.5\]]dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dag shes par gyis shig_/dge sbyong gau ta mas kho bo la lha sbyin gyis nga'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba dang /_'khor lo dbye bar bya nus te/_'di ltar 'di'i grogs byed cing mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su 
[\[170a.6\]]phyogs pa'i dge slong bzhi po ko ka li ka dang /_khaN+Da dra bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams yin pas so zhes lung bstan to/_/ma la kho bos lhag par yang dge 'dun dbye bar bya ba'i phyir rtul bar bya'o zhes de dge slong lnga brgya dang lhan cig kun dga' ra 
[\[170a.7\]]ba'i nang du tshogs shing za bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pas ci'i phyir gsum ni za bar rjes su gnang la/_tshogs shing 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]za ba ni bkag pa mdzad ce na/_rigs 'bar ba la brten pa dang /_gang zag sdig pa 'dod pa rnams kyi phyogs gzhom pa'i don gnyis gzigs pa ste/_gang zag sdig pa 'dod pa rnams dge 'dun kho na la brten/_dge 'dun kho na'i ched du byas/_dge 'dun kho na ma shes 
[\[170b.2\]]shing ya mtshan can lta bur byas nas dge 'dun kho na dang lhan cig rtsod pa bzung nas gnas par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam pas so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gyis lha sbyin la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung phog pa de'i tshe/_de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_gnas 
[\[170b.3\]]brtan khyod kyis ci'i phyir lha sbyin la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung phog_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis de sdig pa 'dod par ma shes mod/_gal te bdag gis shes na de la bdag gis rdzu zhes bya ba tsam gyi lung yang mi dbog na rdzu 'phrul gyi lam lta smos kyang 
[\[170b.4\]]ci dgos/_de nas lha sbyin la dge slong rnams kyis gcugs pas smras pa/_lha sbyin khyod kyi dpal dang skal ba phun sum tshogs pa ci yod pa de thams cad ni gnas brtan 'od srung stobs bcu ldan la brten te yin na khyod de'i drung du mi 'gro'am/_de rnams kyis bsams 
[\[170b.5\]]pa/_bdag cag gis 'di bskul na de'i drung du 'gro zhing des 'di slar zlog par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de la de ltar bskul ba na smras pa/_kho bo la des ci zhig byas/_kho bos brtson 'grus la gnas te nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson 
[\[170b.6\]]pas gnas nas bsam gtan dang po la brten te rdzu 'phrul 'grub par ma byas sam zhes de'i tshig smras ma thag kho nar byas pa mi gzo bas rdzu 'phrul las nyams par gyur to/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[170b.7\]]la zhus pa/_btsun pa lha sbyin byas pa mi gzo bas rdzu 'phrul las nyams pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'di 'das pa na yang byas pa mi gzo bas rig sngags las nyams pa de nyon cig 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor ba dang /_zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang bas rgyal srid byed du 'jug go zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de la rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang gdol pa/_rig 
[\[171a.2\]]sngags dang gsang sngags su mkhas pa zhig yod de/_des sa 'dzin gyi rig sngags sbyar nas rdzu 'phrul gyis ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang las dus ma yin pa dang /_dus tshigs ma yin pa'i me tog dang 'bras bu dag blangs nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin la 'bul ba byed do/_/rgyal po tshangs 
[\[171a.3\]]sbyin de la mngon par dga' nas bya dga' sbyin par byed do/_/ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u zhig gsang sngags don du gnyer zhing gsang sngags tshol ba na brgyud pa las thos nas yul nas bA rA Na sIr son te/_de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang 
[\[171a.4\]]gdol pa de'i drung du song ste phyin nas smras pa/_mkhan po la bdag bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'tshal lo/_/ci'i phyir/_rig sngags kyi slad du'o/_/des tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_rig sngags su la'ang mi sbyin te/_/rig sngags dang ni lhan cig 'chi/_/yang na rig 
[\[171a.5\]]dang bsnyen bkur dang /_nor gyis rig sngags sbyin par bya/_/des smras pa/_mkhan po gal te de lta lags na bdag cag bsnyen bkur bgyid na dus ji tsam gyi bar du bgyi/_des smras pa/_lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du bsnyen bkur byas na sbyin nam mi sbyin du zad do/_/de shin tu 
[\[171a.6\]]rig sngags don du gnyer ba zhig pas khas blangs so/_/de nas mgu bar bya ba lhur blangs nas gus par byas te bsnyen bkur bya bar brtsams so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gdol pa de chang gis myos nas khyim du 'ongs so/_/bram ze'i khye'u des bsams pa/_mkhan po 'di ma 
[\[171a.7\]]'os par chang gis myos kyis 'di'i glor nyal bar bya'o snyam mo/_/ji tsam na gdol pa de mal nas 'gre bar brtsams te de 'gres pa dang khri'i ngos chag pa bram ze'i khye'u yis thos nas sad de des bsams pa/_mkhan po sdug bsngal zhing nyal bar 'gyur gyis/_mal bdag gis 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]khri'i ngos su rgyab gtad do snyam nas/_des khri'i ngos su rgyab gtad nas 'dug go/_/'di ni chos nyid yin ter ro ba rnams las gang stobs dang ldan pa de'i thun dang pos myos pa sangs par 'gyur na/_de chang lci ba'i shugs kyis bram ze'i khye'u'i rgyab la skyugs pas gtor to/_/
[\[171b.2\]]des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis lus bsgul tam tshig phyung na mkhan pos thos te sad nas slar gnyid ldog par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod do snyam nas de mnags nas 'dug go/_/ji tsam na gdol pa de rang nyid sad pa dang de lta bu'i ngan pa de mthong nas de nas 
[\[171b.3\]]dris pa 'di su yin des smras pa/_mkhan po bdag ni bde ba'i zla ba lags so/_/bu 'di ltar 'dug ste ci byed/_des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang /_de yang lhag par dga' nas smras pa/_bu kho bo mgu bar gyur gyis song la khrus byos te shog shig dang khyod la rig 
[\[171b.4\]]sngags sbyin no/_/des khrus byas te 'ongs pa dang des de la rig sngags byin no/_/bram ze rnams ni rgod bag can yin pas des nogs ma thub ste bsams pa/_re zhig sngags 'di 'di nyid du sad la de nas gzhan du 'gro'o snyam nas/_des rig sngags de sbyar te nam mkha' 
[\[171b.5\]]la 'phangs nas myur bar ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang la song ste dus ma yin pa dang dus tshigs ma yin pa'i me tog dang /_'bras bu dag blangs te 'ongs nas des de dag rgyal po'i mdun na 'don la byin no/_/des kyang rgyal po tshangs sbyin la'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod kyis 
[\[171b.6\]]'di su las 'ongs/_des smras pa/_yul thag ring po nas bram ze'i khye'u zhig mchis te/_des 'di dag bdag la stsal to/_/de ni lhag par rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang zhing bram ze 'dod pa chung ba lags kyis/_gdol pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis smad 
[\[171b.7\]]pa 'dis ci zhig bgyi/_de dbang ba'i 'tsho ba bkum ste bram ze'i khye'u 'di la stsal du gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_de bzhin du gyis shig_/de nas mdun na 'don gyis gdol pa'i 'tsho ba bcad nas bram ze'i khye'u de la byin no/_/de byas pa mi gzo ba des rig sngags 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]de las yongs su nyams par gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gdol pa gang yin pa de ni 'od srung stobs bcu ldan 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 
[\[172a.2\]]'di rig sngags las yongs su nyams par gyur to/_/da ltar yang 'di rdzu 'phrul las yongs su nyams par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_ci nas kyang byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor ba can du bya ste/_chung ngu byas pa yang chud mi gzan na 
[\[172a.3\]]mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du rgyal po'i khab tu bzhugs nas/_dge slong rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas ga yA gang na ba 
[\[172a.4\]]der rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang ga yAr byon nas ga yA na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'bras sA lu sog ma'i sbubs su smin pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam dbul ba btang ba dang /_lha sbyin gyis ma skyes dgra la smras 
[\[172a.5\]]pa/_rgyal po bgres po dge sbyong gau ta ma la ci 'dra bar bya ba byed pa gzigs la/_bdag cag ljongs rgyu zhing mchi ba na bdag cag la yang bsod snyoms kyis mi brel bar gyis shig_/lha sbyin yang 'khor lnga brgyas bskor te ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba dang /_lha sbyin la rgyal po ma 
[\[172a.6\]]skyes dgras 'bras sA lu sog ma'i sbubs su smin pa shing rta lnga brgya lam du bskur ba dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas bsams pa/_shing rta lnga brgya tsam po 'di su zhig las 'ongs snyam ste/_de rnams ngo mtshar skyes nas lam nas 'gro ba'i mi dag la dris pa dang de rnams kyis rgyas par 
[\[172a.7\]]smras so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa rgyal po ma skyes dgra snod ma lags pas snod ma lags par char phab pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgyal po ma skyes 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]dgra snod ma yin pas snod ma yin par char phab pa da ltar gyi 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de ji ltar 'dis 'das pa na yang snod ma yin par char phab pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong rdal med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas zhig na drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas me tog 
[\[172b.2\]]dang 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig yod de/_de na drang srong zas su rtsa ba dang /_chu dang /_'bras bu za ba/_ral pa can shing shun gyon pa/_'bras bu lhung ba la longs spyod pa dag gnas so/_/ji tsam na bsti gnas de na yod pa'i shing a mra'i yal ga 'bras bu can 
[\[172b.3\]]dag 'bras bu smin pas g.yur za zhing 'dug go/_/drang srong rnams kyis 'bras bu bslangs pa na shing de la gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de ser sna'i zil gyis non pas ma byin no/_/de nas drang srong de rnams kyis drang srong gcig bsti gnas su 'dug tu bcug nas rtsa ba 
[\[172b.4\]]dang 'bras bu'i phyir 'khyam du dong ma thag tu chom rkun pa lnga brgya bsti gnas su lhags nas de rnams kyis shing de mthong ste/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gis 'bras bu ji ltar longs spyod par bya/_chom rkun pa'i sde dpon gyis smras pa/_sta res shing rtsa 
[\[172b.5\]]nas bcad la 'bras bu rnams bza'o zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /_lhas 'bras bu thams cad sa la blags nas chom rkun pa rnams kyis ji tsam 'dod pa zos nas dong ngo /_/drang srong rnams lhags nas dris pa/_shing a mra'i 'bras bu rnams sus zos/_drang srong 
[\[172b.6\]]des tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_zhi ba tshangs par spyod rnams la/_/shing gi 'bras bu ma byin gyi/_/rkun po sdig byed de dag la/_/'bras bu rnams ni byin par gyur/_/de rnams kyis dris pa/_drang srong de ji lta bu yin/_/des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang de rnams kyis 
[\[172b.7\]]smad par brtsams pa/_ser sna'i zil gyis non pa'i lhas 'bras bu drang srong rnams la ma byin gyi/_snod ma yin pa'i rkun po rnams la byin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha gang yin pa de ni ma skyes dgra 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chom rkun pa'i sde dpon gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe na yang ma skyes dgra 'di ltar gyur pa na snod ma yin pas snod ma yin par char phab bo/_/da ltar yang snod ma yin pa 'dis snod ma yin par char 
[\[173a.2\]]phab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas/_rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/lha sbyin ni rgyal po'i khab tu gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la rgyun kho nar 'tshe bar byed do/_/
[\[173a.3\]]gang dang gang gtses pa de bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan du gsol ba gtong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo snam sbyar khyer la phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong dge slong zhig dang song la rgyal po'i khab kyi lam po che dang 
[\[173a.4\]]srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams la lha sbyin nam lha sbyin gyi phyogs kyis 'tsher bcug pa gang yin pa de rnams ni sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun gyi dang 'brel ba ma yin no zhes sgo shig_/gal te lha sbyin ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing 
[\[173a.5\]]mthu che ba yin no zhes zer na mthu chen por gyur pa las da ni rdzu 'phrul de las yongs su nyams so zhes smros shig_/de song nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la bsgo nas de rnams phyin 
[\[173a.6\]]chad bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan du gsol ba mi gtong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das snyun gyis thebs nas 'tsho byed kyis sman mar lcags mda' zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed ngo mtshar 
[\[173a.7\]]che'am/_bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che lags so/_/'tsho byed ya mtshan che'am/_bcom ldan 'das ya mtshan che lags so/_/'tsho byed shes sam/_bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so/_/'tsho byed mi shes sam/_bde bar gshegs pa ma 'tshal lags so/_/
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]'tsho byed ngo mtshar che ba ci yin/_bcom ldan 'das pa rnams ran spyod cing chab 'tshal ba de las bdud rtsi 'di 'byung la/_de las kyang bsgral ba'i sman mar lcags mda' zhes bgyi ba 'byung lags so/_/'tsho byed ya mtshan che ba ci yin/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 
[\[173b.2\]]byung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos bshad pa dang /_dge 'dun legs par sgrub pa lags so/_/shes pa ci yin/_bcom ldan 'das skye ba mchis na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'gum lags so/_/mi shes pa ci yin/_bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gang du 'gum pa de ma 'tshal 
[\[173b.3\]]lags so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs te bka' stsal pa 'tsho byed kyis 'tshal ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[173b.4\]]slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa na yang 'dis nga'i dgongs te bka' stsal pa shes par gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma 
[\[173b.5\]]blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang bu mo zhig 
[\[173b.6\]]btsas nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas gdu bu can zhes bya bar ming btags so/_/de yang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te/_de yang rigs dang mthun par ming btags 
[\[173b.7\]]so/_/des bsams pa/_bdag cag la bu lon ded pa dang nor 'phrog pa btsas kyis zong khyer te yul gyi mthar 'gro'o/_/des yang bsams pa/_bdag gi chung ma 'di dar la bab pa'i gzugs dang lang tsho la bab pas/_bdag gis 'di la kAr ShA pa Na mang po gtad de song na skyes 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]pa gzhan dang lhan cig chud gson par byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod kyis ma la bdag gis 'di la kAr ShA pa Na nyung zhig byin la 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de la kAr ShA pa Na nyung zhig byin nas lhag ma rnams gser gyi bum pa'i nang du blugs te/_de'i 
[\[174a.2\]]mgrin pa mu tig gi phreng bas bcings nas dur khrod kyi shing rta rna zhes bya ba'i drung du sbas nas zong thogs te yul gyi mthar song ngo /_/de de na rnyed pa mang po dang ldan pas des de nyid du bud med gcig blangs te 'dug nas de la bu yang mang du btsas so/_/da nas chung ma snga ma des gdu bu 
[\[174a.3\]]can dang khye'u gnyis lag las dang gnyen gyi mthus gsos bskyed do/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gi pha gar mchis/_des smras pa/_bu yul che ge mo zhes bya ba'i grong ga ge mo zhes bya ba de na de nor chen po dang ldan zhing 'dug go zhes thos kyis song dang gal te 
[\[174a.4\]]cung zad byin na khyed kyi 'tsho ba'i rkyen du 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa/_de pha tshol zhing rim gyis de'i drung du phyin nas de srang na 'khyam pa na phas bzhin ras las ngo shes nas bos te smras pa/_khyod gang nas 'ongs/_gang du 'gro 
[\[174a.5\]]'dod/_des rgyas par smras pa dang des bsams pa/_bdag gi bu de ni 'di kho na yin no zhes des de bzung ste/_bu khyod su la yang 'di bdag gi pha yin no zhes ma smra shig ces smras nas de de la shin tu sdug par byed do/_/de nas bu gzhan rnams kyis smras pa/_yab khye'u 'di 
[\[174a.6\]]su'i lags/_des smras pa/_'di nga'i grogs po zhig gi bu yin no/_/de rnams kyis bsams pa/_ji ltar 'di la shin tu sdug par byed pa las na gdon mi za bar 'di nyid kyi bu yin no snyam nas de rnams kyis phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/_'di ni mas dbyen gyi spun 
[\[174a.7\]]yin no snyam mo/_/des bsams pa/_sha 'khon rnams kyi nang na ni 'di lta ste/_chen chun ni tha chad yin pas 'di bsad par 'gyur pa'i gnas gang yin pa 'di nyid yod kyis gtang ngo /_/gal te cung zad brdzangs na nor la sogs pa'i phyir lam kar bsad par 'gyur gyis/_/ma 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]la bdag gis 'di la brjed byang cig byin te gtang ngo snyam du bsams nas bris pa/_grong khyer gyi ni grong rdal rta rna'i drung /_/sa yi shar du dpag tshad kyis bcad par/_/mkhas pas bag yod par ni brko byas na/_/bdag gi nor gyi skal ba 'thob 'gyur gyis/_/mgul chings gang 
[\[174b.2\]]yin de ni gdub can byin/_/des brjed byang de khyer te song ba dang lam kar mas dbyen gyi spun rnams kyis bzung nas smras pa/_khyod kyis yab las ci thob/_des smras pa/_'di ni brjed byang yin te ci yang med do/_/de rnams kyis bsams pa/_phas 'di brid nas btang ngo 
[\[174b.3\]]zhes de rnams kyis de btang ngo /_/rim gyis rang gi khyim du phyin nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos pa dang mas smras pa/_khyod kyis pha las [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ci thob/_des smras pa/_'di ni brjed byang yin te ci yang med do/_/des smras pa/_bu khyod des bslus te lam gyi tshegs phyung 
[\[174b.4\]]bar zad kyi [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang ma rnyed do/_/des smras pa/_yum bdag nyid chen po de bdag la mi 'drid do zhes byas nas des brjed byang de dpyad par brtsams te/_grong khyer zhes bya ba ni gang du btsas pa de ni grong khyer du 'dod do/_/grong rdal zhes bya ba ni gang du ro bsregs pa'o/_/rta 
[\[174b.5\]]rna'i drung zhes bya ba la rta zhes bya ba na rta rnams te de'i rna ba zhes bya ba'i shing ni rta rna ste/_de'i drung na zhes smras pa yin no/_/sa'i shar du zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs su'o/_/dpag tshad kyis bcad par zhes bya ba ni gnya' shing gang tsam gyis bcad par ro/_/des de ltar tshigs 
[\[174b.6\]]bcad kyi don dpyad nas mun tshab tshub tsam na dur khrod du song ste de'i nye 'khor du des bltas na shing rta rna zhig yod pa de'i shar gyi ngos su gnya' shing gang gcal te brkos pa dang /_ci tsam na gser gyi bum pa mgul mu tig gi phreng bas bcings pa zhig mthong nas/_de mgu bas de 
[\[174b.7\]]blangs nas khyim du song ste mu tig gi phreng ba ni bkrol te gdu bu can la byin no/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi de'i bu gang yin pa de ni 'tsho byed 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'dis nga'i bsams te 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]smras pa shes so/_/da ltar yang 'dis nga'i dgongs te bshad pa shes so/_/'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje'i sku mnga' la sku che ba yin pas de la mar nyung ngus ni gdangs par bya mi nus so snyam du brtags nas des mar srang sum bcu 
[\[175a.2\]]rtsa gnyis srang la bcal te lhung bzed bzed nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyi lhag ma dge slong rnams la 'brim du bcug pa dang /_'tsho byed dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyi lhag ma bor ro zhes byas 
[\[175a.3\]]nas phyag byas so/_/lha sbyin gyis bsams pa/_bdag gis kyang mar btung ngo snyam nas des 'tsho byed la dris pa/_'tsho byed dge sbyong gau ta mas mar ji tsam gyi tshad cig gsol/_des smras pa/_srang sum bcu so gnyis so/_/des smras pa/_kho bos kyang srang sum bcu rtsa gnyis 
[\[175a.4\]]btung ngo /_/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje'i sku mnga' la sku che bas 'di tsam yang 'ju bar spyod kyi/_khyod kyis ni 'ju bar mi nus so/_/des smras pa/_kho bo yang rdo rje'i lus can yin na ci'i phyir mi 'ju/_des mar srang sum bcu rtsa gnyis lhung bzed nas 
[\[175a.5\]]'thungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ni legs par zhu'o/_/lha sbyin gyis ni ma zhu'o/_/phyi de nyin par 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'jams gsol to/_/lha sbyin gyis nga rgyal bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsol to zhes mar ma zhu bzhin du thug pa 'thungs pas/_
[\[175a.6\]]sbos gzer nas gnad du gnod pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong bas de rgyu des na sdug bsngal nyam nga ba rtsub pa/_dog pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong zhing nyin dang mtshan du gnyid mi 'ong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni gnyen la gdung ba yin pas des gleng gzhi 
[\[175a.7\]]de bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu 'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil ba can bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/_'jigs pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'i phyag mngon du brkyang ste bya rgod kyi phung 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]po'i ri phug nas lha sbyin gyi spyi bor bzhag ste bden pa gsungs pa/_ji ltar nga bu gcig pa sgra can zin bzang po la dgongs pa de bzhin du lha sbyin la yang lhag chad med pa yin zhe na/_bden pa des nad zhi bar gyur cig ces bden pa'i tshig gsungs ma thag kho nar 
[\[175b.2\]]lha sbyin gyi nad zhi bar gyur cing de dbugs chad pa las slar dbugs byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la gtad nas brtags te des shes nas des bsams pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i lag pa yin no snyam na de bskal pa mi nyung bar ngan g.yo'i kun tu spyod pa dregs pa'i 
[\[175b.3\]]mthus bsgrubs pa'i bsam pa can yin pas de ltar sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen pos tshor ba zhi bar mdzad pa dang smras pa/_don grub khyod sman dpyad khong du chud pa ni legs na 'dis 'tsho bar nus sam/_kun tu bcom ldan 'das kyi bden pa'i gsung gis lha 
[\[175b.4\]]sbyin tshor ba drag pos nyen pas srog dang 'bral ba na sos par mdzad do/_/zhes sgra grags pa de lha sbyin gyi phyogs shin tu zhen pa rnams kyis kyang thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das la kye ma'o 'di ni byams pa yang dag pa dang ldan/_kye ma 'di ni sems can rnams 
[\[175b.5\]]la thugs rje legs par bsgoms pa yin no zhes ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to/_/dge slong rnams kyis lha sbyin la smras pa/_lha sbyin khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sos par mdzad kyi gzhan du na srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_de ni dbang 
[\[175b.6\]]du byed pa'i sgyu ma shes te des 'jig rten dbang du byed do/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_lha sbyin khas rlabs de thong la rang gi sems gtan la phob shig_/khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsos so/_/des smras pa/_mar zhu nas nad zhi bar zad mod des kho 
[\[175b.7\]]bo la ci zhig byas/_'di ni byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no zhes byas nas de rnams chas te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang the tshom skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]btsun pa lha sbyin byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor 
[\[176a.2\]]ba de nyon cig/_//sdom la/_kau shi dbang phyug chen po'i sde/_/a mra dang ni shing sta mo/_/dom gnyis shi ba'i rgyal po dang /_/nyams par byas dang dzu dzu ka/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong rdal med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas skyed mos tshal me tog dang 'bras 
[\[176a.3\]]bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod de/_de na kau shi ka dang rus gcig pa'i drang srong 'bras bu lhung ba la longs spyod pa/_zas su rtsa ba dang /_chu dang /_'bras bu za ba/_pags pa dang shing shun gyon pa zhig gnas te/_de'i bsti gnas 
[\[176a.4\]]kyi nye 'khor du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya rnams 'dris pas ci bder 'khod do/_/de dang ha cang yang mi ring bar bal glang mo zhig phru gu byung ste/_de bu byung ma thag tu seng ge'i sgra sgrogs nas de 'jigs sngangs nas phru gu bor te gcin rtug shor nas bros so/_/re zhig cig na drang srong 
[\[176a.5\]]de bsti gnas nas byung nas bsti gnas kyi nye 'khor gyi phyogs su lta zhing song ba las ji tsam na glang po che'i phru gu gsar du byung ma thag pa ma dang bral ba de mthong ngo /_/de nas drang srong de snying rjes bskyod pa'i snying gis de'i ma btsal ba'i phyir bsgrim pa'i mig gis kun tu lta bar 
[\[176a.6\]]brtsams pa na/_gang gi tshe gnas thams cad na mi snang ba de'i tshe de khyer nas bsti gnas su zhugs te/_des de bu bzhin du bsnun bsnyod de bskyed do/_/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe drang srong de'i bsti gnas su gnod pa byed de me tog gi shing rnams 
[\[176a.7\]]'byin par byed/_'bras bu'i shing rnams yal ga gcog par byed cing de dag dang gnod pa gzhan yang stong phrag dag byed do/_/drang srong des de la bsdigs te/_drang srong des bsdigs pa na de zhum zhum por byas te 'dug go/_/gang gi tshe 'dod chags skyes 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]par gyur pa de'i tshe bsdigs kyang brnyas thabs byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong des drag tu bsdigs pa dang drang srong de nyid bsad par brgyugs pa dang /_drang srong des spyil bu'i glo phug nas bros so/_/lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_sems 
[\[176b.2\]]can rab gdug byas pa chud gson pa'i/_/skyes bu ngan dang 'grogs pa bzang po min/_/ji ltar kau shi ka'i bsti gnas su/_/yun ring bskyed pa'i glang chen sdig byed bzhin/_/gus pas zas dang skom dang gnyi ga yis/_/skye bo ngan bsten khyod la ci zhig dgos/_/
[\[176b.3\]]nges par kau shi ka'i bsti gnas su/_/glang chen bzhin du de yis mthar grogs gsod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang po che dam pa 
[\[176b.4\]]gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/gzhan yang 'di ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig_/
[\[176b.5\]]dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sIr rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/de'i btsun mo zla 
[\[176b.6\]]'od ma zhes bya ba rmi lam rno ba yin te/_rmi lam du gang ci mthong ba de thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin pa zhig yod do/_/rgyal po de'i yul du byang chub sems dpa' [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skyes nas gser gyi glo zhes bya ste/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams 
[\[176b.7\]]kyi dpon por gyur to/_/de yang lus kyi gzi brjid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan zhing 'jig rten thams cad kyi yid dang /_mig tu sdug par byed pas 'dod pa skyed par byed do/_/gang gis de mthong na de rtog cing de nyid du sdod par byed do/_/de lhag par 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]rtog pa na yid gnyis su gyur te/_de rngon pas 'jigs pa dang /_'jig rten pa gzhan gyis 'jigs pas 'tsher zhing skrag pas spyod do/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_'jig rten chags nas ring por ma lon pa na dud 'gro rnams kyang mi'i skad du smra 
[\[177a.2\]]nus pa yin no/_/de nas bya rog cig de'i drung du 'ongs nas des de dang lhan cig bshes shing 'dre ba'i gtam byas nas smras pa/_kye zhang po khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar 'tsher zhing skrag pas spyod/_des smras pa/_tsha bo bdag gi lus skal ba dang ldan pa 'di la 'jig rten 
[\[177a.3\]]thams cad 'dod pa skyed pas kho bo 'jig rten gyis 'jigs shing rngon pas 'tsher zhing skrag pas spyod do/_/des smras pa/_zhang po bdag kyang de bas kyang 'ug pas 'jigs pas gcig la gcig bsrung bar bya ste/_bdag gis ni khyod nyin par bsrung ngo /_/khyod kyis ni 
[\[177a.4\]]bdag mtshan mo srungs shig ces de gnyis kyis de ltar dam bcas nas gnas so/_/ji tsam na mi zhig dgras lag pa phying ka log tu bcing bas dam du bcings nas chu gsar du bab pa shugs drag po'i dba'i nang du bor te/_de des khyer ba na nyam thag pa'i nga ros snying rje rje 
[\[177a.5\]]skad du smre sngags 'don par byed de/_gang gis de ring bdag gi srog_/'jig rten rnyed dka' sbyin 'gyur ba/_/bdag gis de yi dran bya zhing /_/de yi gor re long yang bya/_/stes dbang gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po de'i snying rje'i bsam pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs kyis 
[\[177a.6\]]yongs su bskor te/_'bab chu'i 'gram du nye bar song ngo /_/de nas mi 'o dod 'bod pa thos nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de rnams ni kun du bros so/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis log par ltung ba yin yang sems kyis ma yin pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi 
[\[177a.7\]]dpon po de snying rjes brlan pa'i snying gis mod la 'bab chu de'i nang du 'jug par brtsams pa na bya rog kyang de dang sngon dam bcas pa'i yid kyis kun du bsrung ba'i phyir/_de'i phyi bzhin 'brang bas des mi de dbyung ba'i phyir 'bad pa byed par rig nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/ri 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]dgas kyi dpon po thong thong gzu lums ma byed/_mi 'di dag ni byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi sems pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid chen po rnams ni mi zlogs pa yin pas des de'i tshig ma mnyan par 'bab chu de'i nang du zhugs te/_bu gcig pa sdug 
[\[177b.2\]]pa bzhin du mi de rgyab tu zhon nas chu'i 'gram du phyung ste/_bcings pa rnams bkrol zhing yud tsam cig dbugs phyung nas smras pa/_bu lam 'di nas ci dga' bar song shig_/de nas mi des thal mo sbyar te/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs 
[\[177b.3\]]nas/_'di skad ces smras pa/_khyod kyis bdag gi srog gang lags/_/'jig rten rnyed dka' stsal pas na/_yab gcig khyod kyi 'bangs bdag ste/_/de bzhin go re long yang bgyi/_/des smras pa/_deng khyod bdag gi bran dang ni/_/go re long yang 
[\[177b.4\]]ma byed par/_/pags pa'i phyir ni bsad 'ong gis/_/khyod kyis bdag gzhan ma bstan cig_/bu khyod kyis mdor bya ba ni 'di yin te/_kho bo'i lus 'di 'jig rten thams cad kyis shin tu chags par bya ba dang /_'dod par bya ba yin pas khyod kyis kho bo 
[\[177b.5\]]su la yang ma bstan dang /_byas pa la lan du phan btags pa yin no/_/de nas mi des de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes khas blangs nas/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po la lan gsum bskor ba byas te rkang pa la gtugs nas song ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo zla 'od ma 
[\[177b.6\]]rtsed mos dub nas mal chen por legs par gnyid log pa las mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la rmi lam du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po gzugs mchog tu sdug pa zhig seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas/_rgyal po'i 'khor mang po la chos 'chad par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mngon 
[\[177b.7\]]sum du gyur pa bzhin du rmi lam du rmis pas/_yid bde ba skyes nas myur ba myur bar mal nas langs te rgyal po la smras so/_/rgyal pos thos nas kyang de'i bden pa'i rmi lam gyi khyad par la mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/_mi 'dod pa'i 'gro bar skyes pa des go ji ltar 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas rgyal po'i 'khor mang po la chos 'chad par 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas btsun mo zla 'od mas dga' ba dang /_snyan pa dang /_g.yer bag gi gtam dang ldan pa'i kun du spyod pas rgyal po yud tsam zhig dga' bar byas nas 
[\[178a.2\]]smras pa/_lha [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de khugs par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan mdzad du gsol/_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag pa'i yul na rngon pa ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad nga'i spyan sngar khug cig_/blon po rnams kyis yul so sor rgyal po'i 
[\[178a.3\]]mi rnams la bsgo ba/_lhas bka' stsal pa/_nga'i yul na rngon pa gnas pa rnams 'dir khug cig ces byung gis khyod kyis rngon pa thams cad 'dir thong shig_/de rnams kyis yul rnams na gnas pa'i rngon pa thams cad rgyal po'i drung du btang nas/_blon po rnams 
[\[178a.4\]]kyis rgyal po la phul ba dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga'i yul na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po gzugs shin tu rab tu sdug pa zhig yod do/_/zhes ngas thos kyis khyed kyis de rnyi 'jam zhing lhod pas zung la ma snad pa rang la phul cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[178a.5\]]lha bdag cag ni 'di nyid kyis 'tsho ba lags pas bdag cag gis dus 'di tsam gyi bar du lha'i yul du brgyus pa las [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po mchog 'di lta bu ni sngon chad lan 'ga' yang ma thos na mthong ba lta ci smos/_lha gcig nas gcig tu smras te phyogs ga ge mo 
[\[178a.6\]]zhig na mchis so zhes gsan nas bdag cag la bka' stsal pa'i rigs so/_/de lta na bdag cag gis kyang lha'i bka' stsal pa nges par 'grub par mchi'o/_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag bA rA Na sIr dril sgrogs su chug la/_lhas 
[\[178a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_nga'i yul na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po gzugs shin tu rab tu sdug pa zhig yod kyis sus de'i gtam nga'i snyan du gsol na/_de ngas bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas la de la grong rdal mchog lnga sbyin no zhes sgo shig_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]mnyan nas bA rA Na sIr dril bsgrags pa/_bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i grong mi dang /_yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyi shes ldan dag nyon cig_/lhas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga'i yul na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po gzugs shin tu rab tu sdug 
[\[178b.2\]]pa zhig yod kyis sus de'i gtam nga'i snyan du gsol pa/_de ngas bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas te/_de la grong rdal mchog lnga sbyin no zhes byung ngo /_/de nas de mthong ba'i mi de 'di snyam du sems te/_ci re zhig 'khor rjes su bskyang bar bya 'am/_'on 
[\[178b.3\]]te byas pa gzo bar bya snyam pa las 'dod pa la so sor bsten pa ni sdig pa'i las mi byed pa ci yang med pas de 'dod pa'i rgyus bslang ba'i zhe sdang gi me drag pos snying gdungs nas bsams pa/_byas pa gzo ba re zhig zhog_/dgra la sha glan pa'i dus la bab 
[\[178b.4\]]bo/_ci bdag gis yang de 'dra ba'i gnas skabs thob par 'gyur ram/_re zhig de la sha glan par bya'o snyam nas/_de nam nangs pa dang /_rgyal po'i dgos pa sgrub pa'i 'khor gyi nang du 'dug pas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo lhug par 'dug pa na de me tog shin tu 
[\[178b.5\]]dri zhim pa sna tshogs dag khyer te sgo ba dang /_blon po rnams las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyal pos thos par byas nas/_'khor gyi nang du zhugs te thog mar bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas rgyal po la smras pa/_lha phyogs ga ge mo zhig na zhugs shing sna 
[\[178b.6\]]tshogs kyi nags bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dris pas mdzes par bgyis pa na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po gser gyi glo zhes bgyi ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mchis te/_bdag gis lha la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dam pa gzugs mchog tu sdug pa de bstan par 
[\[178b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal pos de thos nas yid bde ba skyes te/_blon po brgya phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing ya mtshan skyes pa yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa gzhan rnams dang bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis kyang mdun du bdar te/_mi des lam 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]bstan pa bzhin rim gyis phyogs der phyin to/_/ji tsam na bya rog byang chub sems dpa' dang dam bcas pas phyogs su blta ba'i phyir nags tshang tshing de'i shing kha na 'dug pas skye bo'i tshogs chen po nags tshang tshing du phyogs te 'ong ba mthong nas des 
[\[179a.2\]]rings pa rings par [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po'i drung du song ste smras pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po khyod la bdag gis sngar mi rnams ni phan pa byas pa mi sems shing byas pa mi gzo la byas pa mi tshor ba yin no zhes smras pa yin te/_mi des skyes mang du khyer nas 'ong ngo /_/sgra de ri 
[\[179a.3\]]dgas rnams kyis thos nas skrag ste kun du bros so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'di dag ma bsrungs na de ring nyid du kha btags par 'gyur gyis sems can yal bar dor ba bas ni rang gi srog chud 
[\[179a.4\]]gzon pa bla'o snyam nas rgyal po sur song ngo /_/de nas mi snying rje med cing 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta ba de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la blta bar brtun pa'i blos [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi mchog de lag pa gnyis kyis bstan te smras pa/_lha [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po ni 'di lags so/_/las shin du 
[\[179a.5\]]drag po yongs su rdzogs pa dag ni rnam par smin pa'i dus la mi ltos pa yin pas tshig smras ma thag kho nar mi de'i lag pa gnyis ka sa la lhung bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po de skyo ba skyes nas mi de la dris pa/_kwa'i nang rje 'di ci las gyur/_de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen 
[\[179a.6\]]cing nga ro mi gsal bas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rgyal chen gang zhig bkum nas nor/_/'phrog de chom rkun ma lags kyi/_/rgyal chen byas pa mi gzo ba/_/gang lags de ni chom rkun lags/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje smras pa de'i don ci yin/_des ji 
[\[179a.7\]]ltar gyur pa thams cad rgyas par rgyal po la smras so/_/de nas rgyal pos byas pa chud gzon pa'i mi de la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/_ci phyir tha chad sar ni bying ma gyur/_/ci'i phyir lce ni dum bu brgyar ma lhags/_/ji ltar khyod kyis lus 'di gsang ba bas/_/rdo rje char 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]mdung mnga' chen brdeg ma gyur/_/de nas rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po de shes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po bdag nyid chen po 'di ni bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os kyis deng la grong khyer dang lam byi dor byed du chug shig_/
[\[179b.2\]]de rnams kyis grong khyer de'i rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo rnams bsal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor dag bzhag_/rgyal mtshan btsugs/_dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dbyangs/_me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' 
[\[179b.3\]]ltar bkram ste/_lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du lam yang mdzes par byed du bcug nas bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis me tog gi phreng ba dag thogs te bsur dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal pos [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po gzugs shin tu sdug pa de 
[\[179b.4\]]'byor pa chen pos grong khyer bA rA Na sIr zhugs nas seng ge'i khri la 'dug tu bcug go/_/de nas rgyal po rgyal po'i 'byor pa dang /_mthu chen pos btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi dang bcas pas yongs su bskor cing 
[\[179b.5\]]'dug go/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po byang chub sems dpas 'khor la bltas nas rgyal po dang 'khor de la de lta bu'i chos bshad de/_de thos pas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bslab pa lnga'i gzhi blangs so/_/sems can du ma dag gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag 
[\[179b.6\]]thob bo/_/de nas rgyal pos nags de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams la byin no/_/srog chags 'byung po thams cad la yang mi 'jigs pa byin no/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po gser gyi glo gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe 
[\[179b.7\]]de'i dus kyi mi gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/da lta na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/gzhan yang ji ltar lha sbyin 'di byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na me tog phreng rgyud mkhan zhig gnas te/_de'i me tog gi rab chu'i pha rol na yod pas de nyi ma re re zhing chu rgal zhing me tog thu'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na chu rgal ba na dus tshigs ma yin pa'i a mra'i 
[\[180a.2\]]'bras bu chus khyer ba zhig mthong nas des de blangs te sgo ba la byin no/_/sgo bas gsol ka ba la'o/_/gsol ka bas rgyal po la'o/_/rgyal pos btsun mo la'o/_/btsun mos de myangs pa na rol zhen nas rgyal po la gsol ba btab pa/_lha a mra'i 'bras bu 
[\[180a.3\]]'di 'dra ba gzhan yang stsal ba'i rigs so/_/rgyal pos gsol ka ba la smras pa/_khyod kyis a mra'i 'bras bu su las 'ongs/_des smras pa/_sgo srungs kyis stsal lags so/_/sgo srungs la smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_me tog phreng rgyud mkhan 
[\[180a.4\]]gyis stsal lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag me tog phreng rgyud mkhan khug shig_/rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis bkug nas rgyal pos smras pa/_kwa'i me tog phreng rgyud mkhan khyod kyis a mra'i 'bras bu 'di ga las rnyed/_des ji ltar gyur pa 
[\[180a.5\]]smras pa dang /_rgyal pos de nyid la bsgo ba/_song la a mra'i 'bras bu 'di 'dra ba gzhan yang khyer te shog shig_/mi'i dbang po rnams kyi tshig ni gcig tu mi rung bas de bag tsha bas snying la zug cing a mra'i 'bras bu btsal bar brtsams te/_des rgyags khyer nas thog 
[\[180a.6\]]ma a mra rnyed pa logs su song ba dang /_ri'i phyogs gcig na a mra'i shing spre'u rnams kyi bgrod par gyur gyi mi rnams kyi ni ma yin pa de mthong nas/_de nas me tog phreng rgyud mkhan de shing de la phan tshun nas brtags na/_g.yang sa chen por skyes pas mi rnams kyis 
[\[180a.7\]]bgrod pa ma yin te gzeg par ma nus so/_/de de na a mra'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir zhag mang du lon pas rgyags zad par gyur to/_/des bsams pa/_bdag 'di bzhin 'dug na yang rgyags med pas 'chir [(]chabs [,]cha bas [)]gcig gis ci byung ba byung gzeg go zhes des rdo 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]ba rnams la 'jus te 'dzeg par brtsams pa las a mra'i 'bras bu ma thob par g.yang du lhung ngo /_/ri de la byang chub sems dpa' spre'ur gyur pa na spre'u rnams kyi dpon por gyur to/_/stes dbang gis des ri de la tshogs bzhag ste/_phyogs der phyin pa dang /_ji 
[\[180b.2\]]tsam na des me tog phreng rgyud mkhan de sdug bsngal dog cing nyam nga bar gyur par mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin te/_de de la phan pa skyed pa lhur len pas rim gyis ma sad na dbyung bar mi nus so/_/zhes 
[\[180b.3\]]rdo rnams kyis goms par bya bar brtsams te/_gang gi tshe bdag gis dbyung bar nus so snyam du rig pa de'i tshe des de g.yang sa nas rim gyis phyung ba dang /_rdo ba bteg pa dang /_me tog phreng rgyud mkhan phyung bas shin tu dub par gyur to/_/de'i tshe dud 'gro yang mi'i skad 
[\[180b.4\]]du smra ba yin pas des de la dris pa/_khyod ci'i phyir nyam nga ba 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur/_des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/_'di a mra'i 'bras bu med par song na gnod pa 'thob par 'gyur gyi/_bdag gis 'di la a mra'i 
[\[180b.5\]]'bras bu sbyin no snyam nas bdag nyid chen po de spro ba dang gzhan la phan par bya ba la brtson pa ma bor bas dub bzhin du yang shing de la 'dzegs nas a mra'i 'bras bu klag par brtsams te/_mi de ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du a mra'i 'bras bu zar bcug nas thu ba yang bkang ngo /_/
[\[180b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad la bag 'bebs pa yin pas de nas spre'u'i dpon po de babs nas des mi de la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje kho bo dub pas yud tsam zhig nyal gyis re zhig phyogs su byar gyis shig_/des smras pa/_bka' bzhin 'tshal 
[\[180b.7\]]de gnyid log pa dang mi des bsams pa/_bdag rgyags chad pas gal te a mra rnams zos na ni bdag gis rgyal po la yang ci dbul de bas na spre'u 'di bsad la sha skam du byas te lam du 'jug go snyam nas/_snying rje med pa 'jig rten pha rol yal bar bor ba des de rdo ba 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]chen pos bsad do/_/lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_phan 'dogs pa yi mtshan nyid dang /_/de bzhin drin gzo grogs por brjod/_/mi rnams la yang kha cig ni/_/phan pa byas pa mi shes so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i 
[\[181a.2\]]dus kyi spre'u'i dpon po gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi tshor ba 
[\[181a.3\]]yin no/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na grong rdal med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas ri 'or dang ri'i phug chu dang /_me tog dang /_'bras 
[\[181a.4\]]bus rgyas pa zhig tu bya rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_bya shing sta mo zhes bya bar gyur to/_/ri de nyid kyi phyogs zhig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge zhig ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyod pa dang gnas pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bsad cing bsad cing za bar byed do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na sha zos pa 
[\[181a.5\]]las so'i bar du rus pa chud nas de 'jigs pa dang /_bag tsha ba dang bral ba yin yang so'i nad kyi tshor bas lus la gnod par gyur nas blong bar gyur pas kha zas za ma nus so/_/stes dbang gis shing sta mo de shing kha gcig nas gcig tu rgyu ba la goms pas de 
[\[181a.6\]]phyogs de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po 'dug pa'i phyogs der 'ongs pa na/_des seng ge de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen par mthong nas smras pa/_zhang po ci'i phyir blong bar gyur/_des smras pa/_tsha bo bdag sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen to/_/khyod sdug bsngal 
[\[181a.7\]]ci lta bu zhig gis/_des rgyas par smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_zhang po khyod la bdag gis dpyad byas khyod ni seng ge yin te rkang bzhi ba thams cad kyi dpon po yin pas phan gdags par nus kyis khyod kyis bdag la dus dus su phan pa byos shig_/des smras pa/_
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]de bzhin du bya'o/_/shing sta mos bsams pa/_ji ltar 'dis byed pa yang ma tshor ba de ltar 'di'i dpyad byas nas sos nas shes par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de phan par bya ba lhur len pas de'i spyod pa dang gnas pa la rtog cing 'dug go/_/ji tsam na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi 
[\[181b.2\]]dpon po de rlung bde ba'i reg pas nad rtse zhil nas rdo ba che zhing yangs pa zhig la kha gdangs nas gnyid log go/_/de nas shing sta mo de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po de'i drung du song na de ltar bsod par gnas par mthong nas des bsams pa/_'di'i dpyad bya ba'i dus de la bab bo 
[\[181b.3\]]snyam du rig nas legs par brtags te so'i bar du chud pa'i rus pa 'dab mas bskyod pa'i rim pas mod la phyung ste skyes shing gnyid kyi snyoms pa bsal ba'i mig gis langs nas 'dug go/_/de nas shing sta mo des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po de sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi 
[\[181b.4\]]bde ba dang bral bar rig nas rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_zhang po khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur pa ni rus pa 'di yin no/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po de mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas smras pa/_tsha bo phan pa 'di'i lan khyod la bdag gis 
[\[181b.5\]]nges par slar phan pa byas dus dus su shog shig_/legs so de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas shing sta mo song ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po sha la za ba na shing sta mo de yang bya khra zhig gis zin te de'u shi ba las shor te bkres pas gdungs pa'i snying gis ri 
[\[181b.6\]]dgas kyi dpon po de'i drung du song ste/_nyam thag pa dag rig par byas nas smras pa/_zhang po bdag bkres pas gzir gyis sha la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]byin cig_/des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_da ltar kho bo srog gcod cing /_/gtum po mi dge byed pa yi/_/mche ba'i bar 
[\[181b.7\]]du khyod 'ongs pa/_/gson pa drin cher mi sems sam/_/des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rgya mtshor lhung ba phung ba ste/_/rmi lam bsams pa don med yin/_/pho ngan bsten pa gang yin dang /_/byas mi gzo la byas don med/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi shing sta mo gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/
[\[182a.2\]]da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na mi dbul po zhig gnas pa de shing btsong zhing btsongs pas 'tsho bar byed 
[\[182a.3\]]do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na nang par sngar langs te sta re dang khur shing dag thogs te shing gi phyir nags khrod du song ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i char sprin chen po sna la rlung ldang ba langs so/_/mi de 'di rung ngam 'di rung ngam zhes gnas kyi khyad par tshol zhing shing nas shing 
[\[182a.4\]]gzhan gyi drung du song na 'on kyang gsher bar gyur pa nyid pas/_des shing drung brgyus te rim gyis brag phug cig tu zhugs pa dang /_des brag phug de na dom zhig gnas pa de mthong nas sngangs te 'bros par brtsams pa las/_dom gyis smras pa/_bu ci'i phyir sdangs bu 
[\[182a.5\]]ma 'jigs par kho bo'i drung na 'dug shig_/de bag tsha bzhin du bred nas 'gro ma nus so/_/de nas dom des dbugs phyung ste/_lag pa gnyis kyis pang du 'khyud nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bus tshim par byas so/_/yul ngan yang zhag bdun du byung lhas kyang char pa ma bcad 
[\[182a.6\]]do/_/zhag bdun 'das te zhag brgyad pa'i nyin par char sprin sangs nas dom gyis phyogs bzhir bltas te rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu rab tu mang po byin nas mi de la smras pa/_bu char sprin sangs te yul ngan med kyis ci bder song shig_/mi des rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/_
[\[182a.7\]]yab mchi na bdag gis khyed la lan ci zhig glan/_des smras pa/_bu ci nas kyang kho bo su la yang ma smras na de nyid kyis lan glan pa yin no/_/des smras pa/_yab de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes des de la bskor ba byas nas rkang pa la phyag byas nas chas so/_/de bA rA Na sIr zhugs 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]pa dang rngon pa zhig [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'chor du chas pa des de mthong nas smras pa/_grogs po khyod dus 'di srid cig lon na gang nas 'dir 'ongs/_khyod kyi bu smad ni khyod dus ma yin par char zhag bdun bab pas gcan gzan gyis bsad par ma gyur grang zhes skrag par gyur nas shin tu smre 
[\[182b.2\]]sngags 'don to/_/dus ma yin pa'i char zhag bdun bab pas bya dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyang du ma shi na khyod ji ltar shor/_des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_grogs po dom de gang na 'dug pa'i phug de smros shig_/des smras pa/_ne'u zla cis 
[\[182b.3\]]'tsho yang bla/_slar nags khrod du mi 'gro'o/_/des de la ji ltar khas len par 'gyur ba de ltar sha'i skal ba sum nyis sbyin pas bslus pa dang lam mtshon pa'i phyir song ste/_ji tsam na rim gyis bdag nyid chen po'i dom de gang na gnas pa'i phug der phyin to/_/de nas snying 
[\[182b.4\]]rje med pa la gnas pa byas pa mi gzo bas smras pa/_phug 'di na dom gnas so/_/de nas rngon pa pha rol gyi srog la gnod pa byed pas phug der me btang ngo /_/de nas bdag nyid chen po'i dom de du bas subs pa'i yid dang mig mchis mas gang bas tshigs su bcad de 
[\[182b.5\]]smras pa/_bdag ni ri yi sul gnas te/_/rtsa ba 'bras bu chu 'thung zhing /_/sems can la ni phan blo yis/_/su la gnod pa ci zhig byas/_/'chi ba'i dus la bab gyur pas/_/da ni ci yang byar med de/_/lus can 'dod dang mi 'dod pa'i/_/las kyi 
[\[182b.6\]]rjes su 'brang bar bya/_/zhes smras nas shi'o/_/de nas de rnams kyis bshas te sha bgos nas byas pa chud gzon pa'i mi de la smras pa/_sha'i skal ba sum nyis long shig_/des blang ngo zhes lag pa gnyis brkyang ba dang sa la lhung ngo /_/de nas rngon pa de rnams 
[\[182b.7\]]kyis de ltar ma rung ba de mthong nas kyi hud kyi hud ces smras te/_rang rang gi skal ba yang bor nas dong ngo /_/shin tu ya mtshan du gyur pa de skye bo'i tshogs chen pos thos nas phyogs der 'dus so/_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang ya mtshan skyes nas de nyid du 'ongs so/_/
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]ri de'i phyogs gcig na dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yod pas de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis de'i pags pa blangs te/_ya mtshan gyi mig phye nas don de dge slong gi dge 'dun la rig par bya'o zhes dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang der song nas pags pa 
[\[183a.2\]]dag bting ste/_rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug nas dge 'dun la don de rgyas par smras so/_/de na gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zhig yod pa des tshigs su bcad de/_rgyal po de la smras pa/_rgyal chen 'di ni dom ma lags/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzi 
[\[183a.3\]]'chang ste/_/rgyal chen 'jig rten gsum po dang /_/khyod kyis kyang ni mchod 'os lags/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_'di la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' lags kyis 'di la mchod 
[\[183a.4\]]pa mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi dang bcas pas dri'i shing thams cad blangs te/_phyogs der dong nas de'i sha dang /_keng rus thams cad phung po gcig tu byas nas smras 
[\[183a.5\]]pa/_shes ldan dag dri'i shing thams cad spungs la spungs zin nas sregs shig_/de dri'i shing thams cad kyis spungs te spungs nas bkur sti chen po byas te bsregs nas phyogs de nyid du mchod rten chen po byed du bcug ste/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[183a.6\]]ba dan btags nas dus mchod chen po btsugs so/_/de la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang mtho ris su gzhol bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dom gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi mi byas pa
