[\[183a.7\]]chud gzon pa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]mi tshor ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na mi dbul po zhig yod pa de shing btsong zhing btsongs pas 'tsho bar byed do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na nang par sngar langs te sta re dang khur shing blangs te shing gi phyir nags khrod du song ba dang /_ri de'i 
[\[183b.2\]]phyogs shing rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nags stug po me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis rgyas pa zhig yod pa de na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa dom rnams kyi nang du skyes pa zhig yod do/_/ji tsam na shing thun de shing 'tshol ba na phyogs gzhan zhig nas 
[\[183b.3\]]stag gis gtses te 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas skrag nas stes dbang gi shing gang la byang chub sems dpa' dom de gnas pa'i shing de la 'dzegs pa las des de mthong nas lhag par skrag par gyur pa dang /_bdag nyid chen po des dbugs phyung nas bzung ste pang du bzhag go/_/
[\[183b.4\]]stag de yang kha zas la zhen pas shing drung de nyid mi gtang bar smras pa/_kye bdag nyid chen po mi mgo nag 'di rnams ni byas pa mi gzo ba yin gyis 'or cig dang de zos te 'gro'o/_/mi gzhan phal cher skyabs su 'ongs pa la byams na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta 
[\[183b.5\]]smos kyang ci dgos pas des smras pa/_'di bdag la skyabs su 'ongs pas bdag gis mi dor ro/_/'on kyang stag de sha dang khrag 'dod pas de nyid du 'dug gi ma song ngo /_/de nas dom des mi de la smras pa/_bu kho bo ngal gyis re zhig khyod 'dug shig dang kho bo ngal sos 
[\[183b.6\]]par bya'o/_/de de'i pang du 'dug nas ngal ba dang dub pas gnyid log go/_/stag gis smras pa/_kwa'i mi khyod dus ji srid zhig tu 'dir 'dug_/'o ni mar 'or cig dang zos la 'gro'o/_/de nas khyod ci bder song shig_/snying rje med pa sdig pa'i las can 'jig 
[\[183b.7\]]rten pha rol yal bar bor ba des bsams pa/_bdag gis dus ji srid zhig tu 'dir gnas par byas des smras pa/_legs kyis dor ro snyam nas des de bor ba dang bdag nyid chen po des bor ba na smras pa/_kye/_min/_tshig_/des/_kyi/_ci/_se/_ngan/_bsten/_
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]gro zhes smras te lhung nas stag gis tshul ma yin pas bsad do/_/mi des bsams te smras pa/_de thos nas bsams pa/_'dis bdag la ji zhig bgo bsha' bya bar 'dod de/_gang gi phyir 'di skad ces smras so snyam nas/_de sred pas ldongs 
[\[184a.2\]]bas bla bar gyur te/_de sems 'khrugs shing smyos nas de dang de dag tu 'khyam pa na 'di skad ces kye/_min/_tshig_/des/_kyi/_ci/_se/_ngan/_bsten/_gro zhes smra'o/_/de gnyen rnams kyis khyim du khrid na de bzhin du bla zhing 'dug go/_/de rnams kyis 'byung po'i dpyad bya ba'i 
[\[184a.3\]]rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags 'chang dang /_gzhan yang dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_snying du sdug pa dang /_nye du dang /_rtsa lag rnams la dris na/_de rnams rnam pa phal mo cher smra zhing dpyad ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang mi byed do/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bsti 
[\[184a.4\]]gnas shing rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nags stug po 'bras bu dang /_me tog dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa/_bya du ma skad 'byin pas mdzes par byas pa zhig yod pa na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so/_/mi de'i gnyen rnams kyis mi de khrid de drang srong de'i 
[\[184a.5\]]gan du dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_drang srong chen po bdag cag gi gnyen 'di yang dang yang 'di skad du bla ba 'di la ji ltar bgyi/_des smras pa/_sems can 'di ni sdig pa byed pa yin te/_rang bzhin ngan pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dogs 
[\[184a.6\]]'dogs pa stag gi mdun du bor ro/_/bdag nyid chen po des ni 'di la chos bshad par bya'o snyam du bsams na 'dis de bor te/_de bor ba na mya myo khyer te tshigs su bcad pa bcu las yi ge re re zhig dran pa ni kye/_min/_tshig_/des/_kyi/_ci/_se/_ngan/_bsten/_
[\[184a.7\]]gro zhes bya ba yin no/_/drang srong de'i slob ma zhig gis smras pa/_mkhan po re shig tshigs su bcad pa de rnams ji lta bu lags pa gsungs shig_/drang srong des rim bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa de rnams smra bar brtsams pa/_kye ma kyi hud 'jig rten 'dir/_/
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]chos ma yin pa mi bzad de/_/tshogs par mi dbyung mi rnams la/_/grogs po gsod par byed pa yod/_/grogs gsod gnas skabs gang du yang /_/bde bar 'gyur ba ma yin te/_/stan la ma yin lam du min/_/'dug min 'chag pa na yang min/_/
[\[184b.2\]]de lhung snying ni rje rje skad/_/'di la tshig tu smras pa gang /_/des ni sems can blo ngan po/_/ji ltar khan da 'bar bzhin sreg_/shin tu mi bzad las byas pa/_/nges khyod 'jig rten pha rol du/_/sdug bsngal reg pa'i tshor ba ni/_/sim pa ma yin myong 
[\[184b.3\]]bar 'gyur/_/tha shal bas kyang tha shal khyod/_/ngu 'bod shin tu mi bzad par/_/kyi hud kyi hud ces sgrogs pa'i/_/sdug bsngal ngan pa chen po 'thob/_/mi dge'i las can gtum de la/_/de yis ci zhig byas gyur na/_/tshogs par mi 'byung mi 
[\[184b.4\]]rnams las/_/grogs po gsod par byed pa yod/_/chos 'jig byed pa mi bzad pa'i/_/sems ni sdig pa yin par shes/_/khyod kyis dom la sdig pa dang /_/stag la gang byas dran par gyis/_/blo ngan khyod kyis ji lta bur/_/grogs la bya ba mi 
[\[184b.5\]]shes te/_/gsod par byed pas gsod 'thob la/_/sha 'khon can gyis 'khon rnams mthong /_/stag gi 'jigs chen byung ba na/_/khyod ni yun ring bsten byas shing /_/nyal ba na yang khyod bsrungs na/_/khyod kyis de ni ma bsrungs so/_/grogs 'khu kha 
[\[184b.6\]]na mtho cher/_/chos smra ba rnams rjod byed do/_/blo ngan lus ni zhig gyur nas/_/dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dom gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi byas 
[\[184b.7\]]pa chud gzon pa'i mi gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba yin no//_//_
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa/_gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_
[\[185a.2\]]lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/rgyal po de yang dad pa bzang ba/_dge ba'i bsam pa can/_bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/_snying rje can/_bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu rnams la byams 
[\[185a.3\]]pa/_thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/_thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba/_gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig yin te/_de 'di lta ste dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkres pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_'gro bar chas pa'i slong ba rnams la sbyin 
[\[185a.4\]]par yongs su mi gtong ba ci yang med de/_lhag par yang nad pa rnams la sbyin no/_/rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs nas pha dang ma gnyis la phyag byas te nad pa la bltas nas dgos pa'i ched kyi phyir 'dug par byed do/_/ji tsam na mi nad pa sman pa thams 
[\[185a.5\]]cad kyis bor ba 'tsho ba'i re ba med la 'chi ba la mngon du phyogs pa zhig de dang de dag tu 'khyam zhing shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po shi bi so ga'i dus la bab ste/_me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_
[\[185a.6\]]ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal stug po'i skyed mos tshal gyi sar btsun mos yongs su bskor te chas so/_/nad pa de yang tshor ba drag pos gdungs pas yid mi bde ba skyes shing lus kyi dbugs ni brdzags/_mig ni mchi mas gang bzhin 
[\[185a.7\]]lag pa khar ba la brten nas dal bus rgyal po'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te smras pa/_lha bdag bro nad 'di las yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_srog stsal du gsol/_de nas shi bi'i rgyal pos nad pa de'i tshig snying rje rje skad du dal bus yi ge re re nas smras pa thos nas snying 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]rjes kun nas bskyod pa'i sems kyis de nyid nas slar log ste/_blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga'i yul na gnas pa'i sman pa rnams khug cig_/de rnams kyis sman pa thams cad bkug ste rgyal po la phul lo/_/de nas rgyal pos mi de bkug nas smras pa/_shes ldan 
[\[185b.2\]]dag mi 'di'i dpyad gyis shig_/sman pa rnams kyis dpyad de blo gros gcig tu byas nas smras pa/_lha 'di'i sman dkon lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag de'i sman ci 'dra ba zhig yin/_sman pa rnams kyis smras pa/_lha skyes pa thog ma btsas nas su la yang khrom 
[\[185b.3\]]myong ba gang lags pa de'i khrag gis nas thug sbyar nas gal te 'tshal du stsal na 'di sos par 'gyur lags kyi gzhan du ma lags so/_/rgyal pos thos nas bsams pa/_bdag gis ni 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa gzhan dag zhi bar byed mi nus pa'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 
[\[185b.4\]]gam/_'tsho ba 'di lta bu bdag la ci dgos zhes de snyam du bsams nas/_rgyal po rang gi rgyud la brtag par brtsams nas des ma ma la smras pa/_nga sngon su la lan 'ga' khros pa yod dam/_des smras pa/_lha gang gi tshe khyod bdag gis pang du blangs pa de'i tshe nas bdag kyang su la 
[\[185b.5\]]yang khro ma myong na khyod lta smos ci 'tshal/_de nas ma'i drung du song ste smras pa/_yum bdag sngon su la yang lan 'ga' khros pa ma mchis sam/_des smras pa/_bu khyod gang gi tshe kho mo'i rum du zhugs pa de'i tshe nas bdag kyang su la yang khrom myong na khyod lta zhig ci smos/_
[\[185b.6\]]rgyal pos bsams pa/_da ni sman rnyed do snyam nas des sman pa de rnams la smras pa/_nga'i lus kyi yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtubs shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bdag cag ni mi phal pa'i ched du lha'i sku la mtshon gyis mi 'debs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i 
[\[185b.7\]]gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin pas des rang nyid kyi lus kyi yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtar te/_khrag gis rdze'u bkang nas des nas thug sbyar te blud do/_/rgyal po de la rjes su chags pa'i btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]rnams ngu ba la zhugs so/_/yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang 'phya bar brtsams te mi phal pa gcig gi phyir 'di snyed kyi sems can 'dor ba lta ci tha tshig ces gleng ngo /_/de nas rgyal pos skye bo'i tshogs de dbugs phyung nas thabs des 
[\[186a.2\]]zla ba drug tu lus kyi yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtar te/_gtar nas nas thug blud do/_/rgyal po shi bi'i lus de tshags 'dra bar gyur nas gzi byin yongs su nyams so/_/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bsams pa/_'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[186a.3\]]yin te/_gal te yongs su nyams nam legs so snyam nas de rnams de la nyi ma re re zhing gzi byin sgrub par byed de des de 'tsho'o/_/gang gi tshe mi de'i nad de zhi bar gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po shi bis grong rdal mchog lnga byin nas bA rA Na sI na gtso bor bkur bar gyur to/_/mtha' dag tu 
[\[186a.4\]]sgra grags pa rgyal po shi bi'i lus kyi yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtubs pa'i khrag gis nad pa'i rim gro dus 'di srid cig byas pas de yang sos par gyur to/_/gang yang ya mtshan skyes pa'i sems can rnams lhags nas mi de la dris pa/_kye nang rje khyod la rgyal po shi bis dus 'di srid 
[\[186a.5\]]cig rim gro byas so zhes grag na bden nam/_des smras pa/_bdag la des ci zhig byas/_ngan khrag lta zhig sa la pho 'am gzhan la byin yang rung ste ngo mtshar ci zhig che/_de skad ces smras ma thag kho nar de'i khyim du me byung nas des de'i khyim dang nor thams cad tshig par gyur to/_/
[\[186a.6\]]dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po shi bi gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi byas pa chud gzon pa'i mi gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo 
[\[186a.7\]]ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po'i pho brang zhig na rgyal po zhig 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]byed du 'jug go/_/de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed de/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa 
[\[186b.2\]]na khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/_mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_lag pa ring ba/_'phral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig 
[\[186b.3\]]btsas te/_de btsas pa na dge ba stong phrag du ma byung bar gyur to/_/de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'di btsas pas na dge ba stong phrag du ma byung bas khye'u ming dge byed du 
[\[186b.4\]]gdags so zhes de'i ming dge byed du btags te/_khye'u dge byed ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad de/_de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 
[\[186b.5\]]'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar gyi snying po dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/_skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do/_/rgyal po de yang btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed de/_
[\[186b.6\]]dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na khye'u zhig btsas te/_de btsas pa na mi dge ba stong phrag du ma byung 
[\[186b.7\]]nas de'i ming ni sdig byed ces bya bar btags te/_de yang bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur to/_/gzhon nu dge byed ni byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can sems can thams cad la brtse ba can/_sbyin 'dod pa/_sbyin pa la dga' ba yin pas de dge sbyong dang /_bram ze 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa'i slong ba rnams la sbyin pa gtong bar byed do/_/phas de la smras pa/_bu khyod rtag tu sbyin pa ma gtong zhig_/de ltar btang na re zhig 'u bu cag la nor gyi rigs de rnyed ga la yod/_'di ni chos nyid yin te sbyin 
[\[187a.2\]]pa po dang sbyin bdag la skye bo mang po dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su yang de'i grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_bzang po 'byung ba yin pas yul gzhan gyi rgyal po zhig gis de'i yon tan 
[\[187a.3\]]gyi bdag nyid chen po thos nas bu mo sbyin no/_/rgyal pos de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bsu bar byas pa dang /_dge byed kyis smras pa/_re zhig nor ma bsgrubs kyi bar du bdag mchis 'brang mi 'tshal gyis/_yab rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par gnang ba'i rigs 
[\[187a.4\]]so/_/des smras pa/_de bzhin du gyis shig_/de zong thogs te rgya mtsho chen por chas pa na de'i nu bo sdig byed gang yin pa des bsams pa/_'di skye bo mang po sdug pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba yin te/_gal te yang rgya mtsho chen po'i gru grub ste slar 'ongs nas lhag 
[\[187a.5\]]par yang skye bo mang po sdug pa dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur zhing des na pha 'dug bzhin du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa 'di yod kyis/_'dir yong ci'i dus la bab ce na/_bdag kyang de dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs 
[\[187a.6\]]la der 'di srog dang phral na/_bdag mi 'dod bzhin du yang rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas pha'i drung du song ste smras pa/_lha dge byed rgya mtsho chen por mchi na bdag kyang de dang lhan cig mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_de bzhin du gyis 
[\[187a.7\]]shig_/de nas dge byed kyis rang gi yul du dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_grong khyer na gnas pa'i tshong pa shes ldan dag nyon cig_/gzhon du dge byed zong thogs te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug gis/_ded dpon dge byed dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par khyed cag 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]las su spro ba de sho gam dang /_la gcan dang /_gru btsas med par 'gyur gyis/_rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon gyis shig_/tshong pa brgya phrag du mas rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i zong sta gon byas so/_/de nas ded dpon dge byed nu bo sdig byed dang lhan cig dge 
[\[187b.2\]]mtshan dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas nas tshong pa brgya phrag du mas yongs su bskor te/_shing rta dang /_khur dang /_gzeb dang /_pang tshad dang /_rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu dag gis rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i zong mang po khyer nas chas te de rim gyis 
[\[187b.3\]]grong rdal dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_tshong rdal rnams la lta zhing rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du phyin nas/_des kAr+ShA pa Na lnga brgyas gru nyos te zho shas 'tsho ba lnga po stobs par byed pa dang /_sel bar byed pa dang /_rkyal chen pa dang /_gru 
[\[187b.4\]]pa dang /_rlung yor thogs pa khrid nas lan gsum du dril bsgrags te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs nas gru spangs pa na nu bo sdig byed la smras pa/_gal te rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su gru chag par gyur nam rtabs par nga'i mgul du 'jus shig_/des smras pa/_legs kyis 
[\[187b.5\]]de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/ji tsam na gru de rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis rin po che'i gling du phyin nas rlung yor thogs pas smras pa/_'dzam bu'i gling gi tshong pa shes ldan dag nyon cig_/rin po che'i gling zhes bya ba rdo rje dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_in+d+ra nI la dang /_ma rgad la sogs 
[\[187b.6\]]pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'byung gnas shig yod do zhes thos pa gang yin pa der yu bu phyin gyis/_rin po che ci 'dod pa long shig_/de nas de rnams dga' ba dang mgu bas brtags shing brtags nas rin po che rnams kyis gru de dper na til lam/_'bras sam/_
[\[187b.7\]]rgya sran nam/_sran ma la sogs pa bzhin du bkang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shin tu brtags pa dang mkhas pa yin pas gzhon nu dge byed kyis chen po la 'os pa'i nor bu chen po rnams rked la btags so/_/ji tsam na gru de slar bsgyur ba las 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]'gram dang /_ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu chu srin nya'i rigs kyis tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar byas so/_/de nas sdig byed kyis dge byed kyi mgul nas 'jus pa dang /_des de 'bad pa chen pos 'gram du phyung ngo /_/de khur gyis 
[\[188a.2\]]dub nas gnyid kyis log pa dang /_de 'gres pa'i rked pa la rin po che btags pa dag sdig byed kyis mthong nas des bsams pa/_'di ni rin po che 'di lta bu dag khyer te 'gro bar 'gyur na/_bdag gi lag pa stong par 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta zhes bsams nas 
[\[188a.3\]]des de gnyid stug pos non pa na rin po che de rnams kyang phrogs/_mig gnyis kyang tsher mas phyung nas des de long bar rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bor te song ngo /_/stes te phyugs rdzi dag cig phyugs skyong zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang /_de rnams kyis de mthong nas dris pa/_kye 
[\[188a.4\]]nang rje khyod su zhig des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa/_de rnams kyis thos nas snying rje skyes te/_de rnams kyis de phyugs rdzi dpon po'i khyim du khrid do/_/de de na pi wang blang bar brtsams pa dang /_phyugs rdzi dpon po de'i chung ma gzugs dang lang tsho'i dregs 
[\[188a.5\]]pas rgyags pas pi wang gi sgra thos nas bsgugs pa las/_de byas pa chud gzon pa'i spyod pa rjes su dran nas rna ba bkag ste 'dug nas ma btub bo/_/'dod pa la zhen pa rnams ni mi bya ba ci yang med pas des khyim thab la dpar ba smras pa/_mi long ba 'di 
[\[188a.6\]]bdag la sgugs na/_khyod 'di 'dra ba dag sdud par byed dam/_sha 'khon rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste bud med kyi sha 'khon ni tha chad yin pas des bsams pa/_'di chad pas ni bcad zin pas spang pa ma gtogs par 'di la ci byar yang med do snyam nas des de khyim nas spangs 
[\[188a.7\]]te lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams na pi wang gis 'tsho bar byed do/_/de'i pha shi nas de'i nu bo sdig byed rgyal srid la bzhag go/_/de yang rim gyis mtshams gzhan gyi rgyal po sngon bu mo byin pa gang yin pa de'i grong khyer du phyin to/_/
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]de yang chen mor gyur nas/_de slong ba yul sna tshogs na gnas pa rgyal po'i bu dang /_blon po'i bu dang /_mdun na 'don gyi bu dag lhags nas phas smras pa/_bu mo khyod gang la byin pa'i gzhon nu dge byed de ni rgya mtsho chen por song ba las de nyid du tshul ma 
[\[188b.2\]]yin pas shi bar gyur to/_/da ni khyod slong ba dag lhags te/_gang la khyod ma byin pa de mi dga' bar 'gyur na/_'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_des smras pa/_yab gal te de ltar na grong khyer byi dor bgyid du stsol cig dang bdag nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam 
[\[188b.3\]]mo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu de bzhin gyis shig_/de nas rgyal pos yul sna tshogs dang grong khyer sna tshogs rnams su rang nyid khyim thab 'dam par bsgrags nas grong khyer de yang gseg ma dang /_rdo ba dang /_gyo mo bsal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag 
[\[188b.4\]]chag btab/_dri zhim pa'i pog por dag bzhag_/gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng /_dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs/_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du dga' dga' ltar byas nas dril sgrogs 
[\[188b.5\]]su bcug pa/_grong khyer na gnas pa dang grong mi dang yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyi shes ldan dag nyon cig_/sang rgyal po'i gzhon nu ma rang nyid khyim thab 'dam gyis khyed cag 'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du bar gyis shig_/nam nangs nas rgyal po'i 
[\[188b.6\]]gzhon nu ma de rgyan sna tshogs kyis bklubs te gzhon nu ma du mas yongs su bskor nas nags tshal gyi lha me tog rgyas pa'i nags tshal gyi nang na shin tu mdzes pa de bzhin dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos grong khyer gyi dbus na srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po 'dus pa'i nang du rang 
[\[188b.7\]]nyid khyim thab 'dam du 'ongs so/_/dge byed de yang de'i phyogs gzhan zhig na pi wang len cing 'dug go/_/sems can rnams ni las rnams kho nas phan tshun sbyor bar byed pa yin la/_rgyu'i stobs che yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos pa yin pas/_de nas rgyal po'i 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]gzhon nu ma de pi wang gi sgras sems bsdus pas dge byed pi wang len pa la chags nas des de la 'di bdag gi khyim thab bo zhes me tog gi phreng ba bor ro/_/skye bo'i tshogs yid mi bde bar gyur cing kha cig snying na nas mod la 'phya bar brtsams pa/_
[\[189a.2\]]rgyal po'i gzhon nu ma 'di ltar gzugs bzang ba dar la bab pa sgyu rtsal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang /_gzhan yang grong khyim na gnas pa'i skyes pa'i gtso bo rnams 
[\[189a.3\]]spangs te long ba la khyim thab tu 'dam pa ci tha tshig_/zho shas 'tsho ba rnams yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bas rgyal po la smras pa/_lha gzhon nu ma rang nyid kyis khyim thab bdams lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ci 'dra ba zhig_/lha long ba zhig lags so/_/de 
[\[189a.4\]]yang thos nas yid mi bde bar gyur te de nas de bkug nas smras pa/_bu rgyal po dang /_nor can dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon dang /_blon po'i bu dang /_mdun na 'don gyi bu gzugs bzang ba dang dar la bab pa 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dag yod na/_khyod 
[\[189a.5\]]kyis ci'i phyir 'di 'dra ba zhig khyim thab tu bdams/_des smras pa/_yab 'di kho na bdag 'tshal lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu gal te de ltar na de nyid kyi thad du song shig ci'i phyir 'dug_/de de'i drung du song nas smras pa/_bdag gi khyim thab tu khyod 
[\[189a.6\]]'dams so/_/des smras pa/_khyod kyis ma legs pa zhig byas te de lta mod kyi 'di ni long ba yin pas/_bdag skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams pa lta zhig_/des smras pa/_bdag ni de lta bu'i las byed pa ma yin no/_/
[\[189a.7\]]des smras pa/_ci mngon des bden pa gsol bar brtsams te/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyal bu gzhon nu dge byed de dang khyod la 'dod chags skyes kyi gzhan su la yang ma yin zhe na/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des khyod kyi mig gcig sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]du gyur cig ces bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma thag kho nar de'i mig gcig sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur te/_des smras pa/_dge byed de nyid nga yin te/_nu bo shos sdig byed kyis 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su byas so/_/des smras pa/_gzhon nu dge byed de kho na

[\[189b.3\]]sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang /_bden pa gsol bas de'i mig cig shos kyang sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po gzhon nu ma des dge byed dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa de khrid nas rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/_yab dge byed de

[\[189b.5\]]rgyal srid la bzhag go/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dge byed gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sdig byed gang yin pa de ni lhas byin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/da ltar yang 'dis

[\[190a.1\]]ma dang /_rjes su mthun pa'i lcug ma dang sa ga'o/_/de rnams bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur nas yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i bu mo dag las chung ma blangs pa dang /_de rnams rgyal po la brnyas thabs byed par brtsams pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos

[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]de'i rim gro byas nas sos par gyur to/_/de de'i rim gro byed pa na gcugs pa'i bde bas yang dang yang du drung du song nas gtam rnam pa sna tshogs smra zhing 'dug go/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ba yin pas sa

[\[190b.5\]]bsams pa/_'di ltar 'di chags par gyur la sha 'khon rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/_bud med kyi sha 'khon tha chad yin pas da ni bdag ma rung ngo snyam nas des de dang lhan cig gros bya bar brtsams te/_khyod kyi khyo 'dis gal te bdag cag nyal ba shes par gyur na gdon mi za 
[\[190b.6\]]bar khyod la gnod pa byed cing bdag kyang srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/des bsams pa/_smras pa 'di ni legs kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam mo/_/bud med ni ma bslabs par mkhas pas des mgo bo gos kyis dkris nas ri'i brag ka zhig na nyal te 'dug go/_/

[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]mthong nas des smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag sngon yang klad pa'i bro nad 'di lta bus thebs pa na sman pas rdo dreg bstan te des sos par gyur lags so/_/sa gas smras pa/_rdo dreg btsal lo/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras ri'i bya skyibs 'di la mchis kyis bdag 
[\[191a.2\]]gis khyod kyis spyang thag gzung gis khyod kyis phyung shig_/bdag nyid chen po drang po drang po yin pas de'i ngan g.yo ma shes pas de bzhin du byas zung shig dang dbyung ngo zhes khas blangs nas des de thag pa las dpyang la btang ba dang /_des lag pa gcig gis thag pa btang ba na 
[\[191a.3\]]des kyang btang nas chur lhung ngo /_/sems can tshe ring ba rgyal srid kyi bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ni mi 'chi ba yin pas chu'i rgyun phyogs su khyer nas rgyal po'i pho brang zhig tu phyin to/_/de'i rgyal po yang bu med par shi'o/_/blon po rnams dang /_grong mi dang /_yul 
[\[191a.4\]]mi dang bcas pa thams cad 'dus nas gros byed de/_shes ldan dag rgyal po nongs na da su zhig rgyal srid la gzhag par bya/_de rnams kyis mtshan mkhan gyi mi rnams bskos te/_shes ldan dag sems can bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa tshol cig dang de 
[\[191a.5\]]rgyal srid la gzhag par bya'o/_/de rnams kyis phyogs kun du btsal bar brtsams pa na/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/sa ga la rgyal srid 'byung 
[\[191a.6\]]bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nyid nye bar gnas pas 'bab chu nas byung nas phyogs gzhan zhig na 'dug pa las byang chub sems dpa'i mthus sa phyogs de rgyan gyis brgyan pa bzhin du 'dug go/_/ji tsam na mtshan mkhan gyi mi rnams phyogs der lhags nas bdag 
[\[191a.7\]]nyid chen po de rgyal srid kyi mtshan dang ldan par mthong nas/_de rnams dga' ba dang yid bde bas blon po rnams kyi drung du dong ste smras pa/_bdag cag gis btsal na sems can bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod de de la rgyal srid 'os so/_/de nas blon 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]po de rnams kyis lam gyi byi dor byas grong khyer byi dor byas nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos grong khyer du khrid de nyi ma dang /_tshes grangs dang /_yud tsam dang /_rgyu skar rnams rim bzhin du sbyar te rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ro/_/de la btsun mo med nas blon po rnams dang /_
[\[191b.2\]]mdun na 'don rnams dang /_yul gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams dang /_gzhan yang nor can dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_rang gi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs nas khrid de rgyal pos khab tu bzhes par bya ba'i phyir grong khyer der lhags na/_rgyal po 
[\[191b.3\]]de bud med kyis sun phyung ba yin pas khas ma blangs so/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal po rnams ni btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mir bcas pa lags kyis btsun mo gzhag tu gsol/_yul sna tshogs na gnas 
[\[191b.4\]]pa'i mi gtso bo rnams dang yul gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams dang /_mi gtso bo de rnams kyi bu mo rnams de'i mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sta gon byas te bzhag na/_'on kyang de khas len du ma btub ste bud med rnams yang dang yang du smod do/_/sems can rnams kyi bsod nams 
[\[191b.5\]]kyi mthus longs spyod rnams mthu dang ldan zhing phun sum tshogs pa yin pas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bud med byas pa chud gzon pas ri de las bor ba de'i tshe ri de'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams srabs par gyur cing mthu med par gyur to/_/de nas bud med de mu ge'i dus kyi 'chi ba'i 
[\[191b.6\]]'jigs pas skrag nas rkang lag ma tshang ba'i mi de khur du thogs te grong mthar song nas lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su yang sprang zhig rgyu'o/_/dris pa na smras pa/_bdag khyim thab las mi 'phyo ba'o/_/bud med gang zhig khyim thab las 
[\[191b.7\]]mi 'phyo ba de 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i chos de yod pas de gang du zhugs pa der slong mo 'thob bo/_/ji tsam na de rim gyis rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin pa dang /_'jig rten gyis thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/_/kha cig dag ni ngo mtshar skyes nas de la blta ba'i phyir phyir 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]byung ba dang grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis glags rnyed nas de dag 'phya bar byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed de/_rgyal po 'di ni bud med thams cad la smod par byed na khyim thab las mi 'phyo ba mi rkang lag ma tshang ba khur nas 'khyam 
[\[192a.2\]]pa dam pa 'di ma mthong ba lta/_gtam de mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la smras pa dang /_rgyal pos bsams nas des smras pa/_bud med de bltas khug shig_/de bkug nas rgyal pos mthong ba dang /_'dzum dmul te tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_nga yi brla yi 
[\[192a.3\]]sha dag dang /_/khrag kyang zos shing 'thungs nas ni/_/rdum po khur du thogs pa khyod/_/khyim thab las da mi 'phyo 'am/_/rdo dreg dag gi ched du ni/_/nga ni g.yang sar bor nas su/_/rdum po khur du thogs pa khyod/_/khyim thab las da mi 'phyo 'am/_/de ngo tsha 
[\[192a.4\]]bar gyur pa'i snying gis gdong smad de 'dug go/_/blon po rnams kyis don de rgyal po la dris pa dang des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras nas/_de la smad pa'i tshig gis grong khyer gyi phyi rol du bskrad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems 
[\[192a.5\]]de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po gzhon nu sa ga gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bud med gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/
[\[192a.6\]]gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba thams cad kyi grong rdal gyi grong khyer na rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_/'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo 
[\[192a.7\]]legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na 'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_khrag khrug dang /_'gyed pa dang /_chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa 'bras dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa na chos kyi rgyal po 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]chos dang ldan pa/_chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_rgyal po de yang dad pa bzang ba/_dge ba'i bsam pa can/_bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/_snying rje can/_bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu la byams pa zhig yod pa de dus gzhan 
[\[192b.2\]]zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes 
[\[192b.3\]]pa/_blta na sdug pa/_pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/_mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_dpung pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba/_/yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/btsas nas de'i 
[\[192b.4\]]btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/_khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/nye du rnams kyis smras pa/_khye'u 'di rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen kyi sras yin pas de bas na khye'u'i ming thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gdags so/_/zhes btags nas khye'u 
[\[192b.5\]]thams cad sgrol ma ma brgyad po bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis dang /_ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad nas de 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu 
[\[192b.6\]]dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis srid par byed/_skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_grangs dang /_rtsis dang /_lag rtsis la nye bar zhugs shing rgyal po 
[\[192b.7\]]rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul gyi 'byor ba dang /_mthu dang /_brtson 'grus thob pa/_sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon par zil gyis mnan te gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad par gyur pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_glang po 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]che'i gnya' bar zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta la zhon pa'i thabs dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_gzhu'i 'dzin stangs dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_mda' 
[\[193a.2\]]bo che 'phen pa dang /_gcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_'dzin stangs dang /_gom stangs dang /_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra grag par phog pa dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_tshabs che ba ste gnas lnga rnams la yang byang bar gyur to/_/
[\[193a.3\]]gzhon nu thams cad sgrol dad pa bzang ba/_dge ba'i bsam pa can/_bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/_snying rje can bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu rnams la byams pa/_thams cad rab tu gtong ba/_thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_chags pa med par 
[\[193a.4\]]yongs su gtong ba/_gtong ba chen po la zhugs pa yin te/_de'i gtong ba rgya chen po thos na dpag tshad brgya nas kyang don du gnyer ba'i skye bo 'ong ste/_thams cad kyang yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas gtong ngo /_/de nas re zhig cig na byang chub sems dpa' shing rta nor bu dang /_
[\[193a.5\]]gser dang /_dngul dang /_rdo rje dang /_byi ru dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_spug dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_in+d+ra nI las 'bar bar byas pa/_tsan dan mchog gi snying po las bsgrubs pa/_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_gung gi pags pas g.yogs pa/_rta rlung gi shugs ltar 
[\[193a.6\]]mgyogs pa/_gser dang dngul gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra 'khrol ba bzhi dang ldan pa mchog gi nang du zhugs nas grong khyer dam pa nas skyed mos tshal du mngon du song ngo /_/de nas bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol bsu nas smras pa/_rgyal 
[\[193a.7\]]rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig_/yang smras pa/_khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/_/thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/_/bram ze rnams la shing rta 'di/_/khyod kyis sbyin pa gtang bar rigs/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]cad sgrol shing rta de las myur ba myur bar babs te snying dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' bas bram ze de dag la shing rta de byin nas smras pa/_bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la/_/mchog tu dga' bas shing rta btang /_/de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/_/btang nas byang 
[\[193b.2\]]chub mchog reg shog_/de dus gzhan zhig na glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba me tog kun da dang /_puN+Da rI ka dang /_kha ba dang /_dngul dang /_sprin dkar po lta bu'i mdog can bdun legs par gyur pa/_rkang lag legs par gnas pa/_glang po ches srung 
[\[193b.3\]]gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba/_skal ba mchog gi mtshan can/_bsod nams byas pas mthong ba la zhon nas shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du so ga'i dus la 
[\[193b.4\]]bab pas shing rnams me tog kha 'bus shing /_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal gyi skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba dang /_de nas phyir rgol bas rbad pa'i bram ze kha cig gzhon 
[\[193b.5\]]nu thams cad sgrol gyi drung du rings pa rings par 'ongs nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol la smras pa/_rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig_/yang smras pa/_lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du/_/khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags/_/khyod kyi glang po mchog 
[\[193b.6\]]'di ni/_/bdag cag rnams la stsal pa'i rigs/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i mchog de las myur ba myur bar babs nas/_dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis de dag la glang po che'i mchog de byin nas smras pa/_
[\[193b.7\]]bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la/_/mchog tu dga' bas glang chen btang /_/de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/_/btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog_/rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyi bu thams cad sgrol gyis glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba phyir rgol 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]bas rbad pa'i bram ze rnams la byin no zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen shin tu khros 'khrugs nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol bkug ste smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod nga'i yul na ma 'dug par song shig_/de nas gzhon nu 
[\[194a.2\]]thams cad sgrol phas spangs pa dang bsams pa/_bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir 'bad pa byas pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pas glang po che de yang btang ste/_de bas khyim na gnas pas ni/_/ci nus pas ni sbyin pa btang /_/
[\[194a.3\]]dka' thub nags su brten nas ni/_/nges pa mchog dag bya ba yin/_/bslangs na mi sbyin bya ba yi/_/tshig ni smra bar mi phod kyi/_/de bas bdag ni khyim spangs te/_/dka' thub nags su rab tu 'gro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar snying la mna' mtho 
[\[194a.4\]]bcad nas chung ma rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste de dag rgyas par smras so/_/de nas rgyags sbyin mas thos ma thag tu sdug pa dang bral bar dogs pa'i snying gis thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_rje'i sras gal te de ltar na bdag kyang dka' thub kyi nags su 
[\[194a.5\]]mchi ste/_bdag ni rje'i sras dang bral na skad cig tsam yang 'tsho bar rngo mi thog lags so/_/ci'i slad du zhe na/_nam mkha' zla bas stongs par gyur pa dang /_/ji ltar sa ni lo tog gis stongs dang /_/pad ma chu yis stongs par gyur pa dang /_/bud med khyim thab kyis 
[\[194a.6\]]stongs de bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bdag cag mthar gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur te/_'di ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin no/_/khyod ni bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_bgo ba mchog la goms pas lus shin tu skyid de ba 
[\[194a.7\]]yin/_dka' thub kyi nags na ni rtswa dang lo ma bting bar ni nyal/_rtsa ba dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu ni za/_rtswa dUr ba dang /_zug rdo dang /_rtswa dang /_tsher mas gang ba'i sa la ni rgyu/_yang dang yang du za gcig pa la ni sten/_bdag nyid skye bo thams cad la ni 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]bsten dgos/_glo bur du 'ongs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni 'bad dgos la/_de na yang nga gdon mi za bar ci nus kyis sbyin pa gtong ste de la khyod kyis cung zad kyang mi 'gyod par bya dgos so/_/de bas na re zhig da dung yang legs par soms shig rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/_rje'i 
[\[194b.2\]]sras bdag rngo ci thog gis rje'i sras kyi rjes su sgrub lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' smras pa/_gal te de lta na dam bcas pa de dag khyod kyis dran par byos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' pha'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te/_yab cig bdag gis sbyin 
[\[194b.3\]]par glang chen stsal/_/nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol/_/bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchi lags kyi/_/mi yi dbang po phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur/_/de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dbugs kyis brnangs te skad 'dar 'dar bos smras pa/_
[\[194b.4\]]bu sbyin pa'i blo bor la 'dug shig_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_sa ni ri dang bcas par yang /_/gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yis/_/sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa las/_/sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do/_/zhes smras nas song ngo /_/de nas bu dang /_bu mo dang /_
[\[194b.5\]]chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi mya ngan byed pa brgya stong rjes su 'brang bzhin du song ngo /_/de nas mi zhig gis ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra de yang thos/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang 
[\[194b.6\]]mthong nas mi zhig la dris pa/_kye nang rje skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'di cho nges 'debs pa ci las gyur des smras pa/_shes ldan ci mi shes sam/_'di ltar mi yi dbang po nyid kyi sras po mche ba bzang /_/brtan pa'i ngang tshul rab tu sbyin la dga' ba 'di nas spyugs/_de ni bu dang chung mar 
[\[194b.7\]]bcas te nags mthar chas pa la/_/pho brang 'khor ba rnams 'dus shin tu snying rjes cho nges 'debs/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 'khor ba rnams la ci rigs par mngon du song nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag slar deng shig_/slar 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]deng shig_/'di ltar shin tu yun ring po nas sdug pa dang 'grogs pa yang mjug tu gdon mi za bar 'bral ba'i mtha' can du 'gyur te/_gnyen gyi skye bo dang 'grogs pa ni lam ka'i ngal bso ba'i bsti gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi za bar sdug pa dang bral 
[\[195a.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten kun na skye bo dbang med de/_/mdza' ba rnams dang bral bar 'gyur bsams nas/_/khyed kyis sa steng 'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/zhi phyir blo gros mi g.yo brtan pa gyis/_/de nas dpag tshad sum brgya 'das pa dang /_/byang chub 
[\[195a.3\]]sems dpa' mthong nas bram ze zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa/_kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag ni khyod kyi yon tan thos nas 'di nas dpag tshad sum brgya tsam gyi yul nas 'dir mchis lags kyis/_khyod kyi shing rta mchog 'dis bdag ngal ba 'bras bu mchis par bgyi ba'i rigs 
[\[195a.4\]]so/_/de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes te tshig brlang pos bram ze de la smras pa/_e ma'o nags na'ang mi dbang sras la slong ba gang /_/bram ze 'di ni shin tu brtse ba med pa'i blo/_/mi dbang sras po mi dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa/_/'di la 'dir ni snying rje cig mi 
[\[195a.5\]]skye 'am/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_khyod kyis bram ze ma spyo shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyags sbyin gal te nor 'dod len pa 'di dag med gyur na/_/kun sbyin med par mi gang zhig gis sa steng byang chub 'thob/_/sbyin sogs pha rol phyin drug tshul gyis yon tan 
[\[195a.6\]]mchog can gyi/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun mkhyen nyid mchog rtag tu 'thob/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' bas rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/_bram ze ser sna dri ma sel byed pa/_/shing rta rab tu byin pa 'di yis 
[\[195a.7\]]'dir/_/bdag ni drang srong che mchog gis bskor ba'i/_/zag med chos kyi shing rta che skor shog_/de nas thams cad sgrol gyis snying rab tu dga' bas shing rta'i mchog de yang bram ze la byin nas gzhon nu mdog gnag phrag pa la khyer/_rgyags sbyin mas ni gzhon nu ma dra ba can 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]khyer nas dka' thub kyi nags logs su chas pa dang rim gyis dka' thub kyi nags su phyin to/_/de nas thams cad sgrol dka' thub kyi tshal der rang gi snying mgu bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs blangs te gnas so/_/ci tsam na rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i phyir dka' thub kyi 
[\[195b.2\]]nags su song ba dang bram ze zhig thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/_rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig_/bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis pa/_/spa shug lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na/_/de yi don du bus pa gnyis/_/khyod kyis bdag la sbyin pa'i rigs/_/
[\[195b.3\]]de skad ces smras pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol bu sdug pa gtong ba la chung shig sems shing 'dug pa dang de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol la smras pa/_kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag gis khyod thams cad ster ba'o zhes thos na 'di 
[\[195b.4\]]ltar khyod la bdag gis bslangs pa de la ci zhig dpyad du yod/_khyod ni kun ster snying rje yi/_/bdag nyid can du sa steng grags/_/ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du/_/khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis 
[\[195b.5\]]bram ze de la smras pa/_kye bram ze chen po/_/rang gi srog ni gtong ba la'ang /_/lan 'ga' dpyod pa ma myong na/_/rang gi bu ni gtong ba la/_/bdag blo gzhan du 'gyur ci smos/_/bram ze chen po de lta mod kyi/_bdag gis nags su bskyed bskyed pa'i/_/bus pa 'di gnyis 
[\[195b.6\]]yongs spangs na/_/ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa/_/'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod/_/gzhon nu shin tu brtse med pas/_/bus pa btang la bdag min zhes/_/kha cig bdag la 'phyar 'ong gis/_/bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs/_/de nas bram ze des thams cad 
[\[195b.7\]]sgrol la smras pa/_kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/_sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/_srog chags thams cad la snying rje brtse bas 'o byams par zhugs pa/_sbyin pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_bkur stis spos kyi glang po lta bu dge 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_blo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod pa byed pa/_skye bo bkren pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_ltogs pa yongs su sdug pa thams cad kyi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis bdag 
[\[196a.2\]]'ongs na nom pa med pa'am/_lam gyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa'am/_mthong na don med pa'am/_re ba dang yun ring po nas brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni cha ma yin te/_khyod kyi med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo'i yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i 
[\[196a.3\]]rta bstabs na myur du ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na khyod kyis bdag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas btang ba'i rigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chu gter gos su gyon zhing bza' mig mtshungs med pa/_/ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can/_/grong khyer 
[\[196a.4\]]grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang /_/mche bzang khyod dang mtshungs par gtong phod yod ma yin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze'i tshig de thos nas bu la chags pa'i slong bas 'di dag sems par byed de/_gal te re zhig bu gnyis po/_/bram 
[\[196a.5\]]ze byin na bu dang ni/_/bral ba las byung sdug bsngal dag_/bdag dang rgyags sbyin gyis 'thob 'gyur/_/'on te 'di la ma byin na/_/brtul zhugs las kyang nyams gyur cing /_/bram ze 'di ni tshe chad de/_/ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'gro/_/nyes na bu bral nyam thag pa'i/_/
[\[196a.6\]]mya ngan sa steng bdag gis blang /_/de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa/_/zhig cing brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis sdug pa'i bu gnyis nges par btang bar chad nas smras pa/_kye kho bos dka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten 
[\[196a.7\]]sdug bsngal gyi/_/rgya mtsho chen po so sor 'jigs byed pa/_/gting mi dpogs par rab tu bying ba dag_/pha rol bsgral phyir lam gyi zam stegs bca'/_/zla ba dri med nya ba'i bzhin ras can/_/ma zhum kha nas de skad tshig smras nas/_/mchi ma'i brlan chus mig ni 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]gang gyur pas/_/byis pa gnyis po bram ze de la byin/_/yang smras pa/_bu 'di byin pa'i 'bras bu ni/_/rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas/_/des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/_/'jig rten rnams ni bsgral bar bya/_/byis pa gzhon nu dag byin ma thag tu sa 'di rnam pa drug 
[\[196b.2\]]tu g.yos so/_/de nas sa g.yo ba des nags de na gnas pa'i dka' thub can rnams sdangs nas phan tshun smras pa/_sa ni mi bzad g.yos gyur pa/_/'di ni su yi mthu ltas yin/_/gang gi mthu ni 'di 'dra ba/_/shin tu bsal bar shes par bya/_/de na gnas 'jog dang rus gcig 
[\[196b.3\]]pa rgan po dka' thub can ltas shes pa la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des drang srong de rnams la don de go bar byas pa/_gdon mi za bar dka' thub kyi nags su 'dug pa'i bu byis pa 'bras bu dang chu 'thung ba yid du 'ong ba'i mig tu sdug par byed pa gnyis thams cad sgrol gyis skye bo sdug 
[\[196b.4\]]bsngal gyis nyam thag pa/_yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir btang ste/_des nas g.yos par gyur to//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgya pa/_de nas bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing thal mo gnyis sbyar 
[\[196b.5\]]nas thams cad sgrol gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_yab cig yum ni ma mchis par/_/khyod ni bdag cag stsol bzhed pa/_/re zhig de ni mthong gyur nas/_/de nas bdag cag stsal du gsol/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal 
[\[196b.6\]]gyis ngom zung gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag bzhin de gnyis la 'khyud nas smras pa/_bu dag nga yi snying du mi sdug min/_/snying brtse snying rje med min te/_/'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/yon tan mthong nas btang ba yin/_/ci nas nga yis byang chub mchog_/zhi ba rang 
[\[196b.7\]]gis thob nas ni/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i/_/rten med 'jig rten rnams bsgral lo/_/de nas byis pa gzhon nu de dag gis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas pha'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas snying rje rje skad dang sma 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]bab pa'i tshig gis dal gyis smras pa/_gal te khyod kyis thag bkum na/_/ma la bdag cag gnyis kyi phrin/_/khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces/_/yab cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol/_/yab gzhan yang byis par gyur pas bla ma khyod la 
[\[197a.2\]]nongs pa bgyis pa gang /_/gal te la lar thugs la mi bab tshig 'ga' smras pa'am/_/gus par mnyan pas yongs su mnyes pa nyid du ma bgyis pa/_/de ni byis pa'i nongs pa lags zhes bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_/de skad ces smras nas pha la phyag 'tshal te lan 
[\[197a.3\]]gsum du bskor ba byas nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin bla ma la smra bar yid la gcags pas yang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying blong nas yid kyi byang chub tu 
[\[197a.4\]]smon lam btab ste/_dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs so/_/byis pa gzhon nu dag dong ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/lha stong phrag du mas yang bar snang la ca co dang ga zha'i sgra 'byin cing /_e 
[\[197a.5\]]ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che/_/byis pa 'di gnyis btang nas kyang /_/gang gi yid ni 'gyur med pa/_/de ni nges pa rmad cig go/_/de nas rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te bsti gnas logs su chas pa las sa che thang du g.yos pa des myur ba kho nar bsti gnas de 
[\[197a.6\]]nyid du song ba dang /_lha gzhan zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' sems can thar bar bya bar brtson pa byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas seng ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te lam bkag nas 'dug pa dang rgyags sbyin 
[\[197a.7\]]mas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po'i chung ma de la smras pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgeg ma/_/kho mo lam 'dir bkag nas ci ste 'dug_/ji ltar bdag ni mi 'phyo nges gyur na/_/lam las bzur te myur du 'gro bar gyis/_/gzhan yang khyod kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po'i chung ma la/_/
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi/_/btsun mo yin pas chos kyi spun gyur gyis/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal mos bdag gi lam phye shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang lha seng ge mo'i gzugs su bsgyur ba de yang lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo /_/de nas rgyags sbyin mas bkra mi 
[\[197b.2\]]shis pa'i ltas dag mthong nas yud tsam zhig bsams pa/_ji ltar bar snang la ngud mo'i sgra grag pa dang /_ji ltar yang tshal na gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams mya ngan byed pa'i sgra grag pa las na gdon mi za bar bsti gnas su ma legs pa zhig byung bar gyur to snyam nas smras pa/_ji 
[\[197b.3\]]ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang /_/ji ltar bya skad 'byin pa dang /_/ji ltar bdag ni dogs pa las/_/bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges/_/ji ltar sa 'di g.yos pa dang /_/bdag gi snying ni 'dar ba dang /_/ji ltar lus kyang rma ba las/_/bus pa de yang btang bar nges/_/
[\[197b.4\]]zhes de lta bu'i mi legs pa brgya stong dag sems shing bsti gnas su song nas bsti gnas su zhugs te/_mi dga' bzhin bltas na bu de gnyis ma mthong nas de nas rmongs shing snying 'dar bas bsti gnas kyi gzhi de'i rjes bzhin du sems te/_phyogs 'di na ni gzhon nu mdog nag sring 
[\[197b.5\]]mo dang lhan cig [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phru gu dang lhan cig rtag tu rtse rtse/_'di ni de gnyis kyis sa rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin/_'di ni de gnyis kyi rtsed mo'i cha byad yin na de gnyis ni mi snang na gal te zhig na bdag gis ma mthong gi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs nas nyal lta srid dam snyam du de ltar 
[\[197b.6\]]snying la re zhig bu mthong bar 'dod pas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du khyim thab kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_rje'i sras khye'u dang bu mo de gnyis gang du mchis/_thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/_kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig_/re 
[\[197b.7\]]bas yang dag 'ongs gyur na/_/bus pa de gnyis de la byin/_/de la rjes su yi rang gyis/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyags sbyin ma [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo mda' dug can gyis phog pa bzhin du sa la skyel nas nya chu'i gnas nas phyung ba bzhin du 'gre ldog par byed/_khrung khrung bu stor ba 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]bzhin du ni snying rje rje skad du du/_ba be'u shi ba bzhin du ni 'ba' sgra sna tshogs 'don cing smras pa/_pad mo gzhon nu lta bu'i byad bzhin can/_/lag pa pad ma'i mda' ltar gzhon sha can/_/bdag gi bu gnyis sdug bsngal ma myong ba/_/'gro ba gang du 
[\[198a.2\]]song nas sdug bsngal gyur/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bu ltar drang zhing [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mig_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lhan cig bsti gnas dga' ba na/_/de ring bdag gi bu gnyis ji lta bur/_/gzhan gyi dbang gis dong zhing sdug bsngal gyur/_/mig ni mchi mas gang ba'i mig gis ni/_/snying rjes du 
[\[198a.3\]]bas shin tu sdug bsngal ba/_/de ring bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas/_/skye bo bkren pa'i nang na sdug pas 'tsho/_/de gnyis bdag gi pang nas bskyed bskyed pa/_/zas su rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu za/_/bzod dang gnas pas bla ma rtag dga' bas/_/bdag gi bu gnyis 
[\[198a.4\]]shin tu sdug bsngal lo/_/de gnyis ma dang nye du bral ba dang /_/rtsa lag rnams kyis gzu lums spangs pa las/_/skye bo sdig can ngan dang phrad gyur nas/_/bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo/_/skom zhing bkres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs na/_/de gnyis su yi dbang 
[\[198a.5\]]gis 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bran du gyur pas gdon mi za bar ni/_/de gnyis nyam thag sdug bsngal yongs su zin/_/bdag gis nges par tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/_/srog chags sdug pa brgya dag phral ba yi/_/sdig las shin tu mi bzad 'dir byas pa/_/des na ba be'u med 
[\[198a.6\]]bzhin cho nges 'debs/_/bden tshig gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang /_/sems can kun la yid ni mnyam gyur pa/_/bden tshig des ni bdag gi bu gnyis po/_/bran du gyur pa las ni thar bar shog_/de nas rgyags sbyin mas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis bskyed cing bsrungs 
[\[198a.7\]]pa'i shing gang yin pa de dag lo ma thib be 'dug par mthong nas snying du sdug nas 'khyud de smras pa/_bus pas ril ba chung ngu'i chus bcus pa/_/lo ma rnams la chu thigs 'dzag pa yi/_/ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa bzhin/_/bus pa nu zho ma blud lta bur ngu /_/
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]yang bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis dang rtse rtse ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phru gu bsti gnas na 'dug pa rnams mthong nas mi dga' ste snying rje rje skad kyi tshig gis dal bus smras pa/_de'i ne'u zla mthong bar 'dod pa gang /_/gnas su sa tshugs mtshon cing tshol byed pa/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phru gu rgyu ba 
[\[198b.2\]]'di dag kyang /_/bdag gi sdug bsngal mi chung gzhan yin no/_/de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam der rjes bcad pa dang /_bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis rjes drang por ma byung gi gya gyus gang bar mthong nas lhag par yang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas 
[\[198b.3\]]smras pa/_ji ltar 'then pa'i rjes byung dang /_/la lar myur du song ba las/_/brdegs te khrid par gdon mi za/_/kye ma bram ze brtse med mchog_/mgul ni dbugs kyis brdzags shing skad kyang 'dzer/_/ma mchu mdzes pa 'dar zhing bdag gi bu/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du mig 
[\[198b.4\]]kyang rig rig ste/_/rkang pa 'jam pos ji ltar song zhig gu/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de ltar smre sngags 'don pa'i bdag nyid de mthong nas mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshig de dang de dag gis rnam grangs mang por go bar byas nas smras pa/_kho bos bu gnyis grags pa yis/_/
[\[198b.5\]]btang ba ma yin sdang bas min/_/sems can kun la phan don du/_/btang bar dka' ba'i bu de btang /_/mchog tu btang dka' bdag nyid dang /_/bu dang chung ma rnams btang nas/_/sems dpa' chen pos tshul bzhin du/_/byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/rgyags 
[\[198b.6\]]sbyin bdag gis gtong ba la brten gtang dka' ba'i/_/bus pa de gnyis 'jig rten thar pa'i don du btang /_/bdag dang chung ma gzhon nu nor yang gtang bya ste/_/kun la thams cad btang ba'i blo gros nga la yod/_/de nas rgyags sbyin mas sems brtan te/_byang chub sems 
[\[198b.7\]]dpa' la smras pa/_khyod la bar chad mi bgyid kyis/_/khyod blo gzhan du ma 'gyur cig_/gal te bdag kyang stsol bzhed na/_/dogs pa ma mdzad bdag stsol cig_/gzhan yang dpa' bo gang phyir nyid kyi mi/_/sdug pas chags pa btang ba yi/_/don de myur du thob nas ni/_/
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]srid las 'gro ba bsgral bar mdzod/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rgyags sbyin ma brtson 'grus shin tu rmad du byung ba dang /_shin tu bya dka' bar rig nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[199a.2\]]bskor te/_steng gi nam mkha' las bsti gnas der lhags nas snang ba rgya chen pos gnas de gsal bar byas te/_nam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_'di ltar 'jig rten rmongs pa blo ngan gzhung gis bcings pa'i blo gros can/_/longs 
[\[199a.3\]]spyod la chags snying gi zhags pa bu yis bcings pa'i nang na yang /_/khyab bdag khyod gcig chags pa med pas dga' bskyed pa'i bu gtong bas/_/nges par go 'phang ba de dang zhi ba dri med dka' ba med pas 'thob/_/de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyed nas lha 
[\[199a.4\]]rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_'di gcig pu g.yog dang bral na nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis rgyags sbyin ma bslang ngo snyam nas/_de nas bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur te byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song nas yang byang chub sems dpa' la 
[\[199a.5\]]smras pa/_yan lag kun bzang khyim thab las/_/'phyo ba med cing snying nye ba/_/rigs na bsngags pa'i sring mo 'di/_/bdag la bran mo'i don du stsol/_/de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas bram ze la smras pa/_ngo tsha med cing brkam pa khyod/_/'di ni 
[\[199a.6\]]bram ze'i tha shal te/_/khyod lta 'phyon ma mi byed cing /_/dam chos dga' ba nga 'dod dam/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol snying rje dang ldan pa'i snying gis rgyags sbyin ma la brtag par brtsams pa dang /_de nas rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_
[\[199a.7\]]bdag ni bdag la g.yar ngan med/_/de bzhin bdag la lta ma lags/_/gcig pu ji ltar bzhugs 'gyur zhes/_/de ltar khyod slang g.yar ngan bgyid/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/_go 'phang mi zad mya ngan med pa tshol bdag la/_/sa 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]steng 'dir ni rgyags sbyin mya ngan bya mi dgos/_/khyod ni mya ngan med par bram ze 'di rjes 'brongs/_/bdag ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'chi ba bzhin du bsti gnas 'then/_/de skad ces smras nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yid rab tu dga' bas bsams pa/_sbyin pa 'di ni nags 
[\[199b.2\]]tshal 'dir/_/bdag gi sbyin pa tha ma yin/_/rgyags sbyin 'dir yang yongs btang nas/_/yongs su gzung ba med par 'gyur snyam du rig nas rgyags sbyin ma lag pa nas bzung ste bram ze de la smras pa/_bdag gi mchis 'brang sdug pa 'di/_/snying nas snying nye bsgo ba nyan/_/
[\[199b.3\]]ya rabs tshul can snyan par smra/_/bram ze'i mchog khyod bzhes su gsol/_/de nas mche ba bzang po yi/_/chung ma byang chub 'dod phyir btang /_/chu la gru ni ji lta bar/_/sa ni mtha' dag rnam drug g.yos/_/de nas rgyags sbyin ma bram ze'i dbang du gyur te/_/khyo dang /_bu 
[\[199b.4\]]dang /_bu mo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas dbugs brdzags pas mgul sgra ngar ngar por 'gags bzhin 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis tshe rabs snga ma la/_/ci 'dra ba yi las ngan byas/_/des na ba be'u shi ba bzhin/_/skye bo med pa'i nags na ngu /_/de 
[\[199b.5\]]nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i cha byad mi snang bar byas te rang bzhin gyi cha byad du gnas nas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/_skal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag ni bram ze ma yin mi yang ma yin gyi/_/bdag ni lha yi dbang po brgya byin lha min 'joms byed de/_/khyod kyi 'dul ba'i mchog 
[\[199b.6\]]tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgu yis/_/bdag las dam pa gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar gyis/_/de nas de'i tshig gis rgyags sbyin ma yid bde ba skyes nas brgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_spyan stong ldan pa bdag gi bu/_/bran gyur pa las thar mdzad cing /_/mes 
[\[199b.7\]]po'i drung du phyin par yang /_/sum bcu rtsa gsum bdag pos mdzod/_/de skad ces smras nas yang dbang po chen po bsti gnas su zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste/_rgyags sbyin ma lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_bdag gis khyod 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]la rgyags sbyin 'di/_/g.yog gi phyir ni sbyin par byas/_/khyod kyis su la'ang ma sbyin cig_/bzhag pa byin na smad par 'gyur/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze khye'u dang bu mo khyer ba de ji ltar grong khyer gzhan yin no snyam nas grong khyer de 
[\[200a.2\]]nyid du song ste bus pa gzhon nu de dag btsong bar brtsams pa de lta bur rmongs par byas so/_/ji tsam na blon po rnams kyis mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/_lha khyod kyi dpon po mdog nag dang /_/dra ba can dang de gnyis ni/_/bram ze shin tu ma rungs pa/_/grong khyer mchog 
[\[200a.3\]]'dir 'tshong zhing mchis/_/de skad ces thos nas rgyal po de sems mi dga' nas smras pa/_gzhon nu gnyis myur du ston cig_/blon po rnams kyis skad phyung ba dang grong khyer pa rnams myur du rgyal po'i mdun du nye bar lhags nas/_ji tsam na blon po gzhan zhig gis rgyal po'i 
[\[200a.4\]]drung du khrid pa dang /_mi yi dbang po mngon phyogs khrid pa'i tsha bo gos med cing /_/lus rbeg dri ma can gyi lus de de yis mthong nas ni/_/mod la seng ge'i khri las sa yi steng du ltung gyur te/_/pho brang 'khor mi blon tshogs bud med dag kyang ngu bar gyur/_/de nas rgyal pos 
[\[200a.5\]]blon po rnams la smras pa/_gang zhig nags na gnas pa yang /_/sbyin la mngon par dga' ba'i yid/_/mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ni myur du 'dir/_/chung ma dang bcas dgug par gyis/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas rang gi gnas 
[\[200a.6\]]su song ngo /_/phyi zhig na rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen 'das pa dang /_/bram ze de dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams lhan cig bsti gnas der song nas byang chub sems dpa' la gsol ba btab ste/_rang gi grong khyer du bos nas rgyal por bcug go/_/de 
[\[200a.7\]]nas rgyal po thams cad sgrol thams cad gtong zhes bya bar gyur to/_/des dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_mdza' bo dang /_nye du dang /_gnyen bshes dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_byang 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]chub don du gnyer ba yis/_/rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang /_/dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la'ang /_/'jigs pa med par sbyin pa btang /_/gser dang dngul dang ba lang dang /_/rta dang nor bu'i rna rgyan dang /_/de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran/_/tshul khrims phun 
[\[200b.2\]]sum tshogs la sbyin/_/chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/bu dang chung ma yongs btang bas/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/mi yis dag pa thob par 'gyur/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyis thams cad sgrol gyi ched du bram ze dzu dzu ka la nor 
[\[200b.3\]]mang po sbyin pa de'i tshe de 'byor pa rgya chen por gyur pa dang /_de la snying du sdug pa dang /_rtsa lag dang /_grogs po dag 'ongs nas smras pa/_khyod kyi 'byor pa dang /_dpal dang skal ba phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa ci yang rung de dag thams cad ni gzhon nu thams cad sgrol 
[\[200b.4\]]de la brten te yin no/_/des smras pa/_gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyis kho bo la ci zhig byas/_rigs mchog gi nang du skyes pas kho bo 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur te/_/des na kho bo skal pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[200b.5\]]dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dzu dzu ka gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas 
[\[200b.6\]]pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor bar bya ste/_cung zad byas pa yang chud mi gsan par bya na mang po la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[200b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul tsam pa na khyim bdag gru 'dzin zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu la nor 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas te/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/_dus gzhan zhig 
[\[201a.2\]]na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_'di ltar de'i mngal yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra cung zad kyang mi thos shing grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dang /_dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dang /_sman pas bcas pa'i kha zas ha cang kha ba ma yin pa dang /_ha cang skyur ba ma 
[\[201a.3\]]yin pa dang /_ha cang lan tshwa che ba ma yin pa dang /_ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa dang /_ha cang tsha ba ma yin pa dang /_ha cang bska ba ma yin pa ste/_de ltar kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_mngar ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba spangs pa'i kha zas kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing do 
[\[201a.4\]]shal dang /_se mo dos lus brgyan nas lha'i bu mo dga' tshal na rgyu ba bzhin du khri'u nas khri'ur dang /_khri nas khrir rgyu zhing 'og gis gzhi la mi 'bab bo/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag gru 'dzin dgos pa 'ga' zhig la rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo /_/de yang zla ba dgu 'am/_bcu lon te rgyu skar 
[\[201a.5\]]gro bzhin la bab pa na khye'u gzugs bzang po blta na sdug pa mdzes pa de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis la spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi tsam skyes pa zhig btsas so/_/btsas nas ji tsam na khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyi mi zhig rings pa rings par rgyal po'i khab tu song nas khyim bdag gru 
[\[201a.6\]]'dzin la smras pa/_khyim bdag dgyes pa skyed cig_/khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsas so/_/de dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas smras pa/_kye nang rje ci zhig smra/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsas so/_/de dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas yang dris pa/_
[\[201a.7\]]kye nang rje ci zhig smra/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsas so/_/yang dris pa/_kye nang rje ci zhig smra/_de nas mi de 'di snyam du sems te ci khyim bdag 'di yang nas yang du 'dri ba bdag la kyal ka smra bar mi 'dod grang snyam du bsams nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/khyim 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]bdag gis smras pa/_kye nang rje khyod kyis nyes te/_gal te khyod kyis lan brgyar smras par gyur na yang /_ngas kyang khyod kyi kha gser gyis lan brgya bkang bar 'gyur ba zhig_/de nas khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis mi de'i kha gser gyis lan gsum bkang nas dkor pa la khye'u dkan 
[\[201b.2\]]dbab pa'i rin gser bye ba nyi shu byin cig ces spring ngo /_/khyim bdag gru 'dzin dga' ba dang yid bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song nas lha bdag gi khye'u zhig btsas so/_/rgyal pos smras pa legs so/_/ngas de la tsam pa gzhi dang bcas pa dang /_glang po che bdun gyi tshogs 
[\[201b.3\]]sbyin no/_/khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bltas te tsam par 'ongs nas de nas khyim bdag gi gnyen rnams kyis nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/gzhan dag 
[\[201b.4\]]gis smras pa/_khye'u 'di rgyu skar gro bzhin la btsas la 'di btsas pa na phas kyang dkan dbab pa'i rin du gser bye ba nyi shu byin pas/_de bas na khye'u'i ming gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya bar gdags so zhes de'i ming gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya bar btags te/_khye'u gro bzhin skyes 
[\[201b.5\]]bye ba nyi shu pa ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de/_pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te/_de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu 
[\[201b.6\]]dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis skyed par byed/_sring bar byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed de/_de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_grangs dang /_rtsis dang /_lag rtsis dang /_dbyung ba dang /_gzhug pa dang /_gzhag 
[\[201b.7\]]pa la nye bar zhugs shing /_brtag pa brgyad po gzhi brtag pa dang /_gos brtag pa dang /_rin po che brtag pa dang /_shing brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_gzhon nu brtag pa dang /_gzhon nu ma brtag pa dang /_'byed pa dang /_klog pa la mkhas 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]pa dang /_g.yer por gyur to/_/de bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa yin no/_/zhes rigs mnyam pa mang pos thos nas bu sring dag byin no/_/de'i phas 'dug pa'i khang pa gsum po dgun gyi dang /_dpyid kyi dang /_dbyar gyi rtsig tu bcug ste chung ma 
[\[202a.2\]]gsum po chen ma dang /_bar ma dang /_chun ma bzhag nas de steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir song ste skyes pa med pa na rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de nyi ma re re zhing lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas 'tshed cing sbyor ro/_/lha sbyin gyis gzhon nu ma skyes dgra 
[\[202a.3\]]la rbad pa gzhon nu rgyal po thams cad ni gang gi tshe skra skya bo skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe gzhon nu'i thu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag nas rab tu 'byung na/_khyod kyi yab ni skra kha dog rnam pa gsum pa'i mthar phyin na 'on kyang 'dod pa rnams la zhen bzhin te nye bar zhi bar mi 'gro'o/_/
[\[202a.4\]]ma skyes dgras smras pa/_de nyid kyis shes mod/_de la ci byar yod/_lha sbyin gyis smras pa/_pha rol gnod pa gyis shig_/'dod pa don du gnyer ba rnams ni mi byed pa ci yang med pas/_ji tsam na rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das mar gsol nas 'jams gsol bar 
[\[202a.5\]]bzhed pa'i 'jams kyi zhal ta byas te/_'od ma'i tshal du song ba ma skyes dgras mthong nas des rdo rje rtse gcig pa zhig 'phangs pa dang rgyal po sgra la mkhas pa yin pas des g.yon phyogs su thug pa'i rdze'u chag par gyur nas de nyid nas slar log go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[202a.6\]]rnams ni 'di lta bu mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_thugs su ma chud pa'am/_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu ma skyes dgra mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[202a.7\]]lha sbyin gyis zin pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod snyoms ma rung bar byas kyis tsam par gru 'dzin gyi bu'i drung du song la bsod snyoms khyer te shog shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas ji 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar gyur te tsam par phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa nyi ma la dad pas de nyi ma re re zhing nang par sngar langs te nyi ma la phyag byed pa na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i 
[\[202b.2\]]rdzu 'phrul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brtol nas babs pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bdag gis mngon sum kho nar nyi ma nyid kyi gzugs mthong ngo snyam nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/_/mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/_
[\[202b.3\]]nyi ma brtol nas sa steng mngon phyogs myur nyid du/_/bdag gi gnas su byon pa 'di ko su zhig lags/_/'di ci nyi ma'am nor sbyin zla ba'am brgya byin nam/_/'on te lha yi bdag po mod la gshegs shig gu/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i sems kyis kyang de'i bsam pa 
[\[202b.4\]]shes nas yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kho bo 'od zer stong gi 'od 'bar nyi ma ma yin rgyu skar bdag po min/_/kho bo rnam thos ma yin mchog ldan ma yin legs pa'i brtul zhugs dbang phyug min/_/kho bo thugs zhi gzi brjid kyis 'bar sangs rgyas sras po yin par shes par 
[\[202b.5\]]byos/_/kho bo thub la bsod snyoms dgongs nas bslang ba'i phyir ni khyod kyi drung du 'ongs/_gro bzhin skyes kyis smras pa/_ci shes ldan nyid thub pa yin nam/_des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji ltar gser gyi ri bo lhun po'i zlar ni yungs kar khyer te 'ong ba dang /_ji ltar nyi 
[\[202b.6\]]ma'i zlar ni sa steng srog chags srin bu me khyer 'jal ba dang /_/rin chen gyis phyug rgya mtsho'i zlar ni 'di ni gnag gi rmig rjes sgrun pa ltar/_/de bzhin mi mchog bla ma sangs rgyas la ltos ston pa'i sras dag rig par gyis/_gro bzhin skyes kyis smras pa/_rjes su dpag pa 'di yis 
[\[202b.7\]]na/_/bdag gis khyod kyi 'dren pa ni/_/ji ltar dka' thub rab che ba/_/gsal bar rab tu rtogs lags so/_/dgos pa ci la byon bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod snyoms phul cig_/bcom ldan 'das de su yin/_khyim bdag gi bu dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod do/_/khyim bdag gi 
[\[203a.2\]]bu de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/des sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas ba spu'i khung thams cad g.yos shing mngon par dad pa des snod du btsos pa lnga brgya po de nyid tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la phul lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de las 
[\[203a.3\]]bsod snyoms blangs nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na tsam pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_des bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms phul te bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[203a.4\]]gsol par brtsams pa na/_ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos snod nas btsos pa phyi ma shos khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang /_ji tsam na 'od ma'i tshal thams cad kha zas kyi dri zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab par mthong nas des bsams 
[\[203a.5\]]pa/_gdon mi za bar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/_lha gzhan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms phul te/_'di ltar 'od ma'i tshal 'di kha zas kyi dri zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab par gyur to snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[203a.6\]]to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/_lha gzhan dag gis bsod snyoms phul ba'am ci lags na/_'di ltar 'od ma'i tshal 'di zhal zas kyi dri bda' ba sna tshogs kyis khyab par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po 
[\[203a.7\]]chen po lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang ma yin la/_lha gzhan rnams kyis kyang ma phul te/_de lta mod kyi khyod nyid kyi yul tsam pa na gru 'dzin gyi bu nyi ma re re lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas 'tshed cing sbyor ba yod de/_de las dge slong maud gal gyi bus blangs so/_/bcom 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]ldan 'das de'i bsngags pa gsung bar brtsams pa thos nas de yang mthong bar 'dod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po sems can de ni bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa yin pas khyod bsod 
[\[203b.2\]]nams yongs su zad par 'gyur du 'ong gis de la bka' ma stsol cig_/de lta mod kyi rgyal po chen po lhung bzed kyi lhag ma la longs spyod cig_/des gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba lags te/_sngon ni su'i lhung bzed kyi lhag ma 
[\[203b.3\]]yang ma 'tshal lags mod kyi/_bcom ldan 'das ni chos nyid kyis bdag gi yab lags pas/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na longs spyod par bgyi'o zhes des longs spyod par brtsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po 
[\[203b.4\]]chen po khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' yang bza' ba dang btung ba 'di 'dra ba longs spyad pa yod dam/_rgyal pos gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag kyang rgyal po'i rgyud du btsas/_rgyal po'i rgyud las chen por gyur cing rgyal por gyur kyang g.yar zas dang btung ba 'di 'dra ba ni sngon lan 'ga' 
[\[203b.5\]]yang myong bar ma 'tshal lags so/_/rgyal po chen po sems can skal ba chen po de ni 'di ltar 'di 'dra ba'i bza' ba dang btung ba la longs spyod do/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 
[\[203b.6\]]'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas/_des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag yul tsam par 'dong gis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig_/ci'i slad du lags/_gru 'dzin gyi bu blta'o/_/lha'i yul na de mchis pas de nyid dgug tu gsol/_de ni sems can bsod 
[\[203b.7\]]nams kyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa yin pas de la bka' mi stsol to/_/lha ji ltar bka' ma stsal kyang bdag cag gis mchi bar 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du gyis shig_/de rnams kyis tsam par yi ge spring ba/_shes ldan dag rgyal po gshegs par 'gyur gyis grong khyer byi 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]dor gyis shig_/rtswa dang chas dag sta gon gyis shig ces spring ba de rnams kyis thos nas shin tu dga' bar gyur pa dang yang yi ge spring ba/_shes ldan dag rgyal po ni mi gshegs mod kyi gzhon nu gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes spring ba dang /_de rnams skrag ste 
[\[204a.2\]]gzhon nu gtum po lan 'ga' zhig 'ongs na yang gnod par 'gyur ro snyam nas yang spring ba/_rgyal po yang mi gshegs gzhon nu yang mi gshegs te/_de lta mod kyi khyed kyis gang gA ji ltar rgyun las bzlog phyogs su 'bab pa de ltar gags rtsigs shig ces spring ba thos nas tsam 
[\[204a.3\]]pa na gnas pa'i grong khyer gyi mi rnams 'dus nas shes ldan dag gdon mi za bar rgyal po ni bdag cag la chad pa gcad par bzhed pas des na yi ge 'di skad spring mod ces de rnams kyis blon po rnams la don de spring ba dang /_de rnams kyis blags te yang drang por spring ba/_shes ldan dag 
[\[204a.4\]]'di ni bden pa yin te/_rgyal po dang gzhon nu yang mi gshegs la/_gang gA gags brtsig pa yang dgos pa cung zad kyang med do/_/de lta mod kyi lha ni gru 'dzin gyi bu blta bar bzhed do zhes spring ba dang /_de rnams kyis nyan rna ba'i mi zhig mngags so/_/des kyang de bzhin du bsnyad do/_/
[\[204a.5\]]de nas de rnams 'dus nas khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyi drung du song nas khyim bdag lha gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa blta bar bzhed nas blon po rnams kyis bdag la drang por spring ste/_nyan rna ba'i mis kyang don de nyid smras na/_'di thong shig_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo'i gags 
[\[204a.6\]]kyi skal ba gang yin pa gser gyi gong bus rtsig kyang bla'i mi btang ngo /_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag gal te de lta yin du zin kyang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse bar gyis shig des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na dam zhig bca' ste/_gal te khyed 
[\[204a.7\]]cag gi bu rnams kyang gro bzhin skyes dang lhan cig gtong ba lta na btang ngo /_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/'o na shes ldan dag [{]ding [,]deng [}]shig_/khyim bdag gru 'dzin gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu grong mi 'di dag 'di skad ces zer ro/_/des smras pa/_yab gal te de lta na mchi'o/_/bu gdon mi za bar rgyal po de khyod kyi rkang mthil gyi spu gser gyi kha dog can blta bar 'dod kyis/_rgyal po de dag ni gnas ma yin par khro bas khyod la gnod 
[\[204b.2\]]pa byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis khyod kyis rkang pa bteg ste de la bstan par mi bya'i/_'di re mu tig phreng ba 'di rgyal po de'i zhabs kyi drung du zhog la phyag byas nas de'i spyan sngar skyil mo krung chos te 'dug shig dang /_des na spu rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis
