[\[204b.3\]]bsams pa/_gro bzhin skyes bzhon pa gang gis gtang /_ci glang po che'i bzhon pas sam/_rta'i bzhon pas sam/_shing rta'i bzhon pas sam/_'on te gru'i bzhon pas snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di dag gi nang na gru'i bzhon pa mchog yin pas gru'i 
[\[204b.4\]]bzhon pas gtang ngo snyam du bsams nas des chu bo gang gA la gru sbrengs nas der skyed mos tshal rnam pa sna tshogs byed du bcug ste/_me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug la sogs 
[\[204b.5\]]pa bya rnams skad 'byin cing rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs dang /_bud med rgyan sna tshogs kyis bklubs pa dag 'dug tu bcug ste/_'byor pa des chu'i nang nas btang ngo /_/de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu nye bar phyin pa/_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gru 'dzin gyi bu 'ong ngo zhes thos nas 
[\[204b.6\]]des rgyal po'i khab nas gang gA'i 'bab chu'i bar der 'obs brkos nas chus bkang ste de'i nang nas gru drangs so/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer yang rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo bsal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_dri zhim po'i pog phor bzhag_/dar gyi chun 
[\[204b.7\]]'phyang mang po btags/_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan btsugs me tog sna tshogs kyis lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du dga' dga' ltar byas te/_de 'byor pa des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du khrid do/_/de nas rgyal po seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i rkang pa'i drung du 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]mu tig gi phreng ba bzhag nas mgo bos phyag byas te mdun du skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug pa dang /_rgyal pos de'i rkang pa gnyis la gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spu yod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang kye ma gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa ni bsod nams kyi 
[\[205a.2\]]skal ba chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/_/mthong nas smras pa gro bzhin skyes khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong ngam/_lha ma mthong lags so/_/tshur shog 'dong ngo /_/des dris pa lha ci bcom ldan 'das bzhon pas gshegs sam/_'on te 
[\[205a.3\]]zhabs kyis lags/_rgyal pos smras pa/_de rab tu byung ba yin na de la bzhon pas ci bya/_des smras pa/_lha gal te de lta na bdag kyang sug pa kho nas 'chi'o zhes de rkang pa kho nas chas pa na/_de'i zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis sa la gos dag bting ba dang /_des smras 
[\[205a.4\]]pa/_ci bcom ldan 'das gding ba las bzhud dam/_'on te gding ba med par bzhud/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_gding ba med par bzhud do/_/des smras pa/_gding ba sdus shig_/bdag kyang gding ba med par 'gro'o/_/zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis gos 
[\[205a.5\]]rnams bsdus pa dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bting nas des smras pa/_shes ldan dag ngas khyed cag la ma bzlog gam/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bzlog lags so/_/'o na yang su zhig gis bting /_lha khyod bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po mnga' bas mi ma 
[\[205a.6\]]yin pa rnams kyis bting lags grang /_des snying nas tshig tu smras pa/_mi ma yin pa dag gos rnams sdus shig_/de rnams kyis bsdus nas rkang pa sa la bzhag pa nas chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/_sa chen po 'di g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab 
[\[205a.7\]]tu g.yos/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur te/_shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/_lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/_byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/_mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/_dbus 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]mtho na mtha' dma' bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di nas bzung ste bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du gru 'dzin gyi bus lan 'ga' yang gding ba med par rkang pas lam bor te/_da ltar bor ba yang chos la 
[\[205b.2\]]gus pas yin gyi bsod nams yongs su zad pas ni ma yin te/_des nas 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/de nas gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 
[\[205b.3\]]'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par mdzad pas gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas 'jig 
[\[205b.4\]]tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong ba dang /_de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 
[\[205b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[205b.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni pha mas ma gnang ba'i rigs kyi bu rab tu 'byin pa dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed kyis song la pha dang /_ma la rtogs shig_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_btsun 
[\[205b.7\]]pa bdag ni rten pa thams cad kyi dpon po lags te don du 'di ni chos nyid kyis bdag gi bu lags pas 'di bdag gis gnang lags kyis bcom ldan 'das ci legs su rab tu dbyung du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas dge slong tshur shog tshangs 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]par spyad pa spyod cig ces gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag kho nar skra byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur te skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /_lag pa lhung bzed dang /_bya ma bum gyis 'brel pa dang /_lo brgya 
[\[206a.2\]]lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/'dir smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/_/
[\[206a.3\]]drug sde rnams kyis de la co dri bar brtsams pa/_re zhig bstan pa la ni gcig tu brtson par bya dgos pa yin na/_mar sar gyi gong bu 'dis khyad par ci zhig rtogs par 'gyur zhes de rnams kyis de co dris pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan 
[\[206a.4\]]pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gcig tu brtson pa'i rnal 'byor dang mthun pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gsungs pa gang lags/_tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes 'chag pas thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni yun ring du gnas par 
[\[206a.5\]]'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/des bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ste/_'chag sa byas nas de na tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa rgyal po'i khab kyi bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du gnas nas rtag tu 'grus pa dang ldan par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 
[\[206a.6\]]mthun pa'i chos rnams la rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson pa'i sgom pas gnas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag bzhag pa na sems la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'di snyam du skyes par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[206a.7\]]nyan thos brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa ji snyed cig yod pa de rnams kyi nang na bdag mchog yin na/_'on kyang bdag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur gyis/_bdag gi nye du rnams la longs spyod rgya chen po yod pas/_ma la bdag 'dug la 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]'dod pa rnams la longs spyod cing sbyin pa dag sbyin bsod nams dag bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas dge slong zhig la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong tshur shog_/khyod gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi 
[\[206b.2\]]shu pa gang na ba der song la phyin nas gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa khyod la ston pa gsung ngo zhes sgo shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong des bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der 
[\[206b.3\]]song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes khyod la ston pa gsung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas dge slong de las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[206b.4\]]na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gro bzhin skyes khyod 
[\[206b.5\]]gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag bzhag pa na sems la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na bdag mchog yin na/_'on kyang bdag len pa med par zag pa rnams las 
[\[206b.6\]]sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur gyis/_bdag gi nye du rnams la longs spyod rgya chen po yod pas ma la bdag 'dug la 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod cing sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag bya'o snyam pa skyes par ma gyur tam/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes 'di snyam 
[\[206b.7\]]du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du bsams nas 'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang skyobs pa spu zing zhes byed nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa de lta lags so/_/de'i phyir gro bzhin skyes khyod la dri yis 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin de'i lan thob shig_/gro bzhin skyes ji snyam du sems khyod sngon khyim par gyur pa na pi bang gi rgyud kyi sgra la mkhas pa yin nam/_btsun pa bdag sngon khyim par gyur pa na pi bang gi rgyud kyi sgra la mkhas pa mad lags so/_/gro 
[\[207a.2\]]bzhin skyes ji snyam du sems/_gang gi tshe pi bang gi rgyud shin tu bsdams par gyur pa de'i tshe ji ga pi bang gi sgra snyan par 'gyur ba'am/_sgra yid du 'ong ba'am/_sgra dang ldan pa'am/_las su rung bar 'gyur ram/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/'o na gang gi tshe pi bang gi rgyud 
[\[207a.3\]]lhag par lhod par gyur pa de'i tshe ji ga pi bang gi sgra snyan par 'gyur ba'am/_sgra yid du 'ong ba'am/_sgra dang ldan pa'am/_las su rung bar 'gyur ram/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/gang gi tshe pi bang gi rgyud shin tu bsdams pa ma yin zhing lhag par lhod pa ma yin par gyur te rgyud ran par 
[\[207a.4\]]'dug pa de'i tshe pi bang gi sgra snyan par 'gyur ba'am/_sgra yid du 'ong ba'am/_sgra dang ldan pa'am/_las su rung bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam/_btsun pa de lta lags so/_/gro bzhin skyes de bzhin du ha cang brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni rgod par 'gyur ro/_/ha cang zhan na ni zhum 
[\[207a.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gro bzhin skyes de lta bas na khyod kyis ran pa nyid rtogs par bya ste/_des kyang nga rgyal du mi bya zhing de la yang bag yod par bya/_de'i tshe mtshan ma yang gzung bar bya/_gro bzhin skyes khyod gnas pa 'dis gnas na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar zag pa rnams zad 
[\[207a.6\]]nas zag pa med pa rnam par grol ba'i sems dang /_rnam par grol ba'i shes rab mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te/_bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las 
[\[207a.7\]]gzhan mi shes so zhes sgrogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pi bang gi dpe 'dis tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes la gdams ngag phog nas gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtong bar gnas so/_/gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtong bar gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu 
[\[207b.2\]]rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa/_tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te/_bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs 
[\[207b.3\]]par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de kun shes par gyur te/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa dgra bcom pa thob ste/_rnam 
[\[207b.4\]]par grol ba'i dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su myong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te bcom 
[\[207b.5\]]ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 
[\[207b.6\]]dge slong dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur pa gang lags pa de de'i tshe gnas drug 
[\[207b.7\]]la mos par 'gyur te nges par 'byung ba la mos par 'gyur ba lags/_'tshe ba ma mchis pa la mos par 'gyur ba lags/_rab tu dben pa la mos par 'gyur ba lags/_sred pa zad pa dang /_len pa zad pa dang /_mi brjed pa'i sems la mos par 'gyur ba lags 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]so/_/btsun pa 'di na kha cig 'di snyam du kye ma tshe dang ldan pa 'di dad pa tsam kho na la gnas pas nges par 'byung ba la mos so snyam du sems na/_btsun pa de ltar blta bar mi bgyi ste/_'dod chags zad pa dang /_zhe sdang zad pa dang /_gti mug zad 
[\[208a.2\]]pas nges par 'byung ba la mos par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa 'di na kha cig 'di snyam du kye ma tshe dang ldan pa 'di tshul khrims tsam kho na la brten nas mi 'tshe ba la mos so snyam du sems na/_btsun pa de ltar blta bar mi bgyi ste/_'dod chags zad pa dang /_zhe sdang 
[\[208a.3\]]zad pa dang /_gti mug zad pas mi 'tshe ba la mos par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa 'di na kha cig 'di snyam du kye ma tshe dang ldan pa 'di rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa tsam kho na tshol ba'i slad du rab tu dben pa la mos so snyam du sems na/_btsun pa 
[\[208a.4\]]de ltar blta bar mi bgyi ste/_'dod chags zad pa dang /_zhe sdang zad pa dang /_gti mug zad pa dang /_sred pa zad pa dang /_len pa zad pa las mi brjed pa'i sems la yang mos par 'gyur lags te/_btsun pa dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas 
[\[208a.5\]]pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur pa gang lags pa de de'i tshe de gnas drug po 'di dag la mos par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa 
[\[208a.6\]]dge slong slob pa gang yin pa ma thob pa gang lags pa de gong ma'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba'i tshul la lan mang du gnas te/_de de'i tshe slob pa'i tshul khrims dang /_slob pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa lags so/_/de dus gzhan na zag pa rnams 
[\[208a.7\]]zad nas zag pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang /_rnam par grol ba'i shes rab mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]so zhes sgrogs pa de'i tshe ni de mi slob pa'i tshul khrims dang /_mi slob pa'i dbang po rnams dang ldan lags so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgya rtsa gcig pa/_btsun pa dper na bus pa gzhon nu chung ngu zhan pa gan rkyal du nyal ba de ni de'i tshe byis pa'i 
[\[208b.2\]]ngang tshul dang /_byis pa'i dbang po rnams dang ldan lags la/_de dus gzhan na chen por gyur pa'i rgyus dbang po rnams yongs su smin pa de'i tshe na chen po'i ngang tshul dang /_chen po'i dbang po dang ldan lags so/_/btsun pa de bzhin du dge slong slob pa yid ma thob pa gang 
[\[208b.3\]]lags pa de gong ma'i grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la don du gnyer ba'i tshul la lan mang du gnas te/_de de'i tshe slob pa'i tshul khrims dang slob pa'i dbang po dang ldan lags so/_/de dus gzhan na zag pa rnams zad nas zag pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[208b.4\]]sems dang /_rnam par grol ba'i shes rab mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes sgrogs pa de'i 
[\[208b.5\]]tshe ni de mi slob pa'i tshul khrims dang /_mi slob pa'i dbang po dang ldan lags so/_/gal te de'i mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams mig la shin tu snang bar gyur kyang de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang /_rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs 
[\[208b.6\]]par mi 'gyur te/_de'i sems phyin ci ma log pa shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shin tu bsgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing de la zad par yang rjes su blta'o/_/gal te de'i rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang /_snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams 
[\[208b.7\]]dang /_lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang /_lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang /_yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams yid la shin tu snang bar gyur kyang de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang /_rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]gtugs par mi 'gyur te de'i sems phyin ci ma log pa/_shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shin tu bsgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing de la zad par yang rjes su blta'o/_/btsun pa dper na grong khyer ram/_grong rdal dang ha cang yang thag mi ring ba 
[\[209a.2\]]zhig na ri brag chen po ser ga ma mchis pa/_shin tu mkhregs pa gcig tu 'thas pa zhig mchis na/_de la gal te shar phyogs nas rlung gi shugs drag po langs kyang de g.yos par mi 'gyur/_de 'gul bar mi 'gyur zhing de nub phyogs su bkur bar mi nus lags so/_/
[\[209a.3\]]gal te lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs nas rlung gi shugs drag po langs kyang de g.yos par mi 'gyur/_de 'gul bar mi 'gyur zhing de lho phyogs su bkur bar mi nus lags te/_gang nas rlung gi shugs drag po langs kyang des de g.yos par mi 'gyur/_
[\[209a.4\]]de 'gul bar mi 'gyur zhing de gang du yang bkur bar mi nus lags so/_/de bzhin du gal te de'i mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams mig la shin tu snang bar gyur kyang de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang /_rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs par mi 
[\[209a.5\]]'gyur te de'i sems phyin ci ma log pa/_shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shin tu bsgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing de la zad par yang rjes su lta'o/_/gal te de'i rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang /_snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang /_
[\[209a.6\]]lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang /_lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang /_yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams yid la shin tu snang bar gyur kyang de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang /_rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs 
[\[209a.7\]]par mi 'gyur te/_de'i sems phyin ci ma log pa/_shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shin tu bsgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing de la zad par yang rjes su lta'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas/_de skad ces gsol nas gnas brtan dgra bcom 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nges par 'byung la mos pa dang /_/sems ni 'tshe ba med pa dang /_/rab tu dben la mos pa dang /_/sred pa zad la dga' ba dang /_/len pa zad la mos pa dang /_/sems ni brjed pa med gyur pa/_/skye mched skye 
[\[209b.2\]]ba shes nas su/_/sems ni rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_/de nas sems ni rnam grol zhing /_/sems zhi ba yi skyob pa yis/_/bya ba dag ni byas zin pas/_/bya ba yod pa ma yin no/_/ji ltar brag gi ri bo la/_/rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos pa/_/de bzhin 
[\[209b.3\]]sdug dang mi sdug pa'i/_/gzugs rnams dang ni sgra dag dang /_/dri dang ro dang reg pa dang /_/chos kyis skyob pa mi g.yo ste/_/bkrir mi btub pa'i sems gnas shing /_/de la'ang zad par rjes su lta/_/dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod 
[\[209b.4\]]pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes shing rkang pa'i mthil gnyis su spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba 
[\[209b.5\]]skyes pa dang /_gdugs re re zhing lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas sgrol zhing sbyor ba dang /_'di nas bzung ste bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du lan 'ga' yang gding ba ma mchis pa'i sa phyogs su rkang pa ma bzhag pa dang /_btsas ma thag tu dkan dbab pa'i rin gser bye ba 
[\[209b.6\]]phrag nyi shu thob cing bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed 
[\[209b.7\]]pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas gro bzhin skyes 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung 
[\[210a.2\]]po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu 
[\[210a.3\]]bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[210a.4\]]rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba byung ste/_de dge slong drug khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan zhes bya bar gshegs so/_/rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan na dga' sde rab tu mang po gnas te/_de rnams kyis 
[\[210a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dge slong drug khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor te ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na 'dir byon to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang thams cad 'dus te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs gang na ba 
[\[210a.6\]]der dong ste lhags nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis dga' sde rnams la 
[\[210a.7\]]chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas dga' sde rab tu mang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs 
[\[210b.2\]]gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag cag dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms 
[\[210b.3\]]dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis dga' sde rab tu mang po rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas dga' sde rab tu 
[\[210b.4\]]mang pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs 
[\[210b.5\]]te dong ngo /_/de rnams 'dun khang du 'dus te gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gdugs tshod gsol bar bya/_ci 'dus te bya 'am/_'on te re res bya/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_nyi ma re re zhing 'dus te gdugs 
[\[210b.6\]]tshod gsol na bdag cag gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams bar chad du 'gyur bas shes ldan dag gal te 'dod na re mos re mos gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis re mos re mos spyi bu ngas las ston mo bya bar brtsams te/_'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin bdag nyid kyi yang snon 
[\[210b.7\]]par byed do/_/de nas dga' sde rnams kyi nang na bram ze'i khye'u bkren pa zhig yod pa de ma'i drung du song ste smras pa/_yum dga' sde rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa re mos re mos bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o zhes bcas na/_de la bdag gi 'byor pa 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]ni nyung na bdag gis ji ltar gdugs tshod gsol bar bgyi/_des smras pa/_bu gal te de lta na khyod kyis nyi ma tha ma zung la dus de'i bar du cung zad sgrubs shig_/tshogs kyi rgyu lhag kyang cung zad rnyed grang /_des nyi ma tha ma bzung nas de na tshogs kyi rgyu 
[\[211a.2\]]lhag pa rab tu mang po yod pa dang /_des kyang cung zad bsgrubs nas de nas des gnas khang rtsig tu bcug ste/_der gos rnams bting nas grwa rnams su kAr+ShA pa Na lnga lnga bzhag_/de la dom lpags shig bdog pa de yang gnas khang gi sgor bting ngo /_/de nas lnga brgya'i ston 
[\[211a.3\]]mo snod du btsos shing sbyar nas bkur sti chen pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la gdugs tshod gsol te zhabs la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing lan 
[\[211a.4\]]'ga' yang gding ba ma mchis pa'i sa phyogs su rkang pa mi 'jog pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis la spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi tsam 'khrungs pa ji 'dra ba de lta bur bdag gi yang de dang 'dra ba dang yon 
[\[211a.5\]]tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob cing /_ston pa 'di 'dra ba mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur gyis mi mnyes par bgyid par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dga' sde'i bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa 'di 
[\[211a.6\]]nyid yin te/_'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la bya ba byas shing smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes pa dang /_rkang pa gnyis la spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor 
[\[211a.7\]]bzhi tsam skyes pa dang /_'di nas bzung ste bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du lan 'ga' yang gding ba med pa'i sa phyogs su rkang pa ma bor ba dang /_btsas pa na yang dkan dbab pa'i rin du gser bye ba phrag nyi shu thob cing /_nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyon mongs 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/_'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas/_
[\[211b.2\]]dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe ma skyes dgra mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lha sbyin gyis zin pas 
[\[211b.3\]]rgyal po gzugs can snying po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phangs pa de'i tshe/_rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i grong mi rnams kyis 'phya bar brtsams te/_de na kha cig ni rgyal po la mi snyan pa sgrogs par byed de/_'di ma btsas pa nyid nas yab la dgrar 'gyur ro zhes lung 
[\[211b.4\]]bstan na/_ci'i phyir ma btsas pa nyid du mi bsad/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal pos mnyes te ci thams cad kyi lung bstan pa [(]bdan [,]bden [)]par 'gyur ram/_gzhon nu nyid dul ba yin mod kyi 'on kyang lha sbyin mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bslus nas des na bya 
[\[211b.5\]]ba ngan pa la shin tu zhugs par gyur to/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po dang lha sbyin gyis kyang ma nyes te/_'on kyang lha sbyin khrid de 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du mi bzhag par 'di ltar rab tu 'byin par mdzad pas na bcom ldan 'das kho nas nongs so/_/
[\[211b.6\]]kha cig gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma nongs te/_de gang gi phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las ma byas pas dge 'dun gyis nyes so/_/de nas gang dag rgyal po la mi snyan par sgrogs pa des rgyal po ngo tsha bar mi byed kyi/_sngon gyi tshe rabs rnams su bdag gis 
[\[211b.7\]]las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa yin no snyam mo/_/gang dag bcom ldan 'das dang dge 'dun la mi snyan pa sgrogs pa des ni rgyal po shin tu ngo tsha bar byed de/_bdag gi lus ngan pa gang yin pa des 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das dang dge 'dun gyi mi snyan pa 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]brjod do snyam mo/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa nongs pa gzhan gyis bgyis la skyon gzhan la bsgo ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[212a.2\]]da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nyes pa gzhan gyis byas la skyon gzhan la bsgos pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo 
[\[212a.3\]]legs pa skye bo'i tshogs mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/de la khyi gnyis zhig yod pa 'gram dang nye 'gram zhes bya ste/_de gnyis kyis rgyal po'i rta khrab kyi cha spyad 'chos so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin dra ma la cha ba na des blon po 
[\[212a.4\]]rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag rta khrab kyi yo byad ltos shig_/de rnams kyis blta bar brtsams pa na thams cad bcad cing rab tu gtubs par mthong nas de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha rta khrab kyi cha spyad zhes rnams kyis 'tshal to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes 
[\[212a.5\]]ldan dag gal te de lta na ngas khyi rnams yongs su spang ngo /_/de na kha cig ni bsad do/_/kha cig ni bros so/_/ji tsam na yul gzhan gyi khyi zhig yul nas bA rA Na sIr 'ong ba na des de rnams 'bros pa mthong nas dris pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir khyed 'di ltar skrag_/de rnams 
[\[212a.6\]]kyis ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang des smras pa/_khyed ci'i phyir rgyal po la gsol bar ma byas/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhan dag ni kha btag_/kho bo cag ni bros na rgyal po la gsol bar bya ba'i gtol ga la yod/_des smras pa/_'dug shig dang khyed 
[\[212a.7\]]kyi don du kho bos rgyal po la gsol ba bya'o/_/des de rnams dbugs phyung nas slar log pa dang /_de nas des rgyun lugs tshad tsam na thos pa'i nyen kor du 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab pa/_rgyal po'i khab na zhes gnyis mchis pa 'gram dang ni/_/nye 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]'gram stobs dang kha dog ldan pa gang lags pa/_/de 'dir dgum rgyu bdag cag dgum pa'i rgyu ma lags/_lha cig dgum rgyu ma lags bkum pa rigs pa min/_/rgyal pos thos nas des nam langs pa dang blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag mdang sum nga 
[\[212b.2\]]la tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba byed pa gang yin pa de tshol cig_/de rnams kyis sku srung rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag mdang sum lha la tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba byed pa de tshol cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_yul gyi khyi lags so/_/rgyal pos 
[\[212b.3\]]smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci 'gram dang nye 'gram gyis zos sam 'on te/_khyi gzhan rnams kyis yin rtogs shig_/blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag lhas 'di skad ces khyi rnams rtogs shig ces bka' stsal na/_de rnams 
[\[212b.4\]]la ji ltar brtag par bya/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_de la gzhan brtag tu ci yod/_skra'i thum po byin te skyug tu gzhug mod/_de rnams kyis skra'i thum po byin te skyug tu bcug pa las/_ji tsam na 'gram dang nye 'gram gnyis ko ba'i dum bur skyugs nas rgyal po la rig par byas 
[\[212b.5\]]pa dang /_rgyal pos de gnyis spangs te/_lhag ma rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin no/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'gram dang nye 'gram gang yin pa de gnyis ni lha sbyin dang /_ma skyes dgra 'di gnyis yin te/_de na yang 'di gnyis kyis nyes pa 
[\[212b.6\]]byas la skyon gzhan la bsgo'o/_/da ltar yang 'di gnyis kyis nyes pa byas la skyon gzhan la bsgo'o/_/gzhan yang ji ltar lha sbyin byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/ji tsam na mi 
[\[212b.7\]]zhig sta re dang khur shing thogs te shing gi phyir nags khrod du song nas/_de de na shing tshol bar byed pa na seng ges skrag nas bros pa las su ra khung zhig du lhung ngo /_/seng ges kyang de bza' ba'i bsam pas de nyid du lhung ngo /_/sbrul zhig gis byi ba zhig skrag nas bros pa dang /_khras byi ba bza' 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]ba'i phyir bsnyags pa las/_ci tsam na thams cad sur khung du lhung ste/_de dag thams cad gcig la gcig bsad par 'dod pa'i gnod sems dang ldan par gyur pa dang seng ges smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed thams cad kho bo'i bgrod pa yin te/_
[\[213a.2\]]de lta mod kyi bdag cag sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dog pa thob pas 'di ni gnod par bya ba'i dus ma yin gyis ma 'gul bar 'khod cig_/stes dbang gis rngon pa zhig [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams tshol zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang /_des sur khung der blta bar brtsams pa las/_de rnams 
[\[213a.3\]]kyis brtabs pa'i tshig gis smras pa/_kye nang rje skyabs gyis shig_/de nas rngon pa des shes nas thog mar seng ge phyung ba dang /_des rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/_khyod kyi drin gzo bar bya ste/_'on kyang 'di na mgo nag po gnas pa de ni byas pa chud gson pa yin 
[\[213a.4\]]gyis khyod kyis ma dbyung shig ces smras nas song ngo /_/ji tsam na rngon pa des thams cad mthar gyis phyung ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na seng ges [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shig bsad pa dang rngon pa de yang phyogs der phyin pa seng ges de ngo shes nas rngon pa'i rkang pa la gtugs te [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[213a.5\]]de byin no/_/dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin btsun mo dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal gyi sar song nas des skyed mos tshal der bde ba nyams su myong bar byas nas gnyid kyis log go/_/btsun mo bud med rnams kyang bag yangs su gnas pas gos dag phud de skems/_
[\[213a.6\]]rgyan dag bkrol nas phyogs dag tu bzhag ste skyed mos tshal na 'chag par byed/_'dug par byed/_nyal bar byed/_gnyid log par byed do/_/ji tsam na btsun mo zhig rgyan rnams bkrol te phyogs zhig tu bzhag nas gnyid log pa dang khras de blangs nas rngon pa de la byas pa 
[\[213a.7\]]gzo bar bya ba'i phyir byin no/_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin gnyid kyis snyom pa bsal nas myur ba myur bar bA rA Na sIr zhugs so/_/btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams kyang rings par dong ngo /_/ji tsam na btsun mo des rgyan btsal ba las 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]ma rnyed nas des rgyal po la smras pa/_lha skyed mos tshal du bdag gi rgyan stor lags so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag rgyan stor gyis su yis khyer tshol cig_/de rnams kyis btsal bar brtsams pa na mgo nag po de rngon pa'i drung du dus dus 
[\[213b.2\]]su 'gro bas de de'i khyim du song ba na mtshan ma las de la rgyan yod par shes nas/_byas pa chud gzon pa des rgyal po'i drung du song nas gsol pa dang /_de nas rgyal po mchog tu khros te rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis rngon pa bkug nas smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje khyod kyis skyed mos 
[\[213b.3\]]tshal nas rgyan brkus so/_/de nas de skrag nas ji ltar gyur pa smras te rgyan de rgyal po la phul na/_'on kyang mi de bcings nas btson rar bzhag go/_/byi bas song nas sbrul la smras pa/_mgo nag po sdig pa byed pa des bya ba byas nas bdag cag gi dge ba'i 
[\[213b.4\]]bshes gnyen rgyal pos bcings nas btson rar bzhag go/_/sbrul gyis smras pa/_kye rngon pa de ring bdag gis rgyal po la zin par byas khyod kyis sngags kyi tshig 'di dang sman 'di dag gis gsos shig dang /_de ltar na rgyal po de dga' nas khyod gdon mi za bar 
[\[213b.5\]]btang nas longs spyod kyang bgo bsha' byed par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa legs kyis de bzhin gyis shig_/sbrul gyis rgyal po zin pa dang rngon pas song ste sngags dang sman de dag gis gsos so/_/de nas rgyal po mgu nas btson las btang ste longs spyod dag 
[\[213b.6\]]gis bgo bsha' yang byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rngon pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi byas pa chud gson pa'i mi gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na 
[\[213b.7\]]yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba dus ma yin par zhag bdun du sprin chags te 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]lhas char phab nas ne'u le zhig byi ba'i tshang du zhugs so/_/sbrul zhig kyang char pas skrag nas phan tshun rgyu ba na de nyid du zhugs so/_/ji tsam na ne'u le des byi ba de gsad par brtsams pa na sbrul gyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag sdug bsngal mi bzad pa 
[\[214a.2\]]dog pa thob kyis gcig la gcig gnod pa ma byed par ma 'gul bar 'khod cig_/de na sbrul gyi ming ni dga' sde zhes bya'o/_/ne'u le'i ming ni dga' bo zhes bya'o/_/byi ba'i ming ni gang gAs byin zhes bya'o/_/dga' sde dang /_dga' bos gang gAs byin la smras pa/_khyod 'jab cing song 
[\[214a.3\]]la bdag cag gi kha zas tshol cig_/de drang zhing bsam pa bzang ba yin pas de gnyis kyi ched du snying nas kha zas btsal bar brtsams pa na ma rnyed do/_/dga' bos dga' sde la smras pa/_gal te gang gAs byin kha zas med par 'ongs na de nyid bdag gis bza' bar bya'o/_/dga' sdes bsams 
[\[214a.4\]]pa/_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dog pa thob na yang 'di de la gsod par rtsom na/_gal te de kha zas med par 'ongs na lta smos kyang ci dgos pas ye de la spring bar bya'o snyam nas des de la spring ba/_dga' bo na re 'di skad ces gal te gang gAs byin kha zas med par 'ongs na de nyid bdag gis 
[\[214a.5\]]bza' bar bya'o zhes zer ro/_/gang gAs byin gyis kha zas btsal ba las cung zad kyang ma rnyed nas des bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar des bdag zos par 'gyur ro snyam nas des dga' sde la spring ba/_mi bkren ltogs pa'i shugs kyis yongs dub nas/_/nyam thag snying rje med par 'gyur 
[\[214a.6\]]bas khyod/_/byas pa chud gson sems can de la ni/_/gang gAs byin pa phyir mi 'ong zhes gsungs/_/zhes spring ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gang gAs byin gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ne'u le dga' bo gang yin pa de ni 
[\[214a.7\]]lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin no/_/gang gi tshe ma skyes dgras rgyal po gzugs can snying po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phangs pa de'i tshe rgyal pos de la spyos nas 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]gzhon nu ci'i phyir khyod kyis nga la rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phangs/_des smras pa/_lha tshig pa 'tshal ba'i slad du ste/_lha la ni longs spyod mnga' na bdag la ma mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu gal te de lta na song la tsam pa gzhi dang bcas pa khyod kyi yin no/_/
[\[214b.2\]]de dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' bas lha sbyin gyi drung du song ste smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis tsam pa gzhi dang bcas pa thob bo/_/des smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod kyis pha rol gnon pa'i 'bras bu mthong ngam/_'phags pa mthong ngo /_/da dung 
[\[214b.3\]]yang pha rol gnon pa gyis shig dang /_khyod kyi mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/des tsam par dpyad bab pas gtse bar brtsams te gtses pa na skye bo'i tshogs 'bros pa la zhugs te/_kha cig ni rgyal po'i khab tu dong ngo /_/kha cig ni yul gzhan du dong nas 
[\[214b.4\]]blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la pho nyas bzlugs pa/_lha gzhon nus tsam pa'i skye bo gtses te/_gtses pa na 'bros lags kyis/_lha gzhon nu de las bzlog par mdzad pa'i rigs so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu ci'i phyir yul mi la gnod par byed/_des smras 
[\[214b.5\]]pa/_lha dpung rgyas par mi 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu gal te de lta na rgyal po'i khab 'ba' zhig ma gtogs par yul ma ga d+hA khyer cig_/des yul ma ga d+hA blangs nas lha sbyin gyi drung du dong ste smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis rgyal 
[\[214b.6\]]po'i khab 'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa yul ma ga d+hA thams cad thob bo/_/des smras pa/_gzhon nu pha rol gnon pa'i 'bras bu ni de 'dras yang pha rol gnon pa gyis shig_/des yul ma ga d+hA brlag par bya bar brtsams pa na yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis 
[\[214b.7\]]rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol pa/_lha gzhon nus yul ma ga d+hA brlag par bgyis kyis zlog mdzod cig_/rgyal pos de bkug ste smras pa/_gzhon nu ci'i phyir yul ma ga d+hA brlag par bya/_des smras pa/_lha bdag gi skye bo'i tshogs phal mo che rgyas par mi 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]'gyur lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu gal te de lta na mdzod cig ma gtogs pa thams cad khyod kho na'i yin no/_/des rgyal po'i khab kyang blangs nas lha sbyin gyi drung du song ste smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis mdzod cig ma gtogs par longs 
[\[215a.2\]]spyod thams cad thob bo/_/des smras pa/_pha rol gnon pa'i 'bras bu de yin mod kyi 'on kyang rgyal po rnams ni mdzod kyi mthu can yin te/_gang la mdzod yod pa de rgyal po yin pas mdzod kyi phyir pha rol gnon pa gyis shig_/des rgyal po'i khab kyang brlag par bya bar 
[\[215a.3\]]brtsams pa na rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /_yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /_tsam pa ba thams cad skrag par gyur nas/_ji ltar ma skyes dgras mi mthong ba de ltar pho nya btang ste rgyal po la gsol pa/_lhas bdag cag bu bzhin du so 
[\[215a.4\]]sor bskyangs na gzhon nus ma 'os pa bzhin du bkren par bgyis pas lha'i yul mi phal cher bros lags te/_bdag cag kyang 'bros par 'tshal lags so/_/rgyal po snying rje'i bdag nyid can chos gtsor byed pa de mi bde ba skyes nas ma skyes dgra bkug ste/_dga' ba 
[\[215a.5\]]dang /_snyan pa dang /_rjes su mthun pa'i tshig gis mgo la byugs te smras pa/_bu ngas khyod la yul thams cad byin na ci'i phyir yi chad par bya so sor skyongs shig_/des smras pa/_lha rgyal po rnams ni mdzod kyi mthu can lags na/_bdag la mdzod kyi mthu ma 
[\[215a.6\]]mchis na ji ltar bgyi/_des smras pa/_gal te de lta na btsun mo'i 'khor ma gtogs pa thams cad khyod kho na'i yin no/_/'on kyang rang bzhin ngan cing sdig pa'i grogs po can de 'dug tu mi btub cing brlag pa kho nar byed do/_/rgyal pos spyo ba dang bcas pas smras pa/_
[\[215a.7\]]bang mdzod dang /_mdzod dang /_yul thams cad khyod kho na la byin na ci'i phyir da dung rlag par byed/_de skad ces smras pa dang de khros nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la smod pa gang yin pa de la chad pa cis gcad/_
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha chad par dgum lags mod/_des smras pa/_de nga'i yab yin pas ji ltar bsad kyis/_deng la de zung ste phyag sbal du chug la zhog shig_/de phyag sbal du bcug pa dang /_rgyal po de la grong mi rnams dga' bas yul de na gnas 
[\[215b.2\]]pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas yid mi bde bar gyur na ma skyes dgra gtum pa dang /_brlang ba dang /_gzu lums che bas de la su yang kha zer mi phod do/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyag sbal na las kho na la rten cing 'dug pa de la lus 'phags mas snod du btsos pa skyel 
[\[215b.3\]]bar byed do/_/ma skyes dgras btson srungs rnams la dris pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po bgres po ji ltar 'tsho bar byed/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha khyod kyi yum gyis snod nas btsos pa skyel lags so/_/ma skyes dgras bsgo ba/_phyin chad bza' ba dang btung ba ji ltar yang 
[\[215b.4\]]skyel bar mi 'gyur bar khog shig_/btsun mo rnams la yang bsgo ba/_sus kyang phyag sbal du bza' ba dang btung ba bskyal bar mi bya'o/_/gang zhig skyel na de chad pas bsad do/_/de zhe gnag pa'i las can yin par shes pas su yang kha zas sbyor ba yang mi byed na 
[\[215b.5\]]skyel ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas lus 'phags ma khyim thab la sdug par 'chums pa'i snying gis phye'i 'de gus lus byugs shing rkang gdub kyi sbubs chus bkang nas bskyal bar brtsams te de des 'tsho bar byed do/_/btson srungs kyi mi rnams kyis de'i thabs shes mod kyi 
[\[215b.6\]]rgyal po de la dga' bas mthong yang ma skyes dgra la ma sbran to/_/ji tsam na yang ma skyes dgras btson srungs kyi mi rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po bgres po ji ltar 'tsho bar byed/_de rnams kyis rgyas par smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag lus 
[\[215b.7\]]'phags ma ji ltar yang phyis skyel bar mi 'gyur bar khog shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir skar khung gi drang thad kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'chag par brtsams nas/_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos skar khung nas drang thad kyi bya rgod 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das gang na ba la bltas nas dga' bskyed pas des na srog dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/ma skyes dgras yang btson srungs kyi mi rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag bza' ba dang btung ba ni bkag na da ltar rgyal po bgres po ji ltar 
[\[216a.2\]]'tsho bar byed/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de rjes su gzung ba'i slad du skar khung gi drang thad kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'chag par mdzad pa de la de gdugs re re zhing bzhengs nas gzigs lags so/_/des smras pa/_skar khung khog la de'i rkang pa gnyis 
[\[216a.3\]]kyang spu gris dros shig_/de rnams kyis skar khung dag bkag de'i rkang pa gnyis kyang spu gris dras pa dang de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gdungs pas mchi mas brnangs shing skad 'gags la mig mchi mas gang bas bsams pa/_bdag sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dog pa thob na bcom ldan 
[\[216a.4\]]'das kyis ma dgongs pa lta zhig snyam mo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de lta bu mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa'am/_rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga'o/_/chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 
[\[216a.5\]]dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/_bsrung ba gcig pu pa/_nyag gcig dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/_dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 
[\[216a.6\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/_yan lag lnga spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs 
[\[216a.7\]]pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcur dbang 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]sgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni nyams/_gang ni 'phel/_gang ni mi bzad par gyur/_gang ni dog par gyur/_gang ni sdug bsngal bar gyur/_gang ni mi 
[\[216b.2\]]bzad pa dang dog pa dang sdug bsngal bar gyur/_gang ni ngan song la gzhol/_gang ni ngan song la 'bab/_gang ni ngan song la bab/_ngas gang ni ngan song nas drangs te mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/_gang 
[\[216b.3\]]gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag ni yongs su smin par bya/_gang gi yongs su smin pa ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu song la 
[\[216b.4\]]nga'i tshig gis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bya ba gang yin pa de ngas khyod la mdzad zin te/_khyod sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_yi 
[\[216b.5\]]dgas rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs/_lha dang mi rnams su ni rab tu bzhag_/'khor ba'i ni mthar byas/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/_ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bcad/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye na/_'on kyang 
[\[216b.6\]]khyod nyid kyi las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag khyod nyid kyis byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po las byas shing bsags 
[\[216b.7\]]pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]rnams kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na las kyi skyabs can du gyis 
[\[217a.2\]]shig ces gsung ngo /_/zhes byos shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur to/_/phyag sbal du rgyal po gzugs can snying 
[\[217a.3\]]po'i mdun du 'dug pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod nad med par gyur cig ces gsung ngo /_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[217a.4\]]po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'di skad ces/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bya ba gang yin pa de ngas khyod la mdzad de/_khyod sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs/_lha dang mi rnams su ni rab tu bzhag_/'khor ba'i ni 
[\[217a.5\]]mthar byas/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/_ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bcad/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye na/_'on kyang khyod nyid kyi las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas 
[\[217a.6\]]pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag khyod nyid kyis byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 
[\[217a.7\]]'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis las kyi skyabs can du gyis shig ces gsung ngo /_/de phyag sbal du bcug pa dang /_spu gris rkang pa dras pa dang /_bza' 
[\[217b.2\]]ba dang btung ba dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pas smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gang na kha zas bzang po 'tshal lags/_des smras pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams na'o zhes smras nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 
[\[217b.3\]]ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na phyag sbal de nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bya rgod kyi phung po la phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/ma skyes dgra'i bu 'char byed bzang po'i mdzub mo la phol mig byung bas de ngu bar gyur nas ma skyes dgras drung du song ste/_
[\[217b.4\]]des de pang bar bzhag nas mgul nas 'khyud/_'o byas/_kun tu 'khyud na 'on kyang de ngu ste 'dug tu mi btub bo/_/de nas ma skyes dgras de'i mdzub mo khar bcug pa dang /_pho la mig khar rdol nas ma skyes dgras rnag khrags la pho'o/_/gzhon nu 'char byed bzang pos 
[\[217b.5\]]rnag khrag de mthong nas lhag par ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_btsun mo lus 'phags mas 'dzum phyung ba ma skyes dgras mthong nas smras pa/_yum 'di ji lta bu zhig_/des smras pa/_bu nad 'di ni khyed kyi yab mes brgyud de 'ongs pa yin te/_khyod kyang de ltar gyur pa na khyod kyi 
[\[217b.6\]]yab kyis mdzub mo khar bcug pa dang /_phol mig rdol nas khyod mi ngu bar bya ba'i phyir rnag khrag sa la ma pho bar khong du mid do des smras pa/_yum bdag gi yab 'di 'dra bar byams par gyur tam/_des smras pa/_de 'dra'o/_/de nas ma skyes dgra pha la zhe sdang gi kun nas 
[\[217b.7\]]dkris pa dang bral zhing rjes su chags pa skyes te/_des blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang zhig nga la rgyal po bgres po gson no zhes zer ba de la ngas rgyal srid phyed sbyin no/_/rgyal po de la grong mi dang yul mi rnams dga' ba yin pas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]phyag sbal logs su brgyugs pa'i sgra rgyal pos thos nas bsams pa/_da ni gnod pa mi bzad pa ci zhig byed par 'gyur ro snyam ste/_skrag nas shugs nar zhes phyung ste shi ba dang /_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i bur skyes te pang du 'dug nas lha'i 
[\[218a.2\]]bdud rtsis longs spyod par byed do/_/rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/_khyod su zhig_/des bdag ni rgyal ba khyu mchog lags so/_/zhes smras pas/_de'i ming rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal ba khyu mchog ces bya bar grags so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams 
[\[218a.3\]]cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rgyal po gzugs can snying po las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes par gyur cing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bden pa mthong 
[\[218a.4\]]bar bgyis pa dang /_spu gris sug pa rkang pa dras te phyag sbal du stsal cing bkres pa dang /_skom pas gzir nas gum par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_
[\[218a.5\]]rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/_gzugs can snying pos las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag 
[\[218a.6\]]las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i 
[\[218a.7\]]phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]ba sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin pas/_ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas zhig 
[\[218b.2\]]ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa na bA rA Na sIr phyin nas bA rA Na sI'i rdza mkhan zhig gi las khang du nub mo nye bar brten te gnas so/_/'gron pa zhig kyang las khang de nyid du gnas btab pa las der 'gron pa des bshang ba byas nas nub mo nyid langs te song ngo /_/dgra bcom pa rnams 
[\[218b.3\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma bsams par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pa yin pas rang sangs rgyas kyis 'di nyid du bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o snyam nas de nyid du 'dug go/_/ji tsam na rdza mkhan nam nangs nas las kyi khang par zhugs na mi gtsang bas ma rungs par 
[\[218b.4\]]byas pa mthong ngo /_/mi phal pa rnams ni mi rtog pa yin pas des rang sangs rgyas la sems rab tu gdug par byas te de sems rab tu sdang bas smras pa/_rab tu byung ba khyod kyi rkang pa gnyis spu gris dras sam cin gang gi phyir khyod kyis las khang du bshang ba byas shing phyi rol 
[\[218b.5\]]du ma song /_des de sgo bcad nas 'di nyid du skom pa dang bkres pas shi shig ces bzhag go/_/bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa/_nyon mongs pa 'di ni nyams kyis gal te bdag gis sgo phye ste song bar gyur na lhag par yang nyams par 'gyur ro snyam nas de cang mi smra bar 
[\[218b.6\]]'dug go/_/ji tsam na rdza mkhan dro'i dus la bab nas de'i zhe sdang gi kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas des smras pa/_kye rab tu byung ba gdugs tshod gsol gyis tshur spyon/_rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo dus su longs spyod pa yin pa las dus las yol zin 
[\[218b.7\]]to/_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta na 'di nyid du bzhugs te/_sang bshos gsol la gshegs shig_/des de la snying brtse ba'i phyir khas blangs so/_/des de phyi de nyin par kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas so/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyi ngag 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]gis ma yin pas de steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas de shing rtsa ba 
[\[219a.2\]]nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_yon gnas chen po mar spyon/_mar spyon/_bdag 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba lag nas drang du gsol/_de babs pa dang /_des de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yon gnas 
[\[219a.3\]]dam pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa bgyis pa'i las gang lags pa de'i skal ba can du ma gyur cig_/bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par bgyid kyi mi mnyes par mi 
[\[219a.4\]]bgyid pa dang /_'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rdza mkhan gang yin pa de ni gzugs can snying po 'di nyid yin te/_rang sangs rgyas la sems rab tu gdug pas ngag rtsub po'i las phyung ba gang yin pa de'i 
[\[219a.5\]]las kyi rnam par smin pas spu gris rkang pa gnyis dras pa dang /_phyag sbal du bcug pa dang /_skom pa dang bkres pas shi ba yin no/_/des bzod pa gsol nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas phyug pa dang rgyal po'i rigs su skyes nas kyang nga'i spyan snga 
[\[219a.6\]]nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du thob par byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams 
[\[219a.7\]]kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/_'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te/_las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//_//_
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgya rtsa gnyis pa/_blon po rnams kyis ma skyes dgra la smras pa/_lha rgyal po bgres po ni nongs so/_/des thos nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel ba dang /_chus gtor nas dbugs slar byung nas mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug go/_/de'i mya ngan 
[\[219b.2\]]bsal bar sus kyang mi nus nas blon po rnams kyis de'i mya ngan bsal ba brtsal bar brtsams pa las/_ji tsam na lho phyogs nas gar mkhan zhig 'ongs nas/_blon po rnams kyis de de'i mdun du gar byed du bcug kyang ma skyes dgra yid mi bde ba nyid pas sus kyang de la legs 
[\[219b.3\]]so zhes bya ba ma byin nas/_gar mkhan phyir byung ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so/_/des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas des bsams pa/_skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag la byas dang des bdag la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa zhig snyam ste/_de bcom ldan 
[\[219b.4\]]'das la sems mngon par dad pas rdza rnga chen po brdungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_
[\[219b.5\]]btsod ka dag byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro/_kha cig ni steng du 'gro la/_gang dag 'og tu dong ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa 
[\[219b.6\]]dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol ba can dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a cu zer dang /_ut+pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song ste/_sems can dmyal ba tsha ba gang yin pa de dag ni bsil 
[\[219b.7\]]bar gyur te 'bab par byed la/_sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang yin pa de dag tu dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed do/_/des sems can dmyal ba de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so/_/de dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la gzhan du 
[\[220a.2\]]skyes pa yang ma yin te/_'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to snyam mo/_/de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du 
[\[220a.3\]]bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do/_/gang dag steng du 'dong ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul 
[\[220a.4\]]dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams 'phel dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi 
[\[220a.5\]]che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrog par byed cing /_tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/_brtsam par bya 
[\[220a.6\]]zhing 'byung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/_/chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar 
[\[220a.7\]]byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya bar yang sgrogs so/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'gro ste/_de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su nub par 'gyur/_sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur/_dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed 
[\[220b.2\]]na ni rting bar nub par 'gyur/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur/_mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mor nub par 'gyur/_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yon par nub 
[\[220b.3\]]par 'gyur/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yas par nub par 'gyur/_lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang 
[\[220b.4\]]chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod 
[\[220b.5\]]spur nub bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te zhus pa/_kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi/_/tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur pa/_/ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang 
[\[220b.6\]]bar bgyis/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par/_/rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/_/de slad brtan pa nyid blos dus mkhyen 
[\[220b.7\]]nas/_/rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog_/nyan par 'tshal ba nyan pa po rnams kyi/_/the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang /_/dam pa bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol/_/tshwa chu ri dbang lta bur brtan pa'i mchog_/rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams blo bur 'dzum mi ston/_/
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]brtan pa ci slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/skye bo phal chen 'di dag de nyan 'tshal/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gar mkhan nga la sems mngon par dad par byas nas rdza rnga chen po rdung bar byed pa de mthong ngam/_btsun pa de mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo gar mkhan 
[\[221a.2\]]de sems bskyed pa des rang sangs rgyas rnga sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_de'i sbyin pa'i chos ni 'di yin te/_nga la sems dad par byas pa gang yin pa'o/_/lha sbyin gyis ma skyes dgra la smras pa/_kho bos khyod rgyal srid la bzhag pa yin gyis khyod kyis kyang kho bo sangs rgyas nyid du skos 
[\[221a.3\]]shig_/des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni sku gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug la re zhig dang por gser gyi kha dog nyid med do/_/des smras pa/_kho bos kyang gser gyi kha dog tu snang bar bsgyur ro/_/zhes des gser mgar bkug nas smras pa/_kho bo'i lus gser gyis 
[\[221a.4\]]g.yogs shig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa gal te tshor ba mnags phong na'o/_/des smras pa/_khyod kyis g.yogs shig dang phod par bya'o/_/des tsan tsu zhes bya ba'i 'bru mar gyis lus byugs nas gser gyi gyim phag gis lus g.yogs pa dang de sdug bsngal mi bzad 
[\[221a.5\]]pa tshab rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ngo /_/dge slong rnams kyis ko ka li ka la dris pa/_lha sbyin gang na/_des smras pa/_phyogs che ge mo zhig na gser gyi kha dog tu snang bar sgyur ro/_/dge slong rnams phyogs der song ba dang /_de rnams kyis de sdug 
[\[221a.6\]]bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen te/_ku co 'don pa thos nas de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ngo /_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa lha sbyin gser gyi kha dog don du gnyer bas sdug 
[\[221a.7\]]bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi mchi ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'di 'das pa'i dus na yang gser gyi zhwa don du gnyer ba'i phyir tshul ma yin pas 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na khyo lam ring por song ba'i bud med cig yod pa de'i mdun du bya rog cig skad snyan pa snyan par 'byin nas des smras pa/_bya rog song shig bya rog song shig gal te bdag gi khyim thab 
[\[221b.2\]]bde bar 'khor na khyod la gser gyi zhwa zhig sbyin no/_/ci tsam na de'i khyim thab de yang bde bar slar 'ongs so/_/bya rog de gser gyi zhwa'i ched du de'i mdun du 'dug nas skad snyan pa snyan par phyung ba dang de nas des de la gser gyi zhwa zhig byin no/_/des de gyon nas phan tshun du lding ba 
[\[221b.3\]]dang /_de gser gyi zhwa'i phyir bya khras mgo bcad do/_/lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_don med gzhi dang ldan pa yi/_/nor ni phung bar 'gyur ba ste/_/gang gi mgo la gser yod pa'i/_/bya rog gis ni phung byed btsal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[221b.4\]]dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bya rog gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di gser gyi rgyus tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/da ltar yang 'di gser gyi kha dog don du gnyer ba'i phyir sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 
[\[221b.5\]]'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang lha sbyin gyis ma skyes dgra la smras pa/_kho bos ni khyod rgyal srid la bzhag gis khyod kyis kyang kho bo sangs rgyas nyid du chug shig_/des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil la ni 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis 
[\[221b.6\]]mtshan pa'i rtags yod na/_khyod kyi rkang pa'i mthil la ni 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis mtshan pa'i rtags med do/_/des smras pa/_kho bos kyang rkang pa'i mthil la ni 'khor lo'i rtags bsgrub par bya'o zhes des lcags mgar rnams bkug nas smras pa/_kho bo'i rkang mthil la 
[\[221b.7\]]'khor lo 'dri nus sam/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa gal te tshor ba mnags phod na'o/_/des smras pa/_phod kyis gyis shig_/de rnams kyis bsams pa/_'di mthu dang ldan pa yin pas gal te 'di bzhin du bris na rdog pas bdag cag srog dang phral bar 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa 'di yod do snyam nas/_de rnams kyis rtsig pa 'bigs su bcug nas smras pa/_'phags pa rtsig pa'i bu ga 'dir rkang pa gnyis chug shig_/des rtsig pa'i bu gar rkang pa gnyis bcug pa dang lcags mgar rnams kyis 'khor 
[\[222a.2\]]lo me'i kha dog tu 'dug par byas nas rkang pa bsregs pa dang /_de sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur to/_/dge slong rnams kyis ko ka li ka la dris pa/_lha sbyin gang na/_phyogs ga ge mo zhig na rkang pa'i mthil la 'khor lo'i 
[\[222a.3\]]rtags sgrub bo/_/dge slong rnams phyogs der song ba dang de rnams kyis de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen cing ku co 'don pa yang thos nas de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ngo /_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[222a.4\]]ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa lha sbyin rkang pa'i mthil la 'khor lo'i rtags don du gnyer bas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi mchi ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 
[\[222a.5\]]'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di rkang rjes kyi phyir tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba gangs can la glang po che zhig yod pa chu 'thung du 'babs pas de'i phyi bzhin wa zhig kyang babs pa dang /_des glang po che'i 
[\[222a.6\]]rjes mthong nas bdag nyid kyi gom pas gzhal bar brtsams te des bsams pa/_rjes 'di ni bdag gi yin no zhes de mchong zhing mchong zhing rjes kyi steng du rkang pa 'jog pa na sdom dum khye'u ga zhig gi steng du rdeg 'chos par gyur to/_/lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mdor na 
[\[222a.7\]]glang chen rkang rjes dang /_/blun po khyod rjes mi 'dra yi/_/don med blo 'di slongs byos shig_/ngal ba thob par gyur ta re/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di rkang rjes kyi phyir tshul ma yin pas 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/da ltar yang 'di rkang pa'i mthil la 'khor lo'i rtags don du gnyer ba'i phyir sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnod sbyin 
[\[222b.2\]]kum bi ra'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/lha sbyin gyis yang ma skyes dgra la smras pa/_kho bos khyod ni rgyal srid la bzhag na khyod kyis kho bo sangs rgyas su gzhug ma nus kyis/_da ni kho bos dge sbyong gau ta ma srog dang dbral gyis khyod kyis sus bsad dam/_gang du 
[\[222b.3\]]bsad pa ma smra shig_/des smras pa/_de bzhin du gyis shig_/ji tsam na lho phyogs nas 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs nas lha sbyin gyis de bkug nas smras pa/_kye slob dpon khyod kyis mi lnga brgyas 'phen pa de lta bu'i sgyogs nus sam/_des 
[\[222b.4\]]smras pa/_'phags pa nus so/_/des de la mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba byin zhing mi stong gi gla yang byin nas smras pa/_gnas gang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de'i drang thad kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i steng der sgyogs chos shig_/sgyogs 'phen pa'i mi lnga brgya po de dag 
[\[222b.5\]]kyang 'khod du bcug go/_/gnas gzhan zhig tu nyis brgya lnga bcu 'khod du bcug nas bsgo ba/_khyed cag gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma sgyogs kyis ma sod na khyed kyis sod cig de'i don du gnas gzhan dang gzhan du yang mi rnams 'khod du bcug nas thams cad la bsgo ba/_khyed cag 
[\[222b.6\]]gang gi gor dge sbyong gau ta ma 'ongs dang de dag gis sod cig_/bdag nyid kyang phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas 'di rnams kyis shor dang bdag gis bsad do snyam mo/_/ji tsam na mi lnga brgyas sgyogs 'phang bar brtsams te smras pa/_su'i phyir sgyogs 'phang /_ji tsam na sangs rgyas 
[\[222b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das shod na bzhugs pa mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag rang gi srog btang ba ni bla'i lha dang mis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa ni de lta ma yin gyis sgyogs bor ro zhes de rnams kyis sgyogs bor nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]phan tshun du rgyu zhing gnas gang zhig nas babs na lha sbyin gyis mi mthong bar 'gyur snyam mo/_/de rnams kyis bsam pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs su chud nas them skas shig sprul pa dang /_de rnams kyis them skas mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[223a.2\]]shes ldan dag them skas 'di sus btsugs snyam na de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus yin no snyam nas/_de rnams kyi lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par gyur te them skas de las babs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyang 
[\[223a.3\]]de dag gdul ba kho na la ltos nas bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'chag cing bzhugs so/_/de nas de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan snga na 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal 
[\[223a.4\]]dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chas bshad pa mdzad pas/_de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[223a.5\]]bu mngon sum du byas te bden pa mthong ba dang lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/_btsun pa bdag cag la phas ma bgyis/_mas ma lags/_rgyal pos ma lags/_lha rnams kyis ma lags/_sdug pas ma lags/_rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma 
[\[223a.6\]]lags/_sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de/_dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs/_lha dang mi rnams su 
[\[223a.7\]]ni rab tu bzhag_/'khor ba'i ni mthar bgyis/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bskum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ldan nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/_btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_bcom 
[\[223b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad du ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams blang bar brtsams so/_/'khrul 'khor 
[\[223b.3\]]gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon yang 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrongs par byed pa yin no snyam du bsams nas/_de rnams kyi phyi bzhin them skas la babs nas mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba khyer te bros so/_/lha sbyin ni rdo ba 'phen par dga' bas yang dang yang du lta ba na ma 
[\[223b.4\]]'phangs so snyam ste/_rang nyid kyis mi lnga brgya po gzhan khrid de bya rgod kyi bung po'i ri la 'dzeg par brtsams pa na/_mi lnga brgya po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos nyan pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang lhag par yang mi bzod pa skyes te phyogs gzhan zhig nas bya rgod kyi phung 
[\[223b.5\]]po'i ri la 'dzegs pa dang /_ji tsam na 'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon yang bros par mthong nas/_de rang nyid kyis 'khor lnga brgya dang sgyogs 'phang bar brtsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nga nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa 
[\[223b.6\]]bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/_nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs nas mi lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shes ldan dag 
[\[223b.7\]]lha sbyin kun nas dkris pa drag po la gnas nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg gis deng shig_/'di dag ni nga'i las yin no/_/de nas mi lnga brgya po de dag bros so/_/lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes 'di snyam du 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]sems te/_lha sbyin ni bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa'i phyir pha rol gnon pa byed do snyam du bsams nas/_gnod sbyin kum bir gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_gnod sbyin kum bi ra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha sbyin ni bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la sgyogs 
[\[224a.2\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la rdo ba 'phen par rtsom la/_bcom ldan 'das ni khyod kyi gnas na bzhugs na/_de la kho bos 'bad de rdo ba bar snang la rdo rjes phye mar brlag na gal te phye mar brlags pa'i dum bus bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du 'bab par 'gyur gyis/_khyod kyis 
[\[224a.3\]]grogs gyis shig_/des smras pa/_bdag bka' bzhin 'tshal bcom ldan 'das kyis ni bla gab med pa na bzhugs bzhugs nas ri'i phug tu gshegs so/_/lha sbyin 'khor lnga brgya pos sgyogs drangs te bcom ldan 'das la rdo ba 'phangs so/_/gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i 
[\[224a.4\]]rdo rjes phye mar byas pa las de'i phyed bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas su lhung ngu cha ba gnod sbyin kum bi ras legs par ma zin pa des bsad nas rdo ba'i dum bu yar ba zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la rma byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' 
[\[224a.5\]]stsal pa/_gang du gnas na las kyis mi rdzi ba'i/_/sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/_/bar snang nyid min rgya mtsho'i nang min zhing /_/ri bo'i phug tu zhugs pa'ang ma yin no/_/gnod sbyin kum bi ra yang dge ba'i sems kyis shi ste shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gya nom pa 
[\[224a.6\]]rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/chos nyid kyis lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo ni skyes nas ring po ma lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis yin pa'o/_/des gnod sbyin las shi 'phos pa dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum 
[\[224a.7\]]pa'i lha gya nom pa rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pa yin par mthong ste/_de nas sngon gnod sbyin byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/_zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]ma la bdag gis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam nas/_de nas sngon gnod sbyin byed byed pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dri ma med cing g.yo ba thogs pa/_do shal dang se mo dos lus brgyan nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha rnams kyi me 
[\[224b.2\]]tog ut+pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i 
[\[224b.3\]]phyir 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas sngon gnod sbyin byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'jig 
[\[224b.4\]]tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/_btsun pa bdag la phas ma lags/_mas ma lags/_rgyal pos ma lags/_lha 
[\[224b.5\]]rnams kyis ma lags/_sdug pas ma lags/_rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/_sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/_dge sbyong dang bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni 
[\[224b.6\]]bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/_ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/_lha dang mi rnams su ni bdag rab tu bzhag go/_/yang gsol pa/_khyod mthus nyes pa mang ldan mi bzad pa'i/_/ngan song lam bkag bsod nams mang 
[\[224b.7\]]po yi/_/mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang thob par gyur/_/khyod la brten nas shin tu rnam dag mig_/nyes bral dag pa de ring bdag gis thob/_/go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa rjes thob ste/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal lags 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]so/_/'gro bar lha min lha dang mis mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dka' ba/_/thub pa deng khyod mthong ba'i 'bras bu mchis/_/de nas do shal rab 'phyang dag 'gyur pa/_/zhabs gnyis la ni mngon par phyag
