[\[225a.2\]]'tshal nas/_/dgra thub pa la g.yas nas bskor byas nas/_/lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song /_/de nas sngon gnod sbyin byed byed pa'i lha'i bu tshong ba khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /_zhing pa lo thog legs pa lta bu dang /_dpa' bo g.yul ngo rgyal ba lta bu dang /_nad pa 
[\[225a.3\]]nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur 'byor ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba'i 'byor ba de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na/_de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[225a.4\]]spyan snga na snang ba rgya chen po de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas the tshom skyes te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mdang sum bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi mchis 
[\[225a.5\]]lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngal blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang ma yin/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin te/_de lta mod kyi lha sbyin nga bsad pa'i phyir 'bad 
[\[225a.6\]]pas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las sgyogs kyi rdo 'phangs pa gang yin pa de bar snang nyid la gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes phye mar byas pa de'i phyed nga'i steng du lhung ba gnod sbyin kum bi ras gzung nyes pas de des bsad do/_/nga la sems mngon par dad par byas nas shi bas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gya 
[\[225a.7\]]nom pa rnams kyi nang du skyes pa yin te/_de mdang sum nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bshad de bden pa mthong bar byas nas rang gi gnas su song ba yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_gcig 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/_'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas/_dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/_las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab 
[\[225b.2\]]par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa gnod sbyin kum bi ras bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du bdag nyid yongs su btang ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[225b.3\]]dag da ltar gyi 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su btang ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang 
[\[225b.4\]]mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na yod pa'i bsti gnas rtsa ba dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig na drang srong dka' thub drag po spyod pa chu 
[\[225b.5\]]dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu la longs spyod pa/_pags pa dang shing shun gyon pa zhig gnas so/_/de'i bsti gnas kyi nye 'khor na rngon pa zhig [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bsad cing 'tsho bar byed de/_de dus dus su drang srong de'i gan du 'ong ngo /_/drang srong des kyang de la ci nas kyang rngon pa 'dis bdag gi nye 
[\[225b.6\]]'khor na gnas pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams gsod par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de la ngal sos nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bus stobs par byed pas/_de gnyis gcig la gcig pha dang bu'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te rngon pas ni drang srong la pha zhes tshig tu 'bod do/_/drang srong gis kyang rngon pa la 
[\[225b.7\]]bu zhes 'bod do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin nang par sngar langs te [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du phyir byung ba des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shig la mdas shi gsor du bsnun pa dang drang srong de'i bsti gnas su zhugs so/_/der yang rgyal pos lcags mdas gnad du bsnun pas shi bar gyur to/_/
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]de nas drang srong de khro ba'i kun nas dkris pas smras pa/_rgyal po khyod ni phung krol spyod pa ngan pa zhig ste/_des na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]nga la skyabs su 'ongs pa bsad do zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po de zhe sdang gi kun nas dkris pa la zhen pa'i blos blon po rnams 
[\[226a.2\]]la smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la kha tshas zer ba gang yin pa de la chad pa ci bcad blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha chad pas dgum lags mod/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na drang srong 'di ngas yongs su spangs so/_/
[\[226a.3\]]blon po rnams kyis drang srong gsad par brtsams pa na stes dbang gis rngon pa de yang drang srong de'i nyen 'khor na 'dug nas des bsams pa/_bdag gson bzhin du drang srong ci'i phyir gsod du gzhug snyam nas/_des g.yul 'gyed par brtsams pa na drang srong bros nas/_dpung 
[\[226a.4\]]chen po'i tshogs kyis de bsad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rngon pa gang yin pa de ni gnod sbyin kum bi ra 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'dis 
[\[226a.5\]]nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su btang ngo /_/da ltar yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su btang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la rdo ba'i dum bus rma byung ba khrag 'chad du ma btub nas de bzhin du 'dzag go/_/sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed bcom ldan 'das kyi snyun 
[\[226a.6\]]brtag pa'i phyir dus gsum du spyan sngar 'gro'o/_/rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dad pa can dang /_yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa nor can dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon rnams kyang 'ongs te/_de na kha cig 
[\[226a.7\]]gis smras pa/_'tsho byed sman 'di ni de la bzang ngo /_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_'di ni de bas kyang bzang ngo /_/sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_'di la mod la gdangs par 'gyur ba'i sman yod mod kyi de ni rnyed par dka'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]dga' bos smras pa/_'tsho byed de ci yin/_des smras pa/_tsan dan sa mchog yin no/_/de'i tshe tsan dan sa mchog rnyed pa nyid med do/_/ji tsam na tshong pa zhig yod pas 'di ltar bdag gis tsan dan sa mchog dus dus su btsongs pas ma skyes dgra 'di ni gtum pa 
[\[226b.2\]]brlang ba/_gzu lums can yin pas gal te ma stes te de la tsan dan sa mchog dgos par gyur la/_de ma rnyed na gdon mi za bar mgo gcod par yang 'gyur ro snyam nas tsan dan sa mchog bsres te bzhag pa zhig yod do/_/des sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis ji ltar 
[\[226b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi snyun la ni tsan dan sa mchog gis gdangs par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa thos nas des bsams pa/_ma skyes dgra 'di lha sbyin gyis rbad pas bcom ldan 'das la zhe 'gras pa'i blo yod de/_gal te bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan sa mchog phul 
[\[226b.4\]]na bdag la gnod pa byed pa'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do snyam mo/_/yang bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang mis mchod pa yin pas gal te de'i don du srog dang phral na yang phral du zad/_ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan sa mchog dbul lo snyam nas/_des 
[\[226b.5\]]tsan dan sa mchog khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas zhabs la gtugs te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan sa mchog gis bgyi ba ci mchis pa glo bar chud na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te 'di bzhes su 
[\[226b.6\]]gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bdag nyid chen po 'di las tsan dan sa mchog long shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos blangs so/_/de nas tshong pa de dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[226b.7\]]kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dag byung nas kha cig ni 'og du 'gro/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro la/_gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_
[\[227a.2\]]tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol pa can dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer ba dang /_a cu zer ba dang /_ut+pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song ste/_sems 
[\[227a.3\]]can dmyal ba tsha ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab par byed la/_sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed do/_/des sems can dmyal ba de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing /_de dag 'di snyam du 
[\[227a.4\]]shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so/_/de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di 
[\[227a.5\]]nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te/_'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[227a.6\]]las de zad par byas nas gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do/_/gang dag steng du 'gro ba de dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral ba dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_
[\[227a.7\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams 'phel dang /_'bras 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/_/
[\[227b.2\]]brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/_/chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug 
[\[227b.3\]]bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba yang sgrogs so/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'gro ste/_de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung 
[\[227b.4\]]ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su nub par 'gyur/_sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur/_dud 'gror skye bar lung ston 
[\[227b.5\]]par bzhed na ni rting par nub par 'gyur/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur/_mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mor nub par 'gyur/_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i 
[\[227b.6\]]mthil du nub par 'gyur/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur/_lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur/_rang sangs 
[\[227b.7\]]rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mdzod spur nub 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi/_/tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur pa/_/ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin/_/de yis phyogs 
[\[228a.2\]]rnams kun du snang bar bgyis/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par/_/rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/_/de slad brtan pa nyid 
[\[228a.3\]]blos dus mkhyen nas/_/rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog_/nyan par 'tshal ba nyan pa po rnams kyi/_/the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang /_/dam pa bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol/_/tshwa chu ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i mchog_/rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams blo bur 
[\[228a.4\]]'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pa ji slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/skye bo phal chen 'di dag de nyan 'tshal/_/kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/_
[\[228a.5\]]kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la tshong pas sems mngon par dad par byas nas tsan dan sa mchog phul ba gang yin pa de mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo tshong ba de dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems bskyed pa dang /_sbyin pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[228a.6\]]btang ba des rang sangs rgyas tsan dan can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin pa'i chos ni 'di yin te/_nga la sems dad par byas pa gang yin pa'o/_/'on kyang khrag de 'chad du ma btub nas de bzhin du 'dzag go/_/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_da ni bud med gzhon nu'i 'o mas gdab 
[\[228a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/dge slong rnams kyis bud med gzhon nu ci 'dra ba ma shes nas/_des smras pa/_bu thon bu btsas pa gang yin pa de ni bud med gzhon nu 'dod de/_de'i 'o ma gang yin pa de ni bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma zhes bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lha sbyin dang /_lha 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]sbyin gyi phyogs ma gtogs par 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs phal cher la yang bsgo nas thams cad kyis bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma btsal bar brtsams so/_/'khor 
[\[228b.2\]]bzhi po dang skye bo'i tshogs rnams tshol ba na de rnams kyis thabs yod yod kyis bgegs byed do/_/ji tsam na rgyal po'i khab na bu thon bu btsas pa'i bud med gzhon nu 'o ma nyung ste rang gi bu yang 'o mas mi ngoms na gzhan la sbyin du lta ga la yod pa zhig 'dug pa des ji ltar bcom 
[\[228b.3\]]ldan 'das la bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma'i dgos pa byung ba thos nas des bsams pa/_gal te phul na ni bdag gi bu nyam chung bas 'o ma med na 'chi bar 'gyur la nyes dmigs de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gzhan 'di yang yod de/_lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das la yun ring po nas phyir 
[\[228b.4\]]rgol ba dgrar gyur ba yin te/_des rbad pa ni rgyal po ma skyes dgra yin/_lha sbyin gyi phyogs ni ko ka li ka dang /_khan da dra ba bya dang /_ka ti ma ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin yin pas 'di dag gis kyang bdag gdon mi za bar bsad par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/yang bsams 
[\[228b.5\]]pa/_bdag bsad pa dang bu dang bral ba ni bla'i lha dang mis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snyun gyis 'o brgyal ba'i tshor ba sku nyams su brtar nas des na rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'khrugs par gyur pa ni de lta ma yin gyi/_ma la bdag gis 'o ma khyer 
[\[228b.6\]]la 'gro'o snyam ste/_de bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dad pa byas nas snod gsar par 'o ma bzhos te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[228b.7\]]'das la 'tsho byed kyis bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma bstan par bdag gis 'tshal na/_bdag rjes su gzung ba'i slad du bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma 'di bzhes su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bsam pa bzang po can 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]gyi bu mo 'di las 'o ma long shig_/des blangs pa dang des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[229a.2\]]ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dag byung nas/_kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro la/_gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_
[\[229a.3\]]bsdus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ut+pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_
[\[229a.4\]]pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song ste/_sems can dmyal ba tsha ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab par byed la/_sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed do/_/des sems can dmyal ba de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun 
[\[229a.5\]]gcod par byed cing /_de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so/_/de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te shes 
[\[229a.6\]]ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la/_gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te/_'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to snyam mo/_/de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/_sems can 
[\[229a.7\]]dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgya rtsa gsum pa/_gang dag steng du 'gro ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]ris dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung 
[\[229b.2\]]dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams 'phel dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa 
[\[229b.3\]]dang /_bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing /_tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/_brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/_sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig rab tu bag yod 
[\[229b.4\]]par/_/chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba yang sgrogs par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin 
[\[229b.5\]]rjes bzhin du song ste/_de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su nub par 'gyur/_sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par 
[\[229b.6\]]bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur/_dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni rting par nub par 'gyur/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur/_mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mor nub par 'gyur/_stobs 
[\[229b.7\]]kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yon par nub par 'gyur/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid du lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yas par nub par 'gyur/_lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi byang 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer 
[\[230a.2\]]de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur nub bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te zhus pa/_kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yis/_/tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur 
[\[230a.3\]]pa/_/ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu mchis par/_/rtsa 
[\[230a.4\]]lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/_/de slad brtan pa nyid blos dus mkhyen nas/_/rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog_/nyan par 'tshal ba nyan pa po rnams kyi/_/the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang /_/dam pa bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol/_/tshwa chu ri 
[\[230a.5\]]rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i mchog_/rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams blo bur 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pa ji slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/skye bo phal chen 'di dag de nyan 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga la bud med kyis sems mngon par dad 
[\[230a.6\]]par byas te bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma phul ba gang yin pa de mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo bu mo de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems bskyed pa dang /_sbyin pa'i chos yongs su btang ba des rang sangs rgyas 'o ma sbyin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_de'i sbyin 
[\[230a.7\]]pa'i chos ni 'di yin te/_nga la sems mngon par dad pa gang yin pa'o/_/'on kyang khrag de 'chad du ma btub nas de bzhin du 'dzag go/_/yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang /_gzhan yang bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can mang pos bcom ldan 'das de ltar thugs 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]mi bde'o zhes thos te lhags nas/_de na kha cig ni sman dag 'debs par byed do/_/kha cig ni sngags kyi dpyad byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gyis bden pa gsol bar brtsams pa/_bcom ldan khyod kyi thugs la ni/_/sras dang dgra bor mtshungs she na/_/
[\[230b.2\]]bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis su/_/rma yi 'dzag pa chad par shog_/bden pa gsol zin pa'i mod kho nar khrag de mi 'dzag par gyur pa dang /_lha sbyin dang /_ma skyes dgra dang /_ko ka li ka dang /_khan da drab bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams ma gtogs 
[\[230b.3\]]par dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams dang /_rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs phal cher thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du gang zhig ji ltar dpyad byed pa de la de bzhin du rjes su dgyes 
[\[230b.4\]]par mdzad de/_de rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gyis bden pa gsol bas bcom ldan 'das kyi khrag 'dzag 
[\[230b.5\]]pa chad par gyur pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga dug 'bags nas kun tu 'khrugs par gyur pa na 'dis dug zhi bar byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 
[\[230b.6\]]'or dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na skyed mos tshal rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_me tog dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa/_bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de/_de na drang srong chu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu longs spyod pa/_pags pa dang /_shing shun gyon pa/_rig sngags dang /_
[\[230b.7\]]gsang sngags 'chang ba zhig gnas so/_/ri 'or de na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang khye'u zhig btsas te/_nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te ming btags nas de bskyed bsrings te chen por gyur to/_/de 
[\[231a.2\]]'chag pa'am/_'greng ba 'am/_'dug pa'am nyal ba na yang dge ba sems shing dge ba'i las byed pas de skye bo'i tshogs kyis chos 'dod ces bya bar ming btags so/_/de dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba'i phyir ri 'or nas byung nas dus dus su drang srong de'i drung du 'gro zhing de la bsnyen bkur byed 
[\[231a.3\]]de dka' thub kyi drung du 'gro bas dka' thub ldan dka' thub ldan zhes bya bar yang grags so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na dug cig gis 'bags pa langs nas de la dug sman du ma dang sngags kyi sbyor bas dpyad byas na yang de'i nad de zhi bar ma gyur nas de'i pha dang ma gnyis drang srong de'i 
[\[231a.4\]]drung du song ste/_drang srong chen po khyod kyi rim gro bgyid pa ni dug gis 'bags nas srog dang bral la thug gis dpyad mdzod cig_/des bden pa gsol bar brtsams te/_bu gcig khyod kyis sems la ni/_/dgra dang mdza' bo mtshungs she na/_/bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis su/_/
[\[231a.5\]]khye'u khyod dug ni med par shog_/des bden pa gsol ma thag_/kho nar dug zhi bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/drang srong gang yin pa de ni 'od srung stobs bcu ldan 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 
[\[231a.6\]]'dis bden pa gsol bas nga sos bar byas so/_/da ltar yang 'di'i bden pa gsol bas nga sos par byas so/_/lha sbyin sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba dang 'gyod pas sems pa/_bdag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma la rdo 'phangs pa ni don med pa zhig byas te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 
[\[231a.7\]]yang ma sod la/_skye bo mang pos kyang rab tu shes par gyur to snyam nas/_de shing drung zhig tu song ste sems khong du chud cing skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/dge slong rnams gnas dang gnas rnams su btsun pa dag gzigs shig_/lha sbyin 'di 'dra bar zhe gdug ste/_
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba de la yang pha rol gnon pas steng du rdo ba 'phen no zhes smod par byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed pa dang /_ko ka li ka dang /_khan da drab bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[231b.2\]]shes ldan dag ma brtags par byung rgyal du ci brdol/_lha sbyin shing che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung na bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ma mthong ngam/_bdag nyid chen po de de lta bu byed par ga la 'gyur/_dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod 
[\[231b.3\]]pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa ko ka li ka dang /_khan da drab bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams bdag nyid ngo tsha ma mchis pas lha sbyin ngo tsha ma mchis pa'i bsngags pa sgrogs pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[231b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa na yang ngo tsha med pa 'dis ngo tsha med pa'i bsngags pa smras pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams dang rgyal pos dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir khrims su 
[\[231b.5\]]bcas pa/_dur khrod gnyis bshams la gcig tu ni skyes pa rnams dor bar bya'o/_/gcig tu ni bud med rnams so zhes bcas so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ma ning zhig shi nas de dur khrod gcig tu yang gnas skabs ma rnyed cing gnyis par yang ma rnyed do/_/rgyal po'i khab 
[\[231b.6\]]kyi phyogs zhig na skyed mos tshal rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de/_de na drang srong spyi cer chu dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu la longs spyod pa/_pags pa dang /_shing shun gyon pa zhig gnas so/_/phyogs de na yang zhing gru 
[\[231b.7\]]gsum zhig la shing e ran da zhig skyes nas ma ning gi ro de der bor ro/_/ro'i dri tshor nas wa zhig 'ongs te des ma ning gi ro de la bza' bar brtsams so/_/bya rog gcig kyang shing e ran da'i kha na tshang bcas te 'dug go/_/de'i blo skyes nas wa la bsngags pa smras pa dang /_gal 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]te na zos pa'i lhag ma ster ro snyam nas des de la tshigs su bcad de bsngags pa smra ngar brtsams pa/_ji ltar khyod ni seng ge'i mgrin pa dang /_/ji ltar khyu mchog bshul dang ldan pa yi/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal nas/_/gsol ba'i pham 'babs las 
[\[232a.2\]]ni thugs dpag mdzod/_/was bltas te slar tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_bya yi rab mchog mkha' 'gro ba/_/phyogs kun gsal bar mdzad nas ni/_/rin chen sbram ltar mdzes gyur pa/_/shing mchog rtse la bzhugs 'di gang /_/bya rog gis smras pa/_skal ldan 
[\[232a.3\]]chen po blta ba'i phyir/_/khyod kyi drung du bdag mchis te/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal khyod phyag 'tshal na/_/gsol ba'i pham 'babs thugs dpag mdzod/_/was smras pa/_rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu yi/_/pho rog blta na sdug pa khyod/_/kun dga' byed pa rnams kyi gtso/_/ci 
[\[232a.4\]]bder gsol gyis mar spyon cig_/de babs nas wa dang lhan cig ma ning gi ro la za bar byed pa drang srong gis mthong nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ljon shing tha chad grib ma la/_/ngo tsha med pa 'dug nas su/_/tha chad ro la longs spyod pa/_/e ma'o ring zhig lon nas 
[\[232a.5\]]mthong /_/bya rog gis thos nas de ma bzod nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'di ltar seng ge rma bya dag_/dam pa'i sha la longs spyod na/_/gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho ba yi/_/spyi cer 'dir ni ci zhig gtogs/_/drang srong de yang mi bzod pa skyes nas tshigs su bcad de smras 
[\[232a.6\]]pa/_'dab chags tha chad bya rog dang /_/rkang bzhi tha chad wa dang ni/_/ljon shing tha chad e ran da/_/mi yi tha chad ma ning ro/_/zhing gi tha chad gru gsum ste/_/ngo tsha med rnams 'dus la ltos/_/de nas bya rog lhag par yang mi bzod pa skyes nas drang srong gi me khang du 
[\[232a.7\]]zhugs te blta bar brtsams pa las/_ci yang mi snang nas ril ba spyi blugs bcag ste bros so/_/ji tsam na drang srong de me khang du zhugs na ril ba spyi blugs chag pa mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_'di ni bya rog gdug pa de'i las kyis byas kyi gzhan ni su yang ma yin no 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_su la 'di 'dra'ang mi smra ste/_/ngo tsha med pa'i gdug sems kyis/_/me khang ma rung byas nas ni/_/ril ba yang ni bcag par gyur/_/bsngags 'os smad par 'os kyang rung /_/yong ye cung zad smra mi bya/_/blo gros ldan pas rtag 
[\[232b.2\]]tu ni/_/kha rog pas ni bde ba 'thob/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bya rog gang yin pa de ni ko ka li ka yin te/_de na yang ngo tsha med pa de dag gis ngo 
[\[232b.3\]]tsha med pa'i bsngags pa brjod do/_/da ltar yang ngo tsha med pa 'di dag ngo tsha med pa'i bsngags pa brjod do/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang lha sbyin thog mar gang du mi mthun par 
[\[232b.4\]]gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba shang shang ti'u gnyis lus gcig tu gyur nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas te/_chos can dang chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/ji tsam na chos ma yin pa ni gnyid log chos can ni mel tse byed pa dang /_des bdud 
[\[232b.5\]]rtsi'i 'bras bu zhig chus khyer ba mthong nas/_des de blangs te bsams pa/_ci re zhig 'di yang bslang ngam/_'on te bza' snyam mo/_/yang bsams pa/_thos kyang lus 'di gcig kho na gso bar zad do snyam nas des de ma bslang ba dang /_rang nyid sad de/_de sad pa na chos can la 
[\[232b.6\]]bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i sgregs pa byung ba chos ma yin pas tshor nas des smras pa/_de ci'i sgregs pa yin/_des smras pa/_bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i'o/_/de gang nas rnyed/_des smras pa/_khyod gnyid log pa na kho bos bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu rnyed nas lus gcig kho na gso bar zad do snyam nas 
[\[232b.7\]]khyod ma bslang bar kho bos zos so/_/des smras pa/_khyod kyis ma legs pa zhig byas te ngas kyang dus shes par bya'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na chos can gnyid log nas chos ma yin pa mel tse byed pa na des dug gi 'bras bu chus khyer ba zhig mthong nas des de zos pa dang /_de gnyi ga 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]brgyal bar gyur to/_/chos ma yin pa dug gi 'bras bus kun nas 'khrugs pas smras pa/_gang dang gang du skyes pa'i tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyod la gsod pa dang phyir rgol ba dang dgra bor gyur cig_/chos can gyis smras pa/_bdag kyang gang dang gang du skyes pa'i tshe rabs 
[\[233a.2\]]de dang de dag tu khyod la byams pa sgrub par gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chos can gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chos ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin yin no/_/der thog 
[\[233a.3\]]mar nga dang 'di mi mthun par gyur to/_/ngas kyang de la byams pa'i thugs bzhag go/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis nga la mi mthun par byas pa dang /_ngas kyang 'di la byams par bsams pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po sra rtsi ldan zhes bya ba 'byor ba 
[\[233a.4\]]dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/des yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i bu mo zhig blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' 
[\[233a.5\]]bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo de dus gzhan zhig na sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa'i nyi ma'i rtse na khye'u gzugs bzang po mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags 
[\[233a.6\]]zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha khye'u 'di gdugs kyi rtse na btsas pas/_de'i slad du khye'u'i ming nyi ma'i mu khyud ces bgyi bar gdags so/_/zhes de'i ming nyi ma'i mu khyud ces bya bar btags nas khye'u nyi ma'i mu khyud ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma 
[\[233a.7\]]gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad de/_de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]bo gtso bo dag gis srid par byed skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe/_yi ge dang /_grangs dang /_rtsis dang /_lag rtsis la nye bar zhugs shing rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul dang 
[\[233b.2\]]dbang phyug dang mthu thob pa sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par zil gyis mnan nas gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad par gyur pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta'i thabs dang /_ral gri'i 
[\[233b.3\]]thabs dang /_'phong dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang /_mda' bo che 'phen pa dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_bcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_'dzin stangs dang /_gom stangs dang /_thor tshugs 
[\[233b.4\]]dang /_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra grag par phog pa dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_tshabs cher phog pa ste bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas lnga po de dag la yang byang bar gyur nas phas de rgyal tshab tu bcug go/_/rgyal po sra rtsi ldan gyi btsun 
[\[233b.5\]]mo dam pa ni chos ldan zhes bya'o/_/blon po'i mchog ni phyugs 'dug ces bya ste/_de la rgyal po lhag par snying 'jog go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po sra rtsi ldan chos ldan ma dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar 
[\[233b.6\]]byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las chos ldan ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/de mtshan mkhan rnams kyis khye'u zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/_des rgyal po srog dang phral nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[233b.7\]]zhes lung bstan to/_/ji tsam na rgyal po sra rtsi ldan nad kyis thebs par gyur nas de la rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur te/_des lus kyi gnas skabs rig par byas nas des 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]bsams pa/_bdag 'das nas nyi ma'i mu khyud rgyal por 'gyur te/_des gdon mi za bar chos ldan ma bsad par mi 'gyur bar 'dir ye ji ltar bya ba'i dus la bab/_yang bsams pa/_blon po phyugs 'dug 'di la bdag gis longs spyod bzang po dag gis 
[\[234a.2\]]bgo bsha' byas shing spyan ras kyis btsas pa yin gyis 'di la chos ldan ma gtad do snyam nas des phyugs 'dug bkug ste bsgo ba/_nga'i btsun mo dam pa ni chos ldan ma yin la/_blon po'i mchog ni khyod yin te/_ngas lus kyi gnas skabs shes na gdon mi za bar nga srog dang 
[\[234a.3\]]'bral bar 'gyur gyis/_khyod kyis nga la sdug par sems na nyi ma'i mu khyud kyis chos ldan ma ji ltar yang srog dang phral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig des smras pa/_lha de tsam yang rngo mi thog gam/_lha thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig dang ji ltar mi bkum pa de ltar bgyi'o/_/
[\[234a.4\]]bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing /_/mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/_/phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/rgyal po sra rtsi ldan shi nas de gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pa bzang po rnams kyis bkur sti cher byas 
[\[234a.5\]]te bsregs so/_/nyi ma'i mu khyud rgyal po'i rgyal srid chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to/_/des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_chos ldan ma sod cig_/phyugs 'dug gis smras pa/_lha ma brtags par bkum ste ci rung /_ci khye'ur btsa' bar 'gyur ram/_'on te bu 
[\[234a.6\]]mor 'gyur sus 'tshal/_gal te khye'u btsas par gyur na/_de nyid dgum mod/_rgyal po nyi ma'i mu khyud kyis smras pa/_de bzhin du gyis la khyod kho nas srungs shig_/des khyim du bzhag pa na zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon nas khye'u zhig btsas so/_/de nyid kyi nyi ma la nya pa'i chung 
[\[234a.7\]]ma zhig la bu mo zhig btsas so/_/des btsas ma thag kho nar nya pa'i chung ma la nor gyis brid de brjes nas phyugs 'dug gis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha chos ldan ma la bu mo zhig btsas lags so/_/legs pa zhig smras so/_/khye'u de nya pa'i chung mas bsnun bsnyod gsos te 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]chen por gyur nas yig 'bru dang bklag pa bslabs te/_snyan dngags bya bar brtsams nas de'i ming nya pa'i khye'u snyan dngags mkhan nya pa'i khye'u snyan dngags mkhan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/phyugs 'dug gis chos ldan ma la smras pa/_khyod la ni khye'u snyan dngags mkhan zhig 
[\[234b.2\]]btsas par gyur to/_/de ci 'dra ba zhig yin re zhig blta'o/_/des smras pa/_de blta ci dgos zhog shig_/de bu la mngon par dga' zhing blta 'dod pas 'dug tu mi btub bo/_/phyugs 'dug gis nges par gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas thabs shig bshams te/_nya zhig 
[\[234b.3\]]bskur nas btang ngo /_/de nang du zhugs pa de kho na na mtshan mkhan rnams kyis nya pa'i khye'u snyan dngags mkhan 'di ni rgyal po srog dang phral te rang nyid cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa rgyal pos thos nas de blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_ci nas 
[\[234b.4\]]kyang de ma shor bar zung shig_/des gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las thos nas de phan tshun bros pa las rgan mo zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa dang des de sbas te/_de nas yung dang 'bru mar gyis lus bskus nas khyogs kyi steng du bzhag ste ro lta bur bcos nas phyung ste dur khrod du bor 
[\[234b.5\]]ba dang langs te bros pa phyogs de na mi zhig me tog dang 'bras bu tshol ba des de bros pa mthong ngo /_/de'i phyi bzhin snyegs shing rgyugs pa'i mi rnams kyis mi de la dris pa kye nang rje bong tshod dang kha dog 'di 'dra ba'i mi 'ga' zhig lam 'di nas 'gro ba khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/_des smras pa/_
[\[234b.6\]]mthong ste lam 'di nas song ngo /_/de rnams de'i rjes bzhin du dong ngo /_/de yang ri 'or der btso blag mkhan zhig gi khyim du zhugs nas de la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_snyegs ma'i mi rnams kyis ri 'or btsal bar brtsams pa na btso blag mkhan gyis gos kyi thum po'i nang du bcug nas 
[\[234b.7\]]bong bu la bkal te ri 'or nas phyir byung ste khrus byed pa'i sar khyer nas btang ba dang langs te phyogs bzhir bltas te bros so/_/der yang mi gzhan zhig gis mthong nas/_des snyegs ma'i mi rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed gang gi don du ri 'or na tshol ba'i mi de ni lam 'di 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]nas song gis myur du deng shig_/de rnams dong ba las de yang grong gzhan zhig tu lham mkhan gyi khyim zhig tu zhugs nas des de la ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad nas smras pa/_mchil lham bol rting bar bltas pa zhig gyis shig_/des smras pa/_bdag gis sngon lan 'ga' 
[\[235a.2\]]yang mchil lham de lta bu byed ma myong ngo /_/des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_blo gros sna tshogs rang bzhin du ma ste/_/de dag srang gcig tu ni gzhal ba med/_/lham mkhan khyod kyis nga yi tshig bzhin 'dir/_/rting pa gang de mdun du lta bar gyis/_/des lham mkhan de la bslabs 
[\[235a.3\]]nas lham mkhan gyis de 'dra ba'i mchil lham zhig byas so/_/ri 'or der bas bskor ba yin pas de mchil lham de gyon nas/_stor khung nas 'dzul te bros so/_/snyegs ma'i mi rnams kyis mchil lham gyi rjes bzhin ri 'or de nyid bskor te de yang bros nas so/_/chur zhugs pa 
[\[235a.4\]]dang klu rnams kyis gnas su khrid do/_/rgyal pos gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las de ji ltar klu rnams kyis klu'i gnas su khrid do zhes thos so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag nga'i yul na sbrul khas sdigs ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad nga'i spyan 
[\[235a.5\]]sngar khug shig_/de rnams kyis yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sbrul khas sdigs rnams rgyal po la phul lo/_/rgyal pos de rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la klu'i gnas che ge mo zhes bya bar klu zung shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sbrul khas sdigs thams cad 
[\[235a.6\]]kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas klu'i gnas su dong ngo /_/'brog gcig na gnod sbyin ser skya zhes bya ba khrag dang sha za ba gcig yod do/_/des skrag pas gcan gzan rnams kyis kyang 'brog de yongs su spangs na mi rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te de ser skya'i 'brog ces bya bar grags 
[\[235a.7\]]so/_/sbrul khas sdigs rnams kyi sngags kyi mthus ji ltar klu de la gnod par 'gyur ba de ltar byas pas de skrag nas de ser skya'i 'brog de rgal bar mi nus par bor ro/_/klu rnams kyis gros byas pa bdag cag gis 'di ltar de ser skya'i 'brog las ma bsgral ba ni ma legs pa zhig byas te/_
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]de yang gnod sbyin ser skyas bsad la bdag cag kyang de'i phyir gtses par 'ong na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_klu'i rgyal po des smras pa/_don de sbrul khas sdigs rnams la rig par bya'o zhes de rnams kyis sbrul khas sdigs rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag 
[\[235b.2\]]'khrugs par byas pa de ni bdag cag gis thabs kyis bsad pa nyid de 'di ltar ser skya'i 'brog tu bor ro/_/sbrul khas sdigs rnams kyis don de rgyal po la smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na yang 'on kyang tshol cig_/de ser skya'i 'brog na phan tshun 'khyam par 
[\[235b.3\]]brtsams pa na gnod sbyin ser skya yang phyogs shig na khyi rnams kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug go/_/de dang khyi rnams kyis de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong nas des bsams pa/_ci 'dis bdag shi bar gyur to zhes thos nas des na de 'dir 'ongs sam snyam mo/_/des de la khyi 
[\[235b.4\]]rnams sbad pa las de bros te shing ljon pa zhig la 'dzegs pa dang /_khyi rnams dang /_ser skyas ljon shing gi drung du bsdad de/_ser skyas smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje khyod kyi ser skya'i 'brog na mi ma yin pa ser skya zhes bya ba gnas te/_der song ba gang yin pa de des gsod 
[\[235b.5\]]par 'gyur ro zhes ma thos sam/_khyod kyi dus la bab kyis bobs shig_/des smras pa/_ji srid 'tsho ba de srid du 'dug go/_/gnod sbyin ser skya pus skyud kyis bcings te sgrim pas 'dug nas de yur ba na des de'i steng du gos shig bor ro/_/khyi rnams kyis bsams pa/_
[\[235b.6\]]'di ni mi de kho na lhung ba yin no snyam nas de rnams kyis gnod sbyin ser skya zos nas dong ngo /_/de ljon shing las dal gyis dal gyis babs te song nas de de dang de na 'khor zhing bsams pa/_bdag gi zhang po drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ba zhig yod kyis de'i drung du 'gro'o 
[\[235b.7\]]snyam nas drang srong de la yang ri 'or zhig na skyed mos tshal rtsa ba dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa shing rnam pa sna tshogs tshang tshing gis mdzes par byas pa/_bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de de rim gyis thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de de'i 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]drung du 'ongs nas gnyen du 'brel bas smras te 'dug go/_/der yang rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis btsal te de rnams kyis de gzung bar brtsams pa las des ri'i g.yang sa nas bdag nyid mchongs so/_/de mchongs pa dang mi zhig gis gtsug pud nas bzung ba las gtsug 
[\[236a.2\]]pud byung nas de lhung ngo /_/de rnams kyis bsams pa 'di ni shi bas 'dong ngo zhes gtsug pud khyer te rgyal po'i drung du song nas/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha nya pa'i khye'u snyan dngags mkhan de bkum nas gtsug pud kyang 'di lags so/_/rgyal po mgu nas des de rnams la longs spyod 
[\[236a.3\]]kyis bgo bsha' byas so/_/de nas drang srong gi skyed mos tshal na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des drang srong de la smras pa/_khyod kyi tsha bo ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dog pa nyam nga ba thob na ma dgongs sam/_des smras pa/_gal te bdag gis ma bsams par gyur na de ring nyid du srog dang 
[\[236a.4\]]bral bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong de ni rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang ba yin te/_gang gis ni skyes pa bud med du 'gyur zhing phyir yang skyes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rig sngags shes pas des de la rig sngags de bslabs te smras pa/_da ni song la 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med pas 'dug 
[\[236a.5\]]shig_/des rig sngags kyis dpes bskrun par mi nus pa'i bud med kyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas bA rA Na sIr song ste/_rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal na 'dug pa skyed mos tshal gyi srung mas mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te des myur ba myur bar song nas rgyal po nyi ma'i mu khyud la smras pa/_
[\[236a.6\]]lha skyed mos tshal na bud med gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dar la bab ba zhig mchis so/_/des bsgo ba khrid de shog shig_/des dpal gyi 'byor ba chen pos blangs te rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid nas de la rgyal po nyi ma'i mu khyud lhag par chags par gyur pa dang des skabs rnyed nas dben pa na 
[\[236a.7\]]'dug pa la bsad de slar yang rig sngags bzlas te skyes par gyur pa dang /_de nas rang nyid kyis cod pan bcings te blon po phyugs 'dug la go bar byas nas rgyal srid la 'dug go/_/lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang gis mgo ma bcad pa de bsad min/_phyir yang langs nas 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]las ni byed par 'gyur/_/ji ltar snyan dngags mkhan de glags rnyed nas/_/sra rtsi can bu lta bu de bsad yin/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po sra rtsi ldan gyi bu nyi ma'i mu khyud ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi snyan 
[\[236b.2\]]dngags mkhan gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_de na yang 'dis nga la shar gnyer la da ltar yang 'dis shar gnyer ro/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis nga la shar gnyer ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na nor bu mkhan gnyis shig gnas te de gnyis kyis lam po che 
[\[236b.3\]]dang grong bgos so/_/de'i tshe tshong pa 'byor pa yongs su zad pa zhig yod pa de nor bu'i snod khyer nas ri 'or der phyin to/_/da nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas nor bu mkhan gcig gi drung du song ste smras pa/_nor bu'i snod 'di rin thang chod cig_/des de'i rin thang chung ngu zhig tu 
[\[236b.4\]]bcad pa dang /_des smras pa/_'di ltar kho bo longs spyod las nyams kyang shes rab las ma yin pas kho bos 'di ci ri ba lta shes na/_de skad du smra ba ci'i tha tshig_/de de'i drung nas log pa ste/_cig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/_nor bu'i snod 'di rin thang chod cig_/
[\[236b.5\]]des de'i rin thang thog tu bab par bcad nas des smras pa/_'di snyed kyi rin thang re zhig bdag la mi bdog go/_/des smras pa/_ci bdog pa de byin la khyer cig_/des blangs so/_/nor bu mkhan cig shos po des thos nas/_de mi bzod pa skyes te/_de'i drung du song nas bdag 
[\[236b.6\]]gis 'di thog mar khyim du khrid cing bdag gis 'di'i rin thang yang bcad na khyod kyis ci'i phyir bkur/_de gnyis phan tshun 'khon byung bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nor bu mkhan nor bu'i snod rin thang chung ngur gcod pa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 
[\[236b.7\]]'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nor bu mkhan cig shos rin thang thog tu bab par gcod pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_de na yang nged phan tshun mi mthun par gyur te/_da ltar yang nged phan tshun mi mthun par gyur to/_/gzhan yang ji ltar nged mi mthun par gyur pa 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' 
[\[237a.2\]]mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na khye'u zhig btsas so/_/btsas nas de'i chung ma shi'o/_/des bsams pa/_khye'u gsor gzhug pa'i phyir gzhan zhig blang ngo snyam nas des gzhan zhig blangs te/_de 
[\[237a.3\]]de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las de las kyang khye'u zhig btsas nas de yang shi'o/_/khyim bdag des bsams pa/_gal te gzhan blangs na de yang shi bar 'gyur gyis khye'u phu bo shos kyi khyim dbub par bya'o snyam nas de'i khye'u phu bo shos kyi 
[\[237a.4\]]khyim phub pa las de las khye'u dang bu mo mang du btsas so/_/de'i chung ma des smras pa/_rje'i sras khye'u 'di khyod kyi cir mchi/_des smras pa/_spun du 'ong ste nu bo yin no/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod la ni sras mang la/_'di ni gcig pu lags na/_'di dag dang 'di'i 
[\[237a.5\]]khyim dang longs spyod mnyam par stsal lam/_des smras pa/_bzang mo 'di ni 'jig rten gyi chos yin no/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras gal te de lta na 'di khum shig_/'dod pa la so sor sen pa ni sdig pa'i las mi byed pa ci yang med pas des de me tog dang 'bras bu la brid nas 
[\[237a.6\]]dgon par khrid de rdos bsnun te bsad do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gi bu phu bo shos gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nu bo shos gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_de na yang 'dis nga la mi mthun par byas so/_/da 
[\[237a.7\]]ltar yang 'dis nga la mi mthun par byas so/_/gzhan yang nged ji ltar mi mthun par gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na bu mo gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig btsas so/_/bram ze des bsams pa/_de ring 
[\[237b.2\]]bdag gi khyim du bram ze su bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa de la bu mo 'di bsod snyoms kyi gor sbyin no snyam mo/_/ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir de'i khyim du zhugs nas bkra shis par gyur cig_/bsod snyoms byin cig_/bram ze des de la bos te smras pa/_
[\[237b.3\]]bram ze'i khye'u bu mo gzhon nu 'di bdag gis khyod la bsod snyoms kyi gor sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_de ring mi blang gi nyi ma dang yud tsam dag bstun nas blang ngo zhes song ngo /_/ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir de'i khyim du zhugs nas bkra shis par 
[\[237b.4\]]gyur cig_/bsod snyoms byin cig_/bram ze des de la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u bu mo gzhon nu 'di bdag gis khyod la bsod snyoms kyi gor sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_'dir bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig bsod snyoms la zhugs na de la ci'i phyir ma byin/_des smras pa/_
[\[237b.5\]]de na re rgyu skar mi bzang zhes zer ro/_/des smras pa/_gal te de ltar na blang bar bgyi'o/_/bram zes smras pa/_khyod rgyu skar la ci'i phyir mi sdod/_des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_don rnams grub par gyur na ni/_/de dag thams cad mthun pa ste/_/rgyu skar thams cad bzang po 
[\[237b.6\]]yin/_/nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin/_/rgyu skar rtsi ba lhur len pa'i/_/mi rnams don ni nyams 'gyur te/_/'di yi don ni rgyu skar yin/_/skar ma rnams kyis ci zhig bya/_/zhes smras nas des khyer te song ngo /_/bram ze gzhan po des bram ze de las bram ze che ge mo 
[\[237b.7\]]zhes bya bas bu mo khyer ro zhes thos nas de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi bu mo de sngar thob zin na khyod kyis ci'i phyir bkur/_des smras pa/_rgyu skar rtsi ba lhur len pa khyod re zhig rgyu skar la rtogs shig_/kho bo la ni rgyu skar bzang ngo zhes byas pa dang de 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]khros par gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u snga ma shos gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u phyi ma shos gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de na yang 'di nga la mi 
[\[238a.2\]]mthun par gyur to/_/da ltar yang 'di nga dang mi mthun par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i glang po che gdug pa nor skyong zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de nyin re zhing khyim nas byung 
[\[238a.3\]]ba na skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do/_/rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la gsol ba btab pa/_lha glang po che gdug pa nor skyong gdugs re zhing gnas nas byung ba na lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su skye bo mang po 
[\[238a.4\]]kha 'dog par bgyid kyis/_lhas glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams la bka' stsal te ci nas gdugs re zhing mi 'byung bar sang lta bu 'byin pa na yang dril sgrogs su stsal ba'i rigs so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de bzhin du byas khyed deng shig_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo 
[\[238a.5\]]ba/_shes ldan dag glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams khug shig_/de rnams kyis glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams bkug pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis nga la gsol ba/_glang po che gdug pa nor skyong 
[\[238a.6\]]gdugs re zhing gnas nas byung ba na lam po che dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnams su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par bgyid kyis/_lhas glang po che 'dul mkhan rnams la bka' stsal te/_ci nas gdugs re zhing mi dbyung bar sang lta bu 'byin pa na yang dril sgrogs su stsal ba'i rigs 
[\[238a.7\]]so zhes gsol gyis/_khyed kyis de nyin re zhing ma dbyung bar sang lta bu 'byin pa na yang dril sgrogs shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra las mnyan nas rkang pa la gtugs te dong ngo /_/rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag phyug 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig gnas pa des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/_/lha sbyin gyis ji ltar khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan 
[\[238b.2\]]drangs pa thos nas des glang po che'i 'dul mkhan la mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba byin nas smras pa/_khyim bdag che ge mos dge sbyong gau ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyis de la khyod kyis glang po che nor skyong rbod cig_/des 
[\[238b.3\]]smras pa/_'phags pa de bzhin du bgyi lags kyis/_'on kyang 'ol byi lha la yang mkhyen par mdzod cig_/de nas lha sbyin rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis ni bdag sangs rgyas nyid du gzhug 
[\[238b.4\]]ma nus na khyod kyis yab srog dang bral nas rgyal srid la 'dug na bdag gis kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma bsad la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byas/_glang po che dam pa nor skyong rbod cig_/ma skyes dgras smras pa/_khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ma thul ba 'dul bar mdzad 
[\[238b.5\]]pa yin no zhes ma thos sam/_des smras pa/_gal te ma dul ba 'dul ba yin par gyur na 'dis re zhig bdag kho na 'dul bar 'gyur grang zhes des de la 'ol byi smras nas/_glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams kyi drung du song ste smras pa/_lha la yang bdag gis rig par byas kyis khyod 
[\[238b.6\]]kyis sang glang po che dam pa nor skyong rbod cig_/de nas glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du dril bsgrags nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i grong mi shes ldan dag nyon cig_/sang glang po che dam pa nor skyong gtong gis de bas na khyed cag thams cad sang rang 
[\[238b.7\]]rang srung ba la sgrims shig ces bsgrags pa/_khyim bdag des thos nas bdag 'dra ba byur ngan pa bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na glang po che gdug pa nor skyong yang sang gtong na bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]slong gi dge 'dun ji ltar gdugs tshod gsol bar bya snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/yang bsams pa/_g.yos byas la de nyid du khyer te bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol lo snyam nas des de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' 
[\[239a.2\]]ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dril bsgrags pa/_sang glang po che dam pa nor skyong gtong gis khyed cag rang rang srung ba la sgrims shig ces mchi bas/_de bas na bcom 
[\[239a.3\]]ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu ma gshegs shig_/zhal zas dang btung ba 'tshal te bdag 'di nyid du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag khyod sems las chung ngur gyis la zhal zas dang btung ba sta gon byos shig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[239a.4\]]ni glang po che'i bsnyengs pa dang bral ba yin pas nga nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs so/_/de nas khyim bdag yid dga' nas rang gi khyim du song ste zhal zas dang btung ba sta gon byas gdan bshams nas bcom ldan 'das la sdod cing 'dug go/_/
[\[239a.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' chos gos mnabs lhung bzed bsnams te dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs cig rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs pa na glang po che dam pa nor skyong yang rbad do/_/glang po che'i dam pa nor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 
[\[239a.6\]]'gying zhing skad phyung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su mod la shugs ci yod pas bang thag pas brgyugs so/_/de nas lha sbyin ma skyes dgra'i grogs can steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir 'dzegs nas dge sbyong gau ta ma gsod pa la lta zhing 'dug go/_/de nas lha sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[239a.7\]]de mthong nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' bas gsang bstod de tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_glang po che yi las bltas na/_/khyod ni glang chen mthus brdzis nas/_/shAkya'i bu khyod de ring du/_/nyan thos bcas te re snyam med/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]stsal pa/_lha sbyin ngan khyod nga la ni/_/khyad gsod co 'dri smra bar byed/_/stobs bcu'i stobs ldan rmad byung ba'i/_/stobs kyi mthu la da ltos shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa'i mthil nas seng ge ral pa can lnga sprul to/_/des de rnams kyi dri tshor nas 
[\[239b.2\]]gcin dang rtug pa shor te 'bros par brtsams pa na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi zhabs kyi drung grang zhing bsil bar gyur pa ma gtogs par phyogs thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas glang 
[\[239b.3\]]po che dam pa nor skyong phan tshun du brgyug par brtsams pa na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du grang zhing bsil bar gyur pa ma gtogs par phyogs thams cad 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_/me lce gcig tu gyur par mthong ngo /_/nor skyong 'khrugs pa mthong 
[\[239b.4\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ma gtogs par dge slong thams cad bros so/_/de nas nor skyong dregs pa'i shugs dang bral nas dal gyis 'gro ba'i 'gros kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_/g.yung 
[\[239b.5\]]drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa/_bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/_skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas de'i mgo la byugs nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_glang chen gtso bo la ni tho ma 'tsham/_/glang chen de la tho 'tsham sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/gtso la gnod 
[\[239b.6\]]pa byas pa pha rol tu/_/'gro ba bzang por 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod re zhig sngon gyi nyes par spyad pas dman pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes na khyod da dung gzhan gyi srog gcod cing gzhan gyi srog gcod pas yongs su dga' bar byed pa 'di nas shi 'phos na khyod kyi 'gro 
[\[239b.7\]]ba ni cir 'gyur/_skye ba ni gang tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de lta bas na 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/_chos thams cad ni bdag med pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba yin gyis/_nga la sems mngon par dad par gyis la ci nas kyang dud 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]'gro'i skyes gnas la 'dod chags dang bral bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas khyim bdag gi khyim gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/nor skyong yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin song ste 
[\[240a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegs pa na sgo drung du sdod pa las bcom ldan 'das ma mthong nas khyim gzhig par brtsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim de shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul nas de la sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par snang ngo /_/des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas de ma 
[\[240a.3\]]bshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig gdugs tshod gsol nas yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs so/_/de bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin song ba'i skabs de blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la rig par byas so/_/ma skyes dgras lha sbyin 
[\[240a.4\]]la smras pa/_khyod kyis bdag la gnod pa byas te/_glang po che dam pa 'di la brten nas mtshams gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams kho bo la gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur na de yang khyod kyis dul bar byas so/_/de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_gang 
[\[240a.5\]]gi tshe bcom ldan 'das phyir byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe glang po che dam pa nor skyong ji ltar yang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi 'gyur bar sgo chod la zhog shig_/blon po rnams kyis glang po che 'dul mkhan rnams la bsgo ba/_glang po che dam pa nor skyong ji ltar yang bcom 
[\[240a.6\]]ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar sgo chod la zhog shig_/des bcom ldan 'das ma mthong nas rdog pas sna brdzis nas shi ba dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes so//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgya rtsa bzhi pa/_chos nyid kyis lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo 
[\[240a.7\]]ni skyes nas ring por ma lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis yin pa'o/_/des glang po che las shi 'phos pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]mngon par dad par byas pa yin par mthong nas/_de nas sngon glang po che byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen 
[\[240b.2\]]bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon glang po che byed byed pa'i lha'i bu rna cha dri ma med cing g.yo ba thogs la/_do shal dang se mo dos lus brgyan nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha rnams kyi me tog ut+pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mud dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra 
[\[240b.3\]]ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_
[\[240b.4\]]bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas sngon gyi glang po che lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes 
[\[240b.5\]]bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/_btsun pa bdag la phas ma bgyis te/_mas ma lags/_rgyal pos ma lags/_lha rnams kyis ma lags/_sdug pas 
[\[240b.6\]]ma lags/_rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/_sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/_dge sbyong dang bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/_
[\[240b.7\]]ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/_bdag lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag_/yang gsol pa/_khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/_/ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i/_/mtho ris 'gro ba phye bzhin bdag 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]gis ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/_/shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/_/de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing /_/go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur/_/'gro bar 
[\[241a.2\]]lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dkon pa/_/thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/_/de nas gdud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas/_/zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas/_/dgra thul 
[\[241a.3\]]g.yas nas g.yon du bskor byas nas/_/lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song /_/de nas sngon glang po che byed byed pa'i lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /_zhing pa lo thog legs pa lta bu dang /_dpa' bo g.yul ngo rgyal ba lta bu dang /_nad pa 
[\[241a.4\]]nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na/_de rnams 
[\[241a.5\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na snang ba rgya chen po mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang yid gnyis su gyur te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mdang sum bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha rnams 
[\[241a.6\]]kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang ma yin/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin/_'jig rten 
[\[241a.7\]]skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin te/_de lta mod kyi dge slong dag khyed kyis glang po che dam pa nor skyong zhes bya ba 'di ltar gdug pa/_'di ltar gtum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa bgrongs pa'i phyir pha rol gnon pa byas pa gang yin pa de mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/ngas de 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]btul nas nga la mngon par dad par byas te shi nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa yin te/_de mdang sum nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bshad de bden pa mthong bar byas nas rang gi gnas su song ba yin no/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams 
[\[241b.2\]]cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa nor skyong gis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gror skyes lags/_las ci zhig bgyis na des na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/_bcom 
[\[241b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nor skyong 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras 
[\[241b.4\]]bur 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na 'jig rten du ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten 
[\[241b.5\]]mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_'od srung zhes bya ba byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI zhes bya bar nye bar brten nas drang srong smra ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung ste zhal ta byed pa na 
[\[241b.6\]]de na 'di bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo phra mo rnams la gus par ma byas pas las de nyid kyi rnam par smin pas dud 'gror skyes par gyur to/_/de na 'dis dge 'dun la bkur sti byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des bza' ba dang btung ba thob par gyur to/_/nga la sems mngon 
[\[241b.7\]]par dad par byas te shi ba gang yin pa des rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rab tu byung nas bklag pa dang /_mnod par byas shing phung po la mkhas par byas/_khams la mkhas par byas/_skye mched la 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]mkhas par byas/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas par byas pa gang yin pa des lhar gyur nas nga las bden pa mthong bar byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste/_
[\[242a.2\]]dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//_//sdom ni/_ngang pa gad rgyangs dbyung ba dang /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rul dang spre'u dang ni/_/glang po che dang byi la dang /_/ba lang zla ba rdo ba dang /_/glang chen wa dang bram ze'o/_/dge slong rnams 
[\[242a.3\]]the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyas yongs su btang na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos yongs su ma btang ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[242a.4\]]dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang kun dga' bo 'dis nga yongs su ma btang ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba mtsho chen po ma dros pa na ngang pa'i dpon po yul 'khor skyong zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de la bu gnyis yod la/_gang 
[\[242a.5\]]ba dang /_bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba ste/_gang ba ni phu bo yin no/_/bzhin rgyas ni nu bo yin no/_/de gnyis las gang ba ni gtum pa/_brlang ba/_gzu lums can zhig ste rtag tu ngang pa rnams la sdigs par byed de/_kha cig la sgro 'byin/_kha cig la 
[\[242a.6\]]ni sder mos rma 'byin par byed cing de lta bu dang gzhan yang gnod pa brgya phrag dag byed de/_ngang pa rnams nyi ma re re zhing ngang pa rnams kyi dpon po yul 'khor skyong gi gan du song ste rig par byed nas des bsams pa/_gang ba gtum pa/_brlang ba/_gzu lums can 
[\[242a.7\]]yin pas gal te bdag gis 'di rgyal tshab la bzhag na bdag shi nas 'dis ngang pa'i tshogs bshig par 'gyur gyis/_de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam mo/_/des gang ba dang bzhin rgyas gnyis bkug nas bsgo ba/_'bab chu'i dngo dang mtsho dang mtshe'u rnams 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]bltas nas/_nga'i drung du thog mar su 'ongs pa de ngang pa rnams kyi dpon por gzhug go/_/de gnyis kyang gcig la gcig 'gran pa'i phyir 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang dong ste/_de gnyis kyis phan tshun gyi 'bab chu'i dngo dang mtsho dang mtshe'u rnams bltas nas mthar gyis grong khyer bA 
[\[242b.2\]]rA Na sIr phyin to/_/de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/des bA rA Na sI'i skyed mos tshal dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 
[\[242b.3\]]tshangs ldan zhes bya ba'i rdzing mtshe'u bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa zhig rkor bcug ste/_der chu nas skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed do/_/'gram dang phyogs bzhi kun tu yang me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing stong phrag du ma bskyed do/_/der ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mud 
[\[242b.4\]]dang /_pad ma dkar pos yog par byas shing shing tshang tshing du mas mdzes pa/_bya sna tshogs mang po skad 'byin pa'i 'byor pa de lta bu de mthong nas ngang pa gang ba 'khor lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te babs nas ci dga' ba'i spyod pa rtse bar brtsams so/_/bzhin rgyas la rang rang gi 
[\[242b.5\]]tshogs kyis smras pa/_khyod kyang bobs la rtsed mo gyis shig_/des smras pa/_re zhig rgyal srid blangs la de nas phyis log ste rtse bar bya'o zhes de rings pa rings par song ste rgyal srid blangs so/_/de nas de ngang pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te bA rA Na sIr 'ongs nas tshangs ldan 
[\[242b.6\]]gyi rdzing du babs te bag rkyong zhing bag rkyong zhing gnas pas rtse bar brtsams so/_/de de ltar bag yod pas gnas pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/_kye ma ngang pa'i dpon po mchog tu gzugs blta na sdug pa gang nas 'dir 'ongs te/_gzugs 
[\[242b.7\]]bzang pos chu na rgyu ba'i 'dab chags thams cad zil gyis mnan nas tshangs ldan gyi rdzing gi rgyan byed cing dga' bar gnas shing 'jig rten dga' ba skyed par byed/_bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang thos nas tshangs ldan gyi rdzing kun nas bskor te/_de'i 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]gzugs bzang po dang /_bag rkyong zhing gnas pa na rtog cing 'khod do/_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha ngang pa rnams kyi dpon po zhig ga zhig nas 'dir mchis te tshangs ldan gyi rdzing du babs nas ngang pa brgya phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing gzugs 
[\[243a.2\]]bzang pos chab na rgyu ba'i 'dab chags thams cad zil gyis mnan nas 'jig rten dga' ba bskyed cing bag rkyong zhing mchis lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na bya pa rnams khug shig_/de rnams kyis bkug pa dang rgyal pos bsgo ba/_shes ldan 
[\[243a.3\]]dag tshangs ldan gyi rdzing na ngang pa'i dpon po gzugs mchog tu blta na sdug pa zhig gzhig nas 'ongs so zhes thos kyis khyed kyis de gcig pu rnyis ma snad par zung la nga la phul cig_/de rnams kyis de mchog tu rnyi 'jam pos ma snad par gzung ba dang des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_
[\[243a.4\]]kho bo rnyis ni dam por bzung zin te/_/mi yi dbang du song bas kho bo la/_/ci byar med kyis ngang pa'i tshogs deng de/_/ma dros par ni myur du 'dod bar gyis/_/ngang pa gcig gis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba ni bros so/_/gcig pu zhig rnyis zin pa de nyid la mya ngan byed cing 'dug pa de bya pa 
[\[243a.5\]]rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes zhing rgyal pos skrag nas ma bzung ma bsad de/_de rnams kyis ngang pa'i dpon po de khyer nas rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang /_cig shos ma bzung ba de yang chags pa'i rnyis bzung bas rang nyid 'ongs so/_/ngang pa'i dpon po rgyal po la 
[\[243a.6\]]phul ba dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag cig shos 'di ci'i phyir khyer te 'ongs de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bdag cag gis 'di ma bzung mod kyi rang nyid mchis lags so/_/rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/_gdon mi za bar 'di ni de'i chung ma yin 
[\[243a.7\]]pas 'ongs kyis ngang pa'i dpon po 'di dang spa shug lhan cig thong la khyed cag su yang 'di gnyis ma gsod cig_/bya pa rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gzhan gyis bkum du mchis bka' stsal du gsol/_rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la grong khyer bA rA Na sIr 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]dril sgrogs su chug ste/_lha nyid kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga'i yul na gnas pa sus kyang chu na rgyu ba'i 'dab chags rnams ma gsad cig ces sgrogs shig_/de rnams kyis dril bsgrags so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ngang pa'i dpon po bzhin rgyas gang yin 
[\[243b.2\]]pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi de'i chung ma gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin no/_/ngang pa gcig gis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba gang yin pa de ni dge slong lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba 'di dag nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di rnams ngang par gyur pa na da yongs su btang ste/_kun 
[\[243b.3\]]dga' bo ngang par gyur pas ni nga yongs su ma btang ngo /_/da ltar yang nga 'di dag gis yongs su btang gi dge slong kun dga' bos ni yongs su ma btang ngo /_/dge slong dag gzhan yang ji ltar 'di dag gis nga yongs su btang na dge slong kun dga' bos yongs su ma btang ba de nyon cig_/dge 
[\[243b.4\]]slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po gang rgyangs can zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa skye bo'i tshogs dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/_/de la blon po lnga brgya yod de/_de rnams kyi mthus mtshams kyi rgyal po 
[\[243b.5\]]rnams kyis zil gyis mi non to/_/ji tsam na lho phyogs kyi lam nas bya ma bum gyi dbyug gu can zhes bya ba dmag stong thub pa zhig 'ongs nas/_de blon po gzhan zhig gis rgyal po la phul te/_lha bya ma bum gyi dbyug gu can zhes bgyi ba dmag stong thub pa 'di lha'i slad du lho phyogs kyi shul 
[\[243b.6\]]nas mchis kyis/_lhas 'di yongs su bzung ba'i rigs so/_/rgyal pos de yongs su bzung nas longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' yang byas so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gang rgyangs can gyi yul gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams mthu dang dpung chen por gyur to/_/de rnams dpung gi 
[\[243b.7\]]tshogs yan lag bzhi po glang po che ba'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas rgyal po gad rgyangs can dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir 'ongs so/_/rgyal po gad rgyangs can gyis kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po glang po che 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas sa gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir spags te bsu'o/_/rgyal po gad rgyangs can gyis sa gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams bcom/_bred par 
[\[244a.2\]]byas/_thag bcug_/pam par byas/_rgyab kyis bltas par byas te/_rang rang gi yul du dong ngo /_/de rnams slar yang 'dus nas rgyal po gad rgyangs can gyi blon po lnga brgya la khyed cag tshur sheg shig dang /_khyed cag las longs spyod ches khyad par du 'phags pa dag gis bgo 
[\[244a.3\]]bsha' bya'o zhes yo byad kyis kha drangs pa dang de rnams kyis khas blangs so/_/de nas sa gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams kyis slar yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas 
[\[244a.4\]]rgyal po gad rgyangs can dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir 'ongs so/_/rgyal po gad rgyangs can gyis kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas sa gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams dang 
[\[244a.5\]]g.yul sprad pa'i phyir spags te bsu'o/_/gad rgyangs can gyi blon po lnga brgya g.yul sprad pa na phyir log nas bya ma bum gyi dbyug gu can dmag stong thub dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par brtsams pa rgyal pos mthong nas bag tsha bar gyur pa dang /_bya ma bum gyi dbyug gu can dmag stong 
[\[244a.6\]]thub kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyed ni bya ma bum gyi dbyug_/grogs po gcig pus ma btang gi/_/yun ring po nas gnang ba yi/_/grogs po kun gyis khyod btang ngo /_/des de dag thams cad kha btag go/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 
[\[244a.7\]]rgyal po gad rgyangs can gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bya ma bum gyi dbyug gu can gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin no/_/blon po lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di dag gis nga yongs su btang ngo /_/da ltar yang 'di 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]dag gis nga yongs su btang gi kun dga' bos ni yongs su ma btang ngo /_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'di dag gis nga yongs su btang gi kun dga' bos yongs su ma btang ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na ri'i phyogs shig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi 
[\[244b.2\]]dpon po seng ger gyur te/_de'i lhag ma za ba wa lnga brgya rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing ri la nye bar brten te gnas so/_/seng ges srog chags rnams bsad de sha'i dam pa dang khrag gi dam pa de 'thungs nas bor te 'gro bas de rnams de lta bus dus ring mo zhig 'das par gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan 
[\[244b.3\]]zhig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge mtshan mo srog chags tshol ba na khron par lhung ba dang wa lnga brgya po de rnams las wa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba so sor dong ste/_wa gcig pu zhig seng ge la rtog cing khron pa'i khar 'dug ste gang gis na 'di phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs de ci yod snyam sems shing 
[\[244b.4\]]de khron pa'i nyen kor phan tshun song ba las ji tsam na khron pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na mtshe'u zhig mthong nas/_des brtags nas phyogs gcig nas 'og brus bcug ste khron par mtshe'u'i chus bkang ba dang /_seng ge rang nyid byung bar gyur to/_/lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_stobs 
[\[244b.5\]]che ba 'am gzhan kyang rung /_/grogs po dag tu bya dgos te/_/was ni khron pa rnying pa nas/_/seng ge phyung bar gyur la ltos/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi seng ge gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gcig po gang yin pa de ni dge slong kun
