[\[244b.6\]]dga' bo yin no/_/wa gcig gis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba gang yin pa de ni dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag yin te/_de na yang 'di dag gis nga yongs su btang gi kun dga' bos ni yongs su ma btang ngo /_/da ltar yang 'di dag gis nga yongs su btang gi kun dga' bos ni yongs su ma btang 
[\[244b.7\]]ngo /_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'di dag gis nga yongs su btang na kun dga' bos yongs su ma btang ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na phyogs shig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lnga brgya'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon por gyur to/_/ji tsam na rngon pa zhig gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]rnams bshor ba'i phyir mdzol dang /_rnyi dang /_rnyong rab tu mang po dag btsugs so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po de bag rkyong zhing gnas pas 'khor lnga brgya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rgyu zhing de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs rnams kyi sna la 'gro ba na rnyis zin to/_/rnyis zin pa de 
[\[245a.2\]]mthong nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]thams cad ni bros so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo gcig pu zhig tshogs kyi dpon po'i drung na 'dug go/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po de 'bad kyang rnyi gcad par ma nus shing de de ltar phra shags byed pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo des mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rnyi 'di gang gis btsugs 
[\[245a.3\]]pa yi/_/rngon pa de ni mchi lags kyis/_/skal chen po ni 'bad mdzod cig_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dam pa 'bad mdzod cig_/des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rmig pa sar btsugs 'then kyang ni/_/'breng ba'i rnyi ni dam po yis/_/bdag gis rkang pa rab smas kyi/_/gcad mi 
[\[245a.4\]]nus na ci byar yod/_/de nas rngon pa de mda' dang gzhu lag par thogs shing gos ngur smrig bgos nas phyogs der phyin to/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo des rngon pa de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po de bsad pa'i phyir bsgrims pas nye bar 'ongs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang rings pa rings par tshigs su bcad de 
[\[245a.5\]]smras pa/_rnyi 'di gang gis btsugs pa yi/_/rngon pa de ni mchis lags kyi/_/skal chen da ni 'bad mdzod cig_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dam pa 'bad mdzod cig_/des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rmig pa sar btsugs 'then kyang ni/_/'breng ba'i rnyi ni dam po yis/_/bdag gi rkang 
[\[245a.6\]]pa rab smas kyis/_/bcad mi nus na ci byar yod/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo de snying stongs nas rngon pa de'i mdun du mngon du song ste/_de la bsnyen nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rngon pa gzhu ni phob mdzod la/_/rngon pa ral gri blang mdzod de/_/thog mar bdag khum de nas ni/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[245a.7\]]dpon po la mdzod cig_/de nas rngon pa de ngo mtshar gyis bsdus pa'i blos bsams pa 'di khyod kyi cir 'ong /_des smras pa/_khyim thab bo/_/des de la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/_bdag gis khyod kyang mi bsad la/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dpon po'ang mi bsad par/_/snying du sdug pa'i 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]khyim thab dang /_/khyod ni lhan cig 'grogs par bya/_/des kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_ji ltar rngon pa bdag dang ni/_/sdug pa'i khyim thab dga' ba ltar/_/de bzhin rngon pa gnyen kun dang /_/lhan cig tu ni dgar gyur cig_/de nas rngon pa de lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes 
[\[245b.2\]]nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de bkrol nas lhan cig dong ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dpon po gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin no/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gcig gis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba bros pa gang yin 
[\[245b.3\]]pa de dag ni dge slong gcig gis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba 'di dag nyid yin te/_de na yang nga 'di dag gis yongs su btang gi kun dga' bos ni yongs su ma btang ngo /_/da ltar yang nga 'di dag gis yongs su btang gi dge slong kun dga' bos ni yongs su ma btang ngo /_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te 
[\[245b.4\]]the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa lha sbyin rul pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti rul pas bcom pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang rul pa 
[\[245b.5\]]'di rnyed pa dang bkur sti rul pas bcom pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri'i phyogs gcig cig na pad ma'i rdzing chen po zhig yod de/_de dang nye ba na glang po che zhig gnas so/_/phyogs gzhan zhig na wa zhig kyang gnas so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na glang po che pad ma'i rdzing de nas 
[\[245b.6\]]chu 'thungs nas 'gro ba dang wa 'ong ba des glang po che la smras pa/_'thab mo bya'am lam las 'dzur/_glang po ches bsams pa/_rul pa nyon mongs spyi rtol can 'di gal te bdag gis rkang lag gis sam/_snas sam/_mche bas bsad na mi gtsang bas ma rung bar 'gyur bas mdor na 
[\[245b.7\]]rul pa 'di ni rul pa kho nas bsad do snyam du bsams nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod ni rkang lag gis mi bsad/_/mche bas ma yin snas min te/_/rul pa rul pas bsad bya bas/_/khyod ni rul pas bsad par bya/_/glang po ches bsams pa/_lam bzur te song dang 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]gdon mi za bar 'ong bdag gi rjes bzhin 'ong ngo snyam nas/_des lam bzur nas myur ba myur bar song ba dang /_was bsams pa/_tshig tsam kho nas bdag gis 'di bcom pa yin te/_des na myur ba myur bar bros so snyam nas/_/de'i rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 
[\[246a.2\]]'brengs pa dang /_glang po ches nye bar 'ongs par shes nas shugs drag pos de'i steng du rtug pa bor bas phog nas shi bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang rul pa 'di rul pas bcom mo/_/da ltar 
[\[246a.3\]]yang rul pa 'di rnyed pa dang bkur sti rul pas bcom mo/_/gzhan yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gzigs pa'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs 
[\[246a.4\]]pa chen po legs par rgal bar gyur la/_lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag ni tshul ma lags pas ma rung bar gyur pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i 
[\[246a.5\]]dus na yang nga'i tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'jigs pa chen po las thar la lha sbyin gyi tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rung par gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig dang nye ba me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa na spre'u'i 
[\[246a.6\]]tshogs kyi dpon po gnyis shig gnas te/_re re la yang 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do/_/de na tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na bdag gson po nyid du 'khor lnga brgya dang zangs su bcug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang skrag sngangs bred de skyi bung zhes byed nas nam do 
[\[246a.7\]]ma nangs te nangs pa dang spre'u rnams bsogs te rmi lam bzlas par brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag mdang sum ngas rmi lam ngan pa zhig mthong gis/_gnas 'di nas 'dir 'dong ngo /_/spre'u rnams kyis smras pa/_de bzhin du bgyis te 'bros par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]rnams ni rmi lam rno ba yin pas bdag nyid chen po des tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos la smras pa/_bdag gis rmi lam 'di 'dra ba rmis nas 'dong na gzhan du 'dong ngam/_de yid ma ches nas smras pa/_ci rmi lam du rmis so cog bden par 'gyur ram/_gal te khyod 'gro na song shig_/
[\[246b.2\]]kho bo ni spyod yul ches yangs par 'gyur bas mi 'gro'o/_/des de yid ma ches par rig nas bdag nyid kyis tshogs dang de dong ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ri 'or de na bran mo zhig thab na yos rngod na ma stes pas lug cig 'khyam zhing phyogs der phyin nas de nas de dag bza' bar brtsams 
[\[246b.3\]]pa dang de 'gal dum gyis bsnun pas me 'bar bzhin rgyal po'i glang po che'i bres su zhugs pa 'bar ba des glang po che'i bres bsregs te glang po che mang po zhig tshig go/_/rgyal pos sman pa bkug ste smras pa/_glang po che mes tshig pa rnams la dpyad ci yod/_sman pa de'i nas kyi zhing spre'u 
[\[246b.4\]]rnams kyis ma rung bar byas pas des bsams pa/_spre'u 'di rnams la sha gnyer ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_lha spre'u'i zhag gis glang po che rnams bskus na gsos par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag spre'u'i zhag sta gon 
[\[246b.5\]]gyis shig_/de rnams kyis kyang rngon pa rnams la bsgo ba dang /_rngon pa rnams kyis ri 'or gyi nye 'khor na gnas pa'i spre'u thams cad bzung ste phul lo/_/sman pa yun ring po nas sha khon rjes su 'brel bas gson po nyid du zangs su bcug go/_/lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_
[\[246b.6\]]grong rdal dang ni grong khyer na/_/mi mthun yod par gnas mi bya/_/lug dang bran mo mi mthun pas/_/spre'u rnams dag ni brlag par gyur/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u'i tshogs kyi dpon po rmi lam rno ba gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i 
[\[246b.7\]]dus kyi tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang nga'i tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'jigs pa chen po las rab tu thar ro/_/lha sbyin gyi tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rungs par gyur to/_/da ltar yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa chen po las rab tu thar te/_lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rungs par gyur to/_/gzhan yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa 
[\[247a.2\]]de dag ni bde legs su dong bar gyur cing /_lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal du gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba phyogs shig na spre'u'i tshogs kyi dpon po 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya pa gnyis shig gnas so/_/
[\[247a.3\]]de na cig shos tshogs dang lhan cig ljongs su dong ste rim gyis ri 'or zhig tu phyin pa dang /_ri 'or de na shing kim pa ka zhes bya ba 'bras bus yal ga g.yur za bar 'dug nas spre'u rnams kyis tshogs kyi dpon po la smras pa/_tshogs kyi dpon po ljon shing lhag par 'bras bu chags 
[\[247a.4\]]pa 'bras bus yal ga g.yur za ba zhig mchis kyis 'o skol dub pa 'bras bu rnams gsol lo/_/tshogs kyi dpon pos shing de la brtags nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_grong gi drung na 'dug kyang ni/_/byis pas 'di la ma zos pas/_/rjes su dpags na shing 'di yi/_/
[\[247a.5\]]'bras bu bzar mi rung bar shes/_/zhes smras nas dong ngo /_/tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos kyang tshogs de nyid kyi rjes bzhin 'brangs nas rim gyis ri 'or der phyin pa dang /_spre'u rnams kyis kim pa ka'i ljon shing de mthong nas de rnams kyis tshogs kyi dpon po la smras pa/_tshogs 
[\[247a.6\]]kyi dpon po ljon shing gi 'bras bu mchis kyis 'o skol dub pa 'bras bu rnams la gsol la bde bar bzhud do/_/des smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/de rnams kyis zos pa dang thams cad tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du 
[\[247a.7\]]sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshogs kyi dpon po dang po pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dpon po gnyis pa shos gang yin pa de lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde legs su dong ngo /_/lha sbyin gyi 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/da ltar yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde legs su 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las rgal to/_/lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa 
[\[247b.2\]]de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rungs par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe lha sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bgrongs pa'i phyir rdo 'phangs pa de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'khrugs nas lha sbyin bsad kyis 'dong ngo zhes byas pa dang /_'jig rten ni mdza' ba dang /_mi mdza' ba dang /_bar ma 
[\[247b.3\]]dag yod pas gzhan zhig lha sbyin la sbran nas de skrag nas shing drung zhig tu brten te spyod lam zhi bas 'dug go/_/de rnams kyis de ltar spyod lam zhi ba mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag lha sbyin bdag nyid chen po 'di bcom ldan 'das bgrongs par ga la 'gyur/_kha cig gis 
[\[247b.4\]]bdag cag bslus kyis tshur 'dong ngo zhes de rnams dong ngo /_/dge slong rnams kyis lha sbyin de lta bu'i spyod lam gyis gnas pas des na grong mi 'khrugs kyang ma bsad do/_/zhes thos nas de rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun 
[\[247b.5\]]pa lha sbyin gyi chos lta bu'i sgo nas 'jig rten bslus pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di chos lta bu'i sgo nas byi ba rnams brid pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 
[\[247b.6\]]phyogs shig na byi ba rnams kyi tshogs kyi dpon po 'khor lnga brgya pa zhig gnas so/_/byi la me skyes zhes bya ba zhig yod do/_/gzhon pa'i gnas skabs na phyogs gang du gnas pa'i nye 'khor du des byi ba thams cad bsad do/_/de yang dus gzhan zhig na rgas par gyur te rgas 
[\[247b.7\]]pas pha rol gnon pas byi ba gzung mi nus nas des bsams pa/_sngon bdag gzhon pa'i gnas skabs na ni pha rol gnon pas byi ba 'dzin nus na da ni mi nus te 'on kyang thabs shig bshams la bza'o snyam nas de 'jab cing 'jab cing byi ba rnams btsal bar brtsams te/_des btsal 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]ba na byi ba lnga brgya'i tshogs yod par shes nas/_de byi ba de rnams kyi khung bu dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu ngan g.yo'i dka' thub kyis dka' thub byed pa na/_byi ba rnams phan tshun 'khyams pas spyod lam zhi bas gnas pa de mthong nas/_de rnams kyis rgyang ring 
[\[248a.2\]]bor 'dug nas smras pa/_zhang po ci byed/_des smras pa/_kho bo gzhon pa'i gnas skabs na bsod nams ma yin pa mang du byas pas de zad par bya ba'i phyir dka' thub spyod do/_/de rnams kyis 'dis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spangs so zhes de la chos kyi rgyu las byung ba'i dad pa 
[\[248a.3\]]skyes par gyur to/_/de rnams de la nyi ma re re zhing bskor ba byas nas khung du 'jug pa na/_des de rnams kyi nang gi tha ma bzung zhing bzung zhing za'o/_/ji tsam na tshogs de 'gribs nas tshogs kyi dpon pos bsams pa/_bdag gi byi ba rnams ni nyung bar gyur la byi la 'di ni nyam skyes 
[\[248a.4\]]par gyur pas 'di la ni rgyu zhig yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des byi la de la brtag par brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na rtug pa spu can du mthong nas des bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar 'dis byi ba rnams bsad par gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis ni mngon sum du bab par bya'o 
[\[248a.5\]]snyam nas/_des de mi mngon pa'i sa nas brtag pa lhur len cing gnas pa na/_ji tsam na des de tha ma'i byi ba za ba mthong nas de de logs su song ste rgyang ring por 'dug nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_zhang po'i yan lag rgyas gyur cing /_/bdag gi tshogs ni 'gribs 
[\[248a.6\]]gyur la/_/'bras bu rtsa ba za ba yi/_/rtug pa spu can mi 'byung bas/_/dka' thub 'di chos dka' thub min/_/dka' thub 'di ni don phyir te/_/byi ba rnams ni 'gribs gyur pas/_/me skyes khyod ni bkra shis shog_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i 
[\[248a.7\]]dus kyi byi la me skyes zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni de'i tshe de'i dus na lha sbyin yin te/_de na yang 'dis chos lta bu'i sgo nas byi ba rnams zos so/_/da ltar yang 'dis chos lta bu'i sgo nas 'jig rten bslus so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gzigs pa'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag bde ba dang legs par 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rgal cing /_lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag ni tshul ma 
[\[248b.2\]]lags par sdug bsngal bar gyur pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde ba dang legs par 'brog dgon pa 
[\[248b.3\]]nas thar la/_lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa gang yin pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba tshong dpon gnyis shig shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang lhan cig tshong sgyur zhing dgon pa'i lam zhig tu zhugs te/_
[\[248b.4\]]de gnyis dgon pa'i lam du zhugs nas glang rnams res 'ga' ni rtswa nyung /_res 'ga' ni chu nyung /_res 'ga' ni med do/_/de nas tshong pa de glang rnams dang bcas te lhag par dub par sdug bsngal gyis dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa las phyogs shig na gsing ma dang chu phun 
[\[248b.5\]]sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshong pa rnams kyis der glang rnams gtang rang rang khrus byas nas chu mang du 'thungs so/_/de nas glang chu nyungs pa dang /_rtswa nyungs pas yongs su dub pa de rnams kyis rtswa 'grangs par zos chu 'thungs te ngal sos pa dang /_de rnams kyi nang na glang gtso 
[\[248b.6\]]bo gang yin pa des de rnams la shes par byas pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag rtswa nyung ngu dang /_chu nyung ngus yongs su dub pa las phyogs 'di ni gsing ma dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa yin gyis/_gal te khyed cag 'dod na 'di nyid du 'then te 'dug par bya'o/_/glang 
[\[248b.7\]]gtso bo cig shos kyis rang gi tshogs rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag mi rnams ni mthu dang ldan zhing gdul dka' ba 'dul bar byed pa yin gyis gnod pa 'thob par 'gyur du 'ong bas bdag cag khal ji ltar bkal ba de bzhin du khyer cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_glang 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]gtso bo cig shos khros nas rang gi tshogs rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag zla ba'i rgyab sus mthong /_'di dag khal khyer la rag_/yu pus ni mi bskur ro/_/ji tsam na tshong pa rnams kyis glang rnams gtad par brtsams pa na glang de rnams phyi 
[\[249a.2\]]lang byed cing 'dug pa dang /_tshong pa rnams kyis mang du brdegs shing lcag gzer bu can gyis gzhus pas khrag 'dzag cing shing rta dang sbyar to/_/gzhan ni cang mi byed par khal mnos pas de dag la cung zad kyang ma byas so/_/lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_glang gis 
[\[249a.3\]]ba lang 'di dag ni/_/log pa dag tu btams pas na/_/rma dag 'byung zhing khrag 'dzag la/_/ltogs shing skom par ldan la ltos/_/glang gis ba lang 'di dag ni/_/legs pa dag tu btams pas na/_/de rnams dgon pa las rgal nas/_/bsil ba'i 
[\[249a.4\]]chu la 'thung la ltos/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang gtso bo legs par ston pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang gtso bo bslu bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang nga'i tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de 
[\[249a.5\]]dag ni bde ba dang legs par dgon pa nas rgal to/_/lha sbyin gyi tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/da ltar yang nga'i lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde ba dang legs par 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas rgal to/_/
[\[249a.6\]]lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa lha sbyin blun zhing 'khor blun pa la gzigs/_
[\[249a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang lha sbyin blun zhing 'khor blun pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa'i gnas zhig na spre'u'i tshogs shig gnas te/_de 'khyams pa na 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]khron par zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shar ba de mthong nas tshogs kyi dpon pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag zla ba khron par lhung gis 'jig rten zla ba med par bya 'am ci dbyung ngo /_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_legs kyis dbyung ngo /_/de rnams kyis gros bya bar brtsams pa/_
[\[249b.2\]]de ji ltar dbyung bar bya/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_ci mi shes sam/_spre'u brgyus la dbyung mod ces de rnams kyis spre'u brgyus te dang mo bas shing gi yal ga la 'jus nas de'i mjug ma la gzhan gyis 'jus shing de'i la'ang gzhan gyis 'jus te/_de bzhin du thams cad 
[\[249b.3\]]'jus pas yal ga lhag par g.yur zos so/_/chu glongs pa dang zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang mi mngon par gyur/_yal ga yang chag nas thams cad khron par lhung ste/_tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'di na blun po gang 
[\[249b.4\]]dag la/_/'dren pa blun po yod gyur pa/_/de dag thams cad brlag 'gyur te/_/zla ba 'byin pa'i spre'u bzhin/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u'i tshogs kyi dpon po gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin yin te/_de na yang 'di blun zhing 'khor yang 
[\[249b.5\]]blun pa yin no/_/da ltar yang 'di blun zhing 'khor yang blun pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 
[\[249b.6\]]las byas shing tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_las 
[\[249b.7\]]byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gdon mi za bar lha sbyin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyu lngas 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]na dge 'dun bye bar mi 'gyur te/_re zhig dang por sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i tshe dge 'dun bye bar mi 'gyur te/_kye ma'o grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung zhes grag go zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten de la phyogs pas so/_/ston pa yongs su mya ngan 
[\[250a.2\]]las 'das nas dge 'dun bye bar mi 'gyur te/_gang la la zhig 'di skad du nga nyid ston pa yin no zhes zer na de la gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa de'i tshe khyod gar song zhes brjod par zad pas so/_/lta ba'i nyes pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[250a.3\]]kyi nyes pa ma byung ba'i tshe dang /_nyan thos zung mchog tu ma bstan pa de'i tshe dge 'dun bye bar mi 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge 'dun bye ba gdon mi za bar nyan thos zung gis sdum par byed pas so/_/mtshams ma bcad pa na dge 'dun bye bar mi 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir 
[\[250a.4\]]zhe na/_mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dun 'byed par 'gyur gyi mtshams kyi phyi rol du ni ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nga'i dge slong gi dge 'dun skyon med pa las tshul khrims kyi skyon dang lta ba'i skyon gyi skyon byung ste/_tshul khrims kyi skyon ni ka 
[\[250a.5\]]lan da ka'i bu bzang byin las byung ngo /_/lta ba'i skyon yang dge slong 'chi ltas kyis phyung bas gdon mi za bar lha sbyin gyis dge 'dun 'byed par 'gyur gyis/_ma la nga rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar bzhugs par dam bca'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_slob 
[\[250a.6\]]pa dang mi slob pa'i gang zag rnams dang /_thabs cig rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs na/_lha sbyin gyis dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya bar mi nus kyis/_ma la nga so so'i skye bo'i dge ba'i gang zag rnams dang thabs cig 'gro'o snyam ste/_mnyan yod du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du 
[\[250a.7\]]bzhugs nas rim gro byed pa tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin dang /_dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon to//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgya rtsa lnga pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/de'i tshe mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[250b.2\]]nga dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag par 'jog par bzhed kyis/_bsod snyoms stobs pa dang /_gso sbyong de nyid kyi tshe ma gtogs par dge slong su yang nga'i spyan sngar ma 'ongs shig_/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang khrims su bcas pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 
[\[250b.3\]]dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po 'di la bsod snyoms stobs pa dang /_gso sbyong de nyid kyi tshe ma gtogs par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir bdag cag su yang 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bcas so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis ni lho phyogs kyi ri la 
[\[250b.4\]]dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/_/lha sbyin gyis zla ba gsum du dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bstabs te zla ba gsum 'das pa dang /_des dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe 
[\[250b.5\]]dang ldan pa dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dgon pa pa nyid kyis ni dag pa dang /_grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba las 'da' ba dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'das pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/bsod 
[\[250b.6\]]snyoms pa nyid dang /_phyag dar khrod pa nyid dang /_chos gos gsum pa nyid dang /_bla gab med pa nyid kyis ni dag pa dang /_grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'da' ba dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'das pa thob par 'gyur 
[\[250b.7\]]ro zhes chos 'chad kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gang su dag brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga po 'di dag mi 'dod pa dang /_mi bzod pa dang /_yid la mi 'bab pa de ni dge sbyong gau ta ma las ring du 'gyur/_thag ring du 'gyur gyis de tshul shing long shig ces byas pa dang /_dge 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]slong lnga brgyas tshul shing blangs te lha sbyin stan las langs te song ba'i rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du dge slong lnga brgya 'brang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin sgo na 'dug pa des de dag lha sbyin gyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba mthong nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 
[\[251a.2\]]ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spangs te sdig pa 'dod pa 'di'i rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin mu ge'i dgon pa nyam nga ba 'di 'dra ba byung ba na/_bcom ldan 'das ni 
[\[251a.3\]]mi snang ba na bzhugs te/_bdag cag lha sbyin gyi mthus srog dang ma bral mod/_gal te lha sbyin gyis zla ba gsum du dge slong gi dge 'dun ma gsos par gyur na/_dge slong gcig kyang gson por mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe lha sbyin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos 
[\[251a.4\]]kyi dge 'dun mthun pa phye ba de'i tshes chen po 'di g.yos par gyur/_skar mda' lhung /_phyogs rnams dmar por gyur/_bar snang la lha rnams rnga'i sgra 'byin nges pa la ma zhugs pa rnams nges pa la mi 'jug_/'bras bu mi 'thob/_'dod chags dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_zag 
[\[251a.5\]]pa rnams zad par mi 'gyur/_lung mi 'bog_/mi klog_/mi 'don/_mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_chos mngon pa 'dzin pa dang /_dgon pa pa rnams mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_chos mngon pa dang /_dgon pa sems pa la rab tu sbyor bar mi byed/_nyan thos kyi byang 
[\[251a.6\]]chub kyi sa bon skyed par mi byed cing /_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi ma yin/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ma yin no/_/lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba yang 'khrugs par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun chad 
[\[251a.7\]]de/_sems can gyi rgyud la mi 'byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bus bsams pa/_ci'i phyir sa chen po 'di g.yos par gyur snyam mo/_/dgra bcom pa rnams ni ma bsams par shes pa mthong bar mi 'jug pas de gnyis kyis bsam pa la zhugs na/_lha 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phye bar mthong nas de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/_song la bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang slar sdums bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po gnyis kyis dbyar gyi 
[\[251b.2\]]zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/_chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te/_rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der rgyu zhing dong nas rim gyis rgyu zhing dong ba dang rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal 
[\[251b.3\]]gyi bus chos gos dang lhung bzed mkhos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo /_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin sgo na 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan po lha sbyin 
[\[251b.4\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phye'o/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag don 'di kho na'i phyir 'ongs kyis/_khyod sems las chung ngur mdzod cig_/slar sdums bya'o zhes smras nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 
[\[251b.5\]]'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 
[\[251b.6\]]bye ba slar sdums bgyid du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu dag legs so legs so/_/gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba slar sdums byed pa de ni bsod nams mang po tshad med cing grangs med pa 
[\[251b.7\]]skyed par 'gyur ro/_/dper na 'ga' zhig gi skra dum bu brgyar gtubs pa 'phro dang 'phror sbyor bar byed pa de bzhin du gang zhig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba slar sdums byed na de ni bsod nams mang po tshad med cing grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/shA 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni tshangs pa'i bsod nams skyed par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na gang zag gang zhig sngon mi bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs su/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten gnas par byed pa 'di ni tshangs pa'i 
[\[252a.2\]]bsod nams skyed pa'i gang zag dang po yin te/_bskal par mtho ris rnams su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang gang zag gang zhig sngon med pa'i sa phyogs su phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang byed du 'jug pa 'di ni tshangs pa'i bsod nams skyed pa'i 
[\[252a.3\]]gang zag gnyis pa yin te/_bskal par mtho ris rnams su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang gang zag gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba slar sdums byed pa 'di ni tshangs pa'i bsod nams skyed pa'i gang zag gsum pa yin te/_bskal 
[\[252a.4\]]par mtho ris rnams su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang gang zag gang zhig byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par 
[\[252a.5\]]byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas shing de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /_bla dang /_'og dang /_thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_'gran zla med 
[\[252a.6\]]pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod 
[\[252a.7\]]pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas shing de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /_bla dang /_'og dang /_thad 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]kar rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te/_khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te/_gnas pa 'di ni tshangs 
[\[252b.2\]]pa'i bsod nams skyed pa'i gang zag bzhi pa yin te/_bskal par mtho ris rnams su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo 
[\[252b.3\]]bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te lha sbyin gang na ba der dong ngo /_/de'i tshe lha sbyin lho phyogs kyi ril ko ka li ka ni de'i g.yas su bzhag_/khaN Da dra ba bya ni g.yon du bzhag nas sangs rgyas ltar 'chos shing 'chad pa na/_lha sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[252b.4\]]shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bsams pa/_bdag gis nyan thos chen po dag kyang dbang du byas pas da ni bdag thams cad mkhyen pa yin no snyam nas/_ko ka li ka dang /_khaN Da dra ba bya la longs shig longs shig_/
[\[252b.5\]]ces gru phugs byas pa dang /_de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_bdag cag gis 'di ltar 'di dge 'dun 'byed pa'i grogs byas pa de nyid bdag cag gis nyes te/_'di mthu dang ldan pa yin pas gal te bdag cag brdegs na gdon mi za bar 'chi bar 'gyur gyis ldang ngo snyam nas de gnyis 
[\[252b.6\]]langs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni g.yas phyogs su 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ni g.yon phyogs su 'dug go/_/de nas lha sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la smras pa/_shA ri'i bu nga rgyab na thugs mi bde ste re zhig de bsal gyis khyod dge slong 
[\[252b.7\]]rnams la chos kyi gtam spobs par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang mi smra bas lha sbyin la khas blangs so/_/de nas lha sbyin bla gos bzhi bltab tu bting /_snam sbyar bltab ste sngas su bcug nas glo g.yas pa phab ste gnyid log pa las tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ji ltar 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]lus gan rkyal gyis sdur ba'i sgra 'byin cing 'dug pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa lus gan rkyal gyis sdur cing gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs la ltos/_de nas tshe 
[\[253a.2\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'khor rnams skyo ba skyed cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon 
[\[253a.3\]]par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/_'chag pa dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal bar byed do/_/me'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste/_me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'od zer 
[\[253a.4\]]sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel gyi kha dog dag 'byin par byed do/_/cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed de/_lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed cing /_lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do/_/lus kyi stod 
[\[253a.5\]]nas me 'bar bar byed cing /_lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su yang de bzhin te/_phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 
[\[253a.6\]]bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du byed pa de dag bsdus te stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos dge slong rnams skyo ba bskyed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dge slong rnams kyis gang thos na lha sbyin spong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos 
[\[253a.7\]]bshad nas yang smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gang dag ston pa la dga' ba de dag ni longs shig 'dong ngo zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis chas pa na dge slong de rnams kyang de'i rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ngo /_/ko ka li kas lha sbyin bslang ba/_
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]longs longs nyan thos chen po dag gis khyod kyi 'khor phrogs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te lha sbyin gyis 'khor ma mthong bar khrid na khrag dron du skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa 'di yod kyis/_mdor na mthong ba kho nar byas 
[\[253b.2\]]la bkri'o snyam nas de dag dal gyis 'gro ba'i spyod lam gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig dong ba dang /_lha sbyin kun nas dkris pa drag pos mig sdog cing bsnyags pa las tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'obs mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba sa'i gting mi snang ba zhig sprul pa dang lha sbyin ko 
[\[253b.3\]]ka li ka dang /_khaN Da drab bya dang /_ka ti mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams dang lhan cig 'obs de'i mthar kun du bskor bar brtsams pa na rgal ma nus nas des bsams pa/_'khor mi 'thob par ma zad tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas 
[\[253b.4\]]slar log go/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bus kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun khrid nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo /_/de nas dge slong de rnams bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa spangs la/_lha sbyin sdig pa can la 
[\[253b.5\]]rten pa ci tha tshig ces 'gyod pa skyes/_yid la gcags pa skyes/_yul yul por byas/_phrag pa bcum/_mgo smad de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis dge slong de rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la 
[\[253b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed 'ongs pa legs so/_/rab tu byung ba legs so/_/khyed kyis mi'i rnyed pa ni legs par rnyed pa yin te/_brgya lam na lan 'ga' 'phags pa'i gnas su skye ba dang /_dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa dang /_glen pa ma yin pa dang /_
[\[253b.7\]]lug ltar lkugs pa ma yin pa dang /_lag brda byed pa ma yin zhing legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa rnams kyis chos kyi don shes par nus/_brgya lam na lan 'ga' de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung /_
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]brgya lam na lan 'ga' de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'jig rten la chos bshad pa snang ngo /_/dge slong dag de lta bas na rnyed par dka' babs kyang shin du dka' ba ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste 'phags pa'i gnas su skye ba dang /_dbang po ma 
[\[254a.2\]]tshang ba ma yin pa dang /_glen pa ma yin pa dang /_lug ltar lkugs pa ma yin pa dang /_lag brda byed pa ma yin zhing legs par smras pa dang nyes par smras pa rnams kyis chos kyi don shes par nus pa'o/_/da ltar 'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[254a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga byung zhing chos bshad pa nye bar zhi bar 
[\[254a.4\]]'gyur ba/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba/_mngon par byang chub par 'gyur ba/_bde bar gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa 'di lta ste/_'di yod pas 'di 'byung la/_'di skyes pas 'di skye ba/_'di lta ste ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen 
[\[254a.5\]]gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen 
[\[254a.6\]]gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste 
[\[254a.7\]]'di med pas 'di mi 'byung la/_'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga 
[\[254b.2\]]shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrugs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na bdag gi don dang /_gzhan gyi don dang /_
[\[254b.3\]]gnyi ga'i don la rjes su lta ba rnams kyis ni 'di la rab tu bslab par bya ste/_ci nas kyang rab tu byung ba don yod pa dang /_'bras bu dang bcas pa dang /_bde ba skyed pa dang /_rnam par smin pa bde ba dang /_gang dag gis chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_
[\[254b.4\]]nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams yongs su longs spyod pa de dag la ci nas kyang de dag gis phan btags pa'i 'bras bu shin tu che ba dang /_phan yon che ba dang /_gzi brjid che ba dang /_yangs shing rgya che bar 'gyur ba de ltar dge slong dag khyed kyis bslab par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 
[\[254b.5\]]'das kyis dge slong de rnams 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba dang rab tu byung ba legs so zhes bya ba gsungs pa de'i tshe de rnams kyi zhum pa dang /_mi dga' ba dang /_'gyod pa dang /_rnam par 'gyod pa dang /_yid la gcags pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du bral bar gyur to/_/de 
[\[254b.6\]]nas dge slong gzhan rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/_phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[254b.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su phrin las byas shing bsags pa dang tshogs rnyed pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]bsti gnas rtsa ba dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa/_shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/_bya'i tshogs du mas bsten pa gzhan zhig na drang srong lnga brgya'i gtso bo drang srong zhig gnas so/_/ji tsam na drang srong gzhan zhig ljongs 
[\[255a.2\]]rgyu zhing song ba na bsti gnas der phyin na drang srong des de la bkur sti legs par ma byas pas de mi bzod pa skyes nas de'i 'khor 'byed par byed de/_drang srong sdig pa 'dod pa 'di cung zad kyang mi shes na ci ste de'i drung du 'dug_/tshur kho bo dang lhan cig 'dong kho bos khyed mngon par shes pa lnga 
[\[255a.3\]]rnams la rab tu dgod do zhes des de rnams la phye bas drang srong de'i gdams ngag nyan du mi btub bo/_/drang srong des bsams pa/_sdig pa byed pa 'dis bdag gi drang srong 'di rnams phye'o snyam nas/_des de la bzhams te smra bar brtsams pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'khor 'byed par ma byed 
[\[255a.4\]]cig_/'di ni drang srong gi chos ma yin no/_/'on kyang de 'byed bzhin te 'dug tu ma btub nas drang srong de yid mi bde zhing thabs cig sems shing gnas so/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/_bas mtha'i 
[\[255a.5\]]gnas mal la dga' ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur pas/_de nas rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na drang srong de'i bsti gnas su phyin pa dang /_drang srong des de'i lus mdzes pa dang spyod lam zhi ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas des de la 
[\[255a.6\]]dad pa bskyed nas des de la bya ba byas te smon lam log par btab pa/_drang srong sdig can gang yin pa 'dis bdag gi 'khor phye bas bdag gis 'di shes bya thams cad la dbang thob pa na yang 'khor 'byed par byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe 
[\[255a.7\]]de'i dus kyi ljongs kyi drang srong gang gis de'i 'khor phye ba de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gnyug mar gnas pa'i drang srong gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin yin te/_ngas de'i 'khor phye ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des na smon lam log par btab pas 'dis nga'i dge 'dun phye ba 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong dag khyod kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun 
[\[255b.2\]]pa lha sbyin gyis phyi pa dag ni nang par bgyis/_nang pa dag ni phyi par bgyis pas 'khor phrogs pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig du ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis phyi ba dag ni nang par byas/_nang pa dag ni 
[\[255b.3\]]phyi par byas pas 'khor phrogs pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba phyogs shig na srog chags wa zhig gnas te de shin tu brkam chags can zhig pas dgon par yang rgyu grong 'dab tu yang rgyu'o/_/de mthar gyis rgyu ba na rim gyis btso blag mkhan zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa las rams kyi rdza 
[\[255b.4\]]mar lhung nas de skyug bro bar gyur te de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na tshwa sgo'i phung po zhig 'dug pa de la nyal nas glos 'gres pa las de bas kyang lhag par lus ma rung bar gyur te/_chu'i nang du zhugs nas langs te song ba dang nyi ma'i zer gyis phog pas nor bu gzi'i kha dog ltar gyur pa ji tsam na wa rnams 
[\[255b.5\]]kyis mthong nas/_de rnams phyogs phyogs su bros te rgyang ring por 'khod nas smras pa/_khyod su zhig gang nas 'dir 'ongs/_des smras pa/_kho bo ni brgyar 'gro zhes bya ste/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal por dbang bskur to/_/wa rnams kyis bsams 
[\[255b.6\]]pa/_/'di'i lus kyi kha dog sngon ma mthong ba las na gdon mi za bar de kho na yin no snyam nas/_wa rnams kyis rkang bzhi pa thams cad la rig par byas so/_/seng ge rnams kyis bsams pa/_bdag cag las khyad par du 'phags pa su zhig yod na de rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal por gyur 
[\[255b.7\]]re zhig dong la rang gi tshogs kyi dpon po la rig par bya'o snyam nas/_de rnams kyi tshogs kyi dpon po ral pa can zhig ri'i phyogs zhig na gnas pa de la de rnams kyis smras pa dang /_des rkang bzhi pa gzhan zhig la bsgo ba/_song la rkang bzhi pa'i dpon po de rkang bzhi pa 'ga' 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]zhig gis mthong ngam/_ma mthong rtogs shig_/de de'i drung du song ste brtags na sngon ma mthong ba yin zhing seng ge rnams ma gtogs par rkang bzhi pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur nas de de'i drung du song ste ji ltar mthong ba dag smras pa des thos 
[\[256a.2\]]nas seng ge'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te de'i drung du dong ngo /_/de ni rkang bzhi pa du mas yongs su bskor cing glang po che la zhon nas rgyu ba na de seng ge rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing /_de nas ni stag rnams so/_/de nas ni rkang bzhi pa rnams so/_/de rnams kyi phyi rim rgyang ring 
[\[256a.3\]]po nas ni wa rnams 'dong ngo /_/de'i ma ri sul zhig na gnas pa de la des wa zhig mngags te bus rgyal srid nyams su myong gis tshur spyon cig ces spring ba dang /_des smras pa/_de'i 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig des smras pa/_de'i 'khor nang pa ni seng ge dang /_stag dang /_glang 
[\[256a.4\]]po che dag yin no/_/phyi pa ni bdag cag nyid yin no/_/des smras pa/_ma rung zin gyis song shig_/des tshigs su bcad pas kyang smras pa/_bdag ni ri 'di'i sul na bder gnas shing /_/bsil ba'i chu la bsod nyams 'thung bar byed/_/de ni ji srid wa sgra mi grag pa/_/
[\[256a.5\]]de srid glang po che yis bder 'gro 'gyur/_/de song ste des wa rnams la smras pa/_rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal po 'di ni wa kho na yin te/_bdag gis de'i ma ri sul ga ge mo zhes bya ba na 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_gal te de lta na de wa yin nam ma yin 
[\[256a.6\]]pa bdag cag gis brtag go/_/chos nyid kyis wa rnams ni gang zhig gis wa skad thos nas skad ma byung na de'i spu rnams 'byi bar 'gyur bas wa skad dbyung bar brtsams nas des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis skad ma phyung na ni gdon mi za bar bdag gi spu rnams 'byi 
[\[256a.7\]]bar 'gyur la/_gal te glang po che las babs nas skad phyung na ni 'dis bdag bsad du 'ong gis 'di nyid du skad dbyung ngo snyam nas des glang po che la zhon bzhin skad dbyung bar brtsams pa dang /_glang po ches shes nas was bdag la bzhon nam zhes des de bor te rkang pas 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]brdzis so/_/lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang dag nang pa phyi pa dang /_/phyi ba nang par byed de dag_/'di 'dra bar ni brlag 'gyur te/_/glang po che yis wa bzhin no/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_/de na 
[\[256b.2\]]yang 'dis nang pa dag ni phyi rol par byas/_phyi rol pa dag ni nang par byas pas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/da ltar yang 'dis nang pa dag ni phyi rol par byas/_phyi rol pa dag ni nang par byas pas 'khor rnams phrogs par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[256b.3\]]shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis lha sbyin gyi 'khor phrogs pa de'i tshe/_lha sbyin gyis ko ka li ka dang /_khaN Da drab bya dang /_khyed gnyis kyis nga'i 'khor 'phrog tu bcug go zhes brdegs so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs 
[\[256b.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa lha sbyin gyi 'khor ni gzhan gyis phrogs la/_gzhan la 'dis sdug bsngal bskyed pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na 
[\[256b.5\]]yang 'di'i chung ma gzhan gyis phrogs la gzhan dag la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal bskyed pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba phyogs gzhan zhig na glang po che'i tshogs shig gnas so/_/de na glang po che zhig bal glang mo zhig la sdug par 'dzin pa dang /_de ni glang po che'i phru 
[\[256b.6\]]gu gzhan zhig yod pa la lhag par chags nas des glang po che'i phru gu de la smras pa/_tshor du 'ong gis bdag cag 'bros sam de nas glang po che'i phru gu des smras pa/_gang gis na bdag cag 'bros pa'i thabs ci yod/_/des smras pa/_bdag gis thabs shig shes so zhes 
[\[256b.7\]]des glang po che de la smras pa/_khrus bya ba'i phyir rdzing du 'jug par bya'o/_/de zhugs pa dang des smras pa/_bdag cag las su yun ring du nub par 'dug par blta'o blun po'i phung po can de de dang lhan cig chu nang du nub par 'dug pa na de langs te glang po che'i phru gu dang lhan cig 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]bros so/_/glang po che ring zhig 'dug nas langs na mi snang nas des bsams pa/_bdag pham par 'gyur du 'ong gis slar yang nub par bya'o snyam nas/_de slar yang nub par byas nas mche ba sa la btsugs te 'dug go/_/de ring zhig lon nas dbugs do chad 
[\[257a.2\]]de langs nas glang po che mo de ma mthong nas des rdzing bu de phan tshun du dkrug par brtsams pa dang /_des der nya dang /_rus sbal dang /_sbal pa la sogs pa srog chags mang po tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar byas so/_/lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_kye ma'o sha yi phung po 
[\[257a.3\]]che/_/'di la shes rab yod ma yin/_/gzhan gyis chung ma phrogs gyur na/_/gzhan la sdug bsngal sten par byed/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na glang po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin yin te/_de na yang chung ma gzhan gyis phrogs la gzhan la 
[\[257a.4\]]tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal bskyed do/_/da ltar yang 'khor gzhan gyis phrogs la gzhan la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal bskyed do//_//sdom ni/_glags dang mthong ba nyid dang ni/_/ut+pal mdog ni bsad pa dang /_/ril ba dang gsum 'o ma dang /_/sa 'tsho ma dang bzod 
[\[257a.5\]]gsol dang /_/glang dang sems pa nyid dang ni/_/bya dang tha ma bzhi yin no/_/dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis lha sbyin la glags 
[\[257a.6\]]btsal ba las glags rnyed pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis lha sbyin la glags btsal ba las glags rnyed pa 
[\[257a.7\]]de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na 'phong gi slob dpon zhig gnas te/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyad par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na bu mo zhig btsas te btsas nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags te de bskyed 
[\[257b.2\]]bsrings nas chen mor gyur to/_/'phong gi slob dpon gyis bsams pa/_bu mo 'di ni bdag gis gzugs dang ldan pa'am/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/_nor can su la yang sbyin par mi bya ste/_'on kyang bdag las gnas lnga bslabs te byang bar gyur pa gang yin pa 
[\[257b.3\]]de la bdag gis 'di sbyin no snyam mo/_/de las bram ze'i khye'u gnyis shig 'phong bslabs pa las/_de na gcig ni gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/_/cig shos kyis ni gcod pa la byang bar gyur to/_/de gnyis las gnas lnga la byang bar gyur pa gang yin pa de la des bu mo 
[\[257b.4\]]byin pa dang cig shos po de mi bzod pa skyes nas chom rkun pa rnams kyi nang du zhugs te/_chom rkun lnga brgya'i sde dpon du gyur nas de phyogs gcig na lam bcad nas 'khod do/_/snga ma po des bu mo de bag mar blangs nas mda' lnga brgya shong ba'i dong pa gnyis thogs te shing 
[\[257b.5\]]rtar zhugs nas rang gi khyim du dong ngo /_/ji tsam na tshong pa chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa mdun du dong ba sdod pa dang des smras pa/_shes ldan dag deng shig ci sdod/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_chom rkun pa rnams kyis lam bcad do/_/des smras pa/_tshur ci zhig byar 
[\[257b.6\]]yod ces de chas pa dang tshong pa rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag re zhig sdod cig_/'di ni 'gro la rag ste 'di bdag nyid 'chi ba dang /_chung ma phrogs par gyur pa'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/_/rkun po rnams shing ljon pa zhig la 'dzegs nas phyogs su lta 
[\[257b.7\]]bar byed cing 'dug pa dang /_de rnams kyis de shing rtar zhugs pa mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag mi zhig shing rtar zhugs nas song ngo /_chom rkun pa'i sde dpon gyis de la pho nya zhig btang ste shing rta slar bzlog pa dang /_des smras pa/_shes 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]ldan dpa' bo la dpa' bo'i lan byin cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag kyang dpa' bo yin no zhes sde dpon gyis mi rgod lnga brgya btang ba dang des de rnams bsad do/_/de bzhin du nyi shu zhig 'ongs pa de de rnams kyang bsad de/_ji tsam na thams 
[\[258a.2\]]cad bsad nas chom rkun pa'i sde dpon 'ba' zhig lus pa dang des ral gri blangs te mdun du bsdad do/_/des mda' 'phangs par brtsams pa na de'i ral gris gtubs so/_/ji tsam na des mda' lnga brgya 'phangs pa de dag thams cad des gtubs nas mda' gcig cig lus te 
[\[258a.3\]]des de ma 'phangs pa dang /_de nas bu mo des smras pa/_mda' bzhag ste ci bgyi 'phongs shig_/des smras pa/_mda' 'di 'ba' zhig lus te 'di 'phangs na kho bo bsad nas khyod kyang phrogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bu mo des lus kyi sgyur stangs kyis lan bu bcos 
[\[258a.4\]]par brtsams pa na/_de la chom rkun pa'i sde dpon rtog par byed pa na des de'i gnad du mdas bsnun pa dang /_de 'chi ka na tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_shing rta can gyis bdag ma bsad/_/'dod chags sdig pa'i sems kyis ni/_/bdag ni g.yul gyi dbus zhugs 
[\[258a.5\]]nas/_/bag med bzhin la lta bas bsad/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi shing rta can gang yin pa de ni shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni maud gal gyi bu yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chom rkun pa'i sde dpon gang 
[\[258a.6\]]yin pa de ni lha sbyin yin te/_de na yang 'di gnyis kyis de la glags btsal ba las glags rnyed do/_/da ltar yang 'di gnyis kyis de la glags btsal ba las glags rnyed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyi a mra'i 
[\[258a.7\]]tshal na dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dbyar nye bar sgrub par dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya dbu ma de nyid kyi mtshan mo yin par shes shing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo la blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir song nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_kye grogs po dag dbyar nye bar sgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya dbu ma de nyid kyi mtshan mo yin par shes shing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu la ngas ci zhig bya/_de nas pho brang slas kyi bud med cig gis lus 
[\[258b.2\]]'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha dbyar nye bar sgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya dbu ma'i mtshan mo lags par mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu la lha 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pas rol par mdzad/_dgyes par mdzad/_
[\[258b.3\]]dgyes dgur spyod par mdzad na lha'i bgyi ba ni de lags pa snyam bdag sems lags so/_/de nas pho brang slas gzhan zhig gis yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha dbyar nye bar sgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya dbu ma'i mtshan mo lags par mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta 
[\[258b.4\]]bu la lha 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi nye 'khor gyi shul phra mo rnams byul zhing rol par mdzad/_dgyes par mdzad/_dgyes mgur spyad par mdzad na lha'i bgyi ba ni de lags pa snyam bdag sems lags so/_/gzhon nu 'char 
[\[258b.5\]]byed bzang pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha dbyar nye bar sgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya dbu ma'i mtshan mo lags par mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu la lha dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_
[\[258b.6\]]dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/_gzhan gyi yul 'khor dang /_gzhan gyi yul du gshegs te/_g.yul chen po'i g.yul sprad nas g.yul las rgyal bar bgyis te/_rgyal nas g.yul de nyid las pags te bzhugs na lha'i bgyi ba ni de lags pa snyam 
[\[258b.7\]]bdag sems lags so/_/de nas blon po rgan po gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha dbyar nye bar sgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya dbu ma'i mtshan mo lags par mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu la lha 'od srung rdzogs byed 'dus pa can/_tshogs can/_
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]tshogs kyi slob dpon/_skye bo mang pos gzugs bzang por bkur ba/_skye bo mang pos mdun gyis bltas pa/_kun tu 'tsho lnga brgya'i gtso bo de rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de la lha bsnyen bkur mdzod cig_/lha'i bgyi ba ni de lags 
[\[259a.2\]]pa snyam bdag sems lags so/_/yang blon po rgan po gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha dbyar nye bar sgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya dbu ma'i mtshan mo lags par mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu lha kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /_smra 'dod kyi bu 
[\[259a.3\]]mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /_mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /_/ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang /_lha gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu 'dus pa can/_tshogs can/_tshogs kyi slob dpon/_skye bo mang pos gzugs bzang por bkur ba/_tshogs chen po'i mdun gyis bltas pa zhig mchis te/_de rgyal po'i 
[\[259a.4\]]khab 'di nyid du dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de la lha bsnyen bkur mdzod cig_/lha'i bgyi ba ni de lags pa snyam bdag sems lags so/_/de'i tshe 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed 'khor de nyid kyi nang na 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma 
[\[259a.5\]]ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed la smras pa kwa'i nang rje 'tsho byed ci'i phyir cang mi smra/_ci cung zad mi smra 'am/_lha dbyar nye bar sgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya'i mtshan mo lags par mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu la/_lha bcom ldan 'das 
[\[259a.6\]]'dus pa can/_tshogs chen tshogs kyi slob dpon/_skye bo mang pos gzugs bzang por bkur ba/_tshogs chen pos mdun gyis bltas pa de rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid kyi bdag gi a mra'i tshal na dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes pa de la lha bsnyen bkur mdzod cig_/
[\[259a.7\]]lha'i bgyi ba ni de lags pa snyam bdag sems lags so/_/de'i tshe lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das la sems gzhol bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das la 'bab par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das la bab par gyur to/_/de nas lus 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'tsho byed song la glang po che'i dam pa chen po stod cig dang /_de la kho bo zhon nas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed 
[\[259b.2\]]kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra las mnyan nas glang po che dam pa chen po de dang bal glang mo lnga brgya tsam gtad nas pho brang slas lag na sgron ma thogs pa lnga brgya tsam bal glang mo re re zhon nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 
[\[259b.3\]]gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha glang po che'i dam pa chen po bsgron lags te/_lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma 
[\[259b.4\]]skyes dgra glang po che dam pa chen po la zhon nas pho brang slas lag na sgron ma thogs pa lnga brgya tsam bal glang mo re re zhon pas mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo /_/
[\[259b.5\]]de'i tshe lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra yul spong byed pa rnams dang mi mthun par gyur to/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra rgyal po'i khab nas byung ma thag kho nar bdag 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed 'dis bsad par 'dod 
[\[259b.6\]]pa'am/_bslu bar 'dod pa'am/_khas len du gzhug par 'dod pa'am/_gshed ma'am/_phyir rgol ba'am/_mi mdza' ba dag la gtad par mi 'dod grang snyam du bsams nas skrag par gyur/_bag tsha bar gyur/_spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas 'tsho byed gzhon 
[\[259b.7\]]nus bskyed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'tsho byed khyod kho bo la gsod par 'dod pa'am/_bslu bar 'dod pa'am/_khas len du gzhug par 'dod pa'am/_gshed ma pa'am/_phyir rgol ba'am/_mi mdza' ba dag la gtad par mi 'dod grang /_des 'di skad ces 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]smras so/_/lha khyod la bdag dgrongs par 'tshal ba'am/_bslu bar 'tshal ba'am/_smrar gzhug par 'tshal ba'am/_gshed ma pa'am/_phyir rgol ba'am/_mi mdza' ba dag la gtad par 'tshal ba ma lags so/_/de nas lus 'phags 
[\[260a.2\]]ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'tsho byed bcom ldan 'das de la 'khor ji snyed yod/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu lhag tsam mo/_/e ma'o 'tsho byed khyod kyis nga ji ltar bsad par mi 'dod/_bslu bar 
[\[260a.3\]]mi 'dod/_smrar gzhug par mi 'dod/_gshed ma pa'am/_phyir rgol ba'am/_mi mdza' ba dag la gtod par mi 'dod/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das de la 'khor de snyed yod na lu ba'i sgra yang mi grag_/sbrid pa'i sgra yang mi grag go_/lha bcom ldan 'das de ni sgra chung 
[\[260a.4\]]ba bzhed/_sgra chung ba la dgyes/_sgra chung bas 'dul/_sgra chung ba'i bsngags pa mdzad pas 'khor yang sgra chung ba nyid do/_/lha de lta bas na myur ba myur bar glang po che dam pa chen po thob shig_/'di ltar 'khor gyi khyim na 'bru mar gyi zhugs mar gyi 'od gda'o/_/
[\[260a.5\]]de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras myur ba myur bar glang po che'i dam pa chen po btab nas des ji tsam bzhon pas rung ba'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du zhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom 
[\[260a.6\]]ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med pas bzhugs so/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor gyi khyams dang nye bar song nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed la smras pa/_'tsho byed bcom ldan 
[\[260a.7\]]'das de gang na bzhugs/_lha bcom ldan 'das de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med par bzhugs pa pha bi kho na lags so/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]ste phyin nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang 
[\[260b.2\]]thugs dul ba nye bar zhi ba ji lta bu dang ldan pa de bzhin du gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po yang sems dul ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba de 'dra ba dang ldan par gyur cig_/rgyal po chen po rang nyid dga' bar rab tu bstan pa legs so legs so/_/rgyal po chen po rang gi stan la 
[\[260b.3\]]'dug shig_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma 
[\[260b.4\]]skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye ba lta na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/rgyal po chen po ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig_/btsun pa las kyi gnas dang bzo'i gnas tha dad pa 
[\[260b.5\]]gang dag lags pa 'di lta ste/_/phreng rgyud pa dang /_smyug ma mkhan dang /_gdan pa dang /_rtswa thun dang /_'dul mkhan dang /_glang po che la 'tshal ba dang /_rta la 'tshal ba dang /_shing rta mkhan dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_gzhu'i 'dzin stangs pa dang /_
[\[260b.6\]]zhabs 'bring ba bgyid pa dang /_/go re long dang /_bro ga len pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu rab gnon tshan po che dpa' ba rtul phod pa rnams dang /_mnyes par bgyid pa dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus mkhan de rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas 
[\[260b.7\]]rnams kyis bgyi ba bgyid cing sbyin pa dag stsol/_bsod nams dag bgyid la gso ba rnams gso zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pas rtse bar bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid/_dga' mgur spyod par bgyid pa de lta bu rnams la yang dag par mthong ba'i 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags pa 'thob lags sam//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgya rtsa drug pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'di 'dra ba'i zhu ba 'di las sngon dge sbyong dang bram ze gzhan rnams la dris pa dran nam/_
[\[261a.2\]]btsun pa dran lags te/_btsun pa dus gcig cig na bdag 'od srung rdzogs byed gang na ba der mchis te/_mchis nas 'od srung rdzogs byed la bdag gis 'di skad ces btsun pa 'od srung las kyi gnas dang bzo'i gnas tha dad pa gang dag lags pa 'di 
[\[261a.3\]]lta ste/_phreng rgyud pa dang /_smyug ma mkhan dang /_gdan pa dang /_rtswa thun dang /_'dul mkhan dang /_glang po che la zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta mkhan dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_gzhu'i 'dzin stangs pa dang /_zham 'bring byed pa dang /_
[\[261a.4\]]go re long dang /_bro ga len pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu rab gnon tshan po che dpa' ba rtul phod pa rnams dang /_mnyes par byed pa dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus mkhan de rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas pa dang /_las kyi gnas rnams kyis bya ba byed cing sbyin pa dag 
[\[261a.5\]]gtong /_bsod nams dag byed la/_gso ba rnams gso zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed na de lta bu rnams la yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags 
[\[261a.6\]]pa 'thob bam zhes dris pa na de 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/_sbyin pa med do/_/mchod sbyin med do/_/sbyin sreg med do/_/legs par spyad pa med do/_/nyes par spyad pa med do/_/legs par spyad pa dang nyes par 
[\[261a.7\]]spyad pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med do/_/'jig rten 'di med do/_/'jig rten pha rol med do/_/ma med do/_/pha med do/_/sems can brdzus te skye ba med do/_/'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par song ba yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag tshe 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te bdag ni skye bzad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed pa dag med do/_/srog ni 'di 
[\[261b.2\]]nyid la 'tsho zhing de phyis chad par 'gyur/_zhig par 'gyur te shi ba'i 'og tu mi 'byung ngo /_/skyes bu'i lus ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa yin te/_de ni gang gi tshe shi ba na de'i sa'i lus ni sa'i bag la zha chu'i lus ni chu'i me'i lus ni me'i rlung gi lus ni rlung 
[\[261b.3\]]gi bag la zha bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po rnams ni nam mkha'i rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu'i ro ni khri dang lnga'i mi dag gis khyer te dur khrod du 'gro zhing bsregs phan chad mi mngon par 'gyur ro/_/bsreg bya dag ni thal bar 'gyur ro/_/rus pa dag ni thi ba'i mdog 'dra bar gnas so/_
[\[261b.4\]]'di ltar rmongs pas nye bar bstan pa ni sbyin la mkhas pas nye bar bstan pa ni len to/_/de la gang dag yod par smra ba de dag thams cad ni gsog gsob [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba brdol ba yin no/_/'di ltar byis pa dang mkhas pa de gnyis ni phyis chad par 'gyur zhig par 'gyur te shi ba'i 
[\[261b.5\]]'og tu mi 'byung ngo zhes mchi ste/_btsun pa dper na mi zhig a mra'i 'bras bu rnams dris na la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid la/_la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams dris na a mra'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid pa de bzhin du 'od srung rdzogs byed la bdag gis yang dag par 
[\[261b.6\]]mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu dris na ma mchis pa nyid lung ston par bgyid nas/_btsun pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pas gzugs bzang por bkur ba yul na gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze la mngon sum du smad pa 
[\[261b.7\]]ni bdag gi cha ma lags so snyam nas/_btsun pa bdag gis 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis smras pa la mngon par bstod pa yang mi bgyid/_smad pa yang mi bgyid de/_mngon par bstod pa yang ma bgyis/_smad pa yang ma bgyis par stan las langs te mchis nas bdag kun du 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu gang na ba der mchis te mchis nas/_kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu la 'di skad ces btsun pa kun du rgyu 'jig rten gyi las kyi gnas dang /_bzo'i gnas tha dad pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_phreng rgyud pa dang /_smyug ma mkhan dang /_gdan 
[\[262a.2\]]pa dang /_rtswa thun dang /_'dul mkhan dang /_glang po che la zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta mkhan dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_gzhu'i 'dzin stangs pa dang /_zham 'bring byed pa dang /_go re long dang /_bro ga len pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu rab gnon 
[\[262a.3\]]tshan po che dpa' ba rtul phod pa rnams dang /_mnyes par byed pa dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus mkhan de rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas rnams kyis bya ba byed cing sbyin pa dag gtong /_bsod nams dag byed la gso ba rnams gso zhing 'dod pa'i yon 
[\[262a.4\]]tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed na de lta bu rnams la yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags pa 'thob bam zhes dris pas na/_de 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di 
[\[262a.5\]]skad smra ste/_sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba la rgyu med rkyen med do/_/sems can rnams rgyu med rkyen med par kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba la rgyu med rkyen med do/_/sems can rnams rgyu med rkyen med 
[\[262a.6\]]par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams shes pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_mthong ba med par 'gyur ba la rgyu med rkyen med do/_/sems can rnams rgyu med rkyen med par shes pa med pa dang mthong ba med par 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams shes par 'gyur ba 
[\[262a.7\]]dang mthong bar 'gyur ba la rgyu med rkyen med do/_/sems can rnams rgyu med rkyen med par shes pa dang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs med do/_/brtson 'grus med do/_/stobs dang brtson 'grus med do/_/skyes bu'i rtsal med do/_/pha rol gnon pa med do/_/skyes bu'i rtsal 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]dang pha rol gnon pa med do/_/bdag gi rtsal med do/_/gzhan gyi rtsal med do/_/bdag gi rtsal dang gzhan gyi rtsal med do/_/sems can thams cad dang srog thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad mthu med stobs med dbang med brtson 'grus med/_pha rol gnon pa med do/_/'gro ba 
[\[262b.2\]]mtshams sbyor ba'i srid pa dag nges par gyur to/_/'di ltar 'gro ba drug po dag tu bde ba dang sdug bsngal so sor myong bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ste/_btsun pa dper na mi zhig a mra'i 'bras bu rnams dris na la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid la/_la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams dris 
[\[262b.3\]]na a mra'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid pa de bzhin du kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu la bdag gis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu dris na rgyu ma mchis pa nyid du lung ston par bgyid nas/_btsun pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas 
[\[262b.4\]]pas gzugs bzang por bkur ba yul na gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze la da ji ltar mngon sum du smad par bya snyam nas/_bdag gis kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu'i smras pa la mngon par bstod pa yang mi bgyid/_smad pa yang mi bgyid de/_mngon par bstod pa yang ma 
[\[262b.5\]]bgyis/_smad pa yang ma bgyis par stan las langs te mchis nas/_bdag smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can gang na ba der mchis te mchis nas smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la 'di skad ces btsun pa yang dag rgyal ba can las kyi gnas dang bzo'i 
[\[262b.6\]]gnas gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_phreng rgyud pa dang /_smyug ma mkhan dang /_gdan pa dang /_rtswa thun dang /_'dul mkhan dang /_glang po che la zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta mkhan dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_gzhu'i 'dzin stangs pa dang /_zham 'bring 
[\[262b.7\]]byed pa dang /_go re long dang /_bro ga len pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu rab gnon tshan po che dpa' ba rtul phod pa rnams dang /_mnyes par byed pa dang /_skra mkhan dang khrus mkhan de rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas rnams kyis bya ba byed cing sbyin pa dag gtong /_
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]bsod nams dag byed la gso ba rnams gso zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na de lta bu rnams yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags pa 'thob 
[\[263a.2\]]bam zhes dris pa na/_de 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'di ltar blta zhing 'di skad smra ste/_byed pa dang /_byed du 'jug pa dang /_gcod pa dang /_gcod du 'jug pa dang /_sreg pa dang /_sreg tu 'jug pa dang /_rdeg pa dang /_rdeg tu 'jug pa dang /_srog chags 
[\[263a.3\]]la 'tshe ba dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa dag la log par spyod pa dang /_shes bzhin du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba 'thung ba dang /_khyim 'bubs pa dang /_mdud pa bkrol ba dang /_rim gyis 'phrog pa dang /_lam 'gog cing 
[\[263a.4\]]'dug pa dang /_grong 'joms par byed pa dang /_grong khyer 'joms par byed pa dang /_yul 'joms par byed pa dang /_sa gzhi chen po 'di la sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad 'khor lo'i mtha' spu gri la byas pas de dag thams cad kun du gcod par byed/_kun du 'cheg 
[\[263a.5\]]par byed/_kun du rdung bar byed/_kun du 'bral bar byed cing de dag thams cad kun du bcad/_kun du gshegs/_kun du brdungs/_kun du dral nas sha'i thang ma gcig tu byed/_sha'i tshoms gcig tu byed/_sha'i bungs gcig tu byed/_sha'i phung po gcig tu 
[\[263a.6\]]byed cing sha'i thang ma gcig tu byas/_sha'i tshoms gcig tu byas/_sha'i bungs gcig tu byas/_sha'i phung po gcig tu byas nas de ltar kun du sgrub par byed pa las gzhi de las sdig pa yang med/_gzhi de las sdig par 'gyur ba yang med do/_/chu klung gang gA'i lho 
[\[263a.7\]]phyogs nas kun du gcod par byed/_kun du 'cheg par byed/_kun du rdung bar byed/_kun du 'dral bar byed cing 'gro la/_chu klung gang gA'i byang phyogs nas sbyin par byed/_mchod sbyin byed cing 'gro bar gyur na/_gzhi de las sdig pa dang bsod nams kyang med/_gzhi 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]de las sdig pa dang bsod nams su 'gyur ba yang med do/_/'di ltar sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don mthun pas de ltar byed pa yang bsod nams mi byed pa kho na yin no zhes mchi ste/_btsun pa dper na mi zhig a mra'i 'bras bu 
[\[263b.2\]]rnams dris na la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid la/_la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams dris na a mra'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid pa de bzhin du smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la bdag gis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu dri ba dris na byed 
[\[263b.3\]]pa nyid ma mchis par lung ston par bgyid do/_/btsun pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pas gzugs bzang por bkur ba yul na gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze la da ji ltar mngon sum du smad par bya snyam nas/_bdag gis smra 'dod 
[\[263b.4\]]kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la mngon par bstod pa yang mi bgyid smad pa yang mi bgyid de/_mngon par bstod pa yang ma bgyis/_smad pa yang ma bgyis par stan las langs te mchis nas bdag mi pham skra'i la ba can gang na ba der mchis te mchis nas/_mi pham skra'i 
[\[263b.5\]]la ba can la 'di skad ces btsun pa mi pham 'jig rten gyi las kyi gnas dang bzo'i gnas tha dad pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_phreng rgyud pa dang /_smyug ma mkhan dang /_gdan pa dang /_rtswa thun dang /_'dul mkhan dang /_glang po che la zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa 
[\[263b.6\]]dang /_shing rta mkhan dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_gzhu'i 'dzin stangs pa dang /_zham 'bring byed pa dang /_go re long dang /_bro ga len pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu rab gnon tshan po che dpa' ba rtul phod pa rnams dang mnyes par byed pa dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus mkhan de 
[\[263b.7\]]rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas rnams kyis bya ba byed cing sbyin pa dag gtong /_bsod nams dag byed la gso ba rnams gso zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed na de lta bu rnams 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]la yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags pa 'thob bam zhes dris pa na de 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'di ltar blta zhing 'di skad ces smra ste/_lus bdun po 'di dag ni ma byas pa/_byas pas ma byas pa ma sprul pa/_sprul 
[\[264a.2\]]pas ma byas pa gnod par bya ba ma yin pa ther zug tu gnas pa/_ka ba bzhin gnas pa dag yin te/_bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste sa'i lus dang /_chu'i lus dang /_me'i lus dang /_rlung gi lus dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_srog gson pa nyid ni bdun pa ste/_
[\[264a.3\]]lus bdun po de dag ni ma byas pa/_byas pas ma byas pa/_ma sprul pa/_sprul pas ma byas pa/_gnod par bya ba ma yin pa/_ther zug tu gnas pa/_ka ba bzhin du gnas pa dag yin no/_/de dag ni 'di lta ste/_bsod nams su 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/_sdig par 'gyur 
[\[264a.4\]]ba'i phyir ram/_bsod nams dang sdig par 'gyur ba'i phyir ram bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir g.yo bar mi byed/_rnam par 'gyur bar mi byed/_gcig la gcig gnod par mi byed 
[\[264a.5\]]do/_/skyes bu gang gis skyes bu'i mgo gcod par byed pa des kyang 'jig rten na g.yo ba'am gnas pa la gnod pa cung zad kyang mi byed de/_lus bdun po dag la bar med par mtshon thal byung du 'gro zhing der srog la gnod pa yang med do/_/de la gsod par byed pa'am/_
[\[264a.6\]]gsod du bcug pa'am/_dran par byed pa'am/_dran par byed du bcug pa'am/_skul bar byed pa'am/_skul du bcug pa'am/_rnam par rig par byed pa'am/_rnam par rig par byed du bcug pa 'ga' yang med do/_/byis pa'am mkhas pa gang dag yin pa dag ni skye 
[\[264a.7\]]gnas gtso bo dang ldan pa khri bzhi stong dang /_rtog pa chen po drug khri dang drug brgya dang /_las lnga dang /_las gsum dang /_las gnyis dang las dang las phyed dang /_las drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_rtog pa bar ma drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_'du shes bdun dang /_sems 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]can dmyal ba brgya nyi shu dang /_dbang po brgya sum bcu dang /_rdul gyi khams sum bcu rtsa drug dang /_klu'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_kun tu rgyu'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_kun tu 'tsho'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong 
[\[264b.2\]]dang /_gcer bu pa'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_'du shes can gyi gnas bdun dang /_'du shes med pa'i gnas bdun dang /_lha ma yin bdun dang /_sha za bdun dang /_lha bdun dang /_mi bdun dang /_mtsho bdun dang /_mtsho bdun brgya dang /_'bri ba bdun 
[\[264b.3\]]dang /_'bri ba bdun brgya dang /_rmi lam bdun dang /_rmi lam bdun brgya dang /_sad pa bdun dang /_sad pa bdun brgya dang /_g.yang sa bdun dang /_g.yang sa bdun brgya dang /_rigs btsun pa drug dang /_mngon par mtho ba bcu dang /_skyes bu chen po'i sa brgyad po de dag 
[\[264b.4\]]tu bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du mtshams sbyor cing 'khor nas sdug bsngal mthar byed do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na/_skud pa'i dru bu yang ba steng gi nam mkha' las 'phangs pa gzangs pa na sa la 'bab pa de bzhin du byis pa'am/_mkhas pa gang dag yin pa dag 
[\[264b.5\]]kyang de dag bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du mtshams sbyor cing 'khor nas sdug bsngal mthar byed do/_/de la dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag 'di skad ces bdag tshul khrims sam/_brtul zhugs sam/_dka' thub bam/_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa 'dis las 
[\[264b.6\]]yongs su ma smin pa ni yongs su smin par bya zhing yongs su smin pa ni reg par byas nas byang bar bya'o zhes zer ba 'ga' yang med do/_/bde ba dang sdug bsngal 'di nges pa yin no/_/yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa ni mi srid do/_/'di lta bu 'di nyid dang gzhan ma yin pas 'khor ba gzhal
