[\[264b.7\]]lo zhes mchi ste/_btsun pa dper na mi zhig a mra'i 'bras bu rnams dris na la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid la/_la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams dris na a mra'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid pa de bzhin du mi pham skra'i la ba can la bdag gis yang dag par mthong 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu dris na 'khor ba dag nyid lung ston par bgyid nas/_btsun pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pas gzugs mdzes par bkur ba yul na gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze la da ji 
[\[265a.2\]]ltar mngon sum du smad par bya snyam nas mi pham skra'i la ba can gyis smras pa la mngon par bstod pa yang mi bgyid/_smad pa yang mi bgyid de/_mngon par bstod pa yang ma bgyis smad pa yang ma bgyis par stan las langs te mchis nas bdag gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu gang na ba der 
[\[265a.3\]]mchis nas/_gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu la 'di skad ces btsun pa gnyen gyi bu 'jig rten gyi las kyi gnas dang /_bzo'i gnas tha dad pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_phreng rgyud pa dang /_smyug ma mkhan dang /_gdan pa dang /_rtswa thun dang /_'dul mkhan dang /_glang po che la zhon 
[\[265a.4\]]pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta mkhan dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_gzhu'i 'dzin stangs pa dang /_zham 'bring byed pa dang /_go re long dang /_bro ga len pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu rab gnon tshan po che dpa' ba rtul phod pa rnams dang /_mnyes par byed pa dang /_skra mkhan dang 
[\[265a.5\]]khrus mkhan de rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas rnams kyis bya ba byed cing sbyin pa dag gtong /_bsod nams dag byed la/_gso ba ni gso zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par 
[\[265a.6\]]byed na de lta bu rnams la yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags pa 'thob bam zhes dris pa na/_de 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/_skyes bu gang zag 'dis so sor myong ba gang yin pa ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad 
[\[265a.7\]]sngon byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no/_/las rnying pa rnams ni dka' thub kyis 'byang bar 'gyur la/_las sar pa rnams ni mi bya ba'i chu lon gyis bzlog par bya'o/_/de lta na phyin chad zag pa med do/_/zag pa med na las zad do/_/las zad na sdug bsngal zad do/_/
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]sdug bsngal zad na sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes mchi ste/_btsun pa dper na mi zhig a mra'i 'bras bu rnams dris na la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams su lung ston par bgyid la/_la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams dris na a mra'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid pa de 
[\[265b.2\]]bzhin du gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu la bdag gis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu dris na sngon bgyis pa'i rgyu las byung ba nyid lung ston par bgyid nas/_btsun pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pas gzugs 
[\[265b.3\]]bzang por bkur ba yul na gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze la mngon sum du smad pa ni bdag gi cha ma lags so snyam nas/_bdag gis gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i smras pa la mngon par bstod pa yang mi bgyid/_smad par yang mi bgyid de/_mngon par bstod 
[\[265b.4\]]pa yang ma bgyis smad par yang ma bgyis par stan las langs te mchis nas bdag ka t+ya'i bu nog can gang na ba der mchis te/_mchis nas ka t+ya'i bu nog can la 'di skad ces/_btsun pa ka t+ya'i bu 'jig rten gyi las kyi gnas dang /_bzo'i gnas tha dad pa gang dag yin pa 
[\[265b.5\]]'di lta ste/_phreng rgyud pa dang /_smyug ma mkhan dang /_gdan pa dang /_rtswa thun dang /_'dul mkhan dang /_glang po che la zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta mkhan dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_gzhu'i 'dzin stangs pa dang /_zham 'bring byed pa 
[\[265b.6\]]dang /_/go re long dang /_bro ga len pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu rab gnon tshan po che dpa' ba rtul phod pa rnams dang /_mnyes par byed pa dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus mkhan de rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas rnams kyis khyab byed cing sbyin pa dag gtong /_bsod 
[\[265b.7\]]nams dag byed la/_gso ba rnams gso zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed na de lta bu rnams la yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags pa 'thob bam zhes de skad dris 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]pa dang /_ka t+ya'i bu nog can bdag la 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad ces smra ste/_gal te 'ga' zhig bdag gi gan du mchis te 'di skad ces 'jig rten pha rol yod dam zhes 'dri na/_de la bdag 'jig rten pha rol yod do zhes dri ba 
[\[266a.2\]]dris pa'i lan 'debs so/_/'jig rten pha rol med pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol yod pa dang med pa dang /_yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol 'di lta bu nyid dang /_'di lta bu nyid ma yin pa dang /_gzhan nyid dang gzhan nyid ma yin pa dang /_
[\[266a.3\]]'jig rten pha rol gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa nyid ma yin pa yin nam zhes 'dri na de la bdag 'jig rten pha rol gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa nyid ma yin no zhes dris pa'i lan 'debs so zhes mchi nas bdag de la 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal po'i khab 
[\[266a.4\]]'di na rab tu byung bar gyur pa ji snyed gnas pa de rnams kyi nang na lhag par blun pa/_lhag par glen pa/_lhag par slu bar byed pa ni 'di lta ste/_ka t+ya'i bu nog can 'di yin no snyam pa las de la yang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_gzugs bzang por bkur ba yul na gnyug mar 
[\[266a.5\]]gnas pa'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze la mngon sum du smad pa ni bdag gi cha ma lags so snyam nas bdag gis ka t+ya'i bu nog can gyis smras pa la mngon par bstod pa yang mi bgyid/_smad pa yang mi bgyid de mngon par bstod pa yang ma bgyis/_smad pa yang ma bgyis par stan las 
[\[266a.6\]]langs te mchis lags te/_bcom ldan 'das la bdag don de kho na zhu lags na/_btsun pa 'jig rten gyi las kyi gnas dang /_bzo'i gnas tha dad pa gang dag lags pa 'di lta ste/_phreng rgyud pa dang /_smyug ma mkhan dang /_gdan pa dang /_rtswa thun dang /_'dul mkhan dang /_
[\[266a.7\]]glang po che la 'tshal ba dang /_rta la 'tshal ba dang /_shing rta mkhan dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_gzhu'i 'dzin stangs pa dang /_zham 'bring bgyid pa dang /_go re long dang /_bro ga len pa dang rgyal po'i bu rab gnon tshan po che dpa' ba rtul phod pa rnams dang /_mnyes par 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]bgyid pa dang /_skra mkhan dang /_khrus mkhan de rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas rnams kyis bgyi ba bgyid cing sbyin pa dag stsol/_bsod nams dag bgyid la gso ba dag gso zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas rtse bar bgyid/_dga' 
[\[266b.2\]]bar bgyid/_dga' mgur spyod par bgyid na de lta bu rnams la yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags pa 'thob lags sam/_rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri yis khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du de lung ston cig_/rgyal po chen po dper na 'di na khyod 
[\[266b.3\]]kyi bran mngag gzhug pa go re long rang dbang med la dga' mgur byar med pa zhig yod pa des khyod steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug ste 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas skyes pa med par rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed 
[\[266b.4\]]pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga ng+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di yang mi yin la bdag kyang mi yin pa las gzhan du na lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga ng+hA'i bu ma skyes dgras sngon bsod nams dag byas shing bsags pa des na da ltar 
[\[266b.5\]]steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed kyis/_ma la bdag gis kyang dge ba'i chos cung zad yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya'o snyam zhing bdag gis dge ba'i chos ci zhig yang dag par blangs 
[\[266b.6\]]te gnas par bya snyam pa las/_ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas des de ltar thag bcad de skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas 
[\[266b.7\]]khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas des ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar log_/ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spangs te log par lta ba las slar log par gyur pa de khyod kyi zho shas 'tsho ba rnams ljongs su 'khyam zhing dong bas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ni lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i 
[\[267a.2\]]rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'bangs mngag gzhug pa go re long rang dbang med pa dga' mgur byar med pa yin na/_de skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nar khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/_srog gcod 
[\[267a.3\]]pa las slar log ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spangs te log par lta ba las slar log nas yang dag pa'i lta ba dang 
[\[267a.4\]]ldan gyis/_ma la bdag cag rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong la snyan du gsol lo zhes de rnams khyod kyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/_lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_lha'i 'bangs mngag gzhug pa go re long rang dbang ma mchis pa dga' mgur bgyir ma mchis pa zhig mchis pa de skra 
[\[267a.5\]]dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas des ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar log_/ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma 
[\[267a.6\]]dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spangs te log par lta ba las slar log ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan lags so zhes smras na/_rgyal po chen po de la ji snyam du sems/_ji ga khyod 
[\[267a.7\]]kyis de skad smra ba la shes ldan dag deng la mi de khug shig dang slar yang nga'i bran mngag gzhug pa go re long rang dbang med par 'gyur ro zhes smra bar 'gyur ram/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/gzhan du na bdag de la lta ba'i slad du mchi ste/_des sngon bdag la mngon du smra ba dang /_
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]phyag 'tshal ba dang /_ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang /_'dud pa'i las gang lags pa bgyid lags pas de nyid la bdag gis de dag bgyi zhing /_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de la 'di lta ste chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad 
[\[267b.2\]]rnams kyis bstab par bgyi'o/_/rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/_de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/_btsun pa mad lags te/_de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 
[\[267b.3\]]'bras bu bstan lags so/_/rgyal po chen po dper na khyod kyi yul 'di na khyim bdag zhing pa skrun pa skyed pa rgyal po'i bang mdzod 'phel bar byed pa zhig yod pa des khyod steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la 'dug nas skyes pa med par rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur 
[\[267b.4\]]spyod par byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di yang mi yin la/_bdag kyang mi yin pa las gzhan du na lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra sngon bsod nams dag byas shing bsags pa des nad 
[\[267b.5\]]ltar steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir song nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed kyis/_ma la bdag gis kyang dge ba cung zad yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya'o snyam zhing bdag gis dge ba'i chos ci zhig yang dag par blangs te 
[\[267b.6\]]gnas par bya snyam pa las/_ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/_des de ltar thag bcad de skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas 
[\[267b.7\]]khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar log_/ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]dang /_log par lta ba spangs te log par lta ba las slar log par gyur pa de khyod kyi zho shas 'tsho ba rnams ljongs su 'khyam zhing dong bas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ni lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes 
[\[268a.2\]]dgra'i khyim bdag zhing bskrun pa skyed pa'i bang mdzod 'phel bar byed pa yin na/_de skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/_de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/_srog gcod pa las slar log_/
[\[268a.3\]]ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spangs te/_log par lta ba las slar log nas yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan 
[\[268a.4\]]gyis/_ma la bdag cag rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong la snyan du gsol lo zhes de rnams khyod kyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/_lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_lha'i khyim bdag zhing pa skrun pa skyed pa rgyal po'i bang mdzod 'phel bar bgyid pa zhig mchis pa de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos 
[\[268a.5\]]ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/_srog gcod pa las slar log_/ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig 
[\[268a.6\]]kyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spangs te log par lta ba las slar log ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan lags so zhes smra na/_rgyal po chen po de la ji snyam du sems/_ji ga khyod kyis de skad smra ba la shes ldan dag deng la mi de khug 
[\[268a.7\]]shig dang slar yang nga'i zhing pa skrun pa skyed pa rgyal po'i bang mdzod 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes smra bar 'gyur ram/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/gzhan du na bdag de la blta ba'i slad du mchi ste/_des sngon bdag la mngon du smra ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_ldang ba dang /_
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]thal mo sbyar ba dang /_'dud pa'i las gang dag lags pa bgyis lags pas de nyid la bdag gis de dag bgyi zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de la yang 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bstab par 
[\[268b.2\]]bgyi'o/_/rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/_de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/_btsun pa mad lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lags so/_/rgyal 
[\[268b.3\]]po chen po 'di la ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[268b.4\]]'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_des chos bshad pa ni thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_/tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa rnam par byang ba/_tshangs par spyod pa rab tu ston te/_chos de khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi 
[\[268b.5\]]bus mnyan te/_de chos de thos nas gnas gsum po 'di lta ste/_chags pa'i chos dang /_zhe sdang gi chos dang /_gti mug gi chos la ston pa'i rnam par dag pa tshol bar byed de/_ci tshe dang ldan pa 'di la chags pa gang gis zil gyis gnon cing sems la khyab na mi shes bzhin kho 
[\[268b.6\]]nar shes so zhes smra/_ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong ngo zhes smra zhing gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_ban pa ma yin pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i chags pa ma spangs pa dang /_yongs su ma shes pa dang /_ma bkag pa 
[\[268b.7\]]dang /_ma bsal ba'i chags pa de yod dam/_'on te tshe dang ldan pa 'di la chags pa gang gis zil gyis non cing sems la khyab na mi shes bzhin kho nar shes so zhes smra/_ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong ngo zhes smra zhing gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]phan pa ma yin pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i chags pa ma spangs pa dang /_yongs su ma shes pa dang /_ma bkag pa dang /_ma bsal ba'i chags pa de med snyam na/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di la 
[\[269a.2\]]chags pa gang gis zil gyis non cing sems la khyab na mi shes bzhin kho nar shes so zhes smra/_ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong ngo zhes smra zhing gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa ma yin pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 
[\[269a.3\]]ston pa'i chags pa ma spangs pa dang /_yongs su ma shes pa dang /_ma bkag pa dang /_ma bsal ba'i chags pa de med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma chags pa'i lus kyi 'du byed dang /_ngag gi 'du byed dang /_yid kyi 'du byed gang dag yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa 'di la yod 
[\[269a.4\]]la/_'di chos gang mdor bsdus pa'am/_rgyas par 'chad kyang rung 'di'i chos ni zhi ba gya nom pa/_zab pa zab par snang ba/_mthong bar dka' ba/_rtogs par dka' ba/_brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/_rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/_zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas 
[\[269a.5\]]pa dang mdzangs pas rig par bya ba yin na/_de yang 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa 'di gcig tu chags pas shes par sla ba ma yin pas tshe dang ldan pa 'di ma chags pa yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni chags pa ma yin no snyam mo/_/gang gi tshe 'di dang po chags pa'i chos la 
[\[269a.6\]]rnam par dag par mthong nas de'i 'og tu gnyis pa zhe sdang gi chos dang /_gsum pa gti mug gi chos la tshol bar byed de/_ci tshe dang ldan pa 'di la gti mug gang gis zil gyis non cing sems la khyab na mi shes bzhin kho nar shes so zhes smra/_ma mthong bzhin kho 
[\[269a.7\]]nar mthong ngo zhes smra zhing gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa ma yin pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i gti mug ma spangs pa dang /_yongs su ma shes pa dang /_ma bkag pa dang /_ma bsal ba'i gti mug 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]de yod dam/_'on te tshe dang ldan pa 'di la gti mug gang gis zil gyis non cing sems la khyab na mi shes bzhin kho nar shes so zhes smra/_ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong ngo zhes smra zhing gzhan dag la yang gang dag de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa ma yin 
[\[269b.2\]]pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de lta de ltar ston pa'i gti mug ma spangs pa dang /_yongs su ma shes pa dang /_ma bkag pa dang /_ma bsal ba'i gti mug de med snyam na/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di la gti mug gang gis zil gyis non cing sems la 
[\[269b.3\]]khyab na mi shes bzhin kho nar shes so zhes smra/_ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong ngo zhes smra zhing gzhan dag la yang gang dag de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa ma yin pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i gti mug ma spangs pa dang /_yongs 
[\[269b.4\]]su ma shes pa dang /_ma bkag pa dang /_ma bsal ba'i gti mug de med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gti mug med pa'i lus kyi 'du byed dang /_ngag gi 'du byed dang /_yid kyi 'du byed gang dag yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa 'di la yod la/_'di chos gang mdor bsdus 
[\[269b.5\]]pa'am/_rgyas par 'chad kyang rung /_'di'i chos ni zhi ba/_gya nom pa/_zab pa zab par snang ba/_mthong bar dka' ba/_rtogs par dka' ba/_brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/_rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/_zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas 
[\[269b.6\]]rig par bya ba yin na/_de yang 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa 'di gcig pu gti mug pas ni shes par sla ba ma yin pas tshe dang ldan pa 'di gti mug pa ma yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni gti mug med pa yin no snyam mo/_/gang gi tshe 'di gsum pa gti mug gi chos la rnam par 
[\[269b.7\]]dag par mthong nas de'i 'og tu 'di la rnam pa dang ldan pa'i dad pa skyed par byed do/_/dad pa skyes nas 'di ltar slob par byed de/_khyim na gnas pa ni gnod pa can dang /_rdul khrod na gnas pa yin la/_rab tu byung ba ni mngon par skabs yod pa yin te/_khyim pa 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]khyim na gnas pas ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gcig tu sal gyis dag par tshangs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa rnam par byang ba 'ba' zhig po 'di la spyad par sla ba ma yin pas/_ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas 
[\[270a.2\]]dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam ste/_des de ltar thag bcad nas nor gyi tshogs mang po'am/_nyung ngu spangs te nye du'i 'khor mang po'am nyung ngu spangs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas 
[\[270a.3\]]khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de de bzhin du rab tu byung nas de tshul khrims dang ldan pa la gnas pa yin/_so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin/_spyod pa dang /_spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa yin/_tha na kha na ma tho ba phra mo la yang 'jigs par lta ba yin/_
[\[270a.4\]]bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te slob pa yin no/_/de srog gcod pa spangs nas srog gcod pa las slar log pa yin te/_chad pa spangs pa yin/_mtshon cha spangs pa yin/_'dzem pa dang /_snying rjer ldan pa yin/_sems can srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la chung 
[\[270a.5\]]ngu na srog chags grog sbur yan chad srog gcod pa las slar log pa yin no/_/de ma byin par len pa spangs nas ma byin par len pa las slar log pa yin te/_byin pa len pa yin/_byin pa la dga' ba yin byin pa lhug par btang ba la dga' ba yin te/_rkun ma ma yin/_
[\[270a.6\]]brkam chags ma yin/_gtsang ma yin/_dag pa yin/_bdag nyid kha na ma tho ba med par srung zhing ma byin par len pa las slar log pa yin no/_/de mi tshangs par spyod pa spangs nas mi tshangs par spyod pa las slar log pa yin te/_tshangs par spyod pa yin/_spyod pa ngan 
[\[270a.7\]]pa spangs pas dag pa yin/_gtsang ba yin/_dri nga ba med pa yin/_'khrig pa dang bral ba yin/_smad rim gyi chos dang bral ba yin/_mi tshangs par spyod pa las slar log pa yin no/_/de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs nas [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba las slar log pa yin te/_bden par 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]smra ba yin bden pa la dga' ba yin/_mnyan par 'os pa yin/_yid ches pa yin/_brtan pa yin/_'jig rten la mi bslu ba yin te/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba las slar log pa yin no/_/de phra ma'i tshig spangs nas phra ma las slar log pa yin te/_de tshu bi dag las 
[\[270b.2\]]thos te de dag dbye ba'i phyir pha bi dag la smra ba ma yin/_pha bi dag las thos te de dag dbye ba'i phyir tshu bi dag la smra ba ma yin/_bye ba rnams sdums byed pa yin/_mthun pa rnams la gzengs bstod pa yin/_mthun pa la dga' ba yin/_mthun pa la mgu ba yin/_
[\[270b.3\]]mthun par byed pa'i tshig smra ba yin te/_phra ma las slar log pa yin no/_/de tshig rtsub po spangs nas tshig rtsub po las slar log pa yin te/_de gang yang tshig gdug pa dang /_rtsub pa dang /_pha rol la mi snyan pa dang /_pha rol spa 'gong bar byed pa dang /_skye bo mang 
[\[270b.4\]]po'i yid la mi 'thad pa dang /_skye bo mang po'i snying du mi sdug pa dang /_skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang /_skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa dang /_mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ba ma yin pa de lta bu'i tshig spangs nas gang yang mi 
[\[270b.5\]]tshugs pa dang /_rnar snyan pa dang /_snying la 'bab pa dang /_dga' bar byed pa dang /_grong khyer pa dang /_snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /_rnam par gsal ba dang /_rnam par rig par byed pa dang /_mnyan par 'os pa dang /_mi rten pa dang /_'gal ba ma yin pa 
[\[270b.6\]]dang /_thub pa med pa dang /_skye bo mang po la sdug pa dang /_skye bo mang po mgu ba dang /_skye bo mang po la dga' ba dang /_skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong ba dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa dang /_mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig smra bas/_tshig rtsub po 
[\[270b.7\]]las slar log pa yin no/_/de tshig kyal pa spangs nas tshig kyal ba las slar log pa yin te/_de dus su smra ba yin/_yang dag par smra ba yin/_de kho na nyid smra ba yin/_don smra ba yin/_chos smra ba yin/_rtogs pa smra ba yin/_khong du chud par byed pa'i 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]tshig smra ba yin te/_dus su dang /_'dren ma ma yin pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang bcas pa dang /_dan rtags dang bcas pa dang /_chos dang don dang ldan pa yin te tshig kyal pa las slar log pa yin no/_/de nyo tshong spangs nas de nyo tshong las slar log pa yin 
[\[271a.2\]]te/_de gzhal blugs la g.yo byed pa dang /_srang la g.yo byed pa dang /_tshad la g.yo byed pa spangs nas gzhal blugs la g.yo byed pa dang /_srang la g.yo byed pa dang /_tshad la g.yo byed pa las slar log pa yin no/_/de gsug len pa dang /_'brid pa dang /_
[\[271a.3\]]bsdigs nas rang gir byed pa spangs nas gsug len pa dang /_'brid pa dang /_bsdigs nas rang gir byed pa las slar log pa yin no/_/de bsad pa dang /_bcings pa dang /_gcad pa dang /_dbug pa dang /_brdeg pa'i bsam pa spangs nas gsod pa dang /_
[\[271a.4\]]'ching ba dang /_gcod pa dang /_'bigs pa dang /_rdeg pa nyams su myong bar byed pa las slar log pa yin no/_/de 'od dang bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba spangs nas/_'od dang bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba las slar log pa yin no/_/de zhing gi gzhi dang /_khyim 
[\[271a.5\]]gyi gzhi dang /_tshong khang gi gzhi len pa spangs nas zhing gi gzhi dang /_khyim gyi gzhi dang /_tshong khang gi gzhi len pa las slar log pa yin no/_de glang po che dang /_rta dang /_ba lang dang /_lug dang /_bya gag dang /_phag len pa spangs nas glang po che dang /_rta dang /_ba lang 
[\[271a.6\]]dang /_lug dang /_bya gag dang /_phag len pa las slar log pa yin no/_/de bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba len pa spangs nas bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba len pa las slar log pa yin no/_/de bud 
[\[271a.7\]]med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo len pa spangs nas bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo len pa las slar log pa yin no/_/de gser dang /_dngul len pa spangs nas gser dang /_dngul len pa las slar log pa yin no/_/de 'bru rjen pa len pa spangs 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]nas 'bru rjen pa len pa las slar log pa yin no/_/de za ma gcig pa yin te/_nub mo'i spangs shing dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs pa yin/_dus su rgyu zhing dus su spyod pas sbyor ba la brtson pa yin/_de lus 'tsho ba tsam gyi chos gos kyis chog shes shing tshod zin pa yin/_
[\[271b.2\]]bsod snyoms lto 'grangs kyis chog shes shing tshod zin pa yin no/_/de lus 'tsho ba tsam gyi chos gos kyis chog shes shing tshod zin/_bsod snyoms lto 'grangs kyis chog shes shing tshod zin pas gang dang gang du 'gro ba na lhung bzed dang bcas chos gos dang bcas pas 
[\[271b.3\]]'gro'o/_/dper na 'dab chags bya gang dang gang du lding ba der 'dab ma dang chas gshog pa dang chas te lding ba de bzhin du de lus 'tsho ba tsam gyi chos gos kyis chog shes shing tshod zin/_bsod snyoms lto 'grangs kyis chog shes shing tshod zin pas gang dang gang du 'gro ba na lhung bzed 
[\[271b.4\]]dang bcas/_chos gos dang bcas pas 'gro'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgya rtsa bdun pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas sa bon gyi tshogs dang /_'byung po'i tshogs sna tshogs rtsom pa 
[\[271b.5\]]la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/_rtsa ba'i sa bon dang /_sdong bu'i sa bon dang /_thor to'i sa bon dang /_'gas pa'i sa bon dang /_lnga ba sa bon gyi sa bon nyid de/_dge sbyong ni sa bon gyi tshogs dang /_'byung po'i tshogs sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson 
[\[271b.6\]]pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas gsog 'jog sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/_zas kyi gsog 'jog dang /_skom gyi gsog 'jog dang /_gos 
[\[271b.7\]]kyi gsog 'jog dang /_dri'i gsog 'jog dang /_me tog phreng gi gsog 'jog dang /_lo ma'i gsog 'jog dang /_me tog gi gsog 'jog dang /_'bras bu'i gsog 'jog ste/_dge sbyong gi gsog 'jog sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas gnas mal mthon po dang /_gnas mal chen po sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas par byed pa 'di lta ste stan dang /_khri dang /_khri snam bu can 
[\[272a.2\]]dang /_ras kyi snam bu can dang /_be'u ras kyis g.yogs pa dang /_ras yug chen gyis g.yogs pa dang /_ras khra bos g.yogs pa dang /_pa le la'i ras kyis g.yogs pa dang /_glang po che'i 'thab stan dang /_rta'i 'thab stan dang /_ngos gcig pa la las byas 
[\[272a.3\]]pa dang /_ngos gnyis ka bal las byas pa dang /_stod pa la las byas pa dang /_rgyab bal las byas pa dang /_ka ling ka'i gos kyis steng g.yogs dang bcas pa'i gos dang /_phyogs gnyis su sngas dmar po bcug pa ste/_dge sbyong ni gnas mal mthon po dang /_
[\[272a.4\]]gnas mal chen po rtsom pa la sbyor ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas chab dang /_gzhag pa sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/_mnye ba dang /_bkru 
[\[272a.5\]]ba dang /_dril phyi dang /_me tog gi phreng ba dang /_dri dang byug pa dang /_kha dog 'chang ba dang /_sen mo'i kha dog bsgyur ba dang /_so byi dor byed pa dang /_khar phye ma 'debs pa dang /_gdong gi byi dor dang /_gdong me long la blta ba dang /_gtsug phud 'ching ba dang /_
[\[272a.6\]]gdugs kyi rtsa ba sbu bu can dang /_ral gri dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_mchil lham khra bo dang /_gos sar pa dang /_ras sar pa kha tshar can 'chang ba'i rang bzhin dag ste/_dge sbyong ni gzhag pa dang cha ba sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu 
[\[272a.7\]]las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong dang /_bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas ltad mo sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/_glang po ches 'gyed pa dang /_rtas 'gyed pa dang /_shing rtas 'gyed pa dang /_
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]dpung bu chung gis 'gyed pa dang /_dbyug pas 'gyed pa dang /_khu tshur gyis 'gyed pa dang /_khyu mchog gis 'gyed pa dang /_ma hes 'gyed pa dang /_ra 'gyed pa dang /_lug 'gyed pa dang /_bya gag 'thab pa dang /_mchil pa 'thab pa dang /_'ur ba 'thab pa dang /_
[\[272b.2\]]bya gag dang /_mchil ba dang /_'ur bar 'thab pa dang /_bud med 'thab pa dang /_skyes pa 'thab pa dang /_gzhon nu 'thab pa dang /_gzhon nu ma 'thab pa dang /_shing 'jog pa dang /_bro gar gyi tshogs dang /_phrag pa nas 'gong ba dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang /_dpung 
[\[272b.3\]]gi tshogs dang /_g.yul bshams pa dang /_dmag gi tshogs la lta ba dang /_'dun phal chen po la lta bar 'dod pa ste/_dge sbyong ni ltad mo sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig 
[\[272b.4\]]dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas sgra sna tshogs nyan pa rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i skad dang /_rta'i skad dang /_shing rta'i sgra dang /_dpung bu chung gi sgra dang /_rnga pa Ta ha'i sgra dang /_dung gi sgra dang /_rnga bo che'i sgra dang /_rol mo'i tshogs pa'i 
[\[272b.5\]]sgra dang /_gar mkhan gyi sgra dang /_glu'i sgra dang /_smra ba'i sgra dang /_se gol gyi sgra dang /_thal mo'i sgra dang /_bum pa'i sgra dang /_rang bzo dang /_snyan dngags dang /_tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs dang /_'jig rten rgyang ba na dang ldan pa dang /_grags pa'i gtam nyan 'dod 
[\[272b.6\]]pa dag ste/_dge sbyong ni sgra sna tshogs nyan pa rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas/_ug shud dang /_khras dang /_rgyan po rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson par 
[\[272b.7\]]gnas pa 'di lta ste/_mig brgyad pa dang /_mig bcu pa dang /_na ya'i mig dang /_phyogs phyogs nas 'gyed pa dang /_bum pas rtse ba dang /_tsa le dang /_su kha le dang /_pheg gis rtse ba dang /_gul tsa ba dang /_thur ma dang /_lag rgyan dang /_skugs ji lta bar 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]'gyed pa ste/_dge sbyong ni ug shud dang /_khras dang /_rgyan po rtsom pa la sbyor ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas gtam sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas 
[\[273a.2\]]gnas pa 'di lta ste/_rgyal po'i gtam dang /_chom rkun gyi gtam dang /_dmag gi gtam dang /_zas kyi gtam dang /_skom gyi gtam dang /_gos kyi gtam dang /_tshong dus kyi gtam dang /_smad 'tshong gi gtam dang /_las ngan pa brjod pa'i gtam dang /_rgya mtsho 
[\[273a.3\]]chen po brjod pa'i gtam dang /_'jig rten brjod pa'i gtam dang /_ljongs dang /_sna chen po la gtogs pa brjod pa'i gtam ste/_dge sbyong ni gtam sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha 
[\[273a.4\]]cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas rtsod pa'i gtam rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/_ji ltar kho bos chos 'dul ba 'di kun shes pa de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang chos 'dul ba 'di kun shes mod kyi nga'i ni rigs pa dang ldan la khyod kyi ni rigs pa dang mi ldan no/_/nga'i 
[\[273a.5\]]ni 'brel la khyod kyi ni mi 'brel te sngar smra bar bya ba ni phyis smras/_phyis smra bar bya ba ni sngar smra la/_khyod kyis ha cang myur bar smras pa mi gsal lo/_/brtsad pas mjug brtul gyis/_khyod kyis rtsad pa'i don du smras pa'i tshig de thong shig_/tshar bcad zin to/_/gal te spogs 
[\[273a.6\]]nus na dris dang /_smros shig ces bya ba ste/_dge sbyong ni rtsod pa sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas pho nyar 'gro ba dang /_gtong ba log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed 
[\[273a.7\]]pa 'di lta ste/_de dag rgyal po'i 'am/_blon po chen po rnams kyi'am/_bram ze rnams kyi'am/_grong mi rnams kyi'am/_yul mi rnams kyi'am/_nor can rnams kyi'am/_tshong dpon rnams kyi'am/_ded dpon rnams kyi pho nya tshu bi nas khrid de pha bir sna 'dren par byed pa dang /_pha bi nas pho nya 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]khrid de tshu bir sna 'dren par byed pa ste/_dge sbyong ni pho nyar 'gro ba dang /_gtong ba log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag dang /_gzhogs slong 
[\[273b.2\]]dang /_thob kyis 'jal ba dang /_rnyed pas rnyed pa sgrub par byed de dge sbyong ni tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag dang /_gzhogs slong dang /_thob kyis 'jal ba dang /_rnyed pas rnyed pa sgrub pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig 
[\[273b.3\]]dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas yon po'i dpyad kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/_gnam 'grum pa dang /_rma mtshan dang /_rmi lam gyi mtshan ma dang /_mes tshig pa dang /_chus reg pa dang /_byi bas zos pa dang /_'bebs pa dang /_skad nyan pa dang /_'byung po 
[\[273b.4\]]thams cad kyi skad dang /_lus kyi dpyad dang /_khyim sa'i dpyad dang /_ne tso'i dpyad dang /_bya'i dpyad dang /_kha cig mthe bo'i dpyad la sbyor ba ste/_dge sbyong ni yon po'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam 
[\[273b.5\]]bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas yon po'i dpyad kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/_rgyu skar rnams la rab tu sbyor ba dang /_yud tsam dang ldang ba dang /_ro brtag pa dang /_sngags kyi las dang /_zhi ba'i las dang /_'byung po'i las dang /_
[\[273b.6\]]rgyas pa'i las dang /_dbang du bya ba'i las dang /_yi ge 'dri ba'i las dang /_bsang gtor ba'i las dang /_grangs dang /_kha cig me long gi dpyad la sbyor ba ste/_dge sbyong ni yon po'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar 
[\[273b.7\]]yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin bdag spyad nas yon po'i dpyad kyis log par 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/_lus kyi dpyad/_rtsa ba'i sman/_mig sman sbyin pa dang /_snum bag gi ro sbyin pa dang /_sman sbyin pa dang /_bud med kyi dpyad dang /_skyes pa'i 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]dpyad dang /_gzhon nu'i dpyad dang /_gzhon nu ma'i dpyad dang /_sman la sbyor bar byed pa ste/_dge slong ni yon po'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas 
[\[274a.2\]]byin pa dag dpyad nas yon po'i dpyad kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/_nor bu'i mtshan nyid dang /_dbyug pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_ral gri'i mtshan nyid dang /_mda'i mtshan nyid dang /_glang po che'i mtshan nyid dang /_rta'i mtshan nyid dang /_mtshon cha'i mtshan nyid dang /_
[\[274a.3\]]ma he'i mtshan nyid dang /_khyu mchog gi mtshan nyid dang /_ra'i mtshan nyid dang /_lug gi mtshan nyid dang /_bya gag gi mtshan nyid dang /_mchil pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_'ur ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_bud med kyi mtshan nyid dang /_skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_gzhon nu'i mtshan 
[\[274a.4\]]nyid dang /_gzhon nu ma'i mtshan nyid dang /_tshe thung ba'i rtags dang /_tshe ring ba'i rtags dang /_skal ba chung ba'i rtags dang /_skal ba che ba'i rtags dang /_bsod nams chung ba'i rtags dang /_bsod nams che ba'i rtags dang /_mthu chung ba'i rtags dang /_mthu che ba'i 
[\[274a.5\]]rtags dang /_jo bo'i mtshan nyid dang /_bran gyi mtshan nyid dag ste/_dge sbyong ni yon po'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas yon po'i dpyad kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 
[\[274a.6\]]'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/_sman mas cig car gtong ba dang /_sbrengs te gtong ba dang /_skyug pa dang /_'khru ba dang /_snar blugs pa dang /_du ba brngub pa dang /_dugs kyi las dang /_bad kan gyi dpyad dang /_pho ba'i dpyad dang /_sme ba'i dpyad dang /_phol mig gi dpyad dang /_ri 
[\[274a.7\]]dgas 'khyil ba dang /_bya rog 'khyil ba dang /_mkhur ba 'gul ba dang /_lce sos chod pa dang /_ro langs dang /_ro langs phyed kyi sbyor ba ste/_dge sbyong ni yon po'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas yon po'i dpyad kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/_dgug pa dang /_kun du dgug pa dang /_rnam par dgug pa dang /_kun du rmongs pa dang /_rnam par rmongs pa dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 
[\[274b.2\]]'joms pa'i chos dang /_bde bar byed pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar byed pa dang /_bu 'chags par byed pa dang /_til gyi sbyin sreg dang /_'bras kyi sbyin sreg dang /_nor gyi sbyin sreg dang /_'bru'i sbyin sreg dang /_mon sran sde'u yi sbyin sreg dang /_mon sran na gu'i 
[\[274b.3\]]sbyin sreg dang /_rdzas kyi sbyin sreg dang /_sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg dang /_nyi ma la bkur sti byed pa dang /_rgyu skar la bkur sti byed pa dang /_lha la bkur sti byed pa dang /_kha cig dmag mang po 'dren pa ste/_dge sbyong ni yon po'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las 
[\[274b.4\]]slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas yon po'i dpyad kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/_'jigs par 'gyur ba dang /_zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_lo nyes par 'gyur ba dang /_lo 
[\[274b.5\]]legs par 'gyur ba dang /_char mi 'bab par 'gyur ba dang /_char legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba dang /_yams kyi nad 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_yams kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste/_dge sbyong ni yon po'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las 
[\[274b.6\]]slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas yon po'i dpyad kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/_zun rnams kyi rgyal po rgyal bar 'gyur zhing phyi rol pa rnams kyi rgyal po pham par 'gyur ba 
[\[274b.7\]]dang /_phyi rol pa rnams kyi rgyal po rgyal bar 'gyur zhing zun rnams kyi rgyal po pham par 'gyur ba dang /_zun rnams kyi rgyal po g.yul du 'jug par 'gyur zhing phyi rol pa rnams kyi rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_phyi rol pa rnams kyi rgyal po g.yul du 'jug par 'gyur 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]zhing zun rnams kyi rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba ste/_dge sbyong ni yon po'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas yon po'i 
[\[275a.2\]]dpyad kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/_nyi ma dang zla ba dag lam du 'gro na 'di ltar 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma dang zla ba dag lam gol bar 'gro na 'di ltar 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma gzas zin pa dang /_zla ba gzas zin pa dang /_skar mda' lhung ba dang /_phyogs dmar 
[\[275a.3\]]por gyur pa dang /_bar snang las sgra 'byung ba dang /_lam gol bar nyi ma gzas zin pa dang /_zla ba gzas zin pa dang /_skar mda' lhung ba dang /_phyogs dmar por 'gyur ba dang /_bar snang las sgra 'byung ba dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 
[\[275a.4\]]'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba 'char ba dang /_nub pa dang /_bsgribs pa dang /_ma bsgribs pa dang /_'di lta ste lam dang /_lam gol ba'i gnas dag mi mngon na 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste/_dge sbyong ni yon po'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa 
[\[275a.5\]]yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas yon po'i dpyad kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/_nyi ma dang zla ba dag lam du 'gro na 'bras bu 'di lta bur 'gyur ba dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba dag lam gol 
[\[275a.6\]]bar 'gro na 'bras bu 'di lta bur 'gyur ba dang /_lam du nyi ma gzas zin pa dang /_zla ba gzas zin pa dang /_skar mda' ltung ba dang /_phyogs dmar por gyur pa dang /_bar snang las sgra byung na 'bras bu 'di lta bur 'gyur ba dang /_lam gol bar nyi ma gzas zin pa 
[\[275a.7\]]dang /_zla ba gzas zin pa dang /_skar mda' ltung ba dang /_phyogs dmar por gyur ba dang /_bar snang las sgra byung na 'bras bu 'di lta bur 'gyur ba dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba 'char ba dang nub pa dang /_bsgribs pa dang /_
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]ma bsgribs pa dang /_'di lta ste lam dang /_lam gol ba mngon na 'bras bu 'di lta bur 'gyur ba ston pa ste/_dge sbyong ni yon po'i dpyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/_/de 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po de dang ldan pas nang gi bde ba kha na ma tho ba 
[\[275b.2\]]med pa nyams su myong bar byed cing de dbang po rnams kyi sgo bsdams pa dang /_kun du bsrungs pa'i dran pa dang /_'grus skyong gi dran pa dang /_yid dran pas bsrungs pas gnas skabs mnyam par spyod pa yin te/_de mig gis gzugs rnams mthong na yid bde bar mi 
[\[275b.3\]]'gyur/_yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur/_mtshan mar mi 'dzin mngon rtags su mi 'dzin no/_/gzhi gang gi phyir zhe na/_mig gi dbang po'i sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pa ni 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba dag 'byung bas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos 
[\[275b.4\]]rnams sems kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/de rnams bsdam pa'i phyir sgrub cing bsrung bar mig gi dbang pos mig gi dbang po sdom par byed do/_/rna bas sgra dang /_snas dri dang /_lces ro dang /_lus kyis reg bya dang /_yid kyis chos rnams shes nas yid bde 
[\[275b.5\]]bar mi 'gyur/_yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur/_mtshan mar mi 'dzin/_mngon rtags su mi 'dzin no/_/gzhi gang gi phyir zhe na/_yid kyi dbang po'i sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pa ni 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba dag 'byung bas sdig pa 
[\[275b.6\]]mi dge ba'i chos rnams sems kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/de rnams bsdams pa'i phyir sgrub cing bsrung bar yid kyi dbang pos yid kyi dbang po sdom par byed do/_/de 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po de dang /_dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa de dang ldan pas nang 
[\[275b.7\]]gi bde ba gnod pa med pa nyams su myong zhing de 'gro ba dang ldog pa la shes bzhin du gnas pa yin no/_/de lta ba dang /_rnam par lta ba dang /_bskum pa dang /_brkyang ba dang /_snam sbyar dang /_chos gos dang /_lhung bzed len pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dang /_mi nyal ba dang /_smra ba dang /_mi smra ba dang /_gnyid kyis dub pa sel ba la yang shes bzhin du gnas pa yin no/_/de 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po de dang ldan zhing dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa de dang /_dran pa 
[\[276a.2\]]dang shes bzhin mchog de dang ldan pas nang gi bde ba kha na ma tho ba med pa nyams su myong ba yin no/_/de 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po de dang ldan zhing dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa de dang /_dran pa dang shes bzhin mchog de dang ldan pas gnas mal dben pa dgon pa 
[\[276a.3\]]dang /_shing drung dang /_khang stong dag tu gnas pa yin te/_de dgon par son kyang rung /_shing drung du son kyang rung /_khang stong du son kyang rung /_'dug ste skyil mo krung bcas shing lus drang por bsrang nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste/_de 'jig rten la brnab 
[\[276a.4\]]sems spangs te/_brnab sems dang bral ba'i sems kyis lan mang du gnas shing brnab sems yongs su sbyong ba yin no/_/'jig rten la gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tshom spangs te yid gnyis las 
[\[276a.5\]]rgal ba yin/_the tshom dang som nyi las rgal ba yin zhing dge ba'i chos rnams la the tshom yongs su sbyong ba yin no/_/rgyal po chen po dper na mi zhig gis skyin po zhig blangs nas zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la brtson par byas te/_de'i las kyi mtha' de rnams chud 
[\[276a.6\]]ma zos shing grub nas des de las bu lon de yang gzhal la de la chung ma gso ba chog tsam zhig kyang bdog nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis skyin po blangs nas las kyi mtha' rnams la brtson par byas te/_bdag gi las kyi mtha' de rnams chud ma zos shing grub nas 
[\[276a.7\]]bdag gis de la bu lon de yang gzhal/_bdag la chung ma gso ba chog tsam zhig kyang bdog go snyam ste/_de gzhi des bde bar gyur yid bde bar gyur pa dang /_dper na mi na ba nad tshabs che ba sdug bsngal ba zhig yod la/_de zas zos pa ni lus la 'jur mi btub/_skom 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]'thungs pa ni khong du gnod par gyur pa las de dus gzhan zhig na nad med cing mthu dang ldan par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag sngon na ba na nad tshabs che ba sdug bsngal bar gyur pa na/_bdag gis kha zas zos pa ni lus la 'jur mi btub/_skom 'thungs pa ni khong du 
[\[276b.2\]]gnod par gyur pa las da ni bdag nad med cing mthu dang ldan pas bde ste bdag gis zas zos pa ni lus la 'jur btub/_skom 'thungs pa ni khong du gnod par ma gyur to snyam ste/_gzhi des dga' ba dang /_rab tu dga' bar gyur pa dang /_dper na mi zhig bran du gyur te/_mngag 
[\[276b.3\]]gzhug pa go re long lto kho_la rang dbang med par gyur pa las de dus gzhan zhig na bran mi byed par gyur te mngag gzhug pa mi byed/_go re long mi byed/_lto khol mi byed de/_rang dbang yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag sngon bran du gyur pa na mngag gzhug pa dang /_go re long 
[\[276b.4\]]dang /_lto khol dang /_rang dbang med pa las da ni bdag bran mi byed pas mngag gzhug mi byed/_go re long mi byed/_lto khol mi byed de/_rang dbang yod do snyam nas/_de gzhi des bde bar gyur/_yid bde bar gyur pa dang /_dper na mi zhig btson du bzung ste/_phyin ka log tu dam 
[\[276b.5\]]du bcings pa las de de las nor gzhal ba med par bde bar legs par thar par gyur pa dang /_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag sngon btson du bzung nas phyin ka log tu dam du bcings par gyur pa las da ni de las nor gzhal mi dgos par bde bar legs par thar to snyam nas/_
[\[276b.6\]]de gzhi des bde bar gyur/_yid bde bar gyur pa dang /_dper na mi zhig skrag par gyur pa las bde ba dang /_lo nyes pa las lo legs par gyur nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag skrag pa las bde bar gyur cing /_lo nyes pa las lo legs par gyur to snyam ste/_de 
[\[276b.7\]]gzhi des bde bar gyur/_yid bde bar gyur pa de bzhin du rgyal po chen po des bdag nyid kyi sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag skyin po ji lta ba dang /_nad ji lta ba dang /_bran ji lta ba dang /_btson ji lta ba dang /_'jig pa ji lta ba bzhin du spangs pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_de sgrib 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]pa lnga po sems nye ba'i nyon mongs par byed pa/_shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa/_mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa/_mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gyur ba dag spangs nas/_de 'dod pa rnams las dben/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las 
[\[277a.2\]]dben/_rtog pa dang bcas/_dpyod pa dang bcas/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas nas gnas so/_/des lus de nyid dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas mngon du rlan par byed/_yongs su rlan par 
[\[277a.3\]]byed/_yongs su tshim par byed yongs su khyab par byed de de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas ma khyab pa'am/_khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do/_/dper na khrus mkhan nam khrus mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig 
[\[277a.4\]]kha phor ram/_gzhong bu 'am/_nya phyis kyi nang du 'dag chal gyi phye ma zhib mo blugs te chus btab ste bdas na 'dag chal gyi gong bu de gsher dang ldan/_gsher gyis zhen te/_gsher gyis phyi nang khyab pas 'bo bar mi 'gyur/_'dzag par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin 
[\[277a.5\]]du des lus de nyid dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas mngon du rlan par byed/_yongs su rlan par byed/_yongs su tshim par byed/_yongs su khyab par byed do/_/de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas ma khyab pa'am/_khyab 
[\[277a.6\]]par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/_btsun pa mad lags te/_de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras 
[\[277a.7\]]bu bstan lags so/_/de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dngas te/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/_dpyod pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas nas gnas shing /_des lus de nyid 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas mngon du rlan par byed/_yongs su rlan par byed/_yongs su tshim par byed/_yongs su khyab par byed de/_de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas ma khyab pa'am/_khyab par ma gyur 
[\[277b.2\]]pa cung zad kyang med do/_/dper na ri'i rtse mo'i phyogs shig na bkod ma'i mtsho bran zhig yod par gyur la/_der ni shar phyogs nas kyang chu mi 'bab par gyur la/_lho phyogs nas ma yin/_nub phyogs nas ma yin zhing /_byang phyogs nas kyang chu mi 'bab la/_der lhas kyang dus dus 
[\[277b.3\]]su char gyi rgyun mi 'bebs te/_gzhan du na bkod ma'i mtsho bran de nyid nas bkod ma'i chu'am/_bkod ma'i chu chen po lud nas bkod ma'i mtsho bran de thams cad chu bsil bas gang bar byed/_yongs su gang bar byed/_shin tu gang bar byed/_yongs su khyab par byed de/_
[\[277b.4\]]bkod ma'i mtsho bran de thams cad 'di lta ste/_chu bsil bas ma khyab pa'am/_khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do/_/de bzhin du des lus de nyid ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas mngon du rlan par byed/_yongs su rlan par byed/_yongs su tshim par byed/_
[\[277b.5\]]yongs su rgyas par byed de/_de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas ma khyab pa'am/_khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 
[\[277b.6\]]'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/_btsun pa mad lags te/_de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lags so/_de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bar btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin 
[\[277b.7\]]te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas nas gnas te/_des lus de nyid dga' ba med pa'i bde bas mngon du rlan par 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]byed/_yongs su rlan par byed/_yongs su tshim par byed/_yongs su khyab par byed de/_de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bde bas ma khyab pa'am/_khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do/_dper na ut+pal 'am/_pad 
[\[278a.2\]]ma'am/_ku mu da'am/_pad ma dkar po chu las skyes shing chu nas chen por gyur pa rtses btags shing 'dug pa de dag gi rtsa ba nas rtse mo'i bar gyi gsab gseb 'di lta ste/_chu bsil bas ma khyab pa'am/_khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med pa de bzhin du des lus de nyid dga' ba med pa'i 
[\[278a.3\]]bde bas mngon du rlan par byed/_yongs su rlan par byed/_yongs su tshim par byed/_yongs su khyab par byed de/_de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bde bas ma khyab pa'am/_khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_
[\[278a.4\]]de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/_btsun pa mad lags te/_de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lags so/_/de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang 
[\[278a.5\]]spangs shing yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi ba rdzogs par byas nas gnas te/_de lus de nyid yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i sems kyis 
[\[278a.6\]]lhag par mos te/_khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pas de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/_yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i sems kyis ma khyab pa'am/_khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do/_/dper na khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi bus 
[\[278a.7\]]ras khru brgyad pa'am/_dgu pas de mgo dang /_lag pa dang rkang pa g.yogs nas/_de'i mgo dang lag pa nas rkang pa'i bar lus thams cad 'di lta ste/_ras gtsang ma yongs su dag pas ma yog pa'am/_yog par ma gyur ba cung zad kyang med do/_/de bzhin du des lus de 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]nyid yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i sems kyis lhag par mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pas de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/_yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i sems kyis ma khyab pa'am/_khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med 
[\[278b.2\]]do/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/_btsun pa mad lags te/_de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lags 
[\[278b.3\]]so/_/rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos bde ba yang spangs te/_snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[278b.4\]]pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de'i tshe de'i sems rgod pa ma yin zhum pa ma yin no/_/rgod pa med cing zhum pa med pas mi g.yo bar gnas pa thob bo/_/dper na khang pa rtseg ma'am/_khang pa rtseg ma'i khyams su 'bru mar gyi me mar bus pa de'i me lce rlung nas bya dang mi 
[\[278b.5\]]dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis ma bskyod cing ma bsgul ba de'i me lce de rgod pa ma yin zhum pa ma yin no/_/rgod pa med cing zhum pa med par gnas pas mi g.yo bar 'bar ba de bzhin du/_gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos bde ba yang spangs te/_snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs 
[\[278b.6\]]shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de'i tshe de'i sems de rgod pa ma yin/_zhum pa ma yin no/_/rgod pa med cing zhum pa med 
[\[278b.7\]]pas mi g.yo bar gnas pa thob nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi lus kyi gzugs 'di ni rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rgyu las byung ba yin te/_'di la bdag gi rnam par shes pa rten cing 'di la gnas te 'di la khyab par gnas kyis/_ma la bdag gis lus 'di 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]las yid bskyod de lus gzhan yid las byung ba'i gzugs dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin zhing dman pa ma yin pa zhig mngon par sprul lo snyam nas/_de lus de las yid bskyod de lus gzhan yid las byung ba'i gzugs dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin zhing dman pa ma yin 
[\[279a.2\]]pa mngon par sprul par byed do/_/dper na nor bu baiDUr+ya bzang po rigs dang ldan pa gsal ba dang /_dang ba dang /_dri ma med pa tshon skud sna lnga pa 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan la brgyus pa de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas 
[\[279a.3\]]mthong na 'di ni skud pa yin no/_/'di ni nor bu yin te/_skud pa 'di la nor bu brgyus so zhes bya bar shes pa de bzhin du de lus de las yid bskyod de/_lus gzhan zhig las byung ba'i gzugs dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin zhing dman pa ma yin pa mngon par sprul par byed do/_/dper 
[\[279a.4\]]na mi zhig gis rtswa mun dza las thur ma phyung pa de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na 'di ni rtswa mun dza yin no/_/'di ni thur ma yin te/_mun dza las thur ma phyung ba yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du de lus de las yid bskyod nas lus gzhan yid las byung ba'i gzugs dbang po ma tshang 
[\[279a.5\]]ba ma yin zhing dman pa ma yin pa mngon par sgrub par byed do/_/dper na mi zhig gis za ma tog nas sbrul phyung ba de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na 'di ni za ma tog yin no/_/'di ni sbrul yin te/_za ma tog nas sbrul phyung ba yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du de lus de las 
[\[279a.6\]]yid bskyod nas lus gzhan yid las byung ba'i gzugs dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin zhing dman pa ma yin pa mngon par sprul par byed do/_/dper na mi zhig gis ral gri shubs nas phyung ba de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na 'di ni shubs yin no/_/'di ni ral gri yin te/_ral gri 
[\[279a.7\]]shubs nas phyung ba yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/_de lus de las yid bskyod nas lus gzhan yid las byung ba'i gzugs dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin zhing dman pa ma yin pa mngon par sprul par byed do/_/de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]ba nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba thob nas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon par gtod par byed cing /_de rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyams 
[\[279b.2\]]su myong bar byed de/_'di lta ste/_gcig tu gyur nas mang por gyur pa dang /_mang por gyur nas gcig tu gyur pa dang /_snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar gyur pa'i shes pa mthong ba nyams su myong bar byed cing /_rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro/_/ri la yang thad kar 'gro/_/ra 
[\[279b.3\]]ba la yang thad kar 'gro ste/_lus kyis thogs pa med par 'gro ba ni dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang bye'u zul byed de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang rgyun phyogs las bzlog par 'gro ste/_dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/
[\[279b.4\]]nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/zla ba dang nyi ma 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba la yang lag pas 'dzin cing kun du nyug par byed la/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur bar byed 
[\[279b.5\]]do/_/dper na gser mgar ram gser mgar gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis gser shin tu las su rung bar byas par rig nas rdungs su bya ba'i rnam pa phor bu 'am/_mgul rgyan nam/_lag rgyan nam/_rkang rgyan nam/_sor gdub rgya'am/_gser gyi phreng ba gang dang gang 
[\[279b.6\]]byed 'dod pa de dang de myur ba myur bar byed pa de bzhin du/_de de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa/_las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba thob nas 
[\[279b.7\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du gtod par byed cing /_de rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed de/_'di lta ste gcig tu gyur nas mang por gyur pa dang /_mang por gyur nas gcig tu gyur pa dang /_snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]gyur pa'i shes pa mthong ba nyams su myong bar byed cing /_rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro/_/ri la yang thad kar 'gro/_/ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro ste/_lus kyis thogs pa med par 'gro ba ni dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang bye'u 
[\[280a.2\]]zul byed de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang rgyun phyogs las bzlog par 'gro ste/_dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/zla ba dang nyi ma 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu 
[\[280a.3\]]che ba la yang lag pas 'dzin cing kun du nyug par byed la/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur bar yang byed do/_/dper na rdza mkhan nam rdza mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis 'jim pa'i gong bu shin tu las su rung bar byas par rig nas snod kyi rnam pa gang dang gang 
[\[280a.4\]]du bsgrub par 'dod pa de dang de kho na myur bar myur bar sgrub par byed pa de bzhin du/_de de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa/_las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba 
[\[280a.5\]]thob nas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon par gtod par byed cing /_de rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do/_/'di lta ste gcig tu gyur nas mang por gyur pa dang /_mang por gyur nas gcig tu gyur pa dang /_snang 
[\[280a.6\]]bar gyur cing mi snang bar gyur pa'i shes pa mthong ba nyams su myong bar byed cing /_rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro/_ri la yang thad kar 'gro/_/ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro ste/_lus kyis thogs pa med par 'gro ba ni dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang /_
[\[280a.7\]]bye'u zul byed de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_chu la yang rgyun phyogs las bzlog par 'gro ste/_dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/zla ba dang nyi ma 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]la yang lag pas 'dzin cing kun du nyug par byed la/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur bar yang byed do/_/dper na ba so mkhan nam ba so mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis bso shin tu las su rung bar byas par rig nas gzugs kyi rnam pa gang dang gang du bsgrub 
[\[280b.2\]]par 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa de dang de myur ba myur bar sgrub par byed pa de bzhin du/_de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa/_las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi 
[\[280b.3\]]g.yo ba thob nas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon par gtod par byed cing /_de rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed de/_'di lta ste gcig tu gyur nas mang por gyur pa dang /_mang por gyur nas gcig tu gyur pa dang /_
[\[280b.4\]]snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar gyur pa'i shes pa mthong ba nyams su myong bar byed cing /_rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro/_/ri la yang thad kar 'gro/_/ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro ste/_lus kyis thogs pa med par 'gro ba ni dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 
[\[280b.5\]]'byung ba dang bye'u zul byed de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang rgyun phyogs las bzlog par 'gro ste/_dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/zla ba dang nyi ma 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_
[\[280b.6\]]'di ltar mthu che ba la yang lag pas 'dzin cing kun du nyug par byed la/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur bar yang byed do/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/_
[\[280b.7\]]btsun pa mad lags te/_de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag pa mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lags so/_/de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]drang por gyur pa/_las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba thob nas lha'i rna ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon sum du bya ba la sems mngon du gtod par byed cing /_de lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das nas mi rnams kyi'am/_mi ma yin pa 
[\[281a.2\]]rnams kyi'am/_gang dag ring po'am/_gang dag nye ba'i sgra gnyi ga thos par byed do/_/dper na mi dung 'bud pa zhig ri brag chen po'i khar 'dzegs nas mtshan nam phyed kyi dus su dung bus na de'i sgra des phyogs tha dad pa thogs pa med par khyab pa de bzhin du/_de ltar mnyam par gzhag 
[\[281a.3\]]pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa/_las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba thob nas lha'i rna ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du 
[\[281a.4\]]gtod par byed cing /_de lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das nas mi rnams kyi'am/_mi ma yin pa rnams kyi'am/_gang dag ring po'am/_gang dag nye ba'i sgra gnyi ga thos par byed do/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge 
[\[281a.5\]]sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/_btsun pa mad lags te/_de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lags so/_/de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang ba/_nyon 
[\[281a.6\]]mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa/_las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba thob nas de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du gtod par byed cing /_de'i yid kyis sems can gzhan rnams kyi 
[\[281a.7\]]dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa'i yid ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa dang /_gti mug dang bral ba dang /_bsdus pa dang /_rnam par g.yengs pa dang /_zhum pa dang /_rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[281b.2\]]rgod pa dang /_rgod pa ma yin pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba ma yin pa dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang /_bsgoms pa ma yin pa dang /_rnam par grol ba ma yin pa'i sems la rnam par grol ba ma yin pa'i sems yin no 
[\[281b.3\]]zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems la shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pas me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu yongs su dag pa blangs nas rang gi bzhin gyi 
[\[281b.4\]]mtshan ma la rtog par byed pa de bzhin du/_de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba thob nas sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon 
[\[281b.5\]]sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon par gtod par byed cing /_de'i yid kyis sems can gzhan rnams kyi dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa'i yid ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes te/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang 
[\[281b.6\]]bcas pa'i sems yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa dang /_gti 
[\[281b.7\]]mug dang bral ba dang /_bsdus pa dang /_rnam par g.yengs pa dang /_zhum pa dang /_rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_rgod pa dang /_rgod pa ma yin pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba ma yin pa dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang /_
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]bsgoms pa ma yin pa dang /_rnam par grol ba ma yin pa'i sems la rnam par grol ba ma yin pa'i sems yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems la shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[282a.2\]]bzhin rab tu shes so/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/_btsun pa mad lags te/_de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lags 
[\[282a.3\]]so/_/de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba thob nas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par 
[\[282a.4\]]shes pa la sems mngon du gtod par byed cing /_de sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/_'di lta ste skye ba gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_drug dang /_bdun dang /_brgyad dang /_dgu dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum bcu dang /_bzhi 
[\[282a.5\]]bcu dang /_lnga bcu dang /_skye ba brgya dang /_skye ba stong dang /_skye ba brgya stong dang /_skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang /_skye ba stong phrag du ma dang /_skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig 
[\[282a.6\]]pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma rjes su dran te/_gang du bdag sems can 'di dag gi nang du skyes pa na ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/_kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_bde ba dang 
[\[282a.7\]]sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong /_yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas/_tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub bo/_bdag gnas de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/_/de nas kyang shi 'phos nas ga ge mo zhig tu skyes so/_/de nas kyang shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas/_
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]yul phyogs dang bcas par sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_dper na mi zhig grong nas grong du song la de nas kyang grong gzhan du song ste/_de nas kyang 'dir 'ongs nas de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis grong 
[\[282b.2\]]che ge mo nas grong che ge mor son to/_/de nas kyang grong che ge mor ro/_/de nas kyang 'dir 'ongs so snyam pa de bzhin du/_de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa las su rung ba la gnas pa/_
[\[282b.3\]]mi g.yo ba thob nas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du gtod par byed cing /_des sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/_'di lta ste/_skye ba gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_drug dang /_
[\[282b.4\]]bdun dang /_brgyad dang /_dgu dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum bcu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu dang /_skye ba brgya dang /_skye ba stong dang /_skye ba brgya stong dang /_skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang /_skye ba stong phrag du ma dang /_skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa 
[\[282b.5\]]dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma rjes su dran te/_gang du bdag sems can 'di dag gi nang du skyes pa na ming ni 'di zhes 
[\[282b.6\]]bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/_kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong /_yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas/_tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub bo/_/bdag gnas de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes/_de nas kyang 
[\[282b.7\]]shi 'phos nas ga ge mo zhig tu skyes/_de nas kyang shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas/_yul phyogs dang bcas par sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/_btsun pa mad lags te/_de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lags so/_/de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam 
[\[283a.2\]]par byang ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa/_las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba thob nas 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du gtod par byed cing /_de'i lha'i mig 
[\[283a.3\]]rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho rnams dang /_skye ba rnams dang /_kha dog bzang po rnams dang /_kha dog ngan pa rnams dang /_dman pa rnams dang /_gya nom pa rnams dang /_bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams kyang mthong 
[\[283a.4\]]zhing sems can las ji lta ba bzhin nye bar 'gro ba dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes te/_sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_log par lta ba dang /_log 
[\[283a.5\]]par lta ba'i chos kyi las blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa 
[\[283a.6\]]dang ldan zhing /_'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang yang dag par lta ba dang yang dag par lta ba'i chos kyi las blangs pa'i rgyus/_rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes so/_/dper na skyes bu 
[\[283a.7\]]mig dang ldan pa zhig lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_spyod pa sna tshogs la rtog par byed pa de bzhin du/_de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang ba/_nyon 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba thob nas 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du gtod par byed cing /_de'i lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i 
[\[283b.2\]]las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho rnams dang /_skye ba rnams dang /_kha dog bzang po rnams dang /_kha dog ngan pa rnams dang /_dman pa rnams dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams kyang mthong zhing sems can las ji lta ba bzhin nye 
[\[283b.3\]]bar 'gro ba dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_log par lta ba dang log par lta ba'i chos kyi las blangs pa'i 
[\[283b.4\]]rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas/_shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams la skur 
[\[283b.5\]]ba mi 'debs pa dang /_yang dag par lta ba dang /_yang dag par lta ba'i chos kyi las blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes so/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de lta yin na ngas 
[\[283b.6\]]yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/_btsun pa mad lags te/_de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lags so/_/de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_
[\[283b.7\]]rnam par byang ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa/_las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba thob nas zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du gtod par byed cing /_des 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]pa'i bden pa yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[284a.2\]]bzhin rab tu shes so/_/des de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong nas 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_srid pa'i zag pa dang /_ma rig pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod 
[\[284a.3\]]pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes nyid mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dper na grong rdal lam grong khyer dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na mtsho bran gting zab pa/_gsal ba dang ba/_rnam par dang ba zhig yod pa der skyes bu 
[\[284a.4\]]mig dang ldan pa zhig 'gram du 'dug nas gseg ma'am/_gyo mo'am/_nya 'am rus sbal lam/_nya phyis sam/_dung rnams mthong ba de bzhin du/_de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_rnam par byang ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs 
[\[284a.5\]]pa dang bral ba/_drang por gyur pa/_las su rung ba la gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba thob nas zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du gtod par byed cing /_des 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[284a.6\]]rab tu shes so/_/'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/des de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong nas 'dod pa'i 
[\[284a.7\]]zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_srid pa'i zag pa dang /_ma rig pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]rnam par grol ba'i ye shes nyid mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/_btsun pa mang lags te/_de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par 
[\[284b.2\]]mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lags so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra mchi ma blags te dus so/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras gos kyi mtha' mas mchi ma phyis nas bcom ldan 
[\[284b.3\]]'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nongs lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa nongs lags te/_'di ltar bdag sdig pa'i grogs po'i grogs can/_sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mchis pa/_sdig 
[\[284b.4\]]pa'i grogs pos zin pas pha chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po bkum pas byis pa ji lta ba dang /_blun po ji lta ba dang /_mi gsal ba ji lta ba dang /_mi mkhas pa ji lta ba lags te/_btsun pa bdag nongs par 'tshal zhing nongs par mthong na thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 
[\[284b.5\]]nongs pa la nongs par gzung du gsol/_rgyal po chen po nyes pa la nyes par khyod kyis khong du chud pa ni bden te/_'di ltar khyod sdig pa'i grogs po'i grogs can/_sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song ba/_sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas pha chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po 
[\[284b.6\]]bsad pa ni byis pa ji lta ba dang /_blun po ji lta ba dang /_mi gsal ba ji lta ba dang /_mi mkhas pa ji lta ba yin te/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'di ltar nyes pa shes shing mthong la de mthong nas kyang bshags nas/_phyis sdom par byed na dge ba'i chos rnams mi nyams shing 
[\[284b.7\]]'phel ba nyid du 'dod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po gang 'ga' zhig nyes pa shes shing nyes pa mthong la de mthong nas kyang bshags nas phyis sdom par byed na de'i dge ba'i chos rnams mi nyams shing 'phel ba nyid du 'dod do/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin 
[\[285a\]]
