[\[285a.1\]]du khyod kyis 'di ltar nyes pa shes shing nyes pa mthong la de mthong nas kyang bshags nas phyis sdom par byed na khyod kyi dge ba'i chos rnams mi nyams shing 'phel ba nyid du 'dod par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma 
[\[285a.2\]]skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/
[\[285a.3\]]de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 
[\[285a.4\]]'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra rma byung zhing 
[\[285a.5\]]nyams te/_sdig pa'i grogs po'i grogs can/_sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song ba/_sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa des pha chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos la gnas pa rgyal po chen po bsad do/_/dge slong dag gal te lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes 
[\[285a.6\]]dgras pha chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos la gnas pa rgyal po chen po bsad par ma gyur na/_stan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon du byas par 'gyur ba 
[\[285a.7\]]gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod do/_/dge slong dag lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra ni de ltar rma byung zhing de ltar nyams par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_/gang sdong dum tshig pa la yang ngan sems mi bskyed na/_rnam 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos kyis/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag lta gon byas nas nang par 
[\[285b.2\]]sngar langs te gdan bshams/_nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/_spyan 'dren gyis bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags na/_da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na 
[\[285b.3\]]bza' sham thabs mnabs chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams te/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong 
[\[285b.4\]]gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dag 
[\[285b.5\]]rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/_rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba 
[\[285b.6\]]zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sbyin pa la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/_sbyin sreg mchod sbyin rnams kyi mchog_/sdeb sbyor 
[\[285b.7\]]mchog ni nyi ma'i lha/_/mi yi mchog ni rgyal po ste/_/rgya mtsho chu bo rnams kyi mchog_/zla ba rgyu skar rnams kyi gtso/_/nyi ma snang byed rnams kyi gtso/_/steng dang 'og dang thad kar yang /_/'gro ba'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/smra ba'i 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par 
[\[286a.2\]]mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/_gdan 
[\[286a.3\]]las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gzhi med pa'i dad pa la bzhag pa de'i tshe gal te khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng ngam/_glang po che la zhon pa las/_bcom ldan 'das mthong 
[\[286a.4\]]na yang de'i tshe bdag nyid mchod par byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na glang po che la zhon pas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas des bdag nyid mchongs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis blangs so/_/des zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_nang mi rnams 
[\[286a.5\]]la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig deng phan chad nga bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos la skyabs su song gis de lta bas na deng phan chad bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge 
[\[286a.6\]]bsnyen ma rnams la sgo ma dgag shig_/lha sbyin dang /_lha sbyin gyi nyan thos rnams la ni sgo khog shig_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/_lha sbyin rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /_sgo bas smras pa/_nang du ma 'jug par 
[\[286a.7\]]sdod cig_/ci'i phyir lhas bka' stsal pa/_deng phan chad nga bcom ldan 'das dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la skyabs su song gis/_de lta bas na deng phan chad bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]ma rnams la sgo ma dgag shig_/lha sbyin dang /_lha sbyin gyi nyan thos rnams la ni sgo khog shig ces byung ngo /_/de yang sgo na stod cing 'dug pa las dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog bsod snyoms blangs te rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ba dang /_lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems 
[\[286b.2\]]te/_'di ni dge sbyong mgo reg mo 'di'i las yin te/_'dis rgyal po ma skyes dgra nang mi dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang bcas pa dang /_bdag tu dbyen byas pas des na bdag 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur to snyam du bsams nas/_ut+pa la'i 
[\[286b.3\]]mdog la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod la kho bos nyes pa ci byas na/_gang gi phyir khyod kyis kho bo bsod snyoms kyi khyim las ring du byas zhes des de bsad par brtsams te de la bsnun pa na/_de snying rje rje skad du tshig re re nas dal gyis smras pa/_'phags 
[\[286b.4\]]pa rnams mi bzod de/_ci bdag re zhig khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi mched shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba la de ltar bgyid dam/_bdag gis de ltar ma bgyis kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces de skad smras kyang /_lha sbyin gyis de'i mgo bor khu tshur gyis bsnun 
[\[286b.5\]]to/_/de gnad kyi tshor bas nyen te srog gi 'du byed byin gyis brlabs te tshe'i 'du byed btang nas brtson 'grus la gnas te dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du song ngo /_/dge slong ma rnams kyis de lta bu de mthong nas smras pa/_'phags ma ci nongs/_des smras 
[\[286b.6\]]pa/_phu nu mo dag 'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba yin pas khyed cag dge ba'i chos rnams la bag yod par gyis shig_/lha sbyin gyis mtshams med pa gsum pa byas kyis 
[\[286b.7\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes de nas des dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi mdun du cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa lha sbyin gyis dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog snying rje rje skad du smres bzhin du khu tshur gyis bsnun te bkum pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[287a.2\]]dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis 'di snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don bzhin du bsad de sha zos pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas te/_de'i lug rdzis lug gi khyu 
[\[287a.3\]]de bskyang ba'i phyir grong khyer nas phyi rol du byung ngo /_/de nas bskyangs nas nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi tshe ri 'or du 'da' bar brtsams pa dang /_de na lug ma rgan zhig phyi nas 'brang zhing song ba de spyang kis bzung ba dang smras pa/_zhang zhang cig khyod bde'am/_/zhang 
[\[287a.4\]]zhang re lta bder gyur tam/_/zhang zhang nyag gcig dgon pa na/_/ji ga bde ba bltar lags sam/_/des kyang smras pa/_kho bo'i mjug ma brdzis nas su/_/mjug ma'i spu yang byi nas ni/_/zhang po zhes pa'i tshig smras pa/_/lug khyod thar 
[\[287a.5\]]bar re'am ci/_/lug ma mos yang smras pa/_khyod kyi mjug ma phongs na yod/_/bdag gi mdun nas 'ongs gyur na/_/ji lta bu yi thabs shig gis/_/bdag gis mjug ma brdzis par 'gyur/_/spyang kis yang smras pa/_gling bzhi pa 'di rgya 
[\[287a.6\]]mtshor bcas/_/ri bor bcas pa thams cad na/_/bdag gi mjug ma yod yin na/_/khyod ni gang nas 'ongs pa zhig_/lug ma mos smras pa/_bzang po khyod kyi mjug ma ni/_/thams cad na ni mchis so zhes/_/bdag gis gnyen las sngon thos 
[\[287a.7\]]nas/_/nam mkha' las ni mchis lags so/_/spyang kis smras pa/_ma rgan khyod nyid de ring ni/_/nam mkha' las ni 'ongs nas su/_/bdag gi bza' skal gang yin pa'i/_/bdag gi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]tshogs de bskrogs/_/de ni de skad smra bzhin du/_/
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]sdig pa'i las can gyis mchongs nas/_/lug gi mgo bo bcad nas ni/_/bsad de sha yang zos par gyur/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spyang ki gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lug ma rgan gang yin 
[\[287b.2\]]pa de ni dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don bzhin du bsad do/_/da ltar yang 'di snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don bzhin du bsad do/_/de nas lha sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis bcom 
[\[287b.3\]]ldan 'das la pha rol gnon pa mang du byas shing mtshams med pa yang gsum byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la rdo 'phangs nas khrag phyung ba 'di ni mtshams med pa dang po yin no/_/dge 'dun phye ba ni gnyis pa yin no/_/ut+pa la'i mdog bsad pa 'di ni 
[\[287b.4\]]gsum pa yin te/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma thob la/_gzhan yang dgos pa cung zad kyang ma grub ste/_da ni gzhan byar med sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/_lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 
[\[287b.5\]]'dug go/_/ji tsam na rdzogs byed de'i drung du phyin nas smras pa/_lha sbyin ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des smras pa/_gang gis na bdag zhe sdang gi dbang du song bas bcom ldan 'das la pha rol gnon pa mang du byas 
[\[287b.6\]]shing mtshams med pa'i las gsum byas pas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por yun ring du gnas par 'gyur na/_bdag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug_/des smras pa/_bdag gis shAkya rnams kyi nang na khyod 'ba' zhig mkhas pa 
[\[287b.7\]]yin no snyam du shes na khyod kyang blun pa lta/_gang gis na khyod 'di ltar sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa'i 'jig rten pha rol ga la yod/_gal te 'jig rten pha rol yod na khyod kyis las 'di 'dra ba byas pas khyod kyi phyir kho bo yang sems khong du chud cing 'dug 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]go/_/de yid ches par bya ba'i phyir des de'i mdun du ril ba bcag nas/_re zhig lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'di slar 'byor par byos shig_/ye bag ma tsha shig_/'di la byed pa po 'am/_byed du 'jug pa po ni 'ga' yang 
[\[288a.2\]]med do/_/de lta mod kyi song la ser skya'i gzhir son nas rgyal srid byos shig dang bdag gis khyod kyi blon po'i mchog bgyi'o/_/de na lha sbyin 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa'i log pa'i lta ba thob ste/_des na thams cad kyi thams cad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[288a.3\]]rnams chad par gyur to/_/de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lha sbyin gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bcad de/_dge slong dag ngas ji srid lha sbyin la dkar po'i chos gzigs pa de'i bar du ngas 'di ltar lha sbyin ngan 
[\[288a.4\]]song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ba'o zhes lha sbyin lung ma bstan to/_/dper na grong khyer ram/_grong rdal dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na phyi sa khung zabs su mi gang lhag tsam zhig yod pa der mi 'ga' zhig mgo dang /_
[\[288a.5\]]lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang bcas par nub par gyur pa de la mi yun ring por don du 'dod pa phan par 'dod pa/_bde bar 'dod pa/_grub pa dang bde ba la reg par 'dod pa 'ga' zhig song ste/_des phyis khung de'i nye 'khor kun tu bskor zhing song 
[\[288a.6\]]ste/_mi de'i phyi sas ma reg pa'i phyogs 'ga' zhig rnyed na 'di de nas bzung ste dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas/_des de'i nye 'khor kun tu bskor te song na mi de la des bzung ste dbyung ba'i phyogs chung ngu na lag mthil tsam yang mi gtsang bas ma reg pa cung zad 
[\[288a.7\]]kyang med pa de bzhin du/_dge slong dag ngas ji srid lha sbyin la dkar po'i chos gang na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang gzigs pa de'i bar du ni ngas 'di ltar lha sbyin ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ba'o zhes lha sbyin lung ma 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]bstan gyi/_ngas gang nas lha sbyin la dkar po'i chos chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang ma gzigs pa de nas/_ngas 'di ltar lha sbyin ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ba'o zhes lha sbyin lung bstan to/_/dge slong 
[\[288b.2\]]dag lha sbyin sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos gsum dang ldan pas ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ngo /_/dge slong dag gsum gang zhe na/_thog ma nyid nas lha sbyin sdig pa 'dod par gyur cing sdig pa 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa ste/_
[\[288b.3\]]gang lha sbyin thog ma nyid nas sdig pa 'dod par gyur cing sdig pa 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa dam pa ma yin pa'i chos dang po 'di dang ldan pas/_lha sbyin ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ngo /_/dge slong dag gzhan yang lha 
[\[288b.4\]]sbyin sdig pa'i bshes gnyen can/_sdig pa'i grogs can/_sdig pa dang sdong ba ste/_gang lha sbyin thog ma nyid nas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen can/_sdig pa'i grogs can/_sdig pa dang sdong ba dam pa ma yin pa'i chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan pas lha 
[\[288b.5\]]sbyin ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ngo /_/gzhan yang lha sbyin khyad par ngan ngon cung zad tsam zhig rtogs nas gong du bya ba yod bzhin du sgyid lug par gyur te/_gang lha sbyin gyis khyad par ngan ngon cung zad rtogs nas gong du bya ba yod 
[\[288b.6\]]bzhin du bar du sgyid lug pa dam pa ma yin pa'i chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan pas lha sbyin ngan song sems can dmyal bar bskal par gnas pas gsor mi rung ngo zhes smra'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bde bar gshegs pas de 
[\[288b.7\]]skad ces gsungs te/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten 'di na 'ga' yang ni/_/nam du'ang sdig 'dod skye ma gyur/_/des na sdig pa 'dod rnams kyi/_/'gro ba gang yin shes par gyis/_/lha sbyin mkhas par kun 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]grags shing /_/bsgoms pa yi ni bdag nyid du/_/bkur cing dpal gyis shin tu ni/_/mdzes par rnam par grags yin na/_/de ni bag med dang ldan 'dir/_/de bzhin gshegs la khyad bsad pas/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas ni 
[\[289a.2\]]rab mkhyen pas/_/bskal par gnas par de lung bstan/_/'jungs shing sdig pa'i kun rtog can/_/log par lta ba ma gus pa/_/sgo bzhi par ni shes pa yi/_/mnar med dmyal ba de thob bo/_/gnod pa med cing sdig pa'i las/_/mi mdzad 
[\[289a.3\]]pa la gang 'khu ba/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du'ang /_/sdig pa de nyid reg par 'gyur/_/gang zhig dug gi bum pa yis/_/rgya mtsho ma rung byed 'dod pa/_/chu gter 'jigs rung chen po de/_/de yis de sun mi phyin ltar/_/gang zhig de 
[\[289a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa la/_/kha zer sun 'byin de dang 'dra/_/yang dag gzigs pa zhi ba'i thugs/_/gang la phyar kas mi rdzi ba/_/de 'dra ba ni bshes gnyen bya/_/de ni mkhas pas bsten bya ste/_/de lta bu la bsten byas na/_/legs par 'gyur 
[\[289a.5\]]zhing sdig mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/de nas lha sbyin 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i log pa'i lta ba dang ldan te/_
[\[289a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa 'jig rten pha rol med do snyam pa'i nges pa thob nas nyan thos rnams la gzhi lngas chos ston par byed de/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni zho dang 'o ma la longs spyod de/_deng phyin chad bdag cag gis longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[289a.7\]]gzhi de las be'u rnams la gnod par 'gyur bas so/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sha la longs spyod de/_bdag cag gis longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las srog chags dag gsod par 'gyur bas so/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni lan 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]tshwa la longs spyod de/_bdag cag gis longs spyad par mi bya ste/_rdul khrod nas byung ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni ras kha tshar bcad pa dag gyon te/_bdag cag gis ras kha tshar ring po dag bgo'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi des ras thag pa rnams 
[\[289b.2\]]kyi skyes bu'i rtsal don med par 'gyur bas so/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni dgon pa na gnas te/_bdag cag grong du gnas par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las mi rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos la longs ma spyad par 'gyur bas so/_/zhes 'chad par 
[\[289b.3\]]byed do//_//bar sdom la/_'o ma sha dang lan tshwa dang /_/gos dang dgon par gnas pa'o/_/ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon pa dang lha sbyin gyis bsams pa/_bdag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma la gnod pa ni 
[\[289b.4\]]mang po zhig byas na dge sbyong gau ta ma bsad par ma nus kyis/_song la de'i chung ma dbrog par bya'o snyam nas de ser skya'i gzhir song ste/_des grags 'dzin ma la dge sbyong gau ta ma rab tu byung nas khyod kyi phyir bdag 'ongs kyis/_bdag dang khyod du lhan cig 
[\[289b.5\]]dga' mgur spyad par bya'o zhes spring ba/_/des sa 'tsho ma la bzlas pa dang /_des smras pa/_khyod kyis 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag cag gi lag pa nas 'dzin par spro na/_gal te khyod kyang spro na tshur shog shig ces spring shig_/des 
[\[289b.6\]]de la spring nas de ngo tsha med pas pho brang du zhugs so/_/des them skas la 'dzegs nas sa 'tsho ma mthong ba dang /_des 'dzum pas thal mo sbyar bar brtsams shing de ni tshan po che'i stobs can yin pas de'i lag pa g.yon pas de'i sor mo bsdams pas 
[\[289b.7\]]khrag 'dzag par gyur to/_/de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i rol pa'i rdzing du bor ro/_/de bor ba na khus btab pa shAkya rnams kyis thos nas/_lha sbyin byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang du zhugs nas btsun mo rnams 'phrog go zhes brgyugs pa na/_de 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]rnams de rol pa'i rdzing du bor ba mthong nas de rnams kyis gros bya bar brtsams pa/_'di bsad dam/_yang bsams pa/_shi zin pa 'di bsad de ci rung /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar lha sbyin ngan song sems can dmyal bar 
[\[290a.2\]]bskal [(]bar [,]par [)]gnas te gsor mi rung ba'o zhes 'di lung bstan pa nyid do zhes de rnams kyis de bskrad pa dang gtor khung nas byung ste bros pa las de'i gos ral te dum bu gnyis su gyur to/_/des bsams pa/_'di ni legs kyis/_bdag gi nyan thos rnams 
[\[290a.3\]]la bskon no snyam mo/_/des dus gzhan zhig na shAkya rnams bsdus te smras pa/_bdag rgyal srid la zhog shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mo yod kyis de re zhig bdag gir byos la/_de nas phyis rgyal srid 
[\[290a.4\]]gyis shig ces de skad smras pa dang /_lha sbyin shAkya rnams kyi dogs pa dang bral nas khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du 'dzegs te grags 'dzin ma'i drung du song ste thal mo sbyar te smras pa/_khyod kyis bka' stsal pa nyan gyis thugs bag mdzod cig dang /_bdag gi 
[\[290a.5\]]btsun mo'i dam par bgyis la ser skya'i gzhi la rgyal srid bgyi'o/_/grags 'dzin ma ni rab gnon chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa yin pas de khri bzang po las langs nas lag pa gnyis nas bzung ste/_pus mos brdabs nas de'i lag pa gnyis nas khrag 
[\[290a.6\]]'dzag par gyur to/_/de sdug bsngal tshor bas nyen pa dang grags 'dzin mas smras pa/_khyod ni ngo tsha med cing blun po yin te/_khyod kho mos lag pa nas bzung ba gang yin pa'ang bzod par mi nus par kho mo 'dod dam/_kho mo'i khyim thab tu ni 'khor los sgyur 
[\[290a.7\]]ba'am/_byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur ro zhes des spyos nas de nas pho brang nang nas byung ba dang /_shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/_song la bcom ldan 'das la bzod pa gsol cig_/gal te khyod la bcom ldan 'das kyis bzod pa gnang na de'i 'og tu 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]rgyal srid byas so cog_/des be'u yi lte ba lta bu zhes bya ba'i dug mchog tu rno bas sen mo'i gseb bkang ste bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la/_gal te dge sbyong gau ta mas bzod pa byas na de lta na legs/_gal te bzod pa ma byas na de nyid du de'i 
[\[290b.2\]]rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas sen mo bkang ba'i dug gis rkang pa gnyis bsku bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bzod par gsol lo/_/bcom 
[\[290b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_'di ci 'dra ba'i sems kyis nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs snyam na de bsad pa'i sems kyis yin par gzigs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi mthil nas zhabs kyi pus mo'i lha nga man chad shel gyi rang bzhin du mngon par sprul nas cang mi 
[\[290b.4\]]gsung bar bzhugs so/_/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la sen mos rmad byung bar brtsams pa las de'i sen mo chag nas de skyengs te gsol pa/_'di ltar khyod kyis/_gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba/_/de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 
[\[290b.5\]]'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pas khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/_/gal te ngan 'gror mchi bar gyur na khyod kyi de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]lags par 'gyur ro/_/shin tu drag po'i las yongs su rdzogs par byas pa rnams la ni lus zhig pa la mi sdod pas de gson po nyid du 
[\[290b.6\]]mnar med pa'i me 'bar bas kun nas yog nas kun dga' bo tshig go/_/kun dga' bo bsregs so zhes ngu bar brtsams so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rang gi skye bo la mnyes gshin pa/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_byams pa'i bdag nyid can des 
[\[290b.7\]]smras pa/_lha sbyin tshur de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su song shig_/de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen cing las kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong nas bsam pa thag pa nas sems bskyed cing tshig 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]tu yang smras pa/_bdag rus pa'i khong nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su 'gro'o zhes smras nas/_rang gi lus kyis mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[291a.2\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lha sbyin gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshams sbyar te/_mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal par gnas nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas par 'gyur te/_rang sangs rgyas rus pa can zhes bya bar 
[\[291a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de mngon par byang chub ma thag tu bsod snyoms la song nas de mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/_lag pa 'khru zhing sems pa la zhugs pa/_bdag ci'i phyir yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur snyam pa las des bsams na/_bdag 
[\[291a.4\]]gis tshe rabs tshe rabs su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa shes bya la mnga' brnyes pa la yang pha rol gnon pa byas la/_de yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir yin par shes nas/_des 
[\[291a.5\]]bsod snyoms de yang longs ma spyad par steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/_'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings 
[\[291a.6\]]su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyi kun tu spyod pa ni dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu zhing 'gro ba yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi 
[\[291a.7\]]bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis lha sbyin rang byang chub tu lung bstan gyis/_tshur bdag cag mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po'i nang du dong la lha sbyin spro bsring ngo zhes de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po gnyis mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang du dong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po sems can dmyal ba 
[\[291b.2\]]rnams la soms shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag na char pa'i rgyun gtun shing tsam 'bab pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_chu de mnar med pa'i lce rnams kyi bar du bskams so/_/
[\[291b.3\]]de bzhin du gnya' shing dang /_shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char gyi rgyun dag dbab par brtsams pa dang /_chu de yang bar du bskams so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_dmyal ba de thams cad chus 
[\[291b.4\]]bkang nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_lha sbyin gang yin pa de tshur shog_/lha sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma 'ongs nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung lha sbyin gang yin pa de tshur shog shig_/
[\[291b.5\]]de nas lha sbyin tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa dang de gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyod la gnod pa'i khyad par cung zad yod dam 
[\[291b.6\]]des smras pa/_re zhig mnar med pa'i sems can rnams kyi spyi thun gang yin pa de lta zhog gi/_/bdag la gang zag pa lhag pa mchis pa gang lags pa de gson cig_/lcags kyi ri 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig 
[\[291b.7\]]tu gyur pa dag mchis nas bdag la til bzhin 'thag par bgyid do/_/sog le phyogs gnyis ka na so mchis pas yan lag dang nying lag rnams 'thub par bgyid do/_/lcags kyi tho ba 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]gcig tu gyur pa dag gis myur ba myur bar mgo phye mar rlog par bgyid do/_/phyogs bzhi nas glang po che dag mchis nas de rnams kyis bdag 'bras phye bzhin du 'thag par bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu 
[\[292a.2\]]gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha sbyin khyod kyis lcags kyi ri 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag 'ongs te khyod la til bzhin 'thag par byed do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar khyod kyis bcom ldan 
[\[292a.3\]]'das dgrongs pa'i phyir ri bya rgod kyi phung po las rdo 'phangs pa de'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no/_/sog le phyogs gnyis na so yod pa 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag gis yan lag dang nying lag 
[\[292a.4\]]thams cad 'thub par byed do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phye ba de'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no/_/lcags kyi tho ba 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur 
[\[292a.5\]]pa rnams kyis myur ba myur bar [{]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]phye mar rlog go zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar khyod kyis dge slong ma dgra bcom pa ut+pa la'i mdog khu tshur gyis bsnun te bsad pa de'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no/_/phyogs bzhi nas glang po che rnams lhags te de 
[\[292a.6\]]rnams kyis bdag 'bras phye bzhin du 'thag par byed do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das dgrongs pa'i phyir glang po che'i dam pa nor skyong rbad pa de'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no/_/de lta mod kyi khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis lung 
[\[292a.7\]]bstan to/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu ci zhig tu/_dge slong dag lha sbyin gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshams sbyar nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal par gnas nas rang sangs rgyas rus pa can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo /_/des 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te de lta na bdag blo gcig pus mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por gnas par bzod do//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgya rtsa dgu pa ste tha ma'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_
[\[292b.2\]]maud gal gyi bu de gnyis ko ka li ka la sogs pa gang na ba der dong ba dang /_ji tsam na ko ka li ka'i/_lce thong gshol brgyas rmed do/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas ko ka li ka la smras pa/_ko ka li ka dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi 
[\[292b.3\]]bu des pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la'o byams pa dag la sems dad pa skyed cig ces smras pa dang /_ko ka li kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis mthong nas smras pa/_sdig pa can 'di gnyis 'dir yang 'ongs pa lta 
[\[292b.4\]]zhes tshig tu smras ma thag tu ko ka li ka'i lce la thong gshol stong gis rmed par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis 'di dag la ci byar yang med do snyam nas slar log ste/_'od srung rdzogs byed gang na ba der dong 
[\[292b.5\]]ba dang /_de nas 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyi rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu bdag gis chos log par bshad nas skye bo'i tshogs bslus pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 
[\[292b.6\]]bdag gi lce la thong gshol lnga brgyas rmed do/_/slob ma rnams kyis ji lta ji ltar bdag gi chad pa la bgyi ba bgyid pa de lta de ltar bdag gis ches mi bzad pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba lags kyis/_bdag gi gnas skabs de dag la rig par bgyis 
[\[292b.7\]]nas/_de'i chad pa la bya ba ma byed cig ces bzlog tu gsol/_de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis dmyal bar brgyus te rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin nas de gnyis kyis 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong rnams dang /_skye bo'i tshogs la lha sbyin dang /_ko ka li ka dang /_rdzogs byed la sogs pa sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi gnas skabs rgyas par bsnyad do/_/dge slong rnams the tshom 
[\[293a.2\]]skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa lha sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bka' ma lags par bgyis pas mnar ma mchis pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 
[\[293a.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis nga'i tshig tshig ma yin par byas pas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub 
[\[293a.4\]]sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na ba lang rnams kyi nang du skyes nas khyu mchog tu gyur te/_de nub mo grong khyer nas byung nas rgyal po'i mon sran gre'u'i zhing la za zhing nyin par grong khyer na gnas so/_/ji tsam na de'i drung du bong bu zhig 'ongs nas smras 
[\[293a.5\]]pa/_zhang po khyod kyi khrag dang /_sha dang /_pags pa ni rgyas la/_khyod rgyu ba ni lan 'ga' yang bdag gis ma mthong ngo /_/des smras pa/_tsha bo bdag ni nub mo rgyal po'i mon sran gre'u'i zhing la za'o/_/des smras pa/_zhang po bdag kyang khyod dang lhan 
[\[293a.6\]]cig mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_tsha bo khyod ni skad 'byin 'dod pas gnod pa byas par mi 'gyur grang /_des smras pa/_zhang po mi dbyung gis 'dong ngo /_/de gnyis kyis rgyal po'i mon sran gre'u'i zhing gi 'greng rib rnams dral te zhugs 
[\[293a.7\]]nas bong bus ji srid 'grangs pa de srid skad ma phyung ngo /_/de nas smras pa/_zhang po re zhig glu zhig blang ngam/_khyu mchog gis smras pa/_kho bo ma song gi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod la de'i 'og tu ci dga' ba gyis shig ces smras nas bros pa dang /_
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]bong bus skad phyung ba rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis thos nas bzung ste/_shes ldan dag bong bu 'dis ni rgyal po'i mon sran gre'u'i zhing 'di thams cad zos kyis chad pas gcad par bya'o zhes de rnams kyis rna ba bcad de mgul du gtun cig btags nas btang 
[\[293b.2\]]ngo /_/de phan tshun 'khyam pa khyu mchog gis mthong nas des de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_legs par glu blangs glu rab blangs/_/khyod kyis glu yi 'bras bu thob/_/khyod kyi glu yis bdag gi yang /_/rna ba de'u ni yal bar gyur/_/tshig 
[\[293b.3\]]mi srung ba gang yin pa/_/de la 'di 'dra 'byung 'gyur gyis/_/rna rdum gtun gyis rnam brgyan pa/_/da ni 'khyam par byed la rag_/des kyang tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/_so chag khyod ni kha rog shig_/glang rgan khyod ni kha rog shig_/
[\[293b.4\]]lag na dbyug thogs mi gsum po/_/khyod nyid kyang ni tshol bar byed/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyu mchog gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bong bu gang 
[\[293b.5\]]yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'dis nga'i tshig tshig tu ma byas pas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/da ltar yang 'dis pa'i tshig tshig tu ma byas pas 'di tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis 
[\[293b.6\]]nga'i tshig tshig tu ma byas pas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas pa de la glang mtshan dang ldan pa zhig yod nas/_des de dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rang 
[\[293b.7\]]gi skye bo dang /_phongs pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_bkren pa dang /_nad pa rnams zan byin nas ci dgar spyod du btang ngo /_/de dus gzhan zhig na phan tshun du rgyu rgyu ba las 'dam du song nas khyim bdag gis nyi ma nub tsam na thos te 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]btsal ba las/_de'i drung du phyin nas des bsams pa/_da ni dbyung mi nus kyis sang nang par dbyung bar bya'o snyam mo/_/glang gis smras pa/_bdag gi mdun du zhags pa zhig zhog la bzhud cig dang /_gal te wa 'ongs 
[\[294a.2\]]par gyur dang /_bdag gi rwas zhags pa blangs te de la gdab par bgyi'o/_/des de'i mdun du zhags pa zhig bzhag nas song ba dang mtshan mo ji tsam na wa zhig 'ongs nas des smras pa/_pad ma'i rtsa ba dang /_pad ma dkar po dag 'byin pa 
[\[294a.3\]]'di su zhig_/glang gis smras pa/_kho bo yin no/_/'dam gyi nang du bying nas 'dug go/_/was bsams pa/_bdag zas dang phrad do snyam nas des de la gtse bar brtsams pa dang /_glang gis smras pa/_khyod phyogs 'di nas song 
[\[294a.4\]]shig_/tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/_'on kyang de ldog tu ma btub nas de kho na bzhin du 'tshe ba dang /_glang gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kho bo pad ma'i rtsa mi 'byin/_/kho bo pad ma dkar po'ang min/_/gal te khyod ni 
[\[294a.5\]]za 'dod na/_/rgyab tu song la bza' bar gyis/_/was bza' snyam nas rgyab tu zhon pa dang /_khyu mchog gi rwas zhags pa btab pas wa'i ske nas thogs nas nam mkha' la 'phyang ba dang /_glang gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod ci gar mkhan 
[\[294a.6\]]dzab ke ba'am/_/'on te gar slob khye'u zhig yin/_/dgon par bya dga' ster ba med/_/bzo ni grong khyer bstan par gyis/_/was kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag ni gar mkhan dzab ke ba'am/_/gar slob khye'u ni ma yin te/_/
[\[294a.7\]]brgya byin gyis ni skas btsugs pas/_/bdag ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'gro/_/glang gis yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_brgya byin gyis ni skas ma btsugs/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten smos ci dgos/_/thabs kyi zhags pas khyod thogs 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]pas/_/khyod ni 'tsho bar ma mthong ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyu mchog gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'dis nga'i tshig tshig tu ma byas pas 
[\[294b.2\]]tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/da ltar yang 'dis nga'i tshig tshig tu ma byas pas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun 
[\[294b.3\]]pa lha sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' ma mnyan pas mnar ma mchis par gzhol bar gyur pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis 
[\[294b.4\]]ngas smras pa'i tshig ma mnyan pas mnar med par gzhol bar gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po'i pho brang 'byor ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba zhig na rgyal po sems pa 
[\[294b.5\]]zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du bcug ste/_bsod nams kyi mthus lha rnams kyis bar snang la stan 'dzin to/_/rgyal po de'i mdun na 'don de la bu spun gnyis yod pa las/_de la phu bo shos ni mngon par 'byung ba la dga' la/_nu bo shos ni mdun 
[\[294b.6\]]na 'don la dga' bar gyur to/_/phu bo shos kyis pha chos dang chos ma yin pas mdun na 'don byed pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag pha shi nas mdun na 'don du gyur te/_bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas mdun na 'don byas na 
[\[294b.7\]]sems can dmyal ba rnams su gzhol bar 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas des pha la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na mdun na 'don shi nas nu bo shos mdun 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]na 'don du bcug ste/_de chos dang chos ma yin pas mdun na 'don byed par brtsams te/_skye bo'i tshogs la 'tshe bar byed do/_/ji tsam na mi zhig phan tshun 'khyam 'khyam pa las phu bo shos rab tu byung ba de'i drung du song ba dang /_des 
[\[295a.2\]]de la dris pa/_khyod gang nas 'ongs/_des smras pa/_rgyal po'i pho brang che ge mo zhes bya ba nas so/_/de gtam dri bar brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_rgyal po'i mdun na 'don shi nas de'i bu nu bo shos mdun na 'don du bcug ste/_de 
[\[295a.3\]]chos ma yin pas mdun na 'don byed pas skye bo'i tshogs 'tshe bar byed do/_/des smras pa/_dus cung zad cig nogs shig dang /_bdag nyid der song nas phan pa ma yin pa las bzlog par bya zhing /_ji ltar yul mi rnams la mi gnod par 
[\[295a.4\]]phan par byed pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/mi des gnyen rnams kyi drung du song ste skabs de smras pa thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nas/_nu bo shos des thos nas des rgyal po la smras pa/_lha bdag gi phu bo de mchis lags so/_/rgyal 
[\[295a.5\]]pos smras pa/_legs kyis de nyid mdun na 'don du 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_lha khyod la bdag gis dus 'di srid cig tu zham 'bring bgyis pa ni don ma mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'di ni 'jig rten gyi chos yin te/_de phu 
[\[295a.6\]]bo yin pas so/_/'on kyang rnam pa gcig gis khyod mdun na 'don du 'gyur ba yod de/_gal te de 'ongs nas khyod kyis bdag phu bo lags so smros shig_/des smras pa/_bka' bzhin 'tshal de bzhin du smra bar bgyi'o/_/ji tsam na 
[\[295a.7\]]de 'ongs pa de rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas mthong nas langs pa dang /_de ni ma langs so/_/des de la smras pa/_khyod kho bo'i nu bo yin na ci'i phyir mi ldang /_des smras pa/_khyod nyid nu bo yin gyi kho bo ni phu bo yin no/_/gal te khyod 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]yid mi ches na bdag cag ni rgyal po'i pho brang du chen por gyur pas lha la zhu'o/_/phu bos rgyal po la dris pa/_kye rgyal po bdag cag gnyis las phu bo gang lags pa gsung shig_/rgyal pos shes bzhin du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig smras pa/_'di ni phu bo 
[\[295b.2\]]yin no/_/khyod ni nu bo yin no zhes tshig smras ma thag kho nar lha rnams kyis stan btang bas sa la rdab nus te/_de'i kha nas rul pa'i dri byung bar gyur to/_/mdun na 'don gyi phu bo shos kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig ni gsungs 
[\[295b.3\]]pas na/_/lha rnams 'di nas dong ba dang /_/zhal yang mnam par gyur nas su/_/mtho ris las kyang nyams par gyur/_/rgyal po bden par gsung shig kye/_/sngon gyi ji lta bzhin du 'gyur/_/gal te [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni gsung mdzad na/_/sems 
[\[295b.4\]]pa 'og tu nges par bzhud/_/gang zhig chos bzhin 'dri ba la/_/chos ma yin pa ston byed na/_/chu na rgyu ba'i nya bzhin du/_/de ni lce ma mchis par 'gyur/_/rgyal pos bden par gsung shig kye/_/sngon gyi ji lta bzhin du 'gyur/_/gal 
[\[295b.5\]]te [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni gsung mdzad na/_/sems pa 'og tu nges par bzhud/_/gang zhig chos bzhin 'dri ba la/_/chos ma yin pa ston byed na/_/der ni skyes pa mi skye zhing /_/der ni skyes par skye mi 'gyur/_/rgyal po bden par gsung shig kye/_/
[\[295b.6\]]sngon gyi ji lta bzhin du 'gyur/_/gal te [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni gsung mdzad na/_/sems pa 'og tu nges par bzhud/_/gang zhig chos bzhin 'dri ba la/_/chos ma yin pa ston byed na/_/lhas ni dus su char mi 'bebs/_/der ni dus ma yin par 'bab/_/
[\[295b.7\]]rgyal po bden par gsung shig kye/_/sngon gyi ji lta bzhin du 'gyur/_/gal te [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni gsung mdzad na/_/sems pa 'og tu nges par bzhud/_/gang zhig chos bzhin 'dri ba la/_/chos ma yin pa ston byed na/_/sbrul bzhin du ni skye bo de'i/_/
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]lce gnyis dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po bden par gsung shig kye/_/sngon gyi ji lta bzhin du 'gyur/_/gal te [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni gsung mdzad na/_/sems pa 'og tu nges par bzhud/_/de ltar rgyal po sems pa yis/_/shin tu 
[\[296a.2\]]mi bzad las byas nas/_/sdig pa byed pa rnams kyi gnas/_/dmyal ba mnar med thob par gyur/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi phu bo shos gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po sems pa 
[\[296a.3\]]gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang 'di ngas smras pa'i tshig ma mnyan pas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba thob bo/_/da ltar yang 'di ngas smras pa'i tshig ma mnyan pas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba thob bo/_/dge slong 
[\[296a.4\]]rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sman par gsungs pa'i bka' lha sbyin gyis ma mnyan par gyur pas mnar ma mchis par gzhol bar gyur pa la gzigs/_
[\[296a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di ltar ngas phan par smras pa'i tshig ma mnyan pas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong 
[\[296a.6\]]dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na 'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon zhig gnas te/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_
[\[296a.7\]]dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na khye'u zhig btsas so/_/btsas nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas rigs 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]dang mthun pa'i ming btags te/_de bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur pa dang de'i pha shi'o/_/de ri 'or zhig na 'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon gzhan zhig yod pa la 'khrul 'khor gyi bzo bslab par brtsams nas/_des ri 'or zhig na khyim 
[\[296b.2\]]bdag cig yod pa las bu mo blangs pa dang /_des smras pa/_gal te nyi ma ga ge mo zhig la 'ongs na ni sbyin no/_/gzhan du na ni mi sbyin no/_/des 'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon la smras pa/_mkhan po ri 'or che ge mo zhes bgyi ba na khyim bdag 
[\[296b.3\]]cig mchis pa la bdag gis bu mo bslangs na de'i mchid nas gal te nyi ma ga ge mo zhes bya ba la 'ongs na ni sbyin gyi/_'on te ma 'ongs na ni mi sbyin no zhes mchi'o/_/'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis smras pa/_bu gal te de lta na 'dod kho bo nyid 
[\[296b.4\]]kyis blang bar bya'o zhes de de dang lhan cig shing las byas pa'i rma bya la zhon nas nyi ma gang la nges par byas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la ri 'or der phyin pa 'jig rten gyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/_/de nas bu mo bslangs te slar yang 'khrul 'khor la zhon te 
[\[296b.5\]]rang gi khyim du 'ongs nas 'khrul 'khor bsdus te de'i ma la gtad nas smras pa/_khyod kyi bu 'dis 'khrul 'khor 'gro ba'i sbyor ba shes kyi slar ldog pa mi shes kyis 'di la 'khrul 'khor ma sbyin cig ces bsgo'o/_/des yang nas yang du ma la smras pa/_
[\[296b.6\]]yum 'khrul 'khor bdag la stsol cig dang skye bo'i tshogs dbang du bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu khyod kyi slob dpon na re 'dis 'khrul 'khor 'gro ba'i sbyor ba shes kyi slar ldog pa mi shes kyis ma sbyin cig ces zer bas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 
[\[296b.7\]]'gyur du 'ong ngo /_/de bas na kho mos mi sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_yum bdag gis 'gro ba dang ldog pa 'tshal mod kyi slob dpon de phrag dog gis mi ster mod/_bud med ni sems yang zhing 'dod chen che ba yin pas de de la byin nas 'khrul 'khor 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]sbyar te zhon nas song ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas 'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis mthong nas des smras pa/_pha bi slar mi 'ong bar song ngo /_/des ji lta ji ltar 'khrul 'khor gcus pa de lta de ltar 
[\[297a.2\]]shin tu thag ring por ldings nas ji tsam na rgya mtsho chen por ldings pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen por ni lhas rgyun du char 'bebs pa yin pas des sbyor kha rnams bangs nas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang 
[\[297a.3\]]zhig don 'dod brtse bas phan pa yis/_/ji skad bstan pa'i tshig ni mi 'dzin cing /_/'chos pa med cing su tshig mi mnyan gang /_/de ni shing las byas pa'i bya yis khyer/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'khrul 
[\[297a.4\]]'khor gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi de'i slob ma gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/_de na yang ngas phan par smras na/_nga'i tshig 'dis ma mnyan pas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/
[\[297a.5\]]da ltar yang ngas phan par smras na nga'i tshig 'dis ma mnyan pas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen zhes bgyi/_dge 
[\[297a.6\]]'dun mthun pa zhes bgyi na de la dbyen ni gang lags/_dge 'dun mthun pa ni gang lags/_nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong rnams chos kyis chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes dang /_chos ma yin pas chos kyi 'du shes dang /_mi mthun pa la mthun pa'i 'du 
[\[297a.7\]]shes kyis las rnams byed na 'di ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen zhes bya'o/_/'di ltar chos la chos kyi 'du shes dang /_mthun pa la mthun pa'i 'du shes kyis las rnams byed na/_'di ni dge 'dun mthun pa zhes bya'o/_/gang na dge slong gcig gnas pa de na dge 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]'dun gyi dbyen du mi 'gyur ro/_/gang na gnyis dang gsum nas brgyad kyi bar gnas pa de na yang dge 'dun gyi dbyen du mi 'gyur ro/_/gang na dge slong dgu 'am lhag pa yod pa de na rgyu gnyis kyis dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur te/_gsol ba'i las dang tshul 
[\[297b.2\]]shing len pas so/_/gsol ba'i las ji lta bu zhe na 'di ltar lha sbyin gyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed de/_tshe dang ldan pa dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'di skad ces brtul zhugs kyi gzhi 
[\[297b.3\]]lngas dge slong dag pa dang /_grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal las 'da' bar 'gyur/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'das pa thob par gyur te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag lnga gang zhe na/_dge slong dgon pa nyid ni 
[\[297b.4\]]dag pa dang /_grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal las 'da' bar 'gyur/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong shing drung nyid dang /_bsod snyoms pa nyid 
[\[297b.5\]]dang /_chos gos gsum pa nyid dang /_phyag dar khrod pa nyid ni dag pa dang /_grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'da' bar 'gyur/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/_tshe dang 
[\[297b.6\]]ldan pa dag khyed cag las gang brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga po 'di dag gis dag pa dang /_grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung bar mi bzod pa de dag dge sbyong gau ta ma las ring du gyis shig_/tha dad par gyis shig_/rgyang srings shig ces zer ba 'di ni 
[\[297b.7\]]gsol ba ste/_de lta bu ni gsol ba'i las kyis yin no/_/tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'di ltar lha sbyin gyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed de/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]sbyong gau ta ma ni 'di skad ces brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lngas dge slong dag pa dang /_grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'da' bar 'gyur/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'das pa thob par 'gyur te/_tshe dang 
[\[298a.2\]]ldan pa dag lnga gang zhe na/_dge slong dgon pa pa nyid ni dag pa dang /_grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal las 'da' bar 'gyur/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong shing drung pa 
[\[298a.3\]]nyid dang /_bsod snyoms pa nyid dang /_chos gos gsum pa nyid dang /_phyag dar khrod pa nyid ni dag pa dang /_grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'da' bar 'gyur/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal las 'das pa thob 
[\[298a.4\]]par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gang brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga po 'di dag gis/_dag pa dang /_grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung bar mi bzod pa de dag dge sbyong gau ta ma las ring du 'gyur/_tha dad par 'gyur/_rgyang sring bar 
[\[298a.5\]]'gyur gyis tshul shing long shig ces lha sbyin bdag nyid dang lngas tshul shing len pa yin te/_de lta bu ni tshul shing len pas yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa re zhig gnas nas phyung bas dge 
[\[298a.6\]]'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur la gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas 
[\[298a.7\]]nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags sam/_btsun pa re zhig gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du gyur la gnas nas phyung bas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags sam/_btsun 
[\[298b.2\]]pa re zhig gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur la gnas nas phyung bas ma lags/_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin 
[\[298b.3\]]pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags sam/_btsun pa re zhig gnas nas 'byin pas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ba la gnas nas phyung bas ma lags/_gnas nas phyung ba'i 
[\[298b.4\]]rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags sam/_
[\[298b.5\]]btsun pa re zhig gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur la gnas nas phyung bas ma lags/_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_
[\[298b.6\]]gnas nas 'byin pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags sam/_btsun pa re zhig gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ba la gnas nas 
[\[298b.7\]]phyung bas ma lags/_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pas ma lags/_gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pas ma lags 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]sam/_nye ba 'khor gnas nas phyung ba 'ba' zhig ma gtogs par 'di dag thams cad kyis dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ro//_//bar sdom la/_dge 'dun dbyen dang mthun pa dang /_/gcig tu dge 'dun dbyen min 
[\[299a.2\]]dang /_/tha ma dgu po dbyen dang ni/_/gnas dbyung gsum po drug tshan yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i 
[\[299a.3\]]dbyen bgyis nas mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing /_mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa btsun pa ji tsam gyis na nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen bgyis nas/_mnar 
[\[299a.4\]]med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur lags/_nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes dang /_dbyen la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis 
[\[299a.5\]]dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyis dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong gis nyan thos kyi 
[\[299a.6\]]dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes 
[\[299a.7\]]dang /_dbyen la chos kyi 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing /_mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos ma yin pa la chos ma 
[\[299b.2\]]yin pa'i 'du shes dang /_dbyen la yid gnyis kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na 
[\[299b.3\]]nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos ma yin pa la chos 
[\[299b.4\]]kyi 'du shes dang /_dbyen la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam 
[\[299b.5\]]gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos ma yin pa la 
[\[299b.6\]]chos kyi 'du shes dang /_dbyen la chos kyi 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis 
[\[299b.7\]]na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos ma yin pa la chos 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]kyi 'du shes dang /_dbyen la yid gnyis kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_
[\[300a.2\]]'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis 
[\[300a.3\]]chos la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes dang /_dbyen la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir 
[\[300a.4\]]pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing /_mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[300a.5\]]nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes dang /_dbyen la chos kyi 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun 
[\[300a.6\]]gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par mi 
[\[300a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes dang /_dbyen la yid gnyis kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing dge 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis 
[\[300b.2\]]ni reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos la chos kyi 'du shes dang /_dbyen la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug 
[\[300b.3\]]par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i kha na ma 
[\[300b.4\]]tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos la chos kyi 'du shes dang /_dbyen la chos kyi 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin 
[\[300b.5\]]du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing mtshams med pa'i 
[\[300b.6\]]kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos la chos kyi 'du shes dang /_dbyen la yid gnyis kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin 
[\[300b.7\]]du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing /_mtshams med 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos ma yin pa la yid gnyis dang /_dbyen la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go 
[\[301a.2\]]bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas mnar med pa'i kha na 
[\[301a.3\]]ma tho ba skye zhing /_mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos ma yin pa la yid gnyis dang /_dbyen la chos kyi 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun 
[\[301a.4\]]tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha 
[\[301a.5\]]na ma tho ba skye zhing /_mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos ma yin pa la yid gnyis dang /_dbyen la yid gnyis kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu 
[\[301a.6\]]go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i 
[\[301a.7\]]kha na ma tho ba skye zhing /_mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos la yid gnyis dang /_dbyen la chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar 
[\[301b.2\]]med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing /_mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos la yid gnyis dang /_dbyen la chos kyi 'du shes kyis dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_
[\[301b.3\]]kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen byas nas/_
[\[301b.4\]]mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing /_mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong gis chos la yid gnyis dang /_dbyen la yid gnyis kyis dge slong rnams la go 
[\[301b.5\]]bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par byed na/_'di tsam gyis na nye ba 'khor dge slong nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun 
[\[301b.6\]]pa'i dbyen byas nas/_mnar med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye zhing /_mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis ni reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na de dag ni mu [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du 'gyur la/_de dag las drug la ni mtshams 
[\[301b.7\]]med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par 'gyur te/_dbyen la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa gang dag yin pa'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyis reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]'dun gyi dbyen gyi gzhi rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba gzhi rdzogs so//_//thub dbang zla ba'i zhal nas byung gyur pa/_/gsung gi me tog 
[\[302a.2\]]char pa yid 'ong rnams/_/lta ba ngan zlog rnyi ba med pa yi/_/rang bzhin yun ring skye dgu'i nang gnas shog_/kha che'i mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang /_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang /_kha che'i mkhan 
[\[302a.3\]]po d+harmA ka ra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal gyi lhun pos bsgyur cing /_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//_
[\[302a.4\]]bzod pa dka' thub dam pa bzod pa ni/_/mya ngan 'da' ba mchog ces sangs rgyas gsung /_/rab tu byung ba gzhan la gnod pa dang /_/gzhan la 'tshe ba dge sbyong ma yin no//_//ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba 
[\[302a.5\]]data/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH//_//
